40001001	Zaar ci ɔl ween jijitigi Yesu ween Kiristo ween dole ci dɔl o Devid ween ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim o karɛ naaga ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ ka kiiya nɛɛn ce.
40001002	Ibrayim baale baati Aizak. Aizak baati Jakob. Jakob baati Juda ki ŋɛɛrigin oogi.
40001003	Juda baati Paraz kibeen Zera ween yaatineeŋ nɛɛn Tamar. Paraz baati Ezron. Ezron baati Raam.
40001004	Raam baati Aminadab. Aminadab baati Nacon. Nacon baati Salmon.
40001005	Salmon baati Bowaz baal kazi yaatin nɛ Reyab. Bowaz baati Obɛd baal kazi yaatin zaar nɛ Ruz. Obɛd baati Jesi.
40001006	Jesi baati alaan o kazi Devid. Devid baati Solomon. Yaatinɛ baale rak ŋaa ci eet o kazi Oraya.
40001007	Solomon baati Riyoboyam. Riyoboyam baati Abija. Abija baati Asa.
40001008	Asa baati Jeyozivat. Jeyozivat baati Joram. Joram baati Uziiya.
40001009	Uziiya baati Jotam. Jotam baati Eyaz. Eyaz baati Izakiya.
40001010	Izakiya baati Manasa. Manasa baati Amoon. Amoon baati Josiya.
40001011	Josiya baati Jikoniya ki gɔtɔnɔgi baal aritai waan baal agamin ɔl o Israyil, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ looce o kazi Babilan e.
40001012	Zin vurta mazi akɔ agamnyi ɔl o Israyil, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ Babilana, Jikoniya ook izi baati Sɛlitil. Sɛlitil baati Zarubabel.
40001013	Zarubabel baati Abiyud. Abiyud baati Iliyakim. Iliyakim baati Azɔr.
40001014	Azɔr baati Zadok. Zadok baati Acim. Acim baati Eliyud.
40001015	Eliyud baati Eliyezar. Eliyezar baati Maatan. Maatan baati Jakob.
40001016	Jakob baati Josev ween eet o Meri ween yaati Yesu ween Kiristo.
40001017	Izi zin bulowa ci ɔɔtɔ dook amɔtɔ wec akanai ŋaati Ibrayim zɛɛ been Devid. Bodo akanai ŋaati Devid zɛɛ been iiten baal agamin ɔl, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ Babilana e bulok amɔtɔ wec. Bodo akanai iinyaye baal agamin ɔl e zɛɛ been iiten baal aritan Kiristo e bulok amɔtɔ wec.
40001018	Zin Yesu Kiristo aritai gole ci abil kete. Baale yaatin Meri agam ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ka kiriyi. Mazi ŋaan kitivica niini nɔɔnɔ, bar ajowa Meri ɛlɛ anyake dolece ci anyononek Vɔŋize o Joowo.
40001019	Maje Josev baale niini eet ci abon, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ kɔbɔrak ɔl nyayiin ci Meri o, bar abaaban olla arɔɔŋ kotoŋ nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ yɔɔt calaŋ akɔlak alyaan.
40001020	Mazi ŋaan abaaban niini gi nico, iiyak nɔɔnɔ toonnyaiti ci Joowo wunozyai, ma aku anek nɛ, “Josev, borit o tatok o Devid, má abur Meri ŋaati avicanɛ kizi ŋaa cun gaga, eeci dole ci anyak niini kɛŋa noko anyek nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
40001021	Arita tiŋeere logoz, ma akanei zaar ci kazi Yesu, eeci aku niini ka kiiya kɛɛla ɔl ogin baciinowɛ.”
40001022	Akatai ni didi kaal nicigi kɛzɛdjai dook kɛlɛɛmtɛ ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi nyakaŋan zooze o anɛ nɛ,
40001023	“Anyake katin kabarzɛci oman gole ci abiirni ɔl ooti, ma arita logoz, ma akanonek katin nɔɔnɔ zaara ci kazi Imanawil.” Kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ Aavi Jooi Ŋaatinai.
40001024	Mazi akɔ aŋaaz Josev ooŋnyai, iiya didi ook itivica Meri eona aduwaki toonnyaiti o Joowo nɔɔnɔ e.
40001025	Mazin iinya ci baal anyayin Meri neke dook ŋaan koromtɛ Josev ki nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋaa ki eet zɛɛ ma akɔ ookcai. Mazi ookcai dole, akatek Josev nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Yesu.
40002001	Aritai zin waanice Yesu kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm looce o kazi Judiya irkite o ɛɛnɛ Erod alaan. Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ivita ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o gɔɔn iiyez kaal monyonyɛ libire ci jenu o ivitak Jerusalɛm.
40002002	Ma avu ajine azi nɛ, “Aavi logoti o aritai ka kizi alaan unooŋ Juz ŋaaḏaŋ? Ayelzai monyatot oninɛ kicinta libire ci jenu kabaaka naaga e. Zin kanowana ka kiiya kidiŋdiŋanta nɔɔnɔ.”
40002003	Mazi akɔ azii Erod ween alaan kibeen ɔl dook Jerusalɛma zɔɔz nico, ivirit nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40002004	Ma awa Erod alaat o ceez o Joowo been alaat o demziinto ŋaatodoi, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ gɛnyiza anek nɛ, “Kiristo aritai dim katin ŋaaḏaŋ?”
40002005	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aritai katin niini kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm looce o kazi Judiya. Anyak baale nyakaŋan ci ayɛɛt zɔɔz ci anɛ Jooi nɛ,
40002006	Ineeta kutur o kazi Bɛzilɛm o abil Judiya adiŋdiŋ niina ɔrɔɔt, eeci aritai katin ŋaatun alaani ci ka kiiya kabal ɔl ogan Israyil.”
40002007	Otowa ni Erod ɔl o avu libire o jenu e ka kɔɔt kozoozɔ ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaatineeŋ doon, ma aku ajin niini nɔɔgɔ iiten ci da acini niigi monyatot ci tiryan ci dole ci ka kizi alaan ci Juz o. Ma aduwak niigi nɔɔnɔ iiten ci baal acini niigi monyatot o.
40002008	Ma anek Erod nɔɔgɔ gɛnyiza nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ zin orooŋit dole nico Bɛzilɛma juruŋ zɛɛ mazi ajowanu, ivita buk uduktayaŋ aneeta ka kook kidiŋdiŋan buk naana nɔɔnɔ.”
40002009	Mazi adotiz zooze ci ona aduwak alaani nɔɔgɔ o, ɔtɔɔzɔ. Ma gɔla icinit niigi bodo monyatot baal rak acin e ɛlɛ.
40002010	Ma atalnɛ niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma oontanɛ monyatot nici nɔɔgɔ ŋuma nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma akɔ abil ŋaati ona aavɛ dole o ɛlɛ.
40002011	Ŋinaante mazi avɔ niigi ceeza eecitɔ, acin dole ki yaatin Meri, ma akani niigi kozoŋti looc adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ. Okolit ni kaboot ugeec anyak e, ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal ci titiny, warki ki karacɛnɛn been karkarɛt.
40002012	Uduwak ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ wunozyai gi calaŋ amiirɔnɛkɛ Erod. Ma ŋeere imiirte didi niigi gole oman ɔɔt looce uneeŋ calaŋ adiir Erod.
40002013	Ma vurte o imiirtɔi ɔl nica, iiyak toonnyaiti ci Joowo Josev wunozyai, ma aricanek gi ci anek nɛ, “Tiŋaje! Dɔkɔnyi dole ki yaatin biti Masirɛ. Bitɔ aavu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma kanekin nɛ, Bada bodo, eeci tiŋeere Erod arɔɔŋ dole ka kuruk kadaak.”
40002014	Itiŋa ni Josev ecodoi nɔkɔ iyiit dole ki yaatin baaline nico ɛlɛ ooyi Masirɛ.
40002015	Ma akɔ abaak ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adaai Erod. Zin gi nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal azi Jooi nyakaŋane onin nɛ, “Kotowa ŋɛɛran Masirɛ ka kimiirozek looc baal aritan e.”
40002016	Mazi akɔ aga Erod ɔl baal avu libire ojenu e alaba da bar nɔɔnɔ, otobor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma aricanek takirnya kɔɔt kuruyit dɔl o miliny macik anyak irkitok ram been o miliny tɛr ŋaan aritai Bɛzilɛma been vitɛnane o ajɔŋzɔ dook. Agɔɔn Erod nɔkɔ o, eeci aduwak ɔl baal avu libire o jenu e nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Izi irkitowa ci ɔɔtɔ iiten baal kacina monyatot e zɛɛ been inoko o ram.” Gi ci zin aruyi Erod dɔl ci miliny anyak irkitok ram been o ŋaan kurumit irkitok nicoko o nɛɛn.
40002017	Zin giye o aruwɛn dɔlya kadaayitɔ Bɛzilɛma ɛlɛɛmnyai zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jirimaya e didi.
40002018	Azi baale niini nɛ, “Iziiyɛ mɔlɔyi ci aluwɛki Recal dɔl ogin kuture o kazi Rama nunun. Aboobi niini nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma alaŋ ajaki becn nɛɛn, eeci dɔlya oginɛ dook adaayitɔ.”
40002019	Mazi akɔ adaai Erod, iiyak toonnyaiti ci Joowo Josev wunozyai Masirɛ.
40002020	Ma aku anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Miirɔi dole kibeen yaatin biti looce o Israyil. Eeci ɔl baal arɔɔŋ kuruyit dole kadaak e adaayitɔ.”
40002021	Itiŋa ni Josev iyit dole ki yaatin abadakɛ looc o Israyil.
40002022	Bar mazi akɔ azii bodo niini Arkiloz irigiz alaazɛt o baatin Erod abalun Judiya, ɔtɔŋɔlɛ niini ŋaati akɔ abaai ŋinaante. Zin buk itilo Jooi nɔɔnɔ gɔla wunozyai laadun ka calaŋ akɔ Judiya. Ook ni niini abaak looce o kazi Galili.
40002023	Aruwek niini kɔrɔk looc kuture onin kazi Nazarɛt. Itiroyai ni Yesu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adikir, ka kɛlɛɛmɛ gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani azi nɛ, “Katin aga ɔl dook niini eet ci Nazarɛt.”
40003001	Ma vurta irkitowe ogɛn iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Jɔn o oonyi, ma akana niini uuwayi balala looce o kazi Judiya.
40003002	Agɛrɛny niini iinya dook anek ɔl nɛ, “Otoŋit baciinok ugooc gɛr agoonu, eeci baliin o Joowo izi ajɔn.”
40003003	Jɔn zin nɛɛn baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya e. Azi baale niini nɛ, “Agɛrɛny ɛɛti oman balala azi nɛ, Idimdimantek Manyi gɔl onin. Amadek nɔɔnɔ golok ogin keelit tɔp.”
40003004	Ma Jɔn nici waanice aborcek niini rumanɛ ci agɔɔnnyai imane ci nyakaletu. Ma anyak kavali ceen ruceen barkɔnya, ma adak niini giroc ki lɛtɛ kizi dayiin cigin nɛɛn.
40003005	Ma avunak ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ Jerusalɛma ki Judiya buk kibeen vitɛne o ajɔŋɔz liil o kazi Jordan dook.
40003006	Ma avu abad niigi mony baciinowe ugeec, ma oony niini nɔɔgɔ liile nico.
40003007	Mazi acin Jɔn ɔl o kazi Parici kibeen ɔl o kazi Sajuzi avunak nɔɔnɔ ka kivita kicinit kaal ci agɔɔn niini o, enewun nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet dɔl ci kokonyawu coko! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci ilotuŋ ka odokonyit bornɛt noŋe o Joowo ka kiiya tiŋeere neke o?
40003008	Abon zin agoonu kaal ci abon ci ayelza gi ci utuŋtu niiga kaal o gɛr didi.
40003009	Má bar anonu nɛ, Keegina dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, Jooi anyak dɔyiz ci ookci biyɛn nico kiziti dɔl ci Ibrayim labak.
40003010	Eelnu niiga kiyo kɛɛna. Olla zin inoko mɛlɛyi o payiin o Joowo ɛrɛwɔ ka kɛɛcawuŋ loota kiyo kɛɛca kɛɛt o. Gɔɔn zin laadun kɛɛt calaŋ arek kɛbɛrɛ ci abon, atɛɛdjak looc, ma akanonek goo.
40003011	Kuunyuŋ zin inoko naana igeet maami doon ka keyelizyai badi mony o baciinok ugooc. Bar anyak eet oma ci ŋaan aku ka kiiya kotoony ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ Vɔŋize o Joowo, ma apayek oogi goo. Adikir niini ɔrɔɔt kujukan aneet. Ma alaŋ kaganona kanyayek naana nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zoonu.
40003012	Anyaa niini luli ci arekɛ labi ŋɔɔt ka kɛŋɛr labi ki jululu. Ma arek labi kɛbɛrɛ karat, maje jululu avaat gooye o alaŋ adiiti been nɛɛn.”
40003013	Ma iitene nice iiya Yesu looce o kazi Galili. Aku akɔ ŋaati Jɔn ka kook kotoony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
40003014	Maje Jɔn arɔɔŋ kujura ŋaati oonyi nɔɔnɔ, eeci aga niini anyak Yesu dɔyiz ci appe kujuk nɔɔnɔ. Ma anek Jɔn nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati kuunyin naana ineet, bar karooŋnyin ineet toonyan aneet.”
40003015	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyek kibil kiyo kaduwakin noko. Abon kagɔɔn naaga nɔkɔ rak ka koolyai gi o arooŋekan Jooi aneet kutugu.” Agama ni Jɔn zɔɔz nico, ma oony nɔɔnɔ.
40003016	Mazi akɔ adotiz toonyɛnta, ɔyɔyai Yesu maami, ma akole tammu kɛŋ, ma acin niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo ŋaati akunakɛ looc kiyo yɛɛlac o, ma aku abil ŋaatin.
40003017	Ma azi mɔlɔyi ci aku Joowa tammu tadena nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran onan kareez nɛɛn nici. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
40004001	Iyit ni Vɔŋizi o Joowo Yesu ooyi balala ka kook kicina Loryenti nɔɔnɔ.
40004002	Mazi akɔ aavi niini ŋinaante kɔkɔm dayiin iinya eet ram been baalinok eet ram, aburek nɔɔnɔ magiz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40004003	Iiyak ni Loryen nɔɔnɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã een didi ŋɛɛrti Joowo, towo di biyɛn nicoko kizi dayiin.”
40004004	Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Alaŋ ɛɛti ci deer arogni dayiin doon, bar buk arogni niini zoozok o aduŋna otoge o Joowo.”
40004005	Itiŋawi ni bodo Loryen Yesu ŋinaante ooyi Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ atɔɔdi ceez o Joowo taden.
40004006	Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, kul di ŋinaanto taak tɔdɔ, eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Ŋaan itoona Jooi toonnyak ogin ka kivita katabuŋtawin niigi ineet calaŋ iinai looc kuruktin biyɛn zɔɔ.”
40004007	Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Azi buk waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Má acina Jook ween Manyi unun.”
40004008	Itiŋawi ni Loryen Yesu ŋinaante bodo ooyi biye ci wun kal, ma akɔ ayelek nɔɔnɔ diŋdiŋɔn o baliin o loocu dook.
40004009	Ma anek niini Yesu nɛ, “Mã akanɛ kozoŋti looc, ma adiŋdiŋanan aneet, kanyin koca kaal ci acin noko dook kizi cugun.”
40004010	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet Loryen, nyɛyɛ ŋaatan! Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, Idiŋdiŋanit Jook ween Manyi unooŋ. Iliŋliŋtozek nɔɔnɔ doon.”
40004011	Ɔɔtɔ ni didi Loryen ŋaatin, ma avu toonnyawa o Joowo, ma avu atirit Yesu.
40004012	Ma iitene oman mazi akɔ azii Yesu acabit ɔl Jɔn, itiŋa niini imiirozek kutur o kazi Nazarɛt abil Galiliya, ma ŋaan buk kook komon ŋinaante ŋinti wun, bar idicek ook abaak kuture o kazi Kapernam abil liil o Galili otoga ŋaati ajɔŋɔzɔ ki loocok o kazi Zebulon been Navtali.
40004014	Ma akɔ uuwak niini ŋinaante ka kɛlɛɛmɛ gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya baal anɛ nɛ,
40004015	“Loocok o kazi Zebulon kibeen Navtali noko ɛɛl liil o Jordan baagita looce o kazi Galili abaayi ɔl o Juz kibeen buk modɛn oogi.
40004016	Ma ɔl o abaak muure o anyak daayiz ŋinaante acin iima vooritin ci appe ɔrɔɔt.”
40004017	Ma iitene nice akata Yesu uuwayi onin anek ɔl nɛ, “Otoŋit baciinok ugooc, eeci baliin o Joowo izi ajɔn.”
40004018	Ma iinyaye niceke mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu liil o Galili otoga, icin niini ɔl ceen ram adete cabaya, Saiman o kazi Pitɔr kibeen Andoru ween gɔtɔni.
40004019	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ivita korkorit ki aneet. Ŋaan kakɔ kademezuŋ igeet ka edetit ɔl ci deer ka gɔɔn anyaaktak nɔɔgɔ Jook.”
40004020	Enico ɛlɛ otoŋtek niigi cabayɛt ugeec e looc, oneec nɔɔnɔ.
40004021	Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ, acin Yesu bodo ɔl oogi ceen gɔtɔn een ram, Jemis ki Jɔn. Aromɛ niigi kibeen baatineeŋ ci kazi Zebedi kavoola. Acap cabayɛt juruŋ ka kedetit. Ma awa Yesu nɔɔgɔ.
40004022	Enico ɛlɛ otoŋtek niigi kavool kibeen baatineeŋ looc, ma ɔrkɔr kibeen Yesu.
40004023	Ma azɔp Yesu Galili dook adɛmɛz ɔl ceezine o ɔl o Juz lotento, ma uuwak kaviyak o abon akati baliin o Joowo, ma arogoz niini ɔl ci olla ajowa moorizowe ci meelik keŋti gɛr.
40004024	Ma avɔ kaviyawa ciginɛ o kɔɔt kiziiktɛ looce o kazi Siriya rɛɛna many. Ma anyaak ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante ɔl ci anyak moorizok kɛbɛrɛ dook ka kiiya korogoz niini nɔɔgɔ. Ma arogoz didi niini ɔl nicoko dook, mayo nuun een ɔl o anyak miniŋ ci Loryento ki ɔl ci abice ki ɔl ci rɛbrɛbik arogoz buk.
40004025	Ma ano nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel Galiliya ki Dekapolisa ki Jerusalɛma ki Judiya been ɔl o abaak liil o Jordan baagita.
40005001	Mazi akɔ acin Yesu kɔlɛ ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, ɔtɔɔt bɛ, ma akɔ aavi loota bɛ ɔɔwa. Ma avu aliya nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ kau.
40005002	Ma akana niini demziin ci adɛmzi nɔɔgɔ azi nɛ,
40005003	“Amayuwi ɔl o arɔɔŋ gɔl o Joowo, eeci baliin o Joowo izi cineeŋ.
40005004	Amayuwi ɔl o abad mony zinzeetinɛ kaale ugeec agɔɔn, eeci tiŋeere azoozek Jooi nɔɔgɔ.
40005005	Amayuwi ɔl o acɛlbɛzan eleeti, eeci tiŋeere ajowa niigi kaal o aterkedek Jooi nɔɔgɔ.
40005006	Amayuwi ɔl o arɔɔŋ kuzuuti zɔɔz o Joowo doon kujuk kaal dook loota, eeci ŋaan atirit Jooi nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon.
40005007	Amayuwi ɔl o awucnek gɔnɔgja ogɛn, ma alaŋ acaca kaal o gɛr agoonek ɔl nɔɔgɔ, eeci buk tiŋeere awucnek niigi Jook.
40005008	Amayuwi ɔl o iimi zinzeeti ŋaaten Jook, eeci tiŋeere acin niigi Jook.
40005009	Amayuwi ɔl o aliŋliŋ ganɔn ɔla, eeci tiŋeere anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ kizi dɔl cigin een didi.
40005010	Amayuwi ɔl o agide giye o agɔɔni kaal o aricanek Jooi nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo izi cineeŋ.
40005011	Amayuwenu niiga, eeci gɔɔn amezu dominɛt ki gidɛn o akanuŋ ɔl igeet vɔlɔŋa giye o anuyaŋ niiga aneet.
40005012	Amayuwenu niiga ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci azoonekuŋ Jooi vɔyit ci appe ɔrɔɔt tammu tadena. Agaac zin buk baale nyakaŋanɛta o Joowo amɛz gidɛn kiyo niiga noko.
40005013	Eelnu niiga kiyo mɛlɛ o ɔla dook loota ŋina. Bar zin gɔɔn mã idicai mɛlɛ mokcarɔnti, akɔm bodo gɔl oma ci ka kanycekɛ komokcar been nɛɛn. Izi gɛrzɛ nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma ajukonek tuu kizi gi ci labak, ma arɔc ɔl zɔɔnɛ.
40005014	Eelnu niiga kiyo vooritin o modɛni dook loota ŋina. Gɔɔn kuturi ci ɛɛnycai bɛ ɔɔwa, alaŋ aroodi ŋaati acini ɔl been nɛɛn.
40005015	Akɔm eet ci atokol lamba muura, ma abuŋ ija. Bar atokol, ma anyek kataraan ceez kɛŋ dook.
40005016	Abon zin buk niiga ataranu ɔl dook loota ŋina kaale ugooc abon agoonu ka kanycek niigi baatinai o aavi tammu tadena zany bonate unooŋ.
40005017	Má abaabanu aziyu nɛ, Kakun ka kiiya kuulal waragɛ o Joowo. Akɔm! Alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kutugu nɔkɔ, bar kakun ka kɛlɛɛmnyai keŋti ci zoozok o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo keelit tɔp.
40005018	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ tammu taden ki tɔdɔ, akɔm lotinowe nicoko ŋintimiliny tɛr aaryai been nɛɛn zɛɛ ma iina kaal o aduwa Jooi waragewe onin dook.
40005019	Ma ɛɛti ci acɛlbɛzan lotinɛt ci miliny lotinowe o Joowo, ma bar anyek kizi gi ci miliny labak, ma adɛmɛz gɔnɔgi oogi kutuguzɔ kiyo niini o, acɛlbɛzɛni buk katin niini baliinte o Joowo kizi gi ci labak. Maje ɛɛti ci azooni lotinok nicoko, ma adɛmɛz gɔnɔgi oogi kuzuuti kiyo buk niini o, adiŋdiŋani buk katin niini baliinte o Joowo nɔkɔ.
40005020	Kaduwakuŋ zin naana igeet, mã alaŋ abonanu ɔrɔɔt zinzeetine ugooc ujukit bonat ci ɔl o Parici kibeen alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, alaŋ avoyu baliinte o Joowo been nɛɛn.
40005021	Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ogaac nɛ, Má amuny eet ci deer. Mã alam eet ci amony eet ci deer, abon anyaayak rooni.
40005022	Bar zin naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã alam eet ci olla abornek gɔn nɔŋ, apawonek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Mã anek ɛɛti gɔn nɛ, Olla niina arogi gaga, akɔm gi ci ka doma, abon apawonek buk nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Maje ɛɛti ci anek gɔn nɛ, Een niina aliyai ci ḏɔmḏɔm, ajukonek niini goo o Loryento.
40005023	Zin gɔɔn mã anyak gi ci arooŋ ka taabi Jook ŋaao taabinto, ma anyak da eet oma ci abornekin nɔŋ, toŋek rak gi ci ona anyaai Jook noko looc ŋina, iyiik rak ɔɔtɔ idica ki gotonu gi ci abornekin niini ineet nɔŋ o zɛɛ abada ni ka ija taap Jook.
40005025	Mã anyak eet ci arɔɔŋ kooyin ineet rooni, abon aminyu niina ki nɔɔnɔ idica gi nico taman gɔla ŋina ɛlɛ ŋaati ŋaan urumti rooni. Mã alaŋ agoon nɔkɔ, akoyin koca niini ineet alaane o roonnyo, ma ŋinaante anyek alaani nici takirnya kɔɔt kacaptin ineet.
40005026	Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, mã ŋaan ruk karama, alaŋ koca oogjai been nɛɛn.
40005027	Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Má adoma zoocmaz.
40005028	Bar zin inoko kaduwakuŋ naana ineet kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci olla acin ŋaa culu alina, ma arɔɔŋ ziniza kɛlɛɛmtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ, utuguzɔ bar niini zoocmaz ki nɔɔnɔ odota ŋume o Joowo.
40005029	Zin mã abacakin kɛbɛrɛci cune azo o gi ci gɛr, kata bitaala kodowiwin kɛbɛrɛci. Abon bar ŋaati adowinin kɛbɛrɛci kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ kɛbɛrɛ dook, ma ajukonek ɛlɛ dook goo o Loryento eecitɔ.
40005030	Mã anyin aziiti cune azo o baca baciinok, tɛɛdak bitaalin jukek tuu. Abon bar ŋaati adowinin aziiti kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ azɛɛn dook, ma ajukonek ɛlɛ dook goo o Loryento.
40005031	Aziiŋnyu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, abon ayɛɛdak niini nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci aryanto.
40005032	Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin gaga nɔkɔ ŋaati alaŋ agami zoocmaza, ma akɔ ariyi ŋaa nico bodo ɛɛti oman, anyek niini ŋaa nico kodoma zoocmaz. Buk ɛɛti ci ariyi nɔɔnɔ o odoma zoocmaz.
40005033	Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Má itoonu zaar o Joowo gaga. Bar mã itoontu Jook, abon didi agoonu gi nico.
40005034	Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Má itoonu Jook been nɛɛn. Buk má itoonu tammu taden, eeci tammu tadena ŋino abaai Jooi alya nɛɛn.
40005035	Buk má itoonu tɔdɔ, eeci tɔdɔwa een ŋino ataadek Jooi zɔɔ nɛɛn. Buk má itoonu Jerusalɛm, eeci een kutur o alaan o adikir nɛɛn.
40005036	Má bar buk itoonu eleeti ugooc maany, eeci alaŋ niiga aganeku otoweec imitat codoi ṯɔr ootine cugooc o kizi vɔɔr, karabɔŋ kizi koli.
40005037	Olla gɔɔn iziti nɛ, Yɔŋ, karabɔŋ aziyu nɛ, Akɔm! Eeci zoozowa ogɛn ci arooŋnyu udukta neke avu Loryenta.
40005038	Iziiktu buk baale azi ɔl nɛ, Mã akana ɛɛti gɔn keberec, akata buk nɔɔnɔ keberec. Mã aliba ɛɛti gɔn nyigitat, ilibta buk nɔɔnɔ nyigitat.
40005039	Bar zin naana inoko kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã agoonekin ɛɛti gi ci gɛr, má acaca been nɛɛn. Mã arookin ɛɛti voret ci azo o, towek bodo ci kaŋeto o.
40005040	Mã akoyin ɛɛti oman rooni arɔɔŋ kaamawin rum unun zinzeetinu, anyek buk nɔɔnɔ rum unun malkinto.
40005041	Mã arooŋnyin takirɛnti oman nyayek nɔɔnɔ ijo cigin dɔyiza ŋintimiliny, nyayek nɔɔnɔ ŋinti wun kal.
40005042	Mã anyak eet ci alayin gi ci alayin, ma anyei niina gi nico, anyek nɔɔnɔ labak. Buk mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti gi ci akɔ aliŋliŋi zɛɛ ŋaan abadakin tiŋeere, anyek nɔɔnɔ labak.
40005043	Aziiŋnyu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Ereezit laŋotugooc doon! Otoborit ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet!
40005044	Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Ereezit buk ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet. Ijintek buk Jook ɔl o agiduŋ.
40005045	Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, izitu koca niiga didi dɔl o baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena. Eeci anyek niini ii kuduna, ma ataran ɔl o abon kibeen ɔl o gɛr buk. Ma anyek buk niini tammu taden kitiilak maam ɔl o abon ki ɔl o gɛr dook.
40005046	Mã areezu ɔl o areezuŋ igeet doon, alaŋ koca atitinyuŋ Jooi igeet, eeci ɔl o gɛrzɛ agɔɔn gɔɔn buk niigi nɔkɔ.
40005047	Mã azaayu laŋotugoocok doon, anyak gi ci utuguzu abon kujuk kaal o agɔɔn ɔl o alaŋ atuwe tɔ? Mayo nuun een ɔl o alaŋ atuwe gɔɔn buk agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ.
40005048	Abon zin niiga areezu ɔl dook ɔrɔɔt kiyo buk baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena o.
40006001	Egenyit! Má aliŋliŋnyu liŋliŋɔn o Joowo ɔl kɔrgɛna ka olla bar kicinit niigi kaal ci agoonu o. Mã agoonu kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna, alaŋ ajowanu vɔyit ŋaati baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena been nɛɛn.
40006002	Zin gɔɔn mã arooŋnyu itiritit eet ci amaat, má abɔraku ɔl dook kiyo gɔɔn agɔɔn ɔl o ayelza eleeti o. Agɔɔn gɔɔn niigi kaal ci abon ceezine o lotento kibeen golowɛ ka katanaazɔ ɔl nɔɔgɔ kaale nicoko. Zin giye nico abon agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita ugeec dook loota ŋina odota.
40006003	Bar zin gɔɔn niiga mã atiritu eet ci amaat, itiritit nɔɔnɔ gole ci laŋotugooc o orkoryu alya alaŋ aga been nɛɛn.
40006004	Anycek gi nico kizi gi ci agaya niiga doon. Ŋaan aruwekuŋ igeet vɔyit o agoonu nɔkɔ baatunooŋ o acin kaal nicoko roodinta.
40006005	Gɔɔn ma ajinu Jook, má eelnu kiyo ɔl o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ ka keyelizta eleeti ɔla o. Arɛɛz gɔɔn niigi ŋaati ɛɛlnijena ɔl kɔrgɛna ceezine o lotento been golowɛ, ma ajin Jook ka kicinit ɔl nɔɔgɔ. Abon zin agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita ugeec loota ŋina odota.
40006006	Bar zin niiga mã gɔɔn arooŋnyu ijinit Jook, ɔɔtɔ ceezine ugooc eecitɔ, onyoogit karogi. Ijintu ni baatunooŋ o aga kaal dook. Ŋaan anyuŋ niini igeet kaal o arooŋnyu ŋaaten nɔɔnɔ o acin kaal o agoonu niiga roodinta dook.
40006007	Gɔɔn mã ajinu Jook, má aduwanu zoozok ci wuntik akɔm keŋti kiyo ɔl o alaŋ atuwe gɔɔn abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, Coma azii Jooi ŋaryiin cineeŋ wun o.
40006008	Má zin eelnu kiyo niigi o been nɛɛn. Eeci baatunooŋ aga kaal o arooŋnyu niiga rogete unooŋ laadun iŋaan buk ijinit niiga nɔɔnɔ.
40006009	Zin gɔɔn ma aŋaryinu, aŋaruyɔ gole ci atobɔ kibeen co. Baatinaaŋ o aavɛ tamma, anyek ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit zaar ugun.
40006010	Anyek baliin unun kiiya. Anyek rooŋinɛt unun kutuguwe loocowɛ kiyo tamma o.
40006011	Nyet dayiin onaaŋ iiten codoi waanico.
40006012	Toŋ baciinok ogaacak kiyo kuuŋna kaal o abaca ɔl ŋaatinaaŋ o.
40006013	Nyet dɔyiz ka calaŋ acinanet kaala o gɛrzɛ.
40006014	Mã ooŋneku niiga ɔl oogi kaal o abaca ŋaatunooŋ, ooŋnekuŋ buk baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena igeet kaal ugooc abacanu.
40006015	Mazi alaŋ ooŋneku niiga ɔl oogi kaal o gɛr agoonekuŋ niigi igeet, alaŋ buk koca baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena ooŋnekuŋ igeet kaal o abacanu been nɛɛn.
40006016	Gɔɔn mã uuŋnu dayiin ka idiŋdiŋanit Jook, má anyoranu ŋumti kiyo ɔl o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ keyelizta eleeti ɔla o. Gɔɔn niigi ma ooŋ dayiin, alɔŋa eleeti, ma azɔp looc, ka kagaac ɔl nɔɔgɔ ooŋ dayiin ka kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Abon zin agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita cigeec loota ŋina odota.
40006017	Gɔɔn zin ma ooŋnu niiga dayiin ka idiŋdiŋanit Jook, otoonyit ŋumti, ma avilanu ooti juruŋ, ka calaŋ aga ɔl ogɛn uuŋnu niiga dayiin. Ŋaan agayuŋ igeet baatunooŋ o aga kaal dook. Ŋaan aruwekuŋ niini igeet vɔyit kaale o abon agoonu roodinta dook.
40006019	Má itaŋeku eleeti arɔkzɛt loota ŋina, eeci arɔkzɛt ci loocu adak tɔdɔwa ki zizaac, ma agɔrɔz agoryawa.
40006020	Abon zin iyaŋeku eleeti arɔkzɛt tammu tadena, eeci ŋinaante alaŋ adak zizaaca ki tɔdɔ, ma akɔm agoryak ci ka kogorozit.
40006021	Eeci ŋino iyaŋin arɔkzɛt unooŋ, ŋino buk aavtiyɛ zinzeeti ugooc nɛɛn.
40006022	Ma kɛbɛrɛ tokolec ci alyo gi. Mã abon kɛbɛrɛ cugune o, aavi buk ɛlɛ cune o dook vooritina.
40006023	Bar mazi gɛrzɛ kɛbɛrɛ cugune o, aavi buk ɛlɛ cune o dook muura, ma muuri nici gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40006024	Akɔm laadun eet ci aliŋliŋonek alaat ram. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, arɛɛz koca codoi ŋaatineeŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma amarnin codoi. Karabɔŋ aŋole codoi, ma apɛz codoi. Zin gole nico alaŋ abon ŋaati kaliŋliŋonɛkɛ Jook, ma bodo kaliŋliŋ guruc.
40006025	Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Má iinonu maam ki dayiin o arooŋnyu ka orogti, karabɔŋ een rumanɛ ci ka uburucek eleeti. Eeci rogɛti titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk dayiin, maje ɛlɛ titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk rumanɛ.
40006026	Icinit di kibaali o too ŋaati akuli tammu kɛŋa labak. Alaŋ niigi aḏowɛ, ma akɔm nɔɔgɔ labi ci ateedek piimanɛ. Zin baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Bar zin niiga adiŋdiŋnyu ɔrɔɔt ujukit nɔɔgɔ.
40006027	Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci azaac rogɛt cin kizi wun iitene codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ inoninta?
40006028	Iinonu zin rumanɛ gaga naa? Icinit di! Koroboli aduŋna ku? Alaŋ niigi aliŋliŋ, ma alaŋ alolak eleeti rumanɛ.
40006029	Kaduwakuŋ zin igeet kanekuŋ nɛ, Mayo nuun een Solomon baal een aroi ɔrɔɔt e alaŋ anyak rumanɛ ci alina kiyo gɔɔn koroboli o.
40006030	Mazi alinatan Jooi koroboli o gɔɔn alina waanico, ma bodo tiŋeere araaba kɔr o, alaŋ agayu Jooi anyuŋ buk igeet rumanɛ? Anyaku didi tɛ niiga tuwɛn ci miliny ɔrɔɔt giye ci iinonu kaal noko.
40006031	Má iinonu zin gi ci aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta dayiin ŋaaḏaŋ? Karabɔŋ aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta kaal ci kawot ŋaaḏaŋ? Karabɔŋ aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta rumanɛ ci kanyak ŋaaḏaŋ?
40006032	Eeci kaal nicoko abaaban gɔɔn ɔl o loocu tup nɔkɔ. Bar zin baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena aga nɔkɔ arooŋnyu niiga kaal nicoko dook o.
40006033	Bar zin rak ɔɔwa ooritnɔŋ orooŋit baliin o Joowo. Utuguz kaal o abon arooŋekuŋ niini igeet utuguz ŋaan vurta anyuŋ niini igeet kaal nicoko dook.
40006034	Má iinonu kaal ci tiŋeertinu, eeci Jooi ŋaan aga niini niceke. Olla utuguz kaal ci tɛ agoonu waanico o doon.
40007001	Má apayeku ɔl oogi gerzitin ka calaŋ buk apayekuŋ Jooi igeet gerzitin.
40007002	Eeci mã apayeku ɔl oogi gerzitin, apayekuŋ buk Jooi igeet gerzitin nɔkɔ.
40007003	Naa zin rican gi ci abil keberece ci gonon o, ma bar alaŋ abaaban rak gi ci appe abil keberece cuno o?
40007004	Ku anei gon oma nɛ, Jai kaarawin gi ci anyei kebereca o, ma gi ci appe abil keberece cun o alaŋ rak aara naa?
40007005	Zin niina ci adiŋdiŋan ɛlɛ vɔlɔŋa o aara rak gi ci appe abil keberece cun o ɔɔwa zɛɛ mazi icinɔ juruŋ, bitɔ zin aara gi ci abil keberece ci gotonon e.
40007006	Má anyeku kaal o abon titiny orze, eeci alaŋ agayu karabɔŋ iiten oma ookconekuŋ igeet ɛlɛ, ma adakuŋ. Má ajukeku ziira ugooc alina kɔcɔcɔbanɛn kɔrgɛn, eeci arocek koca tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ.
40007007	Ijintɔ, ŋaan anyononekuŋ. Ɔrɔɔŋtɔ, ŋaan ajowanu. Ɛtɛrɛnit karogi, ŋaan akolonekuŋ.
40007008	Eeci ɛɛti ci ajine, anyononek nɔɔnɔ gi o ajin Joowa. Ɛɛti ci arooŋnyi, ajowa gi o arɔɔŋ Joowa. Maje ɛɛti ci atɛrɛn karogi, akolonek nɔɔnɔ karogi o Joowo.
40007009	Inoko ŋaatunooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn ci gɔɔn mã ajin ŋɛɛrin ḏokoc, anyek bar niini nɔɔnɔ bɛ?
40007010	Karabɔŋ mã ajin niini nɔɔnɔ kulugit, anyek bar kowat?
40007011	Mayo nuun eeginu gɛrzɛ noko, agayu kaal ci abon anyeku dɔl ugooc nɔkɔ. Zin bar baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena anyek ɔl o ajin nɔɔnɔ kaal ci abon ɔrɔɔt kujukuŋ igeet.
40007012	Utuguzek ɔl oogi buk kaal o arooŋnyu niiga nɔɔgɔ kutuguzeyuŋ igeet. Nici kɛŋ o lotinok o Mosis been zoozok o nyakaŋanetu nɛɛn.
40007013	Oneec zin gɔl o lodoci akɔ araane o lodoci. Ma gɔl nici gɔl o akɔ tammu tadena nɛɛn. Ano zin gɔl nico ɔl ci miliny tɛr, eeci adɔi ɔrɔɔt.
40007014	Maje gɔl o akɔ gooye o Loryento alɔɔlɔ niini ɔrɔɔt. Ma ano gɔl nico ɔl ci meelik gɛr, eeci aboke ɔrɔɔt.
40007015	Egenyit nyakaŋanete o voloŋo. Gɔɔn ma kacin nɔɔgɔ eci bitaalu gononɛ kiyo ɛɛzana ween aza o. Maje bar zinzeeti ugeec eecitɔ ɛɛl kiyo guzule o.
40007016	Ŋaan zin agayu nɔɔgɔ kaale o agɔɔn. Kaga zin gɔɔn laadun kɛɛna ceen tirɔ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci kiŋirowu. Buk larbɔɔ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gemenyowu.
40007017	Ma kɛɛt ci abon abiirna buk kɛbɛrɛ ci abon. Maje kɛɛt ci gɛrzɛ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr amadowez.
40007018	Ma kɛɛt ci abon alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr. Maje buk kɛɛt ci gɛrzɛ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci abon.
40007019	Ma kɛɛn o alaŋ anyak kɛbɛrɛ ci abon keene o gɔɔn aḏok ɔl atɛɛdjak looc, ma ajukonek goo.
40007020	Ŋaan zin agayu nyakaŋanɛt o voloŋo kaale ugeec agɔɔn.
40007021	Alaŋ ɔl dook o awuyan aneet azi nɛ, Manyi, Manyi, aridonek katin baliin o Joowo. Avɔ ŋinaante ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o arooŋek baaba o aavi tammu tadena nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ doon.
40007022	Mazi iitene ci aku katin e ɔl ci meel avu anekan nɛ, Manyi, Manyi, baale gɔɔn kaduwaka ɔl kaviyak o Joowo zaare ugun. Buk baale gɔɔn kaarana miniŋ o Loryento ɔla zaare ugun. Ma kagoona kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye zaare ugun.”
40007023	Kanei zin katin naana nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Alaŋ kagayuŋ igeet been nɛɛn. Ɛnyɛktɛ ŋaatan ŋina lorye ci oŋenu coko.
40007024	Ma ɛɛti ci azii zoozok cigan noko, ma azooni zinize onin dook, atobɔ niini kibeen eet ci agɛny ɛɛnyɛt ceez cin kutur ɔɔwa.
40007025	Mazi atiil tammu ɔrɔɔt, ma ariya tawani, ma ivaan ŋɔɔti ɔrɔɔt, alaŋ ceez nici aruk looc been nɛɛn, eeci ɛɛnyci kutur ɔɔwa.
40007026	Maje ɛɛti ci azii zoozok cigan noko, ma alaŋ azooni, abil niini kiyo ɛɛti ci tarbal ɛɛnyɛt ceez nyarata o.
40007027	Mazi atiil tammu ɔrɔɔt, ma ariya tawani, ma ivaan ŋɔɔti ɔrɔɔt, aruk ceez nici looc kɔɔyɔyɛ lai, eeci ɛɛnyci nyarat kɛŋa.”
40007028	Mazi akɔ adica Yesu demziin nico, ibiirit ɔl dook ooti tɛt gole cin ademzin noko.
40007029	Eeci alaŋ demziin cinɛ o atobɔ ki demziin o alaat ugeec gɔɔn ademzek nɔɔgɔ lotinok, bar adɛmzɛ niini kizi eet o didi anyak alaazɛt.
40008001	Mazi alocai Yesu bɛ tadena, unuya nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel gɛr.
40008002	Ma akunak ɛɛti ci anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, mã arooŋ rogozan kizi maya, rogozan.”
40008003	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Karooŋ kuruguzin.” Ma itoon Yesu aziit, ma uum nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Izi zin maya.” Enico ɛlɛ izi mɔɔrizi oninɛ e ḏim. Orok didi niini kobona kigirgir ɛlɛ kiyo da alaŋ amɔɔr o.
40008004	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziiyan di. Má akɔ aduwai zɔɔz nico eet oma, bar bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o ceez o Joowo ka kook kicinin niini ineet. Buk bitɔ taap Jook ebaal aduwan lotinowa o Mosis, ka kagayin ɔl dook didi urugu niina mɔɔrize baal amɔɔrni e.
40008005	Mazi akunak Yesu kutur o kazi Kapernam, iiya urumtɔ ki alaan ci takirnya o Rom. Ma ilalek alaani nici Yesu arɔɔŋ tirtɛn.
40008006	Azi nɛ, “Manyi, amɔɔr gabarɛnti cane ɔlɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ɔɔŋ niini onyite codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ma alaŋ anim kitiŋajena. Apirnanɛ nɔɔnɔ balcɔnti ci amɔɔrni noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
40008007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan kakɔ kanyi nɔɔnɔ kizi maya.”
40008008	Ma anek alaani nici Yesu nɛ, “Akɔm Manyi. Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati akunakɛ niina kɔrɔk can o. Kaga nɔkɔ olla mɔlɔyi ci aduwa niina ŋina arogoz tedec gabaren can noko.
40008009	Kanyei buk naana alaat oogi ci adikir ŋaatan alaazɛta, ma kazii naana zoozok cigeec. Ma bodo buk naana keen alaan ci adikir takirnyai, ma aziiŋnan niigi aneet. Mã kanei co nɛ, Bitɔ kete, akɔ. Mã kanei ce nɛ, Ija, aku. Buk mã kanei gabara ogan nɛ, Utuguz gi co, agɔɔn.”
40008010	Mazi azii Yesu gi nico, ibiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek ɔl ona ano nɔɔnɔ e nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ŋaan baal rɛɛn ŋaan kicin ole o Israyil dook eet ci atuyan ɔrɔɔt kiyo ɛɛti nici noko!
40008011	Abon aadanu gi ce. Avu katin ɔl ci meel atuyan aneet libire ci jenu o, ma avu ogɛnɛ libire ci nyagjo o. Ma avu aavtiz niigi dook loota kibeen Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob baliinte o Joowo.
40008012	Maje bar ɔl o Israyil ogɛn o waan aganɔ ŋaati avɔyi baliinte o Joowo, ma bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ kutuyan aneet, atoowonek katin niigi muur bitaala rɛɛna many, ma alu niigi ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit kirkic kirkic balcɔnta kibeen badi mony.”
40008013	Enek ni Yesu alaan nico nɛ, “Bitɔ ɔlɔ. Ma gi o atu niina ŋaan agoononekin ineet.” Ma ziite ci azɔɔzɔnɛ niigi neke ɛlɛ urugun gabarɛnti o alaano nico.
40008014	Mazi akɔ Yesu ole o Pitɔr, amɔda inyik o Pitɔr amɔɔr. Anyak tadiwɔn ci ɔɔŋɛ onyite codoi nɔkɔ.
40008015	Mazi uum Yesu nɔɔnɔ aziit, izi maya enico ɛlɛ, ma iŋaaz, ma akɔ agoonek nɔɔnɔ dayiin.
40008016	Ma yomana anyaaktak ɔl Yesu ɔl ci meel gɛr ci anyak miniŋ o Loryento eleetinɛ. Mazi aduwa Yesu olla zɔɔz ci aduwa, aduŋna miniŋa ci Loryento noko ŋaatineeŋ ecodoi nɔkɔ. Ma arogoz niini ɔl ci amɔɔr noko dook.
40008017	Zin giye o agɔɔni niini gi nico, ɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zooze o anɛ nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o aarawet ageet moorizok ogaac.”
40008018	Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ ci meel aliya nɔɔnɔ noko, enewun nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kabaayizit liil kɔɔtɔ baagita.”
40008019	Ma akunak alaani ci gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Gayoi, inoko kɔrɔɔŋa naana kunuwin ineet. Olla ŋinti akɔyɛ o kɔrkɔr.”
40008020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak kireerwana looknya, ma anyak kibaali ceezi, maje bar naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaŋ kanyei ŋinti ka kaavɛ loota ka kuyubuzi.”
40008021	Bodo azi ɛɛti oman ole o gɔɔn ano nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋ kunuwin ineet. Nyan zin rak kimiirozek kɔrɔk ka kook kiyaŋ baaba iitene ci adaaŋni.”
40008022	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm ! Nowawan aneet inoko o. Anyek ɔl o alaŋ atuwi kiyaŋit gɔnɔgi o adaai.”
40008023	Ma vurta otoodit Yesu ki nuyak ogin kavool o liilu.
40008024	Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔmɔdak nɔɔgɔ ŋɔɔti ci appe ɔrɔɔt liil kɛŋ. Ma ayɛlyɛlanak ŋɔɔti nici maam kavool ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Maje Yesu ɔɔŋ daa.
40008025	Ma iiŋka nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, Manyi, Tiŋaje! Ɛɛlawet! Kizita toronyɛ ka kadaakta.”
40008026	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Naa? Abarinu naa? Anyaku dim tuwɛn ci miliny tɛr nɔkɔn?” Itiŋa ni niini jena, ma agernyek ŋɔɔt ki maam kajaŋantɛ. Ma ajaŋani didi tiv enico ɛlɛ.
40008027	Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti tɛt, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma laadun eet ci abil ku nici? Ma nuun een ŋɔɔt kibeen maam azii nɔɔnɔ!”
40008028	Mazi abaawonek Yesu looc o ɔl o kazi Gadariin liil baagita, ɔɔt urumtɔ niini kibeen ɔl ceen ram ci avu bɔɔtwane o gɔɔn iyaŋi ɔl gɔnɔgi o adaai. Ɔl nicigi anyak miniŋ ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt ootinɛ. Aam nɔɔgɔ maŋɔnnya kiziti kɛlɛk o too ɛlɛ, ma akɔm eet ci anim kono gɔl ci aavtiyɛ niigi o.
40008029	Ma agɛrɛny niigi enico ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Joowo, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun ka ija uulalet ageeta iŋaan iiteni o payiinto ɔɔwa?”
40008030	Maje ŋinaante anyak kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ci agɛ vorora liil otoga.
40008031	Ma ilalek miniŋa ci ɔl nicoko o Yesu anek nɛ, “Inoko zin mã arɔɔŋ aarawet ageeta bitaala, nyet koota kɔcɔcɔbanene niceke.”
40008032	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Udunta zin. Ɔɔtɔ.” Ma aduŋna niigi ole ceen ram noko, ma avɔ kɔcɔcɔbanɛnɛ. Enico ɛlɛ ɔdɔkɔnyca kɔcɔcɔbanɛna vorora, ma iinak liil kutudude niigi dook lai.
40008033	Odokonyit ni ɔl o oowa kɔcɔcɔbanɛn e odokonyit ɔɔtɔ korogjowɛ, ma avɔ aduwak ɔl zoozok nicoko kutur kɛŋa dook.
40008034	Ma avu ɔl dook kutura ka kivita kicinit Yesu. Mazi avu acin nɔɔnɔ, ilaltek niigi nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ looce cineeŋ o.”
40009001	Ma atɔɔt Yesu kavool, ma abaayiz liil amiironek kutur onin kazi Kapernam.
40009002	Ma ŋinaante ɔdɔŋtak ɔl ogɛn nɔɔnɔ eet ci rɛbrɛbi ɔɔŋ kuwena nɔkɔ. Mazi acin Yesu tuwɛn cineeŋ o, enek eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran, talɔ! Aaryai baciinowa ugune.”
40009003	Enico abaabanit alaata o ademzek ɔl lotinok zinzeetine ci aborni nɔŋ zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici anyek ɛlɛ kizi Jook?”
40009004	Maje Yesu aga kaal ci abaaban niigi o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abaabanu dim kaal ci gɛr zinzeetinɛ naa?
40009005	Mayo aboke jaŋ? Kizi nɛ, Aaryai baciinowa ugune, yo da kizi nɛ, Tiŋa jena, tɔ?
40009006	Inoko zin karooŋ keyeleyuŋ igeet naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kanyei dɔyiz ci kaaranɛ baciinok ɔla.” Enico enek niini eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Tiŋaje! Doma kuwen cun o. Tɔ, bitɔ ɔlɔ.”
40009007	Ma iŋaaz didi ɛɛti nici, ma awɔ akɔ ɔlɔ.
40009008	Mazi acin ɔl gi nico, anyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anaat Jook giye ci anyekɛ eet ci deer alaazɛt ci abil kiyo ci anyek eet nico noko.
40009009	Ma vurta otoŋ Yesu ŋinito ɔɔtɔ. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, icin Matiyu o gɔɔn alota guruc ole o ataalinɛ kaal mɛlɛgɛnyai aavi loota maktabe onin. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.” Enico ɛlɛ itiŋa Matiyu, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.
40009010	Mazi akɔ adake Yesu ole o Matiyu, anyak buk ɔl ci meelik ŋinaante ole o gɔɔn alota guruc kibeen ɔl oogi ole o gɔɔn alaŋ azooni lotinok o Juz. Ma avu azɔlɔ niigi kibeen Yesu ki nuyak ogin ŋaatodoi.
40009011	Mazi acin ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Parici gi nico, enektek nuyak o Yesu nɛ, “Ma dim alaani cunooŋ o azɔlɔ ki ɔl ci gɔɔn alot guruc ki ɔl ci gɛr o naa?”
40009012	Mazi azii Yesu gi nico, ɛbɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl calaŋ amɔɔr alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Bar arɔɔŋ akim ɔl ci amɔɔr doon.
40009013	Ɔɔtɔ ojokta kɛŋ ci zɔɔz o aduyai waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, Alaŋ karooŋ kɛlɛk ceen todoyok o doon, bar karooŋ zinzeeti bonat ka kagama todoyok cugoocok o. Mazin naana alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kotowo ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon, bar kakun ka kiiya kotowo ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr.”
40009014	Ivitak ni ivitak Yesu nuyawa o Jɔn o oonyi, ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gɔɔn naaga kibeen ɔl o Parici kuuŋna dayiin iiten oma ka kidiŋdiŋanta Jook. Ma bar nuyawa cugune o adake niigi iinya dook labak o naa?”
40009015	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋaan karomena naana kibeen nuyak cigan o alaŋ rak niigi akat culum. Mazi tiŋeere iiya iiteni o ka kaaryai naana ŋaatineeŋ, ŋaan zin akat niigi culum, ma abor dayiin.
40009016	Akɔm laadun eet ci abutanek rum ci rɛɛn gɔn ci colai, eeci mã agɔɔn nɔkɔ, arɛɛcai koca kujuk we.
40009017	Akɔm buk eet ci arek iira buru ci rɛɛn. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adɛ koca iirana, ma alip buru. Abon zin arek niini iira buru ci colai ka calaŋ alibe.
40009018	Mazi ŋaan aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ gi nico nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ alaani codoi alaate o ceez o Juz lotento, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc Yesu ŋuma, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Adaak bɛɛnyan! Bar zin kaga mã akun, ma ataadei nɔɔnɔ aziit, arogi koca.”
40009019	Itiŋgazɔ ni Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin dook oneec eet nico.
40009020	Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi gɔla nɔkɔ, iiya ŋaa ci anyak mɔɔriz ci maam o ŋaanu irkitok amɔtɔ ram calaŋ gɔɔn rak ɛɛl. Ma aku uum niini Yesu rum eci bawuco.
40009021	Eeci anek niini ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Mã olla inoko kuum rum cin malkinto noko karugi koca.”
40009022	Mazi abuudi Yesu, acin ŋaa nico, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan, má anyei ŋoliin gaga. Uruguzin ineet tuwɛn unune.” Enico ɛlɛ urugun didi ŋaa nici.
40009023	Idicek ni niigi ɔɔtɔ korge o alaano e, Mazi avɔ arum kɔrɔk, ajowa dole ona amɔɔr e adaawa. Maje ɔl alu ŋinaante.
40009024	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Udunit ɔɔtɔ bitaala. Alaŋ dole adaai, olla ɔɔŋ labak.” Mazi azii ɔl gi nico, atararti niigi nɔɔnɔ.
40009025	Mazi avɔ aduŋna ɔl dook, ook niini ceeza, ma akɔ agam dole aziit, ma iŋaaz dole enico ɛlɛ.
40009026	Ma adiica awaŋi ci gi ci agɔɔn niini noko looc nice dook.
40009027	Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Yesu ŋinaante, iziiyit ɔl ceen ram ruben Yesu aku adiir ŋintineeŋ o. Mazi aku Yesu, oneec niigi nɔɔnɔ. Ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, anyek da kuwuceyin rubenzɛt cinaaŋ noko. Kolet da kɛbɛrɛ kicintowa.”
40009028	Mazi akɔ arum Yesu kɔrɔk oma, ivitak ɔl ci ruben noko nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko atuyu kizik tedec naana karuguzuŋ igeet didi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, kagaya anyei niina dɔyiz ci aruguzet ageeta.”
40009029	Itiŋa ni Yesu, ma uum nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ azi nɛ, “Anyek zin kibil eci ona atuyu niiga o.”
40009030	Enico ɛlɛ izi kɛbɛrɛ ugeec wak icintɔ. Ma aricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má avɔ aduwaku eet oma gi nico.”
40009031	Bar mazi awɔ niigi, ɔɔt uduktak ɔl kutura dook zɔɔz ci ona agɔɔn Yesu o.
40009032	Mazi ka kɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu ki nuyak ogin, anyaaktak bodo ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci adiiti alemeti, eeci anyak miniŋit.
40009033	Mazi aara Yesu miniŋit eete nico, ozoozun niini enico ɛlɛ kibiirit ɔl dook ooti tɛt. Ma anɔ niigi nɛ, “Ŋaan baal rɛɛn laadun ŋaan kicinit Israyila ŋina gi ci abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
40009034	Maje bar ɔl o Parici anɔ nɛ, “Anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz ci aaranɛ miniŋ ɔla noko alaani o miniŋu.”
40009035	Ma azɔp Yesu kuturyok o looc nice dook adɛmɛz ɔl ceezine o Juz lotento, ma uuwak kaviyak o baliin o Joowo abon. Ma arogoz ɔl moorizok keŋti dook.
40009036	Mazi acin niini ɔl ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ noko, icirit nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Eeci avir nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti, ma anyak ŋoliin kaale o gɛr avunak nɔɔgɔ kiyo ɛɛzana o akɔm tuwayoi o.
40009037	Ma anek Yesu nuyak ogin yabziinta nɛ, “Icinit di! Anyak mana labi ci meel gɛr, maje bar naaga ci ka keteedit mana o, keegin kidicɛ tɛr.
40009038	Kijinit zin eet o mano ka kitoonayet ɔl oogi bodo kiiya kitirititet ageet teedinta.”
40010001	Ma awa Yesu nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram dook ŋaatodoi, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ dook dɔyiz ci ka kaartai miniŋ ɔla, ma arogzi ɔl moorizok keŋti dook.
40010002	Zaar zin o nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram nɛɛn ce. Saiman o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Pitɔr, ki gɔtɔni o kazi Andoru, ki Jemis, ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn o eegin lɔgɔz o eet o kazi Zebedi,
40010003	ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Tomaz, ki Matiyu baal gɔɔn alot guruc o meeryo e, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrtii Alvayoz, ki Tadeyos,
40010004	ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ looc onin Israyil e, been Judaz Iskariyot baal ka kataalɔi Yesu e.
40010005	Mazi ka kitoon Yesu nuyak ceen amɔtɔ ram nicoko, itilo nɔɔgɔ rak anek nɛ, “Má avoyu loocowe o ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz, karabɔŋ een kuturyowe ci ɔl o Samariya been nɛɛn.
40010006	Bar ɔɔtɔ korogjowe ci ɔl o Israyil atobɔ ki ɛɛza ci akoloni.
40010007	Ɔɔtɔ uuwayit iziti nɛ, Izi baliin o Joowo ajɔn.
40010008	Orogozit zin ɔl o amɔɔr, ɔdɔŋta ɔl o adaai daayiza, orogozit ɔl o anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ, aarta miniŋ ɔla. Kiyo anyuŋ Jooi igeet dɔyiz nico kɔkɔm gi ci aruweku nɔɔnɔ o, ɔɔtɔ buk niiga utuguz kaal nicoko nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci aruwekuŋ ɔl igeet.
40010009	Má ayiitu guruc been nɛɛn.
40010010	Má buk ayiitu kaboot ci eeronu. Olla iyiitit rumanɛ ki caava ci anyaku eleetine o doon kibeen kɛɛn ci omtinto. Eeci eet ci aliŋliŋ ŋaan anyononek nɔɔnɔ kaal o arɔɔŋ dook ka kɛɛrɔni.
40010011	Mã avoyu kuture ci avoyu, orooŋit eet ci abon atalnanuŋ ka itiktɔi. Aavtiyu ni ole nico zɛɛ ma alam awoyu ŋina.
40010012	Mã avoyu ole ci avoyu, enektek rak ɔl ɔɔwa nɛ, Abonanu ɔl ci kɔrɔk nico? Ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.
40010013	Mazi atalnanuŋ ɔl ci kɔrɔk nico igeet, amayuwit nɔɔgɔ. Mã alaŋ atalnanuŋ niigi ageet, abadai mayuwɛnɛt cunooŋ o.
40010014	Mã alam kɔrɔk, karabɔŋ een kutur calaŋ atalnanuŋ ɔl, karabɔŋ alaŋ aziiŋnuŋ niigi igeet, otoŋit ŋinito. Utuduŋta zin tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ ka kizi tɛɛdzooc calaŋ abadaku ŋinite been nɛɛn.
40010015	Abon aadanu gi ce. Katin iitene ci payiinto e apayek Jooi ɔl ci kutur calaŋ atalnanuŋ neke gerzitin ci appe ɔrɔɔt kujuk ci ɔl baal abaak loocowe o kazi Sodom been ɔl o Gomora e.
40010016	Iziiktɔ di! Olla kitoonuŋ naana igeet ɔɔtɔ ɔtɔɔz kiyo aza o gononik awɔ guzule kɔrgɛna o. Abon zin agenyu kiyo kireerwana o, ma abon anyaku ɛɛzɛt kiyo yɛɛla o.
40010017	Ebeyit zin eleeti juruŋ! Anyak tiŋeere gɔɔn ɔl ci avɔ agamnyuŋ igeet, ma avoyuŋ rooni, ma avɔ arukuŋ ceezine ugeec lotento.
40010018	Anyaakuŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere niigi igeet rooni, eeci anuyaŋ niiga aneet. Ma ŋinaante ŋaan aduwaku niiga alaat o roonnyo ki ɔl o alaŋ een Juz zoozok ogan.
40010019	Mazi anyaanuŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere niigi igeet rooni, má abarinu aniyu nɛ, Kayo kɔɔt kudukta naa?, karabɔŋ bar aniyu nɛ, Kayo kɔɔt kozoozɔ ki nɔɔgɔ ku?, eeci iitene ci avoyuŋ niigi igeet rooni e ŋaan anyononekuŋ igeet zoozowa ci ka udukta.
40010020	Ma zoozowa ci ka udukta o alaŋ een zoozok cugooc, bar zoozok ci avu Vɔŋize o Jook ween baatunooŋ o azɔɔz ŋaaten igeet.
40010021	Iitene nice akɔyi gɔɔn katin ɛɛti dole o yaatin ɛlɛ daayiza kook kadaak didi. Maje buk baatizɛt ki yaatizɛt avɔyi dɔl ugeec ɛlɛ daayiza nɔkɔ. Dɔlya buk katin ookconek baatigeec ki yaatigeec, ma avɔyi nɔɔgɔ daayiza.
40010022	Amarninuŋ katin ɔl dook igeet, eeci anuyaŋ niiga aneet. Zin ɛɛti ci amɛz kaal nicoko dook zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ niigi dook, arogzɛ waanma niini.
40010023	Mã agiduŋ ɔl kuture oman, ɔɔtɔ bodo kuture ce. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ azobju kuturyok ci ɔl ci Israyil noko dook zɛɛ ma adicanu ŋaati uuwayeku nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o Joowo, maŋaan naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kiiya.
40010024	Akɔm eet ci adɛmzɛ ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk eet o adɛmɛz nɔɔnɔ. Ma buk akɔm gabaren ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk manyi onin.
40010025	Abon zin buk ɛɛti ci adɛmzɛ azɔl ki eet o adɛmɛz nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt. Buk gabarɛnti abon azɔl ki manyi onin piryakzɛt. Gɔɔn mã awo ɔl eet ci korgu zaar ceen mazwa kizi Loryen, bar tiŋeere ɔl ci kɔrɔk cino akanek ɔl nɔɔgɔ mazwa ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.
40010026	Zin má aŋolinu niiga nɔɔgɔ, bar uuwayit moozɛta. Eeci gi ci aroodi inoko tiŋeere ayelzai. Buk kaala o aŋɔmtɛ inoko katin abɔryai.
40010027	Ma zoozok ci kaduwakuŋ naana igeet ceeza tɔ noko, abon avɔ aduwaku niigi ɔl bitaala vitɛnanɛ dook. Buk zoozok o aziiŋnu niiga aŋɔmɔt ɔl, abon abɔraku ɔl dook kiziiyit.
40010028	Má aŋolinu ɔl o aruk eleeti doon kadaayitɔ, ma bar alaŋ anim kuruyit voŋizok ugooc. Bar zin abon aŋolinu niiga Jook o anim niini kuruk eleeti ki voŋizok buk, ma ajukek nɔɔgɔ dook goo.
40010029	Inoko anim ɛɛti oman ŋaatunooŋ kataala zoot ceen ram giricoca labak, ma bar akɔm zin zoote nicoko ŋaatineeŋ ci adaai calaŋ baatunooŋ tamma aga.
40010030	Má anyak zin ŋoliin gaga, eeci adiŋdiŋnyu niiga Joowa ɔrɔɔt ujukit zoot ci meel gɛr. Agayuŋ Jooi igeet, ma azoonuŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, mayo nuun een im cugooc ootinu noko ɛlɛ aga dook lai.
40010032	Mã abɔra ɛɛti ɔl dook kebereca gi ci azi nɛ, Katu naana Yesu, kabɔrai buk katin naana tuwɛn onin ŋume o baaba tammu tadena nɔkɔ.
40010033	Mã adaŋnyan ɛɛti aneet ɔl dook kebereca, kadaŋ buk katin naana nɔɔnɔ ŋume o baaba tammu tadena nɔkɔ.
40010034	Má abaabanu gi ci aniyu nɛ, Kuni cane o anyaak looc ganɔn. Akɔm! Bar tiŋeere anyaa marnɔn.
40010035	Kuni cane o anyek tiŋeere lɔgɔz kamartɔi baatigeec. Maje dɔlya o ŋaaye amarnin yaatigeec. Alawanɛta amarnin inyigɔ.
40010036	Maje eet ci atuyan aneet amarnin tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ ɔl o tatok onin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40010037	Ma ɛɛti ci arɛɛz baatin ki yaatin ɔrɔɔt kujukan aneet alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati ɛɛnɛ niini nuyai can kodot. Buk ɛɛti ci arɛɛz ŋɛɛrin karabɔŋ een bɛɛnyin ɔrɔɔt kujukan aneet alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati ɛɛnɛ niini nuyai can kodot.
40010038	Maje ɛɛti calaŋ adoma kɛɛt onin een talakec, ma ataadek inyaa, ma anuyan aneet, niini alaŋ een nuyai can.
40010039	Ma ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ korogoz ɛlɛ onin, bar akoloz. Maje ɛɛti ci akoloz ɛlɛ onin ŋaaten aneet, bar ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
40010040	Mazin ɛɛti ci atalnanuŋ igeet ole cin, atalnanan bar niini aneet, ma atalna buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.
40010041	Ma ɛɛti ci atalna nyakaŋan ci Joowo giye o ɛɛnɛ niini nyakaŋan ci Joowo, aruwek katin buk Jooi nɔɔnɔ vɔyit kiyo nyakaŋani nici noko. Ma ɛɛti ci atalna eet ci abon atu Jook, eeci een niini eet ci abon Joowo, aruwek katin buk Jooi nɔɔnɔ vɔyit kiyo ɛɛti nici noko.
40010042	Abon zin agayu gi ce. Ma ɛɛti ci olla anyek nuyawe cigan noko codoi ŋaatineeŋ maam ci alal kowot giye o ɛɛnɛ niini nuyai can, didilɛ, aruwek katin buk Jooi nɔɔnɔ vɔyit cigin.
40011001	Mazi akɔ odotiz Yesu ŋaati aduwakɛ nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram lotinok nicoko, otoŋ niini ŋinite ɔɔtɔ ook ɛdɛmɛz ɔl kuturyowe o ajɔŋzɔ ki ŋinite.
40011002	Maje Jɔn o oonyi waanice acabje. Mazi azii niini sijina ŋinaante kaal o agɔɔn Yesu, itoonek nuyak ogin oogi ka kɔɔt kijinit nɔɔnɔ kenektek nɛ, “Ma dim yo niina een Kiristo baal azi Jɔn nɛ, ka katin kiiya e nɛɛn, yo kereya da eet oma ci ŋaan aku?”
40011004	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Imiirte ɔɔtɔ uduktak Jɔn kaal ci acinu kibeen kaal ci aziiŋnu noko.
40011005	Enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Ɔl o ruben icintɔ. Ɔl o ŋɔɔlik ɔtɔɔzɔ tɔp. Ɔl o anyak moorizok o gidaŋ orogoztɛ. Ɔl o adiiti iina iziiktɔ. Ɔl o adaai itiŋgazɔ daayiza korogit bodo. Maje kaviyawa o Joowo abon uuwawonek ɔl o amaat.
40011006	Amayuk zin Jooi eet calaŋ bakbai ziniz ŋaatan.”
40011007	Mazi amiiri nuyawa ci Jɔn o, uduwak Yesu ɔl o avu azii nɔɔnɔ e zɔɔz ci akati Jɔn. Anek nɛ, “Baale avoyu ŋaati Jɔn balala e, arooŋnyu da ɔɔt icinit naa? Arooŋnyu ɔɔtɔ icinit artɛ ci amɔɔni ŋɔɔti?
40011008	Yo da arooŋnyu ɔɔtɔ icinit eet ci aborcek rumanɛ ci alina? Bar kanɛ alaŋ een nɛɛn, eeci ɔl ci anyak rumanɛ ci alina abaak gɔɔn niigi ceezine o adikir alaatu.
40011009	Yo da arooŋnyu ɔɔtɔ icinit nyakaŋan? Kanekuŋ zin nɛ, Icintu zin da didi niiga eet ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk bar nyakaŋan.
40011010	Eeci Jɔn nica nyakaŋan baal azɔɔz Jooi waragewe onin e nɛɛn, baal azi nɛ, Kitoona katin toonnyai onan karayai ŋaatun, ka kiiya kidimdimaneyin gɔl unun.
40011011	Abon zin agayu gi ce. Ma Jɔn nica adiŋdiŋ niini ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɔl o abaak loota baale e zɛɛ been inoko o buk. Mazin ɛɛti ci cɛlbɛz baliinte o Joowo, mayo nuun cɛlbɛz niini ɔrɔɔt, bar adiŋdiŋ niini kujuk Jɔn.
40011012	Ma iiten baal akanan Jɔn uuwayi o kaviyak o Joowo e zɛɛ been waanico o, ɔl ci meel amartɔi baliin o Joowo ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɔɔŋ kɛɛlti ɔl o gɛrzɛ nɔɔnɔ dɔyiza.
40011013	Maje nyakaŋanɛta dook kibeen buk Mosis azɔɔz waanice niigi zɔɔz ci akati baliin o Joowo. Mazi aku Jɔn e, iiya buk uduwa zɔɔz nico.
40011014	Mã didi utuyu da waanice niiga kaviyak ugeec, agayu koca didi Jɔn nica Ilija baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta kuni onin e nɛɛn.
40011015	Mã anyaku iin ci aziiknenu, iziiktɔ juruŋ.
40011016	Kayo kotobozek ɔl ci ɔɔ nico alaŋ atuwi noko naa? Atobɔ niigi ki dɔl o gɔɔn amici kɔrɔk bawuca, ma agernyek ogɛnɛ gɔnɔgi anek nɛ,
40011017	Karuwekuŋ kidorɛt, bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu orogomit. Kabena beniin o daayizo, bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu utuluz.
40011018	Iziiyit di kɛŋ ci yabziin nico. Baale ma aku Jɔn e, alaŋ adak dayiin ci adak ɔl dook o, ma alaŋ awot nyaan. Ma bar azi ɔl nɛ, Anyak niini miniŋit ɔɔwa.
40011019	Mazi kakun Naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e, kadake, ma kawodɛ. Ma azi ɔl dook nɛ, Icinit di eet nico. Anyak alɛm, ma abaaki, ma eeginɔ laŋoten ki ɔl o gɔɔn alot guruc ki ɔl o alaŋ azooni lotinok o Juz dook. Zin bonati o gɛnyiz o Joowo ayelzai kɛlɛɛmɛ kaale o abon agooni.”
40011020	Akata ni Yesu ɔzɔɔz zɔɔz ci abornɛki nɔŋ kuturyok baal gɔɔn agɔɔni niini kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye e, eeci ɔl o kuturyok niceke alaŋ arɔɔŋ kabadit mony baciinowe ugeec.
40011021	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole ɔl o kutur o kazi Korazin. Izi buk nɔŋa cugoocok wole ɔl o kutur o kazi Bezediya. Mã da kaal baal atɛɛt ɔl biye agooni ŋaatunooŋ e kutuguze kuturyowe o kazi Tayor ki Sidon baal uulali e, abadit waan ɔl ugeec mony baal rɛɛna many iŋaan kuulaltɛ e, ma uburuca waan niigi awac eleetinɛ ugeec, ma aborcek rumanɛ ci zɔrzɔr, ma anyak waan buk niigi ciiroc ka keyeleza gi o abadi niigi mony baciinowe ugeec.
40011022	Abon zin agayu gi ce. Katin iitene ci payiinto e apayekuŋ Jooi igeet gerzitin ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɔl ci kuturyok ci kazi Tayor been Sidon noko.
40011023	Buk niiga ɔl o kutur o kazi Kapernam arooŋnyu odoŋit eleeti? Ajukoneku zin buk katin niiga goo o Loryento ɔɔtɔ many. Eeci kaal baal atɛɛt ɔl biye baal agooni ŋaatunooŋ e waan da kutuguze kuture o kazi Sodom, ŋaan waan Sodom kuulalɛ zɛɛ been inoko.
40011024	Abon zin agayu gi ce. Katin iitene ci payiinto e awucnek Jook ɔl o kutur o kazi Sodom bar kujukuŋ igeet.”
40011025	Ma anyek Yesu Jook zany anek nɛ, “Baaba, Manyi o tammu tadenu ki tɔdɔ, katalnɛ naana ɔrɔɔt ŋaatun, eeci arɔɔdɛ zɔɔz unun een didi ɔl o gɔɔn abaaban niigi kizik bar agɛny, ma iiya eyeleyu ɔl o cɛlbɛz.
40011026	Nɔɔnɔ zin nɛɛn baaba. Agoon gi nico gole o arooŋ niina.”
40011027	Mazi aṯornɛkɛ Yesu zooze nico, enek ɔl nɛ, “Anyan baaba onane kaal dook aneet. Akɔm zin eet oma ci agayan aneet ŋɛɛrin, bar agayan aneet baaba doon. Akɔm buk eet oma ci aga baaba, bar kaga nɔɔnɔ naana ŋɛɛrin doon, kibeen ɔl o karooŋ ka keyelizak baaba nɔɔgɔ.
40011028	Ivitayaŋ zin aneet niiga dook o apirnanu kaale o loocu, ka kiiya kanyuŋ igeet uyubuzit.
40011029	Agamta demziin onan zinzeetine ugooc dook. Ivita ɛdɛmɛztɔ ŋaatan, eeci aneet alalnan ziniz, ma kacɛlbɛzan ɛlɛ. Ka zin ivita ajokta niiga yubzɛn eleetine ugooc kizi zinzeeti tiv.
40011030	Eeci demziin ci ka kanyuŋ naana igeet o alaŋ adɔi.”
40012001	Ma iinyaye ogɛn iitene o gɔɔn yubzento ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu ki nuyak ogin, ma avɔ abatak manɛɛn culu labinu. Maje nuyak adak magizeeti, ma acarkiz labi nicoko, ma adak.
40012002	Mazi acin ɔl o Parici gi ci agɔɔn nuyawa noko, enektek niigi Yesu nɛ, “Cin di! Apɛz nuyawa cugune noko lotinok ogaac giye ci agɔɔni niigi gi ci waan alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati agɔɔni iitene ci yubzento o.”
40012003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan ekeebit gi baal agɔɔn alaani o kazi Devid waan baal adayi magiz nɔɔnɔ kibeen ɔl ogin e?
40012004	Akɔ waanice niini ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ anyek alaani o ceez nice nɔɔnɔ ki ɔl o ɔrkɔr ḏɔkɛn o gɔɔn ataabi ɔl Jook. Ma avu adak niini ki ɔl cigin noko. Yo nuun abac niigi waanice lotinok baal gɔɔn azi nɛ, Abon adak ḏɔkɛn niceke alaata o ceez o Joowo doon e, adayit waanice niigi labak.
40012005	Buk ŋaan agaac niiga kɛɛranene ugooc zɔɔz o gɔɔn aliŋliŋi ɔl o ataap Jook ceeze o Joowo iitene o yubzento tup nɔkɔ, ma akɔm gi ci gɛr ŋaatineeŋ?
40012006	Kanekuŋ zin nɛ, Bar naana kadiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk ceez o Joowo.
40012007	Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Alaŋ karooŋ kɛlɛk ceen todoyok o doon, bar karooŋ buk zinzeeti bonat ɔla. Inoko tɛ didi agaac kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico, alaŋ koca apayeku ɔl ci abon noko gerzitin.
40012008	Eeci naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keen Manyi o iiten o yubzento nɛɛn.”
40012009	Enico otoŋ Yesu ŋinito ɔtɔɔ ook ceeze o lotento.
40012010	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti. Ma anyak buk ŋinaante ɔl ci Parici ci arɔɔŋ kedetit Yesu giye ci gɛr agɔɔn. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo dim lotinowa ogaac aziiŋnekin ineet rogoz ɔl iitene ci yubzento noko labak?”
40012011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci iinak ɛɛz cinɛ look iitene ci yubzento noko ma alaŋ ɛɛla?
40012012	Mazin bar ɛɛti ci deer adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɛɛz! Ma aziiŋneket buk lotinowa ogaac kitiritit ɔl iitene ci yubzento o labak.”
40012013	Zin enico ɛlɛ enek Yesu eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Zɔlan aziit cun dɔkɔm noko.” Mazi azɔlan ɛɛti aziit, obona didi kotobtɔ ki gɔn ci ona abon o nɔkɔ.
40012014	Mazi acin ɔl ci Parici o gi nico, otoborit niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni ŋina ɔɔt abaabanit gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak.
40012015	Maje Yesu aga gi nico nɔkɔ, otoŋ ni niini ŋinite ɔtɔɔ, ma ano ɔl ci meel gɛr nɔɔnɔ. Ma arogoz niini ɔl o amɔɔr dook.
40012016	Ma aricanek niini ɔl ci ona arogoz mɔɔrizɔi noko calaŋ avɔ aduwak ɔl oogi.
40012017	Zin agooni gi nici o ka keyelizai bonati o Yesu baal aduwa Jooi nyakaŋane o kazi Izaya.
40012018	Azi baale niini nɛ, “Icinit di gabaren onan kaŋɛra naana. Kareez naana nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma katalnɛ ŋaatin. Karekɛ tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋiz onan, ma aduwak katin niini ɔl dook zɔɔz o payiin onan abil tɔp.
40012019	Alaŋ tiŋeere niini adaŋɔ kibeen ɔl, ma alaŋ agɛrɛny, ma akɔm eet ci azii nɔɔnɔ molok ci abololi gɔla.
40012020	Atirit gɔɔn tiŋeere niini ɔl o apirna, mã niigi arɔɔŋ tirtɛn ŋaatin. Ma iitene ci abadaan niini e, anyaa katin bonat, ma adica kaal ci gɛr ɛɛl loota ŋina noko dook.
40012021	Ma atu katin modɛna ci loocok noko dook nɔɔnɔ.”
40012022	Anyaaktak ni ɔl ogɛn Yesu eet ci ruben, ma alaŋ azɔɔz, eeci anyak miniŋit alya. Ma arogoz niini eet nico, kicinɔ ma azɔɔz labak.
40012023	Ma abiir ɔl dook ooti giye nico, ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mayo nici ŋɛɛrti Devid didi?”
40012024	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl o Parici zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Aara niini miniŋ ɔla o, eeci anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz Loryenti ween alaan o miniŋu kazi Baalzibol.”
40012025	Maje Yesu aga gi ci abaaban niigi o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci looc codoi, ma ɔɔrɔ niigi maany, lɔɔci nici uulali, ma alaŋ abil kɔdɔk ŋinti rɛɛn. Buk mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci kɔrɔk codoi, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, alaŋ kɔrɔgi nici abil kɔdɔwɛ ŋinti rɛɛn.
40012026	Zin buk koca mã aŋɛr Loryenti baliin cin o, ma ɔɔrɔ niigi maany, adicai koca baliin cinɛ o taman.
40012027	Aniyu inoko niiga nɛ, Anyan Loryenti aneet dɔyiz ci kaaranɛ miniŋ ɔla. Zin mã abil nɔkɔ, ŋɛnɛɛn koca ci anyek ɔl o anuyuŋ igeet dɔyiz ci aaranɛ miniŋ o? Inoko zin ɔl ugooc anuyu igeet apakteyuŋ vɔlɔŋ.
40012028	Bar zin kaara naana miniŋ ɔla Vɔŋize o Jook o ayelzakuŋ gi o iiyakuŋ igeet baliin o Joowo.
40012029	Akɔm laadun eet ci anim kook kɔgɔrɔz kaal ceeze ci eet ci mooti adɔi dooke coma rak acap nɔɔnɔ ɔɔwa, ma adɔɔn zɛɛ ook ni adoma kaal ogin dook ceeza.
40012030	Ma ɛɛti calaŋ korkorya been aneet, amarninan niini aneet. Maje ɛɛti calaŋ atiritan kolotak ɔl baliin o Joowo, atooyek niini ɔl tuu ŋaatan.
40012031	Zin giye nico kanekuŋ nɛ, “Aara Jooi ɔl baciinok ugeec gɔɔn agɔɔn, kibeen zoozok ugeec gɛr gɔɔn aduwa dook labak. Maje bar eet ci aduwak zɔɔz ci gɛr Vɔŋiz o Joowo, alaŋ ŋaatin oŋɛci nici aariyai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
40012032	Ma ɛɛti ci aduwakan zɔɔz ci gɛr aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, aara Jooi nɔɔnɔ oŋec nico labak. Maje eete ci aduwak zɔɔz ci gɛr Vɔŋiz o Joowo alaŋ ŋaatin oŋɛci nici aaryai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
40012033	Gɔɔn kɛɛn ci abon abiirna buk kɛbɛrɛ ci abon. Maje kɛɛn ci gɛrzɛ, abiirna buk kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr. Má anyeku zin kɛɛt o abon kizi gɛrzɛ.
40012034	Igeet dɔl ci kokonyawu coko! Kayo udukta kaal ci abon ku mã gɛrzɛ zinzeeti o? Ma gɔɔn laadun ɔtɔgi aduwa kaal o anyak ziniz eecitɔ.
40012035	Ma ɛɛti ci abon ziniz aduwa zoozok o abon ɛɛl zinize onin. Maje ɛɛti ci gɛrzɛ ziniz aduwa niini zoozok o gɛr ɛɛl zinize onin.
40012036	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, katin iitene ci payiinto e ajin Jooi ɔl dook zoozok ugeec gɛr baal gɔɔn aduwa loota ŋina e dook.
40012037	Apakuŋ katin igeet zoozowa ugoocok maany, karabɔŋ apayekuŋ gerzitin, karabɔŋ een bonat.
40012038	Ma vurta ivitak ɔI o Parici ogɛn ki ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Joowo Yesu, ma avu anek nɛ, “Gayoi, tuguweyet di gi ci ateedek biye.”
40012039	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Mayo ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko akɔm tuwɛn, ma gɛrzɛtɛ ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔn? Ajinaŋ niiga aneet kutugu gi ci ateeduŋ biye. Akɔm zin kina! Olla gi o atɛɛt ɔl biye baal agoononek nyakaŋan o kazi Jɔna e doon ci ka buk kutuguwozeyuŋ igeet.
40012040	Zin kiyo baale aavɛ niini kulugit kɛŋa waazinok iiyu ki baalinok iiyu e, buk tiŋeere naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kaavɛ tɔdɔwai eecitɔ waazinok iiyu ki baalinok iiyu.
40012041	Mazin katin iitene ci payiinto e ɔl baal kutur o kazi Ninava e iŋaaz jena, ma abɔrak Jook kaal ugooc gɛr agoonu, eeci baale niigi otoŋit baciinok ugeec iinya baal aziiŋni zɔɔz o Jɔna e. Mazin bar demziin cane o adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk zɔɔz baal Jɔna e.
40012042	Buk katin iitene ci payiinto e iŋaaz ŋaa ween alaan baal abal looc o kazi Ciba, ma abɔrak Jook kaal ugooc gɛr agoonu, eeci baale ɛɛrɔn niini ook looce o rɛɛn many arɔɔŋ ka kook kiziik demziin ci gɛnyiz baal alaan o kazi Solomon e. Zin bar naana kadiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk Solomon.
40012043	Zin gɔɔn ma aduŋna miniŋit ci Loryento eete oman, awɔ akɔ balala ŋaati adɔyi akɔm maam ka kook kɔrɔɔŋ ŋinti ayubzi ŋinaante.
40012044	Mazi alaŋ ajowa ŋinti ayubzi ŋinaante, anek ɛlɛ maany nɛ, Nyan kimiire kook eete baal kooŋnei looc e. Mazi abada, aku ajowa eet nico abil kiyo ceez o aviilyai kitiliza, ma akɔm ririny kɛŋa o.
40012045	Ma adun bodo niini akɔ bitaala, ma akɔ anyaa miniŋ ci Loryento oogi ceen torgɛrɛm ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt bar kujukit nɔɔnɔ, ma avu abaak eete nico. Ma uulali ɛɛti nici kizi gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk baale. Iinak zin buk katin ɔl ci ɔɔ nico gɛr noko gerzitin nici nɔkɔ.
40012046	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Yesu ki ɔl nicoko nɔkɔ, ivita yaatinɛ ki gɔtɔnɔgi. Ma avu ɛɛl bitaala arɔɔŋ ka kozoozɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
40012047	Ma anek ɛɛti oman Yesu nɛ, “Yaatun ki gotonogu nɔɔgɔ ci ɛɛl bitaala neke arooŋnyin niigi ozoozɔ ki ineet.”
40012048	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Yaai ŋɛnɛ? Gɔtɔnɔga ɔl jaŋ?”
40012049	Ma oov Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek eet nico nɛ, “Cin di! Nicigi yaai, ma een gɔtɔnɔga.
40012050	Ma ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal o arooŋek baaba o aavi tammu tadena nɔɔnɔ kutugu, niini gɔtɔna, ma een ŋɔɔna, ma een yaai.”
40013001	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ itiŋa Yesu ɔlɔ ook liil otoga, ma akɔ aavi loota ŋinaante.
40013002	Ma ŋinaante ivitak nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel gɛr zɛɛ makacin ook niini kavoola liil kɛŋa. Maje ɔl dook aavtiz liil otoga dɔwɔna.
40013003	Ma oobek niini nɔɔgɔ kaal ci meel gɛr yabziinta. Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci akɔ ḏowɛn mana.
40013004	Mazi akɔ aḏowɛ, iitazak ḏowo ogɛn gɔl kɛŋ, ma avu avɛra kibaali, ma adak dook lai.
40013005	Maje ḏowo ogɛn iinak vitɛn ceen biyɛn, ma aduŋna ḏowo nici kataman.
40013006	Mazi aranɛ kɔr, araabjai bodo kataman, eeci akɔm tɔdɔ ci abon ka kuruktɛkɛ agɛrɔ looc juruŋ.
40013007	Maje ḏowo ogɛn iinak bila kɔrgɛn, ma aduŋna bila zɛɛ makacin eedit nɔɔgɔ calaŋ abiir.
40013008	Bar ḏowo ogɛn iinak tɔdɔ ci abon, ma abiir juruŋ, ma anyaa gɔɔn vokonti codoi kɛbɛrɛ ci miliny. Ma anyaa ogɛn kɛbɛrɛ ci meel kidicilim. Maje ogɛn anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.”
40013009	Mazi aṯornɛkɛ Yesu yabziinte nico, enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã anyaku iin ci aziiknenu, iziiktɔ juruŋ.”
40013010	Ivitak ni Yesu nuyawa oginɛ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn niina aduwai ɔl kaal yabziinta o naa?”
40013011	Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko anyozozeyuŋ igeet gɛnyizi ci ka agayi zoozok o baliin o Joowo aroodi. Maje nɔɔgɔ ŋaan kanyozozek gɛnyizi nici.
40013012	Ma ɛɛti ci agɛny laadun azaaconek bodo nɔɔnɔ bar kɛgɛny ɔrɔɔt. Maje bar ɛɛti ci akɔm nɔɔnɔ gɛnyiz laadun, mayo nuun anyak da niini ci miliny tɛr, aamnyai bar ŋaatin nici kaavu nɔkɔ.
40013013	Zin kaduwai nɔɔgɔ zoozok yabziinta o, eeci niigi mã agɛlɛm kaal, alaŋ acin juruŋ. Mã azii, alaŋ aga keŋti cigeecjuruŋ.
40013014	Ɛlɛɛmnyai zin zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya. Azi baale niini nɛ, “Aziizar gɔɔn niigi kaal been tɛr, bar alaŋ aga keŋti cigeec. Agɛlɛm gɔɔn niigi kaal been tɛr, bar alaŋ acin juruŋ.
40013015	Eeci ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko akɔm nɔɔgɔ baabani. Ma adiit iin ugeec, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziiktɔ, ma amot kɛbɛrɛ, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ kicintɔ. Matɛ calaŋ agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ, acinɛ waan kɛbɛrɛn labak, ma aziiknɛ iini ugeec. Matɛ waan buk kabadayan niigi aneet, akoli koca nɔɔgɔ ooti kagaac kaal juruŋ, ma waan kuruguz naana nɔɔgɔ.”
40013016	Bar zin niiga amayuwenu ɔrɔɔt, eeci kɛbɛrɛ cugooc o acinɛ juruŋ, ma buk iina cugooc o aziiŋnɛ.
40013017	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, baale nyakaŋanɛta ci meel kibeen ɔl ci meel ole o Joowo arɔɔŋ kicinit kaal ci acinu niiga noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma bar ŋaan niigi kicinit nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Ma buk arɔɔŋ niigi kiziiyit kaal ci aziiŋnu niiga noko, bar ŋaan kiziiyit.
40013018	Iziirartɔ zin juruŋ ka agaac kɛŋ ci yabziin ci eet ci aḏowɛ o.
40013019	Ma ɔl o azii kaviyak o akati baliin o Joowo, ma bar alaŋ aga kɛŋ cin, atobɔ niigi ki gɔl kɛŋ o iinak ḏowo. Ma aku Loryen, ma avɛra zɔɔz o aḏowɛ zinzeetine ugeec.
40013020	Ma vitɛna ceen biyɛn iinak ḏowo o atobɔ niigi ki ɔl o gɔɔn olla azii zɔɔz o Joowo talniinta, ma agama kataman talniinta.
40013021	Bar alaŋ akɔ zɔɔz nici zinzeetinɛ juruŋ, ma atuwe ŋintimiliny tɛr, mazi akunak nɔɔgɔ piryakzɛt giye o tuwɛn uneeŋ, amiiri bodo niigi ki vurut.
40013022	Ma tɔdɔwa ci ɛɛl bila kɔrgɛna, ma iinak ḏowo o, atobɔ niigi ki ɔl o gɔɔn azii zɔɔz o Joowo, maje bar baabani ci kaal o loocu ki baabani ci arokzetu ɛɛt zɔɔz o Joowo kamaduk ŋaatineeŋ.
40013023	Mazin tɔdɔwa ci abon, ma iinak ḏowo o, atobɔ niigi ki ɔl o gɔɔn azii zɔɔz o Joowo juruŋ, ma azooni zinzeetine ugeec didi. Ma amɛna niigi gole o Joowo juruŋ, ma atobɔ niigi baayize uneeŋ ki labi ci abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci miliny, maje ogɛn abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci meel kidicilim, maje ogɛn abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.”
40013024	Ma bodo aduwak Yesu ɔl yabziin oma anek nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo atobɔ ki mana ci aḏok ɛɛti.
40013025	Ma iitene oman baalin kɛŋa ŋaati ataŋguzi ɔl dook iiya ɛɛti ceen miroi, ma aku aḏok imac kacantɔ ki labi mana eecitɔ zɛɛ ɔɔtɔ ni niini.
40013026	Mazi akɔ arɛc labina, eyeliztai imac nicigi buk.
40013027	Ma avu gabara ci eet o mana nico, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, iiten baale kizik aḏui ḏowo ci abon ɔrɔɔt. Mazin yo imac nici avu ŋaaḏaŋ?”
40013028	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak miroi ci iiya oḏok nɔɔgɔ.” Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo zin inoko arooŋnyet ageeta koota keteedawa imac nicoko?”
40013029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ karooŋ, eeci kabaaban karabɔŋ koca ateedanu labi buk.
40013030	Anycek rak labi kibeen imac buk kɔɔt niigi dook zɛɛ ma iitene ci teedinto e, ŋaan kaduwai ɔl o teedinto ka kɔɔt keteeda rak imac ɔɔwa, ma acap zɛɛ ka kujuktek goo. Maje labi ka keteeda zɛɛ ka karyekan piim onan.”
40013031	Ma bodo aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin oma anek nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo atobɔ ki keberec o motoŋtoco aduŋna mana o.
40013032	Bar mazi akɔ aduŋna, iroktai zɛɛ makacin izi kɛɛt ci adikir ɔrɔɔt. Ma ɛɛnyɛt kibaali ceezi kɛɛt nico otonɛ.”
40013033	Ma bodo aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin oma anek nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo atobɔ ki nyigit o telawu gɔɔn adɔŋca ŋaa jayitota, ma arurek tela zɛɛ makacin ɛtɛdɛwi tela we dook komokcar o.”
40013034	Aduwak Yesu ɔl kaal dook yabziinta zɛɛ ma akɔm gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ calaŋ aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ yabziinta.
40013035	Agooni kaala nici o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani. Baale azi niini nɛ, “Katin gɔɔn mã kazoozona kibeen nɔɔgɔ, kaduwai zoozok yabziinta. Kaduwai katin nɔɔgɔ kaal ci baale kinatamma laadun e ŋaan kagaac.”
40013036	Otoŋek ni Yesu kɔlɛ looc ɔɔtɔ ook ceeza. Ma avunak nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Duwayet di kɛŋ ci yabziin ci labinu kibeen imac o.”
40013037	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci aḏok ḏowo ci abon o aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto nɛɛn.
40013038	Maje mana looc nɛɛn. Ma labina ci abon o ɔl o avunak baliin o Joowo nɛɛn. Maje imac ɔl o avɔ niigi ki Loryen.
40013039	Ma miroiti ci aku aḏok imac o Loryen nɛɛn. Ma ɔl ci aliŋliŋ atɛɛt labi o toonnyak o Joowo.
40013040	Zin kiyo buk alotai imac, ma ajukonek goo o, abil buk tiŋeere iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e nɔkɔ.
40013041	Waanci kagamɛ baliin onan loota ŋina kitoon tiŋeere naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto toonnyak ogan kɔɔt kuluta ɔl dook o gɔɔn ademzek gɔnɔgi oogi gɔl ci ka kabacai baciinok, kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o gɛr dook.
40013042	Ma avu ajukek nɔɔgɔ goo, ma alu niigi ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigiL
40013043	Maje dɔlya o Joowo anyak katin niigi vooritin ci vɔɔr pɛr kataraanet kiyo ii o baliinte o baatineeŋ tammu tadena. Zin mã anyaku iin, iziiktɔ juruŋ.
40013044	Ma baliin o Joowo abil kiyo warkina o arɔɔt da ɛɛti oman mana kɛŋa o. Mazi awɔ aku ɛɛti oman bodo mana nico, ma ajowa warki nicoko, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ rak kadawa. Bar atalnɛ ɔrɔɔt, ma abuŋ, ma akɔ ataalinɛ kaal ogin anyak dook zɛɛ iiya ni ataala mana nico ɛlɛ dook kizi cin.
40013045	Buk baliin o Joowo abil kiyo ɛɛti ween tajɛr arɔɔŋ kataala kalbɛ ceen ziira o.
40013046	Mazi akɔ ajowa niini codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci adoŋnyi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, amiironek kɔrɔk, ma akɔ ataalinɛ kaal ogin anyak dook zɛɛ iiya ni ataala ziira nicoko.
40013047	Bodo buk baliin o Joowo abil kiyo cabai o ajukonek liil, ma agama kuluk kɛbɛrɛ dook o.
40013048	Mazi akɔ abiz cabai nici, agurak ɔl dɔwɔn, ma aku aavtiz loota, ma atakal kuluk. Adoma kuluk ci abon adikir o arek tori, maje ci miliny gɛr o ajukek tuu.
40013049	Mazin buk katin iitene ci adican lɔɔci e abil nɔkɔ. Avɔ katin toonnyawa o Joowo, ma avɔ alota ɔl o gɛr dook, ma aŋɛra nɔɔgɔ doon ole o abon dook lai.
40013050	Ma avu ajukek nɔɔgɔ goo o Loryento. Ma alu niigi ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit kirkic kirkic.”
40013051	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko kaal ci kaduwakuŋ noko dook aziiŋnu juruŋ?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, kaziiŋna.”
40013052	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma ɔl o aga waragɛ o Joowo rɛɛn, ma ademzek gɔnɔgi oogi, ma inoko ivita iziti nuyak cigan, atobɔ niigi kibeen eet ci korgu anyak ceeze cin kaal o abon rɛɛn been buk o colai o.”
40013053	Mazi adica Yesu yabziinok nicoko, ɔtɔɔ ŋinaante imiirozek kutur onin.
40013054	Ma akɔ adɛmɛz ɔl ceeze o lotento. Ma abiir ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante ooti tɛt, ma anɔ niigi nɛ, “Ma dim logoti nici ajowa gɛnyiz kibeen dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko ŋaaḏaŋ?
40013055	Mayo niini alaŋ een ŋɛɛrti eet o gɔɔn abaac kɛɛn ŋina o nɛɛn? Alaŋ een yaatin nɛɛn Meri? Alaŋ een gɔtɔnɔgi nɛɛn awoyi Jemis ki Josev ki Saiman been Judaz?
40013056	Alaŋ een ŋɔɔnɔgi dook nɛɛn o abaak ŋina o? Ajowa zin niini kaal nicoko dook ŋaaḏaŋ?”
40013057	Zin enico otoborit niigi nɔɔnɔ. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn laadun nyakaŋan atitiny nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci kuturyok oogi, maje bar ɔl o kutur onin kibeen ɔl o tatok onin ɛlɛ alaŋ atitiny nɔɔnɔ.”
40013058	Ma akɔm waanice Yesu kaal ci meelik atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn ŋinaante, eeci alaŋ anyak niigi tuwɛn.
40014001	Ma iinyaye niceke iziik alaani o kazi Erod baal abal looc o kazi Galili e kaal ci agɔɔn Yesu o.
40014002	Ma anek niini alaat o miliny aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko nicini Jɔn o oony ɔl nɛɛn abada bodo daayiza. Gi zin inoko ci agɔɔni niini kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko nɛɛn.”
40014003	Azi Erod nɔkɔ o, eeci baale agam niini Jɔn, ma acap sijina giye ci akati Erodiyas ween ŋaa o gɔtɔni o kazi Pilip.
40014004	Eeci baale anek Jɔn Erod nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati bodo ariyɛ ŋaa ci gotonon o niina maany.”
40014005	Waanice arɔɔŋ Erod kuruk Jɔn kadaak, bar olla waanice aŋole niini ɔl o Juz, eeci waanice Jɔn ŋaatineeŋ abil kiyo nyakaŋani o.
40014006	Mazi akɔ aada Erod iiten onin baal aritan e, otowa ɔl ci meelik ka kivita kimicit ole cin o. Orogom ni tinati Erodiyas ɔl ŋuma zɛɛ makacin ɛtɛɛdɛ Erod ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40014007	Ma aterkedek dole gi ci anek nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci olla arooŋ, duwayan ka kanyin.”
40014008	Imiire ni dole ook ijin yaatin gi ci abon ka kanyek Erod nɔɔnɔ. Mazi abada, iiya enek Erod nɛ, “Karooŋ ɔɔ o Jɔn. Nyaayan kodooca inoko ɛlɛ ŋina.”
40014009	Ma awuci Erod ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zooze nico. Bar giye o ɛtɛrkɛdi niini dole zɔɔz ɔl dook ŋuma, ɔkɔma bodo gɔl ci ka kabadai zɔɔz nico.
40014010	Ma aduwak ɔl kɔɔt keteeda Jɔn ɔɔ sijina.
40014011	Ma anyaak ɔl dole ɔɔ kodooca, ma akɔ anyek niini yaatin.
40014012	Mazi azii nuyawa o Jɔn daayiz onin, ivita adomta nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ ada zɛɛ iiya ni ɔɔt uduktak Yesu daayiz.
40014013	Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, ɔtɔɔzɔ niini ki nuyak ogin ŋinaante oneec liil kavoola ɔɔtɔ ŋaatineeŋ doon tuuwa. Mazi avɔ aziiknek ɔl Yesu ŋinite, ɔɔtɔ buk niigi odotek korogjok looc oneec Yesu zɔɔnɛ liil otoga.
40014014	Ŋinaante mazi atɔɔdak Yesu dɔwɔn, icinun ɔl ci meelik anowa nɔɔnɔ noko. Ma uwucnek nɔɔnɔ kɔlɛ nici, ma arogoz o amɔɔr ŋaatineeŋ dook moorizowɛ.
40014015	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ yoman, ivitak Yesu nuyawa oginɛ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Izi lɔɔci yoman, ma buk een ŋina lɔɔci balal. Anyek ɔl kɔɔtɔ kuturyowe ci miliny neke ka kɔɔt kataalta kaal ci adak.”
40014016	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati awɔyi. Ŋaan anyeku nɔɔgɔ kaal ci adak niiga alya.”
40014017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm dayiin ci kanyaka meel kina. Kanyaka ŋina ḏɔkɛn tur ki kuluk ram nɔkɔ.”
40014018	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaaktayaŋ di kaal nicoko ŋaato.”
40014019	Ma aduwak ɔl kaavtiyɔ loota artɛnɛ. Ma adoma ḏɔkɛn ceen tur noko ki kuluk ceen ram noko, ma agɛlɛm tammu taden, ma anyek Jook zany. Ɛtɛɛt ni ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek ḏɔkɛn nicoko kibeen kuluk nuyak ogin ka keŋeryek ɔl.
40014020	Ma adake ɔl dook zɛɛ makacin ipiiyantɛ. Ma alota nuyawa dayiin ci anyigjai o zɛɛ ma abitiz gilanya amɔtɔ ram.
40014021	Ma ɔl ci baal adake neke een maczɛt doon lak tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000) calaŋ akɛɛp ɔl ŋaai ki dɔl.
40014022	Mazi avɔ adotiz ɔl dayiinta, anyek Yesu nuyak ogin kɔtɔɔzɔ enico ɛlɛ kabaaktɛ kavoola karaktɛ kɔɔt liil baagita. Maje niini aavi rak ka kazaan ɔl kɔɔt korogjowɛ.
40014023	Mazi avɔ azaani ɔl, ɔtɔɔ niini doon ook ɔtɔɔt bɛ taden ka kook kijin Jook. Ma akɔ aavi ŋinaante niini doon zɛɛ ma yoman.
40014024	Maje kavooli o avɔyi nuyawa e ŋaan awɔ liil kɛŋa nɔkɔ, eeci atirginyɔ ki ŋɔɔt ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40014025	Mazi akɔ amaman tammu, iiyak Yesu nuyak ŋaati awoyanɛ maam tadena.
40014026	Mazi acin nuyawa nɔɔnɔ awɔ maam tadena nɔkɔ, otoŋole looc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Abaaban bar azi nɛ, Coma een miniŋit. Makacin egerenyit niigi ŋoliinta.
40014027	Ma azoozek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta gi! Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Anycek zinzeeti kodoyit.
40014028	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, mã een didi nicini ineet nɛɛn, nyan buk aneet kɔtɔɔ maam tadena kook ŋaatun.”
40014029	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija.” Ma aduŋna Pitɔr kavoola, ma awɔ maam tadena akɔ ŋaati Yesu.
40014030	Bar bodo mazi acin ŋɔɔt ivaan ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ, anyawun ŋoliin, ma arɔɔŋ akɔ maami tɔ ka waan kotododɛ. Makacin ɛgɛrɛny izi nɛ, “Manyi, Manyi, ɛɛlawan.”
40014031	Ma itoonek Yesu nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma ɛɛla nɔɔnɔ enico ɛlɛ. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyei niina tuwɛn ci miliny tɛr. Bodo anyi ziniz kizi ḏakḏak naa?”
40014032	Ma avɔ niigi dook kavoola, ma azi ŋɔɔti tiv.
40014033	Ma adiŋdiŋan nuyawa dook Yesu azi nɛ, “Een didi tɛ niina Ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
40014034	Abaayizit ni niigi liil, ma avunak looc o kazi Genezaret.
40014035	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl Yesu ŋinaante, iiyezit niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma itoonek niigi utugeti ɔl dook kutura ka kulutak ɔl Yesu ɔl o amɔɔr.
40014036	Ma ilalek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kanyek ɔl ci amɔɔr noko olla nuun kuumit rum cin o. Mazi olla uum ɔl o amɔɔr rum cin o, orogit didi niigi moorizowe ugeec.
40015001	Ivitak ni Yesu ɔl o Parici ki ɔl oogi ole o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok Jerusalɛma, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ,
40015002	“Ma dim nuyawa cugune o alaŋ azooni lotinok o jijitigaac rɛɛn o naa? Alaŋ rak gɔɔn niigi oony azɛɛnjuruŋ iŋaan kadaktɔ eo aduwan kɛɛranɛ ogaac naa?”
40015003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niiga buk alaŋ azoonu lotinok o Joowo, ma bar anuyu demziinok cugooc doon o naa?
40015004	Azi gɔɔn Jooi nɛ, Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun. Mã alam eet ci aduwak yaatin ki baatin gi ci gɛr, abon aruwe niini kadaak.
40015005	Maje bar niiga ademzonu anonu nɛ, Mã anyewun ɛɛti kaal ogin anyak dook Jook, alaŋ bodo niini aganɔ ŋaati atiriti baatin karabɔŋ een yaatin.
40015006	Gole nico ɛɛti nici alaŋ aŋole baatin ki yaatin. Buk gole nico epeztu niiga zɔɔz o Joowo, ma bar unuyu zoozok cugooc doon.
40015007	Igeet ɔl ci abuuku eleeti o! Alɛɛma didi Jooi zɔɔz o akanuŋ igeet baal aduwa nyakaŋane o kazi Izaya anɛ nɛ,
40015008	Gɔɔn ɔl nicigi adiŋdiŋanan aneet utugetinɛ doon, maje bar zinzeeti cigeec o adɛyai ŋaatan many.
40015009	Alaŋ zin niigi aganɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋanan aneet, eeci arican niigi demziin ci kɛɛranɛ ugeecik ɔrɔɔt kujuk demziin ci zɔɔz onan.”
40015010	Otowa ni Yesu kɔlɛ dook, ma aku anek nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di! Aryek kɛŋ ci zɔɔz co zinzeeti juruŋ.
40015011	Akɔm gi ci adak ɛɛti otoga ci anyek eet kizi ririny ŋume o Joowo, bar zin kaal o gɔɔn aduwa ɛɛti otoge onin nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi ririny.”
40015012	Ma vurta ivitak Yesu nuyawa oginɛ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Zoozok ona aduwa e anyigit ɔl o Parici ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
40015013	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci ŋaan laadun baaba tammu tadena koḏok, ma bar aduŋna niini doon, adaacak koca bitaalin.
40015014	Má areku zin niiga nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti gaga. Niigi olla alaat ci ruben. Gɔɔn laadun mã ayit ɛɛti ci ruben gɔn ci buk ruben, iinak koca niigi dook look.”
40015015	Ma ajin Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Duwayet di kɛŋ ci yabziin nico.”
40015016	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma een buk igeet nuyak ogan ɛlɛ, ŋaan aleekuŋ kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ?
40015017	Alaŋ agayu dayiin ci adak ɛɛti ci deer otoga avɔ kɛŋa, ma bodo avɔ aduŋna o?
40015018	Bar zin kaal o anyek eet ci deer kizi ririny ŋume o Joowo nɛɛn o aduŋna zinize onin.
40015019	Eeci ziniz anyaa baabaninok ci meel gɛr kiyo monyɛnɛt ci kamonyi ɔl ci deer, ki zoocmazit, ki rɛɛcanzɛt, ki gorziin, ki vɔlɔŋ, been ŋomtiin.
40015020	Avu kaal nicigi dook eet ziniza, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi ririny ŋume o Joowo. Maje bar gi ci kadayin iŋaan kotoonyit azɛɛn o alaŋ anyek eet kizi ririny ŋume o Joowo.”
40015021	Ɔtɔɔ ni Yesu looce ci kazi Genezaret noko ook looce ci ajɔŋzɔ ki looc o kazi Tayor been Sidon.
40015022	Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaa ceen borit ci ɔl o kazi Kanan abaak ŋinaante, ma akunak niini Yesu, ma agɛrɛny ŋaati aluwi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi ween ŋɛɛrti Devid, ɛɛlawan da! Tiritan! Kanyei bɛɛnyan ɔlɔ ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento alya, ma apirnanɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
40015023	Maje Yesu ajaki niini labak. Akɔm gi ci aduwak nɔɔnɔ kina. Ivitak ni Yesu nuyawa oginɛ, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyek ŋaa nico kɔtɔɔ, eeci anuyet, ma awudeket luwanta.”
40015024	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu, azi nɛ, “Kitoonnyai laadun o ka kiiya kɛɛla ɔl o Juz doon, eeci niigi atobɔ ki ɛɛza ci akoloni.”
40015025	Mazi azii ŋaa nici zɔɔz nico, iiya, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc Yesu ŋuma, ma alu azi nɛ, “Manyi, tiritan!”
40015026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati kaamanɛ dɔl dayiin, ma kanyek orze.”
40015027	Ma ilalek niini Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, alɛɛma didi zɔɔz nico. Zin mayo nuun een orze o ɛlɛ avɛr zurzuryak o gɔɔn iinanɛ ɔl dayiinta o labak.”
40015028	Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Een ŋaa ci anyei tuwɛn ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Ŋaan zin agoononekin ineet gi ci ona arooŋ o.” Enico ɛlɛ orok didi dole oninɛ.
40015029	Ɔtɔɔ ni Yesu ŋinaante, ma akɔ ano liil o kazi Galili otok. Ma bodo ooŋ liil otok, ma atɔɔt akɔ taden, ma akɔ aavi loota biyɛnɛ ŋinaante.
40015030	Ma avunak ɔl ci meel gɛr nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante. Anyaak niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci ŋɔɔlik, ki ɔl ci ruben, ki ɔl ci dɔkɔm azɛɛna, ki ɔl ci adiiti iina ki alemeti, been ɔl oogi ci amɔɔr meelik gɛr. Ma avu arekɛ niigi Yesu looc, ma arogoz niini ɔl nicoko dook lai.
40015031	Mazi avɔ acin kɔlɛ dook ŋinaante, ɔl o adiiti iina ki alemeti e iziiktɔ ma azɔɔz labak, ki ɔl o dɔkɔm azɛɛna e ɔzɔlantɛ azɛɛna ugeec, ki ɔl o ŋɔɔlik e ɔtɔɔzɔ bɛrbɛr, ki ɔl o rubenik icintɔ, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti giye nico, ma adiŋdiŋan niigi Jook ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40015032	Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ogin, ma aku anek nɛ, “Awucnekan ɔl nici ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci karomena ki nɔɔgɔ iinya ceen iiyu noko dook, ma ɔkɔm niigi gi ci adak. Alaŋ zin karooŋ kanyek nɔɔgɔ kazaantɛ kɔtɔɔzɔ nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci adak, gɛrzɛ ŋaan avɔ aval magizeeti gɔla.”
40015033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ka zin yo kojokta balale nico dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki kɔlɛ nicoko dook ŋaaḏaŋ?”
40015034	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyaku inoko ḏɔkɛn izɔk?” Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kanyaka ḏɔkɛn torgɛrɛm ki kuluk ci miliny tɛr.”
40015035	Uduwak ni Yesu ɔl dook kaavtiyɔ loota.
40015036	Ma adoma ḏɔkɛn ceen torgɛrɛm noko ki kuluk nicoko, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏɔkɛn nicoko, ma anyek nuyak keŋeryek ɔl.
40015037	Ma adake ɔl oke dook zɛɛ been paŋ. Ma alota nuyawa ḏɔkɛn ci anyigjai o zɛɛ ma abitiz gilanya torgɛrɛm.
40015038	Maje ɔl ci baal adake neke een maczɛt doon eet tur lak eet ram (4000) calaŋ kakeebek ŋaai ki dɔl.
40015039	Mazi adotiz ɔl dayiinta, anyek Yesu ɔl kɔtɔɔzɔ. Ma atɔɔt niini kavool, ma abaayiz liil akɔ looce o ajɔŋzɔ ki kutur o kazi Magadan.
40016001	Ma avunak ɔl o Parici ki ɔl o Sajuzi Yesu. Arɔɔŋ kicinta nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Tuguweyet di gi ci ateedet biye ci aku tammu tadena.”
40016002	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã akɔla ŋɔɔti ci jenu o, anonu nɛ, Uluz tiŋeere tammu alaŋaan bodo atiil.
40016003	Mã acinu anewek tɔ ŋeere ririwɔna, anonu nɛ, Atiil tedec tammu. Anyaku gɔɔn niiga arizɛt ci agayu kaal o ka kivita looc tiŋeere ŋɔɔta. Bar zin alaŋ eeginu arinya ci kaal o agooni inoko o arooŋekuŋ Jooi igeet ka agaac.
40016004	Mazin ɔl ci arɔɔŋ kicinit gi ci atɛɛt ɔl biye kiyo niiga noko gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt, ma akɔm nɔɔgɔ Jook. Alaŋ zin bodo kagoonekuŋ naana igeet gi oma ci ateeduŋ biye. Olla gi baal agoononek Jɔna e doon ci ka buk keyelozeyuŋ igeet.” Enico odotek Yesu nɔɔgɔ looc, ɔtɔɔ.
40016005	Mazi abaaki nuyawa kibeen Yesu avɔ liil baagita, erektek nuyak ḏɔkɛna ŋaati anyaani.
40016006	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Egenyit ɔrɔɔt! Ebeyit eleeti ole o Parici been ɔl o Sajuzi. Edeya eleeti nyigite ugeec gɔɔn arek ḏɔkɛn ka ketedeec o.”
40016007	Ma aŋɔmtɔ nuyawa anɔ nɛ, “Aduwa bɔŋ gi nico o, eeci ŋaan kanyaakta ḏɔkɛn.”
40016008	Maje Yesu aga gi ci azɔɔz niigi o nɔkɔ, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Naa akɔ ma azoozu gi ci akɔmnuŋ ḏɔkɛn o? Anyaku niiga tuwɛn ci miliny ɔrɔɔt.
40016009	Ŋaan dim iziiktɔ nɔkɔ? Alaŋ aadanu iiten baal kaŋɛrɛkɛ ɔl ween 5000 ḏɔkɛn ween tur nɔkɔ e? Waanice alotanu dayiin o anyigjai zɛɛ ma abitiz kodoocɛ izɔk?
40016010	Inoko buk alaŋ aadanu iiten baal kaŋɛrɛkɛ ɔl ween 4000 ḏɔkɛn ween torgɛrɛm nɔkɔ e? Waanice alotanu dayiin o anyigjai zɛɛ ma abitiz kodoocɛ izɔk?
40016011	Alaŋ zin aziiŋnenu naa? Alaŋ kazooz naana zɔɔz ci akati ḏɔkɛn ci ka ketedeec o. Bar kilotuŋ egenyit ole o Parici been ɔl o Sajuzi. Edeya eleeti demziinte uneeŋ gɛr atobɔ ki nyigit o gɔɔn arek ɔl ḏɔkɛn.”
40016012	Enico agaac nuyawa alaŋ arɔɔŋ Yesu nɔɔgɔ kedeya eleeti nyigite o gɔɔn arek ɔl ḏɔkɛn ka ketedeec. Bar arɔɔŋ nɔɔgɔ kedeya eleeti demziinte o ɔl o Parici ki ɔl o Sajuzi.
40016013	Mazi akunak Yesu looc ci ajɔŋzɔ ki kutur o kazi Sisiriya Vilipiya, ŋinaante ijin niini nuyak ogin anek nɛ, “Mayo dim gɔɔn azi ɔl nɛ, Naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keen ŋɛnɛɛn?”
40016014	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi ɔl ogɛn nɛ, Een Jɔn o oony ɔl. Azi ɔl ogɛn nɛ, Een Ilija. Azi ogɛn nɛ, Een Jirimaya. Azi ɔl ogɛn nɛ, Een nyakaŋan oma nyakaŋanete o Joowo baal adaayitɔ e.”
40016015	Ma anek niini nuyak nɛ, “Ma niiga aziyu nɛ, Keen naana ŋɛnɛɛn?”
40016016	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Jook o arogi been nɛɛn.”
40016017	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Amayuwin Jooi ineet Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔna. Eeci alaŋ aduwakin zɔɔz nico ɛɛti ci deer, bar baaba o aavi tammu tadenu nɛɛn o ayelzakin ineet zɔɔz nico.
40016018	Inoko zin kakateyin ineet zaar ci kazi Pitɔr, ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ bɛ, eeci adoi niina kiyo bɛ o. Mazin biye nico ŋaan keenyeti ceez onan een ɔl o atuyan aneet, ma alaŋ anim daayizi kuulal nɔɔgɔ.
40016019	Kanyin tiŋeere alaazɛt o baliin o Joowo. Zin gi o abur niina loota ŋina, abornɛ buk tammu tadena. Maje gi o agama niina loota ŋina, agamnyai buk tammu tadena.”
40016020	Ma bodo aricanek Yesu nuyak ka calaŋ aduwak ɔl oogi gi o ɛɛnɛ niini Kiristo.
40016021	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ akata Yesu gi ci abɔraki nuyak ogin labak nɔkɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Abon kakɔ Jerusalɛma ka kɔɔt kigidan alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Arukan tiŋeere niigi aneet kadaak. Mazi kadica iinya iiyu, ŋaan kaŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
40016022	Ma alakada Pitɔr Yesu doon kidicilim, ma anek nɛ, “Uloi, Manyi! Lam gi nico calaŋ akunakin ineet been nɛɛn. Abon bai ŋaati alaŋ akunakin gi nici nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
