40016023	Enico ɛlɛ ookci Yesu, ma anek Pitɔr nɛ, “Nyɛyɛ ŋaatan Loryen co. Inoko arooŋ niina ka nyook gɔl o liŋliŋɔn onan, eeci baabani cune o alaŋ aku Joowa, bar baabani ci eet ci deer.”
40016024	Enek ni Yesu nuyak ogin dook nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti konowan aneet, abon areyek nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ oninɛ, ma abon agama gidɛn ki piryakzɛt ŋaati anuyan niini aneet.
40016025	Eeci ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ korogoz ɛlɛ onin, bar akoloz. Maje ɛɛti ci akoloz ɛlɛ onin ŋaatan, bar arogoz.
40016026	Mayo zin inoko mã anyak ɛɛti kaal o loocu dook, ma bar akoloz rogɛt ci ɛlɛ onin, bonat inoo? Mã adaak ɛɛti, akɔm bodo gi ci ka kabadakɛ nɔɔnɔ rogɛt onin.
40016027	Kakun zin tiŋeere naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kɔrkɔrana ki toonnyak o Joowo diŋdiŋonte o baaba. Ma kaku kacacai gɔɔn eet co kaal ogin abon baal gɔɔn agɔɔn e.
40016028	Abon zin agayu gi ce. Anyak ŋaatunooŋ ŋina ɔl oogi calaŋ adaai zɛɛ ma acinan aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto waanci kakunɛ baliinte onan.”
40017001	Mazi adicai iinya ceen tɔrkɔnɔm, iyit Yesu Pitɔr ki Jemis been gɔtɔni Jemis o kazi Jɔn, ma avɔ atɔɔt bɛ ci wun, ma aavtiz niigi doon biya ŋinaante.
40017002	Mazi ŋaan aavtiz nɔkɔ, bar acin niigi Yesu otowɛ nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ. Otowɛ ŋum oninɛ kizi vɔɔr pɛr kataraanet kiyo ii o. Ma ookci rumanɛ oginɛ aborcek e buk kizi vɔɔrɛ pɛr ɔrɔɔt.
40017003	Ma ŋintimiliny icinit niigi Mosis ki Ilija azɔɔzɔ ki Yesu.
40017004	Enek ni Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, kavu tɛ ŋina juruŋ. Inoko matɛ arooŋ, nyet kɛtɛɛnycawa kaal ceen ceezi kabili kɔr iiyu ka codoi kizi cun, codoi ci Mosis, codoi ci Ilija.”
40017005	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz niini nɔkɔ, acin diizoc ci vɔɔr pɛr aku, ma aduulɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ diiz. Ma azii niigi molok ci azɔɔz diizoce nico eecitɔ azi nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛran onan een didi o kareez ɔrɔɔt. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt. Abon zin niiga dook aziiŋnu nɔɔnɔ.”
40017006	Mazi azii nuyawa molok nico, iiyak nɔɔgɔ kulurkulur ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ makacin iitazɔ ŋoliinta kakati ŋumti looc.
40017007	Iiya ni Yesu, ma uum nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Itiŋgaz jena. Má aŋolinu looc gaga.”
40017008	Mazi aara niigi kɛbɛrɛ, ɔkɔma eet oma ci acin kina. Izi Yesu doon.
40017009	Mazi alocai niigi bɛ tadena, iricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Má avɔ rak aduwaku gi ci ona acinu noko ɔl oogi zɛɛ been iiten ci katin kaŋaanɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto daayiza e.”
40017010	Ijinit ni nuyawa nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Dim gɔɔn alaata o ademzek ɔl lotinok azi nɛ, Arayai katin Ilija rak ɔɔwa ŋaatun o naa?”
40017011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, alɛɛm didi. Ŋɛdɛt Ilija arayai ɔɔwa rak ŋaatan ka kiiya kidimdimaneyan aneet kaal dook keelit juruŋ.
40017012	Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Iiya Ilija iiten baale, ma akɔm eet ci aga nɔɔnɔ. Ma bar agoonek niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal ci gɛr eo arɔɔŋi niigi. Zin kiyo waanice agit niigi nɔɔnɔ e, agidan buk tiŋeere niigi aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto nɔkɔ.”
40017013	Enico agaac nuyawa zɔɔz ci aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o akati Jɔn o oony ɔL
40017014	Mazi alocai niigi bɛ tadena, ivita amada ɔl ci mɛɛlɛ bɛ loota. Ma akunak ɛɛti oman Yesu, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma.
40017015	Ma anek nɛ, “Manyi, ɛɛlawan da! Tirit ŋɛɛran ci anyak mɔɔriz ci avalni ce. Gɔɔn ma agam nɔɔnɔ mɔɔrizi nici, iinak goo karabɔŋ een maam.
40017016	Kanyaai uyene nɔɔnɔ nuyak cugun noko, bar akɔm ŋaatineeŋ ci anim kitirit nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
40017017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Igeet ɔl ci akɔmnuŋ tuwɛn coko. Kayo koromtɛ naana kibeen igeet zɛɛ been inin ka utuyɔ? Ka kɛmɛz zɔɔz cunooŋ zɛɛ been inin? Anyaaktayaŋ zin di logo nico ŋaato.”
40017018	Ma agerenyek Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento noko kuduna. Ma arogi logoti enico ɛlɛ.
40017019	Ivitak ni Yesu nuyawa oginɛ ŋaati aavɛ niini doon, ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ uyene ageeta akɔmneket miniŋit nici ŋaati kaarana naa?”
40017020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ niiga animnyu aarta moorizok ki miniŋ ɔla o, eeci alaŋ anyaku tuwɛn. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, inoko tɛ nuun anyayit olla tuwɛn ci miliny tɛr ceen ki keberec ci laŋiracoco, koca ma aneku bɛ nico nɛ, Piya ɛlɛ ŋina! Bitɔ bil bodo ŋaate! Aziiŋnuŋ koca, ma apiya ɛlɛ ŋina, ma akɔ ŋaati ona aduwaku niiga nɔɔnɔ o. Ma akɔm waan gi ci akɔmnekuŋ igeet been nɛɛn.”
40017022	Mazi avu alotɛ Yesu ki nuyak ogin iitene oman looce o kazi Galili, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko izi ajɔn ŋinti ka kuruktan ɔl aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kadaak.
40017023	Ma iinyaye ceen iiyu ŋaan kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.” Mazi azii vuyawa zɔɔz nico, akatit culum ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40017024	Mazi avunak Yesu ki nuyak ogin Kapernam, ivitak ɔl o gɔɔn alot guruc o ceez o Joowo Pitɔr, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo dim gɔɔn alaani cunooŋ noko buk aruk guruc o ceez o Joowo?”
40017025	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ii ri. Aruk gɔɔn buk.” Maje Yesu aga gi nico nɔkɔ. Mazi akɔ Pitɔr ŋaatin ceeza, enek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Saiman, mayo inoko niina azi nɛ zooze nico? Inoko gɔɔn aruwek alaat o loocu guruc ɔl jaŋ? Ɔl o tatok onin ɛlɛ, yo da aruwek nɔɔgɔ guruc ɔl o bitaalu?”
40017026	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aruwek nɔɔgɔ guruc ɔl o bitaalu.” Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Abon! Mazi abil nɔkɔ, alaŋ waan aganɔ ŋaati karuyi naaga guruc ci ceez ci Joowo o.
40017027	Bar zin alaŋ karɔɔŋ naaga kanycek nɔɔgɔ kotoborteyet nɔŋ kiziti nɛ, Coma alaŋ karɛɛz naaga ceez o Joowo. Inoko zin bitɔ liila. Yiitɔ abic ka bitɔ dɛtɔi. Zin tedec kulugiti ci akɔ agama oowa neke ajowa anyak otoga guruc ci kalɛɛnɔ ki ageet dook ka kuruktek ɔl nicoko. Doma zin, tedec anyek nɔɔgɔ.”
40018001	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ ivitak Yesu nuyawa oginɛ, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn dim inoko ci adikir ŋaatinaaŋ baliinte o Joowo?”
40018002	Ma awa Yesu dole ci miliny, ma aku anyek kibil nɔɔgɔ ŋuma.
40018003	Ma azi nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, má alaŋ abadanu eleeti eelit kiyo dɔlya o miliny o, alaŋ avoyu baliinte o Joowo been nɛɛn.
40018004	Ma ɛɛti ci anyek ɛlɛ kizi cɛlbɛz kiyo dole ci miliny abil igeet ŋuma noko, eet o adiŋdiŋ baliinte o Joowo nɛɛn.
40018005	Ma ɛɛti ci atalna dole ci miliny kiyo dole nici noko zaare ogan atalnanan niini aneet.
40018006	Bar mazi anyak eet ci anyek dɔl ci miliny noko codoi ŋaatineeŋ kimiire kivurut calaŋ atuyan aneet, aganɔ koca niini ŋaati acabonɛkɛ golu nɔɔnɔ inyaa, ma ajukonek liil kotododɛ kook many.
40018007	Izi nɔŋa wole zin ole o anyek ɔl kabaca oŋɛ. Ŋɛdɛt kaal ci gɛrzɛ acinanuŋ igeet noko avunak looc nico tup. Bar zin izi nɔŋa wole eete ci laadun anyaa kaal nicoko o.
40018008	Mã anyin aziiti karabɔŋ een zɔɔci baca baciinok, abon atɛɛda, ma ajukei tuu. Abon bar akɔ rogete o abil been nɛɛn ŋaati ɛɛnɛ ŋɔɔl karabɔŋ adowinin aziiti kujuk ŋaati ajukonɛkɛ goo o Loryento abil been nɛɛn ŋaati anyayɛ zɔɔ ki azɛɛn dook.
40018009	Mã anyin kɛbɛrɛci baca baciinok, abon akana, ma ajukei tuu. Abon ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta keberece codoi kujuk ŋaati ajukonɛkɛ goo Loryento abil been nɛɛn ŋaati anyayɛ kɛbɛrɛ dook.
40018010	Egenyit zin juruŋ ka calaŋ apezu dolene ci miliny noko codoi ŋaatineeŋ. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma toonnyawa ugeec abɛk nɔɔgɔ gɔɔn avɔ Joowa tup, ma aduwak nɔɔnɔ kaal o agooneku niiga dɔl ci miliny noko.”
40018012	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko mã anyak ɛɛti ɛɛza ceen eet tur, ma akoloni codoi ŋaatineeŋ, abaabanu agɔɔn koca niini naa? Bar kanɛ ooŋnek rak koca ɛɛza ceen eet wec kamɔtɔ ki tiin tɔrkɔc o looc, ma akɔ arɔɔŋ ɛɛz codoi ona akoloni o zɛɛ ma ajowa.
40018013	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔ zɛɛ mazi ajowa niini ɛɛz nico, atalnɛ ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk talniin o anyak ɛɛzaye o ŋaan kukuluze e.
40018014	Mazin buk gole nico baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena alaŋ arɔɔŋ dole codoi dolene ci miliny noko kokolozɛ.
40018015	Mã agoonekin gotonu gi ci gɛr, bitɔ ŋaatin ka bitɔ bɔrak nɔɔnɔ gi nico. Abon zin aminyu niiga doon. Mã aziiŋnin niini ineet, idicai gi nici, izi niini gotonu bodo.
40018016	Bar mã alaŋ aziiŋnin niini ineet, biti eet codoi karabɔŋ een ɔl ram orkorit ki ineet, ka kɔɔt kiziiyit zoozok ci abornekin niini ineet o eo aduwan waragɛ o Joowo.
40018017	Bar mã alaŋ buk azii niini nɔɔgɔ, bitɔ duwak ɔl o ceez o Joowo zɔɔz nico. Mazi alaŋ azii niini ɔl o Joowo buk, abon adɛyanu niiga dook ŋaatin.
40018018	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet dook, ma gi ci azoozu, ma abornu niiga loota ŋina, abornɛ buk tammu tadena. Maje gi ci azoozu, ma agamanu niiga loota ŋina, agamnyai buk tammu tadena.
40018019	Mã arom ɔl raman ŋaatunooŋ eleeti, ma ajin Jook gi ci arɔɔŋ niigi nɔɔnɔ kutuguwek, agoonek koca baaba tammu tadena nɔɔgɔ gi nico.
40018020	Eeci mã alotɛ ɔl raman karabɔŋ een iiyon zaare ogan, karomɛna buk naana ki nɔɔgɔ.”
40018021	Iiyak ni Pitɔr Yesu, ma aku ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, inoko mã agoonekan gɔtɔna gi ci gɛr, kotoŋ nɔɔnɔ lak izɔk? Kotoŋ lak torgɛrɛm?”
40018022	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ een lak torgɛrɛm nɔkɔ, bar toŋ nɔɔnɔ lak eet iiyu kamɔtɔ lak torgɛrɛm.
40018023	Eeci baliin o Joowo abil kete. Anyak baale alaan ci arɔɔŋ kɛkɛɛp ŋabolɛt baal gɔɔn da anyek niini ɔl ogin aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ e iziti izɔk.
40018024	Mazi akana ka kɛkɛɛp, anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci anyak ŋabolo ci guruc ci meel gɛr ci atobɔ ki guruc ci kataalanɛ tiin eet tur lak amɔtɔ.
40018025	Maje ɛɛti nici alaŋ anyak guruc ci meel ka kurui ŋabolo nico. Ma aricanek alaani ɔl ka kɔɔt kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ ki ŋaa onin ki dɔl ogin ki kaal ogin anyak dook ka kurui ŋabolo nico.
40018026	Mazi akɔ azii ɛɛti nici zɔɔz nico, iiya akati kozoŋti looc alaan onin ŋuma, ma azi nɛ, “Anyek da kalalin ziniz ŋaatan zɛɛ ma karuwekin kaal cugun o dook kidicilim labak.”
40018027	Uwucek ni alaan zɔɔz nici, makacin otoŋek didi niini nɔɔnɔ ŋabolo nico, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kɔɔtɔ.
40018028	Mazi adun ɛɛti nici, ook urumtɔ ki gɔn oma ci anyayek nɔɔnɔ ŋabolo ci miliny tɛr. Ma agam nɔɔnɔ, ma adaal alɛm anek nɛ, “Nyan guruc ogan baal anyei e.”
40018029	Ma akani ɛɛti nici kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɛ, “Anyek da kalalin ziniz ŋaatan zɛɛ ma karuwekin guruc cugun o labak.”
40018030	Bar niini alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziik zɔɔz nico been nɛɛn. Ma bar anyek nɔɔnɔ kook sijina ka kook kacabɛ zɛɛ ma aruk ŋabolo nico.
40018031	Mazi akɔ acin ɔl ogɛnɛ ci aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔnɔ ŋaatodoi gi nico, otoborit niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma avɔ aduwak alaan gi ci agɔɔn niini noko.
40018032	Ma awa alaani nɔɔnɔ ma aku anek nɛ, “Een eet ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt. Iiten baale kuuŋnekin naana ineet ŋabolo baal appe e, eeci arooŋnyan aneet kutuŋeyin.
40018033	Abon waan zin buk awunekin gotonu nici kiyo baale awucnekan niina aneet e.”
40018034	Enico otobor alaani nɔŋ arɔɔt, ma itoonek nɔɔnɔ sijin ka kook kipirtai ɔl nɔɔnɔ sijina zɛɛ ma aruk guruc baalke dook.”
40018035	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã alaŋ ooŋneku gotonogu kaal o abaca niigi ŋaatunooŋ zinzeetine ugooc dook, koca buk baaba o aavi tammu tadena alaŋ ooŋnekuŋ igeet kaal o abacanu.”
40019001	Mazi adiea Yesu zoozok nicoko, itiŋa Galiliya ook abaawozek looc o kazi Judiya liil o kazi Jordan baagita.
40019002	Ma ano ɔl ci meel gɛr nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔ arogoz niini nɔɔgɔ moorizowɛ ŋinaante.
40019003	Ma avunak ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ arɔɔŋ kicinta nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ajini aneki nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziiŋnek eet kɔtɔɔk ŋaa cin giye ci ɔɔ cin doon labak?
40019004	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan da niiga ekeebit waragɛ o Joowo rɛɛn o azi nɛ, Baale kinatamma laadun e ɛɛnyca Jooi eet ci mac ki ŋaa.
40019005	Ma azi Jooi nɛ, Gi o zin gɔɔn ooŋni ɛɛti baatin ki yaatin, ma akɔ aromɛn niini ki ŋaa cin o nɛɛn nici ka kiziti niigi dook ramantiya ɛlɛ codoi.
40019006	Alaŋaan zin bodo niigi eegin ram, bar iziti ɛlɛ codoi. Akɔm zin bodo eet ci ka kɛŋɛr gi ci orom Jooi o.”
40019007	Ma ajin ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mazin da baale Mosis azi nɛ, Mã arɔɔŋ kɔtɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, abon labak, olla anycek kɛtɛyɛɛdak niini nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci ŋeronto o naa?”
40019008	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyuŋ lotinowa o Mosis gɔl ci atooku ŋaai labak o, eeci igeet adɔi zinzeeti kak. Maje baale laadun kinatamma e laadun alaŋ abil nɔkɔ.
40019009	Inoko zm kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã ɛɛti ci atɔɔk ŋaa cin ŋaati alaŋ agami zoocmaza, ma akɔ arɔca niini ŋaa oma bodo, odoma niini zoocmaz.”
40019010	Ma vurta ivitak nuyawa Yesu, ma avu anek nɛ, “Mã een gɔl ci akati ŋaa kibeen eet nɛɛn nici, maya bar alaŋ karɔcɛ dook.”
40019011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma gɔl calaŋ karocin o alaŋ akati ɔl dook, bar akati ɔl o anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci aavtiyɛ calaŋ arocin doon.
40019012	Eeci anyak kaal oogi ci anyek ɔl calaŋ arɔcɛ. Ɔl ogɛn alaŋ arɔcɛ o, eeci aritai gole nico nɔkɔ laadun. Ɔl ogɛn alaŋ arɔcɛ o, eeci anyek ɔl ogɛnɛ nɔɔgɔ calaŋ arɔcɛ. Ɔl ogɛn alaŋ arɔcɛ, eeci arɔɔŋ kiliŋliŋit gɔl ci akati baliin o Joowo. Ma ɛɛti ci agama gɔl calaŋ karocin o, anycek nɔɔnɔ kagama didi.”
40019013	Ma anyaak ɔl oginɛ Yesu dɔl ci miliny ka kiiya kataadek niini nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn kamayuk ma ajinek nɔɔgɔ Jook. Maje bar nuyawa oginɛ agernyek ɔl nicoko ka calaŋ anyaak dɔl Yesu.
40019014	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek dɔl kivitayan aneet. Má alamnyu nɔɔgɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo abilnek ɔl o anyek eleeti keelit kiyo dɔlya ci miliny noko.”
40019015	Amayuk ni niini nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ ɔtɔɔ ni niini.
40019016	Ma akunak ɛɛti ci ŋaan een mɔldɔŋ Yesu, ma aku ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, mayo gitaz ci abon kagoon ka kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn?”
40019017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔ ma ajinan gi ci abon ka tugu o naa? Akɔm zin gi oma ci abon, bar abon Jooi doon. Mazi arooŋ rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, zooti lotinok.”
40019018	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nici Yesu anek nɛ, “Lotinok jaŋ?” Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Má amuny eet ci deer. Má adoma zoocmaz. Má agɔrzɛ. Má avoloŋ.
40019019	Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun. Zin ricik ɔrɔɔt rɛɛz ɔl o abaawonu kiyo areez ɛlɛ unun o.”
40019020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nici Yesu anek nɛ, “Lotinok nicoko dook kazoonɛ baale laadun. Gi jaŋ zin inoko ci arooŋnyan bodo kutugu?”
40019021	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã arooŋ ka bona ŋume o Joowo, bitɔ taalɔi kaal ugun dook zɛɛ ŋerek guruc ɔl o amaat. Mazi odot, ija niina alya nowan aneet. Ŋaan akɔ ajowa arɔkzɛt tammu tadena.”
40019022	Mazi azii ɛɛti nici zɔɔz nico, alaca ɛlɛ, ma awɔ bornɛt nɔŋa, eeci een niini aroi ɔrɔɔt.
40019023	Enek ni Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, adɔi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ eete ceen aroi ŋaati akɔyi baliinte o Joowo.
40019024	Inoko bodo kabɛdɛkɛ zɔɔz nico kanekuŋ nɛ, “Adɔi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ eete ceen aroi ŋaati akɔyi baliinte o Joowo kiyo alaŋ ayizonek nyakale nyibira ŋino vɔlɔŋ o.”
40019025	Mazi azii nuyawa zɔɔz nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ dook ooti tɛt giye nico, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ka dim zin katin korogozɛ ŋɛnɛ?”
40019026	Ɛgɛlɛm ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ma zɔɔz nici adɔi eete ci deer doon, maje Joowa akɔm gi ci adɔi.”
40019027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko kotoŋteya naaga kaal ogaacak dook looc, ma kivita kunuyin ineet o, mayo katin kajowana naa?”
40019028	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, katin waanci kagamɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaazɛt onan tammu tadena, niiga ci anuyaŋ aneet eeginu amɔtɔ ram noko avɔ buk niiga aavtiyu lecerene cugooc een amɔtɔ ram ka apayit boryok o Israyil een amɔtɔ ram.
40019029	Ma ɛɛti ci ooŋ kɔrɔk onin, ki gɔtɔnɔgi, ki ŋɔɔnɔgi, karabɔŋ een yaatin, ki baatin, ki dɔl cigin, ki mana cin ŋaaten aneet, azaaconek bodo katin nɔɔnɔ kaal ci meel, ma ajowa buk niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
40019030	Zin ɔl ci meel ole o inoko abaaban bar kizik oontanɛ niigi gole o Joowo, katin eegin vurut. Maje ɔl ci meel ole o inoko abaaban kizik niigi eegin vurut gole o Joowo bar, katin oontanɛ niigi.”
40020001	Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma baliin o tammu tadenu abil kete. Anyak baale eet ci mano alɔk ririwɔna ka kook kataala ɔl ci avu atɛɛt mana.
40020002	Mazi akɔ ajowa nɔɔgɔ, ɔzɔɔztɔ ki nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ ma agama ka kanyek niini nɔɔgɔ eet codoi gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ gurucoc codoi liŋliŋone ci iiten dook. Itoonek ni niini nɔɔgɔ mana kɔɔt kiliŋliŋit.
40020003	Ma ziiye ween tɔrkɔc ɔtɔɔ bodo ook ɔrɔɔŋ ɔl oogi mɛlɛgɛnyai. Ma akɔ ajowa ŋinaante ɔl ci olla ɛɛl aŋaam, akɔm gi ci aliŋliŋ kina.
40020004	Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Karooŋnyuŋ ɔtɔɔ iliŋliŋteyaŋ mana. Ŋaan tedec karuwekuŋ igeet dook guruc ci aganɔ ki liŋliŋɔn.”
40020005	Agamta ni niigi gi nico, ma avɔ mana, ma waaz ziiye ween amɔtɔ ram been ziik ween iiyu yomana ook anyaa niini ɔl oogi ka kivita kiliŋliŋit mana.
40020006	Ma ziiye ween tur yomana ook mɛlɛgɛnya bodo, ma akɔ ajowa ɔl oogi ɛɛl ŋinaante olla aŋaam, akɔm gi ci aliŋliŋ kina. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma dim aavtiyu ŋina adicanu iiten dook o agoonu naa?”
40020007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaavtiya ŋina o, eeci akɔm eet ci aku akɔyet ka koota kiliŋliŋtozeya.” Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ivita ɔɔtɔ iliŋliŋit mane onan.”
40020008	Ma yomana enek ɛɛti o mano eet o gɔɔn abɛk ɔl keevinta nɛ, “Izi yoman. Odot liŋliŋɔni. Towa ɔl ka kivita kagamit guruc. Kata ole ona akana liŋliŋɔn vurta e zɛɛ been tir ole ona arayai e.”
40020009	Ivita ni ɔl ona akana liŋliŋɔn ziiye ween tur yomana e, ma anyek ɔl nɔɔgɔ dook eet codoi gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ gurucoc codoi.
40020010	Mazi avu ɔl ona akana liŋliŋɔn ɔɔwa e ka kagamit guruc, anycek buk ɔl nɔɔgɔ gɔɔn eet codoi ŋaatineeŋ gurucoc codoi. Maje bar uyen niigi abaaban kizik tedec anyonek nɔɔgɔ guruca ci meel kujuk ɔl ona avu liŋliŋɔn vurta e.
40020011	Ma vurta mazi agamit guruc odot, ɔɔt oyoyit eet o mano e.
40020012	Anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ɔl ci ona avu akana liŋliŋɔn vurta o aliŋliŋ niigi ziit codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Maje naaga kaliŋliŋnya uyene iiten dook kore ci abur pɛr. Alaŋ abon zin ŋaati waan katobona naaga kibeen nɔɔgɔ guruci.”
40020013	Ma abarzek ɛɛti ci mano noko eet codoi ŋaatineeŋ anek nɛ, “Ziik di, gɔtɔn. Alaŋ kadakuŋ looc nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Uyene agamtawu liŋliŋɔn ka iliŋliŋit gurucoc codoi iiten dook.
40020014	Inoko odomta guruc cugooc o, ɔɔtɔ ɔlɔ. Ma naana kanyi ɔl ci ona avunak liŋliŋɔn vurta o guruc ci atobɔ ki ci ona kanyuŋ igeet o labak.
40020015	Mã anyak gi ci karooŋ kutugu guruce cigan o, kagoon labak. Yo da amadiku ɔl ci ona avu vurta o, eeci kiirkei nɔɔgɔ guruc?”
40020016	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Tiŋeere ɔl o inoko een vurut, oontanɛ niigi ɔɔwa. Maje bar ɔl o inoko een ɔɔ, amiiri kizi vurut.”
40020017	Mazi avɔ Yesu ki nuyak ogin Jerusalɛma, ook uduwak niini nɔɔgɔ doon gɔla gi ci anek nɛ,
40020018	“Inoko kavɔ Jerusalɛma ŋaao ka kook kanyozozɛkɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaat o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto. Ma avɔ apayekan tiŋeere niigi aneet daayiz.
40020019	Avoyan zin tiŋeere niigi alaate o Rom ka kɔɔt komomoztan niigi aneet, ma arukan, ma avɔ adodoyan keete ween talakec. Zin iinyaye ceen iiyu, kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
40020020	Iiyak ni ŋaa ci eet ci kazi Zebedi kibeen lɔgɔz cigin een ram kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Jemis ki Jɔn Yesu, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc Yesu ŋuma, ma anek nɛ, “Anyak da gi ci karooŋ tuguweyan.”
40020021	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ gitaz?” Ma anek niini Yesu nɛ, “Karooŋ katin waanci ɛɛnɛ alaan, anyek lɔgɔz cigan noko keŋerteyin ineet kɔrgɛn kiziti buk niigi alaat.”
40020022	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ niiga gi ci ajinaŋu noko agayu juruŋ. Inoko tiŋeere piryakzɛt ci kakɔ kapirnanɛ neke niiga animnyu?” Ma agama niigi dook azi nɛ, “Ii, kanimnya labak.”
40020023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt didi tiŋeere apirnanu kiyo naana o. Bar zin inoko o akɔmnan aneet alaazɛt ci ka kanyuŋ igeet eŋerteyaŋ katin gɔɔn kɔrgɛn. Aŋɛra ɔl ci ka kaavtiyɔ vitɛnane nicoko o baaba doon.”
40020024	Mazi avɔ azii nuyawa ween amɔtɔ e gi nico, otobortek niigi lɔgɔz ceen gɔtɔn een ram noko nɔŋ.
40020025	Ma awa Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook ŋaatodoi, ma aku anek nɛ, “Agayu niiga gɔɔn alaata o loocu ŋina anyak dɔyiz ole ugeec ci abali nɔɔgɔ.
40020026	Bar zin niiga alaŋ abon ŋaati eelnu kiyo niigi o. Mã anyak ŋaatunooŋ eet ci arɔɔŋ dikirzɛt, abon rak bar aliŋliŋonek niini gɔnɔgi kiyo gabarɛnti o.
40020027	Buk mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti ŋaatunooŋ kootonai kizi ɔɔ, abon rak anyek ɛlɛ kizi gabarɛn.
40020028	Utuguz niiga kiyo buk naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o. Alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kiliŋliŋtozeyan ɔl aneet, bar kakun ka kiiya kiliŋliŋozek naana ɔl, ma kadaai ka korogoz ɔl ci meel.”
40020029	Mazi iŋaaz Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin Jerikowa, oneec nɔɔgɔ kɔlɛ ci meelik gɛr.
40020030	Maje ɔl ci ruben een ram aavtiz gɔIa, iziiyit Yesu aku anowa gɔI nico. Egerenyit ni niigi dook ramantiya azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritet da!”
40020031	Maje ɔl ceen kɔlɛ ɔrkɔr ki Yesu noko agernyek nɔɔgɔ kajaktɔ. Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritet da!”
40020032	Enico ibil Yesu, ma awa nɔɔgɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kutuguweyuŋ naa?”
40020033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, karooŋnyin kolet kɛbɛrɛ kicintowa.”
40020034	Uwucek ni Yesu gi nici, ma uum nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ. Enico ɛlɛ ɔkɔltɛ kɛbɛrɛ ugeec icintɔ labak, ma ano Yesu.
40021001	Mazi avunak niigi ŋino kazi Bezpeja ajɔŋzɔ ki. Jerusalɛm biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, ŋinaante itoonun Yesu nuyawe ogin ram karaktɛ.
40021002	Anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ korogjowe ci ɛɛl igeet ɔɔwa neke. Avɔ tedec ajowanu zigir ci acabje kibeen jɔrɔn ŋinaante. Ɔɔkta zin nɔɔgɔ dook ramantiya ka anyaaktayaŋ ŋina.
40021003	Mã anyak eet ci ajinuŋ, enektek nɛ, Arɔɔŋ Manyi nɔɔgɔ. Anyuŋ tedec niini igeet anyaakta labak.”
40021004	Agooni gi nici nɔkɔ o ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani azi nɛ,
40021005	“Enektek ɔl o Jerusalɛm nɛ, Icinit di, iiyayuŋ alaani unooŋ. Acɛlbɛzɛn niini ɛlɛ, ma awɔ joronte ci zigiro.”
40021006	Ɔɔt ni nuyawa ceen ram noko, ma avɔ agɔɔn eona aduwakɛ Yesu e ɛlɛ.
40021007	Anyaakta zigir been jɔrɔn, ma avu ataadek niigi rumanɛ ugeec zigir bawuc, ma anyek Yesu kɔtɔɔt.
40021008	Maje kɔlɛ ci meelik gɛr avetek rumane gɔl kɛŋ. Maje ogɛn acarkiza bɔlɔk, ci keenu, ma avu avetek gɔl buk.
40021009	Maje kɔlɛ ci araki Yesu ɔɔwa o kibeen ci awɔ nɔɔnɔ vurta o agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Kidiŋdiŋanit Ŋɛɛrti Devid! Amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o aku zaare o Jook ona! Abil diŋdiŋɔnti ŋaaten Jook!”
40021010	Mazi akɔ arum Yesu Jerusalɛm, adɔŋnyai ɔl dook kutura dɔŋ. Ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Eet jaŋ tɛ nici?”
40021011	Ma anek kɔlɛ ci ano Yesu o nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Nicini Yesu ween nyakaŋan o aku kuture o kazi Nazarɛt abil Galiliya.”
40021012	Ook ni Yesu kaluwawe o ceeze o Joowo eecitɔ, ma akɔ atɔɔwa ɔl o gɔɔn ataalinɛ kaal been ɔl o ataali dook bitaala lai. Ma uup tarabɛzɛt ci ɔl o abali guruc ŋinaante kibeen lɛcɛrɛ ci ɔl o ataalinɛ yɛɛla.
40021013	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz ci anɛ Jooi nɛ, Ceez cane o ceez ci ŋaryiinto. Maje bar niiga avu anyeku kizi ŋinti aroodinɛ agoryawa.”
40021014	Ma ŋinaante ivitak nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci ŋɔɔlik ki ci ruben, ma arogoz niini nɔɔgɔ dook lai.
40021015	Mazi akɔ acin alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn Yesu noko, otoborit niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt. Ma abor buk niigi nɔŋ, eeci dɔl o miliny aavtiz ceeze o Joowo agɛrɛny atal Yesu azi nɛ, “Kidiŋdiŋanit ŋɛɛrti Devid.”
40021016	Ma anek ɔl ci abor nɔŋ noko Yesu nɛ, “Inoko azii gi ci aduwa niigi o?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, kazii. Ma niiga ŋaan ekeebit zɔɔz nico waragɛwa? Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, Niina Jooi ademez gɔɔn dɔl o miliny ka katanaazin ineet juruŋ.”
40021017	Enico ɔtɔɔ Yesu otoŋek nɔɔgɔ looc ook kuture o kazi Bezani, ma akɔ ɔɔŋ baalin codoi ŋinaante.
40021018	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iitene ci ano gɔn o ɔlɔwa Yesu Bezaniya ŋaabaal ɔɔŋɛ e abadaak Jerusalɛm. Ma gɔla adawun nɔɔnɔ magiz.
40021019	Ma acin kɛɛt ceen moneec gɔl kabanyca, ma anyaaŋonek azi nɛ, Coma abiir. Mazi akɔ acin, bar akɔm kɛbɛrɛ kina, olla anyak bɔlɔk doon. Enek ni niini kɛɛt nico nɛ, “Alaŋ bai bodo katin niina abiir nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.” Enico ɛlɛ araabjai kɛɛt nici kɔdɔk kak.
40021020	Mazi acin nuyawa gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma anɔ nɛ, “Araabjai yo kɛɛt nici taman nɔkɔ ku?”
40021021	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã atuwenu niiga kɔkɔm gi oma ci abakbayanuŋ zinzeeti, animnyu koca buk utuguz gi ci abil kiyo ci kagoonei naana kɛɛt nico noko. Alaŋ zin buk bar een gi nico doon, bar animnyu buk koca enektek bɛ nico nɛ, Piya ɛlɛ ŋina. Bitɔjukozek liil, ma aziiŋnu koca niini igeet.
40021022	Mã atuwenu, anyuŋ koca gɔɔn Jooi kaal o ajinu ŋaatin dook.”
40021023	Abadaak ni Yesu ceez o Joowo, ma aku adɛmɛz ɔl. Mazi ŋaan adɛmzɛ nɔkɔ, ivitak nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o Juz adikir, ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim alaazɛt ci agɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko o anyin ineet ŋɛnɛ?”
40021024	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋ buk kijinuŋ naana igeet gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ce. Mã aduwakaŋ, kaduwakuŋ buk koca naana igeet alaazɛt can kagɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko o.
40021025	Baale Jɔn o oony ɔl ajowa alaazɛt baal oonyi ɔl e ɔla yo Joowa da?” Mazi ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, adaŋtɔ niigi maany izitɔ nɛ, “Kayo kenektek nɛ? Mã inoko kanek nɛ, Ajowa Joowa, aneket koca nɛ, Alaŋ zin da baale atuyu Jɔn naa?
40021026	Bar mã kanek nɛ, Ajowa eete ci deer, aborneket koca ɔl nici dook nɔŋ, eeci baale atu niigi Jɔn anyek kizi nyakaŋan.”
40021027	Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niigi Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ kagaya.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk kaduwakuŋ igeet eet ci anyan alaazɛt ci kagɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko o.”
40021028	Abaabanit di gi ce. Anyak baale eet ci anyak lɔgɔz ram. Ook ni ɛɛti logote cin een abuu o, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Bitɔ liŋliŋ mana waanico.”
40021029	Abɛdɛkɛ niini baatin anek nɛ, “Kajura," bar bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ itiŋa ook mana eona aduwaki baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ e.
40021030	Ook ni bodo baatinɛ logote ween tutur, ma akɔ anek buk nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ liŋliŋ waanico mana.” Ma agama azi nɛ, “Yɔŋ, ŋaan kakɔ," bar vurta aavu alaŋaan akɔ mana been nɛɛn.”
40021031	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko logoze ceen ram noko jaŋ ci iziik gi o aduwak baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Iziik baatin logoti ween abuu e.” Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, avɔ tiŋeere ɔl o gɔɔn alot meeri kibeen ŋaai ween waaŋnyak baliinte o Joowo, maje bar niiga alaŋ avoyu.
40021032	Eeci baale iiyayuŋ Jɔn o oonyi igeet ka kiiya keyeleyuŋ gɔl o abon ka waan oneec, ma bar alaŋ aziiŋnu niiga nɔɔnɔ. Maje bar waanice ɔl o gɔɔn alot meeri ki ŋaai ween waaŋnyak iziiyit niigi zɔɔz onin. Mayo nuun icintu niiga gi nice e, alaŋ arooŋnyu otoweec ooti ugooc ka utuweec nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
40021033	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiyit di bodo yabziin oma ce. Anyak baale eet oma ci aḏok mana ci keenu, ma alok juruŋ, ma agɔɔna ŋinti ka gɔɔn kocoortek ɔl nyaantanɛ, ma ɛɛnyca vaaco ci beyiinto. Mazi akɔ adotiz, ook anyaa ɔl ci ka gɔɔn kiliŋliŋit mana. Ɔtɔɔ ni niini.
40021034	Mazi akɔ ajɔn iiteni o teedinto, itoona niini gabara ogin kɔɔt ole o aliŋliŋ mana ka kɔɔt kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ cigin.
40021035	Mazi avɔ arum gabara nici ɔl o aliŋliŋ mana, agamit niigi gabara nicoko, ma arɔɔk codoi, ma aruk codoi kadaak, ma avac codoi biyɛnɛ.
40021036	Ma iitene oman itoona bodo ɛɛti ci mano o gabara oogi ci meel kujuk baal oowu e. Mazi avɔ arum niigi mana, utuguzek bodo ɔl ci aliŋliŋ mana o nɔɔgɔ gi baal rak agoonek gabara baal oowu e ɛlɛ.
40021037	Ma vurta itoonek niini nɔɔgɔ ŋɛɛrin onin ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Kaga naana aŋole tiŋeere niigi ŋɛɛran.”
40021038	Mazi bar avɔ acin ɔl ci aliŋliŋ mana noko ŋɛɛrti eet ci mano o, izitɔ nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti eet o mano nɛɛn nici. Ivita kuruyit kadaak ka kula kaalyan cigin o dook kizi cigaac.”
40021039	Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ ooti mana bawuca, ma avɔ aruk kadaak.”
40021040	Ijin ni Yesu ɔl o aziirar nɔɔnɔ e enek nɛ, “Mazi yo inoko ma akɔ aku ɛɛti ci mano o, agoonek ɔl nicoko naa?”
40021041	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Aku koca aruk ɔl ci gɛr noko kadaayitɔ, ma anyek mana ɔl ci abon kiliŋliŋit ka gɔɔn keŋerit ki nɔɔnɔ kaal ci abiirna mana o juruŋ.”
40021042	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan ekeebit zɔɔz o waragɛ o Joowo azi nɛ, Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ceezi biyɛnɛ, ma apɛz kizi gi ci labak, bar bɛ o titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk biyɛn o enyciinto dook nɛɛn. Ma gi nico agɔɔn Jooi niini alya kizi titiny ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40021043	Zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, abuluzu katin niiga baliin o Joowo, ma bar akɔ anyonek ɔl oogi ci atuwe, ma aliŋliŋ juruŋ eeci abornaŋ niiga aneet.
40021044	Ma ɛɛti ci adir bɛ nici, aduuli yivyiv. Ma ɛɛti ci iinak bɛ nici nɔɔnɔ, uurti kututut.”
40021045	Mazi azii alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici zoozok ci aduwa Yesu yabziinta noko, agaac niigi ariik niini nɔɔgɔ.
40021046	Orooŋit ni niigi gɔl ci ka kagamti nɔɔnɔ, bar olla bodo otoŋole kɔlɛ ci aromɛ kibeen Yesu o, eeci anyek niigi Yesu kizi nyakaŋan.
40022001	Ma uduwak Yesu ɔl zoozok yabziinta bodo anek nɛ,
40022002	“Abil baliin o Joowo kete. Anyak baale alaan ci agɔɔn dayiin ci ka kiiya kadayit ɔl iitene ci arocin ŋɛɛrin.
40022003	Ma iitene nice itoon gabara ogin kɔɔt kutuya ɔl baal aduwak ka kivitak tiŋkawiin e. Mazi avɔ aduwak gabara nɔɔgɔ molok, bar ujurta niigi, alaŋaan arɔɔŋ kivita.
40022004	Bodo aku itoon gabara oogi anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ utuya ɔl baal kawai tiŋkawiin e enektek nɛ, Odotit kaal dook. Kɔtɔdɔŋɔ, ma aaktɛ kaal dook odota. Ivitak zin tiŋkawiin.”
40022005	Bar ɔl nica alaŋ arek zinzeeti zɔɔz nico. Bar codoi ŋaatineeŋ akɔ keevin mane cin. Maje oman akɔ ataalinɛ kaal cigin mɛlɛgɛnyai.
40022006	Maje ogɛn agam gabara ci ona itoonnyai o, ma aruk kadaayitɔ.
40022007	Otobor ni alaani nɔŋ giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma itoon takirnya ogin kɔɔt kuruyit ɔl ci ona aruk gabara nicoko o kadaayitɔ, ma atooz kutur dook lai.
40022008	Ma vurta otowa gabara ogin bodo, ma aku anek nɛ, “Inoko kaal o tiŋkawiinto dook odotita, bar zin ɔl baal kawa e alaŋaan aganɔ ka kivita ka kadaktɔ.
40022009	Inoko zin ɔɔtɔ utuya ɔl ci olla ajowanu awɔ golowɛ kivita kadaktɔ.”
40022010	Itiŋgazɔ ni gabara ɔɔtɔ uluta ɔl o gɛr kibeen ɔl o abon buk zɛɛ ma abitiz ceez tɔc.
40022011	Mazi aku alaani ka kiiya kicin kernok, bar acin eet codoi ŋaatineeŋ calaŋ anyak rumanɛ ci tiŋkawiinto.
40022012	Ma ajin niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Laŋo, mã alaŋ anyei rumanɛ o tiŋkawiinto o, akun zin tɛ ŋina ku?” Bar akɔm ɛɛti nici gi ci abarzek nɔɔnɔ kina.
40022013	Enek ni alaani gabara ogin nɛ, “Agamit eet nico acabit zɔɔ ki azɛɛn ɔɔtɔ ujuktek bitaalin. Alu tedec ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit.”
40022014	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Abil zin buk baliin o Joowo nɔkɔ. Inoko otoyai ɔl ci meel gɛr, bar zin avu ŋaatineeŋ ci miliny tɛr.”
40022015	Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni ɔl o Parici, ma avɔ abaabanit gɔl ci ka kicintai Yesu jinɛnta.
40022016	Ma avɔ itoonak niigi nɔɔnɔ nuyak ugeec kibeen ɔl o alaan o kazi Erod. Ivita ni ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, kagaya aduwa gɔɔn niina zoozok ceen didi. Ma ademzei ɔl zɔɔz ween didi o arɔɔŋ Jooi eet ci deer kutugu juruŋ kɔkɔm gi ci aŋole niina ɔla.
40022017	Duwayet zin di. Inoko ŋaatun aganɔ ŋaati karuwɛkɛ meeri alaan o Rom, yo akɔm da?”
40022018	Maje Yesu aga kɛŋ ci jinɛn cineeŋ gɛr o nɔkɔ, ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet labjok coko! Arooŋnyu icintawaŋ naa?
40022019	Eyeleyaŋ di gurucoc ci ka ɔɔt urukti meeri o.” Anyaaktak ni niigi gurucoc.
40022020	Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma zaara ci ayeedi gurucoca ce ki riritɔn co ci ŋɛnɛ?”
40022021	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Ŋum o alaan o kazi Sizar ki zaar ogin.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Uruktek zin Sizar kaal o akati nɔɔnɔ, maje Jook uruktek kaal ogin.”
40022022	Mazi azii niigi gi ci aduwa Yesu noko, olla apaŋantɛ paŋ, ma ooŋnek nɔɔnɔ looc, ma awɔ.
40022023	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ ivitak ɔl o kazi Sajuzi Yesu. Maje gɔɔn niigi alaŋ agama zɔɔz o bodo katin iŋaani ɔl daayiza.
40022024	Ivita ni enektek niigi Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, azi baale Mosis nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti iŋaan kitira dɔl ŋaawe cin, abon arigiz gɔtɔnnya ŋaa ka kitirak nɔɔnɔ dɔl.
40022025	Anyak zin baale lɔgɔz ceen gɔtɔn een torgɛrɛm abaak ŋina. Ɔrɔcɔ ni logoti ceen abuu o, ma adaai iŋaan kanyak ŋaa dɔl. Iiya ni gɔtɔnnya o anowa nɔɔnɔ anyawun ŋaa.
40022026	Ma bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ adaawun buk logoti nici iŋaan kitirak ŋaa nico dɔl. Ma azɔbɔn niigi ŋaa nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin adaayitɔ niigi dook iŋaan kitirtak ŋaa dɔl.
40022027	Ma vurta adaak buk ŋaa.
40022028	Inoko zin tiŋeere mã iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ŋaa nicini akati ŋɛnɛɛn giye baal anyakti niigi dook ŋaa nico?”
40022029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abacu niiga zɔɔz nico ɔrɔɔt, eeci alaŋ areku niiga zinzeeti waragɛ o Joowo ki dɔyiz onin.
40022030	Katin ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ɛɛl niigi kiyo toonnyawa o Joowo o. Ma alaŋ bodo eeta ki ŋaai arɔcɔ.
40022031	Mazin giye ci akati ŋaazi daayiza, ŋaan niiga ekeebit zɔɔz baal aduwakuŋ Jooi e?
40022032	Azi baale niini nɛ, Keen Jook o Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob. Ma zɔɔz nici ayelza gi o inoko arogni Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob. Zin Jooi niini Jook ci ɔl ci arogi, alaŋ een Jook ci ɔl ci adaai.”
40022033	Mazi azii kɔlɛ gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40022034	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl o Parici ɛtɛza Yesu ɔl o Sajuzi, ivitak niigi dook nɔɔnɔ.
40022035	Icina ni ɛɛti codoi ole o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok Yesujinɛnta.
40022036	Ma aku ajin niini Yesu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, mayo lotinɛt jaŋ ci titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk gɔnɔgi dook.”
40022037	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lotinɛt o azi nɛ, Abon areez Jook ween Manyi unun zinize unun dook, ki rogete unun dook, been baabaninte unun dook.
40022038	Lotinɛt zin ci titiny ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn nici.
40022039	Bodo lotinɛt oma ci titiny nɛɛn o azi nɛ, Reez ɔl o abaawonu kiyo areez ɛlɛ unun maany o.
40022040	Ma lotinowa o Mosis been demziin o nyakaŋanetu ano niigi dook lotinok ceen ram noko doon.”
40022041	Mazi ŋaan alotɛ ɔl o Parici nɔkɔ, ijin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ,
40022042	“Abaabanu dim inoko niiga aziyu nɛ, Kiristo ŋɛnɛ? Niini ŋɛɛrti ŋɛnɛ?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Kiristo niini dole ci dɔl o Devid.”
40022043	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mazi een Kiristo dole ci dɔl ci Devid, anyek zin baale Vɔŋizi o Joowo Devid kotowo nɔɔnɔ kizi Manyi cin naa?
40022044	Azi baale Devid nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan Kiristo nɛ, Aavu libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
40022045	Mazi awo Devid Kiristo kizi Manyi o, alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati ɛɛnɛ dole ci dɔl ci Devid doon, bar aku niini Joowa.”
40022046	Mazi azi Yesu nɔkɔ, ajaktɔ niigi dook tiv, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz. Zin iitene nice ɔkɔma bodo eet ci anim kijin nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.
40023001	Enek ni Yesu kɔlɛ ki nuyak ogin nɛ,
40023002	“ Ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o Parici irigizit niigi zɔɔ o Mosis ka koobtek ɔl lotinok.
40023003	Abon zin aziiŋnu niiga nɔɔgɔ, ma anuyu kaal o aduwakuŋ niigi igeet dook. Bar zin má agoonu kaal ci agɔɔn niigi o, eeci kaal ci agɔɔn niigi o aŋɔrɔwɔ kibeen kaal o ademzek niigi ɔl.
40023004	Adaŋekuŋ gɔɔn niigi igeet utuguz kaal ci adɔi kak, maje bar niigi alya alaŋ buk ataman kuzuuti.
40023005	Agɔɔn niigi kaal dook gole ci ka keyeliztai eleeti ɔla. Aborcek gɔɔn niigi kaal ci ayeedonek zoozowa o Joowo ŋumti kibeen azɛɛn ka kicinit ɔl. Ma buk aborcek rumanɛ ci wuntik alina ka kiziti ɔl nɛ, Niigi ɔl ci Joowo.
40023006	Arɛɛz gɔɔn niigi aavuzit ci aavtiye lecerene ci abon ŋaati alotɛn ɔl. Ma arɛɛz buk lɛcɛrɛ o abon ceezine o lotento.
40023007	Arɛɛz niigi buk ŋaati azaawi ɔl nɔɔgɔ diŋdiŋaninta ɔl kɔrgɛna. Ma arɔɔŋ niigi kotoweec ɔl nɔɔgɔ kiziti alaat ci demziinto.
40023008	Alaŋ zin aganɔ ŋaati awuyuŋ ɔl igeet iziti alaat ci demziinto, eeci niiga dook eeginu gɔtɔn. Ma anyaku niiga dook alaan unooŋ demziinto adɔi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
40023009	Alaŋ zin buk abon ŋaati awoyu niiga eet ci deer loota ŋina kizi baatunooŋ, eeci anyaku niiga dook baatunooŋ o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ tammu tadena.
40023010	Má anyeku buk kutuyuŋ ɔl igeet iziti alaat, eeci alaan unooŋ igeet dook nɛɛn Kiristo doon.
40023011	Ma ɛɛti ci titiny ŋaatunooŋ abon aliŋliŋonekuŋ niini igeet kizi gabaren.
40023012	Ma ɛɛti ci gɔɔn adɔŋ ɛlɛ, tiŋeere acɛlbɛzɛni. Maje ɛɛti ci acɛlbɛzɛn ɛlɛ, adoŋnyi katin niini kidiŋdiŋ.”
40023013	Ma anek Yesu ɔl o Parici nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat o demziinto kibeen ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti. Unyuuktu niiga gɔl o baliin o Joowo ɔl ŋuma. Ma alaŋ anyeku ɔl o arɔɔŋ kɔɔt baliinte o Joowo kɔɔt eecitɔ. Zin buk tiŋeere niiga alya alaŋ avoyu baliinte o Joowo eecitɔ been nɛɛn.
40023015	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat o demziinto kibeen ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti! Abaayizu gɔɔn liilok, ma azobju loocok ka ɔɔtɔ anycek eet codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ kono lotinok ugooc. Ma vurta bar bodo uwuyu eet nico ɛlɛ kagantɔ ki goo o Loryento kiyo buk niiga o.
40023016	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat ci ruben noko! Ademezu gɔɔn niiga ɔl aneku nɛ, Mã itoon ɛɛti zaar o ceez o Joowo, zɔɔz cinɛ o gi ci labak. Mazi bar itoon niini zaar o warki o ɛɛl ceeze o Joowo, zɔɔz cinɛ o een didi.
40023017	Igeet aliyak ci ruben coko! Adiŋdiŋ yo ɔrɔɔt gi jaŋ? Warkina yo ceez da o Joowo o anyek warki nicoko kililec?
40023018	Ademezu buk gɔɔn niiga ɔl aneku nɛ, Mã itoon ɛɛti zaar ci ŋino taabinto, alaŋ zɔɔz cinɛ o een didi. Bar mazi itoon ɛɛti zaar ci kaal o ataabi ɔl Jook, anyeku zɔɔz cino kizi didi.
40023019	Eeginu zin niiga rubenɛ ɔrɔɔt! Mayo adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt gi jaŋ? Adiŋdiŋ kaal o kataabi Jook, yo da ŋino taabinto o anyek kaal nico kililec?
40023020	Zin mã itoon ɛɛti ŋino taabinto, itoon niini nɔɔnɔ ki kaal o taabinto ɛɛl ŋinaante dook.
40023021	Mã itoon ɛɛti ceez o Joowo, itoon niini nɔɔnɔ ki Jook o abaak ŋinaante buk.
40023022	Mã itoon ɛɛti tammu tadena, itoon niini lɛcɛr o Joowo kibeen Jook ɛlɛ o aavɛ lecere nico.
40023023	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ alaat o demziinto kibeen ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti! Anyeku gɔɔn niiga Jook lɛlɛn codoi lelene ween amɔtɔ, mayo nuun een tambu karabɔŋ een barabarac. Ma bar aburnu ŋaati azuunu lotinok o titiny kiyo payiin ci waan apaku zoozok keelit tɔp, ki ziniz bonat ɔla, been ziniz laliz. Abon waan zin niiga aliŋliŋnyu kaal ci titiny noko dook kibeen buk kaal oogi.
40023024	Igeet alaat ci ruben coko! Aaranu gɔɔn niiga kiroŋit iiranɛ, maje bar nyakale akuuyu labak.
40023025	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat o demziinto kibeen ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti! Aricanu gɔɔn niiga gi ci uunyu kodoocɛ ugooc bawucijuruŋ. Maje bar keŋti eecitɔ abiz kaala o aamanu ɔl dɔyiza been zinzeeti appinzete unooŋ areezu eleeti.
40023026	Igeet ɔl ci Parici rubenik coko! Otoonyca rak ririny ci ɛɛl kodooc kɛŋa o dook lai, ka zin buk kitiliza kodooc bawuc.
40023027	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat o demziinto ki ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti! Eelnu niiga kiyo looknya o adawi ɔl miniŋ gɔɔn alina eci bitaalu doon, maje bar eecitɔ abiz amɛ ci ame tɔc o.
40023028	Zin buk gole nico niiga abuuku eleeti. Alinanu bitaala doon, maje zinzeetinɛ eecitɔ arooŋnyu utuguz kaal ci gɛr.
40023029	Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet alaat o demziinto ki ɔl o Parici! Abuuku gɔɔn niiga eleeti! Agoonu gɔɔn niiga looknya baal adawin nyakaŋanɛta e kitiliza, eeci atitinyu nɔɔgɔ. Ma adimanu buk looknya o adawin ɔl baal abaak baayiz o abon e kitiliza.
40023030	Ma aniyu niiga vɔlɔŋa nɛ, Mã da kaavtiya naaga tɔ oowe baal jijitigaacak e, alaŋ waan karuka nyakaŋanɛt kadaayitɔ kiyo baale niigi e.
40023031	Zin giye nico agayu gi o eeginu niiga didi dɔl ci dɔl ci ɔl baal amony nyakaŋanɛt e.
40023032	Inoko zin ɔɔtɔ uruktaŋ kadaak gole ci baal akata jijitugooc laadun o.
40023033	Igeet dɔl ci kokonyawu coko! Ka dim yo tiŋeere orogit gooye o abil been nɛɛn ku?
40023034	Inoko tiŋeere kitoonakuŋ naana igeet nyakaŋanɛt, ki ɔl ci gɛnyizo, been alaat ci demziinto. Bar zin tiŋeere aruku niiga oogi ŋaatineeŋ kadaayitɔ. Ma adodoyu oogi keete ween talakec. Ma arooku oogi ceezine o lotento. Ma atooku oogi kuturyowe dook.
40023035	Zin giye nico iinakuŋ tiŋeere igeet biyeta ci ɔl abon baal amony ɔl gaga nɔkɔ e dook igeet. Akanai biyete o Abel zɛɛ been biye o Zakeriya ween ŋɛɛrti Biraca baal amonyu ŋaao aŋɛrɔn ceez o Joowo been ŋino taabinto e.
40023036	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, payiin ci kaal ci baal gɛr agooni neke dook iinakuŋ katin igeet, eeci buk niiga agoonu kaal niceke ɛlɛ.”
40023037	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Jerusalɛm, Jerusalɛm, uruwu niina nyakaŋanɛt kadaayitɔ, ma avacu buk ɔl o itoonakin Jooi ineet biyɛnɛ kadaayitɔ. Lak ci mɛɛlɛ gɛr ci karɔɔŋɛ gɔɔn kanyabotai ɔl ugun kiyo gɔɔn alotek toloci jɔrɔ ogin kɛŋ o, bar zin niina ŋaan nyan kutugu nɔkɔ.
40023038	Inoko zin tiŋeere ceez cune noko ooŋnonek looc kizi lik.
40023039	Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, akatai waanico alaŋ bai bodo acinaŋ aneet zɛɛ been iiten ci kabadanɛ e. Enice ŋaan aziyu nɛ, Amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o aku zaare ogin.”
40024001	Mazi aduŋna Yesu ceeze o Joowo, ivitak nɔɔnɔ nuyawa oginɛ arɔɔŋ ka keyeltek nɔɔnɔ linat o ceez o Joowo.
40024002	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Acinu yo kaal nicoko dook juruŋ? Kaduwakuŋ didilɛ, akɔm tiŋeere tegereme ci ceez nico noko codoi ataadonek gɔɔn taden. Alibi tiŋeere niigi dook lai.”
40024003	Mazi akɔ aavi Yesu loota biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, ivitak nuyawa nɔɔnɔ doon ŋinaante. Ma avu ajin anek nɛ, “Duwayet di. Ma kaala nici dook akanai tiŋa? Tiŋeere ma ka ija, akanai gitaz ci ka kagaya badaan unun kibeen dican o loocu?”
40024004	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Egenyit juruŋ ka kɔkɔm eet ci alabanuŋ.
40024005	Eeci tiŋeere avu ɔl ci meelik zaare ogan, ma avu azi nɛ, Aneeta Kiristo nɛɛn. Ma alaba tiŋeere niigi ɔl ci meelik.
40024006	Aziiŋnu tiŋeere oroonok ci ajɔn, ma aziiŋnu kaviyak ci oroonok ci rɛɛn. Bar zin má rak anyeku zinzeeti kotoŋole looc kaale nicoko, eeci kaal nicigi ŋɛdɛt iina. Alaŋ zin bar ayelza iiten ci aṯornɛkɛ e ɛlɛ.
40024007	Katin gɔɔn lɔɔci ce ɔɔrɔ ki looc co. Ma anyak katin tarjo ki looc mɔɔtiz vitɛnane ci meelik gɛr.
40024008	Ma kaal nicigi dook olla ɛɛl kiyo wucezi o gɔɔn rak aami ŋaa dole o.
40024009	Zin tiŋeere iinyaye niceke acabjuŋ ɔl igeet, ma agiduŋ, ma apayekuŋ daayiz. Ma amarninuŋ tiŋeere ɔl dook igeet, eeci atuyaŋ niiga aneet.
40024010	Tiŋeere iinyaye niceke ɔl ci meelik amiiri ki vurut tuwente uneeŋ. Akat tiŋeere ɔl ci amiiri ki vurut o gɔnɔgi o ŋaan atuwe vɔlɔŋa, ma amarnin niigi nɔɔgɔ.
40024011	Zin tiŋeere iinyaye niceke avu nyakaŋanɛta ci voloŋo meelik, ma avu alaba ɔl ci meel.
40024012	Ma giye o tiŋeere appeni gerzitin ɔrɔɔt, alaŋ tiŋeere ɔl ci meel arɛɛzɔ.
40024013	Bar zin ɛɛti ci amɛna amɛz kaal nicoko dook zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ, arogzɛ tiŋeere niini.
40024014	Maje zin tiŋeere kaviyawa o abon akati baliin o Joowo uuwawonek rak loocok dook zɛɛ ma azii modɛna dook. Mazi odot, kiiya ni.
40024015	Acinu katin gi o gɛr ɔrɔɔt baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Danyel e. Acinu tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ abil ŋaao Joowo taabinto. (Abon zin aziiŋnu gi nico juruŋ.)
40024016	Zin ɔl o abaak Judiya iinya niceke abon avir avɔ biyɛnɛ.
40024017	Mã aavi ɛɛti raa, abon avir enice. Akɔm bodo nɔɔnɔ waŋi ci ka kooyi ceeza tɔ ka kook kaara kaal ogin.
40024018	Mã aavi ɛɛti mana, abon avir enice. Akɔm bodo waŋi ci ka kimiirozɛkɛ niini kɔrɔk ka kook kodoma rum onin.
40024019	Nɔŋ ci kol tiŋeere ŋaane o anyake kibeen o arɔkti.
40024020	Ijinit zin Jook ka calaŋ aviryu lɔɔlɔ, karabɔŋ een iitene o yubzento.
40024021	Eeci kinatamma laadun e zɛɛ been waanico noko akɔm piryakzɛt ci atobɔ kibeen ci katin aku neke. Ma akɔm bodo ci atobɔ ki nice katin been nɛɛn.
40024022	Bar zin anyewun Jooi iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ. Ma da calaŋ agɔɔn nɔkɔ, akɔm koca eet ci arogi been nɛɛn. Anyek zin niini iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ giye ci akati ɔl o ɛŋɛra niini.
40024023	Zin iinyaye niceke mã anyak eet ci anekuŋ nɛ, Icinit di Kiristo ceeni ŋaato, karabɔŋ azi nɛ, Kiristo caana ŋaate, má aziiŋnu nɔɔnɔ.
40024024	Eeci avu tiŋeere ɔl ci azi nɛ, Keegina Kiristo, kibeen nyakaŋanɛt ci voloŋo meelik. Agɔɔn katin niigi kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye, ka katamanti gɔl ci alaban ɔl o ɛŋɛra Jooi.
40024025	Iziiktɔ zin! Inoko kuduwayuŋ naana igeet gi nico iŋaan kaal nici kakatai o.
40024026	Mã anekuŋ katin ɔl nɛ, Aavi Kiristo baza, má avoyu ŋinaante been nɛɛn. Mã azi nɛ, Aroodi Kiristo ŋaato, má aziiŋnu nɔɔgɔ.
40024027	Eeci naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kakun tiŋeere keyelizai kiyo bɔrɔyɛ o gɔɔn abadi tammu kɛŋa kicinit ɔl dook eci jenu been eci nyagjo o.
40024028	Zin gɔɔn laadun mã alotɛ kuduvaana ŋaaman, anyak gi ci adaai tɔ ŋinaante.
40024029	Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ mazi odotit kaal ci gɛrzɛ iina noko, ookci ii kizi koli, maje nyɛlɔyi alaŋ bodo ataran looc, maje monyonya iina tammu tadena. Buk kaala o ɛɛl tammu bɔbɔra amɔɔt, ma ookci.
40024030	Zin enice ŋaan ayelzai kuni onane aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto tammu tadena. Ma aboobi tiŋeere modɛna dook loota ŋina, ma acinan aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kawoya diizwani dɔyize ci appe been diŋdiŋɔnta.
40024031	Abɛɛ tiŋeere toromba ci agɛrɛny, ma kitoonai naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto toonnyak ogan looc, ka kivita kuluta ɔl o aŋɛryai loocowe dook.”
40024032	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Agaac zɔɔz nico keete ween moneec. Gɔɔn mã acinu itilizit oto artek bɔlɔk, agayu nɔkɔ izi lɔlɔŋumi ajɔn.
40024033	Zin buk gole ci atobɔ ki nico, mã icintu kaal nicoko dook, agaac izi iiten o ka kiiyai ajɔn.
40024034	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɔl o gɔɔn amɛz piryakzɛt acin tiŋeere niigi kaal nicoko dook.
40024035	Katin tammu taden ki tɔdɔ aṯornɛkɛ. Maje bar zɔɔz onane abil nɔkɔ kodot.”
40024036	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Akɔm eet ci agawa iiten ci kakunɛ naana e kina. Alaŋ toonnyawa o tammo aga, ma alaŋ buk naana alya Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kaga, bar aga baaba doon.
40024037	Katin kuni onane aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto akanai kibiirit ɔl ooti kiyo gi baal iina irkite ojijitinai o kazi Nowa e.
40024038	Waanice iŋaan kiiya tawani e, adake ɔl, ma awodɛ, ma aroce ɔl labak zɛɛ been iiten baal akɔyi Nowa kavoola e.
40024039	Alaŋ waanice aga niigi nɔŋ ci kɔl ka baale kiiyak nɔɔgɔ neke zɛɛ makacin iiya otodot tawani nɔɔgɔ dook lai. Zin iiteni ci kakunɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e abil nɔkɔ ɛlɛ.
40024040	Iitene nice mã eevyi ɔl ceen ram mana, aŋɛryai codoi, ma ooŋnonek codoi looc.
40024041	Mã areke ŋaai ceen ram golwa, aŋɛryai codoi, ma ooŋnonek codoi looc.
40024042	Egenyit zin! Otomta eleeti juruŋ, eeci alaŋ agawanu iiten ci kakunɛ naana Manyi.
40024043	Abon agayu gi ce. Inoko gɔɔn kizi gi ci agawa ɛɛti iiten ci ka kiiyakɛ agoryaiti ceez onin, acinɛ koca calaŋ ɔɔŋ ka calaŋ anyek agoryai waŋi ci aku agorzin.
40024044	Abon zin buk niiga eelnu nɔkɔ. Iziti vililɛ tup, eeci kakun naana tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto iitene calaŋ agawanu.”
40024045	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Gabaren jaŋ yo ci abon aliŋliŋonek alaan onin juruŋ? Gabaren ci abon nɛɛn o anyek alaani oninɛ nɔɔnɔ kabal gabara o miliny dook ka gɔɔn keŋerek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin ugeec juruŋ.
40024046	Ajowa zin tiŋeere gabarɛnti nici vɔyit ci liŋliŋɔn onin iitene ci abadaan alaani oninɛ, ma ajowa nɔɔnɔ agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn juruŋ kibil ebaal aduwakɛ niini nɔɔnɔ e.
40024047	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã agɔɔn nɔkɔ, anyek koca alaani nici kaal ogin dook kagam gabarɛnti nici.
40024048	Bar mazi een gabarɛnti nici eet ci gɛr, anek koca ɛlɛ maany nɛ, Alaŋ tiŋeere alaani cane o abada kataman.
40024049	Ma arɔɔk gɔnɔgi ci miliny o, ma adake niini labak, ma awot nyaantanɛ kibeen ɔl o abaaki.
40024050	Mazi abada tiŋeere aIaani ci gabaren nico o iitene calaŋ niini agawan.
40024051	Aku aruk niini gabaren nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma apayek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin, eeci alaŋ agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn o anyonek nɔɔnɔ juruŋ. Akɔ zin tiŋeere niini ŋaati akɔ aluwi zɛɛ ma adak nyigit.”
40025001	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Abil baliin o Joowa kete. Anyak baale dɔl ceen amɔtɔ adoma lambɛt cigeec, ma aduŋna avɔ bitaala ka kɔɔt kurumtek eet ci rociinto gɔl.
40025002	Ma dolene nicoko ceen tur ŋaatineeŋ tarbalɛ, maje bodo ceen tur agɛny ɔrɔɔt.
40025003	Adoma dɔlya ceen tur tarbalik o avɔyi lambɛt kɔkɔm maal oma ci anyayek.
40025004	Maje dɔlya ci agɛny o avɔyi lambɛt ugeec kibeen bodo maaltanɛ oogi burwɛtɛ.
40025005	Bar ɛɛti ci rociinto o alaŋaan aku taman, ma arɛ dɔlya nɔɔnɔ ŋinti rɛɛn zɛɛ makacin ataŋguzɔ.
40025006	Ma baalin kɛŋa ɛgɛrɛny ɛɛti oman azi nɛ, “Eet o rociinto e ce. Ivita urumtek gɔl.”
40025007	Ma iŋaaz dɔlya dook amɔta, ma apɛrpɛran lambɛt ugeecik e juruŋ.
40025008	Ma anek dɔlya ci tarbal o gɔnɔgi ci agɛny o nɛ, “Anycetu da maaltanɛ ci miliny. Idicai maaltanɛ lambete cigaacak o.”
40025009	Ma abɛdɛkɛ dɔlya ci agɛny o nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Izi buk maaltanɛ ci kanyaka o kidicɛ tɛr. Alaŋ kalɛɛnɔ ki ageet dook. Odokonyit ɔɔtɔ ataalta mɛlɛgɛnyai kataman.”
40025010	Odokonyit ni didi dɔlya ci ona tarbal noko ka kɔɔt kataala maaltanɛ. Mazi avɔ niigi mɛlɛgɛnyai, urum ɛɛti o rociinto e looc. Iiya ni orkorit niini kibeen dɔl ween tur agɛny e ɔɔtɔ ceeze o tiŋkawiinto, ma anyook karogi.
40025011	Ma vurta ivita dɔlya o tarbal e. Ma avu aruk karogi azi nɛ, “Manyi, manyi, koleyet da ceez koota eecitɔ.”
40025012	Bar abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti ci rociinto o nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aavtiz bitaala ŋinaante. Alaŋ kagayuŋ naana igeet.”
40025013	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Egenyit zin, eeci alaŋ agayu iiten karabɔŋ een ziit ci kakunɛ.”
40025014	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo abil kete. Anyak baale eet ci arɔɔŋ kɛɛrɔn. Mazi ka kɔɔtɔ, otowa gabara ogin, ma aku aduwak nɔɔgɔ kuzuuti kaal ogin dook juruŋ.
40025015	Ma anyek gɔɔn co ŋaatineeŋ liŋliŋɔn ci aganɔ ki nɔɔnɔ. Anyek eet co guruc ceen 5000. Ma anyek bodo eet co guruc ceen 2000. Ma anyek bodo eet co guruc ceen 1000. Ɔtɔɔ ni niini.
40025016	Odoma gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 5000 e, ook iliŋliŋi guruc nicoko zɛɛ makacin bodo anyaa guruc ceen 5000 oogi bodo.
40025017	Bodo buk gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 2000 e, ook iliŋliŋi guruc nicoko zɛɛ makacin bodo anyaa guruc ceen 2000 oogi.
40025018	Maje gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 1000 e, ook adawek guruc nicoko looc itaŋa.
40025019	Ma irkitowe ogɛn abada alaani uneeŋ ka kiiya kigiilit ki nɔɔgɔ guruc ogin baal anyek nɔɔgɔ e.
40025020	Mazi avɔ agiil guruc, anyaak gabarɛnti baal anyonek guruca ween 5000 e alaan guruc oogi ceen bodo ni 5000, ma aku anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyan baale guruc ceen 5000. Inoko zin kiliŋliŋa guruc oogi ceen 5000 bodo.”
40025021	Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Een niina gabaren ci abonanin ziniz. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Zm giye o aliŋliŋɛ guruc baal miliny e juruŋ, ŋaan kanyin ineet guruc ci meel bodo ka liŋliŋi. Inoko ija ka kozolit ki ineet talniin can o.”
40025022	Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti baal anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 2000 e, ma aku anek alaan nɛ, “Anyan baale guruc ceen 2000. Inoko zin guruc oogi ceen 2000 kiliŋliŋa ce.”
40025023	Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Een gabaren ci abonanin ziniz. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Zin giye o aliŋliŋɛ guruc baal miliny e juruŋ, ŋaan kanyin ineet guruc ci meel bodo ka liŋliŋi. Inoko ija ka kozolit kibeen ineet talniin can o.”
40025024	Iiya ni bodo gabarɛnti baal anyonek guruca ween 1000 e. Ma aku anek alaan nɛ, “Manygɔn, Kagayin naana ineet een eet ci gɔɔn adoknin aziiti, ma ateedi niina kaal ci ɛɛva ɔl ogɛn.
40025025	Kotoŋolewin zin, ma kakɔ karoodi guruc baal anyan e kadawei looc. Orɛ zin nɔɔgɔ ce.”
40025026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaani nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma adaaŋnin buk ɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Mã da agayan niina aneet kateedi gɔɔn kaal ci ɛɛva ɔl ogɛn, abon waan zin aliŋliŋɛ guruc cigan o labak ka kojowa bodo azaace.”
40025028	Ma anek alaani gabara ogin nɛ, “Aamta guruc nicoko ŋaatin, ɔɔtɔ anycek gabaren ona anyak guruc ween 5000 e.
40025029	Eeci mã anyak ɛɛti kaal ci meel gɛr, anyonek bar bodo nɔɔnɔ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Maje ɛɛti ci anyak kaal ci miliny tɛr, aamnyai bar ŋaatin nici kavɔ nɔkɔ dook.
40025030	Inoko zin gabaren ci gɛr noko ujuktek nɔɔnɔ bitaalin muur ŋinaante, ka kook kutulu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit.”
40025031	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Iiten ci kabadanɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ki toonnyak ogan titinyonte onan, kaku kaavi lecere onan alaazetu.
40025032	Ma alotakan katin ɔl o loocu dook aneeta. Ma kaku kaŋer nɔɔgɔ dook lɛlɛn ram kiyo gɔɔn aŋɛra ɛɛti o ɛɛzawu aza bawɔnɛ o.
40025033	Kari zin tiŋeere ɔl o atuyan aneet libir onan azo. Ma kari ɔl o alaŋ atuyan aneet kaŋeta.
40025034	Ma tiŋeere kanei naana alaani ɔl ci ona aavtiz aneet libire ci azo o nɛ, “Ivitak niiga o amayukuŋ baaba baliin onin baal agɔɔnakuŋ niini igeet laadun kinatamma e.
40025035	Baale adakan magiz, ma anyaŋ dayiin. Baale arukan kɔr, ma anyaŋ maam kowodɛ. Baale keen kernoi, ma atalnanaŋ korogjowe ugooc.
40025036	Baale kawɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma anyaŋ rumanɛ. Baale kamoor, ma atiritaŋ. Baale kacabje, ma avu gɔɔn acinaŋ.”
40025037	Zin katin ɔl ci ona abon noko abɛdɛkan niigi aneet azi nɛ, “Manyi, ma da kacinin adakin magiz, ma kanyin dayiin waŋa? Ma da kacinin arukin kɔr, ma kanyin maam waŋa?
40025038	Ma da kacinin eeron, ma katalnanin korogjowɛ waŋa? Ma da kacinin awɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma kanyin rumanɛ waŋa?
40025039	Ma da buk kacinin amoor karabɔŋ acabje, ma kavɔ kacinin waŋa?”
40025040	Kabɛdɛkɛ zin tiŋeere naana alaani nɔɔgɔ kanei nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma kaal o gɔɔn abon agooneku niiga gɔtɔnɔga cigan cɛlbɛz noko, bar agoonekaŋ niiga aneeta.”
40025041	Kookconei zin katin naana alaani ɔl o ɛɛl aneeta kaŋeta e, ma kanei nɛ, “Ɛnyɛktɛ ɔtɔɔz ŋaatan ŋina niiga ci apayekuŋ Jooi gerzitin o. Ɔɔtɔ gooye o abil been nɛɛn baal agɔɔnnyak Loryen kibeen toonnyak ogin e.
40025042	Baale adakan magiz, ma alaŋ anyaŋ dayiin. Baale arukan kɔr, ma alaŋ anyaŋ maam kowodɛ.
40025043	Baale keen kernoi, ma bar alaŋ atalnanaŋ korogjowe ugooc. Baale kawɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma alaŋ anyaŋ rumanɛ. Baale kamoor, ma kacabje, ma alaŋ avu atiritaŋ.”
40025044	Abɛdɛkan zin tiŋeere niigi aneet azi nɛ, “Manyi, ma da kacinin adakin magiz, karabɔŋ arukin kɔr, karabɔŋ een kernoi, karabɔŋ awɔ ŋaḏinyiny, karabɔŋ amoor, karabɔŋ acabje sijina, ma alaŋ katiritin waŋa?”
40025045	Kabɛdɛkɛ zin tiŋeere naana alaani nɔɔgɔ kanei nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti o gɔɔn alaŋ atirit eet codoi ole ci cɛlbɛz noko, alaŋ atiritan niini aneet.”
40025046	Zin tiŋeere ɔl nicoko apawonek nɔɔgɔ goo o abil been nɛɛn. Maje ɔl o abon avɔ niigi rogete o abil been nɛɛn.”
40026001	Mazi adica Yesu demziin ci kaal nicoko dook, enek nuyak ogin nɛ,
40026002	“Agayu niiga tiŋeere ece iiten o Juz gɔɔn aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt. Zin iitene nice naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kakɔ kanyononei ɔl o ka kɔɔt kotodoyan aneet keete ween talakec.”
40026003	Ivitak ni alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen alaat o Juz kɔrɔk o Kayavas ween alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo.
40026004	Ma avu abaaban niigi gɔl ci ka kagamti Yesu gɛnyiza, kɔkɔm eet ci aga, ka kɔɔt kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
40026005	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati kagɔɔni gi nico iinyaye ci vardaŋinto o, gɛrzɛ ŋaan ayoket ɔl ageet.”
40026006	Ma iitene oman aavi Yesu ole o eet o kazi Saiman baal amɔɔr mɔɔriz o gidaŋ e Bezaniya.
40026007	Mazi ŋaan adake nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa ci anyaa ketezewoc ci abiz karacoc ci ataala guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Ma aku atitiny niini Yesu ŋaati aḏuutɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ karacoc nico nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
40026008	Mazi acin nuyawa gi ci agɔɔn ŋaa nici noko, otoborit niigi nɔŋ. Ma aŋɔmtɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma laadun ŋaa nici aminaŋi karacoc nico gaga naa?
40026009	Alaŋ abon waan bar ataalanɛ karacoc nico guruc ci meelik ka kanyozek guruca ɔl o amaat?”
40026010	Maje Yesu aga gi ci azɔɔz niigi noko nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aŋomotu dim ŋaa nico naa? Ma gi ci agoonekan niini aneet noko gi ci abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaatan.
40026011	Ma ɔl ci amaat o ŋaan aromenu tiŋeere niiga ki nɔɔgɔ ŋina iinya dook. Maje naana alaŋ bodo karomɛ ki igeet tiŋeere tup.
40026012	Aḏuutekan niini karacoc o adimanan niini aneet ka kɛrɛwa dawiin.
40026013	Inoko zin anycaŋ kuduwayuŋ gi ce. Tiŋeere gɔɔn ma akɔ uuwaki kaviyawa o Joowo loocowɛ dook, aadjai buk gi ci ona agɔɔn ŋaa nicini noko.”
40026014	Ɔɔtɔ ni Judaz Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram ook alaate o ceez o Joowo.
40026015	Ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã kayelekuŋ gɔl ci agamnyu Yesu, anyaŋ koca naa?” Anycek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ guruc ceen eetom kamɔtɔ.
40026016	Akata ni Judaz iinyaye niceke orooŋun gɔl ci ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
40026017	Ma iitene o akanan lotɛn o vardaŋinto gɔɔn adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, ivitak nuyawa Yesu, ma avu anek nɛ, “Mayo arooŋnyet koota kutuguzeyin dayiin ci vardaŋinto ŋaaḏaŋ?”
40026018	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak eet oma kutura ŋinaante. Ɔɔtɔ enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Azi alaani o demziinto nɛ, Izi iiten ci ka kadakta naana ki nuyak ogan dayiin o vardaŋinto ole cun e.”
40026019	Ɔɔtɔ ni didi nuyawa utuguzɔ kiyo ona aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o, ma avɔ agɔɔn dayiin o vardaŋinto ŋinaante.
40026020	Ma yomana ivita Yesu ki nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram, ma aavtiz loota ka kadaktɔ.
40026021	Ma dayiinɛ ŋina enek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ aneet.”
40026022	Mazi azii nuyawa gi nico, ivirit nɔɔgɔ dook zinzeeti. Ma ajin ceeni gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ Yesu anek nɛ, “Aneeta gi? Manyi, aneeta gi?”
40026023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔ tiŋeere ataalinan ɛɛti ci kazola ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin ŋina noko ɛlɛ.
40026024	Zin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kadaai ebaal aduwan waragɛ o Joowo laadun e. Bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci akɔ ataalinan aneet o. Abon da bar niini alaŋ aritai dook.”
40026025	Buk Judaz o ka kook kataalɔi Yesu e ijin buk nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, aneet gi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa o.”
40026026	Mazi ŋaan adake niigi nɔkɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏokoc nico, ma aŋerek nuyak, ma azi nɛ, “Adayit. Nicini ɛlɛ onan nɛɛn.”
40026027	Bodo adoma diic ci nyaanu, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Owodit niiga dook.
40026028	Nicigi biye ogan ayelza terkediin o Joowo aḏuutonek looc ka kutuyɔ ɔl ci meel, ma aaryai baciinowa ugeec.
40026029	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo naana kawodɛ ŋaatodoi ki igeet zɛɛ ma kavɔ kawudɛ baliinte o baaba.”
40026030	Artek ni niigi beniin codoi, ma iŋaaz avɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
40026031	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Adotekaŋ tija looc, ma aviryu niiga dook, eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Karui tiŋeere eet o towawiinto kazaantɛ ɛɛzana.
40026032	Zin tiŋeere ma kitiŋa naana daayiza, karake ŋaatunooŋ kakɔ Galiliya.”
40026033	Enico itiŋa Pitɔr, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ bai naana kooŋnekin looc been nɛɛn! Yo nuun avir nuyawa dook, alaŋ naana kavir.”
40026034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnyan tija lak iiyu zɛɛ ma arɔk toloci o oowu.”
40026035	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ bai naana kadaŋnyin been nɛɛn, mayo nuun mã ka kadaayit ki ineet.” Ma buk aduwa nuyawa dook gi ci aduwa Pitɔr o.
40026036	Ivita ni Yesu ki nuyak ogin. Mazi avu arum ŋinti kazi Gezemani biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aavtiz ŋina rak ŋinti ŋaan kakɔ kaŋaryinɛ o.”
40026037	Ma akɔyi niini Pitɔr ki lɔgɔz o Zebedi kazi Jemis been Jɔn. Maje nɔɔnɔ avir ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40026038	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kanyei naana ziniza inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt ci ajonini daayizi. Aavtiz zin niiga ŋina ebeyit eleeti ŋaryiinta.”
40026039	Ma akɔ niini ŋintimiliny, ma akani ŋum looc, ma aŋaryɛ azi nɛ, “Baaba, mã anyak gɔl oma, aara piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko ŋaatan. Alaŋ een zin bar eo karɔɔŋɛ naana, bar tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina.”
40026040	Mazi abadaak nuyak ween iiyu e, amada nɔɔgɔ ataŋguzɔ. Ma anek niini Pitɔr nɛ, “Ma niiga dook iyontiya alaŋ atamanu kicintɛ ki aneet ziit codoi ṯɔr o naa?
40026041	Iziti vililɛ. Aŋaruyɔ ka calaŋ acinanuŋ Loryen zinzeeti zɛɛ ma agoonu oŋɛ. Eeci zinzeeti ugooc arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon, maje bar eleeti cugooc o alaŋ anyak dɔyiz.”
40026042	Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ imiirozek Yesu ŋaryiin. Ma akɔ ajin Jook anek nɛ, “Baaba, mã alaŋ piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko aaryai, tugu eo arooŋ niina labak.”
40026043	Mazi abada ŋaryiinta, amada bodo nuyak ataŋguzɔ, eeci adoŋ niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40026044	Bodo amiiri niini, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ aduwa zɔɔz we
40026045	Ma abadaak nuyak, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ŋaan dim ooginu nɔkɔ? Izi zin ziiti o ka kanyozekɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ɔl o oŋenu ajɔn.
40026046	Itiŋgaz, kɔtɔɔz. Icinit di, iiya ɛɛti o ka kook kataaloyan.”
40026047	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, urum Judaz looc ɔrkɔra kibeen ɔl ci meel gɛr ci itoona alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o Juz baayizo. Awoya niigi dilanyai ki kɛɛni.
40026048	Maje uyen Judaz enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Tedec mã acinu eet ci kacoco ŋalyamoc o, nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn agamit.”
40026049	Mazi aku arum Judaz looc, ook ŋaati Yesu ecodoi nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abona, alaan o demziinto.” Ma acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc.
40026050	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Laŋo, tugu gi ci arooŋ tugu o labak.” Ivita ni ɔl, ma agam Yesu.
40026051	Ma avoca nuyaiti codoi nuyawe o aromɛ ki Yesu o kabaz tibila, ma atɛɛda gabarɛn ci alaan o ceez o Joowo itat por.
40026052	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bil di! Arek kabaz cun noko tibil. Eeci ɔl o gɔɔn akat ɔl dilanyai dook adaai buk katin niigi dilanyai.
40026053	Alaŋ agayu mã inoko kawo baaba, itoonakan toonnyaye ogin ci meelik enico ɛlɛ kiiya kitiritan o?
40026054	Mazi koca avu atiritan toonnyawa aneet, ka zin zɔɔz o waragɛ o Joowo kɛlɛɛmnyai ku?”
40026055	Enek ni Yesu kɔlɛ dook nɛ, “Naa avunakaŋ kɛɛni ki dilanyai ka ivita agamtaŋ kiyo keen agoryai o naa? Karomɛ gɔɔn naana ki igeet tup kadɛmzɛ ceeze o Joowo, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ.
40026056	Bar zin kaala nicigi dook iina o ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zoozowa baal ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta e.” Enico odokonyit nuyawa dook ŋina lai, otoŋtek Yesu doon looc.
40026057	Ooti ni ɔl ci ona agam Yesu o nɔɔnɔ ole o alaan o ceez o Joowo kazi Kayavas ŋaa ona alotɛn alaata o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok kibeen ɔl o Juz baayizo e.
40026058	Mazi avɔyi niigi Yesu, unuwun Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ vurta rɛɛna zɛɛ ma avɔ arum kɔrɔk ci Kayavas ona avɔyi ɔl Yesu o. Ook ni aavu niini loota oromtɛ ki ɔl o abɛk ceez o alaano kɔrɔk kɛŋa ka kicin gi ci arɔɔŋ kutuguzek ɔl Yesu o.
40026059	Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o roonnyo dook arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ajowan gi ci gɛr abaca Yesu ka kɔɔt kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
40026060	Bar zin ɔkɔm gi ci gɛr ajowa niigi ŋaatin kina, yo nuun akat ɔl ci meelik gɛr nɔɔnɔ vɔlɔŋa o. Ma vurta itiŋgazɔ ɔl raman jena.
40026061	Ma anek ɔl o roonnyo vɔlɔŋa nɛ, “Kaziiŋna iiten baale azi ɛɛti nici nɛ, Kanim naana kɔɔyɔk ceez ci Joowo noko, ma bodo kenyeeti iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
40026062	Mazi azii Kayavas zɔɔz nico, itiŋa jena, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Anyei gi ci arooŋ bariz zoozowe ci aduwa ɔl nici noko tɔ?”
40026063	Maje Yesu ajaki niini labak cin. Ma bodo anek alaani Yesu nɛ, “Inoko didi zaare o Jook o arogi duwayet mã een niina Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo ɛlɛ nɛɛn.”
40026064	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o. Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet ci aavtiyu ŋina noko dook, acinaŋ tiŋeere niiga aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kaavɛ aziite o Joowo azo, ma kabada tiŋeere ŋaati kawoyanɛ diizwani tamma.”
40026065	Mazi azii alaani zɔɔz nico, otobor nɔŋ, ma arɛɛc rumanɛ ogin maany, ma azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici amomoz Jook giye ci anyekɛ ɛlɛ kizi Jook noko. Inoko iziiktu niiga dook zɔɔz ci aduwa niini noko. Alaŋ bodo karɔɔŋ cudanɛ oogi.
40026066	Inoko zin arooŋnyu niiga apaktek nɔɔnɔ naa zooze nico?” Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Abac niini gi nico ɔrɔɔt. Abon adaai.”
40026067	Otortek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ amot, ma arɔɔk.
40026068	Ma adoma ɔl ci ona aruk nɔɔnɔ voret noko, ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kiristo, aga ri niina kaal dook. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci arookin o?”
40026069	Maje Pitɔr aavi bitaala kɔrɔk kɛŋa. Ma aku dole ceen gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo, ma anek Pitɔr nɛ, “Orkoryu ri buk gɔɔn niina kibeen Yesu ci Galili noko.”
40026070	Ma bar adaŋnyi Pitɔr ɔl dook kɔrgɛna ŋina anek dole nico nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga gi ci aduwa o been nɛɛn.”
40026071	Ma iŋaaz niini ŋina, ma akɔ araan otoga. Bodo icin dole ceen gabarɛn oman nɔɔnɔ, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Ɔrkɔr gɔɔn buk ɛɛti nici ki Yesu o Nazarɛt.”
40026072	Bodo ni adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Didilɛ kateedona zɔɔ, alaŋ kaga eet ci aduwa o been nɛɛn.”
40026073	Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ivitak ɔl o ɛɛl ŋinaante e Pitɔr, ma avu anek nɛ, “Niina alya een eet codoi ole o Yesu, eeci azooz kiyo niigi o.”
40026074	Ma abarzek bodo Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ mã kaduwa vɔlɔŋ, adaakan koca tammu. Alaŋ kaga eet nico.” Enico ɛlɛ ɔrɔk toloci.
40026075	Ma aada Pitɔr gi baal anek Yesu nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere lak iiyu zɛɛ ma arɔk toloci e.” Udun ni niini ook bitaala, ma akɔ alu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
40027001	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna ivita alaata o ceezi o Joowo dook kibeen alaat o Juz abaabanit gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak.
40027002	Acabit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma avɔyi alaane ween Romen kazi Pailat.
40027003	Mazi akɔ acin Judaz apaktek ɔl Yesu daayiz, uwucek nɔɔnɔ gi nici ɔrɔɔt, ma abad mony. Ma amiironɛkɛ alaat guruc baal een eetom kamɔtɔ anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu e.
40027004	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kabaca oŋec giye ci kanyuŋ eet ci abon noko, eeci inoko arooŋnyu uruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.” Ma ɛbɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm ageeta zɔɔz cinaaŋ. Nicini zɔɔz cun doon.”
40027005	Ujukek ni Judaz guruc ceez o Joowo kɛŋ. Ma adun, ma akɔ acabek alɛm kɛɛt.
40027006	Ɛvɛrta ni alaata o ceez o Joowo guruc ci ona ajukek Judaz ceez kɛŋ noko, ma anɔ nɛ, “Nicigi guruc ci biyetu. Alaŋ zin abon keere ona ŋaati karomi ki guruc o ceez o Joowo.”
40027007	Ma agama niigi dook ka kataalai guruc nicoko mana ci eet o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ijunya ka kizi ŋinti gɔɔn adawi niigi ɔl ceen modo, matɛ gɔɔn adaai niigi Jerusalɛma.
40027008	Gi zin ci awɛ ɔl mana nice kizi Mana ci Biyetu zɛɛ been inoko o nɛɛn.
40027009	Zin gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jirimaya e ɛlɛɛmnyai didi. Azi baale niini nɛ, “Ooti ɔl o Israyil guruc baal een eetom kamɔtɔ baal arɔɔŋ niigi ka kataalai nɔɔnɔ e,
40027010	ma avɔ ataalanɛ mana ci eet ci ɛɛnyɛt ijunya kiyo baale aduwakan Jooi e.”
40027011	Iiya ni ijin Pailat Yesu enek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o Juz nɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
40027012	Maje giye o akɔlaki alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Juz mayan nɔɔnɔ rooni vɔlɔŋa akɔm niini gi ci abariz kina.
40027013	Ma anek Pailat nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ kaal ci akanin ɔl ineet noko azii?”
40027014	Bar Yesu akɔm gi ci abariz kina. Ma giye nico ibiir alaan ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt.
40027015	Maje gɔɔn baale laadun ma aku iiteni o aadanɛ ɔl o Juz vardaŋinɛt, ɔɔga alaani eet codoi ole o acabje ci tɛ olla arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ kɔɔgjai.
40027016	Zin iitene nice anyak eet ci gɛr acabji giye ci amonyi niini ɔl, ma aga ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ kazi zaar cigin nɛ Barabas.
40027017	Mazi avɔ alotai kɔlɛ dook, ijin Pailat nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ Barabas yo kɔɔgayuŋ da Yesu o kazi Kiristo?”
40027018	Maje Pailat aga nɔkɔ anyaak alaata ci Juz nɔɔnɔ Yesu o, eeci amadik niigi nɔɔnɔ gaga nɔkɔ, kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr agɔɔn.
40027019	Mazi ŋaan aavi Pailat roonnya nɔkɔ, itoonak ŋaa oninɛ ɔlɔ nɔɔnɔ otok ci azi nɛ, “Má agoonei eet nico gi ci gɛr been nɛɛn, eeci kapirna bilija avunakan wunozya ci akati nɔɔnɔ, ma awucnekan niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
40027020	Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Juz baayizo ayɔɔta ɔl ceen kɔlɛ o ka kuduktak Pailat kɔɔga Barabas. Maje Yesu abon apawonek nɔɔnɔ daayizi.
40027021	Ma ajin Pailat kɔlɛ anek nɛ, “Mayo ole ceen ram noko arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ jaŋ?” Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋnyin ɔɔgayet Barabas.”
40027022	Ma bodo ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma Yesu ci kazi Kiristo o kutuguwek naa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi dook Pailat anek nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ talakeca kadaak.”
40027023	Abɛdɛkɛ bodo Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abaca niini gitaz?” Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ.”
40027024	Mazi akɔ acin Pailat ɔkɔma gɔl ci ɔɔganɛ Yesu, ma otoborit ɔl dook nɔŋ nɔkɔ, abaaban izi nɛ, karabɔŋ tedec agɔɔn ɔl gi ci gɛr, odoma ni maam otoony azɛɛn nɔɔgɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔmnan aneet gi can daayize ci eet nico o. Gi cunooŋ doon nici. Alaŋ naana kawoyɛ tɔ.”
40027025	Mazi aduwa Pailat gi nico, egerenyit niigi dook aziti nɛ, “Anyek biye cigin o kivitayet ageeta ki dɔl ci dɔl cigaacak labak.”
40027026	Ɔɔgak ni Pailat nɔɔgɔ Barabas. Ma aduwak ɔl rak korooyit Yesu zɛɛ anyek ni nɔɔnɔ kɔɔt kotodeec niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec.
40027027	Ooti ni takirnya Yesu ole o alaano, ma avɔ aliya niigi dook nɔɔnɔ.
40027028	Ma aburuca nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ ogin, ma aborcɛkɛ rum ci meeri.
40027029	Ma agɔɔna nyigirgir ceen bila, ma avu aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ. Ma anyek kɛɛt kanyak aziite ci azo o kiyo kɛɛt o gɔɔn anyak ɛɛti ween alaan o. Ma avu amomoz niigi nɔɔnɔ akanek kozoŋtin kiyo alaani o. Ma azi nɛ, “Rok bai nɔkɔ kodot, alaan o Juz.”
40027030	Ma oortek niigi nɔɔnɔ amot, ma aama kɛɛt we bodo, ma arooi nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
40027031	Mazi ijezit kaal ci ona amomozi niigi nɔɔnɔ noko dook, uburuca rum ci meeri noko, ma arikɛ nɔɔnɔ rum onin laadun e. Ooti ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kutur bitaala ka kɔɔt kotodeec kadaak talakeca.
40027032	Mazi aduŋni niigi nɔɔnɔ, urumtɔ gɔla kibeen eet ci kazi Saiman ci looc ci kazi Sariin. Adaŋtek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kitik kɛɛt ci Yesu een talakec o.
40027033	Ma avunak niigi ŋinti kazi Golgoza. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar ci kazi Golgoza noko kazi nɛ amɛn ci oowu.
40027034	Ma ŋinaante anycek niigi Yesu nyaan ci acanɔ ki agɛrɔ ci akaka. Mazi atar niini, otobor alaŋaan awot.
40027035	Otodooc ni niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante. Ma aŋerek rumanɛ ogin eleeti ŋaati agɔɔni maadico.
40027036	Mazi akɔ odotiz, aavtiyɔ niigi ŋinaante ebeyit nɔɔnɔ.
40027037	Maje keete ci ona adodinɛ Yesu noko tadena ayeedi niigi gi ci ona aruyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ o azi nɛ, “Nicini Yesu ween alaan o Juz.”
40027038	Ma anyaa buk bodo niigi ɔl ceen agoryak een ram, ma avu adɔdɔ codoi nɔɔnɔ eci azo o, maje codoi adɔdɔ eci kaŋeto o.
40027039	Maje ɔl ci olla awɔ gɔla ararni Yesu zɛɛ ma arurut ooti, ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ,
40027040	“Ma baale azi nɛ, Ka ɔyɔk ceez o Joowo, ma bodo ɛɛnyca iinyaye ceen iiyu. Rogoz zin di ɛlɛ. Mã een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, duna di keete ci adodinɛ noko looc.”
40027041	Maje buk alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, been ɔl o Juz baayizo amomoz buk niigi nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.
40027042	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Arogoz niini ɔl oogi doon, ma bar alaŋ amm korogoz ɛlɛ cin o maany. Alaŋ een niini alaan o Israyil nɛɛn? Mã aduŋnak looc keete ceen talakec adodinɛ noko, katu koca naaga dook nɔɔnɔ.
40027043	Atu niini Jook, ma atarkat gi ci azi nɛ, Een niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo. Kicinit zin di mã ɛɛla Jooi inoko nɔɔnɔ.”
40027044	Mayo nuun een ɔl ween agoryak adɔdɔ ɔl ki nɔɔnɔ e amomoz buk nɔɔnɔ.
40027045	Mazi akɔ abil ii boloca, izi lɔɔci dook dildil kizi muur ziik iiyu.
40027046	Ma ziiye ween iiyu yomana ɛgɛrɛny Yesu molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Eli, Eli, Lema Sabaktani?” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico azi nɛ, Jook onan, Jook onan. Ooŋnan naa?
40027047	Mazi azii ɔl ogɛn ole ci ɛɛl ŋinaante gi nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Awo bɔŋ niini Ilija.”
40027048	Ma adɔkɔny ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma akɔ adoma kaviyoi, ma ajukek nyaan, ma akat moroka, ma itoonek nɔɔnɔ ka kococo.
40027049	Maje bar ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Bil rak di, kicinit karabɔŋ aku arogoz Ilija nɔɔnɔ.”
40027050	Ɛgɛrɛny ni Yesu bodo molowe ci appe, ma atɛɛt enico ɛlɛ.
40027051	Ma areeci rum o gɔɔn aŋerin ceez o Joowo kɔrgɛna enico ɛlɛ, akanai tadena been tir loota. Maje lɔɔci amɔɔt kirakirak, ma alibe biyɛn taza.
40027052	Ma akoli looknya o gabara o Joowo titiny baal gɔɔn adaai e. Ma aŋaaz ci meelik ŋaatineeŋ daayiza korogit.
40027053	Ma aduŋna niigi looknyai. Mazi iŋaaz Yesu daayiza, ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi ɔɔt Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ acin ɔl ci meel gɛr nɔɔgɔ.
40027054	Mazi acin alaani o takirnyawu kibeen takirnya ogin abɛk Yesu e looc mɔɔtiz kibeen kaal nicoko dook, otoŋole niigi looc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ ɛɛti nici tɛ ŋɛɛrti Joowo gi.”
40027055	Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaai ci meel gɛr baal anowa Yesu Galiliya, ma atirit nɔɔnɔ e. Agɛlɛm niigi Yesu rɛɛna.
40027056	Ma ŋaai nici awɔyi Meri o kutur o kazi Magdala, ki bodo Meri ween yaati Jemis been Josev, kibeen yaati Jemis ki Jɔn.
40027057	Ma yomana iiya ɛɛti ceen aroi kazi zaar nɛ Josev ci aluuga baale Arimatiya. Niini buk nuyai ci Yesu.
40027058	Ma akɔ ajin Pailat ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ Yesu kook kada. Ma aricanek Pailat ɔl ka kanycek Yesu Josev.
40027059	Odoma ni Josev ɛlɛ o Yesu atakucek rum ci vɔɔr colai.
40027060	Ma akɔ arek bɔɔt onin baal agoonak niini ɛlɛ maany biya e, zɛɛ anyaa ni bɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma aku anyoogi bɔɔt otok. Zɛɛ ɔɔtɔ ni niini.
40027061	Maje Meri o Magdala ki Meri oma bodo aavtiz ŋinaante agɛlɛm bɔɔt rɛɛna.
40027062	Ma ŋeertine co ɔɔtɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o Parici ŋaati Pailat.
40027063	Ma avɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, azi baale voloŋoiti nici iinyaye baal ŋaan arogni e nɛ, Kiŋaaz bodo iima daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.
40027064	Inoko zin karooŋnyin anyek takirnya kɔɔt kebeyit bɔɔt juruŋ zɛɛ ma adicai iinya ceen iiyu baal aduwa niini o, ka calaŋ avɔ agɔrɔz nuyawa oginɛ, ma avɔ anek ɔl nɛ, Itiŋa niini daayiza. Mã agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ, izi koca vɔlɔŋ cineeŋ o appe ɔrɔɔt bar kujuk baal aduwa niini e, ma uulalet.”
40027065	Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek zin takirnya kɔɔt kebeyit bɔɔtjuruŋ.”
40027066	Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi ɔɔt boote o adawin Yesu e, ma avɔ agiir bɔɔt otok dook lai juruŋ ka kɔkɔm eet ci akɔl, ma ooŋnek takirnya ŋinite kebeyit.
40028001	Ma iitene o yubzento ŋeere ririwɔna ook Meri o Magdala been bodo Meri oma ka kɔɔt kicinit bɔɔt.
40028002	Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci dook kirakirak. Ma akunak toonnyaiti ci Joowo looc tamma, ma aku aara bɛ baal anyoogi ɔl bɔɔt otok e, ma aavɛ.
40028003	Maje ŋum ci toonnyai nico o alanyit kiyo abadi bɔrɔyɛ o, ma vɔɔrɛ rumanɛ ciginɛ o pɛr.
40028004	Ma aruk takirnya o abɛk bɔɔt e kulurkuluri, kabaritit, ma iina kataŋguzɔ kiyo ɔl o adaai o.
40028005	Ma azoozek toonnyaiti ŋaai anek nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Kaga nɔkɔ avu arooŋnyu Yesu baal adɔdi talakeca e.
40028006	Azee zin niini tɔ ŋina. Itiŋa daayiza ebaal aduwan niini e ɛlɛ. Ivita di icinit ŋinbaal ɔɔŋɛ e ce.
40028007	Iyiiyit zin inoko taman ɔɔtɔ uduktak nuyak ogin enektek nɛ, Itiŋa niini daayiza. Ma inoko arayɛ ŋaatunooŋ ook Galiliya. Avɔ tedec acinu niiga nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante. Inoko zin gi ci kaduwakuŋ dook nɛɛn nici.”
40028008	Iyiit ni ŋaai nici ɔtɔɔzɔ bɔɔta ŋina ŋoliinta, maje ŋaato atalnɛ. Ma adɔkɔny ka kɔɔt kuduktak nuyak.
40028009	Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔbɔryak Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma anek nɛ, “Abonanu. Abil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.” Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu atorkot zɔɔ, ma adiŋdiŋan.
40028010	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Ɔɔtɔ uduktak nuyak kivita kɔɔt Galiliya. Ŋaan avɔ acinan niigi aneet ŋinaante.”
40028011	Mazi ŋaan awɔ ŋaai gɔla nɔkɔ, odokonyit takirnya ogɛn takirnyaye ona abɛk bɔɔt e ɔɔtɔ Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ aduwak alaat o ceez o Joowo kaal ona acin niigi agooni e dook.
40028012	Mazi azii alaata gi nico, ulute niigi dook ki alaat o Juz ŋaatodoi, ma abaabana zɔɔz codoi. Ivita ni otoloyit takirnya anycek guruc ci meelik gɛr.
40028013	Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã ajinuŋ ɔl, enektek nɛ, Ivita nuyawa o Yesu ogorozit nɔɔnɔ bɔɔta baal ŋaati koogina.
40028014	Mã arum alaan zɔɔz nici, ŋaan kavɔ kazoozona ki ageeta. Má anyaku ŋoliin gaga zooze nico.”
40028015	Agamta ni takirnya guruc nicoko, ma avɔ aduwa vɔlɔŋ eona aduwakɛ alaata e. Zin vɔlɔŋ cineeŋ noko uteec ɔl o Juz zɛɛ been waanico o.
40028016	Ma avɔ nuyawa ween amɔtɔ codoi biye o abil Galiliya ŋaabaal aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ka kooti e.
40028017	Mazi avɔ acin niigi Yesu, ŋinaante idiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ. Maje ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ ŋaan bakbayɛ nɔkɔ.
40028018	Ma icayak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ajonun, ma anek nɛ, “Anyozozeyan alaazɛt dook tammu tadena been loota aneet.
40028019	Ɔɔtɔ zin ole o loocok dook ka anycek nɔɔgɔ kiziti nuyak cigan. Otoonyit nɔɔgɔ zaare o baaba ki zaare ogan aneet ŋɛɛrin been zaare o Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
40028020	Ɔɔtɔ edemezit nɔɔgɔ ka kuzuuti kaal ci karicanekuŋ naana igeet noko dook. Abon zin niiga agayu karomɛ tiŋeere naana ki igeet tup nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci.”
41001001	Nici kanaan ci kaviyak o colai akati Yesu Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo.
41001002	Akanai zin ebaal ayɛɛdi nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zɔɔz o aduwa Jooi waanbaal anɛ nɛ, “Ŋaan tiŋeere kitoon gabaren can rak karayɛ ineet ɔɔwa ka kook kidimdimɛn gɔl.
41001003	Ma aku agɛrɛny ɛɛti nici balala azi nɛ, Idimdimantek eleeti gɔl o Manyi. Amadek nɔɔnɔ golok ogin keelit tɔp.”
41001004	Zin mazi aku Jɔn e, iiya abaak niini balala, ma uuwak gi ci ka kabadai ɔl oŋɛnɛ ka kotoonycɛ niigi ka kaara Jooi oŋɛ ugeec.
41001005	Zin enice ivitak ɔl dook Jɔn looce o kazi Judiya ki kuture o kazi Jerusalɛm ka kiziiyit nɔɔnɔ, ma avu abɔra niigi oŋɛ ugeec, ma oony Jɔn nɔɔgɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
41001006	Maje Jɔn waanice amalik rum ci agɔɔnnyai imane ci nyakalo been kavali ceen ruceen barkɔnya. Ma adak niini giroc been lɛtɛ ci ajowa tuuwa.
41001007	Ma uuwak niini waanice zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Vurte can anyak tiŋeere eet ci aku ci adiŋdiŋ kujukan aneet. Ma alaŋ kaganona naana ŋaati kaborcanɛ nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zoonu, eeci adiŋdiŋ niini ɔrɔɔt ŋaatan.
41001008	Inoko kuunyuŋ naana igeet maami doon, aje bar niini ŋaan aku uunyuŋ igeet Vɔŋize o Joowo.”
41001009	Ma iinyaye niceke iiya Yesu kuture o kazi Nazarɛt abil looce o Galili, ma akɔ oony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
41001010	Mazi akɔ aduŋna Yesu maami, enico ɛlɛ ɔkɔlɛ tammu kɛŋ, ma acin niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak nɔɔnɔ kiyo yɛɛlac o.
41001011	Ma azi mɔlɔyi ci aku tamma nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛran o kareezin nɛɛn. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatun ɔrɔɔt.”
41001012	Enico ɛlɛ itoonek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Yesu balal.
41001013	Ma akɔ aavi niini balala ŋinaante iinya eet ram, ma acina Loryenti nɔɔnɔ. Maje ŋinaante anyak kɛlɛk ci too, bar zin ivita itiritit toonnyawa o Joowo nɔɔnɔ.
41001014	Mazi akɔ acap ɔl Jɔn, itiŋa Yesu ook Galiliya, ma akɔ uuwak kaviyak o Joowo ŋinaante.
41001015	Ma anek niini ɔl nɛ, “Inoko iiya iiteni, ma izi buk baliin o Joowo ajɔn. Otoŋit zin oŋɛ ugoocok agoonu, bar ivita utuweec kaviyak o Joowo abon.”
41001016	Mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu liile o kazi Galili otoga, icinun niini ɔl ceen ram, Saiman kibeen gɔtɔni ci kazi Andoru. Adɛt niigi kuluk cabaya.
41001017	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Unuyawaŋ. Ŋaan kakɔ kademzekuŋ naana igeet gɔl ci ka edetakɛ ɔl Jook.”
41001018	Enico ɛlɛ otoŋit niigi cabayɛt ugeec, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.
41001019	Mazi iicak niigi ŋintimiliny, icin bodo Yesu Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Zebedi ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn. Aavtiz niigi kavoole abutan cabayɛt ugeec.
41001020	Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔgɔ, otowa enico ɛlɛ. Ma ooŋnek niigi baatineeŋ Zebedi kavool ki ɔl o liŋliŋonto, ma ano niigi Yesu.
41001021	Ma avunak Yesu ki nuyak nicoko kutur o kazi Kapernam. Ma iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit, ook Yesu ceeze o lotento, ma akɔ adɛmɛz niini ɔl ŋinaante.
41001022	Ma abiir ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ ooti gole ci adɛmzi niini nɔɔgɔ o, eeci demziin cinɛ o alaŋ atobɔ ki demziin ci alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, bar adɛmzɛ niini kizi eet o didi anyak dɔyiz.
41001023	Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ, iiya ɛɛti ci anyak miniŋ ci Loryento ceez o lotento, ma agɛrɛny miniŋa nici eete nico molowe ci appe azi nɛ,
41001024	“Yesu o kutur o Nazarɛt, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun o ka ija uulalet? Kagayin naaga ineeta nɔkɔ akun niina Joowa.”
41001025	Ma agernyek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ajaktɔ. Udunta bitaala eete nico.”
41001026	Ma amɔɔni miniŋa nici eet nico kabarit kɛdɛkɛdɛk, ma agɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe, ma aduŋna miniŋa nici ŋaatin.
41001027	Ma abiir ɔl ooti tɛt, ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mayo gitaz nici? Demziin ci colai? Ɛɛti nici anyak dɔyiz ci agɛrnyɛkɛ miniŋ o Loryento, ma azii niigi nɔɔnɔ.”
41001028	Taman nɔkɔ iziiyit ɔl gi ci agɔɔn Yesu noko looce o Galili dook.
41001029	Mazi aduŋna Yesu ki nuyak ceeze o lotento, ɔɔtɔ niigi ole o Saiman ki Andoru. Ma ɔrkɔr buk niigi ki Jemis been Jɔn.
41001030	Maje inyik o Saiman amɔɔr anyak tadiwɔn ci ɔɔŋɛ kuwena nɔkɔ. Taman nɔkɔ mazi arum Yesu ŋinite, uduktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ mɔɔriz cin o.
41001031	Ook ni Yesu ŋaatin, ma akɔ agam nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma adɔŋa kaavu jena. Enico ɛlɛ izi maya, ma agoonek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin.
41001032	Mazi akɔ ii loota yomana, anyaaktak ɔl Yesu ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr kibeen buk ɔl ci anyak miniŋ ci Loryento.
41001033	Ma avu ɔl dook kuture nice, ma alotonek ceez ci ona aavɛ Yesu o reerun.
41001034	Ma arogoz niini ɔl ci meelik anyak moorizok keŋti dook. Ma atɔɔk niini miniŋ ci Loryento ole ci meelik. Ma alaŋ anyek niini miniŋ o Loryento kozoozit, eeci aga niigi nɔɔnɔ niini ŋɛnɛɛn.
41001035	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna icinɛ Yesu, ma adun akɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ niini doon ŋinaante.
41001036	Ma vurta itiŋgazɔ Saiman kibeen gɔnɔgi oogi, ma avɔ arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ.
41001037	Mazi avɔ ajowa niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Ajal ɔl dook arooŋnyin ineeta.”
41001038	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abon rak kavɔ naaga kuturyowe ogɛn ajonun ŋaato ka kook buk kuuwak ŋinaante, eeci nici gi o kakunai naana laadun nɛɛn.”
41001039	Ɔɔtɔ ni niini, ma akɔ ɔzɔp looc o Galili dook. Uuwak ceezine o lotento, ma atɔɔk miniŋ o Loryento ole ci meelik ŋinaante.
41001040	Ma akunak ɛɛti ci anyak mɔɔriz ci gidaŋ Yesu, ma aku aavek nɔɔnɔ loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma ilalek anek nɛ, “Manyi, mã arooŋ rogozan kizi maya, rogozan.”
41001041	Ma awucnek Yesu zɔɔz nici, ma ataadek nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma anek nɛ, “Nyan kitiritin. Inoko ɔkɔma mɔɔriz nico ŋaatun.”
41001042	Taman nɔkɔ izi didi ɛɛti nici maya mɔɔriza kigirgir ɛlɛ oninɛ.
41001043	Ma aricanek Yesu eet nico anek nɛ, “Má akɔ aduwai eet oma gɔla gi nico. Bar dicek bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o ceez o Joowo ka kagayin ɔl dook didi inoko izɛ niina maya. Buk bitɔ taap Jook eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis.” Anyek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ.
41001045	Bar mazi akɔ niini ɔlɔ, ook enek ɔl ci meelik nɛ, “Yesu nɛɛn o anyan aneet kizi maya.” Ma giye nico alaŋaan Yesu ayelzak ɔl ɛlɛ kuturyowɛ. Bar aavu niini balala ka kɔɔt ɔl o avu kuturyowɛ dook ŋaatin ŋinaante.
41002001	Mazi amiironek Yesu Kapernam iinyaye ogɛn, iziiyit ɔl nɔɔnɔ iiyak kɔrɔk.
41002002	Ma alotai ɔl ci meelik ŋinaante, ma abitiz ceez eecitɔ kibeen bitaala buk kɔkɔm ŋinti karek zooc kina. Uuwayek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o Joowo.
41002003	Ma avu ɔl ceen wec anyaak Yesu eet ci rɛbrɛbi.
41002004	Mazi avɔ acin niigi mɛɛlɛ ɔl, ma akɔm gɔl ci ka kurumti eet nico Yesu, otoodi niigi nɔɔnɔ ceez taden, ma avɔ akɔl ceez ɔɔ, ma abɔranɛ nɔɔnɔ ceez ɔɔ kuwena kolocak Yesu ŋaati ona aavɛ o.
41002005	Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔgɔ atuwe ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ, enek eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran, aaryai oŋɛ ugune.”
41002006	Maje ŋinaante anyak ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek gɔnɔgi lotinok, ma abaaban niigi zinzeetinɛ gi ci anɔ nɛ,
41002007	“Azɔɔz ɛɛti nici nɔkɔ naa? Amomoz niini Jook. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anim kaara oŋɛ? Alaŋ een Jook doon?”
41002008	Maje Yesu aga baabani cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma abaabanu gi nico nɔkɔ o naa?
41002009	Yo aboke ŋaatunooŋ ŋaati kanɛkɛ eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, Aaryai oŋɛ ugune, yo da aboke ŋaati kanɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Tiŋa jena. Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.
