41002010	Karooŋ zin inoko keyeleyuŋ igeet ka agaac niiga keen naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, ma kanyei dɔyiz loota ŋina ci kaaranɛ oŋɛ ɔla been ci karogozɛ ɔl mɔɔrizɔi.”
41002011	Enico enek niini eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Tiŋa jena. Doma kuwen cun o. Bitɔ ɔlɔ.”
41002012	Ma iŋaaz didi niini jena ɔl kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ, ma adoma kuwen onin, ma awɔ. Mazi acin ɔl eet o rɛbrɛbi e awɔ didi, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma anaat Jook, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ŋaanbaal rɛɛn laadun ŋaan kicinit gi ci abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
41002013	Zin imiirozek Yesu bodo liil o Galili. Ma avunak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ, ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.
41002014	Mazi odotiz niini demziinta, iicak bodo kidicilim, ma gɔla icin niini Livai ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz aavi ŋaao meeryo, eeci gɔɔn laadun niini eet ci alot meeri. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija, nowawan aneet.” Ma iŋaaz Livai, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.
41002015	Ŋintimiliny ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ ole o Livai ka kɔɔtɔ kadayit dayiin o baalinu ŋinaante. Ma avu buk ɔl ci meelik ole o gɔɔn alot meeri kibeen ɔl o oŋenu oogi, ma ano Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ma avɔ azɔlɔ kibeen nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.
41002016	Mazi avɔ acin alaata o Parici demziinto Yesu azɔlɔ kibeen ɔl o meeryo been ɔl o oŋenu oogi, ijinit niigi nuyak ogin enektek nɛ, “Azɔlɔ Yesu ki ɔl nicoko naa?”
41002017	Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl calaŋ amɔɔr alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Maje ɔl o amɔɔr arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Alaŋ zin laadun kakun naana ka kiiya kotowa ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon, bar kakun ka kiiya kotowa ɔl o oŋenu.”
41002018	Ma iitene oman otoŋit nuyawa o Jɔn kibeen ɔl o Parici dayiin ka kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Ivita ni ɔl ogɛn, ma avu ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn nuyawa o Jɔn kibeen ɔl o Parici ooŋ dayiin, maje bar nuyawa cugune o alaŋ ooŋ buk niigi dayiin o naa?”
41002019	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko gɔɔn ma iiŋkayi ɔl, anyek niigi bacok kaavtiyɔ magizɛt? Bar kanɛ, Akɔm. Ŋinti ŋaan rak aromɛn niigi kibeen eet ci rociinto o dook, alaŋ rak niigi aavtiz magizɛt.
41002020	Bar zin ŋaan aku iiteni ci ka kaaryai ɛɛti ci rociinto o ŋaatineeŋ. Mazi aku iiteni nica, ŋaan zin aavtiz niigi magizɛt.”
41002021	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm eet ci abutanek rum ci rɛɛn gɔn ci colai. Mã koca agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, arɛɛcai koca rum ci rɛɛn o gone ci colai o kizi vɔlɔŋ ɔrɔɔt bar kujuk reecinɛt baal oowu e.”
41002022	Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm buk eet ci arek iira buru ci rɛɛn. Mã koca agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adɛ koca iirana, ma alip buru. Ma aduuti iirana, ma alibe burwɛ buk. Bar abon arek ɛɛti iira buru ci colai.” (Aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ zoozok nicoko o ka keyelizak niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz calaŋ abon ŋaati aromi niigi zoozok o Joowo colai kibeen kɛɛranɛ ugeec rɛɛn.)
41002023	Ma iitene o kazi Sabit yubzento awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ma avɔ abatak manɛɛn ci labinu. Ma aduula nuyawa oginɛ labi ci miliny, ma arom.
41002024	Ma anek ɔl ci Parici Yesu nɛ, “Cin di nuyak cugun o. Abacit niigi lotinɛt o azi nɛ, Má aliŋliŋnyu iitene o yubzento.”
41002025	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan ekeebit niiga zɔɔz baal agɔɔn Devid iitene baal adayi nɔɔgɔ magiz e?
41002026	Waanice adak magiz nɔɔnɔ kibeen ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr. Ɔɔtɔ ni ceeze o Joowo, ma avɔ adak dɔkɛn baal gɔɔn ataabi ɔl Jook e. Ma gi nici agooni waanbaal ɛɛnɛ ɛɛti o kazi Abazar alaan ci adikir ceeze o Joowo. Ma kɛɛrite ogaac alaŋ dɔkɛn ci taabinto noko ɔl ci gaga adak, bar adak alaata o ceez o Joowo doon. Adak zin waanice Devid dɔkɛn niceke labak, ma buk anyek niini oogi ɔI ogin ɔrkɔr.”
41002027	Ma anek Yesu ɔl o Parici nɛ, “Agɔɔna zin laadun Jooi iiten ci yubzento o ka kitirit ɔl ci deer. Alaŋ bar agɔɔna Jooi ɔl ci deer ka kuzuuti iiten ci yubzento o.
41002028	Zin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keen Manyi ci kaal dook kurum buk iiten ci yubzento o.”
41003001	Ma iitene oman mazi akɔ Yesu ceeze o lotento, anyak buk eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti ŋinaante.
41003002	Maje ɔl ci Parici ogɛn aavtiz ŋinaante arɔɔŋ niigi gɔl ci ka kɔkɔltakɛ Yesu rooni mã anyak niini gi ci abac. Ivita ni ataŋaamtek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka kicinit mã didi atirit niini eet nico iitene ci yubzento o.
41003003	Enek ni Yesu eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Ija. Bil ɔl ŋuma ŋaato.”
41003004	Ma ajin Yesu ɔl anek nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziineket kutuguz gitaz iitene ci yubzento o? Kitiritit ɔl yo kɛgɛrɛzanit da? Korogozit ɔl yo kuulalit da?” Mazi azii niigi zɔɔz nico, olla azi paŋ, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz.
41003005	Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔgɔ bornɛt nɔŋa. Bar bodo iinon ziniza nɔɔgɔ, eeci adɔi nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti kak. Ma anek niini eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Zɔlan aziit cun o.” Mazi ɔzɔlan ɛɛti nici aziit, obona aziiti oninɛ labak.
41003006	Enico ɛlɛ udunitɔ ɔl o Parici ceeze o lotento, ma avɔ abaaban niigi kibeen ɔl o alaan o kazi Erod gɔl ci arui Yesu kadaak.
41003007	Ma avɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin liile o kazi Galili. Ma ano kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ. Maje ɔl nicigi avu looce o kazi Galili ki Judiya ki Jerusalɛm ki Idumiya ki Tayor ki Sidon kibeen baagite o liil o kazi Jordan. Avunak niigi dook Yesu o, eeci azii niigi kaal o agɔɔn niini.
41003009	Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ appe ɔrɔɔt, ma ɛɛt nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, uduwak niini nuyak ogin kanyaakta nɔɔnɔ kavool o liilu kizi ajɔn, ka mã ayɔɔt ɔl nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ka kɛɛlai ɛlɛ.
41003010	Agɔɔn nɔkɔ o, eeci uyene atirit niini ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr, ma giye nico ivita ɔl o amɔɔr dook, ma ayɔɔtɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci arɔɔŋ kuumit niigi nɔɔnɔ.
41003011	Mazi olla acin ɔl o anyak miniŋ ci Loryento nɔɔnɔ, iina niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa, ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn.”
41003012	Ma aricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má ayelzanaŋ aneeta ŋaati awuyaŋ kizi ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
41003013	Ma vurta otoodozek Yesu biyɛn, ma ŋinaante otowa ɔl ci arɔɔŋ niini. Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ.
41003014	Ma aŋɛra ŋaatineeŋ ɔl ceen amɔtɔ ram kizi toonnyak cigin ka gɔɔn korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ, ka buk gɔɔn kitoon kɔɔt kuuwayit zɔɔz o Joowo.
41003015	Ma anyek niigi nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci ka kɔtɔɔkti miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.
41003016	Zaar zin ci toonnyak ceen amɔtɔ ram baal aŋɛra niini o nɛɛn ce. Saiman o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Pitɔr,
41003017	ki Jemis ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn o eegin lɔgɔz o Zebedi (Akanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook ramantiya zaar ci kazi nɛ Ɔl o Aŋozonek Zɔɔz),
41003018	ki Andoru, ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Tomaz, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Tadiyaz, ki Saiman o gɔɔn ɔɔrinɛ looc onin ole o Rom,
41003019	been Judaz Iskariyot baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e.
41003020	Ma vurte nice ook Yesu ɔlɔ. Ma bodo alotak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ ki nuyak ogin zɛɛ makacin ɔkɔma nɔɔgɔ waŋi ci adayin.
41003021	Mazi azii atenowa oginɛ kaal nicoko, ɔɔtɔ niigi ŋaatin ka kɔɔt kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔk, eeci anɔ ɔl ogɛn nɛ, “Anyawun niini maŋɔn.”
41003022	Mazi buk avu alaata o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok Jerusalɛma, izitɔ nɛ, “Anyak niini alya Loryen. Anyewun nɔɔnɔ alaani o miniŋu kazi Baalzibol dɔyiz ci ka kɔtɔɔyi niini miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.”
41003023	Otowa ni Yesu ɔl, ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ yabziinta gi ci anek nɛ, “Alaŋ Loryenti atɔɔk gɔn oma ci buk een Loryen kiyo niini o.
41003024	Gɔɔn mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci looc codoi, ma ɔɔrɔ niigi maany, alibe lɔɔci nici lai.
41003025	Buk mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci kɔrɔk codoi, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, kɔrɔgi nici alibe.
41003026	Zin buk mã aŋɛr Loryenti miniŋ ogin, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, adicai koca dɔyizi cinɛ o.
41003027	Akɔm laadun eet ci akɔ agɔrzɛ ceeze ci eet ci mooti adɔi, dooke coma koca rak adɔɔn niini nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ ka zin vurta kiiya kooyi niini kaal ci eet ci mooti adɔi noko.
41003028	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, anim Jooi kotoŋ oŋɛ o abaca ɔl ŋaatin dook kibeen buk zoozok ugeec gɛr gɔɔn amomozɛnɛ.
41003029	Maje eete ci amomoz Vɔŋiz o Joowo, alaŋ Jooi ooŋ oŋec nico ŋaatin been nɛɛn, eeci abaca niini oŋec ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ibil nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.”
41003030	Aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico o, eeci azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Anyak niini miniŋit ci Loryento alya.”
41003031	Zin ivita gɔtɔnɔgi Yesu kibeen yaatin, ma avu ɛɛl bitaala, ma itoon niigi eet oma kutuwak nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
41003032	Maje kɔlɛ ci appe aavtiz loota aliya Yesu, ma aku anek ɛɛti nici Yesu nɛ, “Yaatun kibeen gotonogu ci areyin bitaala neke. Arooŋnyin niigi ineet.”
41003033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Yaai ŋɛnɛ? Ɔl cigaŋ ci een gɔtɔnɔga o?”
41003034	Ma acin niini ɔl ci aavtiz loota alya nɔɔnɔ o, ma azi nɛ, “Nicigi gɔtɔnɔga kibeen yaatigan.
41003035	Ma ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi, eegin niigi yaatigan ki dɔl ci yaai.”
41004001	Ma iitene oman adɛmzɛ Yesu liil o Galili otoga. Ma avu ɔl ci meelik gɛr alotak nɔɔnɔ. Makacin ook niini kavoola liila tɔ, ma akɔ aavi loota ŋinaante. Maje ɔl dook aavtiz dɔwɔna.
41004002	Ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ ŋaati ayabzi zoozok yabziinowe ci meelik. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
41004003	“Iziiktɔ di! Anyak baale eet ci akɔ ḏowɛn.
41004004	Mazi akɔ aḏowɛ, iitazak ḏowo ogɛnɛ ŋinten gɔl, ma avu kibaali, ma avɛra ḏowɛn nicoko dook lai.
41004005	Maje ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak tɔdɔ ŋinten biyɛn, ma aduŋna kataman nɔkɔ, eeci akɔm tɔdɔ ci meel.
41004006	Mazi aaranɛ kɔr, araabjai lai, eeci akɔm tɔdɔ ci ka kuruktɛkɛ agɛrɔ looc juruŋ.
41004007	Bodo ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak bila, bar mazi aduŋna, eedit bila nɔɔgɔ, makacin alaŋaan anyak kɛbɛrɛ.
41004008	Maje ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak tɔdɔ ci abon, ma aduŋna juruŋ, ma adikir, ma abiirna kɛbɛrɛ. Ceegi anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci miliny. Ceegi anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik kidicilim. Maje ogɛn anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.”
41004009	Zin enek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu zoozok nicoko juruŋ.”
41004010	Mazi azaani ɔl, aavu Yesu niini doon. Ma avunak nuyawa oginɛ kibeen buk ɔl oogi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ keŋti ci zoozok nicoko.
41004011	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyozozeyuŋ igeet gɛnyizi ci ka agayi baliin o Joowo. Maje ɔl ogɛn azii gɔɔn niigi zoozok yabziinta.
41004012	Bar alaŋ aga niigi zoozok nicoko keŋti cigeec juruŋ. Waan tɛ kagaac, atu waan niigi Jook, ma aara Jooi oŋeeti ugeec.”
41004013	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci yabziin nico? Mã alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci yabziin nico, ka zin tiŋeere agaac yabziinok o ŋaan kuduwayuŋ dook ku?
41004014	Kɛŋ zin ci yabziin nico nɛɛn ce. Ma ḏowo ci aḏok ɛɛti o zɔɔz o Joowo nɛɛn.
41004015	Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ niigi ki gɔl kɛŋ o iinak ḏowo e. Eeci ma azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, taman nɔkɔ aku Loryen, ma aara zɔɔz o Joowo zinzeetine ugeec.
41004016	Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ ween biyɛn e. Eeci ma azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, agama niigi labak talniinta.
41004017	Bar alaŋ akɔ zɔɔz nici zinzeetine ugeec eecitɔ juruŋ, ma alaŋ atuwe ŋinti wun. Mazi avunak piryakzɛt nɔɔgɔ tuwente uneeŋ, ooŋ niigi tuwɛn enico ɛlɛ.
41004018	Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ o anyak bila e, eeci nicigi azii zɔɔz o Joowo,
41004019	Maje bar ŋaato iinon bodo niigi kaal o loocu, ma arɔɔŋ niigi kaal o arokzetu dook, ma kaal nicigi dook avɔ zinzeetine ugeec, ma adaal zɔɔz o Joowo zɛɛ makacin ɔkɔma nɔɔgɔ tuwɛn.
41004020	Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ o abon e, eeci azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, ma atuwe juruŋ. Ma anyek tuwɛn cineeŋ noko nɔɔgɔ kiziti ɔl ci abon kiyo labina o anyaa kɛbɛrɛ o miliny, ki kɛbɛrɛ o meelik kidicilim, kibeen kɛbɛrɛ o meelik ɔrɔɔt e.”
41004021	Ma anek Yesu ɔl bodo yabziinte oman nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã avaat ɛɛti lamba, alaŋ abuŋ ija, karabɔŋ buk alaŋ arek kɛrca loota. Bar arek niini lamba tarabeza taden.
41004022	Zin gi o aroodi inoko, katin abɔryai. Buk gi o abuŋe inoko, katin ayelzai.
41004023	Zin mã anyaku iin, iziiyit zoozok nicoko juruŋ.”
41004024	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aryek zinzeeti zoozok ci ona aziiknu noko juruŋ. Acaca tiŋeere Jooi kaal o gɔɔn agooneku niiga ɔl oogi gole ci atobɔ kibeen kaal o agooneku niiga nɔɔgɔ. Ma bar acaca niini ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk niceke.
41004025	Eeci ɛɛti ci anyak gi ci anyak anyonek bodo nɔɔnɔ ci appe. Maje ɛɛti ci akɔm gi ci anyak, mayo nuun anyak niini ci miliny, aamnyai koca bar nici ŋaatin.”
41004026	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziinte oman nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo atobɔ kibeen eet ci aḏowɛ mane cin.
41004027	Mazi adica ḏowɛn, ook niini aavu ɔlɔ labak. Ma aduŋna labina niigi doon, ma iŋaaz, bar alaŋ niini aga iŋaaz labina ku.
41004028	Ma tɔdɔwa alya anyek labi kudunta, ma abiir. Rak ɔɔwa anyek nɔɔgɔ kanyayit kaŋaya. Ma bodo anyek kobolbolanit, ma vurta aduŋna ooti, ma abiir kanyayit kɛbɛrɛ.
41004029	Mazi avɔ adɔi, atɛɛda niini nɔɔgɔ ecodoi nɔkɔ, eeci izi iiten ci teedinto.”
41004030	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kayo kayabiztek baliin o Joowo gitaz? Atobɔ yo niini kibeen naa?
41004031	Atobɔ zin baliin o Joowo kibeen keberec o motoŋtoco miliny tɛr gɔɔn aduŋna mana o.
41004032	Mazi akɔ aduŋna, iŋaaz ma adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk kɛɛn dook, ma akanek oto ci appintik, ma ɛɛnyci kibaali ceezi.”
41004033	Ma aduwak Yesu ɔl zoozok yabziinowe ogɛn bodo. Aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zoozok waakcaye ci meel ka kiziiyit juruŋ.
41004034	Aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zoozok dook yabziinta, bar mazi aromɛ niini kibeen nuyak ogin doon, oobek nɔɔgɔ zoozok keŋti labak.
41004035	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ yomana enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Abon di kavɔ liil baagita.”
41004036	Ma adotek nuyawa kɔlɛ looc, ma atɔɔt kavool. Maje uyene Yesu arayɛ ook kavoola laadun. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi dook kibeen nɔɔnɔ. Buk anyak kavoolɛt oogi ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔgɔ.
41004037	Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiya ŋɔɔti ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ayɛlyɛlanek maam kavool zɛɛ ma arɔɔŋ abiz kavooli.
41004038	Maje Yesu ɔɔŋ kavool vurta aruk ɔɔ ruma. Ma iiŋka niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, alaŋ abaaban zɔɔz ci ka kadaakti naaga
41004039	Ma iŋaaz Yesu, ma agernyek ŋɔɔt anek nɛ, “Bil.” Bodo anek liil nɛ, “Tivanɛ.” Makacin didi ibil ŋɔɔti, ma azi maama jaŋ.
41004040	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Aŋolinu naa? Ŋaan dim akɔmnuŋ igeet tuwɛn nɔkɔ?”
41004041	Bar enico anyayit niigi ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo ɛɛti nici abil ku? Akɔ zɛɛ ma een nuun ŋɔɔt kibeen liil azii buk zɔɔz cin!”
41005001	Abaayizit ni Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin liil o kazi Galili, ma avɔ baagite o looc o ɔl o kazi Garazin.
41005002	Mazi aduŋna Yesu kavoola, taman nɔkɔ iiyak nɔɔnɔ ɛɛti ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento.
41005003	Anyak ɛɛti nici miniŋit nico alya, ma akɔ gɔɔn abaak niini bɔɔtwane o ɔl o adaai. Ma akɔm ɔl ci ka koolit nɔɔnɔ cabiinta been nɛɛn.
41005004	Acap gɔɔn ɔl nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn kibeen zɔɔ ziiyi lak ci meel gɛr, bar enicoko dook aŋaak niini ziik nicoko.
41005005	Tup nɔkɔ agɛrɛny niini waazinok ki baalinok bɔɔtwani ki biyɛnɛ. Ma atatac ɛlɛ biyɛnɛ.
41005006	Mazi acina niini Yesu rɛɛna, adokonyonek nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔ akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa.
41005007	Ma anek Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento o nɛ, “Duna eete nico.” Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Yesu ŋɛɛrti Jook o adikir, arooŋ ŋaatan gitaz? Kalayin ineet zaare o Joowo ka calaŋ uulalan.”
41005009	Ma ajin Yesu miniŋit nico anek nɛ, “Kazi zaar cugun nɛ?” Abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kazi zaar cigan nɛ Kɔlɛ, eeci keegina naaga mɛɛlɛ.”
41005010	Ma ilalek miniŋa Yesu ɔrɔɔt ka calaŋ atooyek niini nɔɔgɔ looc oma.
41005011	Maje ŋinaante anyak kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ci meelik gɛr agɛ biya.
41005012	Ma ilalek miniŋa ci Loryento noko Yesu anek nɛ, “Nyet koota kɔcɔcɔbanene niceke ka kɔɔt kabaakta eleetine ŋaatineeŋ.”
41005013	Anyek ni didi Yesu nɔɔgɔ kudunta eete nico kɔɔtɔ kɔcɔcɔbanɛnɛ, ma avɔ didi niigi ŋaatineeŋ. Ma avira kɔcɔcɔbanɛna voroora, ma iinak liil kutudude dook lai. Maje kɔcɔcɔbanɛna nicigi dook een eet tur lak eetom (2000).
41005014	Odokonyit ni ɔl ona oowa kɔcɔcɔbanɛn e, ma avɔ aduwak ɔl o eevyi manɛɛni kibeen ɔl dook kutura zɔɔz nico. Ma avu ɔl dook ka kivita kicinit gi ci akanai o.
41005015	Mazi avunak ɔl Yesu, bar amada niigi eet baal gɔɔn anyak miniŋ o Loryento meelik e aavi loota ŋinaante. Anyawun niini rum alya, ma buk obona nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ oninɛ labak. Anyayit ni niigi dook ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
41005016	Maje ɔl ona icinit gi o agoononek eet nico kibeen kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ɔɔwa e, uduktak buk niigi gɔnɔgi gi nico.
41005017	Ilalek ni niigi Yesu kɔtɔɔ looce cineeŋ o.
41005018	Mazi atɔɔt Yesu kavool, ilalek ɛɛti ci ona anyak miniŋ ci Loryento noko Yesu ka korkorit kibeen nɔɔnɔ.
41005019	Bar ujura Yesu ŋaati ɔrkɔri ki nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Bitɔ ɔlɔ atenowe ugun ka bitɔ duwak nɔɔgɔ gi ci abon atiritin Manyi ineet noko.”
41005020	Ɔtɔɔ ni ɛɛti nici, ma akɔ azɔp kuturyok ween amɔtɔ aduwak ɔl gi ona agoonek Yesu nɔɔnɔ e. Ma abiir ɔl dook ooti zooze nico.
41005021	Mazi amiironek Yesu baagit, ivitak kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ liiltoga.
41005022	Ma ŋinaante iiya alaani ci ceez o lotento. Kazi alaan nico zaar nɛ Jairas. Mazi acin niini Yesu, iiya aavek nɔɔnɔ loota kɔpɔkpɔk.
41005023	Ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ anek nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan o miliny amɔɔr ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ kadaak. Ija da taadek nɔɔnɔ aziit ka korok.”
41005024	Orkorit ni Yesu ki nɔɔnɔ. Maje kɔlɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt ano buk nɔɔnɔ, ma iiciwɔ ɔl nɔɔnɔ kabanyɔi zɛɛ makacin oyootit nɔɔnɔ.
41005025	Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaa ci amɔɔr maam o ŋaanu irkitok amɔtɔ ram.
41005026	Amɔɔr niini ɔrɔɔt, ma azɔp akimanɛ ci meel gɛr irkitok dook, ma ŋaan kizi maya nɔkɔ, bar azaaci mɔɔrizi ɔrɔɔt.
41005027	Mazi azii niini zɔɔz o arogzi Yesu ɔl o amɔɔr, iiya buk niini, ma akɔ kɔla eecitɔ, ma icaya zɛɛ ma apadan Yesu eci bawuco, ma uum nɔɔnɔ rum.
41005028	Agɔɔn nɔkɔ o, eeci abaaban niini azi nɛ, “Mã nuun inoko kuum rum cin o ɛlɛ doon, keen koca maya.”
41005029	Mazi didi uum niini Yesu rum, eelit maama enico ɛlɛ, alaŋaan aduŋna. Makacin agawun niini ɛlɛ onin izi didi maya.
41005030	Maje Yesu aga nɔkɔ uduna ŋaatin dɔyizi ci miliny, ma ookconek kɔlɛ enico ɛlɛ, ma azi nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum rum can o?”
41005031	Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aga niina iiciwonun ineet ɔl ci meelik gɛr noko. Ajinei zin ku azi nɛ, Ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum rum can o?”
41005032	Maje Yesu agɛlɛm nɔɔgɔ dook arɔɔŋ kicin ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum nɔɔnɔ o.
41005033	Maje ŋaa nicini aga gi o agooni alye onin. Iiya ni niini ŋoliinta kabarit kɛdɛkɛdɛk, ma aku aavek Yesu loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma aduwak nɔɔnɔ gi ci ona agɔɔn niini o.
41005034	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan, anyin tuwɛn unun ineet izi maya inoko. Zin tɔ talniinta. Alaŋ mɔɔrizi nici abadakin bodo.”
41005035	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen ŋaa nico nɔkɔ, ivita ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Jairas, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Adaak dole unune. Má ŋaan amila gayoi gaga.”
41005036	Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz ci aduwa ɔl nicigi o, enek niini Jairas nɛ, “Má anyei ŋoliin gaga. Tuwɔ labak.”
41005037	Mazi ka kook niini ole o Jairas, alamun ɔl o ano nɔɔnɔ e dook, ma ɔrkɔr niini ki Pitɔr ki Jemis kibeen Jɔn ween gɔtɔni Jemis doon.
41005038	Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi kɔrɔk o Jairas, azii niini ɔl luwa. Iboobi niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
41005039	Ma akɔ niini kɔrga eecitɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Naa? Aluyu naa? Dole alaŋ adaai, bar olla ɔɔŋ niini labak.”
41005040	Bar apɛz ɔl zɔɔz cin o. Otooyek ni niini nɔɔgɔ dook bitaalin. Ma akɔyi baati doleco been yaatin kibeen nuyak ogin een iiyu, ma avɔ ceeze ci ɔɔŋɛ dole o.
41005041	Ma agam niini dole aziit, ma anek otoge uneeŋ nɛ, “Talita koom.” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico kazi nɛ, Bɛɛnyan, tiŋa jena.
41005042	Enico ɛlɛ itiŋa didi dole jena, ma awɔ. Maje irkitowa ci doleco tiryanto een amɔtɔ ram. Ma abiir ɔl ona ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ e dook ooti ɔrɔɔt.
41005043	Ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt ka calaŋ aduwak ɔl oogi gi nico. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek dole gi ci adak.”
41006001	Ma vurta ɔtɔɔ Yesu imiirozek kutur onin kazi Nazarɛt. Ɔrkɔr kibeen nuyak ogin.
41006002	Ma iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit ook ɛdɛmɛz niini ɔl ceeze o lotento. Mazi azii ɔl ci meel demziin cin o, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti tɛt. Ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti nicini ajowa kaal nicoko ŋaa? Gɛnyiz taz ci anyonek nɔɔnɔ o? Ma liŋliŋɔn ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko ajowa niini ku?
41006003	Alaŋ een eet o gɔɔn abaac kɛɛn o nɛɛn? Alaŋ een niini ŋɛɛrti Meri? Alaŋ een niini gɔtɔni Jemis ki Josev ki Judaz been Saiman? Alaŋ een ŋɔɔnɔgi nɛɛn o gɔɔn karomɛ ŋina o?” Zin giye o agawi niigi nɔɔnɔ, otoborit niigi demziin cin.
41006004	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn laadun nyakaŋan atitiny ɔl nɔɔnɔ loocowe dook, maje bar ɔl o kutur onin been atenok ogin ɛlɛ alaŋ atitiny nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
41006005	Zin giye nico alaŋaan Yesu anim kutugu kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ŋinaante, bar olla ataadek niini azɛɛn ɔl ci miliny amɔɔr, ma arogoz nɔɔgɔ.
41006006	Ma abiir Yesu ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt, giye ci ɔl o kutur onin ɛlɛ alaŋ atuwi zɔɔz onin o. Ma azɔp Yesu korogjok adɛmɛz ɔl vitɛnane niceke.
41006007	Ma awa niini nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram, ma itoon nɔɔgɔ korkorit gɔɔn raman, raman. Ma anyek nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci atɔɔi miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.
41006008	Ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Má avoyu dayiin ki guruc been kaboot ci anyaku kaal. Bar olla anyayit kɛɛn ci omtinto doon.
41006009	Ooti caava kibeen rumanɛ ci anyaku eleetinɛ o doon kɔkɔm bodo oogi.
41006010	Mã atalnanuŋ ɔl ŋaaman, aavtiz ole nico zɛɛ ma awoyu looce nico.
41006011	Mã anyak ŋinti alaŋ atalnanuŋ ɔl igeet, ma alaŋ azii niigi zɔɔz cunooŋ o, otoŋit ŋinito. Utuduŋta tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ ka keyeliza gi nici gi o aborni niigi zɔɔz onan.”
41006012	Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ Yesu zɔɔza, ɔtɔɔzɔ ki nuyak, ma avɔ uuwayek ɔl gi ci anek nɛ, “Eteedɔi oŋɛ ugooc.”
41006013	Ma atɔɔk niigi miniŋ o Loryento ole ci meelik, ma avuut ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr ooti maala, ma arogoz nɔɔgɔ.
41006014	Ma adala awaŋi ci kaal o agɔɔn Yesu ɔl dook, makacin iziik buk alaani o kazi Erod kaal nicoko dook, eeci azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ nicini Jɔn o oonyi nɛɛn urugun bodo daayiza. Gi ci inoko agooninɛ kaala ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko nɛɛn.”
41006015	Ma bodo azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ Ilija gi.” Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Coma een nyakaŋan ci Joowo atobɔ kibeen nyakaŋanɛt o rɛɛn.”
41006016	Mazi azii Erod gi nico, izi nɛ, “Inoko ɛɛti nici Jɔn baal oony ɔl baal kanyi takiren kɛtɛɛda ɔɔ e nɛɛn. Urugun inoko bodo niini daayiza.”
41006017	Azi Erod nɔkɔ o, eeci baale anyek niini takirnya kagamit Jɔn, ma arek sijin. Agɔɔn niini gi nico o, eeci waanice aama niini Pilip ween gɔtɔni ŋaa onin kazi Erodiyas.
41006018	Iiya ni Jɔn o oonyi, ma anek Erod nɛ, “Gɛrzɛ gi ci aamanɛ gotonu ŋaa cin noko.”
41006019	Otoborek ni Erodiyas Jɔn nɔŋ, ma arɔɔŋ kuruk nɔɔnɔ kadaak, bar akɔm gɔl ci aruyi, eeci Erod alaŋ agama gi nico.
41006020	Aŋole niini Jɔn giye o ɛɛnɛ Jɔn eet ci Joowo abon. Ebewun ni Erod nɔɔnɔ, ma arɛɛz ŋaati aziikni kaal ci uuwak Jɔn, mayo nuun gɔɔn iima amadik niini nɔɔnɔ o.
41006021	Ma vurta ojowa Erodiyas gɔl ci ka kurui Jɔn, eeci iitene oman awa Erod alaat o akumawo, ki alaat o takirnyawu, been ɔl o Galili een arɔk ka kivita kadayit kɔnyit ci aadanɛ niini iiten onin baal aritan e.
41006022	Iiya ni tinati Erodiyas, ma aku arogom ɔl kɔrgɛna zɛɛ makacin ataltɔ Erod kibeen kernok ogin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anek niini dole nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci arooŋ, duwayan ka kanyin.”
41006023	Ma aterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ bodo gi ci anek nɛ, “Olla gi ci ajinan aneet, kanyin. Yo nuun arooŋ keŋereyin alaazɛt can o kɔrgɛna, kanyin labak.”
41006024	Udun ni dole ook bitaala, ma akɔ ajin yaatin anek nɛ, "Kijin baaba naa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Erodiyas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Jin baatun kɛtɛɛdayin ɔɔ o Jɔn o oonyi.”
41006025	Abada ni dole enico ɛlɛ, ma aku anek Erod nɛ, “Karooŋ ɔɔ o Jɔn o oonyi. Nyaayan kodooca ŋina inoko ɛlɛ.”
41006026	Mazi azii Erod zɔɔz nico, iinon zɔɔz nico, ma avir ziniz ɔrɔɔt, bar akɔm gi ci ka kɛɛla, eeci uyen eterkedek niini dole zɔɔz ci adɔi kak kernok kɔrgɛna.
41006027	Kataman nɔkɔ itoon niini takiren ka kook kɛtɛɛda Jɔn ɔɔ ka kanyaa. Ook ni takirɛnti sijina, ma akɔ atɛɛda Jɔn ɔɔ didi.
41006028	Ma anyaa ɔɔ kodooca, ma aku anyek dole. Ook ni dole anyek yaatin.
41006029	Mazi azii nuyawa o Jɔn gi nico, ivita ooti niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔɔt adaaca.
41006030	Mazi abada nuyawa keronnya, ivita uduktak niigi Yesu kaal o avɔ agɔɔn niigi dook kibeen kaal o adɛmɛz.
41006031	Maje iitene nice anyak ɔl ci meelik avunak Yesu zɛɛ ma alaŋ ajowa niini been nuyak ogin waŋi ci ka kadaktɔi. Enewun ni Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kɔtɔɔz kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl ka ɔɔtɔ uyubuzit ŋintimiliny ŋinaante.”
41006032	Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi kavoola ka kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl.
41006033	Mazi awɔ, icinit ɔl ci meelik nɔɔgɔ. Ma giye o agayi niigi Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ivirtozek niigi kuturyowɛ dook ŋinti avɔyi niigi o, ma avir niigi baagitok dook zɛɛ ma avɔ arak ŋinite iŋaan niigi kurumit.
41006034	Mazi aduŋna Yesu kavoola, acin niini kɔlɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt, ma awuci nɔɔnɔ ziniz ŋaatineeŋ ɔrɔɔt, eeci acin nɔɔgɔ ɛɛl kiyo ɛɛzana o akɔm tuwayoi o. Ma ademzek niini nɔɔgɔ kaal ci meel gɛr.
41006035	Ma yomana ivitak nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Izi lɔɔci baalin, ma buk een ŋiniti balal.
41006036	Anyek ɔl kazaantɛ kɔɔt korogjowe ci kajɔŋzɔ noko ka kɔɔt kataala kaal ci adak.”
41006037	Ma bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycek nɔɔgɔ dayiin niiga alya.” Ma anek niigi Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ kanyaka guruc ci alɛɛnɔ ki dayiin cigeec dook.”
41006038	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku inoko dayiin ceen ku? Ɔɔtɔ di icinit.” Mazi avɔ acin, ivita enektek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kanyaka ḏɔkɛn ceen tur kibeen kuluk ram nɔkɔ.”
41006039	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ eŋerit ɔl kiziti kotorɛ. Anycek nɔɔgɔ kaavtiyɔ loota artene ci colai noko.”
41006040	Mazi aavtiz niigi loota, een gɔɔn kotoritin ceeni eet ram kamɔtɔ (50), maje ceegi een eet tur (100).
41006041	Odoma ni Yesu ḏɔkɛn ceen tur o kibeen kuluk ceen ram o, ma acin tammu taden, ma anyek Jook zany. Ɛtɛɛt ni ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl. Ma buk aŋerek kuluk nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl.
41006042	Ma adake kɔlɛ oke dook zɛɛ ma apiiyani.
41006043	Ma abitiz nuyawa gilanya ceen amɔnki ram tɔc dayiine ci anyigzai kulugɛ kibeen ḏɔkɛni.
41006044	Ma ɔl ci adak dayiin noko o een ɔl ci mac doon eet tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000).
41006045	Kataman nɔkɔ enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Ɔtɔɔz kavoola araktɛ ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Bezediya liil baagita.” Aavu ni Yesu niini doon ka rak kazaan kɔlɛ.
41006046	Mazi azaani kɔlɛ, ɔtɔɔ ni niini ook biya ka kook kaŋarowɔ.
41006047	Mazi akɔ arara lɔɔci yomana, urum kavoolɛ liil kɛŋ. Maje Yesu ŋaan aavi dɔwɔna niini doon.
41006048	Ma acin niini nɔɔgɔ apirna ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ wolinta, eeci atirginyɔ ŋɔɔt. Mazi agɔr tammu, iiyak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ŋaati awoyanɛ maam tadena. Arɔɔŋ niini ka kiiya kidicek.
41006049	Mazi acin niigi nɔɔnɔ awɔ maam tadena nɔkɔ, abaabanit izitɔ nɛ, “Coma bar een miniŋit.”
41006050	Ma acin niigi dook nɔɔnɔ ŋoliinta, ma agɛrɛny ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Kataman nɔkɔ ozoozek Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Agamit zinzeeti kodoyit. Aneeta Yesu gi. Má aŋolinu looc gaga.”
41006051	Iiya ni niini ɔtɔɔt kavool ki nɔɔgɔ. Taman nɔkɔ itivanɛ ŋɔɔti. Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci ŋaan bakbayɛ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti nɔkɔ.
41006052	Mayo nuun icinit niigi gi baal anyekɛ niigi dayiin o miliny kizi mɛɛlɛ e, ŋaan kagaac niigi dɔyiz o Yesu nɔkɔ.
41006053	Mazi avɔ arum baagit o looc o kazi Genezaret, acabit kavool gɔgɔla ŋinaante.
41006054	Mazi aduŋna kavoola, kataman nɔkɔ agaac ɔl Yesu.
41006055	Ma avironek ɔl korogjok ugeec. Ma avɔ adɔŋak niigi ɔl o amɔɔr kuwanɛ ŋinti aavɛ Yesu o.
41006056	Ma ŋinti olla akɔyi Yesu kuturyowe o miliny, karabɔŋ een kuturyowe o adikir, anyaa ɔl gɔnɔgi o amɔɔr, ma avu arek looc mɛlɛgɛnyai. Ma ilalek ɔl ci amɔɔr o Yesu ka olla nuun kuumit niigi nɔɔnɔ rum. Zin didi ɔl o uumit rum onin orogit moorizoye ugeec.
41007001	Ma alotak ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o demziinto avu Jerusalɛma Yesu.
41007002	Ma acin niigi nuyak o Yesu adake iŋaan kotoonyit azɛɛn keere uneeŋ.
41007003	Eeci gɔɔn ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o Juz oogi alaŋ adake iŋaan kotoonyit azɛɛn giye o agami niigi kɛɛranɛ o jijitigeec.
41007004	Gɔɔn ma anyaa dayiin mɛlɛgɛnyai, alaŋ adak iŋaan rak kotoonyit. Ma azooni buk niigi kɛɛranɛ ci meelik oogi kiyo onyɛn ci diicitu ki ijunya been alawɛt e.
41007005	Ivita ni ijinit ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o demziinto Yesu enektek nɛ, “Dim nuyawa cugune o gɔɔn alaŋ azooni kɛɛranɛ o jijitigaac o naa? Adake gɔɔn niigi calaŋ oony azɛɛn o naa?”
41007006	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Igeet ɔl ci abuuku eleeti coko, aduwa da baale nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zɔɔz ceen didi giye ci akanuŋ igeet. Ayɛɛt baale niini zɔɔz ci aduwa Jooi azi nɛ, Gɔɔn ɔl nicigi adiŋdiŋanan aneet utugetinɛ doon. Maje zinzeeti cigeec o adɛyai ŋaatan many.
41007007	Alaŋ zin niigi aganɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋanan aneet, eeci arican niigi demziin ci kɛɛranɛ ugeecik ɔrɔɔt kujuk demziin ci zɔɔz onan.”
41007008	Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alɛɛm zin da Izaya didi. Alaŋ niiga azoonu lotinok o Joowo, bar azoonu kɛɛranɛ ci ɔl ci deer.
41007009	Abaabanu niiga kiziik bar agenyu giye ci aburnu lotinok o Joowo, ma bar azoonu kɛɛranɛ cugooc o.
41007010	Ayɛɛt Mosis baale zɔɔz baal aricanek Jooi nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun. Mã adɔm ɛɛti baatin ki yaatin, abon aruk ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
41007011	Maje bar niiga ademzonu anonu nɛ, Ma alam gi ci ka kitirti ɛɛti baatin karabɔŋ een yaatin, abon anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Alaŋ katirituŋ igeet, eeci kanyeya gi nico Jook.
41007012	Zin gole nico imilmilantu niiga nɔɔnɔ calaŋ atirit baatin ki yaatin.
41007013	Ma buk gole nico epeztu niiga zɔɔz o Joowo kizi gi ci labak kaale cugooc ademzeku ɔl noko. Ma anyak buk kaal oogi ci meel gɛr atobɔ kibeen nicoko gɔɔn agoonu niiga.”
41007014	Zin bodo otowa Yesu ɔl, ma aku anek nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di niiga dook ka agaac zɔɔz ci ka karooŋ kuduwayuŋ ce.
41007015	Akɔm laadun gi ci adak ɛɛti ci deer otoga, ma anyek eet kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo kina. Bar zin gi o gɛr gɔɔn aduŋna zinize ci eet ci deer nɛɛn o agɛrɛzan nɔɔnɔ.
41007016	Mã anyaku iin, iziiyit zɔɔz nicojuruŋ.”
41007017	Ma vurta ook Yesu ceeza otoŋek kɔlɛ looc, ma avunak nuyawa nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin kɛŋ ci demziin nico.
41007018	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci demziin nico niiga buk? Abon waan agayu niiga dayiin o avɔ eet ci deer kɛŋa alaŋ anyek eet kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.
41007019	Eeci dayiin alaŋ avɔ ziniza, bar avɔ kɛŋa ma aduŋnak bitaalin.” Aduwa Yesu gi nico o arɔɔŋ ka keyelek ɔl gi o abonan dayiin dook ŋaati kadayi.
41007020	Ma anek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Bar zin gi o gɔɔn aduŋna eet ziniza nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.
41007021	Eeci zinize ci eet ci deer o aduŋnan baabani ci gɛrzɛ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kutugu kaal ci gɛr kiyo waaŋ, ki agɔr, ki monyɛnɛt, ki zoocmazit, ki ziniz appinzɛt, ki labaan, ki madkɛn, ki ŋomtiin, ki eleeti doŋi, kibeen tarbalzɛt.
41007023	Aduŋna kaal nici dook zinize ci eet ci deer, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.”
41007024	Zin itiŋa Yesu ook looce ci ajɔŋɔz kutur o kazi Tayor. Mazi akɔ arum ŋinite, ook ceeze oman eecitɔ, ma akɔ aavi ŋinaante, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini keyelizak ɔl ɛlɛ, bar zin ojokta niigi nɔɔnɔ.
41007025	Ma ŋinaante iziiwun buk nɔɔnɔ ŋaa oman ci anyak bɛɛnyin miniŋit ci Loryento. Iiyak ni niini nɔɔnɔ, ma aku aavek loota kɔpɔkpɔk.
41007026	Maje ŋaa nici niini dole ci modo o kazi Garik, ma aritai niini kuture o kazi Venosiya o abil looce o kazi Siriya. Ilalek ni niini Yesu ka kɔtɔɔk miniŋit o Loryento dolece cin o.
41007027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nyan rak aneet kitirit ɔl ogan, eeci alaŋ abon ŋaati kajukɛkɛ dayiin ci dolenu o orze.”
41007028	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didi Manyi, ŋɛdɛt aleem zɔɔz nico, bar zin gɔɔn buk orze avɛr zurzuryak ci iina ŋaati adayin dɔlya labak.”
41007029	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Giye o uduwayɛ zɔɔz ci aleem, ɔtɔɔyɛ miniŋit o Loryento dolece unun. Bitɔ ɔlɔ labak.”
41007030	Mazi akɔ ŋaa ɔlɔ, amada dole ɔɔŋ kɛrca. Akɔma didi miniŋit o Loryento ŋaatin.
41007031	Ma iŋaaz Yesu kuture o kazi Tayor, ma akɔ adiir kutur o kazi Sidon been kuturyok ween amɔtɔ, ma akɔ alocak liil o kazi Galili.
41007032	Ma ŋinaante anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci adiiti iina, ma alagonyi aati calaŋ azɔɔz. Ma ilalek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kataadek eet nico aziit ka kitirit kizi maya.
41007033	Alakada ni Yesu eet nico doon ɔla. Ma akɔ azuwek azɛɛn iin ci eet nico o, ma oortek amot aziit, ma uum aat.
41007034	Ma acin tammu tadena, ma akɔla ziniz, ma anek nɔɔnɔ otoge uneeŋ nɛ, “Avta.” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico azi nɛ ziiwɔ.
41007035	Makacin didi ɔkɔltɛ eet nico iina oginɛ, ma buk oogji aati kɔzɔɔz labak enico ɛlɛ.
41007036	Ma aricanek Yesu ɔl dook anek nɛ, “Má aboranu zɔɔz nico.” Bar ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ calaŋ abɔra zɔɔz ci abil nɔkɔ, bar avɔ aduwa niigi gi nico ɔrɔɔt.
41007037	Ma ɔl o azii zɔɔz nico abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt, ma anɔ nɛ, “Kaala ci agɔɔn Yesu noko dook abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma een nuun ɔl ci adiiti iina anyek niini nɔɔgɔ kiziiktɔ. Buk ɔl o adiiti alemeti anyek nɔɔgɔ kozoozit labak.”
41008001	Ma ŋintimiliny iinyaye ogɛn olotak bodo kɔlɛ ci appe Yesu. Mazi akɔ adicai dayiin ugeec, otowa Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ,
41008002	“Inoko awuci ziniz ole nicoko, eeci karomena ki nɔɔgɔ iinya iiyu, makacin idicai dayiin ugeec anyak.
41008003	Mã kitoonei nɔɔgɔ korogjok magizɛt nɔkɔ, avɔ koca aval gɔla, eeci ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ avu rɛɛna.”
41008004	Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mazin yo balale nico ka kojokta dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki ɔl nicoko ŋaaḏaŋ?”
41008005	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko anyaku ḏɔkɛn ceen izɔk?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyaka ḏɔkɛn ceen torgɛrɛm.”
41008006	Uduwak ni niini kɔlɛ kaavtiyɔ loota. Ma adoma ḏɔkɛn ceen torgɛrɛm noko, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek nuyak ka keŋeryek ɔl. Ma aŋerek niigi ɔl.
41008007	Anyak buk niigi kuluk ci miliny. Ma anyek bodo Yesu Jook zany kuluge nicoko, Ma anyek nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl buk.
41008008	Ma adake ɔl nicigi dook zɛɛ makacin ipiiyantɛ. Ma alota nuyawa zurzuryak ci anyigzai o, ma abitiz gilanya torgɛrɛm.
41008009	Maje ɔl ci ona adak dayiin noko o een eet tur lak eet ram (4000). Azaanun ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ kɔɔt korginɛ.
41008010	Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ otoodit niini ki nuyak ogin kavool, ma abaayiz liil avɔ looce o kazi Dalmanuta.
41008011	Zin ivitak ɔl ci Parici ogɛn Yesu, ma avu adaŋɔ ki nɔɔnɔ. Arɔɔŋ niigi kicinta Yesu, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kutugu nɔɔgɔ liŋliŋɔn ci atɛɛt biye ci aku Joowa.
41008012	Ma akɔla Yesu ziniz, ma azi nɛ, “Akɔ ma arooŋnyu icinit liŋliŋɔn ci ateeduŋ biye o naa? Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ kayelekuŋ igeet liŋliŋɔn ci ateeduŋ biye been nɛɛn.”
41008013	Ma ooŋnek niini nɔɔgɔ looc, ma atɔɔt kavool, ma akɔ liil baagita.
41008014	Mazi awɔ niigi, erektek nuyak dayiin ŋinaante, ma bar ajowa ḏokoc codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ kavoola.
41008015	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Egenyit gerzitine o ɔl o Parici kibeen gerzitin o Erod o atobɔ ki nyigit o gɔɔn adɛni ḏɔkɛna o.”
41008016	Bar nuyawa alaŋ aga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ o, ma aŋɔmtɔ anɔ nɛ, “Aduwa bɔŋ Yesu gi nico o, eeci akɔmnet ḏɔkɛn.”
41008017	Maje Yesu aga ŋomtiin cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aŋomotu zɔɔz ci akɔmnuŋ ḏɔkɛn o naa? Ŋaan dim niiga agayaŋ aneet nɔkɔ? Ŋaan bakbayɛ igeet zinzeeti nɔkɔ?
41008018	Anyaku kɛbɛrɛ, ma alaŋ acinenu. Anyaku iin, ma alaŋ aziiŋnenu.
41008019	Alaŋ aadanu ḏɔkɛn baal kanyi ɔl ween eet tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000) e? Mazi baale ipiiyantɛ niigi e, alotanu waanice gilanya izɔk dayiine o anyigzai?” Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kalotana gilanya amɔtɔ ram.”
41008020	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abon buk aadanu ḏɔkɛn baal kanyi ɔl ween eet tur lak eet ram (4000) e. Mazi baale ipiiyantɛ niigi e, alotanu gilanya izɔk dayiine o anyigzai?” Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kalotana gilanya torgɛrɛm.”
41008021	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan zin agayaŋ nɔkɔ o naa?”
41008022	Mazi avunak Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin kutur o kazi Bezediya, anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci ruben, ma ilalek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kuum eet nico ka kɔkɔl nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ.
41008023	Ma agam niini eet ci ruben noko aziit, ma aduŋni akɔyi kutur bitaala. Ma ŋinaante otorek amot nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ, ma ataadek nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Inoko anyak gi ci acin?”
41008024	Ma adɔŋ ɛɛti ci ruben noko ɔɔ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ii, kacin ɔl awɔ, bar olla ɛɛl kiyo kɛɛna o.”
41008025	Ma bodo ataadek Yesu azɛɛn nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ. Enico ɛgɛlɛm bodo ɛɛti looc, ma acin kaal dook juruŋ, eeci ɔkɔltɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ wak.
41008026	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko bitɔ ɔlɔ. Má amiironei kutur.”
41008027	Zin ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ korogjowe o ajɔŋɔz looc o kazi Sisiriya Vilipai. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, ijin Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Gɔɔn dim yo azi ɔl nɛ, Keen naana ŋɛnɛɛn?”
41008028	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi gɔɔn ɔl nɛ, Een Jɔn o oony ɔl. Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, Een Ilija. Ma bar ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, Een nyakaŋan codoi nyakaŋanete o Joowo.”
41008029	Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niiga gɔɔn aniyu nɛ, Keen ŋɛnɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina Kiristo.”
41008030	Iricanek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ ka calaŋ aduwak ɔl oogi zɔɔz nico.
41008031	Ma adɛmɛz Yesu nuyak ogin anek nɛ, “Iiten oma naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kapirna ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kaale ci meelik. Ma abornan tiŋeere aneet alaata o miliny ki alaat o adikir ceeze o Joowo been ɔl o demziinto buk. Arukan tiŋeere niigi aneet kadaak. Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
41008032	Oobek ni niini nuyak dook zɔɔz nico kagaac niigi dook juruŋ. Mazi azii Pitɔr zɔɔz nico, akata Yesu doon, ma akɔ aricanek nɔɔnɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Má azi nɔkɔ.”
41008033	Bar ookci Yesu, ma agɛlɛm nuyak, ma agernyek Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Nyɛ ŋaatan Loryen co, eeci baabani cune o alaŋ aku Joowa, bar baabani ci eet ci deer.”
41008034	Otowa ni Yesu kɔlɛ kibeen nuyak, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti konowan aneet, abon areyek nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ oninɛ, ma abon agama gidɛn ki piryakzɛt ŋaati anuyan niini aneet.
41008035	Eeci ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ korogoz ɛlɛ onin, bar akoloz. Maje ɛɛti ci akoloz ɛlɛ onin ŋaatan kibeen kaviyawe o Joowo, bar arogoz.
41008036	Mayo zin inoko mã anyak ɛɛti kaal o loocu dook, ma bar akoloz rogɛt ci ɛlɛ onin, bonat inoo?
41008037	Mã adaak ɛɛti, akɔm bodo gi ci ka kabadakɛ nɔɔnɔ rogɛt onin.
41008038	Zin ma anyak ɛɛti alyaan ŋaatan ki zooze onan ole ci loocu gɛr noko, katin buk naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kanyei alyaan ŋaatin iitene ci kabadana naana been toonnyak o Joowo titinyonte o Joowo e.”
41009001	Ma anek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, anyak ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ ŋina ci katin alaŋ adaai iŋaan kicinit niigi dɔyiz o baliin o Joowo.”
41009002	Ma vurta iinyaye ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ooyi Yesu Pitɔr ki Jemis been Jɔn bɛ tadena, ma avɔ aavtiz niigi doon ŋinaante. Mazi ŋaan aavtiz nɔkɔ, otowo Yesu ɛlɛ nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ.
41009003	Makacin rumanɛ oginɛ iziti vɔɔrɛ pɛr kizi kiyir kiyir kujuk rum ci vɔɔr loota ŋina.
41009004	Ma acin nuyawa Ilija ki Mosis baal adaayitɔ baale e azɔɔzɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
41009005	Ma anek Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, kavu tɛ ŋina juruŋ. Nyet kɛtɛɛnycawa kaal ceen ceezi kabili kɔr een iiyu, ka codoi kizi cun, codoi ci Mosis, codoi ci Ilija.”
41009006	Aduwa Pitɔr gi nico calaŋ aga, eeci niigi dook anyak ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
41009007	Ma aku diizoc, ma aku abil nɔɔgɔ tadena, ma azi mɔlɔyi ci Joowo diizoce nico nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛran o kareez nɛɛn. Iziiyit nɔɔnɔ.”
41009008	Taman nɔkɔ icinit nuyawa izi nɔɔnɔ Yesu doon, ɔkɔma Ilija ki Mosis.
41009009	Mazi aduŋna niigi bɛ tadena, iricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má avɔ aduwaku ɔl gi ci ona acinu noko zɛɛ ma kakɔ kiŋaaz naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto daayiza.”
41009010	Oroodit ni didi nuyawa gi nico zinzeetinɛ, maje ŋaato ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Ŋaazi daayiza akati kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
41009011	Ma ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn ɔl o demziinto azi nɛ, Arayai katin rak ɔɔwa Ilija ŋaati Kiristo o, naa?”
41009012	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didi ŋɛdɛt arayai rak Ilija ka kiiya kidimdiman gɔl o Kiristo. Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, Katin Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abor ɔl nɔɔnɔ, ma apirna niini ɔrɔɔt.
41009013	Bar zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, Ilija iiya odota, ma utuguzek ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaal ci gɛr eo arɔɔŋi niigi kiyo ayeedi waragewe o Joowo o.”
41009014	Mazi avɔ arum Yesu ki nuyak ceen iiyu o nuyak ogin oogi, acin kɔlɛ ci aliya nɔɔgɔ, ma adaŋɔ ɔl ci demziinto kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
41009015	Mazi acin ɔl nicigi dook Yesu, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma adokonyonek niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ azaa.
41009016	Ma ajin Yesu nuyak anek nɛ, “Ma dim adaŋonu kibeen ɔl nicoko naa?”
41009017	Ma azɔɔz ɛɛti codoi ole ceen kɔlɛ noko anek Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, kanyaakin ŋɛɛran ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento, ma adiiti ɔtɔgi calaŋ azɔɔz.
41009018	Gɔɔn ma agam nɔɔnɔ miniŋit nici, arui looc, ma aduŋna kavucaci otoga, ma adak nyigit, ma aciizɛn ɛlɛ. Kajin uyene nuyak cugun noko ka kotooyit miniŋit nico ŋaatin, bar alaŋ anim niigi kotooyit.”
41009019	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet ɔl ci akɔmnuŋ tuwɛn coko. Kayo koromtɛ naana kibeen igeet zɛɛ been inin ka utuyɔ? Ka kɛmɛz zɔɔz cunooŋ zɛɛ been inin? Anyaaktayaŋ zin di logo nico ŋaato.”
41009020	Ma anyaak niigi nɔɔnɔ logo nico. Mazi acin miniŋit ci Loryento noko Yesu, taman nɔkɔ avic logoz, ma arui looc kɔbɔrbɔr kuduv ɔtɔgi.
41009021	Ma ajin Yesu baatin anek nɛ, “Akanan gi nici baal waŋa?” Ma anek baati logoto nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyaa gi nico kidiczɛta nɔkɔ laadun.
41009022	Lak ci meelik gɛr ci gɔɔn ajukɛkɛ miniŋit nici nɔɔnɔ goo karabɔŋ een liil arɔɔŋ ka kuruk kadaak. Inoko kilalekin anyek ziniz kobona ŋaatinaaŋ. Tiritet miniŋte nico mã anim.”
41009023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Naa akɔba azi nɛ, Mã anim o? Ɛɛti ci atu Jook anim kutugu kaal dook.”
41009024	Taman nɔkɔ enek baati logoto Yesu nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt naana katuwe. Tiritan zin tuwente can miliny noko ka kutuwɔjuruŋ.”
41009025	Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ alotak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, egerenyek miniŋit ci Loryento noko anek nɛ, “Niina miniŋit o adiiti logo nico otok, duna ŋaatin. Má abadai bodo nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
41009026	Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit nici, ma avic logoz kataval ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, makacin uduna. Ma ɔɔŋ logoti kazacanɛ kiyo ɛɛti o adaak o. Ma anɔ ɔl ci meelik nɛ, “Adaak ri logoti.”
41009027	Maje bar Yesu agam logoz aziit, ma adɔŋa kaavu jena.
41009028	Mazi akɔ Yesu ɔlɔ, ɔɔt ijinit nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ɛɛnɛ nɔɔgɔ doon anek nɛ, “Matɛ uyene akɔmneket ageeta ŋaati katooka miniŋit nico naa?”
41009029	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Miniŋit nici alaŋ aaryai gaga. Ool nɔɔnɔ ŋaryiin doon.”
41009030	Ma iŋaaz Yesu ki nuyak ogin ŋinaante, ma avɔ adiir looc o kazi Galili. Maje Yesu alaŋ arɔɔŋ kagaac ɔl ogɛnɛ nɔɔnɔ ŋinti aavɛ.
41009031	Eeci arɔɔŋ niini waŋi ci ka kɛdɛmɛzi nuyak. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten oma agamnyan ɔl aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, ma avɔ arukan kadaak. Bar iinyaye ceen iiyu kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
41009032	Maje bar nuyawa alaŋ aga kɛŋ ci demziin ci aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o. Bodo ŋaato aŋole ŋaati ajini niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci demziin nico.
41009033	Mazi avu arum niigi Kapernam, ɔɔtɔ korge oman. Ŋinaante ijin Yesu nuyak enek nɛ, “Gitaz ona adaŋonu gɔla e?”
41009034	Ma ajaki niigi jaŋ, eeci uyene ŋɛdɛt adaŋɔ gɔla arɔɔŋ kagaac ŋɛnɛɛn ci titiny ŋaatineeŋ.
41009035	Aavu ni Yesu loota, ma awa nɔɔgɔ dook amɔtɔ ramana, ma anek nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kizi titiny, abon anyek niini ɛlɛ onin kizi cɛlbɛz ɔla dook, ma een gabaren ci ɔl dook.”
41009036	Enico odoma Yesu dole ci miliny, ma aku anyek kibil nɔɔgɔ ŋuma ŋaati ataadekɛ niini nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma anek nuyak nɛ,
41009037	“Ma ɛɛti ci atalna dole ci miliny kiyo nici noko zaare ogan, atalnanan buk niini aneet. Ma ɛɛti ci atalnanan aneet, alaŋ bar atalnanan aneeta doon, bar buk atalna niini Jook o itoonanan aneet.”
41009038	Ma anek Jɔn nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, iiten baale anyak eet ci kacina atɔɔk miniŋ o Loryento zaare ugun, ma kalamnya naaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ een niini nuyai kiyo naaga o.”
41009039	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má alamnyu nɔɔnɔ gaga, eeci ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal ci adɔi kiyo nici o zaare ogan, alaŋ amarninan niini aneeta.
41009040	Ma ɛɛti calaŋ amarninet ageet, niini laŋotinai.
41009041	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci anyuŋ maam owodit giye o eeginu niiga nuyak cigan, ajowa katin buk niini gi ci abon Joowa.”
41009042	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Mã anyek ɛɛti dole ci miliny kiyo nici noko kabaca oŋec, aganɔ koca ɛɛti nici ŋaati acabonɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ golu alɛm, ma ajukonek liil kotododɛ kook many.
41009043	Zin mã abacakin aziiti oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta aziite codoi kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ azɛɛn dook, ma ajukonei goo o abil been nɛɛn.
41009045	Mã abacakin zɔɔci oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta zooce codoi kujuk ŋaati koca ajukonɛkɛ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
41009047	Mã abacakin kɛbɛrɛci oŋec, kata bitaalin. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ baliinte o Joowo keberece codoi kujuk ŋaati koca ajukonɛkɛ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
41009048	Ma ŋin o gooyo anyak kuluut ci adak ɔl, ma alaŋ adaai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Buk goo ci avaat nɔɔgɔ o alaŋ adiiti nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
41009049	Avaadi katin ɔl dook gooya zɛɛ ma amokcar kiyo mɛlɛ o.
41009050	Ma mɛlɛ abona, bar mã idicai mokcarɔni, akɔm bodo gɔl ci kanyekɛ komokcar. Anyayit zin bonat o atobɔ kibeen mɛlɛ. Abaayit niiga dook laŋotizɛta been ganɔnta.”
41010001	Ma vurta itiŋa Yesu ook looce o kazi Judiya, ma akɔ abaayiz liil o kazi Jordan. Ma ŋinaante alotak kɔlɛ nɔɔnɔ bodo, ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ eo gɔɔn adɛmzi ɔl laadun.
41010002	Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ ɔl ogɛn ole o Parici arɔɔŋ ka kicinta nɔɔnɔ. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziiknek eet kɔtɔɔk ŋaa cin labak?”
41010003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma da baale Mosis zooze nico anekuŋ nɛ?”
41010004	Ma azi niigi nɛ, “Aneket Mosis nɛ, Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kɔtɔɔk ŋaa cin, abon labak, olla zin abon ayɛɛdak niini nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci ŋeronto.”
41010005	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedekuŋ Mosis zɔɔz nico o, eeci adoknuŋ igeet zinzeeti kak, ma alaŋ arooŋnyu iziiktɔ.
41010006	Maje laadun waanbaal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi looc e, ɛɛnyca niini eet ci mac ki ŋaa.
41010007	Zin nici gi o gɔɔn ooŋni ɛɛti yaatin ki baatin, ma akɔ aromɛn ki ŋaa onin o nɛɛn.
41010008	Ma gole nico alaŋaan bodo niigi eegin ram, bar iziti ɛlɛ codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
41010009	Zin giye o oromi Jooi ɔl nicoko kodoye, akɔm bodo eet ci deer ci ka kɛŋɛr nɔɔgɔ.”
41010010	Mazi avɔ aavtiz nuyawa ki Yesu niigi doon ceeza, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico.
41010011	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, ma arɔca bodo ŋaa oma, adoma niini zoocmaz.
41010012	Buk mã aaryai ŋaa eete cin, ma akɔ arik bodo eete oman, adoma niini zoocmaz.”
41010013	Ŋinaanto anyaaktak ɔl ogɛnɛ Yesu dɔl ci miliny ka kamayuk niini nɔɔgɔ. Maje nuyawa bar agernyek ɔl nicoko kɛdɛyai.
41010014	Mazi acin Yesu gi nico, otobor nɔŋ, ma anek nuyak nɛ, “Anycek dɔl kivitayan aneet. Má alamnyu nɔɔgɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo abilnek ɔl ci anyek eleeti kiyo dɔlya ci miliny noko.
41010015	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti calaŋ agama baliin o Joowo zinize onin kiyo dole o miliny o, alaŋ akɔ niini baliinte nico been nɛɛn.”
41010016	Ma alotek Yesu dɔl kɛŋ, ma ataadek nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn, ma amayuk.
41010017	Mazi iŋaaz Yesu keronnye onin, ivirak ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa. Ma ajin anek nɛ, “Gayoi o abona, mayo kutugu naa ka kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn?”
41010018	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔ ma awuyan kizi eet ci kabona o naa? Akɔm eet ci abon. Jook doon ci abon.
41010019	Aga niina lotinok o Joowo azi nɛ, Má amony eet ci deer. Má adoma zoocmaz. Má agɔrzɛ. Má avoloŋ. Má adayɛ ɔl looc. Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun.”
41010020	Ma anek ɛɛti nici Yesu nɛ, “Gayoi, lotinok nicoko dook kazoonɛ baale kidiczɛta e laadun.”
41010021	Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔnɔ talniinta, ma anek nɛ, “Anyak zin gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci abon agoon. Bitɔ taalɔi kaal ugun anyei dook ka ŋerek guruc ɔl o amaat, ka ija nowawan niina aneet. Ŋaan akɔ katin jowa niina arɔkzɛt tamma.”
41010022	Mazi azii ɛɛti nici zɔɔz nico, alaca ɛlɛ, ma awɔ ŋaati inoni ziniza gi nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci anyak niini kaal ci meelik.
41010023	Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ, “Ɔl ceen arɔk adɔi kak ŋaati avɔyi niigi baliinte o Joowo.”
41010024	Ma abiir nuyak ooti zooze nico. Bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Dɔl ogan, adɔi kak ŋaati akɔyi ɛɛti baliinte o Joowo.
41010025	Ɔl ceen arɔk adɔi ɔrɔɔt ŋaati avɔyi baliinte o Joowo kiyo alaŋ nyakale adunyonek nyibira ŋino vɔlɔŋ o.”
41010026	Enico mazi azii nuyawa gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mazi yo ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka kɛɛlyai korok?”
41010027	Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci deer alaŋ anim korogoz ɛlɛ dɔyize cin doon, bar Jook nɛɛn o arogoz nɔɔnɔ, eeci kaala dook Joowa alaŋ adɔi.”
41010028	Itiŋa ni Pitɔr, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Mazin yo naaga ci kotoŋteya kaal ogaacak dook looc, ma kivita kunuyin ineet, kakana inin?”
41010029	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci ooŋ kɔrɔk cin, karabɔŋ een gɔtɔnɔgi ki ŋɔɔnɔgi, karabɔŋ een baatin ki yaatin, karabɔŋ een dɔl cigin, kibeen mana cin giye ci atuyan niini aneet, ki giye ci akati kaviyak o Joowo, ajowa niini loota ŋina kaal ci meelik kujuk kaal ci ooŋ niini o lak eet tur. Ajowa niini gɔtɔnɔgi, ŋɔɔnɔgi, yaatigin, dɔl been manɛɛn. Ma buk ajowa niini piryakzɛt liŋliŋonte nico, bar zin katin ŋaan ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
41010031	Ma ɔl o titiny inoko, eegin niigi katin kaal ci labak. Maje ɔl o cɛlbɛz inoko, katin niigi titinyɛ.”
41010032	Ma awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak avɔ Jerusalɛma. Arayin niini nuyak ɔɔwa, maje nuyak baraŋɛ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti nɔkɔ. Buk ɔl ci ano nɔɔnɔ o anyak ŋoliin. Ma awa bodo Yesu nuyak ogin amɔtɔ ramana ka kuduwak nɔɔgɔ doon kaal o ka kivitak nɔɔnɔ.
41010033	Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di! Inoko kavɔ naaga Jerusalɛma. Zin tiŋeere ŋinaante kakɔ kanyonei naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaat o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto. Ma avɔ apayekan niigi aneeta daayiz. Ma avoyan ole ween modɛn.
41010034	Ma avɔ ararnan ɔl nica aneet, ma oortekan amot, ma arukan nyaboyɛn, ma vurta ɔɔt ni uruktan kadaak. Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu, ŋaan kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
41010035	Ma avunak Jemis ki Jɔn ween lɔgɔz o Zebedi Yesu, ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋnyin da tuguweyet gi ci karooŋnya ce.”
41010036	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kutuguweyuŋ naa?”
41010037	Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Katin waanci aavɛ niina lecere unun alaazetu baliinte o Joowo titiny tammu tadena, karooŋnya koromtɛ naaga kibeen ineet ŋaati anyekɛ gɔɔn eet codoi ŋaatinaaŋ kaavu ineet aza, maje codoi aavi ineet kaŋeta.”
41010038	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu niiga gi ci ajinaŋ o. Animnyu kini niiga ipirta kiyo tiŋeere kakɔ kapirna naana o? Ma buk kini animnyu daayiz kiyo tiŋeere kakɔ kadaai naana o?”
41010039	Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ii, kanimnya labak.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt zin avɔ apirnanu kiyo tiŋeere kapirna naana o, ma avɔ adaaŋnu kiyo kakɔ kadaai naana o.
41010040	Bar zin gi ci ka kaavɛ ŋaatunooŋ ɛɛti codoi aneet aza, maje codoi aavi kaŋeta o, alaŋ een gi can ka kanyuŋ. Eeci ɛŋɛra Jooi ɔl ci ka kaavtiyɔ vitɛnane nicoko laadun.”
41010041	Mazi azii nuyawa ween amɔtɔ gi nico, otobortek niigi Jemis ki Jɔn nɔŋ.
41010042	Otowa ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook ŋaatodoi, ma anek nɛ, “Agayu niiga alaata o ɔl o alaŋ atu Jook, abal niigi ɔl ugeec dɔyiza.
41010043	Ma zin gi nici alaŋ ŋaatunooŋ abil nɔkɔ. Mã ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ kizi titiny ŋaatunooŋ, abon niini een gabaren ci gonoginu.
41010044	Mã ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ karayɛ ɔɔwa, abon niini een gabaren ci ɔl dook.
41010045	Eeci yo nuun een aneet ɛlɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kiliŋliŋtozeyan ɔl aneet, bar kakun ka kiliŋliŋozek nɔɔgɔ, ma kadaai ka korogoz ɔl ci meel.”
41010046	Ma bodo avunak niigi kutur o kazi Jeriko. Mazi awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ki kɔlɛ kuture nico, anyak eet ci ruben aavi gɔl kabanyca ŋinaante alaye. Kazi eet nico zaar nɛ Bartimeyas. Niini ŋɛɛrti eet ci kazi Timayos.
41010047	Mazi azii niini nici Yesu ween eet o Nazarɛt, ɛgɛrɛny izi nɛ, “Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da!”
41010048	Ma agernyek ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ ka kajawɔ. Bar enico agɛrɛny niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da!”
41010049	Ibil ni Yesu, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Utuyayaŋ di nɔɔnɔ kiiya.” Ma avɔ awa niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Talɔ! Tiŋa je. Awoyin Yesu.”
41010050	Ma ajukek niini rum onin malkinto looc, ma iŋaaz jena taman, ma akunak Yesu.
41010051	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ kutuguweyin naa?" Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini noko nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋ kɔlan kɛbɛrɛ kicinɔ bodo.”
41010052	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ zin. Anyin tuwɛn unune ineet cinɔ.” Kataman nɔkɔ ɔkɔltɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ oginɛ, ma ano niini Yesu gɔla.
41011001	Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi Jerusalɛm, ɔɔtɔ niigi rak biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ajɔŋɔz kuturyok o kazi Bezpeja ki Bezani. Ma itoon Yesu nuyak ram anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ kuture ci kazi Bezpeja abil igeet ɔɔwa neke. Mazi avɔ arumnyu, ajowanu tedec jɔrɔn ci zigiro ci ŋaan laadun kotoodit ɔl acabje ŋinaante. Ɔɔkta ka anyaaktayaŋ ŋina.
41011003	Mã anyak eet ci ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Ɔɔganu naa? Enektek nɛ, Arɔɔŋ Manyi. Ŋintimiliny ŋaan abadakuŋ.”
41011004	Mazi avɔ niigi ŋinaante, amada didi jɔrɔn ci zigiro acabje ɔlɔ araan otoga gɔl kabanyca.
41011005	Mazi ɔɔga niigi zigir, enektek ɔl ogɛn ole ci ɛɛl ŋinaante nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonu noko? Ɔɔganu jɔrɔn ci zigiro noko naa?”
41011006	Ma aduwak niigi nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ona aduwa Yesu e. Otoŋit ni ɔl nici nɔɔgɔ kooti zigir.
41011007	Ma anyaak niigi Yesu zigir. Ma avu ataadek nuyawa rumanɛ ugeec malkinto zigir bawuc, ma aavɛ Yesu tadena.
41011008	Maje ɔl ci meelik ogɛn avetek rumanɛ ugeec malkinto gɔl. Maje ogɛnɛ atɛɛda bɔlɔk ci anyarnyar ḏorta, ma avu avetek gɔl kɛŋ.
41011009	Maje ɔl o arayin Yesu ɔɔwa o kibeen ɔl ci anowa nɔɔnɔ vurta o agɛrɛny anɔ nɛ, “Katanaaz Jook! Abon bai amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o aku zaare o Joowo.
41011010	Abon bai amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o ka kiiya kabal looc kiyo baale jijitinai Devid e.”
41011011	Ook ni Yesu Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ agɛlɛm niini kaal dook. Ma yomana imiirye niini ki nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram ɔɔt kuture o kazi Bezani.
41011012	Mazi abada niigi Bezaniya ŋeere, adawun Yesu magiz.
41011013	Ma acin niini rɛɛna kɛɛt ceen moneec anyak bɔlɔk ci meel ɔrɔɔt. Ma akɔ niini ka kook kicin karabɔŋ abiir. Mazi akɔ arum, bar acin een bɔlɔk doon, eeci alaŋ een iinya o gɔɔn abiirni monɛna nɛɛn.
41011014	Enek Yesu moneec nico nɛ, “Alaŋ bodo niina abiir kadak ɛɛti oman kɛbɛrɛ cugun nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.” Maje nuyawa azii zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ.
41011015	Mazi avɔ arum niigi Jerusalɛm, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo eecitɔ, ma akɔ atɔɔwa ɔl o gɔɔn ataalinɛ kaal kaluwawa eecitɔ kibeen ɔl o ataali. Ma uup tarabɛzɛt ci ɔl o gɔɔn abali guruc. Ma ajuk lɛcɛrɛ ci ɔl o gɔɔn ataalinɛ yɛɛla.
41011016	Ma alaŋ anyek bodo niini eet oma kiiya kabatak kaluwa o ceez o Joowo ŋaati iloli kaal cigin.
41011017	Ɛdɛmɛz ni niini ɔl enek nɛ, “Azi Jooi waragewe onin nɛ, Awɛ ceez cane o kizi ceez ci ŋaryiinto modɛni dook, bar niiga anyceyu kizi ŋinti avu aroodinɛ agoryawa.”
41011018	Mazi azii alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto zɔɔz nico, orooŋit niigi gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak. Amadik niigi nɔɔnɔ o, eeci abiir ɔl dook ooti demziinte onin.
41011019	Ma yomana itiŋgazɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak otoŋit Jerusalɛm.
41011020	Ma iitene co ŋeere mazi avu awɔ gɔla, icinit niigi moneec baale araabjai dook agɛrɔi buk.
41011021	Ma aada Pitɔr gi baal agɔɔn Yesu e, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, cin di moneec baal ator e araabjai lai.”
41011022	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abon anyaku tuwɛn Joowa.
41011023	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti tuwɛn Joowa, ma anek niini bɛ nico nɛ, Piyai! Jukozek liil! Ma alaŋ anyak niini ziniza baabanok ram, gi nici agooni koca nɔkɔ.
41011024	Zin giye nico kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak gi ci ajinu Jook ŋaryiinta, agaac nɔkɔ gi nici ŋaan anyonekuŋ igeet. Zin ŋaan anyuŋ Jooi didi gi nico.
41011025	Ma aŋaryinu, abon uuŋnu kaal o gɛr anyayeku ɔl oogi zinzeetinɛ ka buk Jooi ween baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena kotoŋ oŋeeti ugooc.”
41011027	Mazi abadaak niigi bodo Jerusalɛm, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma avunak nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o adikir baayizo.
41011028	Ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet alaazɛt ci atɔɔyɛ ɔl balawaz ceeze o Joowo o?”
41011029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Buk naana kajinuŋ igeet zɔɔz codoi ce. Mã abarzekaŋ jinɛn can o gole ci alɛɛmanu, kaduwakuŋ buk koca naana igeet alaazɛt can o aku ŋaaḏaŋ.
41011030	Uduktayaŋ di, baale ŋɛnɛɛn baal anyek Jɔn dɔyiz ci aku oonyi ɔl e? Anyek Jooi yo ɛɛti ci deer da?”
41011031	Ma adaŋɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã kazi nɛ, Anyek baale Jɔn dɔyiz baal oonyɛnɛ Jooi, azi koca Yesu nɛ, Ma da alaŋ zin atuwenu naa?
41011032	Buk mã kazi nɛ, Anyek Jɔn dɔyiz nice ɔl ci deer, aborneket koca ɔl ageet nɔŋ.” Aŋole niigi o, eeci ɔl ci meel aga niigi Jɔn baale nyakaŋan didi.
41011033	Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niigi Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ kagaya eet ci da anyek Jɔn dɔyiz o.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk kaduwakuŋ naana igeet dɔyiz ci kagɔɔnɛ naana kaal nicoko o.”
41012001	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziinta nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci aḏok kɛɛn ci gɔɔn agɔɔnanɛ ɔl nyaantanɛ mana. Olok ni mana juruŋ. Ma adawa look ci ka gɔɔn kamacoyek ɔl kɛbɛrɛ ci keenu o. Ma ɛɛnyca vaaco ci appe ka kɛbɛkti ɔl mana. Anyek ni niini mana ɔl ci ka keevit ka mã abiir kɛɛna, ka keŋerit ki nɔɔgɔ. Ɛɛrɔn ni niini ook looce oman.
41012002	Mazi awɔ abiir kɛɛna, itoonek niini gabaren cin ɔl o aliŋliŋ mana ka kiiya kiyiitek nɔɔnɔ kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ cigin.
41012003	Mazi aku arum gabarɛnti nici ɔl ci aliŋliŋ mana o, agamit niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aruk, ma anyek kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm kaal ci akɔyi kina.
41012004	Bodo itoona ɛɛti o mano gabaren oma, ma avu aruk ɔl o aliŋliŋ mana gabaren nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kanyak tuben ɔɔwa, ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ.
41012005	Bodo itoona niini gabaren oma. Enico uruyit niigi gabaren nico kadaak. Ma agoonek niigi kaal nicoko gabara ci mɛɛlɛ, oogi aruk korogit, oogi aruk kadaayitɔ.
41012006	Maje ɛɛti ci mano noko anyak ŋɛɛrin codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci arɛɛz ɔrɔɔt. Ma azi niini nɛ, “Atitiny tiŋeere niigi ŋɛɛran.” Itoonek ni niini nɔɔgɔ ŋɛɛrin.
41012007	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl ci liŋliŋonto noko nɔɔnɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛrti eet o mano nɛɛn. Ivita kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak ka kuula kaal dook kizi cigaac.”
41012008	Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aruk kadaak, ma avɔ ajukek tuu mana bawuca.”
41012009	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mazi yo inoko ma akɔ abada ɛɛti ci mano o agoonek ɔl nicoko naa? Bar kanɛ aku koca niini ma aruk ɔl ci baal aliŋliŋ mana noko dook kadaayitɔ. Ma anyaa ɔl oogi ka kivita kiliŋliŋit mana.
41012010	Kaga nɔkɔ ekeebtu niiga waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz o azi nɛ, Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ceezi biyɛnɛ, ma apɛz kizi gi ci labak, bar bɛ o titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk biyɛn o enyciinto dook nɛɛn.
41012011	Jook zin nɛɛn o agɔɔn gi nico, ma gi nici gi ci panypany keteedet biye ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
41012012	Mazi azii alaata o Juz yabziin nico, orooŋit kagamit Yesu, eeci aga niigi ariik niini nɔɔgɔ yabziinte nico. Bar bodo aŋole niigi kɔlɛ. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi otoŋit nɔɔnɔ.
41012013	Ma itoonek alaata o Juz Yesu ɔl oogi ole o Parici kibeen ole o Erod ka kɔɔt kijinit nɔɔnɔ zoozok ci ajin ka mã abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ gɛrzɛ, ka kagamit nɔɔnɔ.
41012014	Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Gayoi, kagayin naaga ineet gɔɔn azooz zoozok ci alɛɛma. Ma alaŋ aŋole baabani ci ɔl oogi, ma alaŋ buk ari niina ziniz titinyɔn ci eet ci deer. Duwayet di, mayo abon ŋaati karuweka meeri alaan o kazi Sizar, yo gɛrzɛ da?”
41012015	Maje Yesu aga cinaan cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Arooŋnyu icintawaŋ naa? Anyaakta di zin gurucoc ceen ziit anycaŋ kicin.”
41012016	Ma anyek didi ɔl nɔɔnɔ gurucoc, ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋum ceeni kibeen zaar ci ayeedonek gurucoc nico ci ŋɛnɛ?”
41012017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋum o alaan o kazi Sizar kibeen zaar ogin.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycek zin Sizar gi o akati nɔɔnɔ. Maje gi o akati Jook, anycek Jook” Mazi azii niigi Yesu azi nɔkɔ, olla apaŋantɛ paŋ.
41012018	Ma bodo avunak Yesu ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Sajuzi gɔɔn abaaban niigi azi nɛ, Ɔl o adaai alaŋ bodo iŋaaz daayiza. Ma avu ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ,
41012019	“Gayoi, baale ayeedeket Mosis lotinok ci azi nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti, ma ooŋna ŋaa cin iŋaan kanyak dɔl, abon arigiz gɔtɔnnya ci arogi o ŋaa ka kitirak dɔl ka kavada nɔɔnɔ.
41012020	Zin baale anyak gɔtɔn ceen torgɛrɛm. Ma arɔcɛ abuuwi, ma adaai iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dɔl.
41012021	Irigizun ni gɔtɔnnya ci anowa nɔɔnɔ o ŋaa. Bodo buk adaak niini iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dɔl. Ma arigiz bodo gɔtɔnnya o anowa nɔɔnɔ ŋaa, ma adaai buk iŋaan akɔm ŋaa dɔl.
41012022	Ma azɔp daayizi nici kibeen ŋaa nico lɔgɔz ceen gɔtɔn noko zɛɛ makacin idicai niigi dook torgɛrɛma kɔkɔma dɔl ci arita. Ma vurta adaawun buk ŋaa.
41012023	Duwayet zin di, katin ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ŋaa nici akati ŋaatineeŋ ŋɛnɛɛn? Ŋaabaal ɔzɔbtɔi niigi dook ŋaa nico.”
41012024	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abacu niiga gi nico ɔrɔɔt, eeci alaŋ agayu waragɛnya o Joowo kibeen dɔyiz onin.
41012025	Katin ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, alaŋ bodo arɔcɛ, bar eelit niigi kiyo toonnyawa o Joowo o.
41012026	Zin giye ci akati ŋaazi daayiza, baale uduwak Jooi Mosis iitene baal abilni Mosis lugurgoce o alanyit e gi ci anek nɛ, Keen naana Jook o Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob.
41012027	Alaŋ een zin niini Jook ci ɔl o adaai, bar Jook ci ɔl o arogi. Zin Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob yo nuun adaayitɔ o, ŋaan niigi arogi nɔkɔ. Abacu niiga zɔɔz nico.”
41012028	Ma aku ɛɛti codoi ole o demziinto, ma aku azii ɔl ŋaati adaŋɔn kibeen Yesu. Mazi acin niini Yesu alɛɛma kaal o ajin ɔl nɔɔnɔ dook nɔkɔ, ijin buk niini nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Mayo lotinowɛ dook lotinɛt jaŋ ci titiny ɔrɔɔt?”
41012029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lotinɛt ci titiny ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn o azi nɛ, Iziiktɔ ɔl o Israyil, Manyi onai nɛɛn Jooi doon, ma adoyi niini ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
41012030	Ereezit zin Jook ween Manyi unooŋ zinzeetine ugooc dook, ki rogete unooŋ dook, ki baabaninte unooŋ dook, kibeen dɔyize unooŋ dook.
41012031	Bodo lotinɛt ci titiny ano gɔɔn nico nɛɛn o azi nɛ, Ereezit ɔl o abaawonu kiyo areezu eleeti ugooc o. Akɔm zin bodo lotinɛt ci titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk lotinok ceen ram noko.”
41012032	Ma anek ɛɛti ci demziinto noko Yesu nɛ, “Gayoi, aleem didi niina gi ci azi nɛ, Adoyi Jooi ween Manyi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ma akɔm bodo Jook oma o.
41012033	Abon didi karɛɛz naaga Jook zinzeetine ogaac dook, kibeen baabaninowe ogaac dook, kibeen doyizowe ogaac dook. Abon buk karɛɛz ɔl o kabaawɔ kiyo karɛɛz naaga eleeti ogaac o. Lotinowa nicigi dook titinyɛ kujuk todoyok o kavaat gooya kibeen taabinɛt oogi o kagoonek Jook.”
41012034	Mazi acin Yesu eet nico abarzek nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz aritun nɔkɔ, enek nɛ, “Alaŋ adɛyai niina baliinte o Joowo.” Enico akɔma eet ci anim bodo kijin Yesu. Otoŋole niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ajini, eeci atɛɛza niini nɔɔgɔ.
41012035	Ma vurta mazi adɛmzɛ Yesu ceeze o Joowo, enek niini niini ɔl nɛ, “Abac alaata o demziinto zɔɔz o azi nɛ, Kiristo niini Ŋɛɛrti Devid.
41012036	Eeci baale anyek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Devid kizi nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Aavu niina libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
41012037	Mazi awo Devid alya Kiristo kizi Manyi cin. Zin bodo Kiristo een ŋɛɛrti Devid ku?” Ma atalnɛ ɔl ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ŋaati aziiŋni demziin o Yesu.
41012038	Ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Egenyit ole o demziinto gɔɔn awɔ rumanene ci wuntik alina, ma arɛɛz zaawanɛt ci atitinyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ mɛlɛgɛnyai.
41012039	Ma arɛɛz niigi ŋaati aavtiyɛ lecerene ci titiny ceezine o lotento. Ma arɛɛz vitɛn ci titiny aavtiyɛ ŋaati gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl azɔli dayiin.
41012040	Adak gɔɔn niigi kaal ci ŋaai o bɔi, ma ayelza eleeti ŋaati aŋaryin ŋinti wun. Zin ɔl nicigi katin ajowa niigi Joowa payiin ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.”
41012041	Mazi aku aavi Yesu loota ŋaao ajɔŋɔz loidoŋ o gɔɔn arek ɔl muci o ceez o Joowo, icinun niini ɔl ŋaati aaranɛ guruc. Ma acin niini ɔl ci meelik ole ween arɔk aara guruc ci meelik.
41012042	Iiya ni ŋaa ci bɔyɛ amaat, ma aku aruk milinyɛt ceen ram.
41012043	Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ŋaa ci bɔyɛ amaat noko uruk niini guruc ci meelik kujuk ɔl dook.
41012044	Eeci ɔl ogɛn aruk niigi guruc ci aŋɛra guruce ugeec meelik, maje ŋaa nici aara niini guruc ogin dayiino dook.”
41013001	Mazi aduŋna Yesu ceeze o Joowo, enek nuyaiti codoi nuyawe ogin nɛ, “Gayoi, cin di ceez ci Joowo noko kibeen biyɛn ci eenycinɛ noko alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
41013002	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Acin ceez ci Joowo appe noko. Oyoki katin kazaantozek biyɛn nici dook looc, kɔkɔm codoi ataadonek gɔn.”
41013003	Mazi akɔ aavi Yesu biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ŋaati acini ceez o Joowo, ivitak nɔɔnɔ Pitɔr ki Jemis ki Jɔn kibeen Andoru, ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ ŋaati aavɛ doon.
41013004	Anek nɛ, “Duwayet di ma kaala nici agooni tiŋa. Duwayet buk, tiŋeere ma ka kakatai kaala nici, kaga ku izi iiteni cineeŋ ajɔn o?”
41013005	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Egenyit! Má anyeku eet oma kalabawuŋ.
41013006	Anyak katin ɔl ci meelik azɔɔz zaare cigan avu katin azi nɛ, Aneeta Kiristo nɛɛn. Alabek zin katin niigi ɔl tuu.
41013007	Mazi katin aziiŋnu oroonok ci ajɔn kibeen awaŋ ci oroonok ci rɛɛn, má anyeku zinzeeti kivirit, eeci kaal nici ŋɛdɛt katin agooni, bar zin ŋaan rak koṯorɛi lɔɔci.
41013008	Katin ɔl ci looc oma ɔɔr ɔl ci looc oma. Ma amɔɔt tɔdɔwa kirakirak loocowe ogɛn, ma anyak loocowa tarjo. Zin nicigi kanaan ci looc libento, ma abil olla kiyo wucezi o gɔɔn aami ŋaa dole o.
41013009	Egenyit zin niiga alya. Agamnyuŋ katin ɔl igeet, ma avoyuŋ ceezine o roonnyo. Ma adookuŋ ceezine o lotento. Ma avoyuŋ alaate o abal ɔl. Zin giye o atuyaŋ niiga aneet, animnyu katin niiga uduktak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz onan een didi.
41013010	Zin rak ɔɔwa ma ŋaan koṯorɛi lɔɔci, uuwawonek rak kaviyawa o Joowo modɛn dook.
41013011	Zin ma agamnyuŋ ɔl igeet, ma avoyuŋ roonnyi giye o atuyaŋ niiga aneet, má anyeku zinzeeti kivirit giye ci ka udukta. Ma iiya iiteni nica olla udukta zɔɔz ci anyuŋ Jooi igeet, eeci alaŋ azoozu niiga dɔyize cunooŋ doon, bar Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɛɛn o ŋaan anyuŋ igeet ozoozit.
41013012	Buk katin gɔɔn ɛɛti ce akɔyi gɔtɔni daayiza. Maje ɛɛti ce akɔyi ŋɛɛrin daayiza. Maje buk dɔlya amarnin baatigeec ki yaatigeec, ma avɔyi nɔɔgɔ daayiza.
41013013	Ɔl dook katin amarninuŋ igeet, eeci atuyaŋ niiga aneet. Zin ɛɛti ci agam ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci arogoz Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
41013014	Abon agayu kɛŋ ci zɔɔz oma ce juruŋ. Ma acinu katin ceeze o Joowo manyilibe o gɛr ɔrɔɔt, abon ɔl o Judiya avironek biyɛn.
41013015	Mã aavi ɛɛti ceez tadena, abon aduŋna, ma adɔkɔny enice calaŋ akɔ ceeza tɔ ka kook kodoma kaal ogin.
41013016	Mã aavi ɛɛti mana, abon avir enice calaŋ abadaak kɔrɔk ka kodoma rum cin malkinto.
41013017	Nɔŋ ci gɛr katin ŋaane o anyake iinyaye niceke, kibeen ŋaane o arɔkti.
41013018	Ijinit Jook ŋaryiinta ka calaŋ iina kaal nica lɔɔla.
41013019	Eeci iinyaye niceke anyak lɔɔci libɛn ci ŋaan laadun kiita ŋaan baal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi looc e zɛɛ bee inoko o. Ma alaŋ buk katin bodo iina gi ci abil nɔkɔ.
41013020	Mã da calaŋ atɛɛt Jooi iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ, akɔm koca eet ci arogi. Bar zin giye o ka korogti ɔl oginɛ aŋɛra, anyewun niini iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ.
41013021	Zin iitene nice mã anyak eet ci anekuŋ nɛ, Icinit di Kiristo ceeni, karabɔŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn caana, má aziiŋnu nɔɔnɔ.
41013022	Eeci katin anyak ɔl ci anyek eleeti kizi Kiristo kibeen ɔl ci anyek eleeti kizi nyakaŋanɛt. Ɔl nicigi katin agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ka kalabtai ɔl o aŋɛra Jooi.
41013023	Egenyit zin, eeci kuduwayuŋ kaal nicoko dook maŋaan kakati o.
41013024	Bar zin iinyaye ci ano looc libɛn nice ookci ii kizi koli, ma alaŋ nyɛlɔyi alanyit.
41013025	Maje monyonya iina tammu tadena, maje kaala o ɛɛl tammu bɔbɔra amɔɔt, ma ookci.
41013026	Zin iitene nice ŋaan acinan katin ɔl aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kakunɛ diizwani dɔyize ci appe kibeen titinyɔnta.
41013027	Ma kitoon katin toonnyak o Joowo kɔɔt kuluta ɔl o ɛŋɛra Jooi looc libirɔ dook.”
41013028	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ojokta niiga zɔɔz nico keete ween moneec. Gɔɔn mã uvurutit oto oginɛ, ma aryek bɔlɔk ci colai, kaga izi ŋinti ka kiiyai lɔɔlɔ.
41013029	Zin buk mã acinu libɛn nico, agaac niiga kizɛ naana ajɔn ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka kiiya.
41013030	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ɔl ogɛnɛ katin ole ci arogi inoko o alaŋ adaai zɛɛ ma acin libɛn nico ŋaati iinanɛ.
41013031	Tammu taden kibeen tɔdɔ katin adicai, maje zɔɔz onane abil kɛlɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
41013032	Akɔm eet ci aga iiten ci katin iinanɛ kaala nici o. Buk toonnyawa o Joowo alaŋ aga. Naana alya Ŋɛɛrti Joowo alaŋ buk kaga. Bar aga baaba doon.
41013033	Ebeyit zin eleeti eeci alaŋ agayu iiten nice aku tiŋa.
41013034	Atobɔ zɔɔz nici kibeen zɔɔz o eet o ɛɛrɔn o. Mazi ka kɛɛrɔn, aricanek niini gabara ogin zɔɔz ci ka kuzuuti kɔrɔk. Ma anyek gɔɔn gabaren co liŋliŋɔn cin doon. Ma aricanek buk niini eet o abɛk araan ka kɛbɛk araan juruŋ.
41013035	Egenyit zin! Iziti vililɛ, eeci alaŋ agayaŋ niiga aneet kakun tiŋa. Karabɔŋ kakun yomana, karabɔŋ een baalin kɛŋa, karabɔŋ een ŋaati amamani tammu, karabɔŋ een ŋeere.
41013036	Zin mã kakunakuŋ boyoŋyoŋ, abon kajowanuŋ eeginu vililɛ calaŋ ooginu.
41013037	Ma gi ci kaduwakuŋ igeet noko, kaduwai buk ɔl dook. Kiziti vililɛ.”
41014001	Inoko eelit iinya raman ci ka kulutɔi ɔl ka kadakti dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt. Buk iiteni nici iiten o gɔɔn adayi niigi ḏɔkɛn calaŋ amokcar. Orooŋit ni alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto gɔl ci ka kagamti Yesu ka kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak kɔkɔm eet ci aga.
41014002	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati kagɔɔni nɔkɔ iitene ci aadanɛ ɔl vardaŋinɛt o, eeci koca ayoket ɔl.”
41014003	Maje Yesu aavi kuture o kazi Bezani adake ole o Saiman baal anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ e. Mazi ŋaan adake nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa oman anyaa ketezewoc ci anyak karacoc o kazi narat ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Ma alip ŋaa nici ketezewoc inyaa, ma aḏuutɛkɛ niini Yesu karacoc nico ɔɔ.
41014004	Bar ŋinaante otoborit ɔl ogɛn nɔŋ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo aminaŋi laadun karacoc gaga naa?
41014005	Abon waan ataalinɛ karacoc nico ka kojowa guruc ci meelik ka kanyek ɔl ci amaat.” Ozoozit ni niigi ŋaa nico ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ alyaan.
41014006	Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Amilanu ŋaa nico zɔɔza gaga naa? Otoŋit nɔɔnɔ. Agoonekan niini aneet gi ci abon.
41014007	Aromenu niiga kibeen ɔl ci amaat o ŋina. Mã arooŋnyu itiritit nɔɔgɔ, ŋaan atiritu, maje naana alaŋaan bodo kaavɛ ŋaatunooŋ been nɛɛn.
41014008	Ma ŋaa nici agɔɔn gi ci anim niini kutugu. Aḏuutekan niini aneet karacoc o ka kidimdiman dawiin onan ma ŋaan kadaak o.
41014009	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, tiŋeere loocowe o uuwayi ɔl kaviyak o Joowo dook, aduwa buk ɔl gi ci abon agɔɔn ŋaa nicini noko, ma aada ɔl nɔɔnɔ giye nico.”
41014010	Ɔtɔɔ ni Judaz Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram ook alaate o adikir ceeze o Joowo ka kook kuduwak nɔɔgɔ gɔl ci agami niigi Yesu.
41014011	Mazi avɔ azii niigi gi nico, ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã aduwaket gɔl ci kagamnya Yesu, kanyin koca guruc.” Orooŋun ni Judaz gɔl ci ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
41014012	Ma iitene o oowu iinyaye o gɔɔn adayi ɔl o Juz ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, otodoŋit niigi nyɔɔ ci ka kaadai vardaŋinɛt. Ma ajin nuyawa Yesu anek nɛ, “Koota yo ŋaaḏaŋ ka koota kidimdimanta dayiin ci kaadanɛ vardaŋinɛt?”
41014013	Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ram, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ Jerusalɛma. Avɔ arumonu tedec ŋinaante kibeen eet ci anyak maam ija. Oneec zin nɔɔnɔ.
41014014	Mazi akɔ arum ɛɛti ci anuyu noko kɔrɔk, enektek eet ci korgu o nɛ, Anekin gayoiti nɛ, Abil ceez ci ka koota kadakta ki nuyak ogan dayiin o kaadanɛ vardaŋinɛt ŋaaḏaŋ?
41014015	Ŋinaante ŋaan ayelekuŋ niini ceez ci ɛɛnyci gɔn tadena ci anyak kaal dook o karɔɔŋ naaga kadakti dayiin. Ɔɔtɔ zin utuguz dayiin cigaac ŋinaante.”
41014016	Ma iŋaaz nuyawa avɔ Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ didi ajowa kaal dook e ona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e. Ma adimdiman niigi dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt.
41014017	Ma yomana ivita Yesu kibeen nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram ɔɔtɔ ŋaa ona agooninɛ dayiin e.
41014018	Mazi avɔ adake, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ igeet ɛlɛ ci kazɔlɔ noko.”
41014019	Ma abaaban nuyawa gi nico zinzeetinɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek gɔɔn ceeni Yesu nɛ, “Ci aduwa o aneeta gi? Aneeta gi?”
41014020	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ igeet ci eeginu amɔtɔ ram kazɔlɔ kodooce codoi noko akɔ tiŋeere ataalinan aneet.
41014021	Mazin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kadaai eo aduwan waragɛ o Joowo laadun. Bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci ataalinan aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaatɛ o. Maya da bar niini ŋaati alaŋ aritan been nɛɛn.”
41014022	Mazi ŋaan adake niigi nɔkɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏokoc nico, ma aŋerek nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Adayit. Nicini ɛlɛ onan nɛɛn.”
41014023	Bodo adoma diic ci anyak nyaan, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kowodit.
41014024	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Nicigi biye ogan aḏuuti ka kojokta ɔl ci meel bonat. Ma biyeta nici idica terkediin baal aterkedek Jooi ɔl ogin aŋɛra niini e.
41014025	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo kawudi nyaan nico nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kakɔ kawudi nyaan ci colai baliinte o Joowo.”
41014026	Ebenit ni niigi enico beniin ci Joowo, ma awɔ avɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
41014027	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Niiga dook aviryu tedec otoŋteyaŋ looc. Eeci azi Jooi waragewe onin nɛ, Karui tiŋeere eet o towawiinto kazaantɛ ɛɛzana.
41014028	Zin tiŋeere mã kitiŋa naana daayiza, kakɔ Galiliya ɔɔwa ŋaatunooŋ. Ŋaan zin kavɔ karumɔ ki igeet ŋinaante.”
41014029	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mayo nuun avir ɔl dook, alaŋ naana kavir ŋaatun kotoŋeyin looc been nɛɛn.”
41014030	Ma anek Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnye tija zɛɛ been lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci lak ram.”
41014031	Maje bar Pitɔr aduv ɔrɔɔt azi nɛ, “Mayo nuun ka kadaayit ki ineet, alaŋ bai kadaŋnye nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.” Ma aduwa buk nuyawa dook zɔɔz nico.
41014032	Mazi avunak niigi ŋino kazi Gezemani, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Aavtiz ŋina. Kakɔ rak naana kaŋaryɛ ŋaate.”
41014033	Ma akɔyi niini Pitɔr ki Jemis ki Jɔn. Ma akunak nɔɔnɔ inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
41014034	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kanyei naana ziniza inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt ci ajonini daayizi. Aavtiz zin niiga ŋina ebeyit eleeti ŋaryiinta.”
41014035	Ma iicak niini kidicilim, ma abayek ɛlɛ looc, ma ajin Jook ka kozooti nɔɔnɔ calaŋ apirna daayiza.
41014036	Ma ajin Jook azi nɛ, “Baaba, aboke kaala dook ŋaatun. Nyɛyi zin piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko ŋaatan. Bar zin tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina, alaŋ een eo karɔɔŋɛ naana.”
41014037	Mazi abada ŋaryiinta, amada nuyak ween iiyu e oogin. Ma anek niini Pitɔr nɛ, “Saiman, ooginu naa? Akɔmnekuŋ ŋaati abeyinu ŋaryiinta ziit codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ?
41014038	Iziti vililɛ. Aŋaruyɔ ka calaŋ acinanuŋ Loryen zinzeeti zɛɛ ma agoonu oŋɛ. Eeci zinzeeti ugooc arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon, maje bar eleeti cugooc o alaŋ anyak dɔyiz.”
41014039	Bodo amiiri niini, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ aduwa zɔɔz we ɛlɛ.
41014040	Mazi abadaak nuyak, amada nɔɔgɔ oogin bodo, eeci adoŋ niigi ɔrɔɔt. Mazi iiŋka niini nɔɔgɔ, alaŋ aga niigi gi ci ka kuduktak nɔɔnɔ.
41014041	Ma akɔ bodo ŋaryiin zɛɛ mazi abada ŋaryiinta eceen lak iiyu o, amada nuyak bodo oogin. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan dim ooginu ayubuzu nɔkɔ? Odot zin. Iiya ziiti o ka kipirai. Inoko kanyozozeya naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ɔl o oŋenu.
41014042	Itiŋgaz. Kɔtɔɔz. Icinit di, eet o ka kataaloyan nica izi ajɔn.”
41014043	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, urum Judaz Iskariyot looc. Ɔrkɔra niini ki kɔlɛ ci anyak kabazwa ci wuntik kibeen kɛɛn ceen ŋolonɛt. Ma ɔl nicoko itoona alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo ki ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o baayizo titiny.
41014044	Maje Judaz uyene uduwak ɔl nicoko gi ci anek nɛ, “Ɛɛti ci kakɔ ŋaatin, ma kacoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc zaawinta o, eet ci arooŋnyu o nɛɛn. Agamit nɔɔnɔ, ma abeku juruŋ ka calaŋ avir ŋaatunooŋ.”
41014045	Iiya ni Judaz, ma akɔ ŋaati Yesu, ma azaa niini Yesu azi nɛ, “Gayoi.” Ma acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc.
41014046	Ma avu ɔl ci ona ɔrkɔra ki nɔɔnɔ o, ma agam Yesu.
41014047	Ovoca ni ɛɛti codoi ole o aavtiz ŋinaante kabaz tibila, ma aruk gabaren ci alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat, por.
41014048	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma avunakaŋ kabazwani ki ŋolonɛtɛ kiyo avunaku eet ceen agoryai o naa?
41014049	Tup nɔkɔ gɔɔn karomɛ ki igeet ceeze o Joowo adikir ŋaati kadɛmzinɛ, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ niiga aneet. Bar zin inoko gi o aduwa waragɛ o Joowo baale didi ibil tɔ.”
41014050	Zin ivirit nuyawa dook otoŋtek Yesu doon looc.
41014051	Ma ano logoti codoi Yesu. Maje logoti nici amalik rum codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Mazi arɔɔŋ kagamit ɔl nɔɔnɔ,
41014052	bar ibica niini nɔɔgɔ kodotek rum cin malkinto o looc, ma adɔkɔny ŋaḏinyiny nɔkɔ.
41014053	Ma avɔyi ɔl Yesu korge o alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo. Ma alotai alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto ki ɔl o baayizo titiny.
41014054	Maje Pitɔr ano Yesu rɛɛna, ma akɔ kaluwawe o kɔrɔk o alaan o adikir. Ma akɔ aavɛ goo aromɛ niini kibeen ɔl o abɛk kɔrɔk o alaano.
41014055	Ma ŋinaante odomta alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o roonnyo dook orooŋit bacok ci aduwa zɔɔz ci gɛr akati Yesu ka kapaktɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz. Bar akɔm bacok ci ajowa niigi aduwa gi ci alɛɛma ci akati Yesu, eeci ɔl ci meelik aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akani niini nɔɔnɔ, bar molokwana cigeec o alaŋ atobɔ.
41014057	Gɔɔn iŋaaz ɔl ogɛnɛ jena, ma aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akatni Yesu azi nɛ, “Kaziikna iiten baale nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Kooyoi iiten oma ceez ci Joowo baal ɛɛnyca ɔl ci deer noko. Ma bodo kɛɛnyca naana oma iinyaye ceen iiyu nɔkɔ calaŋ ɛɛti ci deer anim kɛtɛɛnya.”
41014059	Buk bodo molokwana ci ɔl nicoko o alaŋ atobɔ.
41014060	Itiŋa ni alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo, ma ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Akɔm dim niina gi ci abariz kaale ci aduwa ɔl nicigi noko?”
41014061	Maje Yesu ajaki, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz. Bodo ajin alaani nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina Kiristo ween Ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn?”
41014062	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneet nɛɛn. Iiten oma acinaŋ aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kaavɛ libire o azo o Jook o Adɔi, ma ŋaan acinaŋ katin niiga aneet ŋaati kakunɛ diizwani tammu tadena.”
41014063	Enico ɛrɛɛc alaani nici rum onin maany bornɛt nɔŋa, ma azi nɛ, “Alaŋaan bodo karɔɔŋ bacok ci ka kuduktayet gi ci gɛr agɔɔn ɛɛti nici.
41014064	Inoko iziiktu niiga momoz cin amomozi niini Jook o. Mayo zin inoko apayeku niiga nɔɔnɔ naa?” Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Aganɔ niini kibeen daayiz.”
41014065	Ma oortek ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ nɔɔnɔ amot, maje ɔl ogɛnɛ abuŋ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ ruma, ma aruk, ma bodo ajin anek nɛ, “Ɔl cigaŋ ci arukin o?” Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl o beyiinto, ma aruk niigi buk nɔɔnɔ.
41014066	Maje Pitɔr ŋaan aavi kaluwawa nɔkɔ. Iiya ni dole ci aliŋliŋonek alaan o adikir.
41014067	Mazi acin Pitɔr ŋaati aavɛ goo noko, ɛgɛlɛm niini nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma anek nɛ, “Orkoryu ri buk gɔɔn niina kibeen Yesu ci Nazarɛt noko.”
41014068	Bar adaŋnyi niini azi nɛ, “Alaŋ kazii zɔɔz ci aduwa o.” Ma adun niini akɔ abil araan tatoga. Taman nɔkɔ ɔrɔk toloci.
41014069	Mazi acin dole bodo Pitɔr, uduwak ɔl ci aavtiz ŋinaante enek nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici nuyai ci Yesu.”
41014070	Bar Pitɔr adaŋnyi bodo. Ŋintimiliny enektek ɔl ci aavtiz ŋinaante o Pitɔr nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt niina een nuyai ci Yesu, eeci een buk niina eet ci Galili.”
41014071	Enico uduwa Pitɔr ŋaati itooni Jook gi ci azi nɛ, “Kaduwa naana gi ci kaleem. Alaŋ kaga eet ci aduwanu o. Mã kalabanuŋ, adakan koca Jooi.”
41014072	Taman nɔkɔ ɔrɔk toloci bodo, ma aada Pitɔr zɔɔz baal aduwak Yesu nɔɔnɔ baal anek nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere niina aneet lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci lak ram e.” Mazi aada niini zɔɔz nico, utulu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
41015001	Ma ŋeere olotai alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo taman kibeen ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o baayizo titiny, ma avu abaaban niigi dook gi ci ka kutuguzek Yesu. Acabit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma avɔyi alaane o kazi Pailat. Niini eet ci ɔl o Rom, ma abal Judiya.
41015002	Ma ajin Pailat Yesu anek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o ɔl o Juz nɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
41015003	Bodo alaata o ceez o Joowo aduwa kaal ci gɛr meelik akati Yesu.
41015004	Ma ajin Pailat bodo Yesu anek nɛ, “Akɔm dim gi ci abariz? Alaŋ azii kaal ci gɛr akanin ineet aduwa ɔl noko dook?”
41015005	Buk enico ɔkɔm Yesu gi ci abariz. Makacin abaraŋɛ Pailat ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt.
41015006	Maje waanice gɔɔn ma een iiten o adayi ɔl o Juz dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt, aboroc Pailat eet codoi ole o acabje ci tɛ arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ koborocai.
41015007	Ma enice anyak eet ci kazi Barabas ci acabje kibeen gɔnɔgi oogi giye ci aborni niigi akuma, ma ayɔwɔ ki takirnya zɛɛ makacin uruyit niigi ɔl koogi kadaayitɔ.
41015008	Olotai ni kɔlɛ, ma avu ajin Pailat ka koborcak niini nɔɔgɔ eet oma eonin gɔɔn agɔɔni laadun iinyaye o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl vardaŋinɛt.
41015009	Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ alaan o Juz?”
41015010	Maje Pailat aga niini alaata o ceez o Joowo anyaa Yesu giye ci olla amadiyi niigi nɔɔnɔ gaga nɔkɔ.
41015011	Bar alaata o ceez o Joowo otoŋomtek kɔlɛ dook ka kijinit Pailat kotoŋ Yesu, ka koborocak nɔɔgɔ Barabas.
41015012	Ma ajin bodo Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma eet ci awuyu kizi alaan ci ɔl o Juz o arooŋnyaŋ kutuguwek nɔɔnɔ naa?”
41015013	Ma ɛgɛrɛny niigi bodo anɔ nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec.”
41015014	Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Naa? Agɔɔn niini gi ci gɛr jaŋ?” Bar enico agɛrɛny niigi ɔrɔɔt kujuk we azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec.”
41015015	Mazin giye o arɔɔŋi Pailat kɔlɛ kataltɔi, ɔɔgak niini nɔɔgɔ Barabas. Ma anyek Yesu kuruyit takirnya nyaboyɛn zɛɛ ma vurta anyek nɔɔnɔ takirnya kɔɔt kotodeec kadaak keete ween talakec.
41015016	Ma ayit takirnya Yesu avɔyi ŋaa uneeŋ abaayi kaluwawe o kɔrɔk o Pailat. Ma alotai niigi dook.
41015017	Ma avu aborcɛkɛ Yesu rum ci meeri, ma agɔɔna nyagirgir ceen bila, ma arekɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
41015018	Ma azaa niigi nɔɔnɔ momozɛnta anek nɛ, “Abona alaan o ɔl o Juz. Rok bai nɔkɔ kodot.”
41015019	Ma anyɔnɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati aruyi ɔɔ keete ci miliny, ma oortek amot, ma bodo akani kozoŋti looc adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ momozɛnta.
41015020	Mazi odotiz niigi momozente nico, uburuca ŋaatin rum ona arikɛ nɔɔnɔ e, ma aborcɛkɛ rumanɛ ogin laadun. Ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ kutur bitaala ka kɔɔt kotodeec keete ween talakec.
41015021	Ma gɔla urumtɔ niigi kibeen eet ci kazi Saiman ci looc o kazi Sariin. Niini baati Alikzandar ki Ruvas. Mazi anowa niini gɔl akunak Jerusalɛm, agamit takirnya nɔɔnɔ, ma adaŋek kitik kɛɛt ween talakec o ka kɔɔt kotodoyi niigi Yesu.
41015022	Ma anyaak niigi Yesu ŋinti kazi Golgoza o akati kɛŋ cinɛ amɛn ci oowu.
41015023	Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ nyaan ci acanɔ kibeen agɛrɔ o kazi mir, ma abor Yesu ŋaati awudi.
41015024	Otodooc ni niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec. Ma aar niigi maadico ci ka kiitazakɛ gɔɔn eet co rum cinɛ rumanene o Yesu.
41015025	Adɔdɔ niigi nɔɔnɔ ziiye ween tɔrkɔc ŋeere.
