42010041	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Marta, Marta. Kacinin ineet abaaban kaal ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.
42010042	Bar zin anyak gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci titiny. Ojowa zin bar Meri gi ci titiny noko, ma akɔm bodo eet oma ci ka kaama nɔɔnɔ.”
42011001	Ma iitene oman ook Yesu ŋaryiin ŋaaman. Mazi akɔ odotiz ŋaryiinta, enek ɛɛti codoi nuyawe ogin nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, demezeyet di buk ageeta ŋaryiin ci ka gɔɔn kaŋaruyoya kiyo baale adɛmɛz Jɔn o oonyi nuyak ogin e.”
42011002	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã aŋaryinu, iziti nɛ, Baatinaaŋ o aavɛ tamma, anyek ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit zaar ugun. Anyek baliin unun kiiya.
42011003	Nyet gɔɔn iinya dook dayiin o karooŋnya.
42011004	Toŋ baciinok ogaacak, kiyo kuuŋna kaal o abac ɔl ŋaatinaaŋ o. Má anyet ageet kicinawet Loryenti.”
42011005	Enek ni bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã akunak eet oma ŋaatunooŋ kernoiti, ma akɔm dayiin ɔlɔ, ma akɔ ole ci laŋotin baalin kɛŋa ka kook kijin nɔɔnɔ kenek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Nyan di ḏɔkɛn ceen iiyu.
42011006	Kanyei eet ceen laŋo ci akunakan keronnya ona noko, ma akɔmnan dayiin ci kanyei ka kanyek.
42011007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ laŋotinɛ ci ceeza o anek nɛ, Má amilanan. Onyoogɛ ceez, ma buk koota ki dɔl ooŋnyak. Alaŋaan bodo kanim kitiŋa ka kook kanyin gi ci arooŋ o.”
42011008	Enek ni Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Anycaŋ zin kuduwayuŋ. Yo nuun ma alaŋ iŋaaz niini ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ ḏɔkɛn giye o ɛɛnɛ laŋotin, akɔ nuun zɛɛ iŋaaz, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ ḏɔkɛn ci ona arɔɔŋ o giye o alaŋ anyayi niini alyaan, ma amɛna ilalɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ.
42011009	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ijintɔ, ŋaan anyononekuŋ. Ɔrɔɔŋtɔ, ŋaan ajowanu. Ɛtɛrɛnit karogi, ŋaan akolonekuŋ.
42011010	Eeci ɛɛti ci ajine, anyononek. Ma ɛɛti ci arooŋnyi, ajowa. Maje ɛɛti ci atɛrɛn karogi, akolonek nɔɔnɔ.
42011011	Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci mã ajin ŋɛɛrin kulugit, bar anyek kowat?
42011012	Karabɔŋ ajin niini nɔɔnɔ iira, ma bar anyek kitɔ?
42011013	Mayo nuun eeginu niiga gɛrzɛ o, agayu kaal o abon anyeku dɔl ugoocok nɔkɔ. Bar zin baatina o aavi tamma abon niini ɔrɔɔt kujukuŋ igeet, ma anyek niini Vɔŋiz onin ɔl o ajin nɔɔnɔ dook.”
42011014	Ma iitene oman aara Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento alagony eet oma aat. Mazi aduŋna miniŋiti nici ɔzɔɔz ɛɛti nici bodo labak, ma abiir ɔl dook ooti tɛt.
42011015	Ma bar anɔ ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ nɛ, “Anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz ci aaranɛ miniŋ noko alaani o loryenu kazi Baalzibol.”
42011016	Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ arɔɔŋ kicinta Yesu. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ kutugu gi ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ci aku tammu tadena.
42011017	Maje Yesu aga baabaninok cigeec o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci looc codoi nɔkɔ kiziti boryok, ma ɔɔrɔ niigi maany, uulali lɔɔci nici. Buk mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci tatok codoi, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, danydany tatok nici.
42011018	Zin buk koca mã aŋɛrɔ baliin o Loryento, abil koca ku? Aziyu inoko niiga nɛ, Kaara naana miniŋ ci Loryento o dɔyize ci anyan Loryenti.
42011019	Mazi abil nɔkɔ, ma ɔl ugooc gɔɔn buk aara miniŋ o Loryento o, ajowa niigi dɔyiz nico naa? Anycek di nɔɔgɔ ɛlɛ kabarizteyuŋ igeet zɔɔz nico.
42011020	Bar zin mã kaara naana miniŋ ci Loryento o dɔyize o Joowo, iiyayuŋ zin ri koca igeet baliin o Joowo.
42011021	Gɔɔn mã ooŋek ɛɛti ceen ole kɔrɔk cin dilanyai, ɛɛl kaala ci kɔrɔk cin o juruŋ kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr akunak.
42011022	Mazi akunak nɔɔnɔ ɛɛti oman ci adɔi kujuk nɔɔnɔ, ma iiya omogun nɔɔnɔ, aama nɔɔnɔ dilanya cigin gɔɔn abɛyi ɛlɛ o dook, ma akɔ aŋerek kaal ci ona aama nɔɔnɔ o dook ɔl ogin.
42011023	Mazin ɛɛti calaŋ aavi libire can, amarninan niini aneet. Buk ɛɛti calaŋ atiritan niini aneet kolota aza ogan, azaan niini nɔɔgɔ.
42011024	Zin gɔɔn ma aduŋna miniŋiti o Loryento eete oman, awɔ akɔ balala ŋaati adɔyi akɔm maam ka kook kɔrɔɔŋ ŋinti ayubzi ŋinaante. Mazi alaŋ ajowa ŋinti ayubzi ŋinaante, anek ɛlɛ maany nɛ, Nyan kimiire kook eete baal kooŋnei looc e.
42011025	Mazi abada, aku ajowa eet nico abil kiyo ceez o aviilyai kitiliza, ma akɔm ririny kɛŋa o.
42011026	Ma adun bodo niini akɔ bitaala, ma akɔ anyaa miniŋ ci Loryento oogi ceen torgɛrɛm ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt bar kujukit nɔɔnɔ, ma avu abaak eete nico. Ma uulali ɛɛti nici kizi gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk baale.”
42011027	Mazi ŋaan aduwa Yesu kaal nicoko nɔkɔ, ɛgɛrɛny ŋaa oman kɔlɛ kɔrgɛna ŋina enek Yesu nɛ, “Amayuk bai Jooi momu o yaatun baal anyakin ineet e kibeen keezin ogin baal iroktanin ineet e.”
42011028	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm. Amayuk bar Jooi ɔl o azii zɔɔz onin, ma azooni.”
42011029	Mazi ŋaan aliya kɔlɛ Yesu nɔkɔ, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɛrzɛ ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Arɔɔŋ niigi kutuguwek naana nɔɔgɔ gi ci atɛɛt biye ka kagayan kakun Joowa. Akɔm zin gi oma ci kagoonei nɔɔgɔ been nɛɛn. Dooke coma kagoonei nɔɔgɔ gi ci abil kiyo baal agoononek nyakaŋan o kazi Jona.
42011030	Zin kiyo buk baale Jona een bayen ci ɔl o Ninava e, buk tiŋeere naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan keen bayen ci ayelzonek ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko.
42011031	Tiŋeere iitene ci roonnyo e iŋaaz ŋaa ween alaan baal agam looc o akɔ ki tɛnɛt e, ma akɔlak ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko rooni giye baal itiŋawi niini, ma awɔyi ŋinti wun ka kook kicin gɛnyiz o alaan o kazi Solomon e. Bar zin inoko ŋina aromenu niiga ki eet ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk Solomon.
42011032	Tiŋeere buk iitene ci roonnyo e iŋaaz ɔl o Ninava, ma akɔlak ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko rooni Joowo, eeci baale niigi iziiyit uuwayi o Jona, ma abadit mony baciinowe ugeec. Bar zin inoko niiga ŋina aromenu ki eet ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk Jona.”
42011033	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Akɔm gɔɔn laadun eet ci atokol lamba, ma arek ŋinti abiilɛnɛ. Bar arek ceez kɔrgɛn ka kataraan looc ka kicintɔi ɔl ci avunak ceez o juruŋ.
42011034	Ma kɛbɛrɛ tokolec ci alyo gi. Mã abon kɛbɛrɛ cugune o, aavi buk ɛlɛ cune o dook vooritina. Mazi een ruben, buk ɛlɛ cune o dook aavi muur.
42011035	Egenyit zin ɔrɔɔt. Gɛrzɛ ŋaan ookci vooritin ci aavi eleetine cugooc o kizi muur.
42011036	Mã adaala ɛlɛ cun o dook vooritin kɔkɔm ŋinti miliny aavi muura, atokoli koca ɛlɛ cune o dook juruŋ kiyo gɔɔn ataranet lamba vooritine onin o.”
42011037	Mazi odotiz Yesu zɔɔza, otowo ɛɛti ceen Pariciwen nɔɔnɔ ka kook kadaktɔ kibeen nɔɔnɔ ɔlɔ. Ook ni Yesu aavu loota ɔlɔ ɛrɛwa dayiin calaŋ oony azɛɛn.
42011038	Mazi akɔ acin ɛɛti ceen Pariciwen noko Yesu adaki iŋaan kotoony azɛɛn, ibiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42011039	Enek ni Manyi Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn niiga ɔl ci Parici o uunyu diicit kibeen kodoocɛ ugooc bawuci doon, maje bar igeet ɛlɛ gɛrzɛtɛ zinzeeti cugoocok o eecitɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42011040	Eeginu niiga aliyak. Alaŋ agayu ɛlɛ bitaala kibeen ɛlɛ eecitɔ ɛɛnyca dook Jooi o?
42011041	Anycek zin gɔɔn ɔl o amaat gi ci tɛ olla anyaku, ka kitiliza kaala ugooc dook.
42011042	Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole igeet ɔl o Parici. Gɔɔn niiga aruweku Jook lɛlɛn codoi lelene ween amɔtɔ yo nuun een kaale o cɛlbɛz labak kiyo abutɛna kibeen ŋooru o kibeen buk kaal o cɛlbɛz mana dook. Ma bar apezu ŋaati agoonu kaal keelit tɔp, ma buk apezu reezinɛt o Joowo. Abon zin waan buk agoonu kaal nicoko.
42011043	Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole igeet ɔl o Parici. Eeci gɔɔn areezu niiga ŋaati aavtiyu lecerene o titiny ceezine o lotento. Ma arooŋnyu buk kazaayuŋ ɔl igeet titinyɔnta golowɛ dook.
42011044	Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole, eeci eelnu niiga kiyo looknya o adawin ɔl o adaai, ma abuŋe loota calaŋ ɔl acin, ma avu arɔc niigi ŋaati awɔyi labak o.”
42011045	Ma anek ɛɛti codoi ole o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, zoozowe ci aduwa noko adomnyet ri buk ageeta.”
42011046	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt buk izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole igeet ɔl o ademzeku ɔl lotinok. Anyeku gɔɔn niiga ɔl kaal ci adiŋdiŋ kitikit, ma alaŋ buk niiga alya eleetine ugooc atiritu nɔɔgɔ kaale ci adiŋdiŋ anyak niigi o.
42011047	Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole igeet ɔl o ademzeku ɔl lotinok. Adimanu gɔɔn niiga looknya o nyakaŋanɛt baal adaayitɔ e kitiliza bodo. Maje nyakaŋanɛt nicoko ɛlɛ jijitugooc nɛɛn o aruk nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ.
42011048	Mazin buk niiga alya eyelizawu gi o areezu kaal baal agɔɔn jijitugooc giye baal aruyi niigi nyakaŋanɛt kadaayitɔ e, maje bodo niiga inoko eenyceku nɔɔgɔ looknya.
42011049	Ma zin giye nico azi Jooi gɛnyize onin nɛ, Kitoonei tiŋeere nɔɔgɔ nyakaŋanɛt ki toonnyak nɔkɔ, ma avɔ aruk niigi oogi ŋaatineeŋ kadaayitɔ, maje coko agit.
42011050	Akeebonek zin tiŋeere ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko biyeta o nyakaŋanetu baal aḏuuti ŋinbaal ɛɛnycan lɔɔci e zɛɛ been inoko o.
42011051	Akanai biyete o Abel zɛɛ been biye o Zakeriya baal amony ɔl nɔɔnɔ ceeza tɔ ŋaao aŋɛrɔn ŋino taabinto been ŋino Joowo alile e. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akeebonek ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko biyeta ci ɔl nicoko dook.
42011052	Izi nɔŋa cugoocok wole igeet ɔl o ademzeku ɔl lotinok. Anyozeyuŋ gɛnyizi o Joowo igeet, ma bar alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga alya agamta, ma buk araŋraŋanu ɔl o arɔɔŋ kagaac gɔl o Joowo calaŋ avu.”
42011053	Mazi odotiz Yesu kaale nicoko, odomta ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Joowo otoŋomit nɔɔnɔ gɛrzɛ. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal ci meel gɛr, eeci arɔɔŋ niigi kalabta nɔɔnɔ ka mã aduwa zɔɔz ci gɛr ka kojokta gɔl ci agami.
42012001	Ma enice ɛlɛ olotak kɔlɛ ci meel gɛr Yesu kook zɛɛ ma ajukɔ. Ma arayek Yesu nuyak ogin gi ci anek nɛ, “Edeya eleeti ole o Parici, eeci gɔɔn niigi alaba ɔl giye o anyekɛ eleeti kizi ɔl ci abon, maje ŋaato gɛrzɛ.
42012002	Ma kaala o inoko abuŋe dook katin akɔlyai. Buk kaala o inoko aŋɔmtɛ dook katin ayelzai kiziiktɛ.
42012003	Ma zin kaala o aduwanu niiga muura katin aziiŋnɛ vooritina. Buk kaala o aŋomteku niiga ɔl ceezinɛ eecitɔ katin abɔryai ɔl dook kebereca.”
42012004	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Laŋotigan, má aŋolinu ɔl o arukuŋ adaayit, ma bar vurte ci adaaktu, ɔkɔma bodo gi oma ci agɔɔn.
42012005	Bar zin kilotuŋ igeet. Otoŋole Jook o aruk ɔl kadaayitɔ, ma bodo vurta anyak dɔyiz ci ajukɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ goo o abil been nɛɛn. Kaduwakuŋ igeet, abon aŋolinu nɔɔnɔ doon.
42012006	Kaga naaga kibaali ceen zoot kaal ci labak, ma anim ɛɛti kataala ci een tur ŋaatineeŋ giricete ceen ram nɔkɔ. Ma akɔm zoote nicoko codoi ṯɔr ŋaatineeŋ ci areyek Jook.
42012007	Má zin anyaku ŋoliin, eeci niiga adiŋdiŋnyu ŋume o Joowo ɔrɔɔt ujukit zoot ci meelik gɛr. Mayo nuun een im cugooc oowu noko ɛlɛ akɛɛp Jooi, ma aga dook.”
42012008	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ bodo nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci abɔra tuwɛn onin ɔl kebereca, tiŋeere buk naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kabɔra tuwɛn onin toonnyak o Joowo kebereca.
42012009	Maje ɛɛti ci adaŋnyan aneet ɔl kebereca, buk tiŋeere naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kadaŋ nɔɔnɔ toonnyak o Joowo kebereca.
42012010	Mã anyak eet ci azoozan aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto gɛrzɛ, aara Jooi ŋaatin oŋec nico labak. Mazi bar aduwak ɛɛti zɔɔz ci gɛr Vɔŋiz o Joowo, alaŋ Jooi aara ŋaatin oŋec nico been nɛɛn.”
42012011	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ bodo nɛ, “Mã akɔlakuŋ ɔl rooni, ma avoyuŋ ole o ka kɔɔt kapaktuŋ igeet ceezine o lotento, karabɔŋ een alaate o adikir akumawo, má anyaki ŋoliin giye ci akati zoozok ci ka abarzek niiga nɔɔgɔ.
42012012	Eeci Vɔŋizi o Joowo iiten nico ɛlɛ ayelzakuŋ igeet zoozok ci ka abarzek nɔɔgɔ.”
42012013	Ma anek ɛɛti oman kɔla tɔ Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, duwak da gɔtɔna ween abuu ka keŋereyan buk aneeta kaal o ooŋnaket baatinaaŋ.”
42012014	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet logoz, ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyan aneet dɔyiz ci ka keŋerekuŋ ineet ki gotonu kaal o?”
42012015	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ dook kɔla nɛ, “Egenyit zinzeeti appinzɛta, eeci rogɛti ween didi eete ci deer alaŋ abilna kaale ci meel arokzetu.”
42012016	Uduwak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ceen aroi ɛɛva mana ŋaati abon akuvkuv, ma abiir juruŋ.
42012017	Abaabanun ni niini doon gi ci azi nɛ, Mayo akɔmnan piimanɛ ci ka keteedek labi cigan noko o ka yo kutugu ku?
42012018	Ma vurta abaaban izi nɛ, Abon kooyoi piimanɛ ci miliny baal rɛɛn noko ka kɛtɛɛnya piimanɛ ci adikir ka keteedek labi, ma buk kiyaŋɛ kaal cigan noko dook.
42012019	Ka zin kenek ɛlɛ maany nɛ, Izɛ mɛr aroi. Anyawu kaalyan ci meel ɛɛl piimanɛn ci adicanɛ irkitok ci meel gɛr. Inoko zin yubuz, olla dawɔ, wodɛ. Anyek ziniz katalɔ.
42012020	Enewun ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ineet aliyai nico. Inoko tedec baaline nico niina adaai. Mazin yo tedec kaala cugune ɛɛnɛ aroi noko akati ŋɛnɛɛn?”
42012021	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Zin yabziin nici akati ɔl o gɔɔn adɛz kaal ci ka kizitɔi arɔk, maje bar ŋume o Jooi alaŋ eegin arɔk.”
42012022	Ma anek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Má iinonu dayiin ci ka orogti, karabɔŋ een rumanɛ ci ka uburucek.
42012023	Eeci rogɛti adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk dayiin. Mã anyin Jooi ineet rogɛt, anyin buk dayiin. Buk ɛlɛ adiŋdiŋ kujuk rumanɛ. Mã anyin Jooi ɛlɛ, anyin buk rumanɛ.
42012024	Icinit di walaaknya. Alaŋ gɔɔn niigi aḏowɛ, ma akɔm buk nɔɔgɔ labi ci ka keteedit. Alaŋ anyak niigi piimanɛ ci ka kiyaŋti labi. Bar olla adayiz nɔɔgɔ Jooi doon. Bar zin niiga eeginu titinyɛ ɔrɔɔt ujukit kibaali.
42012025	Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci anim kazaac rogɛt cin kizi wun kidicilim inonnya?
42012026	Mazin mã alaŋ animnyu utuguz gi ci miliny kiyo nici noko, anyeku zin zinzeeti kiinonit kaal oogi naa?
42012027	Icinit di koroboli o too. Alaŋ niigi aliŋliŋ, ma alaŋ bnk alolak eleeti rumanɛ. Kanekuŋ zin nɛ, Mayo nuun een alaan baal kazi Solomon e diŋdiŋonte onin, ŋaan kanyak rumanɛ ci alina kiyo gɔɔn koroboli o.
42012028	Jook zin nɛɛn o alinatan koroboli o too o aduŋna waanico, ma tiŋeere bar araabjai, ma atoozi gooya. Inoko zin ma alinatan Jooi nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ o, ma zin bar koca igeet o eeginu titinyɛ ujukit koroboli, alaŋ amalikuŋ niini igeet rumanɛn buk? Kidic zin igeet tuwɛn ɔrɔɔt.
42012029	Má zin gɔɔn iinonu kaal ci ka adayit, karabɔŋ een kaal ci ka owodit.
42012030	Eeci nici dook kaal o gɔɔn iinon ɔl o loocu alaŋ atuwe nɛɛn. Mazin baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena aga kaal o arooŋnyu niiga dook.
42012031	Bar zin rak ɔɔwa aryek zinzeeti baliin o Joowo doon, ŋaan kaala nici dook anyononekuŋ igeet buk.
42012032	Nuyak ogan, má anyaku ŋoliin gaga, eeci baatunooŋ o aavi tamma anyuŋ igeet baliin onin talniinta.
42012033	Inoko ɔɔtɔ ataaltɔi kaal ugooc anyaku dook, ka odomta guruc ci ataalanu o itiriti ɔl o amaat, ka ɔrɔɔŋtak niiga eleeti arɔkzɛt o abil kodot, iyaŋtek eleeti arɔkzɛt tammu tadena ŋaao ɛɛlni calaŋ akoloni. Eeci ŋinaante akɔm agoryai ci ka kɔgɔrɔz, ma akɔm buk zizaac ci ka kadayit.
42012034	Eeci ŋino iyaŋin arɔkzɛt unooŋ, ŋino buk aavtiyɛ zinzeeti ugooc nɛɛn.
42012035	Iziti vililɛ tup giye ci tɛ olla akunakuŋ igeet. Uburucek rumanɛ. Acapta tɔɔlit akatek katalanyit. Eelit kiyo gabara o arɛ alaan uneeŋ ka kabada keronnya o, ka ma aku niini, ma atɛrɛn karogi, akolek niigi nɔɔnɔ karogi enico ɛlɛ o.
42012037	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, atalnɛ koca niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaati akuni alaani uneeŋ, ma amada nɔɔgɔ vililɛ areyi calaŋ oogin. Awa koca niini nɔɔgɔ, ma anyek kaavtiyɔ loota, ma anyek dayiin.
42012038	Amayuwi zin niigi ŋaati amadan alaani uneeŋ nɔɔgɔ vililini, mayo nuun abada niini baalin kɛŋa karabɔŋ een ooŋtalizo.
42012039	Abon aadanu gi ce. Gɔɔn kizi gi ci aga ɛɛti ci korgu iiten ci ka kiiyakɛ agoryaiti kɔrɔk cin o, alaŋ koca ooŋnek kɔrɔk looc ka kiiya kook agoryaiti ceeza gorziin.
42012040	Iziti zin buk niiga vililɛ nɔkɔ, eeci iima naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto katorobanuŋ igeet calaŋ agawanu iiten ci kakunɛ.”
42012041	Ma anek Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, ma dim yabziin nici akanet ageeta doon, yo akati da buk ɔl dook?”
42012042	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Manyi Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko ŋaatun ŋɛnɛɛn ci een gabaren ci agɛny aliŋliŋ juruŋ o? Gabaren ci agɛny nɛɛn o aŋɛra alaani oninɛ nɔɔnɔ kizi gabaren ci adikir ceeze onin, ka keŋerek gabara o miliny dayiin ugeec juruŋ.
42012043	Amayuwi zin gabarɛnti nici ŋaati abadaan alaani oninɛ keronnya, ma amada nɔɔnɔ agɔɔn gi nico.
42012044	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, koca enico anyek alaani gabaren nico kagamek nɔɔnɔ kaal ogin dook ka kozooti.
42012045	Mazi bar abaaban niini gi ci azi nɛ, Amɔn rak tiŋeere alaani onane ŋinaante ŋinti rɛɛn calaŋ abada kataman, ma adoma agit gabara ci miliny ŋaatin o, ma adak dayiin dook niini doon, ma awodɛ ma abaaki.
42012046	Abada koca alaani cinɛ o iitene calaŋ niini agawan kuni cin o, ma aku aruk nɔɔnɔ, ma atɔɔk liŋliŋonte onin, ma apayek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin ci ɔl o alaŋ atuwe.
42012047	Ma gabarɛnti ci aga gi o arooŋek alaani oninɛ nɔɔnɔ kutugu, ma bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kizi vilil kutugu eo arɔɔŋ alaani oninɛ, arooki koca niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42012048	Maje gabarɛnti calaŋ aga gi ci arooŋek alaani oninɛ nɔɔnɔ kutugu, ma bar buk agɔɔn gi ci aganɔn niini ki rooyinɛt, arooki buk niini kidicilim. Ma ɛɛti ci anyonek nɔɔnɔ kaal ci meel, arooŋnyi buk ŋaatin kaal ci meel. Maje ɛɛti ci anyonek nɔɔnɔ kaal ci meel ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, arooŋnyi buk ŋaatin kaal ci meel ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42012049	Kakun zin naana o ka kiiya kakatek looc goo. Bar zin abon waan liŋliŋɔni nici inoko akatai odota.
42012050	Anyak piryakzɛt ci appe ɔrɔɔt akunakan aneet. Kanyonei zin tiŋeere naaga piryakzɛt nico nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kadica imin.
42012051	Bar bɔŋ niiga abaabanu kizik kanyaai naana looc ganɔn? Alaŋ zin kanyaai looc ganɔn, bar kanyaai looc ŋeriin.
42012052	Akatai zin bar inoko o ɛlɛ, ma een ɔl ceeza tur, aŋɛrɔ ceen iiyu amarnin gɔnɔgi ceen ram o. Adoma ceen ram o amarnin gɔnɔgi ceen iiyu o.
42012053	Maje gɔɔn ɛɛti tiŋeere amarnin ŋɛɛrin. Buk logoti amarnin baatin. Maje ŋaa tiŋeere amarnin bɛɛnyin. Buk dole amarnin yaatin. Maje inyik tiŋeere amarnin alawan onin. Buk alawani amarnin inyik.”
42012054	Ma anek Yesu bodo ɔl nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã acinu diizoc libire ci jenu o anonu nɛ, Atiil tedec tammu. Ma didi atiil.
42012055	Buk mã akɔla ŋɔɔti ci libir ci jenu o, anonu nɛ, Abur tiŋeere lɔɔci. Ma didi abur.
42012056	Izitu mɛr niiga ɔl ci abuuku eleeti. Acinu gɔɔn niiga looc kibeen tammu taden, ma aganeku ŋaati aduwanu keŋti ci kaal cigeec. Mazin buk alaŋ agayu keŋti ci kaal ci agooni inoko o naa?
42012057	Alaŋ zin aŋɛraku eleeti kaal ci abon ka utuguz naa?
42012058	Mã anyak eet ci akɔlakin rooni, abon akɔ ŋaatin ka ɔɔt idica ki nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nico iŋaan urumit alaan o roonnyo. Gɛrzɛ ŋaan apayekin alaani ineet cabiin, ma avɔ ajukekin takirnya sijin.
42012059	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet. alaŋ koca aduŋna niina ŋinaante kataman, ma aavɛ nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma arui guruc o apawonekin ineet dook.”
42013001	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ ivita uduktak ɔl ogɛn Yesu gi ci akati ɔl o Galili baal aruk alaani o kazi Pailat kadaayitɔ iitene baal ataabi niigi Jook e.
42013002	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Yo abaabanu niiga aniyu nɛ, Adaai ɔl ci Galili neke o giye ci da anyayi niigi oŋɛ ɔrɔɔt kujukit ɔl ci Galili ŋaan arogi noko dook?
42013003	Akɔm kina! Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alaŋ niiga ateedinu oŋɛ ugooc, adaaŋnu buk tiŋeere niiga dook kiyo baale adaai niigi e.
42013004	Aada di buk zɔɔz ci ɔl ween amɔnki turge baal iinak nɔɔgɔ ceez ŋaao kazi Siloom, ma aruk nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ e. Abaabanu niigi kizik iinak baale nɔɔgɔ ceez kuruk kadaayitɔ o, eeci gɛrzɛ niigi doon kujukit ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma dook?
42013005	Akɔm kina! Bar zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma alaŋ ateedinu niiga oŋɛ ugooc, adaaŋnu buk koca tiŋeere niiga dook kiyo baale niigi e.”
42013006	Enico uduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Baale anyak ɛɛti oman kɛɛt ceen moneec mane cin. Ma iitene oman ook niini arɔɔŋ ka kook kodoca, mã anyak monɛn ci abiirna. Mazi akɔ arum kɛɛt, bar ajowa akɔm kɛbɛrɛ ci abiirna kina.
42013007	Enek ni niini eet o gɔɔn abeyek nɔɔnɔ mana nɛ, “Cin di! Kanyei irkitok iiyu ci gɔɔn kakunakɛ kɛɛt nico ka waan kiiya kodoca kɛbɛrɛ ci abiirna, ma bar akɔm ci kajowa kina. Inoko zin tɛɛdak looc, eeci olla ɛɛŋ mana gaga, ma buk uulal tɔdɔ ci ŋinti aavɛ niini o kizi gɛrzɛ.”
42013008	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti o abeyek nɔɔnɔ mana anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, toŋɔ rak di labak kidica irkit nico doon, ka kɔwɔlɔny tɔdɔ kocodek cɔlɔ coma akuvkuv.
42013009	Mã zin tɛ abiir irikite ci aku noko, abon ɔrɔɔt. Bar má alaŋ abiir, ŋaan zin koca enice atɛɛdai looc.”
42013010	Ma iitene oman ook Yesu ɛdɛmɛz ɔl ceeze o lotento iitene o yubzento een Sabit.
42013011	Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaa ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento alya ci anyek nɔɔnɔ kɔmɔɔr irkitok amɔnki turge. Makacin uduulun ŋaa karatot kogomgom calaŋ azɔlani kɔtɔɔ tɔp.
42013012	Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔnɔ, otowa, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ineeta ŋaa nico, urugu niina mɔɔrize cun noko.”
42013013	Ma ataadek nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn. Enico ɛlɛ ɔzɔlanɛ ŋaa karatot oninɛ ibil tɔp, ma anaat niini Jook ɔrɔɔt.
42013014	Mazi acin alaani o ceez o lotento gi nico, otobor nɔŋ, eeci arogoz Yesu ŋaa nico iitene ci yubzento een Sabit o. Ma azɔɔz niini anek ɔl nɛ, “Kanyak gɔɔn laadun naaga iinya tɔrkɔnɔm ci aganɔ ki liŋliŋɔn. Abon zin gɔɔn anyaanu niiga moorizok cugooc o iinyaye nicoko ŋaan avu arogzenu. Alaŋ abon ŋaati avunu iitene ceen Sabit o.”
42013015	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Manyi Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Izitu mɛr niiga ɔl ci abuuku looc. Inoko gɔɔn ŋaatunooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn calaŋ aboroc taŋ cin karabɔŋ een zigir cin ka kook kowodoz iitene ceen Sabit o?
42013016	Inoko ŋaa nici dole ci dɔl o Ibrayim buk, ma acap Loryenti nɔɔnɔ irkitok ceen amɔnki turge noko dook. Mayo zin gɛrzɛ ŋaati ɔɔgjanɛ niini iitene ceen Sabit noko?”
42013017	Mazi azi Yesu nɔkɔ, aamun ɔl o amarnin nɔɔnɔ dook alyaani. Maje ɔl ceegi dook atalnɛ kaale o abon agɔɔn niini ŋinaante dook.
42013018	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo baliin o Joowo atobɔ ki gitaz? Kayo kotobozek gi jaŋ?
42013019	Atobɔ zin kibeen keberec ci motoŋtoco aduŋna mana o. Ma iroktai zɛɛ makacin izi kɛɛt ci adikir ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ɛɛnyɛt kibaali ceezi kɛɛt nico otonɛ.”
42013020	Bodo ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo baliin o Joowo atobɔ ki gitaz? Kayo ka kotobozek gi jaŋ?
42013021	Atobɔ zin niini kibeen nyigit o telawu gɔɔn adɔŋca ŋaa jayitote ci miliny tɛr, ma arurek tela, makacin ɛtɛdɛwi tela we dook komokcar o.”
42013022	Ɔtɔɔ ni Yesu, ma akɔ azɔp kuturyok o adikir ki o miliny, ma adɛmɛz rak ɔl ŋinaante ŋaati akɔyi ki Jerusalɛm.
42013023	Ma ajin ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, mayo bɔŋ katin ɔl ci arogzɛ kidicɛ tɛr?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ,
42013024	“Ooritnɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ka coma avoyu tatoge ci lodoci noko eecitɔ. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, tiŋeere ɔl ci meel gɛr ataman gɔl ci arɔɔŋ kooti tatoge nico eecitɔ, bar alaŋ anim kɔɔtɔ nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
42013025	Eeci tiŋeere iŋaaz ɛɛti o ceezu, ma anyook ceez. Mazi avu aruku niiga karogi, ma aneku nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Manyi, koleyet da ceez, bar abedekuŋ niini igeet anekuŋ nɛ, Alaŋ kagayuŋ. Ma niiga eeginu ɔl ci avunu ŋaaḏaŋ?
42013026	Maje bodo niiga aneku katin nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Ageeta baal gɔɔn kadake, ma kawodɛ ki ineet e. Buk gɔɔn baale adɛmzɛ niina kuturyowe ogaacak.
42013027	Abedekuŋ bodo katin niini igeet anekuŋ nɛ, Alaŋ kagayuŋ naana igeet. Avunu ŋaaḏaŋ? Ɛnyɛktɛ ŋaatan niiga dook o agoonu oŋɛ.
42013028	Utuluzu ni katin niiga ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma adaku nyigit ŋaati acinu niiga Ibrayim, ki Aizak, ki Jakob, been nyakaŋanɛt dook ŋaati aavtiz niigi baliinte o Joowo. Maje niiga atoowoneku bitaalin.
42013029	Alotai katin ɔl libire ci jenu e, kibeen libire ci nyagjo o, ma libire ci baatikeri o, kibeen libire ci tɛnɛtu o, ma avu aavtiz niigi dook loota baliinte o Joowo. Ma azɔl ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin ŋaatodoi.
42013030	Zin enice ɔl o inoko araki amiiri kiziti vurut. Maje ɔl o inoko eegin vurut, bar araki kiziti ɔɔ.”
42013031	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ ivitak ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Parici Yesu, ma avu anek nɛ, “Tɔ ŋina. Bitɔ ŋaaman, eeci arɔɔŋ Erod kuruyin daak.”
42013032	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ enektek kireer nice nɛ, Kaara miniŋ o Loryento ɔla, ma buk karuguz ɔl moorizowɛ waanico kibeen tiŋeere. Ma iitene ceen iiyu e kidica naana liŋliŋɔn onan.
42013033	Maje rak waanico ki tiŋeere kibeen tiŋeere ece kazobi looc kagoon liŋliŋɔn onan, eeci alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati aruwɛn nyakaŋani ŋaaman dooke coma aruwe Jerusalɛma.”
42013034	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Jerusalɛm, Jerusalɛm, uruwu niina nyakaŋanɛt kadaayitɔ, ma avacu buk ɔl o itoonakin Jooi ineet biyɛnɛ kadaayitɔ. Lak ci meel gɛr ci karɔɔŋɛ gɔɔn kanyabotai ɔl ugun kiyo gɔɔn alotek toloci jɔrɔ ogin kɛŋ o, bar zin niina ŋaan nyan kutugu nɔkɔ.
42013035	Inoko zin tiŋeere ceez cune noko ooŋnonek looc kizi lik. Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, akatai waanico alaŋ bai bodo acinaŋ aneet zɛɛ been iiten ci kabadanɛ e. Enice ŋaan aziyu nɛ, amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o aku zaare ogin.”
42014001	Ma iitene ceen Sabit oman, ook Yesu korge ci alaan oma ci ɔl o Parici ka kook kadawɔ ŋinaante.
42014002	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet ci iivez zɔɔna kibeen azɛɛn aavi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa nɔkɔ.
42014003	Ma ajin Yesu alaat o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici anek nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziikneket korogozit ɔl moorizowɛ iitene ceen Sabit o, yo akɔm da?”
42014004	Bar olla ajaki niigi tiv, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz. Orogoz ni Yesu eet ci amɔɔr noko, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ.
42014005	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko ŋaatunooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn ci iinak dole cinɛ look, karabɔŋ een taŋ cinɛ iitene ceen Sabit, ma alaŋ ɛɛla kataman?”
42014006	Bodo buk ajaki niigi, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz.
42014007	Mazi acin Yesu ɔl ci ona avunak dayiin o aŋɛrak gɔɔn ceeni ɛlɛ ŋinti abon aavuzito nɔkɔ, uduwak nɔɔgɔ dook zɔɔz ci anek nɛ,
42014008	“Gɔɔn mã awekuŋ ɛɛti oman igeet dayiin korge cin, má rak avɔ aavtiyu vitɛnane o titiny gɔɔn aavtiyɛ ɔl o adiŋdiŋ. Eeci alaŋ agayu karabɔŋ tedec buk akunak ɛɛti ci titiny ɔrɔɔt kujukin ineet ŋinito.
42014009	Ma aku anekin ɛɛti ci ona awanin o ineet nɛ, “Tiŋa di anyek eet nico kiiya kaavu ŋina.” Itiŋa ni niina kaamin alyaani ɔrɔɔt, ma akɔ aavɛ ŋaati cɛlbɛz.
42014010	Bar zin gɔɔn mã awuyuŋ ɔl igeet korgine cigeec, abon avɔ aavtiyɔ vitɛnane ci cɛlbɛz, ka mã acinuŋ ɛɛti ci ona awuyuŋ o, ka kiiya keneyuŋ nɛ, Laŋo, tiŋa je. Ija aavu ŋaati abon ce. Ka zin jowa niina ɛɛzɛt ole ci ona avunak dayiin o dook.
42014011	Eeci ɛɛti ci atitiny ɛlɛ, bar acɛlbɛzani. Maje ɛɛti ci acɛlbɛzɛn ɛlɛ onin, bar akunak nɔɔnɔ titinyɔnti.”
42014012	Enek ni Yesu eet ci ona awa nɔɔnɔ o nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã arooŋ towek ɔl dayiin, má awa ɔl ween laŋotugun, karabɔŋ een gotonogu, karabɔŋ een ɔl ween atenok, karabɔŋ een ɔl o abaawonu een arɔk. Eeci mã awa niina ɔl nicoko doon, awekin buk koca iima bodo niigi ineet dayiin korgine ugeec. Zin gole nico urukteyin niigi ineet ŋabolo ci dayiin cugun baal adak niigi korge cun o.
42014013	Bar zin gɔɔn mã arooŋ towek ɔl dayiin, abon awa ɔl o amaat, kibeen ɔl o rɛbrɛbik, ki ɔl o ŋɔɔlik, been ɔl o ruben.
42014014	Ka zin jowa niina mayuwɛnɛt Joowa, eeci niigi alaŋ anyak dayiin ci ka kurukteyin ineet. Bar zin ŋaan aruwekin ineet Jooi iitene ci katin iŋaani ɔl o abon daayiza e.”
42014015	Mazi azii ɛɛti codoi ole ci aavtiz loota o zɔɔz nico, enewun Yesu nɛ, “Amayuwi katin ɔrɔɔt ɔl o azɔl dayiin ŋaatodoi baliinte o Joowo.”
42014016	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ yabziinta nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci arɔɔŋ kotowak kɔlɛ ci meelik dayiin korge cin.
42014017	Mazi akɔ acin niini kaal dook utuguze odota, itoonun gabaren cin ka kook kenek ɔl nɛ, “Ivita. Utuguze kaal dook odotita.”
42014018	Mazi bar akɔ aduwak gabarɛnti nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, aduwa niigi dook ŋaatineeŋ gɔɔn ceeni zɔɔz ci alam nɔɔnɔ. Azi ɛɛti ci oowu o nɛ, “Alaŋ kanim kook ŋinaante, eeci kanyei mana ci jɔr kataala. Karooŋ zin ka kook kicin. Ɛɛlawan ziiyeyan zɔɔz ci kaduwakin noko.”
42014019	Azi bodo ceeni nɛ, “Kanyei arzɛn ceen amɔtɔ ci jɔr kataala ka gɔɔn kɛɛvtɔ. Inoko zin karooŋ kook kicinai keviin. Ɛɛlawan ziiyeyan zɔɔz ci kaduwakin noko.”
42014020	Maje ceeni azi nɛ, “Jɔr ŋaan karɔcɛ. Alaŋ zin kanim kook ŋinaante.”
42014021	Abada ni gabarɛnti iiya uduwak Manyi onin itoon nɔɔnɔ e zoozok nicoko. Mazi azii Manyi oninɛ itoon e zoozok nicoko, otobor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek gabaren nɛ, “Dɔkɔny! Bitɔ towa ɔl o amaat, ki ɔl o ruben, been ɔl o ŋɔɔlik kivita.”
42014022	Kataman nɔkɔ ook utugu gabarɛnti eci ona aduwaki Manyi oninɛ nɔɔnɔ o. Ma aku bodo anek niini Manyi onin nɛ, “Koowa kotowa nɔɔgɔ, bar zin ŋaan amaac ceez ɔl nɔkɔ.”
42014023	Ma anek bodo Manyi gabaren nɛ, “Bitɔ golowɛ kutur bitaala. Anyek ɔl kivita ka coma abitiz ceez can noko.
42014024	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm bodo eet codoi ṯɔr ole baal laadun kawo ɔɔwa e ci atar dayiin nicoko been nɛɛn.”
42014025	Ma iitene oman ɔrkɔr kɔlɛ ci appe kibeen Yesu. Ma gɔla ubuude niini, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci arɔɔŋ konowan aneet, abon ooŋ niini baatin, ki yaatin, ki ŋaa onin, ki dɔl ogin, ki dɔl o yaatin dook. Ma abon buk areyek nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ oninɛ maany.
42014027	Eeci ɛɛti calaŋ arɔɔŋ niini piryakzɛt ŋaati anuyan aneet, alaŋ een niini nuyai can.
42014028	Gɔɔn mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kɛtɛɛnya ceez ci appe, aavi rak loota, ma akɛɛp guruc ci ka kɛtɛɛnyai ceez o, karabɔŋ alɛɛnɔ kidica ceez nico tɛɛnyinta.
42014029	Eeci mã aruwek niini ceez looc iŋaan kɛkɛɛp guruc ka kaga alɛɛnɔ kibeen enyciin, ma bar aruwek ceez looc, ma alaŋ anim kɛtɛɛny kidica, ararni koca ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ giye nico.
42014030	Anɔ koca niigi nɛ, “Icinit di eet nico. Akana ceez tɛɛnyinta, ma bar ɔkɔmek alaŋaan adica.”
42014031	Inoko mã anyak alaani takirnya ci meel (10,000), ma arɔɔŋ niini kooryɔ been alaan oma ci anyak takirnya ci meelik kujuk cigin o lak ram (20,000), aavi rak koca niini loota, ma abaaban zɛɛ ma aga gɔl ci ka kook kooryɔi kibeen alaan nice.
42014032	Mazi acin alaŋ anim kɔɔrtɔ kibeen alaan nice, itoonek koca niini nɔɔnɔ otok ŋinaante, ma ala nɔɔnɔ ganɔn iŋaan aavi niini rɛɛna o.”
42014033	Ma aṯornɛkɛ Yesu zooze ci azi nɛ, “Zin akɔm ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ci anim kizi nuyai can, dooke coma ooŋ niini kaal ogin anyak dook giye can.”
42014034	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Gɔɔn laadun mɛlɛ abon ŋaati ŋaan amokcarni, bar mazi idicai mokcarɔnti, izi gɛrzɛ, ma akɔm bodo gɔl ci kagɔɔni komokcar.
42014035	Ma bodo alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati kagɔɔni kaal oogi been nɛɛn, bar agantɔ ŋaati kajukɛki tuu. Mã alam zin ŋaatunooŋ eet ci anyak iin, abon aziiŋnɛ juruŋ.”
42015001	Ma iitene oman ivitak Yesu ɔl o gɔɔn alot meeri kibeen ɔl o gɛr oŋenu ka kivita kiziiyit niigi kaal o aduwa niini.
42015002	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok nɔɔgɔ ŋaati avunakɛ Yesu nɔkɔ, ɔtɔŋɔmtɔ izitɔ nɛ, “Icinit di eet nico ŋaati atalnan ɔl o oŋenu, ma buk azɔlɔ ki nɔɔgɔ.”
42015003	Uduwak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ,
42015004	“Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci anyak aza ceen eet tur, mazi akoloni codoi ŋaatineeŋ, alaŋ adotek ceen eet wec ki tiin tɔrkɔc o looc, ma akɔ arɔɔŋ ona akoloni e zɛɛ ma ajowa?
42015005	Bar kanɛ akɔ arɔɔŋ nice zɛɛ mazi ajowa nɔkɔ, atalnɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma adɔŋ inyaatinɛ akɔyi ɔlɔ. Mazi akɔ arum kɔrɔk nɔkɔ, awa laŋotigin kibeen ɔl o abaawɔ kivita ŋaatodoi, ma aku anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko katalnɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci kojowa azeet onan baal akoloni e.”
42015007	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã abad ɛɛti codoi mony oŋene ogin, ma abadaak Jook, appe buk koca talniin tammu tadena ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ eete nico, kujuk ɔl ceen eet wec ki tiin tɔrkɔc ŋaan kabaca oŋɛ.”
42015008	Bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã anyak ŋaa guruc ceen ziik een amɔtɔ, ma akoloz codoi ceez kɛŋa aje ceez muur, agɔɔn koca niini naagin? Bar kanɛ atokol koca goo, ma aviil ceez kidicilim, ma arooŋnyi juruŋ ceez kɛŋa dook zɛɛ ma ajowa.
42015009	Mazi ajowa nɔkɔ, awa laŋotigin kibeen ɔl o abaawɔ anek nɛ, “Katalnɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci kojowa gurucoc onan akoloni e.”
42015010	Zin buk mã abad ɛɛti codoi mony oŋene ogin, atalnɛ koca toonnyawa tammu tadena nɔkɔ.”
42015011	Ma azi bodo Yesu nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci anyak lɔgɔz ram.
42015012	Ma anek logoti ci miliny o baatin nɛ, “Baaba, karooŋnyin ŋɛrayan aneet kaal cigan inoko o.” Eŋerek ni baatineeŋ kaal nɔɔgɔ dook ramantiya.
42015013	Ma iinyaye ci miliny nɔkɔ, ataalɔi logoti ci miliny o kaal cigin o dook zɛɛ adoma ni guruc ɔtɔɔwi, ooyi looce oman rɛɛna many. Ma ŋinaante ook iminaŋi guruc cigin noko rɛɛcanzɛta been kaale ogɛn.
42015014	Mazi adicai guruca dook, iiya tarjo ci appe looce nice, maje nɔɔnɔ ɔkɔma guruc ci anyak kina.
42015015	Makacin ook iliŋliŋozek eet oma ole ci looc nice. Ma anyek ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ liŋliŋɔn ci oowawi kɔcɔcɔbanɛn.
42015016	Ma giye o ɔkɔmai eet ci ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ dayiin ci abon, orooŋun niini ka nuun kook kozolit ki kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ayɛr.
42015017	Ma vurta abadaak niini ɛlɛ maany abaaban izi nɛ, Gɔɔn gabara o baaba anyak dayiin ci adak zɛɛ ma apiyani, maje bar naana ŋina ka kakaran ki magiz.
42015018	Abon kiŋaaz kamiironei baaba ka kook kenek nɛ, “Baaba, kabaca oŋec Joowo kibeen ŋaatun buk.
42015019	Alaŋ zin bodo kaganona ŋaati awuyan niina aneet kizi ŋɛɛrun, bar olla nyan kibil kiyo gabarɛnti o.”
42015020	Itiŋa ni niini ɔtɔɔ imiirozek baatin. Mazi ŋaan awoya rɛɛna nɔkɔ, icinun baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma ateedi baatin biyeta, ma iŋaaz adɔkɔny akɔ arumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl. Ma akɔ atorkot nɔɔnɔ azɛɛnɛ dook, ma acoco ŋalyamoc, eeci awucnek nɔɔnɔ ŋɛɛrin.
42015021	Bar anek logoti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Baaba, kabaca oŋec Joowa kibeen ŋaatun buk. Alaŋ zin bodo kaganona ŋaati awuyan niina aneet kizi ŋɛɛrun.”
42015022	Maje bar baatinɛ awa gabara ogin, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaakta rum ci abon ivita uburucɛkɛ ŋɛɛran. Buk artekɛ nyapokodec aziit. Uburucɛkɛ buk caava zɔɔ.
42015023	Mazi odot, ɔɔtɔ icinta ariz ceen mɔɔr adii ka kivita kotodoŋit kadayit kataltɔi.
42015024	Eeci baale ŋɛɛran nici adaawa, bar zin inoko urugun bodo. Baale okolozɛ, ma inoko o, ojoyai bodo.” Ulute ni ɔl iitene nice ŋaatodoi, ma adake niigi dook talniinta.
42015025	Maje logoti ween abuu iitene nice aavi mana. Mazi abadaak kɔrɔk, bar azii ɔl abene, ma arogom.
42015026	Otowa ni niini gabaren codoi kɔrɔk bawuca, ma aku ajin anek nɛ, “Matɛ micit taz nici?”
42015027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ gabarɛnti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abada uyene gotonu kɔrɔk, ma atoŋdek baatune nɔɔnɔ ariz ci ŋaan een mɔɔr adii ɔrɔɔt, eeci abada niini kɔrɔk kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr.”
42015028	Mazi azii logoti ceen abuu o gi nico, otobor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt calaŋ arɔɔŋ kiiyak kɔrɔk. Makacin iiyak baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma ilalek ka kiiyak kɔrɔk.
42015029	Enek ni niini baatin nɛ, “Cin di! Ŋaan baal kaliŋliŋonekin irkitok nicoko dook kiyo gabarɛnti o. Ma akɔm iiten codoi ci kajuranɛ been nɛɛn. Gitaz ci anyan niina aneet? Akɔ zɛɛ ma akɔmnekin ŋaati atoŋdekan bawot o colai ɔtɔgi ɛlɛ ka waan kadakta ki laŋotigan.
42015030	Mazi abada ŋɛɛrun ci baal akɔ adica kaal ugun waaŋnyai noko, otodoŋozeyu ni bar nɔɔnɔ.”
42015031	Ma anek baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Dole onan, karomɛ naana been ineet ŋina iinya dook, ma kaala ci kanyei naana ŋina o dook kaal cugun.
42015032	Maje gotonu nici baale adaawa, ma bar inoko urugun bodo. Baale okolozɛ, bar waanico ojoyai bodo. Abon zin bar katalnɛ naaga dook giye ci abadaket niini ageet o.”
42016001	Ma anek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ceen aroi ci anyak gɔn ci agamek nɔɔnɔ kaal cigin, ma bar aminaŋi ɛɛti nici kaal. Ma iitene oman uduyak nɔɔnɔ ci aminaŋi ɛɛti nici kaal cigin o.
42016002	0towa ni niini nɔɔnɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci kazii agoon noko? Inoko nyaayan waragɛ o gɔɔn ayɛɛdɛ kaal o agoon kibeen buk guruc ogan dook, eeci alaŋaan bodo aliŋliŋ ŋaatan.”
42016003	Enek ni ɛɛti nici ɛlɛ maany baabaninta nɛ, “Inoko manyi cane kaliŋliŋonei noko orooŋun kɔtɔɔyan liŋliŋɔnta. Kayo zin kutugu gitaz? Akɔmnan dɔyiz ci ka kɛɛvɔi, ma bodo kanyei alyaan ŋaati kalawinɛ.
42016004	Inoko kaga gi ci ka kutugu. Abon karɔɔŋa laŋotigan ci ka gɔɔn kataltawan korgine cigeec.”
42016005	Enico ɛlɛ otowa niini ɔl baal gɔɔn anyayek manyi onin ŋabolɛt e. Ma aku ajin eet ci oowu o anek nɛ, “Anyayei manyi onan ŋabolɛt izɔk?”
42016006	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyayei topiyɛt ci zeetu een eet tur (100).” Ma anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Orɛ zin waragɛ o ŋabolɛt ugun ce. Inoko tɛyɛɛt kizi eet ram kamɔtɔ (50) nɔkɔ.”
42016007	Bodo ajin niini eet oma anek nɛ, “Anyei ŋabolɛt izɔk?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyei kaboot ci labinu een eet tur (100).” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Orɛ tɛyɛɛt kizi eet wec (80) nɔkɔ.”
42016008	Mazi acin manyi oninɛ nɔɔnɔ agɛny nɔkɔ, ataana niini nɔɔnɔ gɛnyize cin noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Agɛny zin ɔl ci loocu noko ŋaati aromi zɔɔz cineeŋ kujuk ɔl o aavtiz vooritine o Joowo.
42016009	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, buk niiga o atuwenu abon anyaku gɛnyiz ci arɔɔŋaku eleeti laŋotizɛt Joowa kaale ugooc anyaku loota ŋina, ka mã adicai arɔkzɛt ŋina, atalnanuŋ niini igeet korge onin aavtiz kodot.
42016010	Mã ɛɛti ci atu ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaale ci miliny, atu buk ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaale ci meel. Maje ɛɛti calaŋ atu ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaale ci miliny, alaŋ buk atu ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaale ci meel.
42016011	Zin mã alaŋ atu ɔl bonat cunooŋ kaale ci loocu cɛlbɛz noko, anyononekuŋ zin koca igeet katin arɔkzɛt ween didi Joowa ku?
42016012	Buk mã alaŋ atuyuŋ ɔl igeet kaale ci eet oma, anyononekuŋ zin buk koca katin igeet kaal cugooc ku?
42016013	Akɔm laadun eet ci aliŋliŋonek alaat ram. Mã agɔɔn nɔkɔ, arɛɛz koca codoi ŋaatineeŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma amarnin codoi. Karabɔŋ aŋole codoi, ma apɛz codoi. Zin gole nico alaŋ abon ŋaati kaliŋliŋonɛkɛ Jook, ma bodo kaliŋliŋ guruc.”
42016014	Mazi azii ɔl o Parici zɔɔz nico dook, atararti niigi Yesu, eeci arɛɛz niigi guruc ɔrɔɔt.
42016015	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyeku gɔɔn niiga eleeti cugooc o kobonta ɔla, maje Jooi aga kaal o ɛɛl zinzeetine ugooc dook nɔkɔ. Mazin kaala o atitiny ɔl o deer, Joowa gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt.”
42016016	Ma anek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aliŋliŋi baale ɔl lotinok o Mosis kibeen zoozok o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta zɛɛ been iiten baal akuni Jɔn o oonyi e. Mazin iitene o iiyai niini e zɛɛ been inoko o kaviyawa o Joowo abon akati baliin onin uuwaktɛ, makacin ɔl ci meel ivita iyizek eleeti gɔl nico eecitɔ.
42016017	Bar zin katin aṯornɛkɛ tammu taden ki looc, maje lotinowa ɛɛl nɔkɔ kɔkɔm ŋintimiliny tɛr aarayi ŋaatineeŋ been nɛɛn.
42016018	Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, ma bodo arɔca ŋaa oma, adoma koca niini zoocmaz. Buk mã arɔca ɛɛti ŋaa ci aaryai eete oman, adoma buk niini zoocmaz.”
42016019	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ceen aroi ci gɔɔn aborcek rumanɛ ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Ma abaak niini baayiz ci amadi ɔrɔɔt iinya dook.
42016020	Maje buk ŋinaante anyak eet ci amaat kazi zaar cigin nɛ Lazaros ci anyak dɔkizɛ alya. Anyaak gɔɔn ɔl nɔɔnɔ araan ci kɔrɔk ci eet ceen aroi noko, ka kiiya kɛvɛr zurzuryak ci iinak looc ŋaati adayin ɛɛti ceen aroi noko. Ma araana ŋina bodo gɔɔn aduk orze nɔɔnɔ dɔkizɛ cigin noko.
42016022	Ma iitene oman adaak ɛɛti ci amaat noko. Ivita ni toonnyawa o Joowo, ma avu avɔyi nɔɔnɔ ŋaao aavɛ Ibrayim tammu tadena. Bodo buk iitene oman adaawun ɛɛti ceen aroi noko, ma avɔ ada ɔl nɔɔnɔ.
42016023	Mazi akɔ aara niini kɛbɛrɛ, bar aavi gooye o ɔl o oŋenu, ma acin niini Ibrayim rɛɛna aromɛ kibeen Lazaros.
42016024	Otowo ni niini Ibrayim anek nɛ, “Baaba Ibrayim, ɛɛlawan da. Anyekan Lazaros koconek komolit maam ka kiiya karekan aat, eeci kapirna ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ gooye ci kaavɛ noko.”
42016025	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran, baale irkitowe baal ŋaan arognɛ niina loota e, anyozeyin ineet kaala o abon dook. Maje Lazaros waanice ajowa kaal o gɛr dook. Inoko zin buk niini iiya ojowa looc madiz ŋina. Maje niina apirna piryakzɛt nico.
42016026	Buk bodo ŋaati kaŋɛrɔn naaga been igeet noko anyak ŋolol ci wun kal ci aŋeryet ageet, ka mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti ŋaatinaaŋ kavardaŋ kook ŋaatunooŋ, akɔm gɔl. Buk mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti ŋaatunooŋ kavardaŋa kiiyayet ageeta ŋaato, akɔm gɔl.”
42016027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Ibrayim anek nɛ, “Baaba Ibrayim, kilalekin zin da ka toon Lazaros kook korge o baaba loota.
42016028	Eeci kanyei ŋinaante gɔtɔnɔga ceen tur. Anyek da nɔɔnɔ kook kitilo nɔɔgɔ keteedɔi oŋɛ ugeec ka calaŋ katin avunak niigi ŋinti nɔŋ ci kol kaavɛ naana noko.”
42016029	Ma anek Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyak gotonogu loota ŋinaante lotinok o Mosis been zoozok o nyakaŋanetu. Ŋaan ilot nɔɔgɔ. Ŋaan zin azii gotonogu zoozok niceke.”
42016030	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Ibrayim anek nɛ, “Baaba Ibrayim, alaŋ niigi ooli been nɛɛn. Dooke coma iŋaaz ɛɛti daayiza, ma akɔ aduwak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz can kapirnanɛ noko, o koca aziiknɛn niigi, ma ateedinɛ oŋɛ ugeec dook nɛɛn.”
42016031	Ma anek Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziiyit niigi lotinok o Mosis kibeen zoozok o nyakaŋanetu, mayo nuun iŋaaz ɛɛti daayiza korok bodo, ma akɔ ilot nɔɔgɔ, alaŋ koca buk azii niigi nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
42017001	Ma anek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Ma kaala ci anyek ɔl . kabaca oŋɛ noko ŋɛdɛt avu nɔkɔ laadun, bar zin izi nɔŋa wole eete ci laadun anyaa kaal nicoko o.
42017002	Aganɔ waan ŋaati acabonɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ golu inyaa, ma ajukonɛkɛ liil ka calaŋ anyek dɔl ci miliny noko kabaca oŋɛ.
42017003	Egenyit zin niiga alya eleetine ugooc. Mã abacakin gotonu gi ci gɛr, gerenyek. Mazi ɛtɛɛdɔi niini gi nico, toŋ nɔɔnɔ.
42017004	Mã abacakin niini ineet kaal ci gɛr lak torgɛrɛm iitene codoi, ma bodo buk aku anekin ineet lak torgɛrɛm nɛ, “Inoko o kabaci naana gi we," abon buk uuŋ niina nɔɔnɔ kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr agoonei.”
42017005	Ma anek toonnyawa Manyi Yesu nɛ, “Zaaceyet zin tuwɛn cinaaŋ o.”
42017006	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko tɛ anyayit nuun tuwɛn ci miliny tɛr kiyo kɛbɛrɛci o laŋiracoco o, animnyu waan enektek kɛɛt ceen moneec noko nɛ, Piya ɛlɛ agɛrɔi buk ŋina, bitɔ bil liil kɛŋa ŋaate, ma aziiŋnuŋ waan niini igeet.”
42017007	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã anyak ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ gabaren ci eevonek, karabɔŋ oowawonek nɔɔnɔ, mazi akɔ abada niini towawiinta, karabɔŋ een keevinta, anei koca niina nɔɔnɔ ecodoi nɔkɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ dawɔ?”
42017008	Bar kanɛ anei rak koca nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ tuguweyan dayiin zɛɛ mazi odot, borocek rum ci abon, ka nyaayan dayiin, ka ija rɛwan kadawɔ rak, ma kawodɛ. Ŋaan akɔ adake niina tedec.”
42017009	Alaŋ zin anyek ɛɛti gabaren zany giye o agɔɔni niini kaal o aduyak niini nɔɔnɔ kutugu.
42017010	Abil zin buk ŋaatunooŋ nɔkɔ. Mã agoonu liŋliŋɔn o aduyakuŋ ka utuguz, iziti nɛ, “Keegina naaga gabara ci labak, olla kaliŋliŋnya naaga liŋliŋɔn onaaŋ aduyaket doon.”
42017011	Mazi ŋaan awɔ Yesu gɔla akɔ Jerusalɛma nɔkɔ, ook ono niini vitɛn ci aŋɛr looc o kazi Samariya kibeen looc o kazi Galili.
42017012	Mazi akɔ awowonek kutur oma ŋinaante, urumtɔ kibeen ɔl ceen amɔtɔ ci amɔɔr mɔɔriz o gidaŋ. Avu niigi, ma ɛɛl rɛɛna kidicilim.
42017013	Ma agɛrɛny azii nɛ, “Yesu, Manyi, eelawet da!”
42017014	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ eyeltek eleeti alaat o ceez o Joowo ka kɔɔt kicintuŋ igeet maŋaan anyaku mɔɔriz.” Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni ɔl nici. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, obonta nɔɔgɔ eleeti ugeecik orogita.
42017015	Mazi akɔ acin ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ɛlɛ onin nɔkɔ, abada niini, ma aku anyek Jook zany molowe ci appe.
42017016	Aku niini, ma aavek Yesu loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ zany talniinta. Maje niini laadun eet ci Samariya.
42017017	Ma anek Yesu ɔl nɛ, “Ma uyen eegin ɔl ci orogit mɔɔriza amɔtɔ. Ɔl tɔrkɔc ŋaaḏaŋ?
42017018	Ole oke dook akɔm ci abada ŋaatineeŋ kiiya kanyek Jook zany zɛɛ ma bar abada ɛɛti ceen miroi noko doon?”
42017019	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je, tɔ. Tuwɛn unun nɛɛn ci uruguzin ineet o.”
42017020	Mazi ajin ɔl o Parici Yesu iiten ci ka kiiyai baliin o Joowo. Ɛbɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Baliin o Joowo alaŋ aku gole ci ka kicinti ɔl.
42017021	Akɔm katin eet ci ka kizi nɛ, “Icinit di nɔɔnɔ ce," karabɔŋ azi nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ ca," eeci baliin o Joowo aavi zinzeetine ugooc.”
42017022	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Avu katin iinya ci arooŋnyaŋ niiga icintaŋ aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, ka olla koromtɛ been igeet nuun iiten codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, bar alaŋ acinaŋ nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
42017023	Anyak katin ɔl ci anekuŋ nɛ, “Icinit di ŋinte! Aavi niini ŋinaante," karabɔŋ azi nɛ, “Icinit di ŋinto! Aavi ŋina.” Bar zin eteedɔ zɔɔ. Má avɔ anuyu nɔɔgɔ been nɛɛn.
42017024	Eeci tiŋeere badaan cane aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abil kiyo bɔrɔyɛ o gɔɔn abadi kicinit ɔl looc dook o.
42017025	Bar zin rak ɔɔwa abon kapirna kaale ci meelik, ma abornan ɔl ci ɔɔ nico noko.
42017026	Zin kiyo baale agooni kaala iinyaye o Nowa e, abil buk katin iinya cigan aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o nɔkɔlɛ.
42017027	Baale iinyaye niceke ɔl dook adake, ma awot nyaantanɛ. Ma arɔcɔ labak zɛɛ been iiten baal akɔyi Nowa kavoola e. Iiya ni otodot waanice tawani nɔɔgɔ dook lai.
42017028	Abil buk katin kiyo baale iinyaye o eet o kazi Lat e. Waanice adake ɔl, ma awot nyaantanɛ, ma ataali, ma ataalinɛ kaal, ma eevyi, ma ɛɛnyɛt ceezi labak.
42017029	Ma iitene o aduŋni Lat kuture o kazi Sodom e, iita goo tamma, ma adak waanice nɔɔgɔ dook lai.
42017030	Abil zin buk katin iiteni ci kayelizyanɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e nɔkɔlɛ.
42017031	Tiŋeere iitene nice ɛɛti ci aavi ceez rɛɛrna alaŋ anim kook kaara kaal ogin ceeza eecitɔ. Maje ɛɛti ci tɛ aavi mana alaŋ bodo anim kiiyak kɔrɔk ka kiiya kooyi kaal ogin.
42017032	Aada zɔɔz o ŋaa o Lat baal abuudi gɔla arɔɔŋ kimiirozek Sodom, ma waanice ook adaak e.
42017033	Ma ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ korogoz ɛlɛ onin, bar akoloz. Maje ɛɛti ci akoloz ɛlɛ onin, bar arogoz.
42017034	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, katin baaline nice mã aromɛ ɔl raman kuwena, aŋɛryai codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma ooŋni codoi.
42017035	Buk mã areke ŋaai raman golwa ŋaatodoi, aŋɛryai ŋaatineeŋ codoi, maje codoi ooŋnonek looc.”
42017037	Ma ajin nuyawa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, akanai dim katin gi nici ŋaaḏaŋ?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Zin gɔɔn laadun mã alotɛ kuduvaana ŋaaman, anyak gi ci adaai tɔ ŋinaante.”
42018001	Uduwak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci ka kɛdɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ ka kemedai kijinti Jook tup.
42018002	Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyak baale kuture oman alaan ci roonnyo calaŋ aŋole Jook, ma buk apɛz niini ɔl dook.
42018003	Maje buk kuture nice anyak ŋaa ci bɔi ci gɔɔn akunak nɔɔnɔ iinya dook, ma aku ilalek ka kiroon zɔɔz cin kibeen eet oma ci amarnin nɔɔnɔ.
42018004	Maje alaani nici lak ci meel alaŋ arɔɔŋ kitirit nɔɔnɔ, ma vurta enek ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Yo nuun alaŋ naana kaŋole Jook, ma kapez ɔl o, abon kagoonei ŋaa nico gi ci arɔɔŋ o, gɛrzɛ ŋaan aku aconanan tup zɛɛ ma arukan kadaak.”
42018006	Izi nɛ Manyi Yesu nɛ, “Iziiyit zin di gi ci aduwa alaani ci gɛrzɛ noko.
42018007	Bar zin mã aluwek Jook ɔl oginɛ waazin ki baalin ole o amarnin nɔɔgɔ, apak koca niini zɔɔz nico. Alaŋ anyek nɔɔgɔ kereyɔ ŋinti wun.
42018008	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, apayakuŋ koca niini igeet gi o arooŋnyu kataman nɔkɔ. Mayo zin tiŋeere ma kabadai naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto looc, kaku kajowa loota ŋina ɔl ci atuwe juruŋ tɔ?”
42018009	Ma bodo aduwak Yesu yabziin co ɔl o gɔɔn abaaban kizik niigi abona ŋume o Joowo, ma apɛz ɔl oogi.
42018010	Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyak baale ɔl ceen ram avɔ ŋaryiin ceeze o Joowo. Ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ Pariciwen. Maje codoi eet ci gɔɔn alot meeri.
42018011	Ma akɔ abil ɛɛti ceen Pariciwen noko ceez ŋaatin doon, ma aŋaryɛ azi nɛ, “Jook, kanyin naana ineet zany, eeci aneet alaŋ appe ziniz, ma alaŋ kalaba ɔl, ma alaŋ karɛɛca kiyo ɔl dook o, ma buk alaŋ katobona ki eet ci gɔɔn alot meeri co.
42018012	Kuuŋ gɔɔn naana dayiin lak ram iinyaye ween torgɛrɛm ka kidiŋdiŋanin ineet, ma kanyin ineet lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ween amɔtɔ kaale ogan kajowa dook.”
42018013	Maje ɛɛti ci gɔɔn alot meeri o, abil rɛɛna kidicilim, ma alaŋ buk adɔŋ ɔɔ ki taden, ma acɛlbɛzɛn ɛlɛ onin ajin Jook azi nɛ, “Jook, kilalekin ineet, eeci naana kabaca oŋɛ ɔrɔɔt.”
42018014	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci gɔɔn alot meeri noko imiire niini ook ɔlɔ ŋaati agaman Jooi nɔɔnɔ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi eet ci abona ŋume onin. Maje bar eet ci Parici noko akɔm gi ci agoonek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kina. Eeci ɛɛti ci adɔŋ ɛlɛ, acɛlbɛzɛn Jooi nɔɔnɔ. Maje bar ɛɛti ci acɛlbɛzɛn ɛlɛ onin, adɔŋ Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi titiny.”
42018015	Enice anyaaktak ɔl ogɛn Yesu dɔl ci miliny ka kiiya kataadek niini nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn kamayuk. Mazi bar acin nuyawa oginɛ ɔl nicoko, egerenycek niigi nɔɔgɔ.
42018016	Otowa ni Yesu dɔl, ma anek nuyak nɛ, “Anycek dɔl kivitayan. Má alamnyu nɔɔgɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo abilnek ɔl ci anyek eleeti kiyo dɔlya ci miliny noko.
42018017	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti calaŋ agama baliin o Joowo kiyo dole ci miliny o, alaŋ akɔ niini baliinte o Joowo been nɛɛn.”
42018018	Ma ajin alaani ci ɔl o Juz Yesu anek nɛ, “Gayoi o abon, mayo kutugu gitaz ka kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn?”
42018019	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma awuyan kizi eet ci kabona o naa? Akɔm eet ci abon, bar abona Jooi doon.
42018020	Inoko aga niina lotinok o azi nɛ, Má adoma zoocmaz. Má amuny eet ci deer. Má agɔrzɛ. Má avoloŋ. Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun.”
42018021	Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaani nici Yesu anek nɛ, “Kazoonɛ lotinok nicoko dook nɔkɔ laadun iŋaan keen kidic e.”
42018022	Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, enek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyak zin gi codoi ci ŋaan tugu. Bitɔ taalɔi kaal ugun dook zɛɛ anyek guruc ɛlɛ ɔl o amaat. Ŋaan akɔ jowa niina arɔkzɛt tammu tadena. Ija zin niina alya nowan aneet.”
42018023	Bar mazi azii alaani nici zɔɔz nico, alaca ɛlɛ calaŋ atalnɛ, eeci een niini aroi ɔrɔɔt.
42018024	Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔnɔ alaŋaan atalnɛ nɔkɔ, izi nɛ, “Adɔi kak ole ceen arɔk ŋaati avɔyi baliinte o Joowo.
42018025	Adɔi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ eete ceen aroi ŋaati akɔyi baliinte o Joowo, bar kizi mayɛ nyakale ŋaati adunyonɛkɛ nyibira ŋino vɔlɔŋ o.”
42018026	Ijinit ni ɔl o azii gi nico nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Ka dim zin katin korok ŋɛnɛ?”
42018027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma gi o alaŋ anim ɔl ci deer kutuguzɔ, aboke Joowa labak.”
42018028	Enek ni Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Cin di, inoko naaga kotoŋta korogjok ogaacak, ma kivita kunuyin ineet. Mazin yo tiŋeere kajowana naa?”
42018029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci ooŋ kɔrɔk onin, ki ŋaa onin, ki gɔtɔnɔgi ogin, ki baatin, ki yaatin, been dɔl ogin giye ci akati baliin o Joowo, ajowa tiŋeere niini kaal ci meelik loota ŋina kujuk kaal baal ooŋnek niini looc ole onin e. Ma bodo katin ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
42018031	Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram, ma anek nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di, inoko kavɔ naaga Jerusalɛma. Avɔ zin tiŋeere ŋinaante agooni kaala baal ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta akanan aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e dook.
42018032	Kakɔ tiŋeere kanyononei naana takirnya o ɔl ween modɛn, ma avɔ ararnan niigi aneet, ma adomnyan, ma oortekan amot.
42018033	Avɔ tiŋeere arukan niigi aneet nyaboyɛn, ma vurta ɔɔt ni uruktan kadaak. Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu, ŋaan kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
42018034	Maje nuyawa oginɛ akɔm gi codoi aga kaale nicoko. Eeci kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci azɔɔz Yesu noko aroodi ŋaatineeŋ, ma alaŋ aga niigi zɔɔz ci aduwa niini o akati gitaz.
42018035	Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz Yesu kutur o kazi Jeriko, anyak eet ci ruben ci aavi gɔla alaye ŋinaante.
42018036	Mazi azii niini kɔlɛ ci awɔ o, ijin nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Ma dim tɛ anyak lɔɔci naa?”
42018037	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Awɔ Yesu o Nazarɛt ŋina.”
42018038	Ɛgɛrɛny ni niini izi nɛ, “Yesu ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da.”
42018039	Maje ɔl ci araki o agernyek nɔɔnɔ kajawɔ. Bar enico ɛgɛrɛny niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da.”
42018040	Ibilun ni Yesu, ma aduwak ɔl kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ eet ci ruben noko. Mazi aku, ijinun Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyan kutuguweyin naa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, karooŋnyin nyan kicinɔ bodo.”
42018042	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Cinɔ zin. Tuwɛn unun nɛɛn ci aruguzin ineet o.”
42018043	Enico ɛlɛ icinɔ niini didi, ma ano Yesu, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye nico. Mazi acin kɔlɛ gi nico, atanaazɔ niigi dook Jook ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42019001	Mazi akɔ arum Yesu kutur ci kazi Jeriko, anyak ŋinaante eet ceen aroi kazi Zakiyas. Niini alaan ci ɔl o gɔɔn alot meeri.
42019003	Ma arɔɔŋ niini kicin eet ci kazi Yesu o ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, bar akɔm gɔl ci ka kicini nɔɔnɔ, eeci mɛɛlɛ ɔl ɔrɔɔt, maje niini alya eet ci kutur tɛr.
42019004	Ɔdɔkɔny ni niini arayɛ ɔl ɔɔwa, ma akɔ atɔɔt kɛɛt ceen moneec ka kicin Yesu juruŋ ŋaati aku aduŋni ŋina.
42019005	Mazi aku arum Yesu ŋinito, ɔdɔŋ ɔɔ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zakiyas, duna taman. Kakɔ tedec katike ole cun e waanico.”
42019006	Ma aduŋna niini kataman, ma atalna Yesu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42019007	Maje ɔl dook o acin gi nico, aŋɔmtɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici akɔ ka kook kataŋu ole ci eet ci oŋenu o?”
42019008	Ma iŋaaz Zakiyas jena, ma anek Manyi Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, ziiyan di. Kakɔ tiŋeere kaŋer kaal ogan kanyei dook kɔrgɛna, ma kanyi ɔl o amaat. Buk mã da gɔɔn anyak ɔl ci kadayɛ looc, karuwei tiŋeere nɔɔgɔ kaal ci arɔɔŋ niigi ŋaatan o lak wec.”
42019009	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iiyak zin rogzɛn kɔrɔk nico waanico. Buk ɛɛti nici dole ci dɔl o Ibrayim.
42019010	Mazin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kakun ka kiiya kɔrɔɔŋ ɔl o akoloni zɛɛ ma kajowa ka korogoz nɔɔgɔ.”
42019011	Mazi ŋaan azii ɔl zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ, uduwak niini nɔɔgɔ yabziin oma, eeci izi ajɔn Jerusalɛm. Abaabanit ni ɔl ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ o izitɔ nɛ, “Izi baliin o Joowo ajɔn ka kiiyak looc.” Ma aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ,
42019012	“Anyak baale eet ci titiny eerononek looc ci rɛɛn many, ka kook kɔrɔnyca ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante kizi alaan zɛɛ mazi odot, ka kabadaak niini looc onin.
42019013	Mazi ka kɔɔtɔ, otowa gabara cigin een amɔtɔ, ma aku anyek codoi gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ guruc ceen eet tur, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ iliŋliŋti rak guruc nicoko ŋinti ŋaan kazɛɛnɛ tɔ o.”
42019014	Maje ɔl ci looc cin o abor niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma itoon niigi otok kono nɔɔnɔ vurta azi nɛ, “Alaŋ karooŋnya eet nico kizi alaan cinaaŋ.”
42019015	Maje bar ŋaati baal eerononek niini neke, anyozozek nɔɔnɔ alaazɛt odota. Mazi akɔ abadaak niini kɔrɔk, iiya otowa gabara ogin baal anyek guruc e ka kiiya kicin guruc ci anyaa niigi guruce baal anyek niini nɔɔgɔ ka kemelŋenyit e.
42019016	Ma aku gabarɛnti ci oowu o, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, kiliŋliŋa guruc eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1,000) guruce baal anyan e.”
42019017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Een niina gabaren ci abonanin. Zin giye o iliŋliŋayɛ guruc oogi guruce baal miliny tɛr e, kanyin tiŋeere ineet kuturyok amɔtɔ ka bal niina izi alaan cineeŋ.”
42019018	Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti ci ano gɔn o, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, kiliŋliŋa guruc ceen eet tur lak tur (500) guruce baal anyan e.”
42019019	Ma anek niini gabaren nico nɛ, “Kanyin tiŋeere ineet kuturyok tur bal izi alaan cineeŋ.”
42019020	Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti ceeni, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, guruc baal anyan e ce. Kacabi iiten baale ruma, ma kitaŋ karoodi.
42019021	Kaŋolinin ineet, eeci een niina eet ci adoŋnin aziiti. Adoma gɔɔn kaal culu, ma ateedi manɛɛn calaŋ ɛɛva niina.”
42019022	Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr. Kacabjin tedec zoozowe cugun aduwa noko ɛlɛ. Mã da ma agayan keen eet ci adoŋnan aziiti, ma kadoma kaal culu, ma kateedi manɛɛn calaŋ een cigan, alaŋ zin da amelŋeny guruc cigan o ka ma kakun kajowa azaace naa?”
42019024	Enek ni alaani ɔl o aromɛ kibeen nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aamta nɔɔnɔ guruc nicoko, anycek gabaren ona anyak guruc ween eet tur lak amɔtɔ e (1,000).”
42019025	Bar anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, anyawun uyen niini laadun eet tur lak amɔtɔ (l,000).”
42019026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti kaal ci meelik, bar anyonek nɔɔnɔ ogɛn bodo kizi mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Maje ɛɛti ci akɔm gi ci anyak, mayo nuun anyak ci miliny tɛr, aamnyai bar ŋaatin nici kavu nɔkɔ.
42019027	Inoko zin anyaaktayaŋ ɔl baal amarninan aneet, ma alaŋ arooŋnyan kizi alaan cineeŋ e dook. Anyaakta ka ivita uruyit nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ aneet ŋuma ŋina.”
42019028	Aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico, ma vurta arawɔi ɔl ooyi Jerusalɛma.
42019029	Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz ŋino kazi Bezpeja kibeen Bezani biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, itoonun niini nuyak ram karaktɛ.
42019030	Ma anek rak nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ korgine ci igeet ɔɔwa neke. Ajowanu tedec ŋinaante zigir ceen jɔrɔn ci ŋaan laadun kɔtɔɔt ɛɛti oman acabje ŋinaante. Ɔɔtɔ ɔɔkta ka anyaaktayaŋ aneet ŋina.
42019031	Mã anyak eet ci ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Ɔɔganu zigir nico naa? Enektek nɛ, Arɔɔŋ Manyi nɔɔnɔ.”
42019032	Ɔɔtɔ ni niigi, ma avɔ ajowa kaal dook eona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e.
42019033	Mazi avɔ ɔɔga zigir, ijinit ɔl ci zigiro o nɔɔgɔ enektek nɛ, “Ɔɔganu zigir cinaaŋ naa?”
42019034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔɔŋ Manyi nɔɔnɔ.”
42019035	Ooti ni niigi zigir ŋaati Yesu. Ma avɔ arekɛ nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ bawuc, ma anyek Yesu kɔtɔɔt.
42019036	Mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu zigira, etevetɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ ugeec gɔl.
42019037	Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz niini Jerusalɛm ŋaao alocanɛ gɔl biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, egerenyit nuyawa oginɛ dook kɔla ŋaati anyekɛ Jook zany, ma anaati nɔɔnɔ kaale o meel adiŋdiŋ acin niigi.
42019038	Ma agɛrɛny niigi azi nɛ, “Amayuk Jooi alaan o aku zaare ogin. Abil ganɔni tamma, ma anyak titinyɔn Jooi o adiŋdiŋ.”
42019039	Ma azɔɔz ɔl ogɛn ole o Parici kɔla tɔ anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, gerenyek nuyak cuguno kajaktɔ.”
42019040	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, mayo nuun ajaki niigi, biyɛn alya agɛrɛny ni koca ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ.”
42019041	Mazi awowonek Yesu Jerusalɛm, acin kutur, ma aluwek azi nɛ, “Matɛ nuun ga gɔl o ka jowai ganɔn iiten nico ɛlɛ doon, abon koca. Bar zin inoko o alaŋ aga.
42019043	Aku zin tiŋeere iiteni ci aliyanin modɛna o amarninin ineet kabanyɔ dook, kɔkɔm ŋinti aduŋnɛ.
42019044	Oyokin tiŋeere niigi ineet kibeen ɔl cugun noko dook lai kɔkɔm tegeremoc codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ataadonek gɔn. Agooni gi nici o, eeci ŋaan ga niina iiten o iiyai Jooi niini alya ka kiiya kitiritin ineet.”
42019045	Enico ook Yesu ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ atɔɔwak ɔl dook o ataalinɛ kaal kaluwawa ŋinaante bitaalin.
42019046	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz ci anɛ Jooi nɛ, Ceez cane o agayi kizi ceez ci ŋaryiinto, maje bar niiga ivita utuguzu kizi ŋinti aroodinɛ agoryawa.”
42019047	Ma iinyaye niceke akɔ gɔɔn adɛmɛz Yesu ɔl ceeze o Joowo iinya dook. Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o demziinto, been alaat o ɔl o Juz arɔɔŋ kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
42019048	Bar akɔm gɔl ci ka kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci ɔl dook gɔɔn alotak nɔɔnɔ, ma avu azii zoozok ogin. Ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kobolozit zɔɔz codoi ṯɔr zoozowe ci aduwa niini noko.
42020001	Ma iitene oman ademzek Yesu ɔl kaviyak o Joowo abon ceeze o Joowo. Ivitak ni nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o demziinto, been ɔl o adikir baayizo.
42020002	Ma avu anek nɛ, “Duwayet di, ma dɔyiz ci agɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko dook noko ajowa ŋaa? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet dɔyiz nico o?”
42020003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycaŋ zin di buk kijinuŋ naana igeet. Baale dɔyizi o Jɔn o oonyi aku Joowa, yo aku da eete ci deer?”
42020005	Ŋinaanto adaŋtɔ niigi maany izitɔ nɛ, “Kayo kiziti nɛ? Mã kazi nɛ, Aku Joowa, azi koca nɛ, Alaŋ zin da baale atuyu Jɔn naa?
42020006	Bodo mã kazi nɛ, Aku ole ci deer, avacet koca kɔlɛ nici dook ageet biyɛnɛ zɛɛ ma kadaai, eeci atu niigi Jɔn anyek kizi nyakaŋan.”
42020007	Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niigi Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ kagaya ŋinti da akuni dɔyizi ci Jɔn o.”
42020008	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk naana kaduwakuŋ igeet dɔyizi can kagɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko dook o.”
42020009	Uduwak ni Yesu ɔl yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci aḏowa kɛɛn ci amadi kɛbɛrɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anyek niini ɔl oogi keevit mana nico ka ma abiir, ka keŋerit niini been nɔɔgɔ. Ɛɛrɔn ni niini ook ŋaati rɛɛn many.
42020010	Ma iinyaye o teedinto, itoonak niini gabaren cin ɔl o keevinto ka kiiya kooyɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ cigin. Bar ɔl ci keevinto noko uruyit gabaren nico, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci akɔyi.
42020011	Bodo akɔ itoona niini gabaren oma, bar ɔl ci keevinto noko ŋaan amɛna bodo aruk buk gabaren nico. Ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci akɔyi.
42020012	Bodo aku itoonek niini nɔɔgɔ gabaren oma, ma avu aruk niigi nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma atooyek bitaalin.
42020013	Abaabanun ni ɛɛti ci mano noko izi nɛ, “Kayo kutugu ku? Abon kitoonei nɔɔgɔ ŋɛɛran onan kareez ɛlɛ. Kaga nɔkɔ aŋole tiŋeere niigi nɔɔnɔ.”
42020014	Bar mazi avɔ acin ɔl ci keevinto noko nɔɔnɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛrti eet o mano nɛɛn. Abon karuk nɔɔnɔ kadaak ka kaala ciginɛ o dook kizi cigaac.”
42020015	Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ aruk kadaak mana bawuca.” Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko zin tiŋeere ɛɛti ci mano noko aku agoonek ɔl nicoko naa?
42020016	Bar kanɛ aku tiŋeere niini, ma aku aruk ɔl ci keevinto noko kadaayitɔ, ma anyek mana ɔl oogi.” Mazi azii ɔl yabziin nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ ri bai abil nɔkɔ.”
42020017	Ɛgɛlɛm ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Mazi yo zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo akati naa? Azi niini nɛ, Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ceezi biyɛnɛ, ma apɛz kizi gi ci labak, bar bɛ o titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk biyɛn o eenycinto dook nɛɛn.
42020018	Ma ɛɛti ci iinak bɛ nici aduuli yivyiv. Maje ɛɛti ci iinak bɛ nico nɔɔnɔ uurti kututut.”
42020019	Ma arɔɔŋ ɔl o ademzek ɔl lotinok kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo kagamit Yesu ziite nice, eeci aga niigi ariik niini nɔɔgɔ zooze nico, bar olla eeci aŋole niigi ɔl.
42020020	Orooŋit ni gɔl ci ka kagamti nɔɔnɔ. Ma avɔ atɔlɔk ɔl oogi guruci, ka kɔɔt kedetit Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni eleeti kizi ɔl ci abon, ka kalabta nɔɔnɔ kijinit kaal gɛnyiza zɛɛ mazi anyak gi ci gɛr aduwa, ka kooti nɔɔnɔ rooni alaane o Rom.
42020021	Ma avu anek roote nici Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, kagayin naaga ineet kaala ci aduwa niina, ma ademez o dook kaal ci alɛɛmnyai. Ma akɔmnin ineet tɛl, bar ademez ɔl gɔl o Joowo een didi.
42020022	Inoko zin di duwayet. Mayo aganɔ ŋaati karuwɛki alaan o Rom meeri, yo akɔm da?”
42020023	Maje Yesu aga zɔɔz cineeŋ adɛti niigi nɔɔnɔ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
42020024	“Anycaŋ di gurucoc kicin. Ma riritɔni kibeen zaar ci anyak gurucoc nici o ci ŋɛnɛ?”
42020025	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ci Sizar.” Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek zin Sizar kaal o akati nɔɔnɔ. Maje Jook anycek kaal o akati nɔɔnɔ.”
42020026	Buk enico ɔkɔm zɔɔz ci ka kagamti niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna ŋina. Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti zooze ci abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ o, olla kapaŋantɛ kɔkɔm gi ci aduwa.
42020027	Ma avunak ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Sajuzi Yesu. Niigi ɔl o gɔɔn adaŋnye azi nɛ, Alaŋ bodo ɔl iŋaaz daayiza. Ma avu ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ayeedeket baale Mosis lotinɛt ci azi nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti ci ɔrɔcɔ maŋaan akɔm ŋaa cin o dɔl, abon gɔtɔnnya ci ŋaan arogi o anyak ŋaa cin o ka kitirak nɔɔnɔ dɔl.
42020029	Anyak zin baale ɔl ceen gɔtɔn een torgɛrɛm. Ɔrɔcɔ ni ceen abuu o, ma adaai iŋaan kitira dole. Iiya ni anyawun gɔtɔnnya ci anowɔ ki nɔɔnɔ o ŋaa, ma adaai buk nici iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dole.
42020031	Ma bodo buk aku agɔɔn gɔtɔnnya ceen kɔrgɛn o nɔkɔ. Ma akɔrkɔranɔn niigi dook ŋaa nɔkɔ zɛɛ been tir logote ceen tutur o. Ma adaai niigi dook kɔkɔm dɔl ci arita.
42020032	Ma vurta adaak buk ŋaa.
42020033	Mayo zin tiŋeere ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ŋaa nici akati ŋɛnɛɛn giye o niigi dook torgɛrɛma anyakti ŋaa nico?”
42020034	Ma abarzek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔcɔ ɔl loota ŋina inoko o doon.
42020035	Maje bar ɔl o tiŋeere iŋaaz daayiza, ma avɔ rogete o abil been nɛɛn, alaŋ bodo niigi arɔcɔ.
42020036	Ma alaŋ buk bodo niigi adaai, eeci otobtɔ niigi ki toonnyak o Joowo. Iziti niigi dɔl ci Joowo giye o tiŋeere iŋaani niigi daayiza.
42020037	Ma ɔl o adaai iŋaaz bodo tiŋeere niigi daayiza. Uduwa baale Mosis gi nico waragewe o Joowo ŋaabaal acini niini lugurgoc o alanyit e. Ma awo niini Jook azi nɛ, .Iook o Ibrayim, ki Aizak, been Jakob.
42020038	Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico akati gi o alaŋ ɛɛnɛ Jooi Jook ci ɔl ci adaai, bar niini Jook ci ɔl ci arogi, eeci ɔl dook ŋaatin arogi.”
42020039	Ma abɛkɛkɛ ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o ademzek ɔl lotinok nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, abarzeket gi ci abon.”
42020040	Azi nɔkɔ o, eeci otoŋole niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma alaŋaan arɔɔŋ kijinit niigi bodo nɔɔnɔ gi oma.
42020041	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn niiga anonu nɛ, Kiristo niini katin dole ci dɔl o Devid o, ku?
42020042	Kajine o, eeci azi Devid alya waragewe onin beniinowu nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Aavu libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin ineet rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
42020044	Mazi awo Devid niini alya Kiristo kizi Manyi cin o, ka zin bodo kizi dole ci dɔl cigin ku?”
42020045	Mazi ŋaan azii ɔl dook zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ, enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Egenyit ole o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Arɛɛz niigi gɔɔn ŋaati aborcɛki rumanɛ ci alina, ma arɛɛz ŋaati azaawi ɔl nɔɔgɔ titinyɔnta ŋaati awɔyi golowɛ, ma gɔɔn avɔ arayek niigi eleeti lɛcɛrɛ o abon ceezine o lotento been vitɛnane o gɔɔn azɔli ɔl dayiin.
42020047	Ma buk gɔɔn avɔ aavtiz niigi ki ŋaai o bɔi ka kadakti nɔɔgɔ looc. Ma arɔɔt gerzitin uneeŋ ŋaati ajini Jook ŋinti wun kal kɔlɛ kɔrgɛna. Bar zin katin payiin cineeŋ gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɔl dook.”
42021001	Mazi akɔ Yesu ceeze o Joowo,acin ɔl ween arɔk ŋaati avu ajukɛkɛ guruc loidoŋ o ceezu.
42021002	Ma acin buk niini ŋaa ci bɔi amaat ajukek milinyanɛ ceen ram loidoŋ nico.
42021003	Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, anyek ŋaa ci bɔyɛ noko Jook guruc ci meel kujuk ɔl oke dook.
42021004	Eeci ɔl oke dook anyek Jook kaal ci anyigjai arokzete uneeŋ. Maje bar niini amaat ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek Jook guruc ogin ona anyak e dook.”
42021005	Maje nuyawa o Yesu ogɛn anaat linat o ceez o Joowo, eeci ɛɛnycai niini biyene ci alina, ma anyak kaal ci alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ci gɔɔn anyek ɔl Jook.
42021006	Bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaal ci acinu noko dook, anyak iiten oma ci alibɛn niigi dook lai kɔkɔm bɛ codoi ṯɔr ataadonek gɔɔn tadena.”
42021007	Ijinit ni nuyawa Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ma dim kaala nicigi akanai tiŋa? Ma katin ma izi iiteni nica ajɔn, kagaya ku?”
42021008	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iziti vililɛ! Má anyeku ɔl koogi kalabtawuŋ. Eeci iima avu ɔl ci meel zaarc cigan, ma avu anekuŋ nɛ, Aneeta Kiristo nɛɛn ce. Inoko iiya iiteni. Bar zin niiga má aziiŋnu zɔɔz cineeŋ o been nɛɛn.
42021009	Mazi iziiktu oroonok kibeen looc yawyawitin, má rak aŋolinu looc gaga, eeci kaala nici ŋɛdɛt rak akanai ɔɔwa nɔkɔ, bar zin looc dican alaŋ ɔrkɔra ki kaal nicoko ecodoi nɔkɔ.”
42021010	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ɔɔrɔ waanma modɛna olla yaka. Kuturi ce ki kutur co ɔɔrɔ. Alaani ce ki alaan co ɔɔrɔ.
42021011	Ma amɔɔt waanma tɔdɔwa vitɛnane ogɛn kirakirak, ma anyak lɔɔci tarjo ki moorizok ci gɛr vitɛnane ci meelik, ma ayelzai tammu kɛŋa kaala ci anyek ɔl kanyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
42021012	Zin maŋaan rak kakatai kaala nicigi, agamnyuŋ tiŋeere ɔl igeet, ma agiduŋ, ma akɔlakuŋ rooni, ma arekuŋ sijin, ma avoyuŋ alaatɛ, eeci atuyaŋ niiga aneet.
42021013	Bar zin nici waŋi cunooŋ ka uduktakɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ kaviyak o Joowo abon.
42021014	Anycek zin niiga zinzeeti kalalit labak calaŋ abaabanu gi ci aniyu nɛ, Kayo kɔɔtɔ kuduktak nɔɔgɔ naa?
42021015	Eeci tiŋeere iitene nice ŋaan kanyuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz ganiin ki dɔyiz ci atɛɛzanu ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet dook kapaŋantɛ, kɔkɔm gi ci aduwa.
42021016	Ma iinyaye niceke iirikuŋ tiŋeere baatugooc, ki yaatugooc ɛlɛ, ki gotonogu, ki atenok ugooc, been laŋotugooc, ma aruk niigi oogi ŋaatunooŋ kadaayitɔ.
42021017	Amarninuŋ waanma ɔl dook igeet, eeci anuyaŋ aneet.
42021018	Bar zin akɔ ma akɔm ŋaatunooŋ imitat ci oowu adoi ṯɔr iina been nɛɛn.
42021019	Mã amezu piryakzɛt labak, ajowanu koca tiŋeere rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
42021020	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma acinu takirnya ci modɛn oogi ivita ilikta Jerusalɛm, agaac niiga iiya libɛn oninɛ izi ajɔn.
42021021	Abon zin ɔl o abaak Judiya adokonyonek biyɛn. Maje ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma, abon aluuk ŋinaante. Ma ɔl o adɛyai Jerusalɛma, abon aavtiz calaŋ avunak.
42021022	Eeci nicaga iinya o acacinɛ Jooi nɛɛn, ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zoozowa dook o aduyai waragewe o Joowo.
42021023	Nɔŋ ci kol zin tiŋeere iinyaye niceke ɔrɔɔt ŋaane o anyake been ŋaane o arokti. Eeci akunak tiŋeere libɛn ci appe ɔrɔɔt looc nice giye o abornɛkɛ Jooi ɔl niceke nɔŋ.
42021024	Aruwe katin ogɛn dilanyai, ma agamnyi ogɛn kɔɔt kacabtɛ loocowe ogɛn. Ma abal Jerusalɛm ɛlɛ modɛna ogɛn zɛɛ ma akɔ adicai irkitowa ci baliin cineeŋ o.”
42021025	Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Iiten ci akuni Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e, anyak katin kaal ci ayelzai iiwa, ki nyelowa, been monyonyɛ. Maje loota ŋina apalpalani katin maama liilowɛ, ma amacucɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ keteede modɛn o loocu dook biyɛta, ma akunak nɔɔgɔ ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42021026	Aruk tiŋeere ɔl kulurkuluri katavalitɔ ki ŋoliin ŋinti ŋaan rak arɛwi niigi kaal ci gɛr ka kakatai loota neke. Eeci tiŋeere kaala o ɛɛl tammu bɔbɔra amɔɔt, ma ookci.
42021027	Keyelizai ni naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kakuni diizoca dɔyiza been diŋdiŋonte ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
42021028	Mazi akanai kaala nicigi, itiŋgaz jena odoŋit ooti ki taden, eeci ɛlyaan unooŋ izi ajɔn.”
42021029	Ma uduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Abaabamt di kɛɛt ween moneec kibeen buk kɛɛn oogi.
42021030	Gɔɔn mã acinu bɔlɔk ugeec itilizit, agayu izi lɔlɔŋumi ajɔn.
42021031	Buk zin gole nico ma acinu kaal nicoko akatai, agaac izi baliin o Joowo ajɔn ka kiiya.
42021032	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, iina tiŋeere kaala nici dook iŋaan kidicai ɔl nicigi dook.
42021033	Adicai katin tammu taden ki looc, maje zɔɔz cane o abil kɛlɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ zɛɛ been nɛɛn.
42021034	Egenyit eleetine ugooc ka calaŋ atalvanyanuŋ zinzeeti baayinɛt ci awudu nyaantanɛ gil, kibeen gi ci anyeku zinzeeti kivirit kaale ci akati rogɛt unooŋ looce nico zɛɛ makacin iiyayuŋ iiteni nica boyoŋyoŋ calaŋ agayu.
42021035	Eeci atoroban tiŋeere iiteni nica ɔl loocok dook kɛrɛk nɔɔgɔ kiyo gɔɔn atoroban kelegit curi o.
42021036	Egenyit zin ijinit Jook tup ka anyayit dɔyiz ci avardaŋnyu kaalyan ci avunak looc neke dook zɛɛ ma avɔ arumnyaŋ aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.”
42021037	Ma adica Yesu iinya niceke dook adɛmɛz ɔl waaz ceeze o Joowo. Ma yomana awɔ akɔ ooŋnyak biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
42021038	Ma avunak gɔɔn waanice ɔl dook ceez o Joowo ŋeere ririwɔna ka kivita kiziiyit niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ademzin.
42022001	Mazi akɔ ajɔn iiteni o gɔɔn adayi ɔl o Juz ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar o gɔɔn aadanɛ niigi iiten baal avardaŋi toonnyaiti o Joowo ceezi ugeec looce o Masiro e, ivita alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok orooŋit gɔl ci ka komonyci Yesu calaŋ ɔl aga, eeci aŋole niigi ɔl.
42022003	Enico ook Loryen zinize o Judaz o kazi Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe o Yesu een amɔtɔ ram.
42022004	Ɔtɔɔ ni niini, ma akɔ azɔɔz ki alaat o ceez o Joowo been alaat o takirnya o abɛk ceez o Joowo gɔl ci ka kanyaakɛ niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
42022005	Ataltɔ ni niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma aterkedek niigi nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci ka kanycekɛ guruc.
42022006	Agama ni Judaz zɔɔz cineeŋ o, ma akɔ arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kakatakɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu kɔkɔm eet ci aga.
42022007	Mazi akɔ een iiten o gɔɔn adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, ma atɔŋdi niigi mirkici o ŋaan miliny o aadanɛ iiten o vardaŋinto, itoon Yesu Pitɔr ki Jɔn anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ orooŋit ŋinti ka utuguzi dayiin cigaac kaadanɛ iiten ci vardaŋinto o.”
42022009	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Koota kutuguza ŋaaḏaŋ?”
42022010	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di juruŋ. Avoyu tedec zɛɛ ma kutura ŋinaante arumonu kibeen eet ci anyak iju ci maamu. Oneec zin nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been kɔrɔk ci akɔyi o. Ɔɔt zin enektek eet ci ceez nico o nɛ, Anekin gayoiti nɛ, Abil ceez ci ka kiiya kadakta ki nuyak ogan dayiin o vardaŋinto ŋaaḏaŋ?
42022012	Ŋaan zin ayelekuŋ tedec niini ceez ci alɔlani ci ɛɛnyci gɔɔn tadena, ma anyak kaal o ceezu dook, ka zin ɔɔtɔ utuguzi dayiin.”
42022013	Mazi avɔ niigi, ɔɔt didi ojokta kaal dook eona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e. Utuguzɔ ni dayiin.
42022014	Mazi izi ŋinti ka kadaktɔi, ivita Yesu kibeen toonnyak ogin oogi, ma avu aavtiz niigi dook loota ka kadaktɔ.
42022015	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ii baale laadun karooŋ naana iiten nico kiiya ka kozolit ki igeet dayiin ci vardaŋinto noko iŋaan kiiyayan piryakzɛt o.
42022016	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo kazɔl ki igeet dayiin ci ɛɛl kiyo nici noko zɛɛ ma kavɔ kazɔl dayiin o vardaŋinto een didi baliinte o Joowo.”
42022017	Odoma ni Yesu jayitot ci nyaanu, ma anyek Jook zany, ma azi nɛ, “Odomta jayitot nico iribanit niiga dook.
42022018	Eeci alaŋ bodo kazɔl naana ki igeet nyaan nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma aku baliin o Joowo.”
42022019	Bodo adoma ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kadayit, ma anek nɛ, “Nicini ɛlɛ onan anyonekuŋ igeet nɛɛn. Utuguz zin gɔɔn nɔkɔ ŋaati aadanaŋ aneet.”
42022020	Mazi adotiz dayiinta, anyek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ jayitot ci nyaanu ewe anek nɛ, “Ma jayitot nicini terkediin o colai o ka kɛɛlayuŋ Jooi igeet biyete ogan aḏuuti ŋaatunooŋ.
42022021	Mazin ɛɛti o ka kook kiiriyan aneet, karomena ki aneet ŋina ɛlɛ.
42022022	Maje naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abon kadaai ebaal arek Jooi laadun, bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci iirikan aneet o.”
42022023	Mazi azii niigi gi nico, ijintɔ niigi maany iziktɔ nɛ, “Ma dim ŋɛnɛɛn ŋaatinai ci ka kook kutuguwek nɔɔnɔ gi nico o?”
42022024	Ma akanai daŋɔn nuyawɛ maany giye ci akati ŋɛnɛɛn ci adikir ŋaatineeŋ.
42022025	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn alaata o loocu anyak dɔyiz ole ugeec abal. Ma awɛ niigi kizi ɔl ci titiny.
42022026	Bar zin ŋaatunooŋ alaŋ abon ŋaati agoonu buk niiga nɔkɔ. Ma ɛɛti ci adikir ŋaatunooŋ, abon niini abadaan ɛlɛ kizi kidic. Maje ɛɛti ci arayinuŋ igeet, abon anyek ɛlɛ kibil kiyo gabarɛnti o.
42022027	Yo gɔɔn adikir ɛɛti jaŋ? Adikir ɛɛti ci aavi loota olla arɛ dayiin kanyaayai o, yo da adikir ɛɛti ci anyaak nɔɔnɔ dayiin o? Ma ɛɛti ci aavi loota arɛ dayiin o eet o adikir nɛɛn. Bar zin inoko naana ŋaatunooŋ ŋina kabil kiyo gabarɛnti o.
42022028	Igeet nɛɛn o amɛnanu karomɛ ki aneet iinya dook gidente onan.
42022029	Kanyuŋ zin tiŋeere naana igeet alaazɛt kiyo buk anyan baaba aneet o.
42022030	Kadake tiŋeere naana ki igeet, ma kawodɛ ki igeet baliinte onan. Ma aavtiyu katin niiga lecerene o ka apakti boryok o Israyil een amɔtɔ ram.”
42022031	Ma azi Manyi Yesu nɛ, “Saiman, Saiman, ziik di. Ojowa Loryen gɔl ci ka kitivanyuŋ igeet kiyo gɔɔn ivanyit ŋaa labi o.
42022032	Bar zin kijineyin naana ineet Jook ka calaŋ iina niina tuwente unun. Ka zin iitene ci abadakan niina aneet e, ka itiir gotonogu o tuwento kodoyit.”
42022033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, kagama buk naana cabiin ci kacabin ki ineet, ma kadaai been ineet labak.”
42022034	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakin ineet Pitɔr, akɔ tija adaŋnyan niina aneet lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci.”
42022035	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baale mã kitoonuŋ igeet kɔkɔm guruc, ki kaboot ci dayiino, been caava e, anyak gi ci ɔɔt atamaatu tɔ?” Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina.”
42022036	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti guruc karabɔŋ een kaboon ci dayiino, abon adoma kanyak. Mã akɔm eet kabaz ci wun, abon ataalinɛ rum ka kataala kabaz.
42022037	Kaduwakuŋ igeet gi nico o, eeci iiya iiteni o ka kɛlɛɛmnyai gi baal akanan aneet baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Akeebek katin ɔl nɔɔnɔ ɔl ween libjok.” Mazin didi kaala dook o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta akanan aneet avɔ zɛɛ iina.”
42022038	Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, cin di. Kanyaka ŋaato kabazwa ci wuntik ram.” Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mɛɛlɛ nicigi alya.”
42022039	Ma iŋaaz Yesu kutura, ma akɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc eonin laadun. Ma ɔrkɔr buk nuyawa ki nɔɔnɔ.
42022040	Mazi avɔ arum ŋinite, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Ijinit Jook ka calaŋ iinanu kaale o acinanuŋ.”
42022041	Ma ooŋnek niini nɔɔgɔ looc, ma icak kidicilim, ma akɔ akani kozoŋti looc ajin Jook azi nɛ,
42022042	“Baaba, nyɛyi da piryakzɛt nico ŋaatan. Matɛ arooŋ, nyɛyi. Bar zin alaŋ een giye ci karɔɔŋɛ naana, bar olla tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina.”
42022043	Iiyak ni nɔɔnɔ toonnyaiti ci Joowo, ma aku anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz.
42022044	Ma acirit nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma abedonek ŋaryiin lak ci meel gɛr. Ma amolok kakat molowot tɔdɔ kiyo biyeta o.
42022045	Mazi adotiz ŋaryiinta, itiŋa imiirozek toonnyak, ma akɔ amɔda nɔɔgɔ bar oogin. Apirna niigi, eeci acirit nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt giye ci aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o.
42022046	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooginu naa? Itiŋgaz ijinit Jook ka calaŋ iinanu kaale o acinanuŋ.”
42022047	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, ivita kɔlɛ ci meelik. Arayan nɔɔgɔ Judaz ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram. Ma akunak niini Yesu, ma aku acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc zaawinta.
42022048	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Judaz, aku iirikan niina aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati acucuyan ŋalyamoc?”
42022049	Mazi acin nuyawa oginɛ gi ci ka kakatai noko, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Manyi, keteŋeda nɔɔgɔ kabazwani labak?”
42022050	Ma iŋaaz codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma aŋɛdɛt gabaren ci alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat ci azo o por.
42022051	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bil di! Má ŋaan bodo abɛdɛkɛ.” Ma uum niini eet nico itat, ma alal nɔɔnɔ itati enico ɛlɛ.
42022052	Ijin ni Yesu alaat o ceez o Joowo, ki alaat o takirnya o ceez o Joowo, been ɔl o adikir avu ka kivita kagamit nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Akɔ ma avunakaŋ kabazwani kibeen kɛɛni kiyo avunaku libjoi o naa?
42022053	Baalyo karomɛ naana ki igeet ceeze ci Joowo noko tup nɔkɔ, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ. Inoko zin nici waŋi cunooŋ ajowanu niiga baliinte o Loryento.”
42022054	Agamit ni niigi Yesu, ma avɔyi ole o alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo. Maje Pitɔr ano nɔɔgɔ vurta rɛɛna kidicilim.
42022055	Maje kɔrɔk kɛŋa ŋinaante anyak ɔl ci aavtiyɛ goo. Iiya ni Pitɔr, ma aku aromonek nɔɔgɔ aavɛ buk goo.
42022056	Mazi acin dole ceen gabaren ole nice Pitɔr aavɛ goo nɔkɔ, ɛgɛlɛm niini nɔɔnɔ, ma azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici buk gɔɔn ɔrkɔr ki Yesu.”
42022057	Ma adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Dole, alaŋ kaga eet nico been nɛɛn.”
42022058	Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiyezin ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Een ri buk niina nuyai codoi nuyawe o eet nico.” Abɛdɛkɛ bodo Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm ŋɛr, alaŋ keen nuyai cin.”
42022059	Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɛbɛɛyɛ ɛɛti oman ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici nuyai ci Yesu gi, eeci niini buk een eet ci Galili.”
42022060	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eet onaaŋ, alaŋ naana kaga zɔɔz ci aduwa o.” Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz niini nɔkɔ, ɔrɔk toloci.
42022061	Ma abuudi Manyi Yesu, ma agɛlɛm nɔɔnɔ. Aada ni Pitɔr zɔɔz o Manyi Yesu baal anɛki nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci e.”
42022062	Ma adun Pitɔr akɔ kɔrɔk bawuca, ma aku alu ŋinaante ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
42022063	Maje ɔl ci baal abɛk Yesu o, amomoz nɔɔnɔ. Abuŋ niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ, ma aruk, ma bodo ajin anek nɛ, “Duwayet di! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci arukin o?”
42022065	Ma aduwak buk niigi nɔɔnɔ zoozok ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ci adɔmi niigi nɔɔnɔ.
42022066	Ma ŋeere olotai ɔl o mayan baayizo, ki alaat o adikir ceeze o Joowo, been ɔl o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Anyaaktak ni ɔl nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
42022067	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Duwayet di, ma dim niina een Kiristo nɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo nuun inoko kaduwakuŋ, alaŋ atuyaŋ been nɛɛn.
42022068	Buk inoko mã kajinuŋ naana igeet gi oma, alaŋ abarzekaŋ.
42022069	Bar zin akatai waanico naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kakɔ kaavi aziite o Joowo azo.”
42022070	Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Een zin bɔŋ niina Ŋɛɛrti Joowo?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwanu niiga o.”
42022071	Mazi azii niigi zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋaan bodo karɔɔŋ bacok, eeci kiziiyit naaga alya zoozok ogin otoge onin ɛlɛ.”
42023001	Ma iŋaaz ɔl dook, ma avɔyi Yesu alaane o kazi Pailat.
42023002	Ma avɔ akana niigi kaal ci aŋanyi nɔɔnɔ, azi nɛ, “Kajowana eet nico ademzek ɔl gɔl ci gɛr. Anek niini ɔl nɛ, Má aruweku alaan o Rom adikir meeri. Ma bodo buk azi nɛ, Niini alya Kiristo nɛɛn. Anyek niini ɛlɛ kizi alaan.”
42023003	Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niina een alaan o Juz nɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
42023004	Enek ni Pailat alaat o ceez o Joowo been kɔlɛ dook nɛ, “Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa eete nico ka kapayek nɔɔnɔ.”
42023005	Mazi azi Pailat nɔkɔ, egerenyit niigi, bar ɛbɛɛktɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Eet nico gɔɔn arumuz ɔl dook Judiya ŋina kɔɔyɔktɔ demziinte onin. Akana iiten baale laadun Galiliya zɛɛ makacin inoko iiya urumet ageet ŋina.”
42023006	Mazi azii Pailat gi nico, ijinun ɔl enek nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici eet ci Galili?”
42023007	Mazi akɔ aga niini Yesu eet ci Galili, itoonek nɔɔnɔ Erod o abal looc nice. Maje buk waanice Erod alya aavi Jerusalɛma.
42023008	Mazi akɔ acin Erod Yesu, atalɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci gɔɔn da azii niini kaviyak o akati Yesu rɛɛna, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci acini nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Arɔɔŋ niini kicin Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye keberene ogin ɛlɛ.
42023009	Ijin ni niini Yesu kaal ci meel ɔrɔɔt. Maje bar Yesu akɔm gi codoi ci abarzek nɔɔnɔ.
42023010	Ma iŋaaz alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Juz, ma aduwa kaal ci akani Yesu vɔlɔŋa.
42023011	Omomozit ni Erod been takirnya ogin Yesu, ma aminaŋi nɔɔnɔ. Ma aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ rum ci alina momozɛnta, ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ bodo ŋaati Pailat.
42023012	Maje rak baale Pailat ki Erod amarnɔ. Ma iitene ci baal agami ɔl Yesu neke, izitɔ bodo laŋoten.
42023013	Otowa ni Pailat alaat o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o mayan baayizo, kibeen buk ɔl oogi ŋaatodoi.
42023014	Ma aku anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baale rak anyaakaŋ eet nico aniyu nɛ, Ademzek niini ɔl gɔl ci gɛr. Mazi ona kajin nɔɔnɔ igeet kɛbɛrɛn ŋina noko, akɔm gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ebaal aduwanu niiga e.
42023015	Ma buk Erod akɔm gi ci gɛr ajowa ŋaatin giye ci abadaket niini nɔɔnɔ ageet ŋina o. Akɔm zin ɛɛti nici gi ci gɛr agɔɔn ka kurukti naaga nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
42023016	Ŋaan zin olla kanyi takirnya kuruyit nɔɔnɔ nyaboyɛn zɛɛ ka koboroc kɔɔtɔ.”
42023017	Maje gɔɔn laadun iitene o vardaŋinto ɔɔgak Pailat nɔɔgɔ eet codoi ole o acabje.
42023018	Mazi azii kɔlɛ zɔɔz ci Pailat noko, egerenyit niigi dook azi nɛ, “Ruwɔ eet nico kadaak, bar ɔɔgayet Barabas.”
42023019	Maje ɛɛti ci kazi Barabas noko, acabji niini zooze ci da ayɔwɔn ɔl kutura, ma aruwɛn ɛɛti oman kadaak.
42023020	Maje Pailat arɔɔŋ kɔɔk Yesu kɔtɔɔ. Ma ajin niini kɔlɛ bodo zɔɔz ci ka kɔɔgi Yesu.
42023021	Bar enico egerenyit niigi dook iziti nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak! Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak talakeca!”
42023022	Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ eceen lak iiyu o anek nɛ, “Agɔɔn dim ɛɛti nici gitaz ci gɛrzɛ o? Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz. Olla zin karooŋ nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔɔyɛ nyabowa doon zɛɛ ka kɔɔgɛ kɔtɔɔ.”
42023023	Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ talakeca!” Nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin apawun Pailat Yesu eci arɔɔŋi niigi o.
42023025	Ma ɔɔgak nɔɔgɔ eet o arɔɔŋ niigi baal acabje yowonte o ayɔwɔn ɔl kutura, ma aruwɛn ɛɛti oman kadaak e. Ma anyek niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu ka kɔɔt kutuguzek niigi nɔɔnɔ gi o arɔɔŋ kutuguzek.
42023026	Ooti ni niigi Yesu. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, urumtɔ ki eet ci kazi Saiman ci aluuga looce o kazi Sariin. Iŋaana niini ɔlɔ arɔɔŋ kiiyak Jerusalɛm. Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ dɔyiza, ma anyek kitik kɛɛt ceen talakec o konowi Yesu vurta.
42023027	Ma ano kɔlɛ ci meel gɛr Yesu. Buk kole nico anyak ŋaai ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔgɔ ci aluwek Yesu.
