42023028	Mazi azii Yesu ŋaai nicoko alu nɔkɔ, ubuut niini nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ŋaai o Jerusalɛm, má aluwekaŋ aneet, bar utuluzek eleeti cugooc o ki dɔl ugooc.
42023029	Eeci avu waanma iinya ci anɛ ɔl nɛ, Amayuk bar da Jooi ŋaai o awɔ koliin o ŋaan laadun kanyayit dɔl.
42023030	Ma buk azi tiŋeere niigi iitene nice nɛ, Alaŋ kini iinaket biyɛn nici bar komonycet kɔɔtɔ ḏim ni.
42023031	Eeci mã agoononekan aneet kaal ci gɛrzɛ noko, bar tiŋeere igeet agoononekuŋ kaal ci gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk can o “
42023032	Mazin waanice avɔyi niigi Yesu kibeen ɔl ceen agoryak een ram ka kɔɔt kurukte buk niigi kadaayitɔ been nɔɔnɔ.
42023033	Mazi avu arum ŋinti kazi Amɛn ci Oowu, otodeec niigi Yesu kibeen ɔl ceen ram noko ŋinaante. Adɔdi codoi Yesu libire ci azo o, maje codoi adɔdi nɔɔnɔ libire ci kaŋeto o.
42023034	Ma aŋaryɛ Yesu azi nɛ, “Baaba, aara nɔɔgɔ oŋec nico labak, eeci alaŋ aga niigi gi ci agɔɔn o.” Ma aŋerek takirnya eleeti rumanɛ o Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni niigi maadico.
42023035	Maje kɔlɛ ɛɛl agɛlɛm kaal ci agooni noko dook. Maje bar ɔl o Juz adikir amomoz Yesu anɔ nɛ, “Arogoz ri gɔɔn niini ɔl oogi. Mã een didi niini Kiristo o aŋɛra Jooi nɛɛn, anyek zin di kɛɛla ɛlɛ cin o maany.”
42023036	Buk takirnya amomoz nɔɔnɔ. Anyaak niigi nɔɔnɔ nyaan ci gɛr acaŋkai, ma avu arikɛ otok.
42023037	Ma anek nɛ, “Mã een didi alaan o Juz nɛɛn, ɛɛla di ɛlɛ cun o.”
42023038	Maje kɛɛt ceen talakec adodinɛ Yesu o ayeedonek zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Nicini alaan o Juz.”
42023039	Maje ɛɛti codoi ole ween agoryak adɔdi ki Yesu e amomoz buk niini Yesu azi nɛ, “Alaŋ een niina Kiristo? Ɛɛla zin ri ɛlɛ cun o kibeen buk ageeta.”
42023040	Egerenyek ni gɔɔn ceeni nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Alaŋ aŋole Jook? Apawoneket ageet daayizi kiyo niini o.
42023041	Bar zin payiin cinai o alɛɛmnyai kaale ogaac kagɔɔn, maje ɛɛti nici akɔm gi ci gɛr agɔɔn kina.”
42023042	Ma abuut niini Yesu, ma anek nɛ, “Má anyi kibiirin ɔɔ. Aadawan buk tiŋeere aneet iitene ci abadanɛ aku ɛɛnɛ alaan e.”
42023043	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, tedec waanico ɛlɛ karomɛ naana ki ineet ŋaao rogeto.”
42023044	Ma waaz iilya idiitɛ ii kalimik kizi lɔɔci dook muur gilinyik zɛɛ been ziik ween iiyu yomana.
42023045	Ma areeci rum o gɔɔn aŋerin ceez o Joowo kɔrgɛna cac.
42023046	Ma agɛrɛny Yesu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Baaba, karekin vɔŋiz onan aziit unun.” Aduwa zɔɔz nico, ma atɛɛt enico ɛlɛ.
42023047	Maje alaani ci takirnyawu aavi ŋinaante acin kaal nicoko nɔkɔ, ma anaat niini Jook azi nɛ, “Didilɛ, ɛɛti nici bar da eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt.”
42023048	Mazi acin kɔlɛ ci ona aavtiz ŋinaante o dook kaal nicoko, imiirtozek korogjok ugeec ŋaati agami ooti iinoni Yesu.
42023049	Maje ɔl ween laŋoten o Yesu dook, been ŋaai baal anowa nɔɔnɔ Galiliya e, aŋaamnek niigi dook kaal nicoko rɛɛna nɔkɔ.
42023050	Maje waanice ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Josev ci abaak kuture o kazi Arimatiya abaai ɔl o Juz. Niini eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɛ niini waanice kuni o baliin o Joowo. Buk niini alya alaan codoi ole o roonnyo. Bar zin waanice alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kaal ci gɛr arɔɔŋ kutuguzek gɔnɔgja Yesu o.
42023052	Ook ni niini alaani o kazi Pailat, ma akɔ ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kanyek Yesu kook kada.
42023053	Mazi akɔ aziiknek Pailat nɔɔnɔ kooyi Yesu, ook aara nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec, ma aku amanocek rum ci abon zɛɛ ook ni arek bɔɔt ci abil biya ci ŋaan laadun akɔm eet ci adaai arek ɔl been nɛɛn.
42023054	Maje waanice iiteni nica iiten ween jima ka tiŋeere kizi iiten ci ɔl o Juz yubzento kazi Sabit.
42023055	Odomta ni ŋaai baal ɔrkɔra kibeen Yesu Galiliya e, orkorit buk ki Josev ɔɔt bɔɔta, ma avɔ acin ŋinti aronek Yesu o.
42023056	Ma amiironek niigi korogjok, ma avɔ agɔɔna karacɛnɛn ki karkarɛt ci ka kɔɔt kuvuudi ɛlɛ o Yesu bɔɔta. Ma iitene ween Sabit ayubuz niigi eo aduwan lotinowa.
42024001	Ma iitene o yubzento ririwɔna oloyit ŋaai ooti karacɛnɛn ki karkarɛt baal agɔɔna e bɔɔta.
42024002	Mazi avɔ arum niigi ŋinite, bar acin bɛ baal abuŋi ɔl bɔɔt otok e aaryai bɔɔt otoga.
42024003	Mazi avɔ bɔɔta eecitɔ, ajowa ɛlɛ o Manyi Yesu iziitɔ.
42024004	Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Mazi ŋaan ɛlɛ niigi apaŋani nɔkɔ, bar acin ɔl ceen ram ci anyak rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr eelnek nɔɔgɔ libira.
42024005	Ma aloc ŋaai ooti, eeci aŋole ɔl nicoko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anek ɔl nici nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Avu arooŋnyu eet ci arogi ŋaati ɔl ci adaai o naa?
42024006	Azee zin niini ŋina tɔ. Itiŋa daayiza. Aada zɔɔz baal aduwakuŋ niini igeet iitene baal aavɛ Galiliya e.
42024007	Waanice azi niini nɛ, Tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto anyononek azɛɛn ci ɔl o oŋenu, ma avɔ adɔdɔ niigi nɔɔnɔ talakeca, ma iŋaaz niini bodo daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
42024008	Aada ni ŋaai didi zɔɔz onin baal aduwa e.
42024009	Imiirte ni niigi, ma avɔ aduwak kaal nicoko dook nuyak ween amɔtɔ codoi kibeen buk ɔl o aromɛ ki nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.
42024010	Ma ŋaai nicigi waanice awoyi Meri o looc o kazi Magdala, ki Jowana, ki Meri ween yaati Jemis. Ma avu aduwak niigi been buk ŋaai oogi toonnyak kaal nicoko.
42024011	Maje toonnyawa bar apɛz gi ci aduwa ŋaai noko kizi gi ci labak, ma alaŋ arek niigi zinzeeti juruŋ.
42024012	Itiŋa ni Pitɔr, ma adɔkɔny akɔ bɔɔta. Ma ŋinaante mazi ululi ka kɛgɛlɛm bɔɔt eecitɔ, bar acin rumanɛ doon, akɔm bodo gi oma kina. Ma amiiri akɔ ɔlɔ kibiir ɔɔ giye nico tɛt.
42024013	Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ itiŋgazɔ nuyawa ceen ram ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Ɛmɛyaz. Maje kuturi nica adɛwɔ ki Jerusalɛm kidicilim.
42024014	Ma gɔla imicit niigi ozoozit zɔɔz ci akati kaal ci baal agooni Jerusalɛma neke.
42024015	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ nɔkɔ, iiya Yesu alya, ma aku ɔrkɔr kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
42024016	Acin ŋɛdɛt niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ɔrkɔri o nɔkɔ, bar anyak gi ci agargarɛn nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ calaŋ iiyez nɔɔnɔ.
42024017	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma dim .gitaz ci azoozu gɔla ŋaan oke zɛɛ o?” Ma ɛɛl niigi ŋaati anyorani ŋumti.
42024018	Ma ajin ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci kazi Kiliyopas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een eet ci aavɛ Jerusalɛma maŋaan da ga kaal ci baal agooni iinya nicoko noko niina doon nɔkɔ?”
42024019	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kalakaz da ci utuguze o?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaal baal agoononek Yesu o Nazarɛt e. Niini waanice nyakaŋan ci anyak dɔyiz ci appe ɔrɔɔt zɔɔza kibeen kaale o agɔɔn buk, ma agayi niini Joowa kibeen ɔla buk.
42024020	Ma bar ivita agamit nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo been alaat ogaacak abal ɔl, ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ rooni ka kapawozek nɔɔnɔ daayizi zɛɛ makacin didi ɔɔt otodowit niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec.
42024021	Maje naaga laadun kabaabana kaniya nɛ, Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o ka kiiya kɛɛla ɔl o Israyil. Bar zin inoko ɔɔt iinya iiyon ci adaai.
42024022	Ma adoma ŋaai cigaacak ogɛn alowonek bɔɔt uyen ŋeere ririwɔna, ma avɔ ajowa ɛlɛ onin iziitɔ bɔɔta. Ma avu ateedet niigi ageeta biye giye ci azi nɛ, Acin niigi toonnyak ci Joowo, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Yesu oroga.
42024024	Bodo buk ivita ɔɔtɔ ɔl cigaacak ogɛn bɔɔta. Mazi avɔ abada, avu azi nɛ, Abil didi eona aduwan ŋaai e. Ŋaan kicinit buk niigi ɛlɛ o Yesu bɔɔta.”
42024025	Enewun ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma niiga eeginu tarbalɛ, ma alaŋ atuyu kaal baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta e taman nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
42024026	Udukta niigi baale laadun iziti nɛ, Kiristo abon rak apirna kaale nicoko dook iŋaan kook diŋdiŋonte onin.”
42024027	Ma oobek Yesu nɔɔgɔ zoozok o akati nɔɔnɔ aduyai waragenyaye o Joowo dook, akana waragewe o ayɛɛt Mosis zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ waragenyaye o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta dook.
42024028	Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi kutur ona laadun avɔyi e, utugu Yesu ɛlɛ kiyo ɛɛti o arɔɔŋ kidicek o.
42024029	Ma alam niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Má adicei! Taŋu ŋaatinaaŋ ŋina, eeci izi lɔɔci baalin.” Ook ni niini ka kataŋu ŋaatineeŋ.
42024030	Mazi avɔ aavtiz loota ka kadaktɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ.
42024031	Enico ɛlɛ okole nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ ugeecik, makacin agaac bar tɛ nici Yesu nɛɛn. Ŋinaanto izi Yesu ḏim nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ.
42024032	Ma anɔ ɔl nicigi nɛ, “Uyen laadun ma kɔrkɔra ki nɔɔnɔ gɔla, ma oobeket niini zoozok o akati waragɛ o Joowo e, akanet zɔɔz nica zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
42024033	Ma iŋaaz niigi enico ɛlɛ, ma amiironek Jerusalɛm, ma avɔ amɔda nuyak ween amɔtɔ codoi been gɔnɔgi ci tuwento oogi alotɛ ŋaatodoi.
42024034	Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Itiŋa didi Manyi daayiza! Eyelewun ɛlɛ Saiman.”
42024035	Uduktak ni buk ɔl ci ona een ram o gɔnɔgi kaal ona acin gɔla e, ki zɔɔz o agayi niigi Yesu ŋaa ona atɛɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ ḏokoc e.
42024036	Mazi ŋaan oobek ɔl nici gɔnɔgi zɔɔz nɔkɔ, bar acin niigi Yesu ɛlɛ ibil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azi nɛ, “Abonanu.”
42024037	Ma ateedi nɔɔgɔ biyeta kanyayit ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, bar abaaban niigi anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi miniŋit.
42024038	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku ŋoliin naa? Ma da niiga abaabanu kizik bar alaŋaan kiŋaaz daayiza korok bodo?
42024039	Egelemit zin di tobɛ ci kanyei azɛɛnɛ ki zɔɔnɛ o ka agayaŋ niiga didi nici aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn. Uumtaŋ buk ka agayaŋ jnrnŋ, eeci miniŋiti alaŋ anyak ɛlɛ ki amɛ kiyo acinaŋ kanyei naana o.”
42024040	Azi nɔkɔ, ma ayelek nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn ki zɔɔ.
42024041	Mazi ŋaan anyek niigi kizi lutɛt nɔkɔ giye o aromi niigi talniin been ooti biirɛz, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku yo gi ci kadei tɔ ŋina?”
42024042	Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ kulugit ci aaki.
42024043	Ma adak nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ŋina.
42024044	Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baal ŋaan kɔrkɔri ki igeet e, kuduwayuŋ kaal ci inoko ka kivita kutuguzozeyan aneet noko dook, eeci ka kɛlɛɛmtɛ zoozowa o akanan aneet ayeedi lotinowe o Mosis, ki zoozowe o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta, been waragenyaye o beniinowu.”
42024045	Ɔkɔl ni niini nɔɔgɔ ooti ka kagaac zoozok o aduwa waragɛnya o Joowo.
42024046	Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedi zin baale gi ci azi nɛ, Kiristo abon rak agide zɛɛ ŋaan bodo iŋaaz daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.
42024047	Ma abon uuwaki kaviyawa o ka kabadi ɔl mony oŋene ugeec, ka kaara Jooi nɔɔgɔ oŋɛ ugeec zaare ogin, ka kakatai Jerusalɛma zɛɛ ma akɔ adala modɛn dook.
42024048	Eeginu zin niiga bacok kaale nicoko dook.
42024049	Ŋaan zin kakɔ kitoonakuŋ gi o atɛrkɛt baaba ka kitoonayuŋ igeet. Abon zin rak arewinu Jerusalɛma ŋina zɛɛ ma akunakuŋ dɔyizi o Joowo.”
42024050	Itiŋa ni Yesu Jerusalɛma arawɔi nɔɔgɔ ooyi ŋaati kazi Bezani. Ma ŋinaante ook odoŋun niini azɛɛn, ma amayuk nɔɔgɔ dook.
42024051	Mazi ŋaan amayuk niini nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, ɔdɔŋɛ niini ki tammu taden. Otoŋek nɔɔgɔ looc ook niini tamma.
42024052	Idiŋdiŋanit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma abadaak Jerusalɛm talniinte ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
42024053	Ma aavtiz gɔɔn niigi waanice iinya dook ceeze o Joowo anyek Jook zany.
43001001	Baale da laadun kinatamma e zɔɔz tɔ, ma zɔɔz nici aromɛ kibeen Jook. Mazin da zɔɔz nici Jook nɛɛn.
43001002	Aromɛ baale laadun kinatamma e niini kibeen Jook.
43001003	Ma ɛɛnycai kaal dook ŋaatin, ma akɔm gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ calaŋ ɛɛnycai ŋaatin.
43001004	Ma waanice zɔɔz nici rogɛt nɛɛn, ma rogɛti nici anyaak ɔl vooritin.
43001005	Ma vooritin nici iiya otokol muur, ma ŋaan muuri kidiit nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.
43001006	Anyak baale eet ci itoona Jooi ci kazi zaar nɛ Jɔn.
43001007	Aku niini ka kiiya kizi bacoi ci vooritino ka kutuweec ɔl dook vooritin nico.
43001008	Mazin niini alya alaŋ een vooritin nɛɛn, olla niini bacoi ci vooritino.
43001009	Mazin nici vooritin ween didi baal akunak looc ka kiiya kotokol ɔl dook e nɛɛn.
43001010	Aavi waanice zɔɔz nici tɔ loota laadun, ma ɛɛnycai lɔɔci ŋaatin, ma bar ŋaan lɔɔci kaga nɔɔnɔ.
43001011	Akunak niini ɔl ogin maany, ma ŋaan ɔl oginɛ alya kagamta nɔɔnɔ.
43001012	Maje ɔl o agama nɔɔnɔ, ma atu zaar ogin anyek niini nɔɔgɔ dook dɔyiz kiziti dɔl ci Joowo.
43001013	Alaŋ eegin niigi dɔl ci Joowo gole o aritan ɛɛti ci deer, bar eegin niigi dɔl cigin tiryante o Joowo.
43001014	Ma zɔɔz nici otowɛ izi eet ci deer, ma iiya abaak niini ŋaatinai. Anyak niini dɛtɛn ki bonat ci appe. Kicinta naaga alya diŋdiŋɔn onin baal anyonek nɔɔnɔ giye o ɛɛnɛ niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
43001015	Uuwak waanice Jɔn ween bacoi onin azi nɛ, “Eet baal kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Anowanan tiŋeere ɛɛti ci adiŋdiŋ ŋaatan e nɛɛn nici. Eeci aavi niini tɔ baale laadun iŋaan naana kitiryai e.”
43001016	Mazin dɛtɛne onin adikir kojokta naaga dook mayuwɛnɛt ci appe.
43001017	Anyaa baale Jooi lotinok ŋaaten Mosis, maje dɛtɛni kibeen zɔɔz ween didi ajoyai ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo.
43001018	Akɔm laadun eet ci icinun Jook. Bar ŋɛɛrin o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ o atobɔ ki nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o anyewun nɔɔnɔ kagawɛ.
43001019	Ceeni zin bacokzɛt o Jɔn iitene baal itoonakɛ ɔl o Juz Jerusalɛma nɔɔnɔ alaat o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o kazi Livai ka kɔɔt kijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ kenektek nɛ, “Ma dim ineet ŋɛnɛɛn?”
43001020	Mazin Jɔn ŋaan kadaŋɔ, bar waanice aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci abil tɔp anek nɛ, “Alaŋ keen naana Kiristo o ka kiiya nɛɛn.”
43001021	Ma ajin bodo niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet zin ŋɛnɛɛn? Ineet Ilija?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm.” Ma bodo ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een bɔŋ nyakaŋan gi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm.”
43001022	Ma vurta enektek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ineet zin ŋɛnɛɛn? Duwayet ka kɔɔt kuduktaya naaga ɔl ci ona itoonanet o zɔɔz ci akanin ineet.”
43001023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Keen naana molok ci kuuwai balala ebaal aduwan nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya anɛ nɛ, Anyak tiŋeere molok ci uuwak balala azi nɛ, Amadek Manyi gɔl onin kibil tɔp e.”
43001024	Ma ajin bodo ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ,
43001025	“Zin mã alaŋ een niina Kiristo, ma alaŋ een Ilija, ma buk alaŋ een nyakaŋan, oony zin ɔl naa?”
43001026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Koony naana ɔl maami doon, bar zin anyak eet oma ŋaatunooŋ ci ŋaan niiga agaac.
43001027	Aku anowanan tiŋeere niini aneet vurta, ma alaŋ kaganona naana ŋaati kaborcanɛ nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zɔɔnɛ.”
43001028	Ma kaala nicigi dook agooni ŋaao kazi Bezani liil o kazi Jordan libire ci jenu e ŋaabaal oonyi Jɔn ɔl e.
43001029	Ma iitene co icinun Jɔn Yesu akunak nɔɔnɔ, ma azi nɛ, “Icinit di nyɔɔn o Joowo aku ka kiiya kaara baciinok o loocu nici.
43001030	Eet zin baal kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Anowanan tiŋeere ɛɛti ci adiŋdiŋ ŋaatan e nɛɛn nici, eeci aavi niini tɔ baale laadun iŋaan naana kitiryai e.
43001031	Mazi naana alya ŋaan nɔɔnɔ kaga, olla zin naana kakun, ma koonyɛ maami o ka kagaac ɔl o Israyil nɔɔnɔ.”
43001032	Ma buk aduwa Jɔn zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Kacin iiten baale Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak looc tamma kiyo yɛɛlac o, ma aku aavi ŋaatin.
43001033	Ma naana alya ŋaan nɔɔnɔ kaga, bar zin Jooi o itoonanan aneet ka kiiya kotoony ɔl maami anekan nɛ, Acin tiŋeere Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak looc tamma, ma aku aavi eete oman. Mazin ɛɛti nici eet o ka kotoony ɔl Vɔŋize o Joowo nɛɛn.”
43001034	Ma azi Jɔn nɛ, “Kicina naana alya kaal nicoko. Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Ɛɛti nici ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn.”
43001035	Ma iitene co bodo aromɛ Jɔn kibeen nuyak ogin een ram.
43001036	Mazi acin niini Yesu ŋaati awɔyi, izi nɛ, “Nyɔɔn o Joowo nica.”
43001037	Mazi azii nuyawa ceen ram noko zɔɔz nico, oneec niigi Yesu.
43001038	Mazi abuudi Yesu, acin nɔɔgɔ anowa nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu naa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Rabai, aavɛ ŋaa?” (Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nico kazi nɛ alaan o demziinto.)
43001039	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ivita ka icinit ŋinti kaavɛ o.” Maje ziiti izi ziik wec yomana. Ma ɔrkɔr niigi kibeen nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been ŋin o aavɛ niini. Ma aromɛ niigi kibeen nɔɔnɔ iiten nice dook.
43001040	Ma nuyawe ceen ram azii zɔɔz ci aduwa Jɔn, ma ano Yesu noko codoi ŋaatineeŋ Andoru ween gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr.
43001041	Kataman nɔkɔ ojowa Andoru gɔtɔni o kazi Saiman, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kujuktawa Masaya.” (Ma kɛŋ ci kazi Masaya o kazi nɛ Kiristo ween ruguzoi.)
43001042	Ooyi ni niini Saiman ŋaati Yesu. Ma agɛlɛm Yesu Saiman, ma anek nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko akatozeyin ineet zaara ci kazi Sivas.” (Ma zaara ci kazi Sivas o kibeen zaar ci kazi Pitɔr o akati kɛŋ cinɛ bɛ.)
43001043	Ma iitene co ook Yesu looce o kazi Galili. Ma gɔla urumtɔ kibeen eet ci kazi Pilip. Maje Pilip laadun eet ci kutur o kazi Bezediya. Buk Andoru kibeen Pitɔr abaak kuture nice. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.”
43001045	Ma akɔ Pilip ŋaati Natanyɛl, ma anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kojoktawa eet baal ayɛɛt Mosis waragewe o lotinowu, ma ayɛɛt buk nyakaŋanɛta e. Niini Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Josev o kutur o kazi Nazarɛt.”
43001046	Ma ajin Natanyɛl Pilip anek nɛ, “Ma dim anyak gi ci abon didi ka kiiya Nazarakti?”
43001047	Mazi akɔ acin Yesu Natanyɛl akunak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, izi nɛ, “Eet zin ween Israyilen didi akɔm ŋaatin vɔlɔŋ nɛɛn nici.”
43001048	Ma ajin Natanyɛl Yesu anek nɛ, “Agayan ku?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kicinin uyene ŋaa ona aavɛ loota raa moneeca iŋaan Pilip kotowawin e.”
43001049	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Natanyɛl nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, een niina ŋɛɛrti Joowo. Ma een alaan o Israyil.”
43001050	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Utuwɔ, eeci kanekin nɛ, kacinin uyen ŋaa ona aavɛ raa moneeca e? Ŋaan zin bar tiŋeere acin kaal ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk nicoko.”
43001051	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, acinu tiŋeere niiga tammu taden akoli, ma acinu toonnyak o tammo avɔ tammu tadena, ma avunak looc ŋaaten Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.”
43002001	Ma iinyaye ceen iiyu anyak tiŋkawiin kuture o kazi Kana abil looce o kazi Galili. Maje yaati Yesu aavi buk ŋinaante.
43002002	Ma awo buk ɔl Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ŋaati tiŋkawiinto noko.
43002003	Mazi akɔ adicai nyaani, enek Yesu yaatinɛ nɛ, “Ɔkɔma ɔl nyaan.”
43002004	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een zɔɔz cun. Ŋaan rak aneet iiteni onanɛ kiiya ka keyelek ɔl diŋdiŋɔn onan.”
43002005	Ma anek yaati Yesu ɔl ceen gabara o nɛ, “Olla gi ci aduwakuŋ niini igeet odomta utuguz.”
43002006	Maje ŋinaante anyak ijunya ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ci ɛɛnycai biyene ci gɔɔn arek ɔl o Juz maam ci ka kutuguzi niigi kɛɛr uneeŋ toonyento. Akɔyi gɔɔn iju codoi burwɛt eetoma karabɔŋ een eetoma kamɔtɔ.
43002007	Ma anek Yesu gabara nɛ, “Ibitizit ijunya nicoko maami.” Ibitizit ni niigi ijunya maami tɔc.
43002008	Enek ni Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Otogoca zin inoko ci miliny anycek eet ween abuu o tiŋkawiinto.” Otogocak ni zin didi niigi nɔɔnɔ.
43002009	Mazi akɔ atar ɛɛti ceen abuu ci tiŋkawiinto noko maam ci utuye kizi nyaan noko, alaŋ aga ŋinti akuni nyaani nici o. Maje gabara ona agɔca maam e aga niigi nɔkɔ. Otowa ni ɛɛti ceen abuu ci tiŋkawiinto o eet ci arɔcɛ o.
43002010	Ma aku anek nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl dook anyaak rak kernok nyaan ci abon o ɔɔwa zɛɛ mazi ook abaaktɛ ɔl, anyaaktak ni niigi nɔɔgɔ nyaan o acaŋkai. Maje bar niina itaŋ rak nyaan ci abon o kibil zɛɛ anyaa ni vurta.”
43002011	Nicini zin gi o atɛɛt ɔl biyɛ agɔɔn Yesu ɔɔwa kuture o kazi Kana looce o kazi Galili nɛɛn, ma ayelzai waanice titinyɔni oninɛ. Makacin utuweec nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ.
43002012	Mazi akɔ adicai tiŋkawiin nici, ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu ki yaatin kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi been nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Kapernam, ma avɔ amɔn ŋinaante iinya ci miliny.
43002013	Mazi ka kiiya iiteni o ɔl o Juz gɔɔn aadanɛ niigi iiten baal vardaŋinto e, itiŋaYesu ook Jerusalɛma.
43002014	Mazi akɔ arum niini kaluwa o ceez o Joowo, amada bar ɔl ci ataalinɛ tiin kibeen ɛɛza ki yɛɛla ŋinaante. Maje buk ɔl o abali guruc aavtiz loota ŋinaante tarabɛzɛtɛ.
43002015	Mazi acin niini nɔɔgɔ agɔɔn kaal nicoko, ook utuguwa nyabok ceen loro, ma aku aruwa ɔl ki tiin ki ɛɛza, ma atɔɔwak nɔɔgɔ dook bitaalin. Ma uup tarabɛzɛt kazaantɛ guruca ci ɔl o abali guruc e dook lai.
43002016	Ma agerenyek niini ɔl o ataalinɛ yɛɛla anek nɛ, “Udunti yɛɛla nicoko bitaala. Má anyeku ceez ci baaba o kizi ŋinti taalinto.”
43002017	Aada ni nuyawa oginɛ zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Ma reezinɛt o ceez unun avaadan aneet ziniz kiyo goo o.”
43002018	Abadaak ni alaata o ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci ateedet biye agooneket ka kagayin naaga ineet anyei alaazɛt ci agɔɔnɛ gi ci abil nɔkɔ o.”
43002019	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Oyoyit ceez ci Joowo noko. Ŋaan bodo keenyeti iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
43002020	Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Eenyeti iinyaye ceen iiyu ku? Ceez baal adica irkitok eet ram ki tiin tɔrkɔnɔm eenycinta e.”
43002021	Zin waanice ceez ci Joowo aduwa Yesu o bar akati ɛlɛ onin maany.
43002022	Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Yesu daayiza e, aada nuyawa oginɛ uduwa baale niini gi nico. Utuweec ni niigi waragɛ o Joowo akati nɔɔnɔ kibeen zɔɔz o aduwa Yesu.
43002023	Ma ŋaabaal aavɛ Yesu Jerusalɛma iitene o vardaŋinto e, utuweec nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meelik gɛr kaale o atɛɛt ɔl biye baal icinit niigi agɔɔn niini e.
43002024	Maje bar Yesu alaŋ arek nɔɔgɔ zinizjuruŋ, eeci aga niini ɔl dook nɔkɔ.
43002025	Ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini eet ci aku aduwak nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci akati eet oma, eeci niini alya aga kaal o ɛɛl zinzeetine ugeec nɔkɔ.
43003001	Anyak baale eet ceen Pariciwen ci kazi zaar nɛ Nikodimos. Niini alaan ci Juz.
43003002	Ma baaline oman iiya ook ŋaati Yesu, ma akɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, kagayin naaga ineet nɔkɔ een niina alaan ci demziinto itoonnyai Joowa. Eeci akɔm eet ci agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye kiyo ci agoon niina noko, dooke coma aavi Jooi ŋaatin.”
43003003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, akɔm eet ci acin baliin o Joowo, dooke coma aritai bodo niini kizi colak.”
43003004	Ma ajin Nikodimos nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ka kitiryai ɛɛti ci idikir kizi colak bodo ku? Ka kimiirozek yaatin kɛŋ, ma bodo aritai?”
43003005	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, mã alaŋ aritai ɛɛti maami kibeen Vɔŋize o Joowo, alaŋ baliin o Joowo ajowa been nɛɛn.
43003006	Mã ɛɛti ci aritai alye ci eet o deer, anyak niini ɛlɛ ci eet o deer. Maje ɛɛti ci aritai Vɔŋize o Joowo anyak niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
43003007	Má anyi zin bar kibiirin ɔɔ giye ci kanekin nɛ, Abon aritanu niiga dook iziti colaye bodo o.
43003008	Gɔɔn ŋɔɔti akɔla, ma iim olla libir ci tɛ arɔɔŋ niini. Ŋɛdɛt zin kazii molok ci olla ivaani o. Bar alaŋ kaga aku libire jaŋ, ma aku akɔ ki inin. Abil zin buk ɛɛti ci aritai Vɔŋize o Joowo o nɔkɔ.”
43003009	Ma ajin Nikodimos Yesu anek nɛ, “Ka dim kibil gi nici nɔkɔ o ku?”
43003010	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina alaan ci demziinto ole o Israyil. Alaŋ zin gi nico aga ku?
43003011	Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, naaga kaduwana kaal o kagaya, ma koobja kaal o kicinta. Maje bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu agamta zɔɔz onayaŋ.
43003012	Mayo ma kaduwakuŋ kaal ci loocu, ma alaŋ agamanu o, ma tedec ma kuduwakuŋ kaal ci tammu tadenu ka agamta ku?
43003013	Akɔm zin laadun eet ci ook tamma, bar Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o aavi tamma nɛɛn o iiya tamma.
43003014	Zin kiyo baale adɔŋ Mosis kowat ween ziit kɛɛta balala e, adoŋnyi buk tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto nɔkɔ.
43003015	Ka ɛɛti ci atu nɔɔnɔ calaŋ adaai, bar ka kojowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
43003016	Ma giye o arɛɛzi Jooi looc ɔrɔɔt, anyek ŋɛɛrin o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ka ɛɛti ci atu nɔɔnɔ calaŋ adaai, bar ka niini kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
43003017	Ma Jooi alaŋ itoonak ŋɛɛrin looc ka kiiya kapayek looc gerzitin, bar ka korogoz looc.
43003018	Ma zin ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ apawonek gerzitin, maje eet calaŋ atu nɔɔnɔ apawozek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin odota, eeci alaŋ niini atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
43003019	Apayek zin Jooi looc gerzitin o, eeci iiyak vooritin looc, maje bar ɔl arɛɛz muur kujuk vooritin, eeci agɔɔn niigi kaal ci gɛr.
43003020	Ma ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o gɛr abor niigi vooritin, ma alaŋ avunak vooritin been nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kaal ugeec gɛr agɔɔn keyelizyai.
43003021	Maje ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi dook akunak niini vooritin ka kayelizyai kaala o abon agɔɔn niini, eeci agɔɔn niini kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi.”
43003022	Ma vurta itiŋgaza Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ɔɔtɔ looce o kazi Judiya. Ma avɔ amɔn ŋinaante, ma oony ɔl.
43003023	Maje buk waanice Jɔn oony ɔl ŋaao kazi Anon o ajɔŋzɔ ki ŋin o kazi Salim, eeci mɛɛlɛ maama ŋinaante. Ma avunak ɔl nɔɔnɔ tup nɔkɔ ŋinaante, ma oony niini nɔɔgɔ.
43003024	Ma kaala nici agooni iŋaan Jɔn kacabɛ e.
43003025	Ma iitene oman adaŋtɔ nuyawa o Jɔn ogɛnɛ kibeen eet ceen Juz giye ci akati kɛɛranɛ ugeec gɔɔn oonyi eleeti ka kobontai Joowa.
43003026	Makacin ivitak niigi Jɔn, ma avu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, eet baal arumonu liile o Jordan baagita baal azi nɛ, Niini Kiristo e, inoko oony ɔl, ma avunak ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ. Yo zin gi nici abon?”
43003027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm laadun eet ci anyak dɔyiz mã alaŋ anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
43003028	Ma zin niiga alya iziiktu zɔɔz baal kuduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Alaŋ keen naana Kiristo, bar olla kitoonnyai nɔɔnɔ ɔɔwa e.
43003029	Iziiktɔ di! Gɔɔn laadun nyatarani akati eet o aviica nɔɔnɔ. Maje laŋoti eet o aviica nyataran atalnɛ niini ŋaati aziiŋni eet o aroce molok. Inoko zin naana katalɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
43003030	Abon zin adiŋdiŋ Yesu ɔrɔɔt, maje naana keen cɛlbɛz.
43003031	Ma ɛɛti o aku tamma adikir niini kujuk ɔl dook. Ma ɛɛti o loocu niini eet ci loocu, ma azɔɔz niini kaal o loocu doon. Maje bar ɛɛti o aku tamma adikir niini ole dook.
43003032	Eeci aduwa niini kaal o icinun kibeen kaal o iziiwun tamma, ma bar akɔm eet ci agama zɔɔz cin o.
43003033	Maje zin ɛɛti ci agama zɔɔz cin o niini bacoi ci ayelza gi o Jooi alaŋ ɛɛnɛ voloŋnyoi.
43003034	Ma ɛɛti o itoona Jooi nɔɔnɔ anyaa niini zɔɔz o Joowo, eeci abitiz Jooi nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋize onin.
43003035	Arɛɛz Jooi ŋɛɛrin, ma anyek kaal dook nɔɔnɔ kanyak niini aziite onin.
43003036	Ma ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrin ajowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Maje bar ɛɛti calaŋ ŋɛɛrin agama, alaŋ rogɛt acin, bar bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo aavi ŋaatin.”
43004001	Iziiyit ni ɔl o Parici awaŋ ci azi nɛ, Oony Yesu nuyak ci meel kujuk Jɔn.
43004002	Mazin bar giye ween didi Yesu alye onin akɔm eet ci oony, bar oony ɔl nuyawa oginɛ.
43004003	Mazi akɔ azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, otoŋ Judiya, ma abadaak Galili.
43004004	Ma gɔla iiya idiir niini looc o kazi Samariya.
43004005	Ma ŋinaante ook niini kuture o kazi Sikar o ajɔŋzɔ ki mana baal anyek Jakob ŋɛɛrin o kazi Josev e.
43004006	Maje ṯuuwi o Jakob aavi ŋinaante. Aavu ni Yesu loota ŋinaante uyubuz ṯuuk otoga, eeci apirna niini ki weet. Maje ii ibilun boloca.
43004007	Maje nuyawa oginɛ araktɛ ɔɔtɔ kuture nico ka kɔɔt kataalta dayiin.
43004008	Iiya ni ŋaa ceen Samariyen arɔɔŋ kiiya kɔtɔgɔc maam. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nyan da maam ci kawudi.”
43004009	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nici Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma niina alaŋ een eet ci Juz? Ma naana alaŋ keen ŋaa ci Samariya? Ajinan zin maam ku?” (Azi ŋaa nici nɔkɔ o, eeci gɔɔn laadun ɔl o Juz alaŋ azɔlɔn diicit ci maamu kibeen ɔl ci Samariya.)
43004010	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã aga niina gi o gɔɔn anyek Jooi ɔl, ma agayaŋ buk niina aneet ci kajinin maam o keen ŋɛnɛɛn, abon waan ajinan ka kanyin ineet maam ci rogeto.”
43004011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mazin yo ma alaŋ anyei abala ci ka tɔgɔcai maam, ma wun ṯuuwi o, ka zinjai maam ci rogeto o ŋaaḏaŋ?
43004012	Anyet baale ageeta ṯuuk nico jijitinaaŋ Jakob. Awot baale ṯuuk nico niini alya ki dɔl ogin ki tiin ogin. Ma zin yo niina adiŋdiŋ juk Jakob?”
43004013	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci awot maam nicoko aruk nɔɔnɔ kɔr bodo.
43004014	Maje ɛɛti ci awot maam o kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ, alaŋ aruk kɔr bodo been nɛɛn. Eeci maama ci kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ o ɛɛl alye cin o kizi zawanec ci anyek nɔɔnɔ rogɛt ci abil been nɛɛn.”
43004015	Enek ni ŋaa nici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan, nyan da maam nicoko ka calaŋ bodo arukan kɔr ka buk calaŋ bodo kabada kiiya kɔtɔgɔc maam ŋina.”
43004016	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ towa eet unun ivita ŋina.”
43004017	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔmnan eet.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Didi zin aleema zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Akɔmnin eet o.
43004018	Eeci arii baale lak tur, ma zin ɛɛti ci aavtiyu ki ineet inoko o alaŋ een eet cun. Aduwa zin didi niina zɔɔz ci aleem.”
43004019	Ma anek ŋaa Yesu nɛ, “Alaan, kacinin ineet een inoko nyakaŋan.
43004020	Baale jijitigaacak adiŋdiŋan Jook biye nico, majc bar niiga Juza aniyu nɛ, Abon een Jerusalɛm ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋanti Jook nɛɛn.”
43004021	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziiyan di aneet! Aku tiŋeere iiteni calaŋ bodo adiŋdiŋani ɔl baaba biye nico karabɔŋ een Jerusalɛma doon.
43004022	Adiŋdiŋanu niiga ɔl ci Samariya o gi calaŋ agayu, maje naaga kadiŋdiŋana gi ci kagaya, eeci rogzɛn aku ŋaaten Juz.
43004023	Aku zin tiŋeere iiteni, bar zin buk iiteni nica iiya laadun, ka zin ɔl o adiŋdiŋan Jook didi kidiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ ween baaba vɔŋize onin kibeen zooze ween didi. Eeci arɔɔŋ Jooi ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ gole nico.
43004024	Jooi niini vɔŋiz, ma ɔl o adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ abon adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ vɔŋiza kibeen zooze ween didi.”
43004025	Ma anek ŋaa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kaga ŋɛdɛt tiŋeere aku Masaya ween Kiristo. Zin tiŋeere mã iiya niini, ŋaan aku aduwaket kaal dook.”
43004026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta Kiristo ɛlɛ nɛɛn ci kazɔɔzɔ ki ineet noko.”
43004027	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Yesu ki ŋaa nɔkɔ, abada nuyawa oginɛ. Mazi acin niigi Yesu azɔɔzɔ ki ŋaa nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Bar akɔm ŋaatineeŋ ci anek ŋaa nɛ, “Arooŋ ŋaatin naa?” Karabɔŋ ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Azoozonu ki ŋaa nico naa?”
43004028	Otoŋek ni ŋaa iju onin maamu e looc, ma amiironek kɔrɔk, ma akɔ anek ɔl dook kuture uneeŋ ŋinaante nɛ,
43004029	“Ivita di icinit eet ci aduwakan kaal ogan baal kagoon e dook ce. Bar bɔŋ niini Kiristo nɛɛn?”
43004030	Udunta ni niigi korogjowɛ ivita ɔɔt icinit Yesu.
43004031	Maje nuyawa anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ija, dawɔ.”
43004032	Bar abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyei naana dayiin cigan calaŋ niiga agayu.”
43004033	Ma ajinɔ nuyawa niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Anyak tɛ eet ci anyawun nɔɔnɔ dayiin?”
43004034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Dayiin cigan nɛɛn ci kagɔɔnɛ gi o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet ka kidica liŋliŋɔn onin.
43004035	Gɔɔn niiga anonu nɛ, Adica labina nyɛlɔwɛ wec kani kɛtɛɛdjai. Bar zin naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Icinit di manɛɛn. Inoko ibiiritɔ labina ka kɛtɛɛdjai.
43004036	Mazin gɔɔn eet ci ateedi aruwonek nɔɔnɔ vɔyita ci liŋliŋɔn onin ka kanyaak niini ɔl rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma atalnɛ ɛɛti o eevyi kibeen eet o ateedi buk.
43004037	Alɛɛm zin olit o azi nɛ, Gɔɔn ɛɛti codoi aḏowɛ, maje ɛɛti oman ateedi.
43004038	Kitoonuŋ zin naana igeet ka ɔɔtɔ eteedit manɛɛn calaŋ aḏowanu niiga. Ipirta baale ɔl ogɛn liŋliŋonte nico. Ɔɔtɔ zin niiga ka ɔɔt eteedit manɛɛn ci baal ɛɛva niigi o.”
43004039	Utuweec ni ɔl ci meelik ole o Samariya kuture nice Yesu, eeci anek ŋaa nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aduwakan ɛɛti nici kaal ogan baal kagoon e dook.”
43004040	Mazi avu arum ɔl ci Samariya noko Yesu, ilaltek niigi nɔɔnɔ kɔmɔn rak ŋaatineeŋ. Ɔmɔn ni Yesu ŋinaante iinya ram.
43004041	Mazi adɛmɛz Yesu nɔɔgɔ, utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ demziinte onin.
43004042	Ma anek niigi ŋaa nɛ, “Alaŋ katuwena naaga giye o kaziikna ŋaatun doon, bar katuwena o, eeci kiziikta naaga alya nɔɔnɔ, ma kagawuta buk naaga alya didi niini Kiristo ween ruguzoi o loocu nɛɛn.”
43004043	Mazi adica Yesu iinya ram ŋinaante, itiŋa ook Galiliya.
43004044	Eeci azi niini nɛ, “Akɔm laadun nyakaŋan ci adiŋdiŋan ɔl looce onin ɛlɛ.”
43004045	Mazi akɔ arum Galili, atalta ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante, eeci icinit niigi kaal baal agɔɔn niini e dook iitene baal alotɛn ɔl Jerusalɛma aadanɛ iiten baal vardaŋinto e, eeci buk waanice niigi aavtiz lotente nice tɔ.
43004046	Bodo enice imiirozek Yesu kutur o kazi Kana looce o kazi Galili ŋaabaal ookci niini maam kizi nyaan e. Maje ŋinaante anyak alaan ci amɔɔr ŋɛɛrin ŋaao kazi Kapernam.
43004047	Mazi akɔ azii alaani nici Yesu, itiŋawa Judiya, iiyak Galili. Iiyak niini nɔɔnɔ, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ kook Kapernama ka kook korogoz ŋɛɛrin o arɔɔŋ kadaak ŋinaante.
43004048	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Niiga mã ŋaan ikivtek kaal ci ateeduŋ biye, alaŋ atuwenu.”
43004049	Ma ilalek alaani nici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, ija kiyiiyit taman iŋaan kadaak ŋɛɛran.”
43004050	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ labak! Alaŋ ŋɛɛrun adaai.” Utu ni alaani zɔɔz ci aduwak Yesu nɔkɔ o, ma awɔ.
43004051	Ma gɔla iiya urumtɔ kibeen gabara ci aliŋliŋ ŋaatin, ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Urugun ŋɛɛrun.”
43004052	Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ ka kuduktak nɔɔnɔ ziit ci da mayini dole o. Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abada nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ baritɔni balawaz ziite o adoi waaz.”
43004053	Ma aada baati doleco nici ziit baal anɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ, labak, alaŋ ŋɛɛrun adaai e nɛɛn.” Utuyɔ ni niini kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook.
43004054	Mazin enico izi lak ram ci agɔɔni Yesu kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye eo abadaan niini Judiya akunakɛ Galili e.
43005001	Ma iitene oman anyak ɔl o Juz micit cineeŋ alotɛn Jerusalɛma. Ook ni buk Yesu ŋinaante.
43005002	Maje Jerusalɛma ŋinaante anyak lamurḏen ci ajɔŋɔz araan o azawu. Kazi lamurḏen nico zooze o ɔl o Juz nɛ Bazaaz. Anyak lamurḏenti nici ceezi ceen riinya tur.
43005003	Maje riinyaye nicoko oogin ɔl ci meelik gɛr ole o rubenik ki ole ci ŋɔɔlik been ole ci rɛbrɛbik.
43005004	Eeci waanice gɔɔn toonnyaiti ci Joowo iinyaye ogɛn aku, ma iinak lamurḏen nico, ma amɔɔni maam. Mazi adɔkɔny ɛɛti, ma iinak maam ɔl ɔɔwa iŋaan amɔɔt maama, arogzɛ niini moorizowe ogin dook.
43005005	Ma ole nicoko anyak eet ci amɔɔr irkitok eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin turge.
43005006	Mazi akɔ acin Yesu nɔɔnɔ ɔɔŋ loota nɔkɔ, agawun niini nɔɔnɔ anyak mɔɔriz ŋinti wun ɔrɔɔt. Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ rogɔ mɔɔrize cun noko?
43005007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti ci amɔɔr noko nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, akɔm eet ci ka kooyan lamurḏenta ŋaati gɔɔn tɛ amɔɔni maama. Gɔɔn maŋaan kawɔ gɔla, arawun bar tɛ ɛɛti oman lamurḏen.”
43005008	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.”
43005009	Kataman nɔkɔ urugun ɛɛti nici, ma adoma kuwen onin, ma awɔ. Maje waanice iiteni nica iiten o yubzento.
43005010	Ma anek ɔl o Juz eet ci ona arogzɛ o nɛ, “Nicini iiten o yubzento. Alaŋ zin aganɔ lotinowe ogaac ŋaati ilolɛ kuwen cun o noko.”
43005011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nici nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anekan ɛɛti ci uyen aruguzan o nɛ, Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.”
43005012	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eetjaŋ ci anekin nɛ, Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ, o?”
43005013	Maje ɛɛti nici alya ŋaan kaga ŋɛnɛɛn ci arogoz nɔɔnɔ o, eeci Yesu ɔɔtɔ ŋaao aavtiyɛ kɔlɛ e.
43005014	Ma ŋintimiliny ook ojowa Yesu nɔɔnɔ kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko urugu mɔɔriza. Tɛɛdɔi zin baciinok ka calaŋ bodo akunakin gi ci gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk nice.”
43005015	Ook ni ɛɛti nici uduwak alaat o Juz gi ci anek nɛ, “Bar tɛ ci arogozan o Yesu gi.”
43005016	Gi zin baal laadun amarnin alaata o Juz Yesu, ma arɔɔŋ kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak e nɛɛn, eeci aliŋliŋ niini iitene o yubzento.
43005017	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma baaba gɔɔn laadun aliŋliŋ niini iinya dook nɔkɔ. Abon zin buk naana kaliŋliŋ kiyo niini o.”
43005018	Bar enico otobortek alaata o Juz Yesu nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak. Alaŋ een giye ci baal aliŋliŋi iitene ceen Sabit o doon, bar eeci azi Yesu nɛ, Jooi baatin gi, ma atobzek buk niini ɛlɛ Jook.
43005019	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm ŋɛɛrti Joowo gi ci agɔɔn oowe cin doon, bar agɔɔn niini kaal o acin agɔɔn baatinɛ. Mazin kaal o agɔɔn baatinɛ nɛɛn o agɔɔn buk ŋɛɛrin.
43005020	Eeci Jooi arɛɛz ŋɛɛrin, ma ayelek nɔɔnɔ kaal o gɔɔn agɔɔn niini dook. Bar zin bodo buk tiŋeere ayelek niini nɔɔnɔ kutugu kaal ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk nicoko, ka kibiirtuŋ igeet dook ooti.
43005021	Kiyo gɔɔn iŋaani Jooi ɔl daayiza, ma anyek bodo nɔɔgɔ korogit o, buk tiŋeere ŋɛɛrin agɔɔn nɔkɔ. Anyek rogɛt eet ci olla tɛ arɔɔŋ niini kanyek.
43005022	Akɔm baatinɛ eet ci ka kapak, bar anyewun ŋɛɛrin dɔyiz ci ka kapayi ɔl dook niini.
43005023	Ka zin ɔl dook kidiŋdiŋanit ŋɛɛrin kiyo adiŋdiŋan niigi baatin o. Ma ɛɛti calaŋ adiŋdiŋan ŋɛɛrin, alaŋ buk adiŋdiŋan niini baatin o itoona nɔɔnɔ.
43005024	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci azii zɔɔz o kaduwa, ma atu Jook o itoonanan aneet, anyak niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma alaŋ tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ apawonek gerzitin, bar atayaŋun niini daayiz laadun ook rogɛta.
43005025	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, aku iima iiteni, bar zin buk iiteni nica iiya laadun. Ma iitene nice azii ɔl o adaayitɔ molok o ŋɛɛrti Joowo, ma ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ dook arogi.
43005026	Zin kiyo Jooi alye onin een gɔl ci rogeto o anyek buk niini ŋɛɛrin kizi gɔl ci rogeto.
43005027	Anyewun zin niini nɔɔnɔ alaazɛt ci ka kapai ɔl giye o ɛɛnɛ niini Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.
43005028	Anyak tiŋeere iiten ci aku ci aziikni ɔl o adaayitɔ dook looknyai molok onin. Má anyeku zin kibiirtuŋ ooti giye nico.
43005029	Mazin iitene nice aduŋna ɔl o da gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o abon looknyai, ma arogi rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Maje ɔl o da gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o gɛr apawonek nɔɔgɔ gerzitin.
43005030	Akɔm zin gi ci kagoon naana oowe can doon, bar kapai naana kaal eo aduwakan Jooi aneet. Ma payiin cane o abil tɔp, eeci alaŋ kataman kutugu gi ci karooŋ naana, bar kagoon eo arɔɔŋi baaba o itoonanan aneet.
43005031	Matɛ waan kizi bacoi ci kazɔɔzɛ ɛlɛ cano maany, alaŋ waan kaleem, ma kaala ci kaduwa o alaŋ waan aganɔ ŋaati agamnyan.
43005032	Bar zin anyak eet oma ceen bacoi can. Ma kaga naana zɔɔz o aduwa niini ŋaaten aneet zɔɔz ceen didi.
43005033	Itoonteyu baale niiga ɔl Jɔn, ma aduwa waanice niini zɔɔz ween didi.
43005034	Alaŋ zin karooŋ naana bacokzɛt ci eet ci deer, bar olla kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz nico o ka coma arognu.
43005035	Baale Jɔn abil niini kiyo tokolɛci o gɔɔn ataran looc o, ma waanice ataltowu niiga vooritine onin ŋinbaal miliny e.
43005036	Bar zin naana alya kanyei bacoi ci adikir kujuk Jɔn. Ma kaala ci kagoon naana o kaal ci anyan baaba aneet ka kutugu. Mazin kaala nicigi bacok cigan gi, ma ayelzakuŋ igeet gi o itoonanan baaba aneet.
43005037	Ma baaba o itoonanan aneet niini alya bacoi can. Ŋaan niiga iziiyit molok onin, karabɔŋ acinu ŋum onin.
43005038	Azee zin zɔɔz oninɛ zinzeetine ugooc tɔ, eeci alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o itoonan niini.
43005039	Ɔɔtɔ zin di ekeebit waragɛnya o Joowo, eeci gɔɔn abaabanu niiga aniyu nɛ, Ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ŋaatineeŋ. Ma waragɛnya nicigi alya azɔɔz zɔɔz ci akanan aneet.
43005040	Maje bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu ivitayaŋ aneet ka ojokta rogɛt.
43005041	Alaŋ naana karooŋ titinyɔn ɔla.
43005042	Ma buk kagayuŋ naana igeet alaŋ areezu Jook zinzeetine ugooc.
43005043	Naana kakun alaazete o baaba, ma ŋaan agamtawaŋ. Bar mã anyak eet oma ci aku alaazete cin doon, agamanu niiga nɔɔnɔ.
43005044	Ka zin yo utuyɔ ku, mã areezu niiga ŋaati anaatonu eleetine ugooc maany, maje bar naatinɛt o aku Joowe o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ alaŋ arooŋnyu o?
43005045	Má abaabanu kizik bar tiŋeere kakɔ kakɔlakuŋ naana igeet rooni ŋaati baaba. Bar zin akɔ akɔlakuŋ tiŋeere igeet rooni Mosis o atuyu niiga nɔɔnɔ zinzeeti ugooc.
43005046	Mã da didi utuweec zɔɔz o Mosis, utuyaŋ waan buk aneet, eeci Mosis eteyeedun zɔɔz o akanan aneet.
43005047	Mazi yo ma ŋaan agamta zoozok o ayɛɛt niini o, ka zin agamta zoozok ci kaduwakuŋ naana o ku?”
43006001	Ma vurte nice abaayiz Yesu liil o Galili ook baagita. (Kazi liil nico zaar nɛ Tiberas.)
43006002	Ma ano kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ, eeci icinit niigi kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye baal agɔɔn niini arogzi ɔl o amɔɔr e.
43006003	Otoodit ni Yesu been nuyak ogin bɛ taden, ma avɔ aavtiz loota ŋinaante.
43006004	Maje iiteni o gɔɔn anyayi ɔl o Juz lotɛn uneeŋ vardaŋinto izi ajɔn.
43006005	Mazi adɔŋ Yesu ɔɔ, acin kɔlɛ ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ. Ijinun ni Pilip enek nɛ, “Kayo kataalta dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki ɔl nicoko dook ŋaa?”
43006006	(Aduwa niini gi nico o arɔɔŋ kicina Pilip. Maje niini laadun aga gi ci ka kutugu nɔkɔ.)
43006007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pilip nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔɔŋ guruc ceen kaboot ram ka nuun kojowa ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ dayiin ci miliny.”
43006008	Ma anek Andoru ween nuyai onin een gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr nɛ,
43006009	“Anyak logo ci anyak ḏɔkɛn ceen tur kibeen kuluk ci miliny een ram ŋaato. Ka zin yo dayiin ci miliny tɛr noko kutuguwek ɔl ci meelik noko naa?”
43006010	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek ɔl kaavtiyɔ loota.” Maje ŋinita ŋinti aliz anyak artɛ ci colai. Aavtiyɔ ni ɔl loota. Maje ɔl nici dook een eet amɔtɔ lak tur lɛlɛn tur (5000).
43006011	Odoma ni Yesu ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nuyak ogin ka keŋeryek ɔl. Ma adoma bodo kuluk, ma anyek ɔl ewe. Ma adake ɔl dook zɛɛ ma anyɛr.
43006012	Mazi ook ipiiyantɛ ɔl dook, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Uluta dayiin ci anyigjai o kɔkɔm ci ooŋneku looc.”
43006013	Ma alota niigi ŋodota ci anyigjai o zɛɛ makacin ibitizit gilanya amɔtɔ ram ŋodotaye ci anyigjai ḏokene ween tur adak ɔl e.
43006014	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl gi ci abiirni nɔɔgɔ ooti agɔɔn Yesu noko, izitɔ nɛ, “Izi didi tɛ nicini nyakaŋan baal ka kiiyak looc e nɛɛn.”
43006015	Mazi akɔ aga Yesu arɔɔŋ niigi kagamit nɔɔnɔ ka kanycek kizi alaan dɔyiza, itiŋa ook biyɛnɛ niini doon.
43006016	Ma yomana ɔɔt nuyawa oginɛ liila.
43006017	Ma avɔ atɔɔt kavool, ma abaayiz liil ka kɔɔtɔ Kapernama. Mazi ŋaan awɔ liil kɛŋa nɔkɔ, izi lɔɔci baalin. Maje Yesu ŋaan kurum nɔɔgɔ.
43006018	Maje ŋɔɔti ci appe ivaan, ma ayɛlyɛlan maam ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
43006019	Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi liil kɛŋa nɔkɔ, icinit niigi Yesu awoya maam tadena iima nɔɔgɔ. Anyayit ni niigi ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
43006020	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc! Aneeta gi.”
43006021	Ma atalnɛ niigi, ma atoodek nɔɔnɔ kavool. Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ urum kavooli dɔwɔn ci ŋin ona avunak niigi laadun e.
43006022	Ma ŋeeretine co icinit kɔlɛ baal ooŋnonek looc liil baagita e ɔɔtɔ kavooli baal abil ŋinaante e. Maje niigi aga ŋaan Yesu korkorit been nuyak ogin kavoole nice, bar aga otoŋtek niigi nɔɔnɔ looc.
43006023	Maje bodo kavoolɛta ogɛnɛ avu looce o kazi Tiberas zɛɛ ma avu ajɔŋɔz liiltok ŋinbaal adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn baal anyek nɔɔgɔ Yesu ŋaabaal anyekɛ rak niini Jook zany e.
43006024	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin azeetɔ ŋinaante, otoodit niigi kavoolɛt nicoko ɔɔt Kapernama ka kɔɔt korooŋit Yesu.
43006025	Mazi avɔ ajowa niigi Yesu liil baagita, enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, akunai ŋinito waŋa?”
43006026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ niiga arooŋnyaŋ aneet giye ci agayu kaal baal kagoon atɛɛt ɔl biye e, bar arooŋnyaŋ o giye ci ḏɔkɛn baal adaku zɛɛ ma anyernu e.
43006027	Má aliŋliŋnyu zin dayiin o gɔɔn ame, bar iliŋliŋit dayiin o ɛɛl kodot ween rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Nici zin dayiin o ka tiŋeere kanyuŋ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto igeet nɛɛn, eeci agama Jooi ween baatinai liŋliŋɔn onin.”
43006028	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo zin kutuguza gitaz ci arooŋnyet Jooi ageeta kutuguza o?”
43006029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Liŋliŋɔn o Joowo arɔɔŋ ŋaatunooŋ nɛɛn ci atuyu eet o itoona niini nɔɔnɔ.”
43006030	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko gitaz ci agoon atɛɛt ɔl biye kacina ka kanyet kutuyin ineet o?
43006031	Baale adak jijitigaacak dayiin o kazi mana balala kiyo aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ, Anyek baale niini nɔɔgɔ ḏɔkɛn ci tammu tadenu kadayit.”
43006032	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ḏokoc baal adaku aku tamma e, alaŋ een Mosis nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet, bar baaba nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet. Inoko zin bar anyuŋ niini igeet ḏokoc ween didi o aku tammu tadena.
43006033	Eeci ḏokoc o anyuŋ Jooi nɛɛn o akunak looc tammu tadena ka kanyek looc rogɛt.”
43006034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, nyet zin da gɔɔn ḏokoc nico tup nɔkɔ.”
43006035	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o keen ḏokoc o rogeto. Ma ɛɛti ci akunakan aneet alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ adak magiz. Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ aruk kɔr been nɛɛn.
43006036	Zin kiyo uyene kaduwakuŋ igeet ka icintaŋ aneet e, bar ŋaan utuyaŋ nɔkɔ.
43006037	Mazin ɛɛti o anyan baaba aneet ŋaan akunakan. Ma eet ci akunakan aneet alaŋ naana katooi.
43006038	Eeci kakun naana tammu tadena looc o ka kiiya kutugu gi o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet, alaŋ ka kiiya kutugu gi ci ɔɔ can doon.
43006039	Gi zin o arɔɔŋ baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn ce. Arooŋnyan niini aneet calaŋ kakuluz eet codoi ole o anyan niini aneet. Bar abon kaŋaanɛ naana nɔɔgɔ daayiza iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
43006040	Arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet ɔl dook o acin ŋɛɛrin, ma atu nɔɔnɔ, kojokta rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ŋaan zin kaŋaanɛ naana nɔɔgɔ iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.”
43006041	Enico otoŋomit ɔl o Juz Yesu, eeci azi nɛ, Niini ḏokoc ci akunak looc tammu tadena.
43006042	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim nici alaŋ een Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Josev nɛɛn o kaga naaga dook baatin kibeen yaatin o? Azi zin nɛ, Kakun tammu tadena kakunai looc o, ku?”
43006043	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Otoŋit ŋomtiin cunooŋ o.
43006044	Akɔm eet ci akunakan aneet, dooke coma anyaakan nɔɔnɔ baaba o itoonanan aneet, ka zin kitiŋawi naana nɔɔnɔ iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
43006045	Ayɛɛt baale nyakaŋanɛta zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Adɛmɛz waanma Jooi ɔl dook. Ma ɛɛti ci azii baaba, ma ɛdɛmzɛ niini ŋaatin, akunakan aneet.
43006046	Alaŋ zin bar zɔɔz nico akati kɛŋ cinɛ gi ci anyawun eet ci icinun baatinai, bar eet o aku Joowa nɛɛn o icinun nɔɔnɔ.
43006047	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci atuwe ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
43006048	Zin aneeta nɛɛn o keen ḏokoc o rogeto.
43006049	Baale jijitugooc adayit dayiin o kazi mana baal iina tammu tadena balala e, ma bar niigi waanice ŋaan adaai labak.
43006050	Mazin bar nicini ḏokoc o akunak looc tammu tadena ka kadak ɛɛti ci deer, ma alaŋ bodo adaai.
43006051	Keen zin naana ḏokoc o rogeto o akunak looc tammu tadena nɛɛn. Ma ɛɛti ci adak ḏokoc nico, orok niini izi nɛɛn. Ma ḏokoc ci kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ o ɛlɛ onan kanyi looc ka kojoktai ɔl rogɛt nɛɛn.”
43006052	Zin zooze nico adaŋtɔ ɔl o Juz niigi maany bornɛt nɔŋa anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici ka kanyet ɛlɛ cino kadayit ku?”
43006053	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alaŋ adaku ɛlɛ ci Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o, ma alaŋ awudu biye ogin, alaŋ ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
43006054	Ma ɛɛti ci adak ɛlɛ can o, ma awot biye cigan o, ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ma kaŋaanɛ katin naana nɔɔnɔ korok iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
43006055	Eeci ɛlɛ cane o dayiin ween didi, maje biyeta cigane o kodɛn ween didi.
43006056	Ma ɛɛti ci adak ɛlɛ can o, ma awot biye cigan o, aavi niini ŋaatan, ma kaavɛ naana ŋaatin buk.
43006057	Zin baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn o anyek rogɛt ɔl dook, ma anyan buk niini rogɛt aneet. Mazin buk gole nico kanyi naana rogɛt ɔl o adak ɛlɛ onan.
43006058	Nici zin ḏokoc o akunak looc tammu tadena nɛɛn. Alaŋ atobɔ niini kibeen ḏɔkɛn o kazi mana baal adakjijitugooc, ma bodo adaai labak e. Mazin ɛɛti ci adak ḏokoc nico ojowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
43006059	Ma kaal nicoko aduwa Yesu ŋaati adɛmzi ɔl ceeze o lotento kuture o kazi Kapernam e.
43006060	Mazi avɔ azii nuyawa ci meel nuyawe ogin zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Demziin nici adɔi kak, ka zin yo tedec kiziik ŋɛnɛ?”
43006061	Agawun ni Yesu zɔɔz ci aŋɔmtɔn niigi noko niini doon. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Izi igeet zinzeeti gɛrzɛ giye nico?
43006062	Ma tiŋeere ma acinu Ŋɛɛrti Eeto amiironek tammu taden ŋinbaal aavɛ niini laadun e ka kibil ku?
43006063	Anyaa zin rogɛt Vɔŋizi o Joowo. Maje dɔyizi ci eet ci deer gi ci labak. Mazin zoozowa ci kaduwakuŋ naana o anyaakuŋ igeet Vɔŋiz kibeen rogɛt.
43006064	Bar zin ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatunooŋ alaŋ atuwe.” (Ma Yesu niini laadun kinatamma e aga ɔl o tiŋeere alaŋ atuwe kibeen eet o ka kiiya kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.)
43006065	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Gi zin nɛɛn o kanekuŋ nɛ, Akɔm eet ci akunakan aneet, dooke coma akɔlak nɔɔnɔ gɔl ci ka kiiyakan o baaba e.”
43006066	Ma giye nico imiirye nuyawa ci meel nuyawe ogin ki vurut alaŋaan arɔɔŋ korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ.
43006067	Ma ajin Yesu nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu buk niiga ɔtɔɔz?”
43006068	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ka koota ŋaati ŋɛnɛ? Rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn anyei niina.
43006069	Kutuyin naaga itoonnyai niina Joowa.”
43006070	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een aneet nɛɛn ci kaŋeranuŋ igeet ci eeginu amɔtɔ ram noko? Bar anyak zin eet codoi ŋaatunooŋ ceen Loryen.”
43006071	Aduwa niini gi nico o ariik niini Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat baal ka kook kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ e, ma niini waanice nuyai codoi nuyawe o Yesu een amɔtɔ ram.
43007001	Ma vurte nice otono Yesu Galili doon. Alaŋaan arɔɔŋ kɛɛrɔn kook Judiya, eeci alaata o Juz arɔɔŋ kuruyit nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
43007002	Maje iiteni o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl o Juz ceezi baal abaai niigi balala e izi ajɔn.
43007003	Ma anek gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toŋ ŋinito. Tɔ bitɔ Judiya ka kɔɔt kicinit nuyawa ugune kaal cugun agoon o.
43007004	Akɔm eet ci arɔɔt liŋliŋɔn cin mã arɔɔŋ niini ka kagawɛ juruŋ. Zin giye o agɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko abon ayelei ɛlɛ ɔl dook loota ka kagayin niigi ineet.”
43007005	Aduwa niigi gi nico o, eeci ma een nuun nɔɔgɔ ɛlɛ ween gɔtɔnɔgi ŋaan buk kutuwit nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ buk.
43007006	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan bai iiteni onane kiiya, olla ŋaatunooŋ iinya dook abon labak.
43007007	Ma ɔl o loocu alaŋ amarninuŋ igeet, bar amarninan niigi aneet, eeci kabɔrai naana nɔɔgɔ kaal o gɛr gɔɔn agɔɔn niigi.
43007008	Ɔɔtɔ niiga lotɛnta labak. Alaŋ naana kakɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni onane kiiya.”
43007009	Aduwa niini gi nico, ma aavi rak Galiliya.
43007010	Mazi akɔ avɔ gɔtɔnɔgja lotɛn Jerusalɛma, unuwun bodo buk niini nɔɔgɔ vurta calaŋ ayelzak ɛlɛ ɔl.
43007011	Maje alaata o Juz arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ ole ci ona avunak lotɛn o. Ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Eet we inoo?”
43007012	Ma aŋɔmtɔ ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Niini eet ci abon.” Maje ceegi anɔ nɛ, “Ku? Alaŋ abon, eeci alabek niini ɔl tuu.”
43007013	Bar akɔm eet ci azɔɔz nɔɔnɔ kiziiyɛ, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz.
43007014	Mazi ŋaan kidicai iinya o lotento nɔkɔ, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma akɔ adɛmɛz ɔl.
43007015	Mazi akɔ azɔɔz niini, ibiirit alaat o Juz ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti nici aga kaal nicoko dook ku maŋaan kɛdɛmɛzɔ o?”
43007016	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma kaala ci kademzekuŋ naana igeet o alaŋ een cigan, bar kaal ci eet o itoonanan aneet.
43007017	Ma zin ɛɛti o arɔɔŋ kutugu gi o arɔɔŋ Jooi, ŋaan aga niini mã een kaala ci kademzekuŋ igeet o kaal ci avu Joowa, karabɔŋ bar kazooz naana oowe can doon.
43007018	Bar zin gɔɔn ɛɛti ci azɔɔz dɔyize ci ɛlɛ cin doon, arɔɔŋ niini kojowa titinyɔn ci ɛlɛ onin. Maje bar ɛɛti ci arooŋek titinyɔn eet o itoona nɔɔnɔ, azɔɔz niini gi ween didi, ma akɔm gi ci avɔlŋa.
43007019	Baale ŋaan kanyuŋ Mosis igeet lotinok o Joowo, ma bar akɔm ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ci agama. Arooŋnyan zin uruktaŋ aneet kadaak o naa?”
43007020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ kɔlɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyei niina Loryen alya. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci tɛ arɔɔŋ kuruyin ineet o?”
43007021	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iiten baale anyak gi codoi adikir kagoon, ma abiirnuŋ igeet dook ooti.
43007022	Baale uduwayuŋ Mosis igeet zɔɔz o teedinto. Mazin bar buk nica alaŋ een zɔɔz ci Mosis, bar zɔɔz baal jijitugooc, ma waanice gɔɔn ateedu dɔl iitene ween Sabit.
43007023	Mazi da gɔɔn ma abon ŋaatunooŋ labak ŋaati ateedinɛ dɔlya iitene ween Sabit ka calaŋ abaci lotinok o Mosis, abornekaŋ zin aneet nɔŋ ŋaati karogzɛ eet iiten ceen Sabit o naa?
43007024	Má apaku zin zoozok olla giye ci akat ɛlɛ eci bitaalu, bar apayit zɔɔz gole ci abil tɔp.”
43007025	Ma azi ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Jerusalɛm nɛ, “Ma dim nici alaŋ een eet o arɔɔŋ alaata nɔɔnɔ kuruyit kadaak e nɛɛn?
43007026	Icinit di ŋaati azɔɔzi kɔla labak, ma akɔm eet ci aduwak nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛr. Agaac bɔŋ alaata izi didi niini Kiristo o ka kiiya nɛɛn?
43007027	Ku zin yo koca? Ma kaga naaga dook ŋinti akuni ɛɛti nici o? Bar zin tiŋeere ma aku Kiristo, akɔm eet ci aga ŋinti katin akuni niini o.”
43007028	Mazi akɔ adɛmɛz Yesu ɔl kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ɛgɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe izi nɛ, “Inoko dim niiga agayaŋ aneet ŋɛnɛɛn? Yo buk inoko ŋinti kakunɛ o agayu? Alaŋ zin naana kakun dɔyize can doon. Itoonanan aneet baaba ween Jook ween didi. Ma alaŋ niiga agayu nɔɔnɔ.
43007029	Bar zin naana kaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci kakun naana ŋaatin. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoonanan aneet.”
43007030	Zin giye nico orooŋit alaata ka kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar akɔm eet ci anim kuum nɔɔnɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni oninɛ kiiya.
43007031	Maje ɔl ci meel utuweec nɔɔnɔ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim tiŋeere ma aku Kiristo, agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye kujuk ci agɔɔn ɛɛti nici o?”
43007032	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl o Parici kɔlɛ aŋɔmɔt Yesu nɔkɔ, itoonit niigi kibeen alaat o ceez o lotento takirnya kɔɔt kagamit nɔɔnɔ.
43007033	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Ŋaan rak karomɛ ki igeet ŋintimiliny. Zin ŋaan kakɔ ŋaati baaba o itoonanan aneet.
43007034	Arooŋnyaŋ waanma niiga aneet, ma bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ, eeci ŋinti tiŋeere kaavɛ naana e alaŋ niiga animnyu ɔɔtɔ.”
43007035	Ma anɔ alaata o Juz niigi maany nɛ, “Ŋinḏaŋ ci dim arɔɔŋ niini ka kooyi zɛɛ ma alaŋ kanim naaga kojoktai nɔɔnɔ o? Arɔɔŋ bɔŋ kook loocowe o abaai ɔl ween Garik ka kook kɛdɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ?
43007036	Uyene rak azi nɛ, Katin karɔɔŋ naaga nɔɔnɔ, bar alaŋ kajowa. Ma bodo azi nɛ, Ma ŋinti ka kooyi niini o alaŋ kanim naaga kɔɔtɔ. Ma zɔɔz nici akati kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
43007037	Mazi akɔ een iiten o aṯornɛkɛ lotɛn o adikir, itiŋa Yesu jena, ma azɔɔz molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci aruk kɔr, anyek nɔɔnɔ kiiyayan ka kowodɛ.
43007038	Kiyo azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci atuyan aneet, zinize cino ariik maama ci rogeto.”
43007039	Zin Yesu ŋina azɔɔz zɔɔz o akati Vɔŋiz o ka kanyek Jooi ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ. Maje waanice Vɔŋizi ŋaan kanyozozek ɔl, eeci Yesu ŋaan buk kitiŋa daayiza ka kanyozozek nɔɔnɔ diŋdiŋɔni.
43007040	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl ogɛn zɔɔz o Yesu, izitɔ nɛ, “Didi ri ɛɛti nici nyakaŋan ci Joowo gi.”
43007041	Maje ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Niini ri Kiristo gi.” Bar bodo ogɛn azi nɛ, “Alaŋ Kiristo ka kiiya Galiliya.
43007042	Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Aku katin Kiristo dolene ci dɔl o Devid. Aritai zin katin niini kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm baal abaai Devid e.”
43007043	Zin giye nico ɛŋɛrtɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna giye ci akati Yesu.
43007044	Ɔl ogɛn arɔɔŋ kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar akɔm eet ci ataadek nɔɔnɔ aziit kagam.
43007045	Mazi avɔ amiiri takirnya, ɔɔt ijinit alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici nɔɔgɔ enektek nɛ, “Alaŋaan anyaanu naa?”
43007046	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan baal rɛɛn akɔm eet ci azɔɔz kiyo ɛɛti nici o.”
43007047	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Parici nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alabawuŋ niini igeet buk.
43007048	Inoko alam eet codoi ŋaatinaaŋ karabɔŋ een alaate o Juz ci atu nɔɔnɔ tɔ?
43007049	Ma ɔl ci azii zɔɔz cin o alaŋ aga niigi lotinok o Mosis. Inoko zin niigi anyak toriin o Joowo.”
43007050	Ma anek ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci kazi Nikodimos baal rak akɔ ŋaati Yesu e nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
43007051	“Gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac alaŋ anyet kapaktek eet gerzitin maŋaan kiziiyit gi ci aduwa niini otoge onin ɛlɛ.”
43007052	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Awaaŋ! Een buk niina eet ci Galili? Kɛɛp zin di waragɛ o Joowo ka ga akɔm laadun nyakaŋan ci ka kiiya Galiliya.”
43007053	Enico azaantozek ɔl dook korogjok ugeecik.
43008001	Ook ni Yesu biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
43008002	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna abadaak kaluwa o ceez o Joowo. Ma avunak kɔlɛ ci meel nɔɔnɔ, ma aavi niini loota, ma adɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ.
43008003	Ma anyaak alaata o adɛmɛz ɔl lotinok kibeen ɔl o Parici ŋaa ci agamnyi zoocmaza. Ma avu anyek niigi ŋaa nico kibil nɔɔgɔ dook ŋuma.
43008004	Ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, nicini ŋaa ci agamnyi zoocmaza.
43008005	Ma zin lotinowa o Mosis azi nɛ, Ŋaa ci agamnyi kiyo nici abon avac ɔl nɔɔnɔ biyɛnɛ zɛɛ ma adaai. Mayo zin inoko niina azi giye nico nɛ?”
43008006	Aduwa niigi gi nico o, eeci arɔɔŋ kedetit Yesu ka kojokta gɔl ci agami nɔɔnɔ ka kɔkɔltakɛ rooni. Bar Yesu ululi, ma ayɛɛt looc komolita.
43008007	Mazi ŋaan ajin niigi Yesu nɔkɔ, adɔŋ niini ɔɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã anyak ŋaatunooŋ eet ci ŋaan kabaca baciinok, anycek rak nɔɔnɔ kodoma bɛ ɔɔwa ka kavac ŋaa nico.”
43008008	Zin ulule bodo, ma ayɛɛt looc komolita.
43008009	Mazi avɔ azii niigi zɔɔz nico, iniyit ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi dook kidicilim codoi codoi, akana ole o adikir zɛɛ been o miliny buk. Makacin otoŋtek niigi looc Yesu ki ŋaa we doon.
43008010	Mazi akɔ adɔŋa Yesu ɔɔ, ɔkɔma eet ci acin. Ma anek niini ŋaa nico nɛ, “Ɔl oke ŋaa? Ɔkɔma ŋaatineeŋ eet codoi aavi ka kapayeyin gerzitin?”
43008011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina, alaan.” Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk naana kapayekin ineet gerzitin. Bitɔ zin, ma ŋaan bodo abaca oŋɛ.”
43008012	Ma azoozek Yesu ɔl bodo anek nɛ, “Keen naana vooritin ci loocu. Mã anuyan ɛɛti aneet, anyak niini vooritin o rogeto, ma alaŋ bodo niini awɔ muura.”
43008013	Ma anek ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko niina oobi kaal ci akati ɛlɛ unun maany, ma zin kaala ci ɔɔba o alaŋ een didi.”
43008014	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo nuun koobi kaal ci akati ɛlɛ onan maany, kaala ci kɔɔba o kaal ceen didi. Eeci kaga naana ŋino kakunɛ been ŋinti kakɔyɛ. Maje bar niiga alaŋ agayu ŋino kakunɛ been ŋinti kakɔyɛ.
43008015	Apaku niiga zoozok gole o eet o deer, maje naana akɔm eet ci kapaye gi ci gɛr.
43008016	Bar mã anyak gi ci kapai naana, payiin cane o payiin ceen didi, eeci alaŋ een aneet doon ci kapai zɔɔz nico o, bar kapaka naana ki baaba o itoonanan aneet.
43008017	Ayeedi lotinowe ugooc zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Mã een bacowa ram, alɛɛmyai zɔɔz nici.
43008018	Zin keen naana bacoi ci ɛlɛ onan maany, ma buk baaba o itoonanan aneet, niini bacoi can buk.”
43008019	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aavi baatune ŋaa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ niiga agayaŋ aneet, ma alaŋ buk agayu baaba. Inoko tɛ agayaŋ aneet, agayu waan baaba buk.”
43008020	Ma kaal nicoko aduwa Yesu ŋaati adɛmzi ɔl kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo ŋaao abilni loidoŋ o muco. Ma akɔm iiten nice eet ci agam nɔɔnɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni oninɛ kiiya.
43008021	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iima ŋaan kawɔ naana kooŋnekuŋ looc ŋina. Zin katin arooŋnyaŋ niiga aneet, bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ, ma adaaŋnu niiga waanma iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ nɔkɔ. Ma ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana, alaŋ niiga avoyu.”
43008022	Ma anɔ alaata o Juz nɛ, “Ma dim azi nɛ, Alaŋ naaga kanim kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔyi niini o. Arɔɔŋ bɔŋ ka kuruk ɛlɛ kadaak?”
43008023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ. “Eeginu niiga ɔl ci loocu ŋina, maje naana keen eet ci tammu tadenu.
43008024	Gi zin ci ona kanekuŋ nɛ, Adaaŋnu waanma niiga iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ o nɛɛn. Zin didi niiga waanma adaaŋnu iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ noko mã alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o keen aneet.”
43008025	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niina ineet ŋɛnɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Gi nɛɛn ona kuduwayuŋ rak uyen ɔɔwa e.
43008026	Kanyei zoozok ci meel karooŋ kuduwayuŋ, ma kapayekuŋ igeet. Ma ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet alaŋ niini avɔlɔŋ. Zin olla naana kaduwai ɔl o loocu kaal o kaziiŋna ŋaatin.”
43008027	Ma ŋaan niigi kagaac aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci akati baatin o.
43008028	Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Tiŋeere ma odoŋtu niiga Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keete ween talakec, ŋaan agayaŋu keen naana aneet nɛɛn. Zin enice ŋaan agayu akɔm naana gi ci kagoon dɔyize can doon, bar kaduwa zɔɔz o ayelzakan aneet baaba.
43008029	Ma niini o itoonanan aneet aavi ŋaatan. Ma alaŋ uuŋnan niini aneet kaavu doon, eeci gɔɔn kagoon naana gi o atal niini tup.”
43008030	Mazi akɔ aduwa niini kaal nicoko, utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ.
43008031	Enek ni Yesu ɔl ci atu nɔɔnɔ o nɛ, “Mã azuunu demziin can o, izitu didi koca niiga nuyak cigan.
43008032	Ŋaan zin agayu niiga zɔɔz ween didi, ma zɔɔz ween didi ŋaan ɔɔganuŋ igeet mirɔkzete o baciinowu.”
43008033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Keegina naaga dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim. Ŋaan baal rɛɛn ŋaan kizita mirɔk ci ɔl oogi. Mayo zin kɛŋ jaŋ ci anɛ nɛ, Ŋaan ɔɔgjanu mirɔkzɛta o?”
43008034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci abaca baciinok niini miroi ci baciinowu.
43008035	Ma gɔɔn laadun miroiti alaŋ een eet ci korgu kodot, bar logo o aritak kɔrɔk nɛɛn o abaak niini ɔlɔ kodot.
43008036	Mã ɔɔgawuŋ ŋɛɛrti Joowo baciinowe, ooktewu koca niiga didi.
43008037	Ŋɛdɛt kagayuŋ naana igeet nɔkɔ eeginu dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim o. Ma bar arooŋnyu uruktaŋ kadaak, eeci alaŋ agamanu demziin onan.
43008038	Kazooz zin naana kaal o ayelekan aneet baaba, maje niiga agoonu kaal o aduwakuŋ igeet baatunooŋ.”
43008039	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Baatinaaŋ nɛɛn Ibrayim.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Matɛ didi iziti dɔl ci Ibrayim, agoonu waan kaal ci abon kiyo baale niini e.
43008040	Bar zin naana kaduwakuŋ igeet zoozok ween didi baal kaziiŋna naana Joowa, ma bar arooŋnyu uruktaŋ kadaak. Mazin baale Ibrayim alaŋ agɔɔn kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ.
43008041	Bar zin niiga agoonu kaal o agɔɔn baatunooŋ.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ naana karitana tuuwa. Kanyaka baatinaaŋ codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ween Jook.”
43008042	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kizi da Jooi didi baatunooŋ, areezaŋ waan niiga aneet, eeci kakun naana ŋaatin, ma inoko kaavɛ ŋina. Alaŋ kakun dɔyize can doon, bar nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoonanan aneet.
43008043	Zin alaŋ aziiŋnu kaal ci kaduwakuŋ o naa? Agoonu nɔkɔ o, eeci alaŋ animnyu uzuuti zɔɔz can o.
43008044	Eeginu zin niiga dɔl ceen baatunooŋ nɛɛn Loryen, ma arooŋnyu oneec kaal o arɔɔŋ niini. Niini laadun kinatamma e eet ci monyento. Atɛɛdɔ niini ki leeminɛt zɔɔ, eeci akɔm ŋaatin laadun leeminɛt. Aduwa gɔɔn niini vɔlɔŋ, eeci vɔlɔŋ kɛɛr cin laadun. Niini voloŋnyoi, ma een baati voloŋnyowu.
43008045	Maje naana kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz ween didi. Gi zin calaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o nɛɛn.
43008046	Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci agawekan aneet gi ci kabaci? Zin mã kaduwa gi ween didi, alaŋ atuyaŋ naa?
43008047	Ma ɛɛti o aku Joowa azii niini zoozok o Joowo. Ma zin niiga alaŋ aziiŋnenu o, eeci alaŋ eeginu dɔl ci Joowo.”
43008048	Ma anek ɔl o Juz Yesu bornɛt nɔŋa nɛ, “Een niina eet ceen Samariyen ci anyei Loryen alya.”
43008049	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔmnan Loryen alya. Kadiŋdiŋan naana baaba, maje bar niiga alaŋ adiŋdiŋanaŋ aneet.
43008050	Alaŋ karooŋei naana diŋdiŋɔn ɛlɛ maany, bar Jook nɛɛn o arooŋekan aneet diŋdiŋɔn, ma apayek niini gerzitin ɔl o abornan aneet.
43008051	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã azii ɛɛti zɔɔz can o, alaŋ niini adaai been nɛɛn.”
43008052	Ma anek ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin kagayin didi anyei niina Loryen alya. Mayo nuun een jijitinaaŋ Ibrayim kibeen nyakaŋanɛt baale adaayitɔ. Maje niina azi nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci azooni zɔɔz can o, alaŋ adaai been nɛɛn.
43008053	Ma dim niina ineet ŋɛnɛɛn? Baale baatinaaŋ o kazi Ibrayim kibeen nyakaŋanɛt adaayitɔ labak. Mazi yo niina adiŋdiŋ juk nɔɔgɔ?”
43008054	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ waan kidiŋdiŋan ɛlɛ cano naana maany, alaŋ koca diŋdiŋɔnti cane o een didi. Bar zin adiŋdiŋanan aneet baaba o gɔɔn aniyu niiga nɛ, Jook cunooŋ.
43008055	Bar zin niiga ŋaan agaac nɔɔnɔ, maje naana kaga nɔɔnɔ. Matɛ kizi nɛ, Alaŋ kaga nɔɔnɔ, kavoloŋ waan naana kiyo buk niiga o. Bar zin kaga naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kazoonɛ zɔɔz onin.
43008056	Baale jijitunooŋ Ibrayim atalnɛ ŋaati ka kicini niini iiten onan kakunɛ. Icinun zin niini, ma atalɔ.”
43008057	Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Niina alya ŋaan rak rum irkitok eet ram kamɔtɔ. Icinu zin da Ibrayim waŋa?”
43008058	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ŋaan kitiryai Ibrayim e aneeta tɔ.”
43008059	Ma zooze nico everya niigi biyɛn arɔɔŋ ka kavaci Yesu kadaak. Uduni ni niini nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ ɔɔtɔ ook bitaala.
43009001	Ma iitene oman awɔ Yesu gɔla, ma acin eet ci da aritai kizi ruben nɔkɔ laadun.
43009002	Ma ajin nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ŋɛnɛɛn ci abaca oŋec ci anyek eet nico kitiryai kizi ruben o? Oŋec cin doon yo oŋec da ci baatin ki yaatin?”
43009003	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Rubenzɛt cin o alaŋ anyaa oŋɛci ci abaca niini karabɔŋ een oŋɛci ci baatin ki yaatin. Bar ruben o ka keyelizyai liŋliŋɔnti o dɔyiz o Joowo ŋaatin.
43009004	Abon zin kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn ci eet o itoonanan aneet iŋaan waazin lɔɔci o. Eeci gɔɔn ma izi lɔɔci baalin, akɔm bodo eet ci aliŋliŋ.
43009005	Ma ŋinti ŋaan rak kaavɛ naana loota o keen vooritin ci loocu.”
43009006	Aduwa niini zɔɔz nico, ma oortek amot looc, ma aŋɔnya tɔdɔ amotɛ, ma aŋɔnyɛkɛ eet ci ruben noko kɛbɛrɛ.
43009007	Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ toony ŋum lamurḏente o kazi Siloom.” (Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ itoonɛ.) Ook ni ɛɛti ci ruben noko ŋinaante. Mazi akɔ oony ŋum, izi kɛbɛrɛ oginɛ wak icinɔ.
43009008	Mazi akɔ abada, icinit nɔɔnɔ ɔl o abaawɔ kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Mayo nici alaŋ een eet o gɔɔn aavi loota alaye o nɛɛn?”
43009009	Ma azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ gi.” Maje ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ een nɔɔnɔ, olla atobɔ.” Abarzek ni niini alya nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn.”
43009010	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã een ineet nɛɛn, okole zin kɛbɛrɛ ugune ku?”
43009011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak eet ci kazi Yesu aŋɔnya tɔdɔ, ma aŋonyekan kɛbɛrɛ, ma anekan nɛ, Bitɔ toony ŋum lamurḏente o kazi Siloom. Mazi kakɔ koony ŋum, kicinɔ.”
43009012	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aavi inoko niini ŋaa?” Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga.”
43009013	Ooti ni niigi eet ci baal ruben noko ole o Parici.
43009014	Maje iiteni ci baal akɔli Yesu eet ci ruben noko kɛbɛrɛ o iiten o yubzento.
43009015	Ma avɔ bodo ajin ɔl o Parici eet ci baal ruben noko anek nɛ, “Okole kɛbɛrɛ ku?” Ma abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aŋonyekan ɛɛti oman tɔdɔ ci acɔkcɔi kɛbɛrɛ. Mazi kakɔ koony ŋum, bar kicinɔ.”
43009016	Ma anɔ ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Parici nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci agɔɔn gi nico noko alaŋ een eet ci aku Joowa, eeci alaŋ niini azooni iiten o yubzento een Sabit.” Maje ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci anyak oŋec agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ci ɛɛl ki nici koca ku?” Ɛŋɛrtɔ ni niigi maany kɔrgɛna daŋɔnta.
43009017	Ma ajin bodo ɔl o Parici eet nico anek nɛ, “Ma dim zin niina ci ona akolin ɛɛti nici kɛbɛrɛ o inoko azi nɛ eete nico?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Bar naana kazi nɛ, Niini nyakaŋan gi.”
43009018	Maje bar alaata o Juz alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziiyit zɔɔz ci baal rubenini ɛɛti nici, ma bodo icinɔi o. Makacin ɔɔt utuya baatin ki yaatin.
43009019	Ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Nici logo cunooŋ gi? Aritai da niini kizi ruben noko laadun? Mazi bodo icinɔ ku?”
43009020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kagaya naaga niini logo onaaŋ ɛlɛ nɛɛn. Aritai niini kizi ruben.
43009021	Bar zin alaŋ kagaya gɔl ci icinɔi inoko o. Alaŋ kagaya eet ci akɔl nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ o. Ijinit nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, eeci niini buk eet ci idikirun. Anycek kuduwayuŋ niini alya.”
43009022	Aduwa baatinɛ kibeen yaatin zɔɔz nico o, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz. Eeci aga niigi mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, Yesu niini Kiristo nɛɛn, atɔɔk koca alaata o Juz nɔɔnɔ ceeze o lotento.
43009023	Gi ci zin anɛ niigi nɛ, “Ijinit nɔɔnɔ," o nɛɛn.
43009024	Ma bodo vurta ivita utuya alaata o Juz eet ci baal ruben noko, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Duwa gi ween didi ŋume o Joowo, eeci kagaya naaga ɛɛti ci akolin kɛbɛrɛ o eet ci oŋecu.”
43009025	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ zin naana kaga mã een niini eet ci oŋecu karabɔŋ alaŋ anyak oŋec. Olla naana kaga gi codoi. Baale keen ruben, ma inoko kicinɔ.”
43009026	Ma ajin niigi bodo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Agoonekin dim gitaz? Akolin kɛbɛrɛ ku?”
43009027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Uyene rak naana kuduwayuŋ, bar alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga iziiyit. Mazin yo bodo arooŋnyu ka kuduwayuŋ naa? Arooŋnyu bɔŋ iziti nuyak cigin buk?”
43009028	Ma adɔm niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan een nuyai cin niina. Keegina naaga nuyak o Mosis.
43009029	Kagaya baale naaga azɔɔzɔ Jooi kibeen Mosis. Maje eet nico alaŋ naaga ŋinti akuni o kagaya.”
43009030	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abiirnan aneet ɔɔ zooze calaŋ agayu niiga eet nico ŋinti akuni o. Bar zin okolan niini aneeta kɛbɛrɛ.
43009031	Kaga ri naaga niini Jooi alaŋ azii ŋaryiin ci ɔl o oŋenu. Mazi adiŋdiŋan ɛɛti Jook, ma agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ niini, azii Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
43009032	Ŋaan laadun kinatamma kiziiyit eet ci akɔl kɛbɛrɛ ci gɔn ci aritai kizi ruben.
43009033	Matɛ ɛɛti nici calaŋ aku Joowa, alaŋ waan kaal nicoko dook agɔɔn.”
43009034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aritai niina oŋeca izi ruben nɔkɔ, ma bar arooŋ ija demezet ageeta.” Otooyit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kudun ceeze ci lotento noko.
43009035	Mazi akɔ azii Yesu otooyit ɔl eet baal akɔl niini kɛbɛrɛ e ceeze o lotento, ook urumtɔ niini kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Mayo inoko niina atu Ŋɛɛrti Eeto?”
43009036	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, duwayan da, niini ŋɛnɛɛn ka kutu.”
43009037	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Icinu niina nɔɔnɔ uyene laadun. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn zin ci azoozonu ki ineet noko.”
43009038	Ma anek ɛɛti Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, inoko kutuwɔ.” Ma akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma.
43009039	Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Kakunai naana looc nico o ka kanyaa payiin ka kanyek ɔl o ruben kicintɔ, maje o acinɛ ka kiziti rubenɛ.”
43009040	Mazi azii ɔl ci Parici ona aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ o gi ci aduwa niini noko, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Bɔŋ buk naaga keegina rubenɛ?”
43009041	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Waan tɛ iziti rubenɛ, akɔmnuŋ waan oŋɛ. Bar zin giye o aniyu niiga nɛ, acinenu, amɛnanu anyaku oŋɛ nɔkɔ.”
43010001	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti calaŋ akunak tɛɛny eecitɔ araana, ma bar atɔɔda dɔda ŋin oma, ma akɔ tɛɛnya eecitɔ, niini agoryai, ma een aamnyoi.
43010002	Maje ɛɛti ci akunak tɛɛny araana, niini eet o towawiinto nɛɛn.
43010003	Ma akolek ɛɛti o gɔɔn abɛk tɛɛny eet ci towawiinto noko araan. Ma azii aza oginɛ molok onin, ma awo niini aza ogin zaar, ma arayin nɔɔgɔ ŋaati aduŋni.
43010004	Mazi aduŋnan aza ogin bitaala, ma oontanɛ nɔɔgɔ, anowa niigi nɔɔnɔ vurta, eeci aga niigi nɔɔnɔ molok onin.
43010005	Alaŋ niigi ano eet ci gaga, bar mã een eet ci gaga, avir niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ aga niigi molok cin.”
43010006	Aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin nico, maje bar niigi alaŋ aga kɛŋ cin.
43010007	Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, Keen naana araan o tɛɛny o azawu.
43010008	Ma ɔl dook baal avu iŋaan naana kiiya e niigi agoryak, ma een aamnyok. Bar zin aza ŋaan kiziiyit nɔɔgɔ.
43010009	Keen zin naana araan, ma ɛɛti ci aku ŋaaten aneet ɛɛlyai. Ma aku niini tɛɛny, ma adun, ma ajowa ŋinti agɛwi.
43010010	Gɔɔn laadun agoryaiti akunak niini gorziin ki toŋdiin kibeen targanyitin. Zin bar naana kakun ka kiiya kanyek nɔɔgɔ rogɛt korogit juruŋ.
43010011	Keen naana eet o towawiinto abon. Ma gɔɔn ɛɛti ci towawiinto alaŋ aŋoli daayiz ci aruwɛn azaye cigin.
43010012	Ma ɛɛti ci gɔɔn uuwayi ka kuruktozek vɔyita alaŋ een niini eet o azawu nɛɛn. Mã acina niini kɛlaŋ ci aku, ooŋnek niini aza looc, ma avir, ma aku adak kɛlaŋi aza zɛɛ ma azaan.
43010013	Ma ɛɛti ci aliŋliŋ ka kuruktozek vɔyita avir niini labak o, eeci alaŋ een aza nici cigin ɛlɛ.
43010014	Keen zin naana eet o towawiinto abon. Kaga naana aza ogan, ma buk agayan niigi aneet.
43010015	Kiyo agayan baaba aneet, ma kaga naana nɔɔnɔ o, buk zin naana kaga aza ogan. Ma kagama daayiz ŋaatineeŋ.
43010016	Kanyei buk aza oogi calaŋ ɛɛl tɛɛnye nico. Abon zin kanyaa naana nɔɔgɔ buk ka kivita kiziiktan niigi aneet molok onan ka koromtɛ aza dook tɛɛnye codoi, ma oowa nɔɔgɔ dook ɛɛti codoi.
43010017	Areezan zin baaba aneet o, eeci kagama naana daayiz. Zin kaga naana ŋaan kaŋaaz daayiza bodo.
43010018	Akɔm eet ci anyak dɔyiz ci ka kurukan aneet kadaak, bar kagama daayiz naana oowe onan doon. Kanyei dɔyiz ci kadaaknɛ been ci kiŋaanɛ bodo daayiza. Nici zɔɔz ci aricanekan baaba aneet ka kutugu.”
43010019	Zin zooze nico ɛŋɛryɔ bodo ɔl o Juz kɔrgɛna.
43010020	Ma anɔ ɔl ci meel ŋaatineeŋ nɛ, “Anyak inoko ɛɛti nici Loryen alya, karabɔŋ bar anyak maŋɔn. Mayo laadun aziiŋnu zɔɔz cin o naa?”
43010021	Maje ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm eet ci anyak Loryen alya ci azɔɔz nɔkɔ. Anyak Loryenti dɔyiz ci anyekɛ eet ci ruben kicinɔ?”
43010022	Zin iiya iiteni o gɔɔn anyayi ɔl o Juz lotɛn o aadanɛ niigi iiten baal ɛtɛɛnyɔi bodo ceez o Joowo Jerusalɛma e. Maje waanice lɔɔci izi lɔmɔtin.
43010023	Ma iitene nice awɔ Yesu riiwe baal ɛɛnyca Solomon e. Ma rii nici ajɔŋɔz ceez o Joowo.
43010024	Ma avu aliya ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Ma dim ka kereyowa been inin? Mã een didi niina Kiristo nɛɛn, duwayet juruŋ.”
43010025	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Uyene kuduwayuŋ, bar alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga utuyaŋ. Ma kaala ci kagoon naana zaare o baaba noko ayelza gi o kɛɛnɛ naana Kiristo.
43010026	Bar zin niiga alaŋ atuyaŋ o, eeci alaŋ eeginu aza cigan.
43010027	Gɔɔn aza ogane aziiŋnan molok onan. Ma kaga naana nɔɔgɔ, ma anuyan niigi aneet.
43010028	Kanyi naana nɔɔgɔ rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ma alaŋ bodo niigi adaai. Ma akɔm eet ci iraananan nɔɔgɔ aziite onan.
43010029	Ma baaba o anyan aneet nɔɔgɔ adikir niini ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal dook, ma akɔm eet ci anim kiraana nɔɔgɔ aziite onin.
43010030	Zin naana ki baaba kadowina.”
43010031	Ma giye nico everya bodo ɔl o Juz biyɛn ka kavacit nɔɔnɔ kuruwit kadaak.
43010032	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Keyeleyuŋ naana kaal o abon meelik avu ŋaati baaba dook. Mazi yo kaale nicoko jaŋ ci arooŋnyu avacaŋ biyɛnɛ o?”
43010033	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ karooŋnya kavacin giye ci abon agoon, bar karooŋnya kavacin o, eeci amomoz Jook. Een niina eet ci deer labak, ma bar anyi ɛlɛ izi Jook.”
43010034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo gi ci azi nɛ, Eeginu niiga dɔl ci Joowo.
43010035	Ma kaga naaga laadun waragɛwi o Joowo alɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ kodot. Awo zin Jooi ɔl baal anyek niini zɔɔz onin kiziti dɔl cigin.
43010036	Ma zin bar aneeta aŋɛranan Jooi, ma itoonanan kiiyak looc. Mazi kazi nɛ, Keen ŋɛɛrti Joowo, bodo aniyu nɛ, Kamomoz Jook o, ku?
43010037	Matɛ waan calaŋ kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn o baaba, alaŋ koca aganɔ ŋaati atuyaŋ niiga aneet.
43010038	Bar zin mã kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn o baaba, mayo nuun alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze onan kaduwa, abon atuyu liŋliŋɔn onan kaliŋliŋ, ka agaac aavi baaba ŋaatan, ma kaavɛ naana ŋaatin.”
43010039	Enico orooŋit bodo niigi kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar iniwun niini nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔ.
43010040	Imiire ni Yesu bodo abaayiz liil o kazi Jordan, ma akɔ ŋaabaal oonyi Jɔn ɔl e, ma akɔ amɔn ŋinaante.
43010041	Ma ŋinaante ivitak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anɔ nɛ, “Baale Jɔn akɔm kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn, zin bar kaal baal aduwa niini akati eet nico e eelit didi dook tɔ.”
43010042	Zin waanice ŋinaante utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ.
43011001	Ma enice anyak eet ci amɔɔr kazi zaar nɛ Lazaros. Abaak niini kuture o kazi Bɛtani, ma aromɛ niini ki ŋɔɔnɔgi ci kazi Meri been ci kazi Marta ŋinaante.
43011002	Ma Meri nici nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn baal ka kiiya kuvuut Manyi karacoca, ma ɛɛk zɔɔ imanɛ e.
43011003	Ma itoonek ŋɔɔnɔgi Lazaros Yesu otok ci anek nɛ, “Manyi, laŋotun unun gɔɔn areez amɔɔr ɔrɔɔt.”
43011004	Mazi akɔ azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, izi nɛ, “Mɔɔrizi nici alaŋ een daayiz, bar ka kanyaak Jook zany, ka zin buk kanyozozek ŋɛɛrti Joowo zanyi.”
43011005	Maje waanice Yesu arɛɛz Marta kibeen Meri been Lazaros ɔrɔɔt.
43011006	Bar mazi akɔ azii niini mɔɔriz o Lazaros, omonun rak niini ŋaati baal aavɛ o iinya ram.
43011007	Ma vurta enek nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kimiirte di bodo kɔɔtɔ Judiya ka kɔɔtɔ Bɛtaniya.”
43011008	Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, iiten baale arɔɔŋ ɔl o Juz kavacin biyɛnɛ ŋinaante. Ma bodo inoko arooŋ ka bitɔ ŋinaante?”
43011009	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko gɔɔn alaŋ anyak waazini codoi ziik amɔtɔ ram? Mazin ɛɛti ci awɔ waaz alaŋ niini adiri, eeci vɔɔr lɔɔci.
43011010	Mazi awɔ niini baal, adiri, eeci alaŋ vɔɔr lɔɔci.
43011011	Inoko zin laŋotinai Lazaros ɔɔŋ. Karooŋ zin kook kitiŋka kicinɛ.”
43011012	Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, matɛ ɔɔŋ, ŋaan zin ri tedec acinɛ labak.”
43011013	Ma ɔɔŋnya ci aduwa Yesu o daayiz o Lazaros nɛɛn. Maje bar nuyawa alaŋ aga. Bar abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, “Coma ɔɔŋ labak.”
43011014	Ɔbɔrak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Adaawun Lazaros.
43011015	Katalnɛ zin naana giye ci akanuŋ igeet, eeci alaŋ kaavɛ waanice naana ŋinaante ka korogoz nɔɔnɔ. Ma daayizi nica iina o ka atuyaŋ niiga aneet. Inoko zin kɔɔtɔ ŋaatin.”
43011016	Ma anek Tomaz ween codengɔn gɔnɔgi ween nuyak nɛ, “Korkorit buk naaga dook kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ka mã anyak gi ci aku, ka kadaayit naaga dook ki nɔɔnɔ.”
43011017	Mazi akɔ arum Yesu looc, amada Lazaros anyawun iinya wec bɔɔta.
43011018	Maje kuturi ci kazi Bɛtani noko ajɔŋzɔ ki Jerusalɛm.
43011019	Ma avunak ɔl ci Juz meelik Marta been Meri ka kivita kozooztek nɔɔgɔ daayize nico.
43011020	Mazi akɔ azii Marta Yesu iiya, itiŋa ook urumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl. Maje Meri ŋaan aavi ceeza.
43011021	Ma anek Marta Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, waan da aavu ŋina alaŋ waan gɔtɔna adaai.
43011022	Bar zin kaga mã ajin inoko Jook olla gi ci arooŋ, anyin niini ineet.”
43011023	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan iŋaaz tedec gotonu korok bodo.”
43011024	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt kaga nɔkɔ. Ŋaan iŋaaz waanma niini daayiza iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.”
43011025	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o kanyi ɔl rogɛt, ma kaŋaanɛ nɔɔgɔ daayiza. Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet mayo nuun adaai, arogi bodo.
43011026	Maje ɛɛti ci ŋaan arogi, ma atuyan aneet, alaŋ bodo niini adaai been nɛɛn. Inoko atu zɔɔz nico?”
43011027	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Marta Yesu anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Kutuwin naana ineet. Een niina Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo baal ka kiiyak looc e nɛɛn.”
43011028	Mazi akɔ adotiz Marta zooze nico, imiire ook otowa Meri ween ŋɔɔni, ma aku aŋomtek nɔɔnɔ doon gi ci anek nɛ, “Iiya alaani o demziinto. Awuyin zin niini ineet.”
43011029	Mazi azii Meri zɔɔz nico, itiŋa ecodoi noko iyiik ook ŋaatin.
43011030	Maje Yesu ŋaan korogjok kurum, bar ŋaan aavi ŋaa ona arumɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ gɔl e.
43011031	Maje ɔl o Juz ona avu ka kozoozek awɔyi Meri e ŋaan aavtiz ceeza. Mazi acin niigi Meri aŋaaz taman, ma adun akɔ bitaala, oneec niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, “Akɔ inoko boote o gɔtɔnɔn e ka kook kutulu ŋinaante.”
43011032	Mazi akɔ arum Meri Yesu, acin niini nɔɔnɔ, ma akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɛ, “Manyi, inoko da aavutɔ ŋina, ŋaan waan gɔtɔna kadaak.”
43011033	Mazi acin Yesu Meri kibeen ɔl o Juz alu nɔkɔ, ɛtɛɛdɛ buk nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt.
43011034	Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Adayu ŋaa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ija ka cin ŋinti kadaya o.”
43011035	Utulu ni Yesu.
43011036	Ma anɔ ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Icinit di! Arɛɛz niini eet nico ɔrɔɔt.”
43011037	Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een eet baal akɔl eet o ruben kɛbɛrɛ e nɛɛn? Inoko tɛ kɔmɔda eet nico iŋaan kadaak, alaŋ waan adaai.”
43011038	Zin bodo ɛtɛɛdɛ Yesu ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Iiyak ni bɔɔt ci baal adawin Lazaros o. Maje bɔɔt nico anyoogi ɔtɔgi biye ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
43011039	Ma anek Yesu ɔl nɛ, “Ipikta bɛ nico look otoga.” Bar abɛdɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ame tedec ɔrɔɔt, eeci anyawun niini bɔɔta iinya wec.”
43011040	Ma anek Yesu Marta nɛ, “Kuduwayin uyen keneyin nɛ, Mã atuyan aneet, acin tedec diŋdiŋɔn o Joowo.”
43011041	Mazi akɔ apiya niigi bɛ, ɔdɔŋ Yesu kɛbɛrɛ, ma acin tammu taden, ma azi nɛ, “Baaba, kanyin zany, eeci gɔɔn aziiŋnan niina aneet.
43011042	Ŋɛdɛt kagayin nɔkɔ gɔɔn aziiŋnan niina aneet. Olla zin zoozok nicoko kaduwa o, eeci karooŋ ɔl ci ɛɛl ŋina noko ka kutuyɔ, ma agayan niigi itoonanan niina aneet.”
43011043	Mazi akɔ odotiz niini ŋaryiinte nico, otowɛ molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Lazaros, duna bitaala.”
43011044	Makacin itiŋa Lazaros, ma aduŋnak bitaalin. Maje azɛɛna kibeen zɔɔ ŋaan acabje rumanɛn nɔkɔ. Maje bodo rum codoi atakuconek nɔɔnɔ ŋum. Ma anek Yesu ɔl nɛ, “Ɔɔkta rumanɛ nicoko ŋaatin ka kɔtɔɔ.”
43011045	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl o Juz baal avu azoozek awɔyi Meri e Yesu agɔɔn gi nico, utuweec ci meelik ŋaatineeŋ nɔɔnɔ.
43011046	Maje bar ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ imiirte ɔɔt uduktak ɔl o Parici gi ci agɔɔn Yesu o.
43011047	Mazi azii ɔl o Parici ki alaat o ceez o Joowo zɔɔz nico, ulute ŋaatodoi, ma anɔ nɛ, “kayo kutuguz gitaz? Eet nico utugu kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye ɔrɔɔt.
43011048	Inoko mã kooŋ kiliŋliŋ kaal nicoko nɔkɔ, atu koca ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ. Ma koca avu alaata o Rom, ma ɔyɔk ceez cinai Joowo o, ma buk koca avu atargany looc cinai o dook.”
43011049	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet cinaaŋ kazi Kayavas ceen alaan ci ceez o Joowo irkite nice. Itiŋa ni niini, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm niiga gi ci agayu been nɛɛn.
43011050	Alaŋ agayu abon adaai ɛɛti codoi ɔla ka calaŋ adaai ɔl dook o?”
43011051	Alaŋ zin bar aduwa niini gi nico oowe cin doon, bar giye baal ɛɛnɛ niini alaan ci adikir ceeze o Joowo irkite nice anyewun Jooi nɔɔnɔ kuduwa gi o ka kiiya kadaai Yesu ka korogozi ɔl o Juz dook.
43011052	Alaŋ zin bar ka kadaak ole o Juz doon, bar ka buk kiiya kolota niini dɔl ci Joowo azaanonek loocok o dook kodoyi.
43011053	Zin akati iitene nice ɛlɛ orooŋit alaata o Juz gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak.
43011054	Ma giye nico enice alaŋaan Yesu awɔ keyeleza ɛlɛ Judiya, bar itiŋa niini ook kuture o kazi Iviram ajɔŋɔz balal, ma akɔ amɔn niini kibeen nuyak ogin ŋinaante.
43011055	Mazi izi lotɛn o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl o Juz iiten o vardaŋinto ajɔn, ɔɔtɔ ɔl ci meelik ole o Juz Jerusalɛma ka kɔɔt kutuguzɔ niigi kaal ugeec gɔɔn toonyento.
43011056	Maje ŋaato arɔɔŋ niigi Yesu. Mazi avɔ alotɛ kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ijintɔ izitɔ nɛ, “Mayo dim tedec ɛɛti we aku didi?”
43011057	Ma buk aricanek alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici ɔl zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci ajowa ŋinti aavɛ Yesu, abon aku aduwaket ka koota kagamta.”
43012001	Mazi ŋaan ɛɛl iinya ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ɔɔwa iŋaan kiiya iiteni o vardaŋinto, ook Yesu kuture o kazi Bezani ŋaabaal arogzi niini Lazaros daayiza e.
43012002	Ma avɔ agoonek ɔl nɔɔnɔ dayiin ŋinaante, zɛɛ anyaak ni Marta nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Maje Lazaros aromɛ kibeen ɔl ci ona arɛwa ki Yesu dayiin o dook.
43012003	Ma anyaa Meri ketezewoc ci anyak karacoc ci kazi narat ci aŋɔl madiz ɔrɔɔt ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik gɛr. Ma aku aḏuutɛkɛ Yesu zɔɔ, ma apucpucanek imanɛ. Makacin ɔtɔŋɔl ceez dook madiz ɔrɔɔt.
43012004	Izi ni azi nuyaiti o Yesu kazi Judaz Iskariat baal ka kiiya kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ e nɛ,
43012005	“Matɛ laadun alaŋ ataalinɛ karacoc nico guruce ci meelik ka kanycek ɔl o amaat naa?”
43012006	Alaŋ zin bar aduwa gi nico o giye ci arɛɛzi niini ɔl o amaat, bar aduwa o, eeci een niini agoryai. Ma anyak gɔɔn kaboon o guruco niini.
43012007	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toŋɔ nɔɔnɔ. Agoonekan niini aneet gi nico o ka kidimdimaneyan aneet iiten o dawinto.
43012008	Ma ɔl ci amaat o aromenu ki igeet ŋina iinya dook, maje naana alaŋaan bodo karomɛ ki igeet ŋina been nɛɛn.”
