43012009	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl ci meel Yesu aavi kuture o kazi Bɛtani, ɔɔtɔ niigi ŋinaante. Alaŋ avɔ niigi ŋinaante o ka kɔɔt kicinit Yesu doon, bar arɔɔŋ buk niigi kɔɔt kicinit Lazaros baal iŋaani Yesu nɔɔnɔ daayiza e.
43012010	Makacin abaabanit alaata o ceez o Joowo gɔl ci ka kurukti Lazaros buk,
43012011	eeci ɔl ci meel ole o Juz utuweec Yesu giye o itiŋawi niini Lazaros daayiza.
43012012	Ma ŋeere iziiyit ɔl ci meel ole baal avunak lotɛn o vardaŋinto e Yesu akunak Jerusalɛm.
43012013	Uduulta ni niigi oto ci kɛɛn ween kɛtɛlɛɛn, ma avɔ arumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl ŋaati agɛrnyi anɛ nɛ, “Atanaaz Jook. Amayuk Jooi eet o aku zaare o Manyi. Amayuk Jooi alaan o Israyil.”
43012014	Anyaaktak ni ɔl Yesu jɔrɔn ci zigiro, ma atɔɔt kiyo ayeedi waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ,
43012015	“Ɔl o Jerusalɛm, má anyaku ŋoliin. Icinit di alaan unooŋ ŋaati akunakuŋ igeet joronte ci zigiro.”
43012016	Maje waanice rak ɔɔwa e alaŋ nuyawa oginɛ kaal nicoko dook aga. Bar akɔ mazi itiŋa Yesu ook tamma titinyonte onin e, aada nuyawa ayeedi kaala ci akati nɔɔnɔ noko waragewe o Joowo keelit tɔ laadun. Gi zin ci baal adiŋdiŋani ɔl nɔɔnɔ o nɛɛn.
43012017	Ma ɔl baal aromɛ kibeen Yesu iitene baal iŋaani niini Lazaros daayiza e, ɔɔt uduktak ɔl gi nico.
43012018	Gi zin ci baal avɔ arumɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ gɔl o nɛɛn, eeci iziiyit niigi gi o adiŋdiŋ agɔɔn Yesu.
43012019	Makacin izitɔ ɔl o Parici nɛ, “Icinit di, ɔkɔmeyet. Ɔkɔma gi ci ka kutuguz. Oneec ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ.”
43012020	Maje buk waanice anyak ɔl ceen Garik ci avunak Jerusalɛm ka kivita kidiŋdiŋanit Jook iitene o lotento.
43012021	Ma avunak niigi Pilip o kutur o kazi Bezediya abil looce o kazi Galili. Ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, karooŋnya di kicinta Yesu.”
43012022	Ma akɔ Pilip aduwak Andoru. Ɔɔtɔ ni Pilip ki Andoru uduktak Yesu zɔɔz nico.
43012023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iiya zin iiteni o ka kanyozozɛkɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto diŋdiŋɔni ci appe.
43012024	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alaŋ kɛbɛrɛci ci labitoto aḏowɛ loota, ma adaai, abil kɔdɔwɛ kizi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ nɔkɔ. Bar mazi adaai, aduŋna, ma anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik gɛr.
43012025	Ma zin ɛɛti ci arɛɛz rogɛt, iima akoloz. Maje bar ɛɛti ci abor rogɛt looce nico, ajowa tiŋeere niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
43012026	Ma ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ kiliŋliŋozeyan aneet, abon anowanan niini aneet ka ŋinti kaavɛ naana, aavɛ buk niini. Ma eet ci aliŋliŋonekan aneet, atitiny baaba buk nɔɔnɔ.
43012027	Inoko zin aneet awuci ziniz ɔrɔɔt. Kayo zin kizi nɛ? Kizi nɛ, Baaba, rogozan piryakzete nico? Akɔm, eeci nici gi baal laadun kakunɛ e nɛɛn.
43012028	Baaba, anyek zin zaar ugun diŋdiŋɔn.” Iiya ni tamma mɔlɔyi ci azi nɛ, “Kanyeya zaar ogan diŋdiŋɔn, ma ŋaan kamɛna kanyi diŋdiŋɔn nɔkɔ.”
43012029	Maje ɔl ona ɛɛl ŋinaante e iziiyit molok nico, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ajul dim tammu?” Maje ogɛnɛ anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm, azɔɔzɔ inoko toonnyaiti ci tammo ki nɔɔnɔ.”
43012030	Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ mɔlɔyi nici aku giye can, bar aku giye cunooŋ.
43012031	Inoko zin izi iiten ci ka kapawozɛkɛ looc gerzitin nɛɛn nici. Ka zin buk alaani o looc nico kɔtɔɔyɛ kook many.
43012032	Mazi tiŋeere kɔdɔŋɛ naana keete ween talakec, ŋaan kagura ɔl dook kivitayan aneet.”
43012033	Zin aduwa niini gi nico o ayelza kɛŋ ci daayiz onin ka kadaai.
43012034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kagaya naaga azi waragɛwɛ o Joowo nɛ, Arogi katin Kiristo nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Ma zin niina azi nɛ, Ka kɔdɔŋɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keete ween talakec o ku? Ma dim ceen Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o ŋɛnɛɛn?”
43012035	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan rak abil vooritin ŋaatunooŋ ŋintimiliny. Emeda zin rak ɔtɔɔz gole nico nɔkɔ ŋinti ŋaan anyaku vooritin o, ka calaŋ akunakuŋ muuri. Eeci ɛɛti ci awɔ muura alaŋ aga niini ŋinti akɔyi o.
43012036	Ma ŋinti ŋaan rak anyaku vooritin o, utuweec vooritin nico ka iziti ɔl ci vooritino.” Mazi akɔ odotiz Yesu zooze nico, ɔtɔɔ niini ŋaatineeŋ iliitai nɔɔgɔ ɛlɛ.
43012037	Mayo nuun waanice agɔɔn niini kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn e, ŋaan niigi kuteec nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.
43012038	Zin didi ibilun zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya e tɔ baal anɛ nɛ, “Manyi, ŋɛnɛɛn dim ci ka kutu zɔɔz ci baal aduwaket noko? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka keyelizak Jooi dɔyiz onin?”
43012039	Ŋaan zin didi waanice ɔl nica kutuyɔi. Azi buk bodo Izaya nɛ,
43012040	“Atooza Jooi nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ kizi rubenɛ ka calaŋ acinɛ. Ma buk abakbayɛn Jooi nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ka calaŋ agɛny. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka calaŋ abadaak niigi nɔɔnɔ ka korogit.”
43012041	Aduwa Izaya zɔɔz nico o, eeci baale icinun niini diŋdiŋɔn o Yesu, ma azɔɔz niini gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ.
43012042	Mayo nuun waanice utuweec alaata ci meel ole o Juz Yesu e, bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kɔbɔrta tuwɛn uneeŋ kɔla, eeci aŋole niigi ɔl o Parici. Gɛrzɛ ŋaan atɔɔk nɔɔgɔ ceeze uneeŋ lotento.
43012043	Eeci arɛɛz niigi naatinɛt o ɔl o deer kujuk o Joowo.
43012044	Ma agɛrɛny Yesu moloye ci appe azi nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet, alaŋ bar atuyan niini aneet doon, bar atu buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.
43012045	Ma ɛɛti ci acinan aneet, icin buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.
43012046	Kakun zin naana ka kizi vooritin ci loocu, ka mã anyak eet ci atuyan aneet ka calaŋ bodo niini aavi muura.
43012047	Mã anyak eet ci azii zɔɔz can o, ma alaŋ atu, alaŋ naana kapaye nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Eeci alaŋ kakun naana o ka kiiya kapayek looc gerzitin, bar ka korogoz.
43012048	Ma ɛɛti ci abornan aneet, ma alaŋ agama zɔɔz can o, anyak eet ci ŋaan apayek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin tɔ. Ma zoozowa ci kaduwa naana o ŋaan apayek katin nɔɔnɔ gerzitin iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
43012049	Eeci akɔm gi ci kaduwa naana oowe can doon, bar baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn o ilotekan gi o ka kuduwa.
43012050	Zin kaga naana zɔɔz o ilot niini anyaa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma gi ci kaduwa naana, kaduwa eo aduwakan baaba aneet.”
43013001	Mazi izi ŋinti ka kakatai iiteni o lotɛn o vardaŋinto, agawun Yesu iiya iiteni o ka kitiŋawi niini loota ŋina kooyi ŋaati baatin tamma. Ma waanice gɔɔn arɛɛz niini nuyak ogin ɔrɔɔt koṯorɛi.
43013002	Mazi avu Yesu ki nuyak ogin ka kivita kadaktɔ baal, arayɛkɛ tɛ Loryen Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat ziniz baabaninɛt ci ka kataalɔi Yesu.
43013003	Maje waanice Yesu aga nɔkɔ baatinɛ arekɛ kaal dook aziit onin. Ma aga aku niini Joowa, ma ka bodo kimiirozek Jook.
43013004	Itiŋa ni Yesu jena ŋaati dayiinto noko, ma aborca rum onin malkinto, ma adoma rum oma ci miliny pucpucaninto, ma acabek barkɔny.
43013005	Ma aḏuutek maam kodooc. Akata ni ŋaati oonyi nuyak ogin zɔɔ, ma ɛɛk bodo rume ci ona acabek barkɔny o.
43013006	Mazi akunak Yesu Saiman Pitɔr, ijin Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Manyi, arooŋ dim toonyan niina aneet zɔɔ?”
43013007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ inoko niina gi ci kagoon o aga, bar zin ŋaan aga tedec nuun.”
43013008	Ma anek Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati oonyan niina aneet zɔɔ been nɛɛn.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Mã alaŋ kuunyin naana ineet zɔɔ, alaŋ koca bodo niina een nuyai can been nɛɛn.”
43013009	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, má oonyan zin zɔɔ doon, bar toonyan azɛɛn kibeen ɔɔ buk.”
43013010	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci aranɛ, itiliza nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ dook, ma alaŋ bodo arɔɔŋ raninɛt, olla koca oony niini zɔɔ doon. Inoko zin buk niiga dook itilizawu, olla anyak ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci ŋaan een ririny.”
43013011	Aduwa Yesu gi nico o, eeci aga niini eet o ka kook kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ. Gi ci zin baal aduwan niini zɔɔz nico o nɛɛn.
43013012	Mazi otoony Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔ ugeec odota, aborcek bodo rum onin malkinto, ma abadaak tarabeza ŋin ona dayiinto e. Ma aku ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko zɔɔz ci kagoonekuŋ naana igeet gi nico o agayu?
43013013	Gɔɔn niiga awuyaŋ aneet kizi eet ci demziinto, ma awuyaŋ buk kizi Manyi. Didi zin awuyaŋ juruŋ, eeci keen aneet nɛɛn.
43013014	Keen didi naana Manyi cunooŋ, ma keen eet cunooŋ demziinto. Kutuunyuŋ zin inoko naana igeet zɔɔ. Abon zin buk gɔɔn niiga oonyonu zɔɔ cugooc o maany.
43013015	Mazin kagoonekuŋ naana igeet gi nico o ka buk niiga utuguz nɔkɔ.
43013016	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm laadun gabaren ci adikir alaane cin. Ma buk akɔm eet ci itoonyai ci adikir eete o itoona nɔɔnɔ.
43013017	Inoko zin agawutu niiga gi nico. Mã avɔ agoonu nɔkɔ, amayukuŋ koca Jooi igeet.
43013018	Alaŋ zin kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz nico igeet dook, eeci kaga naana ɔl ogan kaŋɛra. Inoko zin ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ, Ma ɛɛti o kazola naana ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin ogan, otowɛ niinilya amaroyan aneet.
43013019	Kaduwakuŋ zin naana igeet gi nico inoko iŋaan kakatai o, ka tiŋeere ma akanai ka utuyaŋ naana aneet nɛɛn.
43013020	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci agama eet ci kitoon naana, agamanan buk niini aneet. Mazin ɛɛti ci agamanan aneet o, agama buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.”
43013021	Mazi adotiz Yesu zooze nico, uwucun nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt, ma abɔrak nuyak ogin gi ci anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ.”
43013022	Ma agɛlɛmɔ nuyawa niigi maany, eeci abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti zooze nico, ma alaŋ aga eet ci ka kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ o.
43013023	Maje nuyaiti o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu nɔɔnɔ aavi loota Yesu libira.
43013024	Ma alakada Saiman Pitɔr nuyai nico, ma anek nɛ. “Jin di Yesu kuduwayin ŋɛnɛɛn ci ariik niini o.”
43013025	Icayak ni nuyaiti nici Yesu ijonun, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Manyi, ŋɛnɛɛn dim ci arii o?”
43013026	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eet nɛɛn o tedec kadoma ḏokoc, ma kacomekɛ wuci, ma kanyi nɔɔnɔ kadak.” Odoma ni niini ḏokoc ocomek wuci, ma anyek Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat.
43013027	Mazi adoma Judaz ḏokoc nico, ook Loryen nɔɔnɔ ziniza enico ɛlɛ. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tugu gi ci arooŋ tugu o taman.”
43013028	Bar akɔm eet codoi nuyawe ci ona aavtiz aliya tarabeza o ci aga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci aduwak Yesu Judaz o.
43013029	Ma zin bar giye o gɔɔn agami Judaz kaboon o guruco, abaabanit nuyawa ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ izitɔ nɛ, Coma arɔɔŋ inoko Yesu nɔɔnɔ kook kataalayet dayiin ci iiten o lotento o, karabɔŋ bar arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ kook kitirit ɔl o amaat.
43013030	Mazi adoma Judaz ḏokoc, udun enico ɛlɛ ook bitaala. Maje lɔɔci izi baalin.
43013031	Mazi akɔ adun Judaz, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Inoko zin eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Ŋɛɛrti Eeto. Ma buk eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Joowo ŋaatin.
43013032	Zin ma eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Joowo ŋaatin o, adiŋdiŋan buk tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔnɔ taman.
43013033	Dɔl ogan, alaŋaan bodo karomɛ naana ki igeet ŋinti rɛɛn. Arooŋnyaŋ zin tiŋeere, bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ. Kiyo baale kaduwai alaat o Juz kanei nɛ, Ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana, alaŋ niiga animnyu ivita e. Kaduwakuŋ zin bodo buk inoko zɔɔz nico igeet.
43013034	Inoko zin kanyuŋ lotinɛt ci colai ce. Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook. Kiyo gɔɔn kareezuŋ naana igeet o, ɛrɛɛztɔ buk niiga dook nɔkɔ.
43013035	Mã areezonu niiga dook nɔkɔ, agayuŋ koca ɔl dook igeet eeginu nuyak cigan.”
43013036	Ma ajin Saiman Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, arooŋ dim bitɔ ŋaaḏaŋ?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana o, alaŋ rak niina inoko anim nowawan, bar zin vurta ŋaan anowanan.”
43013037	Ma ajin Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, naa akɔma alaŋ kanim kanuyin inoko o? Ma naana katoma kadaak ŋaatun labak.”
43013038	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko dim didi niina anim daak ŋaatan? Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnyan tija lak iiyu iŋaan toloci kɔrɔk.”
43014001	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má anyeku zinzeeti kitiranyit, bar utuweec Jook. Utuyaŋ aneet buk.
43014002	Ma ole o baaba anyak ceezi ci meelik gɛr. Inoko zin naana kakɔ ka kook kidimdiman ŋintunooŋ. Matɛ waan kizi gi ci azeetɔ, alaŋ waan kaduwakuŋ.
43014003	Mazi kook kidimdimana ŋintunooŋ o odota, ŋaan kabada bodo ka kiiya kooyuŋ igeet, ka ŋinti kaavɛ naana o, aavtiyu niiga buk.
43014004	Agayu ri niiga gɔl ci akɔ ŋaati kakɔyi naana o nɔkɔ.”
43014005	Ma anek Tomaz nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, alaŋ naaga ŋinti akɔyɛ niina o kagaya. Kagaya yo gɔl ci akɔyɛ niina o ku?”
43014006	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu Tomaz anek nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o keen gɔl, ma keen didi, ma keen rogɛt. Akɔm eet ci akunak baaba calaŋ aduŋna niini ŋaaten aneet.
43014007	Inoko zin mã agawutaŋu niiga aneet o, ŋaan agayu baaba buk. Bar zin buk inoko agawutu nɔɔnɔ, ma icintu.”
43014008	Ma anek Pilip nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, yeleyet da baatun, olla gi ci karooŋnya dook nɛɛn.”
43014009	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Pilip, koromtɛ naana ki igeet ŋinti wun kal. Maŋaan niina gawan nɔkɔ? Ma zin azi nɛ, Yeleyet baatun o, naa? Ma ɛɛti ci icinan aneet, icinun buk niini baaba.
43014010	Pilip, alaŋ aga niina kaavɛ naana ŋaati baaba, ma aavi buk baaba ŋaatan o? Ma zoozowa ci kaduwakuŋ igeet o, alaŋ kaduwa naana oowe can doon, bar zin baaba o aavi ŋaatan nɛɛn o agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn onin maany.
43014011	Abon zin atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze o kanekuŋ nɛ, Aavi baaba ŋaatan, ma buk kaavɛ ŋaatin. Mã alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze nico, utuyaŋ kaale o kagoon.
43014012	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet agɔɔn buk niini kaal o kagoon naana ɛlɛ. Ma bar buk agɔɔn niini kaal ci adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk nicoko, eeci inoko kakɔ naana ŋaati baaba.
43014013	Zin olla mã anyak gi ci ajinu niiga zaare ogan, ŋaan kagoonekuŋ naana igeet ka diŋdiŋɔni o baaba keyelzyai ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin.
43014014	Mã anyak gi ci ajinaŋ niiga aneet zaare ogan, kagoonekuŋ.
43014015	Mã areezaŋ niiga aneet, uzuuti lotinok ogan.
43014016	Ŋaan kajin naana baaba ka kanyuŋ igeet tiritoi oma ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo ka oromtɛ ki igeet nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Niini Vɔŋiz ween didi o ayelza leemi o Joowo.
43014017	Alaŋ ɔl o loocu agama nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ niigi acin nɔɔnɔ, ma alaŋ aga. Bar zin niiga agayu nɔɔnɔ, eeci aavi niini ŋaatunooŋ, ma aromenu ki igeet.
43014018	Alaŋ kooŋnekuŋ igeet looc aavtiz doon, bar ŋaan kabadakuŋ.
43014019	Ŋintimiliny alaŋ bodo ɔl ci loocu noko acinan aneet, maje niiga ŋaan acinaŋ, eeci naana karogi, ma ŋaan buk tiŋeere niiga arognu.
43014020	Tiŋeere iitene nice ŋaan agayu kaavɛ naana ŋaati baaba, maje niiga aavtiyu ŋaatan, kiyo buk kaavɛ naana ŋaatunooŋ o.
43014021	Ma ɛɛti ci agama lotinok ogan, ma azooni, eet o areezan aneet nɛɛn. Ma eet ci areezan aneet, arɛɛz buk baaba nɔɔnɔ. Ma kareez buk naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kayelzai nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ can o.”
43014022	Ma azi Judaz oman calaŋ een Judaz Iskariat nɛ, “Manyi, ka yeleyet ɛlɛ cun o ageeta doon, ma alaŋ ayelzai ɔl ci looc o ku?”
43014023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma areezan ɛɛti aneet, azooni niini zɔɔz onan. Ma arɛɛz buk baaba nɔɔnɔ. Ma kavunaka naana ki baaba nɔɔnɔ, ma kabaaka ki nɔɔnɔ ŋaatodoi.
43014024	Maje ɛɛti calaŋ areezan aneet, alaŋ azooni niini zɔɔz onan. Ma zin bar zɔɔz ci aziiŋnu niiga kaduwa o, alaŋ een zɔɔz can, bar zɔɔz ci baaba o itoonanan aneet.
43014025	Kaduwakuŋ zin zoozok nicoko ŋinti ŋaan karomɛn naana kibeen igeet o.
43014026	Ma zin tiritoiti ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo o ka kitoona baaba zaare ogan ŋaan aku ademzekuŋ tiŋeere niini ageet kaal dook, ma buk ŋaan aadakuŋ kaal o gɔɔn kaduwakuŋ naana igeet dook.
43014027	Inoko zin kadotekuŋ igeet ganɔn onan. Ma ganɔni cane kanyuŋ igeet o, alaŋ atobɔ ki ganɔn o loocu. Má anyeku zin zinzeeti kitiranyit. Má anyaku ŋoliin.
43014028	Iziiktu rak uyene keneyuŋ nɛ, Kawɔ naana, ma bodo kakɔ kabadakuŋ. Inoko zin mã areezaŋ didi niiga aneet, abon atalninu giye ci kakɔyi naana ŋaati baaba o, eeci niini adikir ŋaatan.
43014029	Kuduwakuŋ zin kaal nicoko inoko iŋaan kakatai o, ka ma tiŋeere akanai ka utuyaŋ niiga aneet.
43014030	Alaŋ zin bodo kazɔɔzɔ naana kibeen igeet ŋinti wun, eeci alaan o loocu nɛɛn ci aku noko. Bar zin akɔm niini gi ci ka kodoma ŋaatan.
43014031	Abon zin aga lɔɔci reezi o karɛɛzɛ naana baaba. Ma kagoon kaal dook eo ilotekan niini aneet. Inoko zin itiŋgaz kɔtɔɔz ŋina.”
43015001	Ma anek Yesu nuyak bodo nɛ, “Keen naana kɛɛt dikirɔn. Maje baaba niini eet o keetu nɛɛn.
43015002	Mã anyak oton calaŋ abiir ŋaatan, aŋɛɛdak niini tuu. Maje oton o gɔɔn abiir, azɛɛc kitiliza ka kibiir juruŋ.
43015003	Inoko zin niiga itilizawu giye o zɔɔz baal kaduwakuŋ e.
43015004	Oromtezeyaŋ zin niiga aneet, maje buk naana karomonekuŋ igeet. Akɔm gɔɔn laadun oton ci abiir alye cin doon calaŋ akanonek kɛɛt dikirɔn. Mã alaŋ aromonekaŋ niiga aneet, eelnu buk koca niiga nɔkɔ.
43015005	Keen zin naana kɛɛt dikirɔn, maje niiga eeginu oto. Ma ɛɛti ci aromonekan aneet, maje buk naana karomonei nɔɔnɔ, eet o abiir juruŋ nɛɛn. Eeci mã kadɛyai naana ŋaatunooŋ, akɔm niiga doon gi ci ka utuguz.
43015006	Mã anyak eet calaŋ aromonekan aneet, atɛɛdjak koca niini looc kiyo kɛɛt otoni o, ma araabjai, ma alotɛ ka kakatozek goo.
43015007	Mã oromtozeyaŋ niiga aneet, ma aavu zɔɔz onane ŋaatunooŋ, olla mã anyak gi ci arooŋnyu, ma ajinu Jook, ajowanu.
43015008	Mã abiirnu juruŋ, anyaak gi nici baaba diŋdiŋɔn. Ma izitu koca didi niiga nuyak cigan.
43015009	Ma naana kareezuŋ igeet kiyo areezan buk baaba aneet o. Uruktek zin zɔɔ looc reezinte can o.
43015010	Mã azuunu lotinok cigan o, urukteyu koca zɔɔ looc reezinte onan didi kiyo kazoonɛ naana lotinok o baaba, ma buk karuwei zɔɔ looc reezinte onin o.
43015011	Kaduwakuŋ zin naana zɔɔz nico o ka talniin onanɛ kaavu ŋaatunooŋ, ka zin talniin unooŋ kidikir.
43015012	Zɔɔz zin can kilotekuŋ ce. Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook kiyo buk kareezuŋ naana igeet o.
43015013	Akɔm bodo reezinɛt ci adikir kujuk ci adaakni ɛɛti ŋaati laŋotigin.
43015014	Zin mã agoonu niiga kaal ci kilotekuŋ naana igeet o, izitu koca niiga laŋotigan didi.
43015015	Inoko zin alaŋaan naana kawuyuŋ bodo igeet iziti gabara, eeci gɔɔn gabarɛnti alaŋ aga gi ci agɔɔn alaani oninɛ. Bar zin inoko naana kutuwuŋ igeet iziti laŋotigan, eeci kuduwayuŋ igeet kaal o kaziikna ŋaati baaba dook.
43015016	Alaŋ aŋeranaŋ niiga aneet, bar aneet nɛɛn o kaŋeranuŋ igeet ka ɔɔtɔ ibiirta kɛbɛrɛ ci ɛɛl kodot. Ka zin kanyuŋ baaba igeet gi ci olla ajinu niiga nɔɔnɔ zaare ogan.
43015017	Inoko zin kilotekuŋ gi ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook.”
43015018	Ma anek Yesu nuyak bodo nɛ, “Mã amarninuŋ lɔɔci igeet, agaac amaroyan rak baale ɔɔwa aneet.
43015019	Matɛ waan iziti ɔl ci looc nico, areezuŋ waan niini igeet, eeci eeginu ɔl cigin. Bar zin kɛŋɛrawuŋ naana igeet looce nico. Alaŋaan zin bodo eeginu ɔl cigin. Gi ci zin amarninuŋ lɔɔci igeet o nɛɛn.
43015020	Aada zɔɔz baal rak kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Akɔm gabaren ci adikir alaane cin e. Zin kiyo amarninan ɔl aneet o, buk tiŋeere amarninuŋ niigi igeet nɔkɔ. Mã da kuzuuti niigi zɔɔz can o, azooni waan buk koca niigi tiŋeere zɔɔz cunooŋ.
43015021	Agoonekuŋ zin niigi igeet kaal ci gɛr noko dook giye can, eeci alaŋ aga niigi eet o itoonanan aneet.
43015022	Mã da iŋaan kiiya kuduwak naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o Joowo, alaŋ waan niigi aga anyak oŋɛ o. Bar zin inoko o ɔkɔma gɔl ci ka kadaŋti niigi oŋɛ ugeec.
43015023	Ma ɛɛti ci abornan aneet, abor buk niini baaba.
43015024	Inoko da iŋaan kutugu kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye o ŋaan laadun ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ kutugu, alaŋ waan niigi aga anyak oŋɛ o. Bar zin inoko icinit niigi kaal o kagoon, ma enico dook amartoyaŋ niigi aneet, ma amarnin buk baaba.
43015025	Zin agooni kaala nici o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal ayeedi waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, Amarninan niigi aneeta gaga nɔkɔ giye ci akɔm kɛŋ e.
43015026	Zin tiŋeere ma koowa naana ŋaati baaba, ŋaan kakɔ kitoonakuŋ igeet tiritoi ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Ma niini Vɔŋiz o aku ŋaati baaba nɛɛn. Ma ayelzak niini ɔl zɔɔz ween didi akanan aneet.
43015027	Zin buk niiga ŋaan eeginu bacok cigan, eeci koromtɛ naana kibeen igeet ŋinbaal kakunɛ e dook.”
43016001	Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ zin zɔɔz nico o, ka mã akunakuŋ igeet piryakzɛt calaŋ ooŋnu tuwɛn unooŋ.
43016002	Atookuŋ tiŋeere ɔl igeet ceezine o lotento. Ma buk aku tiŋeere iiteni ci arukuŋ ɔl igeet adaayit, ma bar abaaban niigi kizik aliŋliŋonek niigi Jook juruŋ giye ci arukuŋ igeet o.
43016003	Agoonekuŋ niigi kaal nicoko o, eeci alaŋ aga baaba, ma alaŋ agayan buk niigi aneet.
43016004	Zin kaduwakuŋ naana igeet kaal nicoko o, ka mã aku iiteni nica ka aada kuduwayuŋ baale naana igeet kaal nicoko laadun. Ŋaan laadun rak baale kuduwayuŋ igeet kaal nicoko o, eeci karomɛ naana kibeen igeet.
43016005	Bar zin inoko ka kook naana ŋaati baaba o itoonanan aneet. Akɔm zin ŋaatunooŋ eet ci ka kijinan kizi nɛ, Akɔ dim ŋaa?
43016006	Inoko zin atiranyuŋ igeet zinzeeti o, eeci kanekuŋ nɛ, Kawɔ naana.
43016007	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, abon kawɔ naana ŋaatunooŋ, eeci mã alaŋ kawɔ, alaŋ koca akunakuŋ tiritoiti ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Bar zin mã kɔtɔwa, ŋaan kitoonakuŋ nɔɔnɔ kiiyayuŋ igeet.
43016008	Zin tiŋeere mã aku niini, ŋaan aku ayelek ɔl o loocu gi o otoozi niigi gɛrzɛ baciinowe ugeecik. Ma aku ayelek buk niini nɔɔgɔ kaal ugeec gɛr abaaban niigi bar kizik abon. Ka buk kiiya keyelek niini nɔɔgɔ gi o alaŋ agawi niigi payiin o Joowo ka kiiya.
43016009	Zin tiŋeere aku ayelzak Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɔɔgɔ baciinok o, eeci alaŋ atuyan niigi aneet.
43016010	Ayelzak buk tiŋeere niini nɔɔgɔ bonat onan giye o kakɔyɛ naana ŋaati baaba, ma alaŋ bodo acinaŋ niiga aneet been nɛɛn.
43016011	Ayelzak buk tiŋeere niini nɔɔgɔ gi o alaŋ agawi niigi payiin o Joowo, eeci alaan o abal looc nico apawozek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin laadun.
43016012	Kanyei zoozok ci meel karooŋ kuduwayuŋ, bar zin alaŋ rak niiga inoko o animnyu uzuuti zoozok nicoko.
43016013	Zin tiŋeere ma iiya Vɔŋizi o Joowo een didi, ŋaan aku ayelekuŋ niini igeet kaal nicoko dook. Alaŋ zin bar niini tiŋeere aku azɔɔz alaazete cin doon, bar aduwa tiŋeere niini kaal o aziikna ŋaati baaba, ma buk aku aduwakuŋ niini igeet kaal o ka kakatai dook.
43016014	Anyan niini aneet zany, eeci tiŋeere adoma zɔɔz onan, ma aduwakuŋ igeet.
43016015	Ma kaal o baaba dook kaal cigan. Gi zin ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Ŋaan adoma Vɔŋizi o Joowo kaal o kaduwai naana nɔɔnɔ, ma aku aduwakuŋ igeet o nɛɛn.”
43016016	Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Inoko zin ŋintimiliny alaŋ acinaŋ rak niiga aneet, ma bodo ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ.”
43016017	Ma anɔ nuyawa oginɛ maany nɛ, “Ma dim azi nɛ, Ŋintimiliny alaŋ rak acinaŋ, ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ bodo o naa? Bodo buk azi nɛ, Kakɔ ŋaati baaba. Mayo zɔɔz nico kɛŋ cinɛ akati naa?
43016018	Gitaz ci anɛ nɛ, Ŋintimiliny, o? Alaŋ zin naaga kaga kɛŋ ci aduwak niini zɔɔz nico o.”
43016019	Maje Yesu aga nɔkɔ arɔɔŋ kijinit nɔɔnɔ kaal nicoko o. Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma dim gi ci ajinonu o gi ona kanɛ nɛ, Ŋintimiliny alaŋ rak acinaŋ, bodo ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ e nɛɛn?
43016020	Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, tiŋeere niiga aluyu, maje bar lɔɔci atalnɛ. Tiŋeere akanu culum, zin bar culum cunooŋ o ŋaan ookci kizi talniin.
43016021	Gɔɔn ŋaa mã ka kotoyai, aam dole, ma abalac ɔrɔɔt. Bar mazi akɔ ookcai, areyek bodo nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt we, ma atalnɛ labak, eeci otoyai.
43016022	Atobɔ zin buk gi nici kibeen igeet ci akanu culum inoko o. Ŋaan zin bodo kakɔ kabadakuŋ, ma iitene nice atalninu niiga ɔrɔɔt. Ma talniin nice akɔm eet oma ci ka kaamawuŋ igeet.
43016023	Ma iitene nice agayu niiga kaal dook, ma alaŋ bodo ajinaŋ aneet. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alam gi ci ajinu baaba zaare ogan, anyononekuŋ.
43016024	Zin laadun ŋaan akɔm gi ci ajinu niiga baaba zaare ogan zɛɛ been inoko o. Abon zin ajinu ka kanyozozeyuŋ, ka talniin unooŋ kizi appe.
43016025	Inoko gɔɔn kaduwakuŋ igeet kaal nicoko dook yabziinta. Bar zin tiŋeere aku iiteni calaŋ bodo kaduwakuŋ igeet kaal yabziinta, bar enice kabɔrakuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz o akati baaba kiziiyɛ labak.
43016026	Ma iitene nice ŋaan ajinu niiga baaba zaare ogan. Alaŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Ka bodo kijineyuŋ baaba naana.
43016027	Eeci baaba areezuŋ igeet giye o buk niiga areezaŋ aneet, ma utuyaŋ kakun naana ŋaatin.
43016028	Kakun baale laadun naana ŋaati baaba. Kakunai looc. Bodo zin inoko ka kotoŋ looc kimiire kook ŋaati Baaba.”
43016029	Ma anek nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin ɔbɔra zoozok calaŋ aduwa yabziinta.
43016030	Inoko zin didi kagayin aga niina kaal dook. Akɔm zin bodo eet ci ka kijinin ineet gi ci ajinin. Mazin giye nico kutuyin naana iiya da didi niina Joowa.”
43016031	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko utuyowu?
43016032	Ŋaan zin aku iiteni, ma bar buk inoko o ibilun tɔ laadun, azaanoneku tiŋeere niiga dook korogjok ugooc, ma adotekaŋ looc aneet doon. Alaŋ zin bar kaavɛ naana doon, eeci karomena kibeen baaba.
43016033	Kaduwakuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz nico o, ka anyayit ganɔn ŋaati aromonekaŋ niiga aneet. Agiduŋ tiŋeere lɔɔci igeet. Bar zin odoyit, eeci agayu kɔmɔga naana looc.”
43017001	Mazi adotiz Yesu zooze nico, adɔŋ kɛbɛrɛ ki tammu taden, ma azi nɛ, “Baaba, inoko zin iiya iiteni. Anyek zin ŋɛɛrun diŋdiŋɔn ka buk kanyin niini ineet diŋdiŋɔn.
43017002	Eeci anyan niina aneet alaazɛt ci ka kabali ɔl dook, ka kanyek naana rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ɔl baal anyan niina aneet e.
43017003	Zin rogɛt o abil kodot nɛɛn gi o ka kagayin ɔl dook ineet doon een niina Jook ween didi, ma buk agayan niigi aneet keen naana Kiristo baal itoonanan niina.
43017004	Ma zin naana keyeliza diŋdiŋɔn unun loota giye o kidicayɛ liŋliŋɔn baal anyan aneet kutugu e.
43017005	Baaba, inoko zin nyan diŋdiŋɔn o abil ŋume unun kiyo baale gɔɔn anyan laadun iŋaan kɛtɛɛnyai lɔɔci e.
43017006	Inoko zin keyelizawin ineet ole baal aŋɛra, ma anyan aneet loota ŋina e. Niigi laadun ɔl cugun, ma anyan niina aneet. Uzuuti zin niigi zɔɔz unun.
43017007	Ma inoko agaac niigi kaal o anyan niina aneet dook kaal ugun.
43017008	Kuduwaya zin naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz baal anyan e. Agamta zin, makacin agaac niigi didi kakun naana ŋaatun, ma utuyɔ itoonanan didi aneet niina.
43017009	Kaŋaryonei zin naana nɔɔgɔ. Alaŋ bar kaŋaryonei looc, bar kaŋaryonei nɔɔgɔ baal anyan niina aneet e, eeci een niigi ɔl cugun.
43017010	Ma kaala oganɛ dook kaal cugun. Maje buk kaala ugune dook kaal cigan. Eyelizai zin diŋdiŋɔni onanɛ ŋaatineeŋ.
43017011	Inoko zin naana kakunakin ineet. Alaŋaan bodo kaavɛ loota, bar aavtiyɔ loota niigi doon. Baaba onan adiŋdiŋ, zooti zin niina nɔɔgɔ ci baal anyan aneet o juruŋ dɔyize o zaar ugun ka buk niigi kodoye kiyo kadoye naana kibeen ineet o.
43017012	Ma ŋinbaal ŋaan karomena naana ki nɔɔgɔ e, kozootɛ nɔɔgɔ ci baal anyan aneet o juruŋ zaare ugun. Kozootɛ nɔɔgɔ dook, ma akɔm codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci akoloni, bar akoloni ɛɛti baal laadun aduyai waragɛwa e doon ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz unune.
43017013	Inoko zin naana kakunakin ineet. Ma zin kaal nicoko kaduwa loota ŋina o ka kanyayit niigi talniin onan zinzeetine ugeec kizi appe.
43017014	Kanyeya naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz unun. Ma amarɔi lɔɔci nɔɔgɔ, eeci alaŋ niigi een ɔl ci loocu, kiyo buk naana alaŋ keen eet ci loocu o.
43017015	Alaŋ zin bar kajinin ineet ka aara nɔɔgɔ loota ŋina, bar kajinin o ka bɛk nɔɔgɔ juruŋ Loryenta.
43017016	Kiyo naana alaŋ keen eet ci loocu o, buk niigi alaŋ eegin ɔl ci loocu.
43017017	Anyek nɔɔgɔ kizi ɔl cugun zooze unun een didi.
43017018	Kitooneya zin buk naana nɔɔgɔ loocok kiyo buk itoonanan niina aneet kiiyak looc o.
43017019	Kanyin zin naana ɛlɛ can o ineet ka korogoz nɔɔgɔ, ka kiziti niigi ɔl cugun zooze unun een didi.
43017020	Alaŋ zin kaŋaryonei nuyak nicoko doon, bar buk kaŋaryonei ɔl o tiŋeere avu agama zɔɔz onan ŋaatineeŋ.
43017021	Baaba, anyek nɔɔgɔ dook kodoye, kiyo kadoye buk naana kibeen ineet o. Ka kagaac ɔl o loocu didi itoonanan niina aneet.
43017022	Kanyeya naana nɔɔgɔ diŋdiŋɔn ci atobɔ kibeen o anyan niina aneet, ka zin buk niigi kodoye kiyo kadoye naana kibeen ineet o.
43017023	Kaavɛ naana ŋaatineeŋ kiyo buk aavɛ niina ŋaatan o. Ka zin kodoye niigi kiyo buk kadoye naaga o, ka kagaac ɔl o loocu itoonanan niina, ma areez niina nɔɔgɔ kiyo buk areezan aneet o.
43017024	Baaba, ineet nɛɛn o anyan aneet ɔl nicoko. Karooŋ zin nɔɔgɔ ka koromtewa ki aneet ŋaao kaavɛ naana ka kicinit niigi diŋdiŋɔn onan baal anyan e, eeci laadun areezan niina aneet iŋaan lɔɔci kɛtɛɛnyai e.
43017025	Baaba, ineet nɛɛn o agoon kaal dook kobonta. Ma bar alaŋ ɔl o loocu agayin ineet. Bar kagayin naana doon. Ma agaac buk ɔl nicigi itoonanan didi niina.
43017026	Inoko zin keyelizaya zaar ugun nɔɔgɔ, ma ŋaan kamɛna kagoon nɔkɔ, ka buk reezinɛt o areezan niina aneet kibil ŋaatineeŋ, ma buk naana kaavɛ ŋaatineeŋ.”
43018001	Mazi akɔ odotiz Yesu ŋaryiinta, itiŋgazɔ niini kibeen nuyak ogin ɔtɔɔzɔ, ma avɔ abaayiz nyarat o kazi Kidiron. Anyak ŋinaante mana, ma avɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin mane nico eecitɔ.
43018002	Maje Judaz baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e aga ŋinite, eeci gɔɔn waanice Yesu kibeen nuyak alotɛ ŋinaante.
43018003	Ook ni Judaz ŋinaante ɔrkɔr ki takirnya kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn abɛk ceez o Joowo. Itoona nɔɔgɔ ɔl o Parici kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo. Anyak niigi azɛɛnɛn tɔlit kibeen dilanya.
43018004	Maje Yesu aga kaal ci ka kivita kutuguzozek nɔɔnɔ o nɔkɔ. Mazi avu arum niigi mana, iiyak Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu dim ŋɛnɛɛn?”
43018005	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋnya Yesu o Nazarɛt.” Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn nici.” Maje Judaz o ka kataalɔi Yesu e, aromɛ kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
43018006	Mazi anek Yesu nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn nici,” amiiri niigi kivurut, ma aruk looc.
43018007	Bodo ni ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu dim ŋɛnɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Yesu o Nazarɛt.”
43018008	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma uyen kanekuŋ nɛ, Aneeta nɛɛn nici. Matɛ arooŋnyaŋ aneet, anycek rak nuyak ci karomena o kɔtɔɔzɔ.”
43018009	Aduwa niini gi nico o ka kɛlɛɛm giye baal anɛ nɛ, “Baaba, akɔm eet ci kakuluz ole baal anyan e.”
43018010	Maje Saiman Pitɔr anyak kabaz ci wun, ma avoca tibila, ma aruk gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat ci azo o vɔc. Kazi zaar ci gabaren nico o nɛ Malkos.
43018011	Ma anek Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Bil. Yizek kabaz cun noko tibil. Abaaban niina kizik bar ŋaatun kaŋole naana piryakzɛt ci baal laadun anyan baaba ka kipirai o?”
43018012	Enico odomta takirnya kibeen alaan uneeŋ kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn abɛk ceez o Joowo agamit Yesu, ma acap azɛɛn.
43018013	Ma avɔyi rak ɔɔwa alaane o kazi Anas ween baati dole o ariyi Kayavas. Maje Kayavas alaan ci ceez o Joowo irkite nice.
43018014	Ma zin Kayavas eet baal ilot alaat o Juz anek nɛ, “Abon adaai ɛɛti codoi ole o Juz ka kirigizit ɔl o Juz dook rogɛt,” e nɛɛn.
43018015	Oneec ni Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai oma Yesu. Mazi avɔyi ɔl Yesu korge ci alaano o, ook buk nuyaiti ɔlɔ nici eecitɔ, eeci ɛɛti ci korgu o aga nuyai nico.
43018016	Maje Pitɔr abil bitaala ajɔŋɔz araan. Ma amiironek nuyaiti ona akɔ kɔrga eecitɔ e araan tatok, ma akɔ aduwak dole o abɛk araan kɔkɔla Pitɔr kiiyak kɔrɔk kɛŋ.
43018017	Ma ajin dole nici Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Alaŋ buk niina een nuyai ci eet nico?” Bar abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm, alaŋ keen nuyai cin.”
43018018	Maje baaline nice alal laju ɔrɔɔt. Ma adoma gabara ki ɔl o abeke avaat goo ci aavtiyɛ zɔlɔmɔi. Ma aku aromonek buk Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ, ma abilnek goo.
43018019	Ma ŋinaanto ijinun Anas Yesu kaal ci akati nuyak ogin kibeen demziin onin.
43018020	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kabora gɔɔn naana zɔɔz ɔl dook kebereca labak, ma kademez gɔɔn ɔl tup ceezine o lotento kibeen ceeze o Joowo gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl o Juz. Akɔm laadun naana gi ci kaŋomoti been nɛɛn.
43018021	Mazin yo ajinan aneet? Bar jin ɔl o gɔɔn aziiŋnan aneet ŋaati kazɔɔzɛ kaal o kaduwai nɔɔgɔ, eeci aga niigi kaal ogan kaduwa.”
43018022	Mazi aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico, apanun ɛɛti codoi ole ci ona abɛk nɔɔnɔ o voret, ma anek nɛ, “Aduwai alaan ci ceez ci Joowo adikir o gi nico?”
43018023	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci kabaci, duwak ɔl dook ŋina kiziiyit gi ci kabaci o. Mazi akɔm gi ci gɛr kaduwa, arukan zin naa?”
43018024	Enico itoonek Anas Yesu Kayavas ween alaan o ceez o Joowo, maje azɛɛna ŋaan acabje nɔkɔ.
43018025	Mazi ŋaan abilnek Pitɔr goo nɔkɔ, ijinit bodo ɔl ogɛnɛ nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ een buk niina nuyai ci eet nico?” Bar adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ keen naana nuyai cin.”
43018026	Maje ŋinaante buk anyak gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo ceen gɔtɔni eet ona atɛɛda Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ itat e. Ma ajin niini Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een ineet nɛɛn o kacinuŋ ki nɔɔnɔ mana e?”
43018027	Bodo ni adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Akɔm, alaŋ een aneet.” Enico orowun toloci.
43018028	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna uduntai ɔl Yesu ceeze o Kayavas, iiya itoontek niigi nɔɔnɔ alaan o Jerusalɛm een Romen kazi Pailat. Ivita ni alaata o Juz, ma avu ɛɛl kɔrɔk kɛŋa, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kanyaaktak eleeti ririny gɛrzɛ ŋaan alam nɔɔgɔ ŋaati avɔ adayi dayiin o aadanɛ iiten o vardaŋinto.
43018029	Ma akunak Pailat nɔɔgɔ bitaala, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ma dim eet nico anyaakaŋ o agɔɔn naa?”
43018030	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ waan kɔkɔma gi ci gɛr agɔɔn, alaŋ waan kanyaakin ineet.”
43018031	Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooti zin nɔɔnɔ ka ɔɔt apayit niiga alya lotinowe o kɛɛranɛ ugooc.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ gɔɔn naaga kaganona ŋaati karuka ɔl kadaayitɔ.”
43018032	Ma gi nici akanai o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal aduwa Yesu akati daayiz onin ka kadaai keete ween talakec e.
43018033	Imiirozek Pailat ceez, ma awa Yesu, ma aku ajin anek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o Juz nɛɛn?”
43018034	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim gi nico ajinan niinalya, yo anyak da eet ci aduwakin kaal ci akanan aneet?”
43018035	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ keen naana eet ci Juz. Ɔl ugun maany kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo nɛɛn ci anyaanin ineet ŋina o. Ma laadun abaca naa?”
43018036	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ baliin cane abil loota ŋina. Matɛ kibil ŋina, alaminan waan nuyawa ogane calaŋ agamnyan alaata ci Juz o. Bar zin inoko o alaŋ baliin cane abil ŋina.”
43018037	Ma ajin Pailat bodo Yesu anek nɛ, “Een zin bɔŋ alaan ci adikir?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didi zin. Abil kiyo aduwa niina o. Keen naana alaan. Karitai laadun, ma kakunai looc nico o ka kuuwak zɔɔz ween didi. Ma zin ɛɛti ci agama zɔɔz ween didi azii niini zɔɔz onan.”
43018038	Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma zɔɔz ceen didi o nɛɛn gitaz?” Enico udun Pailat ook ole o Juz e bitaala, ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa eete nico ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.
43018039	Ma zin keere unooŋ ɔl o Juz gɔɔn laadun kaborcakuŋ igeet eet codoi ole o acabje iitene o lotɛn o vardaŋinto. Mayo zin inoko arooŋnyu koborocayuŋ alaan cunooŋ adikir o?”
43018040	Bar agɛrɛny niigi dook anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm! Má aborca nɔɔnɔ! Bar borocayet Barabas.” Maje Barabas nici waanice niini agoryai ci acabje zooze ci aami ɔl kaal.
43019001	Anyek ni Pailat Yesu takirnya korooyit nɔɔnɔ.
43019002	Ma agɔɔna takirnya nyagirgir ceen bila, ma aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ, ma bodo aborcɛkɛ rum ci meeri ɛlɛ.
43019003	Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ, ma amomoz anek nɛ, “Rogɔ bai kodot alaan o Juz adikir.” Maje bodo ŋaato apan voret azɛɛnɛn.
43019004	Ma amiironek bodo Pailat ɔl dook bitaala, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Iziiyit di, ŋaan kanyaakuŋ Yesu ka agaac akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.”
43019005	Uduna ni Yesu bitaalin. Maje ɔɔwa anyak nyagirgir ceen bila noko, ma anyak rum ci meeri noko alya. Ma aku anek Pailat ɔl nɛ, “Icinit di, eet nɛɛn nici.”
43019006	Mazi acin alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen bɛkcok o ceez o Joowo Yesu, egerenyit izitɔ nɛ, “Otodeec nɔɔnɔ! Otodeec nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec?” Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooti ka ɔɔt otodeec nɔɔnɔ niiga alya, eeci akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.”
43019007	Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Juz Pailat anek nɛ, “Kanyaka naaga lotinok cigaacak. Mazin lotinowe ogaacak aganɔ niini ki daayiz, eeci anyek ɛlɛ kizi ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
43019008	Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, anyawun niini ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
43019009	Ma bodo amiironek ceez, ma akɔ ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim laadun niina akun ŋaaḏaŋ?” Maje Yesu ajaki, ma ŋaan kabarzek nɔɔnɔ.
43019010	Ma anek Pailat nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ arooŋ zoozeyan? Alaŋ agayan kanyei alaazɛt ci kaborcanin kibeen ci kadodoyin keete ween talakec o?”
43019011	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma da iŋaan kanyozeyin ineet alaazɛt nici Joowa, akɔmnin waan alaazɛt cun ŋaatan. Mazin giye nico ɛɛti o ataalinan aneet ŋaatun, anyak niini oŋec ci adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk oŋec cun o.”
43019012	Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, ɔrɔɔŋ niini gɔl ci ka kɔɔgai nɔɔnɔ. Maje bar ɔl o Juz agerenyek Pailat anek nɛ, “Mã ɔɔga nɔɔnɔ, alaŋ koca bodo niina een laŋoti alaan o Rom adikir. Eeci ɛɛti ci anyek ɛlɛ kizi alaan ci adikir, amarnin niini alaan o Rom adikir.”
43019013	Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, udunai Yesu bitaalin, ma akɔ aavi niini loota lecere o roonnyo ŋaati agirgir. Kazi ŋinito zooze o Juz nɛ Gabaza.
43019014	Maje waanice ŋaan iiteni codoi ɔɔwa ka kizi iiten o lotɛn o vardaŋinto. Maje ii ibilun boloca. Ma anek Pailat ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Alaan zin unooŋ adikir ce.”
43019015	Ma agerenyek niigi Pailat anek nɛ, “Ruk kadaak! Ruk kadaak! Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec?” Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ dim aneet kɔtɔdɔ alaan cunooŋ adikir o keete ween talakec?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaata o ceez o Joowo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyaka naaga alaan o Rom adikir doon. Alaŋ een ɛɛti nici alaan cinaaŋ adikir?”
43019016	Enico odoma Pailat Yesu anyewun nɔɔgɔ ka kɔɔt kotodooc nɔɔnɔ talakeca. Agamit ni takirnya Yesu.
43019017	Ma aduŋnan niigi nɔɔnɔ bitaalin, ma anyek kitik kɛɛt ceen talakec. Ma akɔyi zɛɛ been ŋinti kazi Golgoza. Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico o zooze o Juz kazi nɛ Amɛn ci Oowu.
43019018	Ma ŋinaante otodooc niigi Yesu keete ween talakec. Ma buk bodo adɔdɔ niigi ɔl ceen ram keene ceen talakɛn Yesu libirɔi. Maje Yesu adɔdi nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna.
43019019	Ma ayɛɛt Pailat zɔɔz keete ci zabal, ma arek kɛɛt nico gɔɔn ceen talakec o tadena. Azi zɔɔz nici nɛ, “Nici Yesu o Nazarɛt ween alaan o ɔl o Juz adikir.”
43019020	Ma akɛɛp ɔl ci meel ole o Juz zɔɔz nico, eeci ŋinti adodinɛ Yesu o ajɔŋzɔ kibeen Jerusalɛm. Ma zɔɔz nici ayeedi zooze o ɔl o Juz kibeen zooze o ɔl o Rom kibeen zooze o ɔl ween Garik.
43019021	Ma anek alaata o ceez o Joowo Pailat nɛ, “Má ayeedi azi nɛ, Alaan ci Juz adikir, bar tɛyɛɛt izi nɛ, Azi ɛɛti nici nɛ, Keen naana alaan ci Juz adikir.”
43019022	Ma bar abɛdɛkɛ Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma gi ci kɛtɛyɛɛda naana, ibilun nɔkɔ.”
43019023	Mazi akɔ adɔdɔ takirnya Yesu, odomta eŋerit niigi rumanɛ ogin lak wec. Ma adoma gɔɔn takirɛnti ceeni akɔyi cigin. Ma adoma buk niigi rum onin adikir malkinto. Maje rum nici adoye ṯɔr nɔkɔ calaŋ aloli.
43019024	Ma anɔ takirnya nɛ, “Alaŋ rum nico karɛɛc, bar kutuguz maadico, ma anyak eet ci iinak ka kooyi kizi cin.” Ma gi nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛm zɔɔz o aduyai waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Eŋeryek niigi rumanɛ ogan eleeti. Ma agɔɔn maadico rume onan malkinto adikir.” Zin gi nico agɔɔn takirnya.
43019025	Maje yaati Yesu ki ŋɔɔni yaatin ki Meri ween ŋaa o Kilopas kibeen Meri o aku kuture o Magdala ɛɛl niigi ajɔŋɔz kɛɛt ceen talakec adodinɛ Yesu o.
43019026	Mazi acin Yesu yaatin kibeen nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz niini ɛɛl ŋinaante, enek niini yaatin nɛ, “Yaai, inoko nuyaiti nici izi ŋɛɛrun.”
43019027	Ma bodo anek niini nuyai nico nɛ, “Nicini yaatun.” Zin iitene nice ɛlɛ odoma nuyaiti nici ooyi Meri ole onin ɔɔt abaayit ki nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
43019028	Ma vurta mazi agawun Yesu odot liŋliŋɔnti oninɛ, izi nɛ, “Arukan kɔr.” Aduwa niini nɔkɔ o, ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo.
43019029	Maje ŋinaante anyak kodooc ci abiz nyaani ci amokcar ɔrɔɔt. Ma ajukek niigi nyaan nici tovot, ma itoonɛkɛ Yesu otok moroka.
43019030	Mazi atar Yesu nyaan nico, izi nɛ, “Inoko zin odota.” Ma aliba ɔɔ, ma adaai.
43019031	Ijinit ni alaata o Juz Pailat ka kanyek nɔɔgɔ kuduulit ɔl ci ona adɔdi talakɛni o zɔɔ ka kadaayitɔ kataman ka kaaryak looc, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi ɔl keelit kɛɛni zɛɛ been iiten ween Sabit, eeci Sabit nica iiten ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt.
43019032	Uduulit ni takirnya zɔɔ ci ɔl ceen ram ona adɔdi kibeen Yesu o.
43019033	Mazi bar avunak Yesu, icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ adaawun. Otoŋit ni nɔɔnɔ calaŋ aduul zɔɔ.
43019034	Ma akat takirɛnti codoi Yesu libir dilawa kudunta maama kibeen biye.
43019035	(Aneet zin Jɔn o kicina kaal nicoko nɛɛn ci kaduwa zɔɔz nico o, ka buk niiga utuyɔ. Ma kaal ci kaduwa naana o ɛɛl didi tɔ, ma kaga buk naana kaduwa kaal ci alɛɛmnyai.)
43019036	Ma kaala nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo. Eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Akɔm amene ogin codoi aduuli.”
43019037	Bodo azi waragɛwi ŋaaman nɛ, “Acin bodo katin ɔl eet baal akat niigi dilawa e.”
43019038	Mazi ɛtɛɛt Yesu, iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ci kutur o kazi Arimatiya. Josev nici waanice nuyai ci Yesu, ma ŋaan bar kɔbɔra tuwɛn onin, eeci aŋole niini alaat o Juz. Iiya ni niini, ma ajin Pailat ka kanyek ɛlɛ o Yesu. Anyewun ni Pailat nɔɔnɔ kooyi ɛlɛ o Yesu labak. Zin didi ook odoma Josev ɛlɛ o Yesu.
43019039	Maje buk Nikodimos baal akunak Yesu baal e ɔrkɔra kibeen Josev. Anyaa niini kaal ci meel aŋɔl madiz kiyo karkari o ci kazi zaar nɛ mir kibeen alo.
43019040	Odomta ni niigi dook ramana ɛlɛ o Yesu. Ma anyaa rum o gɔɔn abuŋi ɔl gɔnɔgi o adaai, ma aḏuutek karkar nico, ma atakucek ɛlɛ o Yesu. Agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ o, eeci nici kɛɛr ci ɔl o Juz.
43019041	Maje ŋaati baal adodinɛ Yesu o anyak mana ci anyak bɔɔt ci jɔr ŋaan adayai ci ŋaan laadun karyek ɔl eet ci adaai.
43019042	Ɔɔt ni aryek niigi Yesu ŋinite, eeci bɔɔt nica ajɔŋzɔ ki ŋinti ona adodinɛ Yesu o. Ma buk ibil iiteni codoi ka tiŋeere kizi iiten ween Sabit.
43020001	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iitene o yubzento, ook Meri o kutur o Magdala boote ci baal arek ɔl Yesu o. Mazi akɔ arum niini ŋinite, acin bɛ baal anyoogi ɔl bɔɔt otok e ipiyai bɔɔt otoga.
43020002	Ɔdɔkɔny ni niini kataman ook ŋaati Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu. Ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aarya ɔl ɛlɛ o Manyi bɔɔta, bar zin alaŋ kagaya naaga ŋinti ɔɔt aryek niigi nɔɔnɔ o.”
43020003	Ma iŋaaz Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai nico, ma adɔkɔny avɔ bɔɔta.
43020004	Maje nuyaiti nici tiir ŋaati Saiman Pitɔr, makacin ook arawun bɔɔt niini ɔɔwa.
43020005	Ma agiriiny bɔɔt ŋaati abilni niini bitaala calaŋ akɔ eecitɔ. Ma acin rum baal atakucek ɔl ɛlɛ o Yesu e doon.
43020006	Onowa ni Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akɔ niini bɔɔta eecitɔ enico ɛlɛ. Ma acin rum baal atakucek ɔl ɛlɛ o Yesu e ɔɔŋ loota.
43020007	Maje buk rum baal atakucek ɔl Yesu ɔɔ e anyomɛ juruŋ, ma aronek looc kɛdɛyai gɔna.
43020008	Ook ni nuyaiti ona ajaar Pitɔr e bɔɔta eecitɔ buk. Mazi acin kaal nicoko, agawun niini itiŋa Yesu daayiza didi.
43020009	Ma bar ŋaan niigi kagaac zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo akati ŋaazi o Yesu daayiza nɔkɔ.
43020010	Ma enico imiirte nuyawa nici ɔɔtɔ korgine ugeec.
43020011	Maje Meri ŋaan abil bɔɔt otoga alu. Mazi ululi ka kigiriiny bɔɔt eecitɔ ŋaati aluwi nɔkɔ,
43020012	acin bar toonnyak ci tammo een ram bɔɔta eecitɔ. Anyak niigi rumane ci vɔɔr pɛr, ma aavtiz niigi ŋaabaal arek ɔl Yesu e. Aavi codoi libire ci oowu o, maje codoi aavi libire ci zoonu o.
43020013	Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaa nico, alu naa?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ooti ɔl ɛlɛ o Manyi onan, bar zin alaŋ kaga ŋinti ɔɔt aryek niigi nɔɔnɔ o.”
43020014	Aduwa gi nico mazi abuudi, bar acin Yesu abil. Ma bar alaŋ niini aga een Yesu o.
43020015	Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaa nico, alu naa? Arooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn?” Ma bar abaaban niini anyek kizi eet ci aliŋliŋ mane nico, ma anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, mã akɔyɛ ɛlɛ o Manyi onan niina, duwayan da ŋinti ari o ka kook kodoma.”
43020016	Ma awo Yesu nɔɔnɔ zaar azi nɛ, “Meri.” Mazi ookci Meri, acin Yesu, ma anek nɛ, “Robonai," o akati kɛŋ cinɛ alaan o demziinto.
43020017	Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Má atorkodan, eeci ŋaan rak kamiire kook ŋaati baaba. Bar bitɔ duwak gɔtɔnɔga ween nuyak enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Kamiire kakɔ ŋaati baaba ween buk baatunooŋ ween Jook onan, ma een buk Jook unooŋ.”
43020018	Imiiri ni Meri, ma akɔ aduwak nuyak gi o icini niini Yesu kibeen kaal dook ona aduwak Yesu nɔɔnɔ e.
43020019	Ma iitene nice yomana ulute nuyawa ŋaatodoi, ma anyoogek eleeti ceez, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz. Iiyak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma abil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azaa anek nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.”
43020020	Mazi adotiz zaawinta, eyelek niini nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn kibeen libir ŋinbaal akanɛ e. Mazi acin nuyawa nɔɔnɔ, ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
43020021	Ma bodo anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ. Zin kiyo buk itoonanan baaba aneet o, kitoonuŋ buk naana igeet.”
43020022	Mazi adotiz zooze nico, ovoŋek nɔɔgɔ vɔŋiz, ma anek nɛ, “Agamta zin Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
43020023	Mã ooŋneku niiga ɔl baciinok ugeec, ooŋnek buk Jooi nɔɔgɔ. Bar mã alaŋ ooŋneku nɔɔgɔ baciinok ugeec, alaŋ buk Jooi ooŋnek nɔɔgɔ baciinok ugeec.”
43020024	Ma iitene ci baal ayelzakɛ Yesu nuyak ɛlɛ neke, azee Tomaz o kazi codengɔn tɔ. Niini buk nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram.
43020025	Mazi akɔ aku niini, uduktak nuyawa nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Kicinta uyen Manyi Yesu.” Ma bar anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã ŋaan kicin tobɛ baal akani ɔl nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn lotomarete e, ma kuum naana alya azeene ogan, ma buk kari aziit tobɛn baal akat ɔl libira e, alaŋ bai kagama zɔɔz cunooŋ o been nɛɛn.”
43020026	Mazi avɔ iinya ceen torgɛrɛm, ulute nuyawa ŋaatodoi bodo, ma anyoogek eleeti ceez eecitɔ. Maje Tomaz aavi tɔ. Iiya ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma abil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azaa azi nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.”
43020027	Ma anek Yesu Tomaz nɛ, “Ija, uum azɛɛn cigan o ka cin. Zuwek buk aziit cun o tobɛn baal akanan ɔl libira e. Má ŋaan bodo een bakbak, bar tuwɔ.”
43020028	Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni Tomaz nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Een didi niina Manyi onan, ma een Jook onan.”
43020029	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Utuwɔ o, eeci icinan. Bar zin abil mayuwɛnɛt ole o atuwe iŋaan kicintan.”
43020030	Ma agɔɔn Yesu kaal oogi ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye nuyak kɛbɛrɛn. Ma kaal nicoko ogɛn ŋaan keteyeede waragewe nico.
43020031	Ma zin kaal o ayeedi waragewe nico ayeedi o ka mã atuyu Yesu Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo ka ojokta niiga rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn zaare ogin.
43021001	Ma vurta eyelizak bodo Yesu ɛlɛ nuyak ogin liile o .Il. kazi Tiberas.
43021002	Ma waanice aromɛ Saiman Pitɔr, ki Tomaz ween coden, ki Natanyɛl o kutur o kazi Kana abil looce o Galili, ki aneeta Jɔn, ki Jemis o keegina lɔgɔz o Zebedi, ki nuyak oogi ceen ram.
43021003	Ma anek Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kakɔ naana detiin liila.” Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Korkorit naaga dook.” Otoodit ni niigi dook kavool ɔɔtɔ detiin. Bar baalin nice dook akɔm kuluk ci agam kina.
43021004	Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iiya Yesu, ma aku abil liil otoga, maje bar nuyawa ŋaan niigi kiyezit nicini Yesu o.
43021005	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Lɔgɔzɛ, akɔm dim kuluk ci agamnu?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina.”
43021006	Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ujuktek di cabak kavool libir ci azo o ka agamta kuluk.” Mazi ajukek niigi cabak ŋinito, agamun cabai kuluk ci meel ɔrɔɔt calaŋ anim niigi kutugurta.
43021007	Ma anek nuyaiti o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Nicini ri Manyi gi.” Mazi azii Saiman Pitɔr zɔɔz nico, odoma rum onin, ma aborcek ɛlɛ, ma iinak liil, eeci uyen aavi niini ŋaḏinyiny, ma ook ni niini ŋaati Yesu.
43021008	Maje kavooli ɔjɔŋɔz dɔwɔn, ma awɔla nuyawa ceegi kavool, maje ŋaato agura cabak ona abiz kuluga e, ma avunak dɔwɔn.
43021009	Mazi atɔɔdak niigi dɔwɔn, amada zɔlɔmɔ ci agam goo ci anyak kulugit kibeen ḏokoc.
43021010	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaakta kuluk oogi kuluge ci ona agamanu noko.”
43021011	Ma akɔ Pitɔr kavoola, ma akɔ agurak cabak dɔwɔn. Maje cabak abiz kuluga ci adikir een eet tur ki eet ram kamɔtɔ ki tiin iiyu (153), majc bar cabai ŋaan kɛrɛɛci.
43021012	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ivita, adaktɔ.” Ma akɔm eet codoi nuyawɛ ci ka kijin nɔɔnɔ kenek nɛ, “Ineeta ŋɛnɛɛn?” Eeci agaac niigi niini Manyi gi.
43021013	Ook ni Yesu gooya, ma adoma ḏokoc, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ. Bodo adoma kuluk, ma anyek buk nɔɔgɔ.
43021014	Enico izi lak iiyu ci ayelzakɛ Yesu ɛlɛ nuyak ogin vurte baal itiŋawi niini daayiza e.
43021015	Mazi adotiz niigi dayiinta, enek Yesu Saiman Pitɔr nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim areezan didi niina aneet ɔrɔɔt jukɔ gonogu nicoko dook?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Aga ri niina kareezin naana ineet didi o nɔkɔ.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.”
43021016	Bodo abadaki Yesu nɔɔnɔ jinɛn we ɛlɛ anek nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim areezan didi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Aga ri niina kareezin naana ineet o nɔkɔ.” Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.”
43021017	Bodo ni anek Yesu Saiman Pitɔr eceen lak iiyu o nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim niina areezan didi?” Enico itiranyun Pitɔr ziniz, eeci ijinun Yesu nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been lak iiyu. Enek ni niini Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, aga kaal dook niina, ma aga kareezin naana ineet didi o nɔkɔ.” Enek ni bodo Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.
43021018	Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, baale gɔɔn maŋaan een logoz e, iŋaaz niina, ma acabei rum unun, ma akɔ ŋaati olla arooŋ tɛ niina biti. Bar zin tiŋeere ma izɛ matuwoc, acabjin ɛɛti oman ineet azɛɛn, ma akoyin ŋaati alaŋ arooŋ niina biti.”
43021019	Ma zooze nico aduwa Yesu daayiz o katin adaaŋni Pitɔr ka kanyakɛ niini Jook diŋdiŋɔn. Uduwa ni niini gi nico, ma anek Pitɔr nɛ, “Nowawan zin.”
43021020	Mazi abuudi Pitɔr, acin nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu anowa nɔɔgɔ vurta. Nici zin nuyai baal ajɔŋzɔ kibeen Yesu, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ iiten baal adayi niigi dayiin o baalinu anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci dim ka kataaloyin ineet o?” E nɛɛn.
43021021	Mazi acin Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ, enek Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, ma dim tiŋeere ɛɛti ceeni abil ku?”
43021022	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ karooŋ naana nɔɔnɔ korok zɛɛ ma kabada katin, kazi cun nɛ? Ija niina nowawan ineet labak.”
43021023	Mazi azii nuyawa zɔɔz nico, abaabanit niigi izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋaan tiŋeere nuyaiti nici adaai.” Maje bar Yesu alaŋ azi nɔkɔ, bar olla azi nɛ, “Matɛ karooŋ nɔɔnɔ korok zɛɛ ma kabada, kazi cun nɛ?”
43021024	Zin aneet Jɔn nɛɛn ci kaduwa kaal nicoko, ma kayeedi o. Kagaya naaga kaala ci kayeedi o kaal ceen didi.
43021025	Anyak zin bodo kaal oogi ci meel ci agɔɔn Yesu. Mã da inoko keteyeede kaala nici dook, adala waan waragɛnya looc dook dal.
44001001	Laŋo Tipoliz, baale rak kɛtɛyɛɛda waragɛ oma ci akati liŋliŋɔn o Yesu ki demziin onin dook iinyaye o ŋaan akanan niini liŋliŋɔn e zɛɛ been iiten baal akuli Jooi nɔɔnɔ akɔyi tamma e.
44001002	Mazi ŋaan rak niini kook tamma e, iricanek niini dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo toonnyak ogin baal aŋɛra e kaal ci ka kutuguzɔ niigi.
44001003	Ma vurte e itiŋawi niini daayiza e, avu rak loota iinya eet ram, ma ayelzak ɛlɛ nɔɔgɔ lak ci meelik ka kagaac niigi nɔɔnɔ urugun didi. Icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma buk azɔɔz niini ki nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci akati baliin o Joowo.
44001004	Mazi avɔ alotɛ niigi dook ŋaatodoi, iricanek niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Má uuŋnu Jerusalɛm, bar ereyɔ ŋinaante zɛɛ ma akunakuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo baal aterkedekuŋ Jooi igeet baal kaduwakuŋ e.
44001005	Baale Jɔn oony ɔl maami doon, bar tiŋeere niiga iinyaye ci miliny avu neke oonyenu Vɔŋize o Joowo.”
44001006	Mazi avɔ alotɛ toonnyawa ki Yesu iitene oman, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Manyi, ma dim inoko izɛ niina alaan ci abal ɔl o Israyil nɛɛn ka tɔɔk akuma o Rom?”
44001007	Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een nici zɔɔz cunooŋ, bar zɔɔz ci baaba doon o anyan aneet ka kabal Israyil.
44001008	Zin tiŋeere ma iiyayuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ŋaan anyuŋ niini igeet dɔyiz ka iziti niiga bacok cigan Jerusalɛma ki Judiya ki Samariya zɛɛ been vitɛn ci akani tammu zɔɔ looc e.”
44001009	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz nɔkɔ icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ iŋaaz akɔ ki tammu taden nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin ibiil diizoc alaŋaan acin bodo.
44001010	Mazi ŋaan agɛlɛm niigi tammu taden nɔkɔ, bar acin ɔl ceen ram anyak rumanɛ ci vɔɔrik ɛɛl nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna.
44001011	Ma anek niigi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔl o Galili, eelnu agelemnyu tammu taden nɔkɔn? Yesu ci acinu niiga akuli Jooi akɔyi tammu tadena noko, abada bodo katin icinit kiyo acinu akɔ tamma noko.”
44001012	Agooni kaala nicaga biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ajɔŋɔz Jerusalɛm. Ma vurta ivitak niigi Jerusalɛm.
44001013	Mazi avɔ arum ŋinite, ɔɔtɔ ceeze uneeŋ ataadonek gɔn tadena Ma ɔl nicigi awoyi Pitɔr, ki Jɔn, ki Jemis, ki Andoru, ki Pilip, ki Tomaz, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ ɔl ogin akumawe o Rom e, ki Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Jemis.
44001014	Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ alotɛ niigi ŋaatodoi aŋaryɛ. Ma buk aromɛ niigi ki ŋaai koogi, kibeen Meri yaati Yesu, kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi Yesu.
44001015	Ma iinyaye ogɛn olotɛ ɔl o agama Yesu. Ma alotai ɔl ceen eet torgɛrɛm (120). Itiŋa ni Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ma anek nɛ,
44001016	“Gɔtɔnɔga, zɔɔz o waragɛ o Joowo akɔ zɛɛ ayelzai kibil tɔ didi. Baale uduwa Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaati Devid zɔɔz ci akati Judaz baal ayita ɔl o avu agam Yesu e.
44001017	Ma Judaz baale laadun niini eet cinai, eeci ɛŋɛra waanice Yesu nɔɔnɔ ka kiliŋliŋ kibeen ageet.
44001018	Agayu niiga Judaz waanice ataala mana guruce baal anyek ɔl nɔɔnɔ ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu e. Ook zin waanice acabek niini alɛm kɛɛt mane nico, ma iina kɛɛt tadena kɛrɛɛcɛ kɛŋ kudunta koloktɛna, ma adaai.
44001019	Iziiyit zin waanice ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma dook zɔɔz nico. Ma akanek niigi mana nice zaar ci kazi nɛ Akeldama. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ mana ci biyetu.”
44001020	Ma azi Pitɔr bodo nɛ, “Ayɛɛt baale Devid waragewe o beniinowu zɔɔz ci akati Judaz azi nɛ, “Een katin ceez cinɛ lik kɔkɔm eet ci abaayi.” Ma buk ayeedi gi ci azi nɛ, “Abon arigiz ŋintin o ɛɛti oman.”
44001021	Zin giye nico abon kaŋɛra eet oma ole baal karomɛ ki ageet iinyaye baal ŋaan aavɛ Manyi Yesu ŋaatinai e, akanai iinyaye baal oonyi Jɔn nɔɔnɔ e, zɛɛ been iiten baal akɔyi niini tamma e. Abon kaŋɛra eet nico ka kizi bacoi buk ki ageet ci aduwak ɔl ŋaazi o Manyi Yesu daayiza.”
44001023	Ɛŋɛrta ni niigi ɔl ram. Codoi kazi zaar nɛ Matiyas. Bodo codoi kazi zaar nɛ Josev o kazi Justus Barsabas.
44001024	Ma aŋaryɛ niigi azi nɛ, “Manyi, aga niina ɔl dook zinzeeti. Inoko yeleyet eet codoi ole ceen ram noko ci tɛ ɛŋɛra niina laadun ka kirigiz zɔɔ o Judaz, eeci Judaz baale otoŋet ageeta, ma ook gooye o abil been nɛɛn.”
44001026	Ma agɔɔn niigi maadico ci ka kɛŋɛrtai eet codoi ole ceen ram noko. Ɛŋɛra ni Jooi Matiyas, ma aromonek niini toonnyak ween amɔtɔ codoi.
44002001	Mazi akɔ aku iiteni o kazi Pintikos, ulute ɔl o tuwento dook ŋaatodoi.
44002002	Taman nɔkɔ iiya mɔlɔyi ci aku tamma ci atobɔ ki ŋɔɔt ci ivaan ɔrɔɔt, ma aku adala ceez ci ona aavtiyɛ niigi o dook.
44002003	Ma acin niigi kaal ci kizik goonya ci alanyit, ma azaanonek nɔɔgɔ dook ooti.
44002004	Makacin anyayit niigi dook Vɔŋiz o Joowo ɔrɔɔt. Ma anyek Vɔŋizi nici nɔɔgɔ kozoozit utugetine ci ŋaan laadun kagaac.
44002005	Maje ŋinaante anyak ɔl ceen Juz ci gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan Jook. Avu niigi vitɛnane ogɛn, ma avu aavtiz Jerusalɛma.
44002006	Mazi azii molok nico, olotai niigi, ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti, eeci gɔɔn ɛɛti ceeni ŋaatineeŋ azii ɔl o tuwento azɔɔz zooze onin.
44002007	Ma abaraŋani nɔɔgɔ dook ooti, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een ɔl ci azɔɔz noko ɔl o Galili?
44002008	Ku zin yo azɔɔz niigi utugetine ogaac ɛlɛ o?
44002009	Ŋaatinai ŋina anyak ɔl ci avu looce o kazi Partiya, ki Midiya, ki Ilam, ki Mesopatamiya, ki Judiya, ki Kapadociya, ki Pontus, ki Asiya,
44002010	ki Pijiya, ki Pampiliya, ki Masir, been Libya libir ci ajɔŋzɔ ki Sariin e.
44002011	Ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatinai Juz kibeen ɔl o alaŋ een Juz o avu niigi looce o Rom, ma avu agama Jook o ɔl o Juz. Buk ɔl ogɛn avu looce o kazi Karit kibeen Arabiya. Ma azɔɔz niigi otoge ona. Aduwa niigi kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn Jooi.”
44002012	Ma olla abaraŋani niigi dook, ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo gi nici kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
44002013	Maje bar ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ ararni ɔl o tuwento, ma anɔ nɛ, “Abaaki inoko ɔl nici.”
44002014	Itiŋa ni Pitɔr jena kibeen toonnyak ween amɔtɔ codoi, ma azɔɔz niini molowe ci alɔɔlɔ anek ɔl nɛ, “Igeeta ɔl o Juz kibeen ɔl o abaaku Jerusalɛma dook, iziiktaŋ di aneet anycaŋ kuduwayuŋ kɛŋ ci gi nico.
44002015	Ɔl nicigi alaŋ abaaki kiyo ona abaabanu niiga o. Acinu gɔɔn abaaki ɔl ŋeere iŋaan een ziik tɔrkɔc?
44002016	Bar zin nici gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jol e nɛɛn, azi baale niini nɛ,
44002017	“Azi Jooi nɛ, Katin iinyaye ci ka koṯorɛi lɔɔci e, kitoonai Vɔŋiz onan ɔl dook. Lɔgɔz ugooc been dɔl ugooc katin uuwak zɔɔz onan. Ma buk katin lɔgɔz ugooc acin ootinɛ kaal o Joowo. Buk katin matuwo ugooc awunozi wunozyak ci avu Joowa.
44002018	Kanyi katin Vɔŋiz onan iinyaye niceke gabara ogan mac been o ŋaai buk. Ma uuwak niigi zɔɔz onan.
44002019	Kagoon katin kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye tamma kibeen loota buk. Ma katin anyak biye kibeen goo kibeen burɛt ci appe.
44002020	Katin ii ookci kizi koli. Maje nyɛlɔyi ookci kizi meerik kiyo biyeta o. Agooni kaal nicigi iŋaan rak iiten o adikir akuni Manyi kiiya.
44002021	Zin ɛɛti ci awo zaar o Manyi ka kitirit nɔɔnɔ, ŋaan ɛɛlyai niini iinyaye niceke.”
44002022	Igeet ɔl o Israyil, iziiyit zoozok ci kaduwakuŋ ce. Yesu o kutur o Nazarɛt nɛɛn o eyelizayuŋ Jooi igeet kizi didi niini eet o itoonnyai Joowa kaale o agɔɔn adiŋdiŋ ateeduŋ igeet biye. Agayu ri niiga kaal nicoko ɛɛltɔ didi, eeci utuguze ŋaatunooŋ ŋina.
44002023	Agama Jooi gi o ka agamti niiga Yesu ka urukti niiga nɔɔnɔ kadaak gole ci anyeku ɔl o gɛr kotodoyi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec. Kaal nicoko dook aga Jooi baale laadun iŋaan naaga kagaac.
44002024	Bar zin Jooi anyek nɔɔnɔ kɔmɔk daayiz, ma iŋaani nɔɔnɔ daayiza korok bodo, eeci alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati amɔgi daayizi nɔɔnɔ.
44002025	Aduwa baale Devid gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Kacin gɔɔn Manyi onan aneeta ŋuma iinya dook. Ajoŋozan niini aneet tup, gɛrzɛ ŋaan kanyei ŋoliin.
44002026	Atalnɛ zin ziniz onane giye nico, ma kazooz talniinta, eeci mayo nuun tiŋeere kadaai o, kaga akɔm gi ci gɛr agoononekan.
44002027	Eeci niina Jooi alaŋ ooŋnei vɔŋiz onan looc o daayizo. Alaŋ uuŋ gabaren unun abon kumu loowa.
44002028	Eyeleyan baale niina aneeta gɔl o ka kook korogi bodo. Ma giye o karomɛn naana ki ineet, kanyei naana talniin ci appe.”
44002029	Gɔtɔnɔga, abon zin kaduwakuŋ igeeta kaal o akati jijitinai o kazi Devid ka agaac juruŋ zoozok baal aduwa niini e. Agayu niiga adaak baale niini. Ma inoko look oninɛ baal adawin e ŋaan abil tɔ ŋina zɛɛ been inoko o.
44002030	Baale zin niini nyakaŋan ci aga zɔɔz o aterkedek Jooi nɔɔnɔ. Aterkedek baale Jooi nɔɔnɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Kanyi katin logo oma dolene ci dɔl cugun kizi alaan ci abil kiyo niina o.”
44002031	Icinun ni niini gi o ka kutugu Jooi katin. Ma azɔɔz niini gi ci akati ŋaazi o Kiristo azi nɛ, “Alaŋ ooŋnek Jooi nɔɔnɔ looc o daayizo. Ma alaŋ ɛlɛ oninɛ ame loowa.”
44002032	Itiŋawi zin Jooi Yesu daayiza didi. Ma inoko naaga dook kiziti bacok giye nico.
44002033	Ooyi Jooi nɔɔnɔ tammu tadena, ma akɔ arek libir onin azo, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋiz o Joowo kiyo baale aterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ e. Mazin ci inoko acinu, ma aziiŋnu noko, Vɔŋiz o Joowo anyet niini ageeta nɛɛn.
44002034	Alaŋ een zin Devid nɛɛn o akɔ tamma, bar olla aduwa niini waanice zɔɔz ci akati Yesu azi nɛ, “Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Avu ŋina aneet aza nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek ɔl o amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.”
44002036	Abona zin niiga ɔl o Israyil dook agayu zɔɔz nico juruŋ. Yesu baal adodoyu niiga nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec e nɛɛn o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi Manyi, ma een Kiristo.”
44002037	Mazi azii ɔl zɔɔz ci Pitɔr noko, anyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek niigi Pitɔr ki toonnyak nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga, mayo kutuguza naa?”
44002038	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abona niiga dook ateedinu oŋɛ ugooc, ka otoonycɛ zaare o Yesu Kiristo, ka kaara Jooi oŋɛ ugooc. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, anyuŋ koca Jooi igeet Vɔŋiz onin.
44002039	Eeci eterkedeyuŋ niini gi ci ka kiiyakuŋ Vɔŋizi oninɛ igeet, kibeen dɔl ugooc, kibeen buk ɔl o abaak rɛɛna dook. Terkediin nici akati ɔl dook o awak Jooi ween Manyi onai ɛlɛ onin.”
44002040	Ma uuwayek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ zoozok golowe ci meel, ma ilotek nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Orogozit eleeti ugooc piryakzete o akunak ɔl o ɔɔ nico gɛr abor Jook.”
44002041	Makacin iziiyit ɔl ci meelik zɔɔz nico, ma atu Yesu, ma oonyi ɔl ceen eet tur lak eetom kamɔtɔ (3000) iitene nice, ma aromonek niigi ɔl baal atuwe laadun e.
44002042	Ma adɛmɛz toonnyawa nɔɔgɔ zoozok o Joowo. Ma aromɛ niigi dook tup kizitɔ laŋoten kibeen ɔl o tuwento dook, ma aromɛ ŋaatodoi zɔlɔnta been ŋaryiinta.
44002043	Ma aŋole ɔl dook Jerusalɛma Jook, eeci anyek Jooi toonnyak dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal ci meelik ci atɛɛt ɔl dook biye.
44002044	Oromtɛ ni ɔl o tuwento dook laŋotizete ci adɔi kak, ma atirtɔ niigi dook kaale ugeec anyak.
44002045	Ma ataalinɛ niigi manɛɛn kibeen kaal ugeec anyak, ma aŋɛr guruc o ataala. Ma aŋɛrak gɔɔn niigi eet codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
44002046	Tup nɔkɔ alotɛ niigi ceeze o Joowo, ma azɔlɔ niigi ŋaatodoi ceezine ugeec talniinta.
44002047	Ma anyek niigi Jook zany, ma anaat ɔl dook nɔɔgɔ baayize uneeŋ. Ma aromonek nɔɔgɔ tup nɔkɔ ɔl ci colai meel ci orogoz Jooi nɔɔgɔ, makacin azaacun Jooi ɔl o tuwento kizi mɛɛlɛ gɛr.
44003001	Ma iitene oman ɔɔtɔ Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn ceeze o Joowo ziiye ween iiyu ŋaryiinto yomana.
44003002	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet ci aritai kizi ŋanyŋany nɔkɔ laadun ci gɔɔn akɔ aavi araan o kazi Alina otoga. Adoŋek gɔɔn ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinite tup nɔkɔ ka kook kala guruc ole o avunak ceez o Joowo.
44003003	Mazi acin niini Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn avu ka kɔɔtɔ ceeza alawun niini nɔɔgɔ ka kanycek nɔɔnɔ guruc.
44003004	Ma agɛlɛm Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn nɔɔnɔ, ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gelemetjuruŋ.”
44003005	Ma ɛgɛlɛm didi niini nɔɔgɔ, bar abaaban niini azi nɛ, Coma tedec anyek niigi gi ci anyan.
44003006	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Akɔmnan guruc ci ka kanyin kina, bar zin ŋaan kanyin gi ci kanyei ce. Zaare o Yesu Kiristo o looc o kazi Nazarɛt kanekin nɛ, Tiŋa je, tɔ.”
44003007	Ma agam Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ aziit cin azo o, ma atirit nɔɔnɔ kitiŋa je. Taman nɔkɔ obonta nɔɔnɔ zɔɔna oginɛ.
44003008	Ma iŋaaz ŋaati akuli, ma abil jena zɔɔnɛ, ma awɔ ŋaati anotanɛ looc. Ma ɔrkɔr niini ki nɔɔgɔ avɔ ceeze o Joowo eecitɔ ŋaati arogomi talniinta anaati Jook.
44003009	Ma acin ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ ŋaati awɔyi, ma anaati Jook noko.
44003010	Mazi iiyez ɔl nɔɔnɔ een eet o gɔɔn alaye ceeze o Joowo araane o kazi Alina otoga o nɛɛn, eteede nɔɔgɔ biyeta giye ci agoononek nɔɔnɔ o.
44003011	Mazi acin ɔl eet nico ŋaati atorkodi Pitɔr ki Jɔn, eteede nɔɔgɔ dook biyeta, ma adokonyonek niigi nɔɔgɔ kaluwawe o kazi Solomon.
44003012	Mazi acin Pitɔr ɔl agɔɔn nɔkɔ, enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔl o Israyil, ateedinuŋ igeet biyeta giye nico naa? Má agelemnyetu ageeta gaga. Má bar abaabanu kizik inoko kanyeka eet nico kɔtɔɔ dɔyize cinaaŋ, karabɔŋ een bonate cinaaŋ.
44003013	Jook o Ibrayim ki Aizak ki Jakob been jijitigaac nɛɛn o anyek Yesu ween gabaren onin diŋdiŋɔn o tammo. Zin igeet nɛɛn baal anyeku nɔɔnɔ alaat, ma otobortu nɔɔnɔ ŋume o alaan o kazi Pailat, mayo nuun arɔɔŋ waanice kotoŋ Pailat nɔɔnɔ e.
44003014	Niini laadun eet ci abon Joowa, ma bar otobortu niiga nɔɔnɔ, ma ajinu Pailat ka kɔɔgayuŋ igeet eet o monyento.
44003015	Ma aruku nɔɔnɔ kadaak eet o anyek ɔl rogɛt ween didi. Bar zin Jooi itiŋawi nɔɔnɔ daayiza, ma keegina naaga bacok giye nico.
44003016	Dɔyiz zin ci zaar ogin nɛɛn ci arogni ɛɛti ci ŋanyŋany baal agayu noko. Tuwɛn zin onaaŋ katuya naaga Yesu nɛɛn ci anyek eet nico kobona igeet dook kɛbɛrɛn noko.
44003017	Gɔtɔnɔga, inoko zin kaga naana gi baal agooneku niiga kibeen alaat ugooc Yesu e, agoonu o, eeci ŋaan agaac niiga niini Kiristo nɛɛn.
44003018	Baale uduwa Jooi laadun nyakaŋanete dook piryakzɛt ci ka kiiya kipirai Kiristo. Zin didi gole nico anyek Jooi gi nice kɛlɛɛmnyai.
44003019	Abon zin niiga inoko abadu mony, ma abadaku Jook ka kɛɛya Jooi oŋɛ ugooc.
44003020	Ka coma itoonakuŋ Jooi igeet talniin ci appe zinzeeti ugooc, ma bodo buk katin itoonakuŋ Jooi Yesu ween Kiristo baal laadun ɛŋɛrayuŋ niini igeet e.
44003021	Bar zin rak aavi niini tamma zɛɛ ma akɔ agɔɔn Jooi kaal dook kiziti colayɛ kiyo baale aduwa niini nyakaŋanete ogin baal rɛɛn e.
44003022	Eeci azi Mosis baale nɛ, “Katin itoonakuŋ Jooi ween Manyi unooŋ nyakaŋan ci aŋɛra ŋaatunooŋ kiyo itoonanan niini aneet o. Abon zin niiga aziiŋnu kaal dook o aduwakuŋ niini igeet.
44003023	Ma ɛɛti o alaŋ azooni zɔɔz o aduwa nyakaŋani nici, aŋɛryai niini ole o Joowo, ma uulali.”
44003024	Zin didi Samwɛl kibeen nyakaŋanɛt oogi baal avu nɔɔnɔ vurta iinyaye baalgeecik e, uuwak zɔɔz ci akati kaal o ka kiiya kutugu Yesu.
44003025	Igeeta zin nɛɛn o eeginu dɔl o nyakanɛt niceke, ma itoonayuŋ Jooi igeet Kiristo baal aterkedek niinijijitugooc e. Anek baale Jooi Ibrayim nɛ, “Kamayuwi katin ɔl dook loota ŋaaten dole ci dɔl cugun.”
44003026	Zin ɛŋɛra Jooi gabaren onin, ma itoonayuŋ igeet ka kamayuwuŋ, ma abadanuŋ igeet dook gole o gɛr.”
44004001	Mazi ŋaan uuwayek niigi ɔl zɔɔz nɔkɔ, ivitak nɔɔgɔ ɔl ween alaat o ceez o Joowo, kibeen alaan o ɔl o abɛk ceez o Joowo, been ɔl o kazi Sajuzi.
44004002	Eeci abor niigi nɔŋ giye o adɛmzɛkɛ toonnyawa nicigi ɔl zɔɔz ci akati ŋaazi o Yesu daayiza. Ma buk zɔɔz nicini ayelza ŋaazi o iŋaani ɛɛti ci deer daayiza.
44004003	Agamit ni niigi nɔɔgɔ, ma avɔ arek sijin kataŋguzɔ kal, eeci izi lɔɔci yoman.
44004004	Maje ɔl ci meel ole ona azii zɔɔz uneeŋ e utuyɔ. Makacin urumit ɔl ci atuwe o dook eet tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000).
44004005	Ma ŋeere olotai alaata o Juz, ki ɔl o adikir baayizo, been ɔl o demziinto alotonek Jerusalɛm.
44004006	Ma avu arumɔ kibeen alaan o ceez o Joowo kazi Anas, kibeen Kayavas, kibeen Jɔn, kibeen Alikzandar, ki ɔl oogi ceen atenok ci Anas.
44004007	Ma anyek niigi Pitɔr ki Jɔn keelit nɔɔgɔ ŋuma, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ajowanu dɔyiz ci aruguzu eet ci ŋanyŋany o zaare ci ŋɛnɛ?”
44004008	Enico iiyak Pitɔr Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaat o abalu ɔl, kibeen igeet ɔl o adikir baayizo,
44004009	Matɛ laadun anyaanetu o ka ivita ijintetu gi ci abon ona karuguza eet ci ŋanyŋany noko kɔtɔwi tɔp o? Gi nici alaŋ abon?
44004010	Dɔyiz zin o Yesu Kiristo nɛɛn o anyet ageeta korogozta eet nico. Yesu Kiristo o Nazarɛt nɛɛn baal adodoyu keete ween talakec, ma itiŋawi Jooi nɔɔnɔ daayiza e.
44004011	Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn baal aduwaket waragɛ o Joowo zɔɔz o akati nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o tɛɛnyinto ookci bar katin kizi bɛ ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk biyɛn oogi e.”
44004012	Anyet zin rogzɛn niini doon. Akɔm bodo eet oma loota ŋina ci anyet Jooi ageet ka korogit zaare cigin.”
44004013	Ma abiir ɔl o roonnyo dook ooti, eeci acin niigi Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn azɔɔz moozɛta, ma aga nɔɔgɔ een ɔl ci cɛlbɛzik labak. Ma aga niigi nɔɔgɔ aduwa zɔɔz gɛnyiza noko, eeci baale ɔrkɔr ki Yesu.
44004014	Ma bar ɔkɔma gi ci gɛr ka kuduktak niigi nɔɔgɔ, eeci acin niigi eet baal ŋanyŋany e obona, ma aromɛ kibeen Pitɔr been Jɔn.
44004015	Anycek ni niigi nɔɔgɔ kudunitɔ bitaala ka kabaabanit niigi doon rak.
44004016	Ijintɔ ni niigi maany izitɔ nɛ, “Kayo kutuguzek ɔl nicoko naa? Ɔl ci abaak Jerusalɛma ŋina noko dook aga utuguzɔ niigi gi ci atɛɛt ɔl biye, ma alaŋ kanim bodo kadaŋit.
44004017	Alaŋ zin karɔɔŋ ɔl ci kuturyok oogi kiziiyit zɔɔz ci arogzi niigi eet ci ŋanyŋany noko. Inoko abon olla kagernyek nɔɔgɔ ka calaŋ bodo ademzek ɔl zoozok ci akati Yesu.”
44004018	Utuya ni niigi nɔɔgɔ kabadaak ceez, ma aricanek gi ci anek nɛ, “Inoko alaŋ karooŋnyuŋ edemeztek ɔl zɔɔz o Yesu bodo been nɛɛn.”
44004019	Bar Pitɔr ki Jɔn abɛdɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Apayit di zɔɔz nico niiga maany mã acinu abon ŋume o Joowo. Mayo dim abon ŋaati kaziiŋnuŋ naaga igeet yo Jook da?
44004020	Alaŋ zin naaga kaziiŋnuŋ igeet, eeci alaŋ bodo kanimnya kajaktowa kaale o kicinta ma kiziikta.”
44004021	Ma agernyek ɔl o roonnyo nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt. Oborocit ni niigi nɔɔgɔ, eeci acin niigi akɔm gi ci ka kɔrɔɔkti nɔɔgɔ giye o anaati ɔl dook Jook kaale o agooni.
44004022	Maje ɛɛti o ŋanyŋany ona atirit niigi e anyak waanice irkitok ci atayaŋit eet ram (40).
44004023	Mazi aborca ɔl Pitɔr ki Jɔn, imiirtozek niigi ɔl o tuwento, ma avɔ aduwak nɔɔgɔ kaal dook o aduwak alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o adikir baayizo e.
44004024	Mazi azii niigi kaal nicoko, aŋaruyɔ anɔ nɛ, “Manyi, een niina Jook o ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki looc ki liilok kibeen kaal dook o abaak ŋaatineeŋ.
44004025	Baale azooz niina Vɔŋize unun ŋaaten gabaren unun kazi Devid ween jijitinaaŋ waanbaal anɛ nɛ, “Abor modɛna nɔŋ naa? Arɔɔŋ kutuguzek ɔl Jook gi ci gɛr gaga nɔkɔ o naa?
44004026	Aak alaata o loocu gaŋ, ma arom eleeti ka kooyoyit Jook kibeen Kiristo o ka kitoona niini.”
44004027	Zin inoko didi gi baal aduyai e ibilun tɔ. Didi alaani o kazi Erod kibeen alaan o kazi Pantas Pailat oromtɛ kuture nico kibeen modɛn koogi kibeen buk ɔl o Israyil, ma amarnin niigi Yesu ween gabaren unun abon baal arɔnyai kizi Kiristo e.
44004028	Ma alotɛ niigi ka kutuguzɔ kaal dook baal arooŋ niina kutuguze dɔyize unun.
44004029	Manyi, cin di ŋaati agernyeket alaata. Nyet zin ageeta o keegina gabara ugun kɔzɔɔzta zɔɔz unun moozɛta.
44004030	Yeliza dɔyiz unun rogoz ɔl o amɔɔr, ma buk agoon kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye zaare o gabaren unun Yesu.”
44004031	Mazi odotiz niigi ŋaryiinta, ɔtɔɔmɔ ŋinti ona aŋaryin niigi e. Ma akunak nɔɔgɔ dook Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma azɔɔz zɔɔz o Joowo moozɛta.
44004032	Ma waanice ɔl o tuwento dook adoye zinzeeti, ma abaaban niigi gi codoi. Ma akɔm ŋaatineeŋ eet ci azi nɛ, Kaal ciginɛ anyak o kaal cigin doon. Bar azɔl niigi dook kaal ugeec anyak.
44004033	Ma uuwak toonnyawa dɔyiza zɔɔz o akati ŋaazi o Yesu Kiristo daayiza. Ma amayuk waanice Jooi nɔɔgɔ dook ɔrɔɔt.
44004034	Ma akɔm ŋaatineeŋ eet ci arɔɔŋ gi ci arɔɔŋ, eeci ɔl o anyak manɛɛn karabɔŋ een ceezi ataalinɛ, ma anyaak guruc ci ataala o toonnyak, ma aŋerek toonnyawa ɔl dook eet co gɔɔn ci aganɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
44004036	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Josev. Niini eet ci ɔl o kazi Livai ci aritai looce o kazi Sipras. Ma akanek toonnyawa nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Barnabas o akat kɛŋ cinɛ eet ceen tiritoi.
44004037	Ataalinɛ buk niini mana cin, ma anyaak guruc toonnyak.
44005001	Maje buk ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Ananayas. Kazi ŋaa cin zaar nɛ Savira. Ataalinɛ niini mana codoi.
44005002	Ma arɔɔt bodo guruc oogi guruce ci ataala mana o, ma anyek oogi toonnyak, ma anek toonnyak nɛ, “Guruc o kataala mane onan dook nɛɛn nici.” Maje uyene ŋaa cinɛ aga buk zɔɔz nico.
44005003	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ananayas, naa anyi Loryen kook ziniza ma alaba Vɔŋiz o Joowo giye ci arɔɔdɛ guruc oogi guruce ci ona ataala mana o?
44005004	Ma laadun mana alaŋ een mana cun? Mazi ataalinɛ e ma guruca buk alaŋ een cugun? Zin naa akɔ ma abaabana ziniza gi nico o? Alaŋ zin niina alaba ɔl ci deer, bar alaba Jook.”
44005005	Mazi ŋaan azii Ananayas gi nico nɔkɔ, iita kir, ma adaai enico ɛlɛ. Maje ɔl dook ona azii gi nico e anyayit ŋoliin.
44005006	Ma avu lɔgɔzɛt, ma abuŋ ɛlɛ cin o, ma avɔyi bitaala, ma avɔ ada.
44005007	Mazi akɔ adicai ziiya iiyon, iiya ŋaa oninɛ, bar alaŋ aga niini gi ci ona agoononek eet cin o.
44005008	Ma bodo ajin Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Duwayan di, ceegi guruc ona ataalanu mane unooŋ e dook nɛɛn?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, dook nɛɛn.”
44005009	Enek ni Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ma dim niina ki eet unun acinanu Vɔŋiz o Joowo naa? Cin di zin ɔl ona ada eet unun e nɔɔgɔ nɛɛn ci avu ceez tatoga neke. Atikekin niigi tedec ineet buk bitaalin ka kɔɔt kadayin.”
44005010	Taman nɔkɔ iita niini nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, didi adaawa. Mazi avɔ avu lɔgɔz oke, acin niigi nɔɔnɔ adaawa, ma atikek nɔɔnɔ bitaalin, ma avɔ ada nɔɔnɔ eet onin libira.
44005011	Ma akunak ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɔl o tuwento been ɔl o azii gi nico dook.
44005012	Ma waanice agɔɔn toonnyawa kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye. Ma aromɛ ɔl o tuwento dook ceeze o Joowo kaluwawe o Solomon.
44005013	Maje ɔl o alaŋ atuwe, yo nuun waanice adiŋdiŋan niigi toonnyak e, alaŋ anyak moozɛt ci ka kulutɔi niigi ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaatodoi.
44005014	Ma iinyaye niceke ɔl ci mac kibeen ŋaai ci meel utuweec Manyi, ma aromonek niigi ɔl o tuwento.
44005015	Mazin giye o acini ɔl kaal ci agɔɔn toonnyawa noko, ɔdɔŋta niigi ɔl ɔl ci amɔɔr kuwanɛ, ma avu arek nɔɔgɔ golok, ka ma adiir Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ, coma akunak riritɔnti cinɛ o nɔɔgɔ ka kanyek kizi mayɛtɛ moorizowe ugeec.
44005016	Ma avu ɔl ci meelik ɔrɔɔt kuturyowe o ajɔŋzɔ ki Jerusalɛm dook. Ma anyaak niigi toonnyak ɔl ci amɔɔr kibeen ɔl ci anyak miniŋ o Loryento, ma arogzɛ niigi dook.
44005017	Maje alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ kazi Sajuzi amadiyit toonnyak, ma arɔɔŋ kutuguzek nɔɔgɔ gi ci gɛr.
44005018	Agamit ni niigi nɔɔgɔ, ma avɔ acap sijina.
44005019	Bar baaline nice ɛlɛ iiya toonnyaiti ci Joowo, ma akɔl araan o sijino ma aduŋnan toonnyak bitaalin, ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
44005020	“Ɔɔtɔ ceeze o Joowo ka ɔɔt uduktak ɔl zɔɔz o rogɛt o colai.”
44005021	Mazi azii toonnyawa zɔɔz nico, ɔɔtɔ didi niigi ceeze o Joowo ŋeere ririwɔna, ma avɔ adɛmɛz ɔl ŋinaante. Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ utuya alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ ɔl o Juz adikir dook ka kivitak rooni ci adikir. Ma itoon takirnya ka kɔɔt kanyaakta toonnyak sijina.
44005022	Bar mazi avɔ arum takirnya sijin, arɔba toonnyak aziitɔ. Abadaak ni niigi ŋino roonnyo e, ma avu anek ɔl nɛ,
44005023	“Akɔ mazi kavɔ karumnya sijin, kamadana agarani. Aje bɛkcowa abɛk karogi, bar mazi kakola, kavoya eecitɔ, akɔm ɔl oke kina.”
44005024	Mazi azii alaani o ɔl o abɛk ceez o Joowo kibeen alaat o adikir ceeze o Joowo gi nico, abaraŋantɛ nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma anɔ nɛ, “Iiyak toonnyak gitaz?”
44005025	Iiyak ni ɛɛti oman nɔɔgɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di, ɔl baal areku sijin e aavtiz ceeze o Joowo adɛmɛz ɔl.”
44005026	Ma iŋaaz alaani o takirnyawu kibeen ɔl ogin, ma avɔ anyaa toonnyak. Ma alaŋ agit niigi nɔɔgɔ gɔla, eeci aŋole ɔl gɛrzɛ ŋaan avac ɔl nɔɔgɔ biyɛnɛ.
44005027	Anyaaktak ni niigi toonnyak ceez o roonnyo, ma avu anyek nɔɔgɔ keelit ɔl kɔrgɛna.
44005028	Ma anek alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iinyaye baalke ŋaan kiricaneyuŋ keneyuŋ nɛ, Má ŋaan ademezu ɔl zɔɔz ci akati Yesu? Icinit di gi o agoonu. Azaanteyu demziin unooŋ Jerusalɛm dook, ma arooŋnyu anycetu ageeta kizita ɔl o karuka Yesu kadaak nɛɛn.”
44005029	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr kibeen toonnyak oogi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abon kaziiŋna naaga Jook kujuk ɔl ci deer.
44005030	Eeci itiŋawi Jooi o jijitigaac Yesu daayiza ŋaa baal aruku niiga nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec e.
44005031	Ma ooyi Jooi nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔ arek libire onin azo ka kizi alaan been ruguzoi ci ka kanyek ɔl o Israyil waŋi ci abadi mony, ka kaaryai oŋɛ ugeec.
44005032	Keegina naaga bacok kaale nicoko. Ma een buk Vɔŋiz o Joowo o anyek Jooi ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ bacoi kaale nicoko.”
44005033	Mazi azii ɔl o roonnyo gi nico, otoborit nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ niigi ka kuruyit toonnyak kadaayitɔ.
44005034	Maje ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Gamalil. Niini eet ci ɔl o Parici, ma een niini alaan ci ademzek ɔl lotinok o Joowo. Atitiny gɔɔn ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ. Itiŋa ni niini jena, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Anycek rak di ɔl nicoko kudunit bitaala ŋintimiliny.”
44005035	Mazi adun toonnyawa, enek niini ɔl ci roonnyo o nɛ, “Ɔl o Israyil, abaabanit rak di gi ci ka utuguzek ɔl nicoko o juruŋ.
44005036	Agayu niiga baale eet o kazi Tudas baal anyek ɛlɛ kizi eet ci adiŋdiŋ. Ma ano ɔl ceen eet tur lak wec (400) nɔɔnɔ e. Ma vurta uruyit ɔl waanice nɔɔnɔ, ma azaani ɔl baal ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ e, makacin waanice idicai demziin oninɛ.
44005037	Ma vurte onin bodo iiya ɛɛti o kazi Judaz o looc o Galili iinyaye o akɛɛbi akuma ɔl. Ma agama ɔl ci meelik demziin onin. Ma vurta uruyit ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak buk, makacin azaantɛ ɔl baal ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ e.
44005038	Zin giye nico kanekuŋ nɛ, Má agooneku ɔl nicoko gi ci gɛr. Otoŋit nɔɔgɔ kɔtɔɔzɔ labak, eeci mã een demziin been liŋliŋɔn cineeŋ agɔɔn noko ci eet ci deer, ŋaan katin adicai labak.
44005039	Bar mazi aku demziin cineeŋ noko Joowa, akɔm gɔl ci ka omogti nɔɔgɔ kina. Mã agooneku gi ci gɛr ɔl nicoko, alaŋ kaga karabɔŋ bar koca agooneku gi ci gɛr Jook.” Iziiyit ni ɔl o roonnyo gi ci aduwa Gamalil o.
44005040	Utuya ni toonnyak, ma anyek niigi takirnya korooyit nɔɔgɔ nyaboyɛn, ma aricanek nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Má bodo ŋaan azoozu zɔɔz ci akati Yesu.” Oborocit ni nɔɔgɔ.
44005041	Ma adun toonnyawa ceeze o roonnyo talniinta, eeci acin niigi aganɔ ŋaati anyekɛ Jooi nɔɔgɔ kipirta zaare o Yesu.
44005042	Ma avɔ tup nɔkɔ ceeze o Joowo been korogjowe o ɔl o tuwento, ma adɛmɛz ɔl, ma uuwayek ɔl gi o ɛɛnɛ Yesu Kiristo.
44006001	Ma vurta iinyaye o azaacɔi ɔl o tuwento kizi mɛɛlɛ, anyayit niigi daŋɔn ki ɔl ween Juz o aganek zɔɔz ween Garik kibeen Juz o abaak Jerusalɛma laadun. Azi ɔl ci Juz ci aganek zɔɔz ceen Garik o nɛ, “Ŋaai ogaacak bɔyɛ alaŋaan ajowa dayiin o gɔɔn aŋeronek ɔl o tuwento.”
44006002	Zin giye nico utuya toonnyawa ween amɔtɔ ram ɔl o tuwento dook ŋaatodoi, ma avu anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaatinaaŋ ŋaati kuuŋna uuwayi o zɔɔz o Joowo ka koota keŋerteya ɔl dayiin.
44006003	Gɔtɔnɔga, inoko ɛŋɛrta ɔl torgɛrɛm ŋaatunooŋ ci agayu niiga anyak Vɔŋiz o Joowo ɔrɔɔt, ma anyak gɛnyiz ka kanycek nɔɔgɔ liŋliŋɔn nico.
44006004	Ka zin kizi liŋliŋɔn cinaaŋ nɛɛn ŋaryiin kibeen uuwayi.”
44006005	Ma atalna ɔl o atuwe dook baabani cineeŋ o. Ma aŋɛra niigi eet ci kazi Istivɛn ci anyak tuwɛn kibeen Vɔŋiz o Joowo ɔrɔɔt. Ma bodo aŋɛra Pilip, ki Pokoros, ki Nikanora, ki Timon, ki Parmena, been Nikolo ween modɛn o looc o Antiyok o anyek ɛlɛ kizi eet o Juz.
44006006	Anyaaktak ni ɔl o tuwento ɔl ceen torgɛrɛm ona aŋɛra noko toonnyak, ma aŋaryɛ toonnyawa, ma ataadek nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn ka kiziti ɔl ci aliŋliŋ liŋliŋɔn nico.
44006007	Ma azaanonek zɔɔz o Joowo ɔl ci meel ɔrɔɔt. Ma agama ɔl ci meelik Jerusalɛma Yesu. Ma buk atu Yesu alaata ci meel alaate o gɔɔn agoonek Jook todoyok o Juz.
44006008	Maje Istivɛn niini eet ci amayuwi Joowa ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ɔla.
44006009	Bar anyak ɔl oogi ci abor nɔɔnɔ. Ɔl nici gɔɔn aŋaryɛ ceeze o lotento kazi Ceez o Aborcɛn Ɔl Ween Mirɔk. Niigi ɔl ci Juz abadaak Jerusalɛm looce o kazi Sariina ki Alikzandariya ki Silisiya been Asiya. Ma abor niigi Istivɛn, makacin adaŋtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
44006010	Bar anyek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Istivɛn gɛnyiz ci appe atɛɛzanɛ ɔl nicoko.
44006011	Ɔɔt ni otoyoota niigi ɔl oogi ka kivita kakatit Istivɛn vɔlɔŋa kiziti nɛ, “Kaziiŋna iiten baale Istivɛn aduwa kaal ci gɛr akati Mosis kibeen Jook.”
44006012	Mazi akɔ azii ɔl o Juz kibeen alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok o Joowo kibeen ɔl o adiŋdiŋ gi nico, otoborit niigi nɔŋ. Agamit ni niigi, ma anyaak nɔɔnɔ ɔl o roonnyo.
44006013	Ma anyaa buk niigi bacok ci ka kivita kakatit Istivɛn vɔlɔŋa kiziti nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici gɔɔn azɔɔz kaal ci gɛr akani ceez ona Joowo kibeen lotinok o Mosis.
44006014	Ma buk kaziiŋna nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Yesu o Nazarɛt katin alip ceez o Joowo, ma owo kɛɛranɛ baal anyet Mosis e dook.”
44006015	Maje ɔl ci aavtiz roonnya o dook agɛlɛm Istivɛn, ma acin niigi ŋum cino abil kiyo ŋum o toonnyai o Joowo o.
44007001	Ijin ni alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo Istivɛn anek nɛ, “Abil zɔɔz nici didi nɔkɔ?”
44007002	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Istivɛn azi nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga kibeen baatigan, iziiktaŋ di. Baale ayelzak Jooi o adiŋdiŋ Ibrayim ween jijitinai ɛlɛ ŋaa baal abaai niini kazi Mesopatamiya e iŋaan kook kabaak niini looce o kazi Eran.
44007003	Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toŋ atenok ugun kibeen looc unun, luuk bitɔ looce oman ci ŋaan kakɔ kayelekin.”
44007004	Ma didi utuŋun niini looc nice, ma ook abaak ŋaao kazi Eran. Mazi akɔ adaai baati Ibrayim, anyek Jooi Ibrayim kuluugak looc ci inoko abaaku noko.
44007005	Bar zin iinyaye niceke ŋaan kanyek Jooi Ibrayim looc nico kizi cin. Yo nuun een ŋinti kidic tɛr waanice, ŋaan kanyek kizi cin. Bar olla aterkedek Jooi Ibrayim zɔɔz ci ka kanyekɛ nɔɔnɔ ki dɔl ci dɔl cigin looc nico, yo nuun waanice ŋaan kanyak niini dɔl e.
44007006	Aduwak waanice Jooi Ibrayim zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Abaak katin dɔlya ci dɔl cugun looce oman. Ŋinaante katin niigi eegin gabara, ma agit ɔl nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt irkitok eet tur lak wec (400).
44007007	Bar zin katin kuulal ɔl ci agit nɔɔgɔ o, ka vurta kudunta dɔlya ci dɔl cugun o looce nice, ka kivita kidiŋdiŋantan niigi aneet ŋina.”
44007008	Anyewun ni Jooi Ibrayim kɛɛr ci atɛɛdi dɔl kuli ka kizi bayen ci zɔɔz o aterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ. Mazi akɔ aritai Aizak e, anyek Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ kidica iinya turge zɛɛ eteeduni nɔɔnɔ. Waanice zin iiya Aizak izi baati Jakob. Maje Jakob iiya izi baati lɔgɔz ween amɔtɔ ram o ivita iziti jijitigaac.
44007009	Odomta lɔgɔz o Jakob amartɔi Josev ween gɔtɔni uneeŋ, makacin ataaltɔi nɔɔnɔ ka kook kizi gabaren Masirɛ. Bar Jooi itirit nɔɔnɔ.
44007010	Ma azooni nɔɔnɔ gidente baal agidi ɔl nɔɔnɔ e dook. Mazi akɔ akunak Josev Vɛɛro ween alaan o Masiro, anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ ziniz ci iina kibeen gɛnyiz. Zin giye nico anyewun Vɛɛro nɔɔnɔ kabal Masir kibeen kaal o kɔrɔk onin dook.
44007011	Ma vurta anyawun Masira kibeen looce o abaai Jakob kazi Kanan tarjo ci appe ci adayi ɔl magiz ɔrɔɔt. Ma ɔkɔma jijitigaac ŋinti ka kojoktai dayiin.
44007012	Mazi akɔ azii Jakob anyak Masira labi, itoonun lɔgɔz ogin kɔɔt kataala labi ŋinaante.
44007013	Mazi avu amiiri lɔgɔz eci vurto o ka kɔɔt bodo kataala labi Masirɛ, uduwak Josev gɔtɔnɔgi ɛlɛ. Makacin iziik buk alaani o Masiru kazi Vɛɛro gɔtɔnɔgi Josev ivitak Masir.
44007014	Zin ŋina itoonewun Josev baatin Jakob otok ka kuluuktak niini ki ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook Masir. Maje ɔl ci kɔrɔk cin o dook waanice een eet iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (75).
44007015	Ɔɔt ni Jakob been kɔrɔk onin dook Masirɛ. Ma avɔ abaak ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adaai Jakob kibeen lɔgɔz ogin.
44007016	Ma ɛɛl amɛ ugeec zɛɛ ma irkite baal iŋaananɛ Mosis ki ɔl o Israyil Masirɛ e, itiktak niigi amɛ cigeec o ŋin o kazi Cekam ka kivita kadaac niigi nɔɔgɔ boote baal ataala Ibrayim guruci modene o kazi Amor e.
44007017	Mazi waanice akɔ ajɔn iiten baal aterkedek Jooi Ibrayim ka kanyekɛ nɔɔnɔ looc o kazi Kanan e, azaace waanice ɔl ogaac Masirɛ kizi mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt.
44007018	Maje iinyaye niceke abalun ɔl Masirɛ alaani oman calaŋ aga Josev.
44007019	Ma alaba niini jijitigaac, ma agoonek nɔɔgɔ kaal ci gɛr. Buk akɔ ma adaŋek nɔɔgɔ kujuktek dɔl tuu kadaayitɔ.
44007020	Ma iinyaye niceke aritai logoti ci alina ɔrɔɔt kazi Mosis. Ma arɔɔt yaatinɛ ceeza nyɛlɔwɛ iiyu.
44007021	Ma vurta ook oroodun yaatinɛ nɔɔnɔ tuuwa, ma aku ajowa nɔɔnɔ tinati Vɛɛro, ma akɔ abaayiza nɔɔnɔ kizi dole cin.
44007022	Ma ɛdɛmɛz niini gɛnyiz dook Masirɛ. Makacin izi eet ci titiny zɔɔza kibeen kaale o agɔɔn.
