44007023	Mazi akɔ een Mosis irkitowa eet ram, orooŋun niini kook kicin gɔtɔnɔgi ween Israyil.
44007024	Mazi akɔ niini ŋinaante ook icinun eet codoi ole ween Israyil agit ɛɛti ceen Masiren. Ɛɛla ni niini nɔɔnɔ, ma aruk eet ceen Masiren noko kadaak.
44007025	Abaaban niini anɛ coma ɔl ciginɛ Israyil o aga gɔl o ka kɛɛlai nɔɔgɔ Jooi ŋaaten nɔɔnɔ ka calaŋ bodo eegin gabara ci Masiro. Bar ɔl o Israyil alaŋ aga gi nico.
44007026	Ma iitene oman acin niini ɔl ceen Israyil ram ayɔwɔ niigi maany. Ma arɔɔŋ niini kɛŋɛr nɔɔgɔ. Anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktaŋ di gɔtɔnɔga. Niiga dook eeginu ɔl o Israyil. Ayowonu zin bodo niiga maany naa?”
44007027	Bar ɛɛti ona apan gɔn e ɔtɔyɔɔt Mosis, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet alaazɛt ci ka paket ageeta o?
44007028	Arooŋ ka ruyan kadaak kiyo balawaz arui eet ween Masiren e?”
44007029	Mazi azii Mosis zɔɔz nico, ivirun niini Masirɛ. Ma akɔ abaak looce o kazi Midiyan. Ma ŋinaante ook ɔrɔcɔ, ma arita lɔgɔz cigin een ram.
44007030	Mazi akɔ adica Mosis irkitowa ceen eet ram ŋinaante, eyelizak toonnyaiti ci Joowo nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ gooye ci alanyit lugurgoca balale o ajɔŋzɔ ki bɛ o kazi Sinai.
44007031	Ma abiir Mosis ɔɔ giye ci acin noko, ma akunak ijonun ka kicinjuruŋ. Bar mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz ŋinite, enek Manyi nɔɔnɔ nɛ,
44007032	“Aneeta Jook o jijitugun. Aneeta Jook o Ibrayim ki Aizak ki Jakob.” Ɔtɔŋɔlɛ ni Mosis looc ŋina, ma abarit zɛɛ ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ kicin ŋinito bodo.
44007033	Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aara caava zɔɔnɛ, eeci ŋinti abilnɛ noko ŋinti alile.
44007034	Kacin naana piryakzɛt ci apirnanɛ ɔl ogane Masirɛ o nɔkɔ, ma buk kiziiwa naana luwa uneeŋ. Kiiya zin ka kɛɛla nɔɔgɔ piryakzete cineeŋ o. Inoko zin karooŋ kitooneyin ineet Masir.”
44007035	Nici Mosis baal abor ɔl o Israyil e ɛlɛ nɛɛn baal ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet alaazɛt ci ka paket ageeta o?” Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoona Jooi ka kabal nɔɔgɔ, ma ɛɛla nɔɔgɔ dɔyize o toonnyai baal ayelzak nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ lugurgoce o alanyit e.
44007036	Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o uluugai ɔl o Israyil Masirɛ, ma agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye Masirɛ, ki liile o Meeri, been balala irkitok eet ram.
44007037	Mosis ɛlɛ nɛɛn baal aduwak ɔl o Israyil anek nɛ, “Katin itoonakuŋ Jooi nyakaŋan ci aŋɛra ŋaatunooŋ ɛlɛ kiyo itoonanan aneeta o.”
44007038	Mosis nɛɛn baal azɔɔzɔ been toonnyai o Joowo biye o kazi Sinai. Ma akɔyi niini zɔɔz o aduwak toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ ole weenjijitigaac baal aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ balala e. Ojowa niini toonnyaite o Joowo zɔɔz o anyek ɔl rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ka buk kiiyayet zɔɔz nici ageet.
44007039	Bar jijitigaac waanice otoborit ŋaati aziiŋni nɔɔnɔ. Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ naaga karooŋnyin ineet bar karooŋnya kimiirtewa koota Masirɛ.”
44007040	Ma anek niigi Aron ween gɔtɔni Mosis nɛ, “Karooŋnyin bar naaga ineet ka dilayet joowanɛ ci oontanet ageeta kootet Masirɛ, eeci alaŋ kagaya gi ci alamun Mosis baal anyanet ageet Masirɛ e.”
44007041	Idilta ni waanice niigi jook ci atobɔ ki mool, ma atoŋdek todoyok, ma adake ŋaatodoi, eeci atalnɛ niigijoowe ci adila azɛɛnɛ o.
44007042	Otoborewun ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ nɔŋ giye nico, ma ooŋ nɔɔgɔ kidiŋdiŋanit monyony o tammo. Kiyo aduwa Jooi waragewe o nyakaŋanetu zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Igeet ɔl o Israyil, alaŋ atoŋdekaŋ baale otodoŋteyaŋ todoyok aneeta irkitok ween eet ram baal aavtiyu balala e.
44007043	Bar waanice atiku niiga ceez ween rum o jook o kazi Malok kibeen riritɔn o monyatot o kazi Ravan. Nicigi zin joowanɛ o adilanu niiga doon ka idiŋdiŋanit nɔɔgɔ. Zin giye nico, ŋaan katooyekuŋ igeet ŋinti rɛɛn many looc o kazi Babilan libire ci gɔl e.”
44007044	Baale mã aavtiz jijitigaac balala e, anyak ceez o Joowo een rum. Agɔɔna niigi ceez nice kotobtɔ kibeen riritɔn baal ayelek Jooi Mosis e.
44007045	Ma vurta odomtajijitigaac baal ooŋnek baatigeecik ceez ceen rum neke. Itikit niigi ceez nice ooti waanbaal arayin Jasuwa nɔɔgɔ akɔyi ka kɔɔt kirigizit loocok o modɛn baal abaak ŋinaante baal atɔɔk Jooi nɔɔgɔ ŋuma e. Ma aavi waanice ceez nica ŋinaante zɛɛ been iinya o Devid.
44007046	Ma atalnɛ Jooi ŋaati Devid ɔrɔɔt. Ma ajin Devid Jook arɔɔŋ ka kɛtɛɛnyak niini nɔɔnɔ ween Jook o Jakob ceez.
44007047	Ŋaan zin Jooi kanyek Devid kɛtɛɛnya ceez nico, ma bar iiya anyek niini Solomon ween ŋɛɛrin kiiya kɛtɛɛnya.
44007048	Zin Jooi o adiŋdiŋ alaŋ abaak ceezine ci ɛɛnyca ɔl ci deer. Kiyo baale aduwa nyakaŋani azi nɛ, “Azi Manyi nɛ,
44007049	Tammu taden ŋin onan kaavɛ nɛɛn. Maje tɔdɔwa ŋin onan kari zɔɔ nɛɛn. Mazin yo ceez taz ci ka ɛtɛɛnycayaŋ niiga aneet o? Ma ŋinti kayubzɛ taz ci ka utuguzayaŋ niiga aneet o?
44007050	Ma kaal nicoko dook alaŋ kɛɛnyca naana alya?”
44007051	Eeginu niiga ɔl ci ricil! Adoŋnuŋ zinzeeti kak, ma alaŋ agamanu zɔɔz o Joowo kiyo modɛna o alaŋ eegin ɔl o Joowo o. Ma buk adiitenuŋ iina calaŋ atu Jook o. Eelnu niiga kiyo jijitugooc baale e. Aburnu niiga zɔɔz o Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
44007052	Baale jijitugooc agit nyakaŋanɛt o Joowo dook. Ma aruk niigi nyakaŋanɛt o Joowo baal uuwak kuni o Kiristo ween gabaren o Joowo abon kadaayitɔ. Inoko zin buk niiga utuburtu Kiristo, ma uruktu nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
44007053	Eeginu niiga ɔl o ajowanu lotinok o Joowo toonnyaye ogin nɛɛn, ma bar aburnu ŋaati aziiŋnu.”
44007054	Mazi azii ɔl o roonnyo zɔɔz ci Istivɛn noko, otoborit niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma adak azɛɛn bornɛt nɔŋa.
44007055	Maje Istivɛn anyak niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo alye onin ɔrɔɔt, ma agɛlɛm niini tammu taden, ma acin titinyɔn o Joowo, ma acin Yesu abil libire o Joowo azo.
44007056	Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Icinit di, kacin tammu taden akoli, ma kacin Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abil libire o Joowo azo.”
44007057	Enico egerenyit ɔl o roonnyo ɔrɔɔt, ma adiit iin ugeec. Ma aŋozonek niigi dook nɔɔnɔ.
44007058	Ma agurak nɔɔnɔ kaluwawe o kuturo bitaalin, ma avac nɔɔnɔ biyɛnɛ ka kuruyit kadaak. Ma aara niigi rumanɛ ugeec, ma anyek logo ci kazi Cɔl ka kagamek nɔɔgɔ ka kavacit niigi Istivɛn juruŋ.
44007059	Mazi ŋaan avac niigi Istivɛn nɔkɔ, aŋarowɔ niini ajin Jook anek nɛ, “Manyi onan Yesu, biti vɔŋiz onan.”
44007060	Ma akani kozoŋti looc, ma agɛrɛny molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Manyi, má anyayei nɔɔgɔ da oŋec cineeŋ noko.” Mazi aduwa gi nico, adaawun niini.
44008001	Ma atalnɛ Cɔl daayize o Istivɛn. Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ iiyak ɔl o tuwento Jerusalɛma gidɛn ci appe. Ma avir niigi dook Jerusalɛma, ma azaanonek Judiya kibeen Samariya. Ma aavtiz Jerusalɛma toonnyawa doon.
44008002	Ivita ni ɔl ogɛn ole o gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan Jook, ma avu ada Istivɛn, ma aluwek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
44008003	Igit ni Cɔl ɔl o tuwento, ma azɔp niini ceezi dook, ma agam ɔl o tuwento dook, ŋaai ki ɔl o mac, ma akɔ acap nɔɔgɔ sijina.
44008004	Maje ɔl o tuwento baal avir e ɔɔt azaantozek niigi loocok dook, ma avɔ uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo.
44008005	Buk Pilip ook niini kuture ci abil Samariya, ma akɔ uuwayek ɔl zɔɔz o akati Kiristo ŋinaante.
44008006	Ma azii ɔl ŋinaante zɔɔz o aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma acin niigi kaal o agɔɔn Pilip atɛɛt nɔɔgɔ biye.
44008007	Ma atɔɔk Pilip miniŋ ci Loryento ole ci meelik, ma aduŋna miniŋa nicigi ŋaatineeŋ gernya. Ma anyek ɔl o rɛbrɛbik kibeen ɔl o ŋɔɔlik kobonta kɔtɔɔzɔ.
44008008	Zin kaale nicoko ataltɔ ɔl o Samariya ɔrɔɔt.
44008009	Ma kuture nice baale anyak eet ci kazi Saiman ci gɔɔn agɔɔn niini kaal ci ŋarizetu, ma anyek ɔl o Samariya dook kibiirit ooti ŋarizete cin noko. Ma anyek niini ɛlɛ kizi eet ci titiny ɔrɔɔt.
44008010	Ma aŋaamnek gɔɔn ɔl o titiny kibeen ɔl o labak dook kaal cigin agɔɔn noko ɔrɔɔt. Ma anɔ nɛ, “Kiziiyit baale zɔɔz o akati dɔyiz o Joowo. Dɔyiz zin o Joowo nɛɛn ci anyak ɛɛti nici noko.”
44008011	Azii waanice ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaba niini nɔɔgɔ kaale ogin ŋarizetu abiirni ɔl ooti baal gɔɔn agɔɔn niini tup e.
44008012	Bar mazi azii niigi ŋaati Pilip kaviyak o abon akati baliin o Joowo kibeen zaar o Yesu Kiristo, utuweec niigi kaviyak nicoko, ma oonyi niigi dook.
44008013	Buk Saiman alya utuwɔ, ma oonyi, ma orkor gɔɔn gɔɔn ki Pilip. Mazi acin kaal o adɔi atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn Pilip, ibiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
44008014	Mazi azii toonnyawa Jerusalɛma ɔl o Samariya agamta zɔɔz o Joowo, itoontek niigi nɔɔgɔ Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn.
44008015	Mazi avu arum Pitɔr ki Jɔn Samariya, aŋaruyozek niigi ɔl o tuwento ka kiiyak nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
44008016	Eeci olla waanice oonyi niigi zaare o Manyi Yesu Kiristo, ma ŋaan Vɔŋizi o Joowo kiiyak nɔɔgɔ.
44008017	Ma ataadek Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn, ma akunak nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
44008018	Mazi acin Saiman Vɔŋiz o Joowo iiyak ɔl o tuwento ŋaati ataadekɛ Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn, aara guruc arɔɔŋ ka kanyek Pitɔr ki Jɔn.
44008019	Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycaŋ da buk dɔyiz nico aneet ka buk gɔɔn mã kataadei naana ɔl oogi azɛɛn, ka kiiyak buk nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo.”
44008020	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nyamɛr adaayit niina alya kibeen guruc cugun noko, eeci abaaban niina ka taal gi ci anyaa Jooi o guruci.
44008021	Alaŋ zin abon ŋaati aliŋliŋɛ liŋliŋɔn o Joowo, eeci ziniz cune o alaŋ iimi ŋume o Joowo.
44008022	Inoko zin tɛɛdɔi gerzitin nico. Jin Jook ka kaara oŋec noko.
44008023	Eeci kacinin ineet appe ziniz ɔrɔɔt, makacin acabin oŋɛci.”
44008024	Ma anek Saiman ceen ŋari noko Pitɔr ki Jɔn nɛ, “Ijinteyaŋ zin da Jook ka calaŋ avunakan kaal ci aduwanu noko.”
44008025	Mazi odotiz Pitɔr ki Jɔn kaale o aduwa akati Yesu kibeen zɔɔz o Joowo, imiirtozek niigi Jerusalɛm. Ma gɔla uuwayit niigi kaviyak o Joowo kuturyowe ci meelik looce o kazi Samariya.
44008026	Ma aku toonnyaiti ci Joowo, ma anek Pilip nɛ, “Cap kaal ka tiŋa bitɔ ki tɛnɛt gole o Jerusalɛm o akɔ been kutur o kazi Gaza.” (Ma gɔl nica inoko izirzire.)
44008027	Itiŋa ni Pilip ɔtɔɔ. Ma akɔ ajowa gɔla eet ceen Abacen. Maje ɛɛti nica eet ci apayai teri ci gɔɔn aliŋliŋonek ŋaa ceen alaan ci adikir abal looc o Abacu. Ma gɔɔn agam ɛɛti nici guruc ci ŋaa ceen alaan noko dook. Ɛɛrɔn zin da niini iitene oman akɔ Jerusalɛma ka kook kidiŋdiŋan Jook ŋinaante.
44008028	Ma aku amiire akɔ Abacɛ. Awɔ niini kavoole ci agurut jɔmanɛ. Ma gɔla ekeebun niini waragɛ o Joowo baal ayɛɛt nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya.
44008029	Ma anek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Pilip nɛ, “Bitɔjɔŋɔz kavool nice.”
44008030	Odokonyozek ni Pilip nɔɔnɔ, ma azii nɔɔnɔ akɛɛp waragɛ o nyakaŋan o kazi Izaya. Ijin ni Pilip nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Ma dim inoko gi ci akeebi o aga?”
44008031	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga, eeci akɔm eet ci oobekan kɛŋ juruŋ.” Ma awa niini Pilip kɔtɔɔda kavool koromtɛ ki nɔɔnɔ eecitɔ.
44008032	Ma zɔɔz ci akɛɛp niini o zɔɔz ci waragɛ o Joowo o azi nɛ, “Atobɔ niini kibeen azeet o avɔyi ɔl ka kook kɔtɔdɔŋɛ o, ma buk atobɔ niini kibeen nyɔɔn o alaŋ ɛɛgɛk ŋaati atɛɛdi ɔl nyalaado o, ma alaŋ niini azɔɔz been nɛɛn.
44008033	Ma acɛlbɛzɛn ɔl nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔm eet ci apayek nɔɔnɔ leeminɛt. Ma akɔm dɔl cigin ci aga ɔl, eeci aruk ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak kodocai.”
44008034	Ma anek ɛɛti ceen Abacen noko Pilip nɛ, “Duwayan di, aduwa nyakaŋani zɔɔz ci akati ŋɛnɛɛn ŋina? Aduwa gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ yo da aduwa gi ci akati eet oma?”
44008035	Ma anek Pilip nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zɔɔz nici akati Yesu Kiristo.” Oobek ni niini nɔɔnɔ kaviyak o Joowo akati Yesu.
44008036	Ma gɔla ojokta ŋinti anyak maam. Ma anek ɛɛti ceen Abacen noko Pilip nɛ, “Maam nici. Alaŋ uunyan naa?”
44008037	(Ma anek Pilip nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã didi agama Yesu zinize unun dook, kuunyin koca.” Ma azi nɛ, “Didi kagama.")
44008038	Ma anyek ɛɛti ceen Abacen noko kavool kibil. Ma aduŋna niini kibeen Pilip, ma avɔ maami eecitɔ, ma oony Pilip nɔɔnɔ.
44008039	Mazi avɔ aduŋna niigi dook maami, iiya Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma akɔyi Pilip ḏim, calaŋ acin ɛɛti ween Abacen e nɔɔnɔ bodo. Ɔɔtɔ ni niini talniinta.
44008040	Mazi aara Pilip kɛbɛrɛ, bar aavi kuture o kazi Azotus. Ma iŋaaz ŋinaante akɔ uuwak kaviyak o Joowo kuturyowɛ dook zɛɛ ma arum kutur o kazi Sisiriya.
44009001	Iinyaye niceke ŋaan Cɔl amɛna agit ɔl o atu Yesu nɔkɔ, ma arɔɔŋ kuruk nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ tup nɔkɔ. Ma iitene oman ook niini alaane o adikir ceeze o Joowo.
44009002	Ma akɔ ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kanyek waragɛnya ci itoononek alaat o ceezi o lotento kuture o kazi Damacik. Ma waragɛwi nici anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz ci ka kook kagami ɔl o mac ki ŋaai o ano gɔl o Yesu ŋinaante, ka kanyaak nɔɔgɔ sijin Jerusalɛma.
44009003	Ɔtɔɔ ni zɛɛ mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz Damacik, kataman nɔkɔ iiyak nɔɔnɔ vooritin tamma, ma ataran nɔɔnɔ.
44009004	Ma aruk looc, ma azii molok ci anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Cɔl, Cɔl, naa amarninan nɔkɔn?”
44009005	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Cɔl molok nico anek nɛ, “Ineet ŋɛnɛɛn Manyi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ mɔlɔyi nici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta Yesu o amarninan.
44009006	Inoko zin tiŋa je. Bitɔ Damacika. Anyak eet ci ka kook kuduwayin ineet gi ci ka tugu ŋinaante.”
44009007	Maje ɔl o ɔrkɔr kibeen Cɔl e ɛɛl olla ajaki. Eeci azii niigi molok doon, ma akɔm eet ci acin kina.
44009008	Ma iŋaaz Cɔl jena. Mazi bar arɔɔŋ kamadak kɛbɛrɛ, alaŋaan acinɛ. Agamit ni ɔl o ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ e nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma ayit nɔɔnɔ avɔyi Damacika.
44009009	Ma aavi Cɔl iinya iiyu calaŋ acinɛn. Ma alaŋ adake, ma alaŋ buk awodɛ.
44009010	Maje Damacika ŋinaante anyak eet ci atu Yesu ci kazi zaar nɛ, Ananayas. Ma awo Jooi nɔɔnɔ wunozyai anek nɛ, “Ananayas.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ananayas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Woo, Manyi. Kawɛ.”
44009011	Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Bitɔ gole o kazi Abil Tɔp. Mazi akɔ arum ceez o eet o kazi Judaz ŋinaante,jinɔ nɔɔnɔ ka keyeleyin eet o kazi Cɔl o looc o Tarsas. Niini inoko aŋaryɛ ŋinaante.
44009012	Ma acinin niini ineet wunozyai kizik akunai niina nɔɔnɔ ka taadek azɛɛn ka kicinɔ bodo.”
44009013	Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ananayas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, kazii eet nico ole ci meel gɛr azi nɛ, Agoonek gɔɔn niini ɔl ugun kaal ci gɛr Jerusalɛma.
44009014	Inoko akunak niini Damacik o, eeci anycek alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo dɔyiz ci ka kiiya kagami ɔl o atuyin ineet.”
44009015	Bar anek Manyi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ labak, eeci kɛŋɛra naana nɔɔnɔ ka kiliŋliŋozeyan aneet ka kuduwak niini zɔɔz onan modɛn kibeen alaat ugeec kibeen ɔl o Israyil.
44009016	Mazin naanalya ŋaan kayelei nɔɔnɔ kaal ci ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt gole o aduwakɛ niini ɔl zɔɔz onan.”
44009017	Ook ni didi Ananayas ceeze o aavɛ Cɔl, ma akɔ ataadek nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn. Ma anek nɛ, “Gɔtɔna Cɔl, Manyi Yesu nɛɛn ci itoonanan aneet ŋina o. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn baal ayelzakin ineet ɛlɛ gɔla iiten baal akunɛ ŋina e. Itoonanan zin niini aneet ka kiiya kanyin cinɔ bodo, ka buk kiiyayin ineet Vɔŋizi o Joowo.”
44009018	Kataman nɔkɔ iitazɔ keberene o Cɔl kaal ci kizik tagayaŋ ci kulugto. Makacin icinɔ bodo. Itiŋa ni niini, ma oony Ananayas nɔɔnɔ.
44009019	Mazi akɔ adake, izi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ pir kɔdɔk kak bodo. Ma amɔn niini iinya ci miliny aromɛ kibeen ɔl o tuwento Damacika.
44009020	Ma gɔɔn akɔ niini ceezine o lotento, ma akɔ uuwak ŋinaante zɔɔz o akati Yesu anek ɔl nɛ, “Yesu niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
44009021	Maje ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ dook abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma nici alaŋ een eet o gɔɔn aruk ɔl o atu eet o kazi Yesu kadaayitɔ Jerusalɛma o nɛɛn? Aku inoko niini ŋina o arɔɔŋ buk ka kiiya kagam ɔl nicoko ka kooyi nɔɔgɔ alaate o ceez o Joowo Jerusalɛma.”
44009022	Maje Cɔl uuwak moozɛta kɔdɔk ziniz kak kujuk we. Ma ayelek niini ɔl kaal o akati Yesu o ɛɛnɛ didi niini Kiristo. Ma anyek zɔɔz cinɛ o ɔl o Juz abaak Damacika olla kapaŋantɛ kɔkɔm gi ci abarzek nɔɔnɔ kina.
44009023	Ma iinyaye ogɛn olotai ɔl o Juz, ma avu abaaban gɔl ci ka kurukti Cɔl kadaak.
44009024	Maje bar Cɔl iziiwun gi nico. Ma gɔɔn arɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ araanowe o kaluwa o aliya kutur waazinok ki baalinok dook arɔɔŋ ka kuruyit niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
44009025	Ma baaline oman inikta ɔl o gɔɔn ɔrkɔr ki Cɔl ivitak nɔɔnɔ, ma avu arek nɔɔnɔ doŋok ci appe, ma atɔɔdi nɔɔnɔ kaluwa taden, ma itoonek nɔɔnɔ bitaalin doŋowe nico loronta.
44009026	Ook ni Cɔl Jerusalɛma, ma ŋinaante ɔrɔɔŋ koromozek ɔl o tuwento. Bar ɔl o tuwento alaŋ agama zɔɔz ci izɔi niini eet ci tuwento o, ma ŋaan aŋole niigi dook nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.
44009027	Iiiyak ni Barnabas nɔɔnɔ ka kiiya kooyi toonnyayɛ. Ma akɔ oobek Barnabas toonnyak zɔɔz baal acini Cɔl Manyi gɔla, ma azɔɔzɛkɛ Manyi nɔɔnɔ e. Ma oobek buk zɔɔz baal uuwayi Cɔl zaare o Yesu moozɛta Damacika e.
44009028	Iiya ni Cɔl oromozek nɔɔgɔ, ma akɔ azɔp niini Jerusalɛm dook uuwak zɔɔz o akati Yesu moozɛta.
44009029	Ma buk azɔɔz niini, ma adaŋɔ kibeen Juz o aganek zɔɔz ween Garik. Ma bar arɔɔŋ kuruyit niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
44009030	Mazi azii ɔl o tuwento zɔɔz nico, ivita ooti Cɔl kuture o kazi Sisiriya, ma ŋinaante itoonit niigi nɔɔnɔ kavoole ci liilu kidicek kook kuture onin kazi Tarsas.
44009031	Ma iinyaye niceke abaak ɔl o tuwento yaak looce o kazi Judiya ki Galili been Samariya. Ma atirit Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔgɔ, makacin ɔl o tuwento odoyit kak tuwɛnta, ma buk atuwe ɔl ci meelik ogɛn. Ma abaak niigi dook baayiz ci aŋolin Jook.
44009032	Maje Pitɔr waanice azɔp loocok dook. Ma iitene oman ook icin ɔl o tuwento abaak kuture ci kazi Lida.
44009033	Ma ŋinaante ojowa eet ci kazi zaar nɛ Iniyas. Niini eet ci rɛbrɛbi calaŋ awɔ irkitok turge.
44009034	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iniyas, itiritin Yesu Kiristo. Tiŋa je. Doma kuwen cun o.” Kataman nɔkɔ itiŋa didi Iniyas jena.
44009035	Mazi acin ɔl o Lida kibeen ɔl o Ceran nɔɔnɔ obona, utuweec niigi dook Manyi.
44009036	Waanice anyak ŋaa ci kazi zaar nɛ Tabiza ci abaak kuture o kazi Japa. Atu niini Jook. Kazi zaar ci ŋaa nico zooze ween Garik nɛ Dorkaz. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ alyaz. Niini tup nɔkɔ aliŋliŋ kaal ci abon. Atirit gɔɔn niini ɔl ci amaat.
44009037	Ma iitene oman omoorun zɛɛ makacin adaawa. Ma oony ɔl ɛlɛ onin, ma avɔ arek ceez ci ataadonek gɔn tadena ka waan kɔɔt kadaac niigi nɔɔnɔ.
44009038	Maje Japa kibeen Lida ajɔŋzɔ. Mazi azii ɔl o tuwento abaak Japakti Pitɔr aavi Lidakti, itoontek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl ram ka kɔɔt kenektek nɛ, “Ijayet ageeta ŋaato kataman.”
44009039	Itiŋa ni Pitɔr orkorit ki nɔɔgɔ. Mazi akɔ arum looc, ooti niigi nɔɔnɔ ceeze o arek ɔl ɛlɛ o Tabiza e. Ma avu ŋaai ci bɔyɛk, ma aliya Pitɔr, ma alu, ma ayelzek nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ baal alolak nɔɔgɔ Tabiza waanbaal ŋaan arogni e.
44009040	Anyek ni Pitɔr ɔl dook kudunit ceeza. Ma akani kozoŋti looc, ma aŋaryɛ. Ma ookconek ɛlɛ o Tabiza e, ma anek nɛ, “Tabiza, tiŋa jena.” Ma akɔl niini kɛbɛrɛ. Mazi acin Pitɔr, itiŋa kaavu je.
44009041	Ma atirit Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ kitiŋa je. Otowa ni niini ɔl o tuwento been ŋaai o bɔi e, ma ayelzek nɔɔgɔ Tabiza o oroga.
44009042	Ma adala zɔɔz nici kutur o kazi Japa dook, ma atu ɔl ci meel Manyi.
44009043	Ma amɔn Pitɔr Japakti iinya ci meel. Aavi niini korge o Saiman o gɔɔn adɔdɔ kuwa.
44010001	Ma iinyaye niceke anyak eet ci kazi zaar nɛ Korniliyas ci abaak Sisiriya. Niini eet ci Rom, ma een alaan ci agam takirnya ceen eet tur. Awo ɔl takirnya nicoko zaar ci kazi nɛ Takirnya o Italiya.
44010002	Maje Korniliyas been ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook adiŋdiŋan gɔɔn niigi Jook. Ma atirit ɔl ci Juz amaat kaale ci meel, ma aŋaryɛ tup.
44010003	Ma iitene oman yomana ziiye ween iiyu acin toonnyai ci Joowo akunak nɔɔnɔ, ma awo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Korniliyas.”
44010004	Ma agɛlɛm niini toonnyai nico ŋoliinta, ma anek nɛ, “Arooŋ tɛ naa Manyi?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Atalɔ Jooi ŋaryiinte unun kibeen irkente unun.
44010005	Inoko zin toon ɔl koogi kɔɔt kuture o kazi Japa ka kɔɔt kanyaakta eet ci kazi zaar nɛ Saiman Pitɔr.
44010006	Aavi niini ole ci Saiman o gɔɔn adɔdɔ kuwa abaak liiltoga.”
44010007	Ɔɔtɔ ni toonnyaiti ŋaatin. Ma awa Korniliyas ɔl ram ole o aliŋliŋ ceeze onin kibeen eet ceen takiren codoi ci aliŋliŋonek buk nɔɔnɔ ci gɔɔn buk niini adiŋdiŋan Jook.
44010008	Ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o aduwak toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ e. Itoonek ni nɔɔgɔ kutur o kazi Japa.
44010009	Ma iitene co mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi gɔla ŋaati ojoŋozti Japa, itiŋa Pitɔr waaz ook ŋaryiin ceez tadena.
44010010	Ma ŋinaante adawun nɔɔnɔ magiz, ma ɔrɔɔŋ gi ci adak. Mazi ŋaan agɔɔn ɔl dayiin nɔkɔ, uwunozɛ niini.
44010011	Ma wunozinte nico acin niini tammu akoli, ma acin rum ci abil kiyo rum o malkinto o akunak looc tammu tadena. Acabje rum nico aŋɛtɔ dook loronyaye ceen wec.
44010012	Anyak rum nico eecitɔ kɛlɛk kɛbɛrɛ dook, ki kaal o awɔ keŋtinɛ, been kibaali o too. Maje kɛlɛk nicoko oogi abor gɔɔn ɔl o Juz ŋaati adayi.
44010013	Ma azii Pitɔr molok ci azi nɛ, “Pitɔr, tiŋa je. Tɔdɔŋ kaal nicoko ka dawɔ.”
44010014	Bar abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Kajura Manyi. Ŋaan gɔɔn laadun kadak dayiin ci abor lotinowa o Joowo.”
44010015	Ma anek mɔlɔyi bodo nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Má anyi dayiin ci kazi naana nɛ abon o kizi gɛrzɛ.”
44010016	Ma aduwa mɔlɔyi nici zɔɔz nico lak iiyu. Imiire ni rum nici ook tamma bodo.
44010017	Ma abaaban Pitɔr kɛŋ ci wunozak nicoko ɔrɔɔt. Mazi ŋaan abaaban niini gi nico, ivita ɔl ona itoona Korniliyas e kɔrɔk ci Saiman noko, ma avu ɛɛl niigi araana.
44010018	Ma awɛ niigi ajine azi nɛ, “Mayo ŋina anyak kernoi ci kazi zaar nɛ Saiman Pitɔr tɔ?”
44010019	Mazi ŋaan abaaban Pitɔr kɛŋ ci wunozyak nicoko, enek Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziik di, anyak ɔl ceen iiyu arooŋnyin ineet ŋaato.
44010020	Tiŋa je. Bitɔ ceez loota ka ɔɔtɔ urumtɔ ki nɔɔgɔ. Má ajura ŋaati orkoryu ki nɔɔgɔ giye o eeginɛ modɛn, eeci aneet nɛɛn o kitoonakin nɔɔgɔ.”
44010021	Iiyak ni Pitɔr ceez loota, ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta eet ci arooŋnyaŋ o nɛɛn nici. Avunakaŋ tɛ naa?”
44010022	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Itoonanet alaani onaaŋ kazi Korniliyas. Niini eet ci abon adiŋdiŋan gɔɔn Jook, ma atitiny ɔl o Juz dook nɔɔnɔ. Iiya zin uduwak toonnyaiti ci Joowo nɔɔnɔ gi ci anek nɛ, Toonek ɔl Pitɔr kɔɔt kutuyayin nɔɔnɔ ka ija ziik ŋaatin zɔɔz ci aduwakin niini ineet.”
44010023	Anyaak ni Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ ceez ka kataŋguzɔ baalin. Ma ŋeere itiŋa niini orkorit ki nɔɔgɔ. Ma buk ɔrkɔr ɔl ogɛn ole o atuwe kuture o kazi Japa ki nɔɔgɔ.
44010024	Ma iitenc co urumit niigi kutur o kazi Sisiriya. Maje ŋinaante arɛ Korniliyas ki atenok ogin been laŋotigin o awa niini e dook Pitɔr.
44010025	Mazi arum Pitɔr kɔrɔk, iiyak Korniliyas nɔɔnɔ, ma akani kozoŋti looc ŋaatin, ma adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ.
44010026	Bar Pitɔr agam nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma iŋaani jena anek nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Keen buk naana eet ci deer kiyo niina o.”
44010027	Ma azɔɔzɔ niigi, ma avɔ niigi dook ceeza eecitɔ, ma amada Pitɔr ɔl ci meelik gɛr ceeza.
44010028	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Agayu niiga dook gɔɔn naaga ɔl o Juz keere onaaŋ alaŋ keerononeka modɛn ceezine cigeec, ma alaŋ buk korkorya ki nɔɔgɔ. Bar zin Jooi eyeleyan gi ci ka koromtoya naana ki modɛn dook labak, eeci ɔl dook atobɔ ŋume onin kɔkɔm ŋaatineeŋ ci gɛr.
44010029	Zin giye nico akɔ mazi arumnyan mɔlɔyi baal itoonekan e, kiiya calaŋ kajura. Kajinuŋ zin di igeet, awakaŋ naa?”
44010030	Ma anek Korniliyas Pitɔr nɛ, “Balawantaal iiten o gɔl kaŋaryɛ ceeze onan ziite ween iiyu yomana kiyo inoko noko. Mazi ŋaan kaŋaryɛ nɔkɔ, anai ɛɛti ci aborcek rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr kɔtɔptɔp, ma aku abil aneeta ŋuma.
44010031	Ma anekan nɛ, “Korniliyas, iziiwun Jooi ŋaryiin unun, ma atalnɛ niini irkite unun.
44010032	Toon zin ɔl kɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Japa ka kɔɔt kutuyayin eet o kazi Saiman Pitɔr. Niini kernoi ole o Saiman o adɔdɔ kuwa o abaak liiltoga.”
44010033	Taman nɔkɔ kitooneyin didi ɔl nicoko. Zin didi bonate unun atala niina zɔɔz nico, ma iiyayan kataman. Inoko zin kaavtiya naaga ŋina ŋume o Joowo. Kareyin ineet ka ija duwayet kaal o aduwakin Jooi ineet dook.”
44010034	Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko kagawa didilɛ Jooi alaŋ anyayek ɔl oogi tɛl.
44010035	Mã anyak modene dook eet ci adiŋdiŋan Jook, ma agɔɔn kaal ci abon, agama Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
44010036	Agayu niiga zɔɔz o kaviyak o abon akati ɔl o Israyil. Kaviyak o azi nɛ, Anyak ɔl ganɔn ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo ween Manyi o ɔl dook.
44010037	Agayu niiga zɔɔz nica akanai looce o kazi Galili vurte o uduwakɛ Jɔn ɔl zɔɔz o Joowo ka kotoonycɔi e.
44010038	Agayu niiga anyek Jooi Yesu o Nazarɛt dɔyiz been Vɔŋiz onin. Iziiktu niiga buk nɔɔnɔ azɔp loocok dook aliŋliŋ kaal ci abon, ma arogoz ɔl dook o agit Loryenti. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci aromɛ Jooi ki nɔɔnɔ.
44010039	Ma kicinta naaga toonnyawa kaal baal agɔɔn niini loocowe o Judiya been kuture o kazi Jerusalɛm e dook. Otodooc zin ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec.
44010040	Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu itiŋawi Jooi nɔɔnɔ daayiza, ma anyek Jooi ɔl kicinit nɔɔnɔ orogun.
44010041	Ŋaan zin bar kicinit ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ, bar kicinta naaga baal aŋeranet Jooi e doon. Ma kazolona, ma kawodena been nɔɔnɔ vurte o itiŋawi niini daayiza.
44010042	Ma aricaneket niini ageeta kuuwakteya kaviyak o Joowo ɔl kenekteya nɛ, “Yesu nɛɛn o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi alaan ci ka kapak ɔl o arogi been o adaai buk.”
44010043	Baale nyakaŋanɛta dook ayɛɛt gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti o atu nɔɔnɔ aaryai ŋaatin oŋɛ dɔyize o zaar ogin.”
44010044	Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Pitɔr nɔkɔ, iiyak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl dook o azii zɔɔz o aduwa Pitɔr e.
44010045	Maje ɔl ween Juz o atuwe baal ɔrkɔra ki Pitɔr kuture o kazi Japa e, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti giye ci anyekɛ Jooi Vɔŋiz onin modɛn buk o.
44010046	Eeci azii niigi ɔl ween modɛn azɔɔzɔ zoozowe ogɛn, ma anaat Jook.
44010047	Ma azi Pitɔr nɛ, “Iiyak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl nicoko kiyo baale akunaket ageet e. Akɔm zin eet ci ka kalam nɔɔgɔ ŋaati oonyɛnɛ.”
44010048	Iricanek ni Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ kotoonycɛ zaare o Yesu Kiristo. Ma ilalek niigi Pitɔr kɔmɔn rak ŋaatineeŋ iinya ci miliny.
44011001	Zin iziiyit toonnyawa kibeen ɔl o tuwento abaak .. looce o Judiya dook zɔɔz o iiyakɛ zɔɔz o Joowo modɛn buk.
44011002	Mazi akɔ Pitɔr Jerusalɛma, odomta ɔl o Juz tuwento ogɛn ci gɔɔn arɔɔŋ modɛn keteede, egerenycek niigi Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Agoon niina gi ci gɛr.
44011003	Iiten baale akɔ een kernoi modene o alaŋ ateedi, ma ook ozoltowu ki nɔɔgɔ.”
44011004	Enico oobek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ kaal baal akanai e dook.
44011005	Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaŋaryɛ iiten baale kuture o kazi Japa, ma kawunoze. Kacin wunozyai rum ci aku tamma ci abil kiyo rum o malkinto o akunak looc acabjai aŋɛtɔ dook loronyaye ceen wec, ma aku ajoŋozan.
44011006	Mazi kagiriiny rum nico eecitɔ, kacin kɛlɛk kɛbɛrɛ dook, ki kaal o awɔ keŋtinɛ, been kibaali.
44011007	Ma kazii molok ci anekan nɛ, “Tiŋa je Pitɔr. Tɔdɔŋ kaal nicoko ka dawɔ.”
44011008	Ma bar kabɛdɛkɛ naana nɔɔnɔ kanei nɛ, “Akɔm. Kajura Manyi. Ŋaan laadun kadak dayiin ci abor lotinowa o Joowo.”
44011009	Ma azoozekan bodo mɔlɔyi nici tamma anekan nɛ, “Má anyi dayiin ci kazi naana nɛ abon o kizi gɛrzɛ.”
44011010	Kazii zoozok nicoko lak iiyu. Ma vurta imiirozek rum nici tammu.
44011011	Taman nɔkɔ ivita ɔl ceen iiyu ci itoonnyai looce o kazi Sisiriya. Ma avunakan ceeze baal katikɛnɛ e.
44011012	Ma anekan Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɛ, Tiŋa je. Orkorit ki modo nicoko calaŋ anyei ŋoliin. Kɔrkɔrta ni ki nɔɔgɔ koota Sisiriya korge o eet o kazi Korniliyas. Ma korkorya buk ki ɔl ci tuwento een tɔrkɔnɔm coko, ma kavoya naaga dook ole o Korniliyas.
44011013	Ma ŋinaante uduwayet Korniliyas gi baal acini niini toonnyai o Joowo ceeze onin e. Ma anek toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toon eet oma kook kuture o kazi Japa ka kook kotowayin eet o kazi Saiman Pitɔr.
44011014	Ŋaan aku aduwakin niini ineet zɔɔz o ka kuruguzin ineet been ɔl o kɔrɔk unun dook.”
44011015	Ma kakana kuuwayei zɔɔz Korniliyas been ɔl ogin. Mazi ŋaan kazooz kuuwai nɔkɔ, iiyak Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔgɔ kiyo baale akunaket buk ageet e ɛlɛ.
44011016	Zin enico kaada gi baal aduwa Manyi Yesu azi nɛ, “Oonyi baale Jɔn maami doon, maje bar igeet uunyuŋ Jooi tiŋeere Vɔŋize onin e.”
44011017	Inoko zin kagaac anyewun Jooi modɛn niceke Vɔŋiz onin kiyo baale anyet ageet waan o kutuyi naaga Manyi Yesu Kiristo e. Mazin yo giye nico naana keen ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka waan kalam liŋliŋɔn ci Joowo o?”
44011018	Mazi azii ɔl o tuwento gi nico, otoŋit zɔɔz o agɛrnyɛki niigi Pitɔr e. Ma anaat niigi Jook azi nɛ, “Inoko anyewun Jooi modɛn gɔl ci ka kabadai oŋɛnɛ ka korogit rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
44011019	Zin azaantɛ ɔl o tuwento Jerusalɛma, eeci iitene baal aruyi ɔl Istivɛn kadaak e, akatai gidɛn o agidi ɔl nɔɔgɔ. Ma avɔ ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ looce o kazi Venosiya. Maje ogɛn avɔ looce o kazi Sipras. Bodo ogɛn avɔ kuture o kazi Antiyok. Ma avɔ aduwak niigi kaviyak o Joowo ɔl o Juz doon.
44011020	Maje ɔl o tuwento ogɛn ole o avu Siprasa kibeen Sariina ɔɔt Antiyokti, ma avɔ uuwayek buk niigi zɔɔz o Joowo modɛn ŋinaante. Ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ kaviyak o abon o akati Yesu Kiristo.
44011021	Maje dɔyizi o Joowo aavi ŋaatineeŋ, ma atu modɛna ci meel gɛr Jook, ma avu ano Manyi.
44011022	Mazi avɔ azii ɔl o tuwento Jerusalɛma kaviyak nicoko, itoonit niigi Barnabas kook Antiyokti.
44011023	Mazi akɔ arum niini Antiyok, icin niini mayuwɛnɛt o amayuwi Jooi ɔl, ma atalnɛ niini, ma aricanek nɔɔgɔ kagamit Jook ɔrɔɔt.
44011024	Maje waanice Barnabas niini eet ci abon anyak Vɔŋiz o Joowo been tuwɛn ɔrɔɔt. Ma buk anyek niini ɔl ci meel ŋinaante kutuweec Manyi.
44011025	Ook ni Barnabas kuture o kazi Tarsas ka kook kɔrɔɔŋ Cɔl.
44011026	Mazi akɔ ajowa niini nɔɔnɔ, ooyi nɔɔnɔ Antiyokti. Ma irkit nice dook aromɛ niigi dook ramantiya been ɔl o tuwento, ma adɛmɛz niigi ɔl ci meel gɛr. Zin nica kutur baal laadun akanonɛkɛ ɔl o atuwe zaara o kazi Kiristan e nɛɛn.
44011027	Ma iinyaye niceke ɔtɔɔzɔ ɔl ceen nyakaŋanɛt ci Joowo Jerusalɛma ɔɔtɔ Antiyokti.
44011028	Ma ŋinaante itiŋa ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci kazi zaar nɛ Agabas jena, ma aduwak niini ɔl Vɔŋize o Joowo zɔɔz ci akati tarjo ci appe ka kiiyak looc dook.
44011029	Zin giye nico orooŋit ɔl o tuwento dook ka kolotit guruc ci ka kitiriti niigi gɔnɔgi o tuwento abaak looce o kazi Judiya.
44011030	Uluta ni didi niigi guruc, ma anyek Barnabas ki Cɔl ka konyowoztek alaat o tuwento Jerusalɛma. Zin didi iiya tarjo nica iitene baal agami alaani o kazi Kaladiyas looc e.
44012001	Ma iinyaye niceke akata alaani o kazi Erod gidɛn ci agidi ɔl o tuwento oogi.
44012002	Anyek niini Jemis ween gɔtɔni Jɔn kuruyit ɔl nɔɔnɔ dilawa kadaak.
44012003	Mazi acin Erod ɔl o Juz atalnɛ giye nico, utugu gi ci gɛr bodo ci ka kagamti ɔl Pitɔr. Agooni gi nici iinyaye o gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl o Juz adayi ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar.
44012004	Agamit ni ɔl Pitɔr, ma avɔ aryek nɔɔnɔ sijin. Ma aŋɛra Erod takirnya amɔnki tɔrkɔnɔm kɔɔt kebeyit Pitɔr sijina. Ma aŋɛr takirnya eleeti lɛlɛnɛt wec ka kanycɔi beyiin, ma anyɔn niigi beyiin ɔl wec wec. Maje Erod arɔɔŋ kooyi Pitɔr ka kook kapaktek ɔl nɔɔnɔ daayiz kɔla iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lotɛn o Juz vardaŋinto.
44012005	Maje maŋaan aavi Pitɔr sijina e, ajinak ɔl o tuwento nɔɔnɔ Jook ɔrɔɔt.
44012006	Ma baaline ci ka kalai iiteni ci ka waan kapayɛkɛ Erod Pitɔr daayiz o, ɔɔŋ Pitɔr ŋaati aŋɛrɛkɛ takirnya raman nɔɔnɔ kɔrgɛn acabji azɛɛna ziiye raman. Maje bodo takirnya ogɛn abɛk araan o sijino.
44012007	Ma ŋinaante iiya toonnyaiti ci Joowo olla boyoŋyoŋ, ma ataran ceez ci ona acabin Pitɔr o wak. Ma iiŋka toonnyaiti Pitɔr amɔɔni dodop ka kicinɛ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je taman.” Ma iŋaaz didi Pitɔrjena, ma iina ziiya azeene cigin o.
44012008	Ma anek toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Borocek rum unun been caava.” Ma agɔɔn Pitɔr nɔkɔ, ma anek toonnyaiti bodo nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Doma rum unun malkinto. Nowawan.”
44012009	Ono ni Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ, ma adun sijina. Bar Pitɔr alaŋ aga gi ci agoonek toonnyaiti o gi ceen didi, bar olla abaaban niini anyek kizi wunozyak.
44012010	Ma adicek niigi abatak takirnya ci oowu o, ma avɔ bodo abatak ci korgenu e zɛɛ ma avɔ arum araan ween ziit aṯornɛkɛ. Ma akɔl araani nici ɛlɛ doon kɔkɔm eet ci deer, ma adun niigi bitaala. Oneec ni niigi gɔl ɔtɔɔzɔ. Taman nɔkɔ izi toonnyaiti ḏim.
44012011	Zin ŋina agawun Pitɔr gi ci ona agoononek nɔɔnɔ o, ma azi nɛ, “Inoko kagawa naana gi nico didi juruŋ. Itoona Manyi toonnyai onin ka kiiya korogozan aneet dɔyize o Erod been ole o Juz o arɔɔŋ kutuguzeyan kaal ci gɛr.”
44012012	Mazi agawun niini oboroca didi toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ, ook ole o Meri ween yaati Jɔn Marko. Maje ɔl ci meel ŋinaante alotɛ aŋaryɛ ka kitirit Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
44012013	Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɛtɛrɛn Pitɔr karogi o anyoogɛnɛ kaluwa, ma aku gabarɛnti ceen dole ci ŋaai ci kazi zaar nɛ Roda ka kiiya kɔkɔl karogi.
44012014	Mazi ka kɔkɔl karogi, iziiwun niini Pitɔr molok, ma atalnɛ ɔrɔɔt zɛɛ makacin imiirozek ceez iŋaan kɔkɔl karogi. Ma akɔ anek ɔl nɛ, “Pitɔr abil bitaala.”
44012015	Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aamnyin maŋɔni.” Bar anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ nɔɔnɔ gi. Alaŋ kalutuŋ.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Coma een toonnyai o Joowo o gɔɔn abɛk nɔɔnɔ.”
44012016	Maje bar Pitɔr ŋaan atɛrɛn karogi nɔkɔ. Mazi akɔ akɔl ɛɛti codoi karogi, iiya Pitɔr eecitɔ, ma acin niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti tɛt.
44012017	Ma adɔŋ niini aziit anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ajaktɔ di.” Oobek ni niini nɔɔgɔ gɔl o aduŋnan Manyi nɔɔnɔ sijina. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Uduktak zɔɔz nico Jemis kibeen ɔl o tuwento dook.” Otoŋek ni niini nɔɔgɔ looc ook ŋaaman.
44012018	Mazi akɔ aaliz tammu, olla egenygenyit takirnya o abɛk sijin e arɔɔŋ Pitɔr. Ma anɔ nɛ, “Gitaz ci utuguwozek eet we o? Mayo ook niini ŋaaḏaŋ?”
44012019	Ma aricanek Erod takirnya ka korooŋit nɔɔnɔ juruŋ, ma bar ŋaan niigi kojokta nɔɔnɔ. Ma aricanek Erod alaan uneeŋ ka kɛgɛz nɔɔgɔ juruŋ. Apayewun ni Erod nɔɔgɔ daayiz. Mazi akɔ adicai zɔɔz nici, itiŋa Erod Judiya, ook avu kuture o kazi Sisiriya.
44012020	Ma iinyaye niceke abornek Erod ɔl o Tayor ki ɔl o Sidon nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt. Ivita ni ɔl ceen kɔlɛ loocowe niceke ka kivita kimicit ki nɔɔnɔ. Ɔɔwa rak arumɔ niigi kibeen eet o kazi Balastus o aliŋliŋ ole o Erod, ma agama Balastus ka kitirit nɔɔgɔ. Enice ɛlɛ ɔɔtɔ ɔl nici ŋaati Erod avɔ arɔɔŋ ganɔn ŋaatin, eeci gɔɔn dayiin cigeecik avu looce ci abal Erod o.
44012021	Ma iitene o ka kurumtɔi niigi kibeen Erod, oborocek Erod rumanɛ ogin alaazetu. Maje ɔl ci meel gɛr alotak nɔɔnɔ, ma uuwayek niini nɔɔgɔ kaal.
44012022	Ma agɛrɛny ɔl anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een nicini eet ci deer. Niini Jook gi.”
44012023	Taman nɔkɔ iiya toonnyaiti ci Joowo, ma anyek Erod kɔmɔɔr, eeci agama zɔɔz ci adiŋdiŋani ɔl nɔɔnɔ o, ma bar alaŋ anyek ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Adayit ni nɔɔnɔ kuluuta zɛɛ makacin adaawa.
44012024	Adala ni zɔɔz o Joowo iinyaye niceke loocok dook, ma atuwe ɔl ci meelik.
44012025	Maje Barnabas kibeen Cɔl ɔɔt anycek guruc baalke alaat o tuwento Jerusalɛma, ma amiiri niigi avɔ Antiyokti. Ma azɔt niigi buk Jɔn Marko.
44013001	Ma ole o tuwento o abaak Antiyokti anyak nyakaŋanɛt ci uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo kibeen ɔl ci ademzek ɔl zɔɔz o Joowo. Ɔl nicigi awɔyi Barnabas, ki Simiyan ci akanek ɔl zaar ci kazi Koli, ki Luciyas o aku looce o kazi Sariin, ki Manan baal abaakzai kibeen Erod ween alaan ŋaatodoi e, been Cɔl.
44013002	Ma iitene oman mazi avɔ adiŋdiŋan niigi Jook ŋaati ooŋni dayiin, iiyak Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ɛŋɛrtayaŋ Barnabas kibeen Cɔl ka kiliŋliŋit liŋliŋɔn o kaŋɛrai naana nɔɔgɔ.”
44013003	Otoŋit ni ɔl o tuwento dayiin, ma aŋaryɛ, ma ataadek azɛɛn ugeec nɔɔgɔ, ma itoon nɔɔgɔ eo arooŋi Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
44013004	Ma itoon Vɔŋizi o Joowo Barnabas kibeen Cɔl kɔɔtɔ looce o kazi Selusiya, ma ŋinaante otoodit kavool o liilu, ma avɔ looce o kazi Sipras.
44013005	Mazi avɔ arum kutur o kazi Salamis, ɔɔt uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo ceezine o Juz lotento. Ma gɔɔn ɔrkɔr niigi kibeen Jɔn Marko ka kitirit nɔɔgɔ buk liŋliŋɔnta.
44013006	Ma abatak niigi looc o kazi Sipras, ma avɔ arum ŋinti kazi Papos. Ma ŋinaante urumtɔ kibeen eet ceen ŋari kazi Bar Yesu. Niini eet ceen Juz ci anyek ɛlɛ kizi nyakaŋan, alaŋ zin bar een nyakaŋan ci Joowo.
44013007	Niini laŋoti alaan o agɛny kazi Sergas Palos o abal Sipras. Ma awa alaani nici Barnabas been Cɔl ka kivitak nɔɔnɔ, eeci arɔɔŋ kiziik niini zɔɔz o Joowo ŋaatineeŋ.
44013008	Maje bar ɛɛti ceen ŋari kazi zaar oogi nɛ Elimas noko amarnin nɔɔgɔ. Ma akat niini alaan vɔlɔŋa ka calaŋ atu zɔɔz o Joowo.
44013009	Maje bodo Cɔl o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Pɔl iiyak nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔrɔɔt. Ma agɛlɛm niini eet ceen ŋari noko.
44013010	Ma anek nɛ, “Ineet ŋɛɛrti Loryento. Een niina maryoi ci kaal o abon dook. Alaba niina ɔl kaale o gɛr agoon dook. Atultul gɔɔn niina tup ŋaati arɔɔŋɛ gɔl ci anyekɛ leeminɛt o Manyi kizi vɔlɔŋ.
44013011	Ŋaan zin atoryin Manyi ineet inoko ɛlɛ ŋina. Inoko rak een ruben calaŋ acinɛ iinya ki iinya.” Taman nɔkɔ izi didi nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ kalimik. Ma atamtamɛn looc arɔɔŋ eet ci ka kiyit nɔɔnɔ.
44013012	Mazi acin alaani kaal ci agooni o, utuwɔ, eeci abiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaaten demziin o akati Manyi.
44013013	Ma iinyaye ogɛn otoodit Pɔl been ɔl o ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ kavool o liilu Paposa, ɔɔt kuture o kazi Perga looce o kazi Pampiliya. Maje Jɔn Marko ɔtɔɔ niini imiire ook Jerusalɛma.
44013014	Itiŋgazɔ ni niigi Pergakti, ma avɔ zɛɛ been Antiyok o aavi looce o kazi Pisidiya. Ma iitene o yubzento ɔɔtɔ niigi ceeze o lotento, ma avɔ aavtiz loota.
44013015	Ma vurta mazi ekeebit ɔl waragɛ o Mosis been waragɛnya o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta, enektek alaata o ceez o lotento nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga, mã alam tɛ zɔɔz ci dizkento anyaku, karooŋnyuŋ ka uduktak ɔl.”
44013016	Itiŋa ni Pɔl jena, ma adɔŋ aziit ka kitivan ɔl, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktaŋ di niiga dook ɔl ogane eeginu Israyil kibeen ɔl o eeginu modɛn o agamtawu Jook.
44013017	Ma Jooi ci ɔl ci Israyil noko ɛŋɛra baale jijitigaac. Ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kiziti bor ci appe waano abaai niigi kiziti mirɔk looce o kazi Masir. Ma aduŋnan Jooi nɔɔgɔ dɔyize onin adikir.
44013018	Ma azooni Jooi nɔɔgɔ irkitok eet ram balala.
44013019	Ma azaan Jooi boryok ween modɛn een torgɛrɛm baal abaak looce o kazi Kanan e lai, ma anyek looc nice nɔɔgɔ ween ɔl ogin kazi Israyil.
44013020	Ma kaal nicaga agooni irkitok ceen eet tur lak wec ki eet ram kamɔtɔ. (450) Zin enice anyek Jooi ɔl ci aganek zoozok payiinta kabalit nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ been iiten o nyakaŋan o kazi Samwɛl.
44013021	Ma iinyaye niceke ijinit niigi Jook ka kanyek nɔɔgɔ alaan ci adikir ci ka kabal nɔɔgɔ. Anyek ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ alaan o kazi Cɔl ween ŋɛɛrti Kic ween borit o Bɛnjimɛn, ma abal Cɔl nɔɔgɔ irkitok eet ram.
44013022	Mazi akɔ aboroc Jooi Cɔl, arigzek Jooi Devid kizi alaan cineeŋ. Ceeni zin zɔɔz o aduwa Jooi akati Devid azi nɛ, “Kaga naana Devid ween ŋɛɛrti Jesi. Kareez naana nɔɔnɔ. Niini eet o ka kutugu kaal o karooŋe naana nɔɔnɔ kutugu dook.”
44013023	Zin Devid nici jijiti Yesu o anyek Jooi kizi ruguzoi o ɔl o Israyil kiyo baale atɛrkɛt niini e.
44013024	Zin ma ŋaan kakata Yesu liŋliŋɔn onin e, uuwayek rak Jɔn ɔl o Israyil zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Abadai zinzeeti oŋene ugooc ka otoonycɛ.”
44013025	Mazi ka kidica Jɔn liŋliŋɔn onin e, ajin niini ɔl anek nɛ, “Aniyu yo dim gɔɔn niiga nɛ, Keen naana ŋɛnɛɛn? Alaŋ keen naana eet o areyu nɛɛn. Bar ɛɛti o areyu niiga nɔɔnɔ ŋaan anowanan aneet vurta. Ma alaŋ katin naana kaganona ŋaati kaborcanɛ caava ogin zoonu, eeci adiŋdiŋ niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
44013026	Iziiktaŋ zin di niiga ɔl ogane Israyil o eeginu dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim kibeen buk niiga ɔl o eeginu modɛn o adiŋdiŋanu Jook ŋina. Itoonnyaket zɔɔz ci rogeto noko ageet dook.
44013027	Eeci ɔl baal abaak Jerusalɛma e kibeen alaat ugeec ŋaan kagaac Yesu een Kiristo baal arɛ niigi e nɛɛn. Ma alaŋ buk aga niigi zoozok baal ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta, baal gɔɔn akɛɛp ɔl iinyaye o yubzento dook e. Anycek zin niigi zoozok o nyakaŋanetu kɛlɛɛmtɛ gole o apaktɛkɛ Yesu daayiz.
44013028	Yo nuun waanice ma ɔkɔma gi ci ka kapaktɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ daayiz e, alaac niigi alaan o kazi Pailat ka kuruk nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
44013029	Ma vurte o otodoyi niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec, ma utuguzɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ kaal dook kiyo ayeedi waragewe o Joowo o, aarya nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec, ma avɔ arek bɔɔt.
44013030	Bar zin Jooi itiŋawi nɔɔnɔ daayiza.
44013031	Ma iinyaye ci meelik eyelizak Yesu ɛlɛ ɔl ogin baal ɔrkɔra been nɔɔnɔ Galiliya avunak Jerusalɛm e. Ma inoko iziti niigi bacok giye nico ole o Israyil.
44013032	Inoko zin naaga buk ŋina kanyaakuŋ igeet kaviyak o abon. Zin gi baal aterkedek Jooi jijitigaac e utuguwe ŋaatinai ageet o keegin dɔl ci dɔl ugeecik gole o iŋaani Yesu daayiza. Kiyo ayeedi waragewe o beniinowu zooc ram azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛran. Waanico kayelei naana ɔl gi o kɛɛnɛ naana baatun.”
44013034	Aduwa Jooi zɔɔz ci akati ŋaazi o Yesu daayiza ki gi o alaŋ adaaŋni bodo azi nɛ, “Ŋaan kanyin mayuwɛnɛt onan een didi baal katerkedei Devid e.”
44013035	Buk baale anek Devid Jook waragewe o beniinowu nɛ, “Alaŋ uuŋ niina gabaren unun abon kumu loowa.”
44013036	Alaŋ zin Devid aduwa zɔɔz ci akati ɛlɛ onin, eeci baale ma ŋaan arogi niini e, agɔɔn niini kaal o arooŋek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kutugu. Ma waanice adaak niini, ma ada ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋaao adawin jijitiginɛ, ma ame ɛlɛ oninɛ loowa.
44013037	Bar zin Yesu nɛɛn o itiŋawi Jooi nɔɔnɔ daayiza iŋaan kumu.
44013038	Gɔtɔnɔga, abon agayu niiga dook ŋaaten Yesu uuwayizɛ zɔɔz o aaran Jooi oŋɛ ɔla.
44013039	Zin ɛɛti o atu Yesu ɔɔgjai niini oŋene baal alaŋ lotinowa o Mosis aara e.
44013040	Egenyit zin ka calaŋ zɔɔz baal aduwa Jooi nyakaŋanɛtɛ e akunakuŋ igeet.
44013041	Baale azi niigi nɛ, “Niiga ɔl o gɔɔn adoŋnuŋ nyigita, ma apezu gi ween didi, icinit gi ci ka kutugu ce. Ateeduŋ tedec gi nici biye. Tedec mã acinu gi nico, adaaŋnu. Eeci gi ci ka kutugu naana iinya nicoko noko, yo nuun oobekuŋ ɔl igeet, alaŋ atuyu.”
44013042	Mazi odotiz Pɔl zooze nico, udunta niini been Barnabas ceeze o lotento. Ma aduwak ɔl nɔɔgɔ kabada bodo iitene ci yubzento aku e, ka kiiya kuduktak niigi nɔɔgɔ kaal ci ɛɛl kiyo nici noko bodo.
44013043	Ma vurta mazi azaani ɔl lotɛnta, oneec ɔl ci Juz meel kibeen modɛn o adiŋdiŋan Jook Pɔl been Barnabas. Ma aduwak Pɔl kibeen Barnabas nɔɔgɔ zoozok ci ka kɔdɔkti niigi tuwɛnta ka kabaayit baayiz o Joowo abon.
44013044	Ma iitene ci yubzento oman, iridjai ɔl o abaak kutura ka kivita kiziiyit zɔɔz o Joowo.
44013045	Mazi avɔ acin ɔl o Juz kɔlɛ, inyigitita. Ma akɔny zɔɔz o Pɔl kizi vɔlɔŋ, ma bar aduwa zɔɔz ci gɛr akani nɔɔnɔ.
44013046	Bar enico Pɔl been Barnabas ozoozit moozɛta ɔrɔɔt. Ma anek ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Laadun aganɔ waan rak ŋaati kuuwayekuŋ zɔɔz o Joowo ɔɔwa igeet ɔl o Juz. Zin giye o utuburtu niiga zɔɔz nico, ma icintu eleeti ugooc alaŋaan aganonu ŋaati ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ŋaan kuuŋnuŋ igeet ka koota kuuwakteya zɔɔz o Joowo ɔl ween modɛn.
44013047	Eeci aricaneket Manyi ageeta zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Kitoonuŋ igeet ka iziti vooritin ci modenu, ma buk eeginu gɔl ci rogzɛn ci ɔl o loocu dook.”
44013048	Mazi azii ɔl ween modɛn zɔɔz nico, ataltɔ niigi, ma anaat Jook zooze o akati Yesu. Utuyɔ ni ɔl baal laadun aŋɛrak Jooi nɔɔnɔ rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
44013049	Ma azaanonek zɔɔz o Joowo kuturyok o looc nice dook.
44013050	Maje bar ɔl o Juz amacuc alaat o kutur nice kibeen ŋaai o modɛn ween arɔk gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan Jook ka kotobortek niigi Pɔl been Barnabas nɔŋ. Ma anyek niigi ɔl kigidit Pɔl kibeen Barnabas, ma atooyek tuu.
44013051	Ma aduŋta Pɔl ki Barnabas tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ ka kizi yelzan o aborni ɔl o kutur ci kazi Antiyok noko zɔɔz o Joowo. Idicek ni niigi ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Ikoniyam.
44013052	Maje ɔl o tuwento abaak Antiyokti anyak Vɔŋiz o Joowo zinzeetinɛ, ma atalnɛ ɔrɔɔt.
44014001	Ma Ikoniyama ŋinaante ɔɔtɔ Pɔl kibeen Barnabas ceeze o lotento, ma avɔ uuwak dɔyize o Joowo, makacin ɔl ci meel ole o Juz been modɛn oogi utuyɔ.
44014002	Maje bar ɔl ci Juz ogɛn calaŋ arɔɔŋ kutuyɔ amacuc modɛn, ma akat nɔɔgɔ zɔɔza ka kotoborit nɔŋ ka kigidit Pɔl ki Barnabas been ɔl o atuwe.
44014003	Ma amɔn Pɔl kibeen Barnabas ŋinaante ŋinti wun, ma uuwak niigi zɔɔz o Manyi moozɛta. Ma ayelza Manyi zɔɔz uneeŋ akati reezinɛt onin kibil tɔ ŋaati anyekɛ nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye.
44014004	Ɛŋɛrtɔ ni ɔl o kuturo lak ram. Ceegi agama zɔɔz ci ɔl ci Juz o, maje ceegi agama zɔɔz o toonnyawu.
44014005	Oromit ni modɛna eleeti kodoye kibeen Juz been alaat ugeec ka kigidit toonnyak ka kavacit nɔɔgɔ biyɛnɛ kadaayitɔ.
44014006	Mazi azii toonnyawa gi nico, ivirit ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Litra kibeen kuture o kazi Darbi o ɛɛl looce o kazi Likoniya kibeen vitɛn o ajɔŋɔz loocok niceke.
44014007	Ma ŋinaante ɔɔt uuwaktek niigi ɔl kaviyak o Joowo abon.
44014008	Maje kuture o kazi Litra anyak eet ci aritai kizi ŋanyŋany calaŋ awɔ been nɛɛn.
44014009	Aavi niini ŋinaante, ma azii zɔɔz o Pɔl. Ma agɛlɛm Pɔl nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma acin nɔɔnɔ anyak tuwɛn ci ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ kobona.
44014010	Ma anek Pɔl nɔɔnɔ molowe ci appe nɛ, “Tiŋa jena. Zɔlan zɔɔ.” Ma iŋaaz didi ɛɛti nici jena taman nɔkɔ, ma awɔ.
44014011	Mazi acin kɔlɛ gi ci agɔɔn Pɔl o, egerenyit zooze uneeŋ een Likoniya anɔ nɛ, “Ivitayet joowanɛ eleetine ci ɔl ci deer.”
44014012	Ma akanek niigi Barnabas zaar ci jook uneeŋ kazi Zuus. Maje Pɔl akanek zaar ci jook uneeŋ kazi Ormɛz, eeci azɔɔz niini ɔrɔɔt.
44014013	Maje ceez ci jook cineeŋ kazi Zuus noko aavi waanice kutur nice kabanyca. Iiya ni alaani ci ceez ci jook cineeŋ kazi Zuus noko. Anyaa tiin ceen olenya ci anyak koroboli alemetinɛ zɛɛ been araan. Arɔɔŋ niini been kɔlɛ kutuguzek todoyok toonnyak, eeci abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, Ɔl nicigi joowanɛ gi.
44014014	Mazi azii Barnabas been Pɔl gi ci arɔɔŋ kutuguzek niigi nɔɔgɔ o, ereecit rumanɛ ugeec maany, eeci gi nici gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt Joowa. Ma adokonyonek niigi kɔlɛ eecitɔ, ma agɛrɛny nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ,
44014015	“Má agoonu gi nico nɔkɔ. Naaga keegina ɔl ci deer kiyo niiga o. Kaavtiya ŋina o ka kuuwakteyuŋ igeet zɔɔz ci ka otoŋti diŋdiŋaninɛt ci adiŋdiŋanu joowanɛ o labak adilyai, ka bar idiŋdiŋanit Jook o arogi tamma. Jook nico nɛɛn o ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki looc ki liilok been kaal o anyak nirgi dook.
44014016	Baale ooŋ niini modɛn dook kutuguzɔ kaal o arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ niigi labak.
44014017	Bar zin gɔɔn ŋaan niini ayelza ɛlɛ ɔla kaale o abon agoonek niini nɔɔgɔ. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet tammu tiilɛz been manɛɛn o gɔɔn abiir keberece uneeŋ. Ma anyuŋ buk niini igeet dayiin, ma anyek zinzeeti ugooc kataltɔ.”
44014018	Alamit ni toonnyawa ɔl o arɔɔŋ kotodoŋtek nɔɔgɔ todoyok, bar zin yo nuun aduwak niigi nɔɔgɔ zoozok nicoko o, alaŋ niigi arɔɔŋ kiziiyit juruŋ.
44014019	Ma vurta ivita ɔl o Juz ogɛn Antiyokti looce o Pisidiya kibeen Ikoniyama. Ma avu akana niigi kɔlɛ kavacit Pɔl biyɛnɛ. Ma avac nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ makacin abaabanit kizik adaawa. Ɔɔt ni ujuktek tuu.
44014020	Bar mazi alotak ɔl o tuwento Pɔl, ma avu eelnek nɔɔnɔ, itiŋa bodo niini jena, ma amiironek kutur. Ma iitene ci aalna o ɔtɔɔzɔ Pɔl kibeen Barnabas ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Darbi.
44014021	Ma Darbiya ŋinaante ɔɔt uuwayit Pɔl kibeen Barnabas zɔɔz o Joowo, makacin utuyɔ ɔl ci meelik. Ma amiironek bodo kutur o kazi Litra ki kutur o kazi Ikoniyam kibeen kutur o kazi Antiyok looce o kazi Pisidiya.
44014022	Ma ilot niigi ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe nicoko kodoyit kak, ma ilot nɔɔgɔ ka kemedak tuwɛn Joowa. Ma adɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Naaga o katuwe dook kapirna tiŋeere kaale ci meelik loota ŋina maŋaan rak naaga kɔɔtɔ baliinte o Joowo tamma o.”
44014023	Ma aŋɛra niigi alaat ci ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe nicoko dook. Ma adiŋdiŋan Pɔl ki Barnabas Jook ŋaati ooŋni dayiin, ma aŋaryɛ, ma anyek niigi alaat nicoko Jook o atu niigi ka kozooti nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ.
44014024	Ɔɔtɔ ni niigi, ma avɔ adiir looc o kazi Pisidiya, ma avɔ zɛɛ been looc o kazi Pampiliya.
44014025	Ma avɔ uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo kuture o kazi Perga. Ma adicek avɔ kuture o kazi Ataliya.
44014026	Ma ŋinaante otoodit kavool o liilu, imiirtozek kutur o kazi Antiyok baal itooni nɔɔgɔ ɔl o tuwento kɔɔt kuuwakti zɔɔz o Joowo e, eeci idica niigi liŋliŋɔn uneeŋ.
44014027	Mazi avɔ arum Antiyok, uluta niigi ɔl o tuwento kivitak ŋintodoi, ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ kaal baal agɔɔn Jooi ŋaaten nɔɔgɔ e dook. Ma aduwak buk niigi nɔɔgɔ gi o anyekɛ Jooi modɛn gɔl ci ka kutuyɔi.
44014028	Ma aavtiz niigi ŋinaante ŋinti wun aromɛ kibeen ɔl o tuwento.
44015001	Ma avu ɔl ogɛn looce o Judiya avunak Antiyok. Ma avu adɛmɛz ɔl o tuwento anek nɛ, “Alaŋ bai ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn mã alaŋ ateedinu kiyo baale aduwa lotinowa o Mosis e.”
44015002	Mazi azii Pɔl been Barnabas zɔɔz nico, adaŋtɔ ki ɔl nicoko ɔrɔɔt. Makacin giye nico ɛŋɛrta ɔl o tuwento Pɔl kibeen Barnabas kibeen ɔl koogi ole o tuwento Antiyokti ka kɔɔt Jerusalɛma kɔɔt kuduktak toonnyak kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento zɔɔz nico.
44015003	Ma itoonek ɔl o tuwento nɔɔgɔ gɔl. Mazi avɔ adiir looc o kazi Venosiya kibeen Samariya, uduktak niigi ɔl o tuwento loocowe nicoko zɔɔz o utuyi modɛna Jook. Mazi azii ɔl o tuwento kaviyak nicoko, ataltɔ niigi dook ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
44015004	Mazi avɔ arum Pɔl kibeen Barnabas been ɔl o tuwento ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔgɔ Jerusalɛm, atalta ɔl o tuwento ki toonnyak been alaat o ɔl o atuwe nɔɔgɔ. Ma oobek Pɔl ki Barnabas nɔɔgɔ kaal o agɔɔn Jooi ŋaatineeŋ dook.
44015005	Maje bar ɔl ogɛn ci rak baale een ɔl ci Parici, ma ivita utuweec Yesu itiŋgazɔ jena, ma azi nɛ, “Abon ɔl ceen modɛn atuwe o ateedi. Uduktak buk nɔɔgɔ kuzuuti lotinok o Mosis dook.”
44015006	Ma alotɛ toonnyawa kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento ŋaatodoi ka kabaabanit gi nico.
44015007	Ma adaŋɔ giye nico ŋinti wun zɛɛ makacin vurta itiŋa Pitɔr jena, ma azi nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga, agayu niiga nɔkɔ baale ɛŋɛrawan Jooi ŋaatunooŋ ka kuuwayizek modɛn kaviyak ogin abon ka zin buk niigi kiziiyit, ma atu.
44015008	Ma Jooi o aga zinzeeti o ɔl dook eyelizayit gaman o agaman niini modɛn o utuweec nɔɔnɔ giye o anyekɛ niini nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋiz onin kiyo buk baale anyet ageet e.
44015009	Zin giye nico eyeliza Jooi tobɔnɛt o katobɔnɛ naaga dook kibeen modɛn. Ma aara Jooi oŋɛ ugeec, ma anyek zinzeeti ugeec kobonta, eeci utuyɔ buk niigi.
44015010	Zin yo arooŋnyu anycek Jook kotobor nɔŋ giye ci adaŋeku ɔl ceen modɛn atuwe o gɔl ci ka kuzuuti lotinok o jijitigaac o naagalya Juza alaŋ kanim kuzuuti, ma buk baale jijitigaac alaŋ azooni o naa?
44015011	Naaga Juza alaŋ kɛɛlyai gole ci kazooni lotinok cigaac o. Katu naaga Jook, ma ɛɛlanet niini ageet ŋaaten Manyi Yesu kiyo buk ɛɛla niini modɛn o.”
44015012	Oobtek ni Barnabas kibeen Pɔl nɔɔgɔ kaal baal atɛɛt ɔl biye baal agɔɔn Jooi ŋaatineeŋ ole ween modɛn e. Mazi azii ɔl o tuwento dook zɔɔz nico, ajaktɔ tiv.
44015013	Mazi odotiz Barnabas ki Pɔl zɔɔza, itiŋa bodo Jemis jena, ma azi nɛ, “Iziiktaŋ di gɔtɔnɔga.
44015014	Oobeket ona noko Saiman Pitɔr gi o akunakɛ Jooi modɛn gole o aŋɛran ŋaatineeŋ ɔl oogi kizi ɔl cigin.
44015015	Ma zoozowa o nyakaŋanetu atobɔ kibeen zɔɔz nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo gi ci anɛ Manyi nɛ,
44015016	“Katin ŋaan kabada ka kiiya kɛtɛɛny baliin o Devid baal oyoki e, ma kadoŋ kɔdɔk bodo.
44015017	Kagoon zin naana katin nɔkɔ o, ka ɔl ci loocu noko dook kivitayan aneeta, eeci kɛŋɛra buk modɛn kiziti ɔl cigan.
44015018	Gi zin o aduwa Manyi nɛɛn nici, ma naaga dook kagaac gi nico baale.”
44015019	Ma amɛna Jemis azi nɛ, “Kabaaban zin naana alaŋ abon ŋaati kamacuci modɛn o atu Jook.
44015020	Bar abon kayeedek nɔɔgɔ waragɛ ci kaneki nɛ, “Edeya eleeti dayiine ci ataabi ɔl joowanɛ o adilyai. Otoŋit waaŋzɛt. Má adaku kɛlɛk calaŋ atɛɛt ɔl alemeti. Má adaku biye. Eeci mã agoonu niiga kaal nicoko ŋaati aromenu kibeen ɔl o Juz, abornekuŋ koca niigi igeet nɔŋ.”
44015021	Eeci gɔɔn akɛɛp ɔl lotinok o Mosis abor kaal nicoko ceeze o lotento irkitok ci meel iinyaye o yubzento dook. Ma uuwak ɔl zoozok o Mosis kuturyowe dook.”
44015022	Ulute ni toonnyawa ki ɔl o mayan ole o tuwento ki ɔl o tuwento dook, ma aŋɛra niigi ɔl ci atuwe oogi ŋaatineeŋ ka kitoonit nɔɔgɔ korkorit kibeen Pɔl been Barnabas kɔɔtɔ ole o tuwento Antiyokti. Aŋɛra niigi Silas kibeen Judaz o kazi Barsabas. Ɔl ceen ram noko ɔl ci titiny waanice ɔrɔɔt ole o tuwento.
44015023	Ma ayɛɛt niigi waragɛ, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kooti. Azi waragɛwi nici nɛ, “Ageeta toonnyak kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento o keegina gotonogu kazaayuŋ igeet dook o eeginu modɛn o atuwenu Antiyokti ki Siriya been Silisiya.
44015024	Kiziikta naaga azi ɔl nɛ, Anyak ɔl oogi ŋaatinaaŋ ci ɔɔt ŋaatunooŋ ŋinaante, ma uulaltuŋ zooze o aduwakuŋ niigi igeet. Avɔ zin ɔl nici ŋaatunooŋ niigi doon. Alaŋ kitoona naaga.
44015025	Zin giye nico kulutewa naaga dook, ma kaŋɛrana Judaz been Silas ci kitoonekuŋ igeet noko. Ɔl nicigi ɔrkɔr kibeen laŋotigaac o kazi Pɔl been Barnabas.
44015026	Nɔɔgɔ nɛɛn o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ kuruyit ɔl nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ giye o aliŋliŋi liŋliŋɔn o Manyi Yesu Kiristo.
44015027	Zin kitoonteyuŋ Judaz kibeen Silas o ka kɔɔt kuduktayuŋ niigi igeet utugetinɛ kaal ci kayeedekuŋ waragewe nico o.
44015028	Naaga dook kibeen Vɔŋiz o Joowo alaŋ karooŋnya kanycuŋ igeet lotinok ci adɔi. Olla zin abon azuunu niiga kaal oogi ce.
44015029	Edeya eleeti dayiine ci ataabi ɔl joowanɛ o adilyai. Otoŋit waaŋzɛt. Má adaku kɛlɛk o alaŋ atɛɛt ɔl alemeti. Má adaku biye. Mã uuŋnu kaal nicoko, utuguzu koca niiga kaal ci abon ɔrɔɔt. Kaṯorneka ŋina.”
44015030	Ma itoonek ɔl o tuwento ɔl ci avɔyi waragɛ noko gɔl, idicek ni niigi ɔɔtɔ Antiyokti. Mazi avɔ arum looc, uluta ɔl o tuwento dook, ma avu anyek nɔɔgɔ waragɛ nico.
44015031	Mazi akɛɛp niigi waragɛ nico, ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt zooze ci adizkɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔgɔ o.
44015032	Ma azɔɔzɔ Judaz kibeen Silas o gɔɔn uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo kibeen ɔl o tuwento ŋinti wun, ma ilot niigi nɔɔgɔ ka kanyayit moozɛt kibeen dɔyiz.
44015033	Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ugeecik keronnyo, itoontek ɔl o tuwento nɔɔgɔ gɔl, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔtɔɔz yaak.” Imiirtozek ni niigi ɔl o tuwento baal itoona nɔɔgɔ Jerusalɛma e.
44015035	Maje Pɔl kibeen Barnabas omonit iinya oogi Antiyokti. Ma aromɛ niigi ŋinaante kibeen ɔl oogi, ma adɛmzɛ, ma uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo.
44015036	Ma iinyaye ogɛn enek Pɔl Barnabas nɛ, “Kimiirte kɔɔtɔ kicinit ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe baal kuuwayi zɔɔz o Manyi e dook ka kɔɔt kicinit di karabɔŋ aavtiz niigi ku iinyaye nicoko.”
44015037	Orooŋun ni Barnabas Jɔn Marko korkorit buk ki nɔɔgɔ.
44015038	Maje Pɔl abaaban alaŋ aganɔ niini ŋaati ɔrkɔri ki nɔɔgɔ, eeci rak baale orkorit niini ki nɔɔgɔ lak codoi, ma ook otoŋek niini Pɔl ki Barnabas looc o kazi Pampiliya, ma amiironek kɔrɔk iŋaan kidicai keroni dook.
44015039	Adaŋtɔ ni niigi giye nico, makacin ɛŋɛrtɔ. Orkorit Barnabas been Marko otoodit kavool o liilu ɔɔt looce o kazi Sipras.
44015040	Maje Pɔl ɛŋɛra Silas orkorit ki nɔɔnɔ. Ma ajinek ɔl o tuwento nɔɔgɔ Manyi ka kozooti nɔɔgɔ.
44015041	Ma avɔ azɔp niigi looc o kazi Siriya been Silisiya ka kɔɔt kidiziktek ɔl o tuwento kodoyit ŋinaante.
44016001	Ma eerononek Pɔl kutur o kazi Darbi been kutur o kazi Litra. Maje ŋinaante abaak ɛɛti ci tuwento kazi Timozi. Yaatinɛ dole ceen Juzen, ma atu Yesu buk. Maje baatinɛ eet ceen Garik.
44016002	Ma gɔɔn ɔl o tuwento dook kuture nice been kuture o kazi Ikoniyam ɔɔp Timozi kizi eet ci abon ɔrɔɔt.
44016003	Ɔrɔɔŋ ni Pɔl Timozi korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ. Ma atɛɛt rak nɔɔnɔ kul. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci ɔl o Juz abaak vitɛnane niceke dook aga Timozi baatinɛ Garik.
44016004	Ma avɔ azɔp niigi kuturyok, aduwak ɔl o tuwento lotinok o aduwa toonnyawa kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento Jerusalɛma. Ma aricanek nɔɔgɔ ka kuzuuti lotinok nicoko.
44016005	Anyayit ni ɔl o tuwento dɔyiz tuwɛnta, ma agama ɔl ci meel Jook tup nɔkɔ, ma azaaci ɔl o tuwento kizi mɛɛlɛ.
44016006	Ma vurta ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi, ma avɔ adiir looc o kazi Pijiya kibeen looc o kazi Galatiya, eeci Vɔŋizi o Joowo alam nɔɔgɔ calaŋ uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo looce o kazi Asiya.
44016007	Mazi avɔ arum kɛk o aŋɛrɔn Misiya been Biziniya, orooŋit kɔɔtɔ looce o kazi Biziniya. Maje bar Vɔŋizi o Yesu ajurakɛ nɔɔgɔ keroni ci avɔyi ŋinaante.
44016008	Idiirit ni looc o kazi Misiya, ma adicek avɔ kuture o kazi Toras abil liiltoga.
44016009	Ma baaline nice uwunozɛ Pɔl. Acin niini wunozyai eet ceen Masidoniyen ci abil ilalek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ijayet da Masidoniyakti ka ija tiritet.”
44016010	Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ wunozya nici, icinɛ Pɔl. Enico ɛlɛ naana Luka kibeen nɔɔgɔ kuluta kaal ka koota Masidoniyakti, eeci kagaya awuyet Jooi ka koota kuuwakteya ɔl zɔɔz o Joowo abon ŋinaante.
44016011	Ma katooda kavool o liilu kuture ci kazi Toras neke, ma kavoya looce o kazi Samosas. Ma iitene co koota kuture o kazi Napolis.
44016012	Ma ŋinaante kuduntawa kavoola, ma kawoya zɔɔnɛ kavoya kuture o kazi Vilipiya. Ma kuturi nici kutur codoi kuturyowe o looc o kazi Masidoniya. Abaayi kutur nico ɔl baal avu looce o kazi Rom. Ma kamona kuture nice iinya ci miliny.
44016013	Ma iitene o yubzento kudunta kutura koota liiltoga, eeci kabaabana kaziya nɛ, Anyak inoko ŋinti alotɛn ɔl o Juz aŋaryin. Ma ŋinaante kɔɔt kaavtiya loota, ma kazoozona ki ŋaai ci alotɛ ŋinaante.
44016014	Anyak ŋaatineeŋ ŋaa ci kazi zaar nɛ Lidiya ci looc o kazi Sayatara. Niini ŋaa ci gɔɔn ataalinɛ rumanɛ ci kolik een jalo. Ma gɔɔn buk adiŋdiŋan niini Jook, ma akɔl Manyi nɔɔnɔ ziniz kagama kaal o aduwa Pɔl.
44016015	Makacin otoonycɛ niini kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook. Ma awuyet aneket nɛ, “Mã agayaŋu niiga kutuwa didi naana Yesu, ivita kɔɔt koromtɛ ki aneet ole can e.” Ma amɛna ŋaati awuyet zɛɛ makacin koota.
44016016	Mazi kavoya iitene oman ŋaao ŋaryiinto, kɔɔt kurumtowa kibeen dole ceen gabaren ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kuduwa kaal ci katin iina, ma ajowa ɔl o aliŋliŋonek niini guruc ci meel gole ci aruwɛkɛ ɔl o aduwak kaal o ka kiitazɔ katin nɔɔnɔ guruc.
44016017	Ma ano gɔɔn dole nici Pɔl kibeen buk ageeta. Ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Ɔl nicigi gabara ci Jook o adiŋdiŋ kujukjoowanɛ dook. Uuwayekuŋ niigi igeet gɔl ci ka orogti.”
44016018	Ma agɔɔn niini gi nico iinya ci meel zɛɛ makacin otobor Pɔl nɔŋ. Ma ookci, ma anek miniŋit o Loryento abil doleca nɛ, “Karicanekin ineet duna dolece nico zaare o Yesu Kiristo.” Taman nɔkɔ uduna miniŋiti ci Loryento noko ŋaatin.
44016019	Mazi avɔ aga ɔl o aliŋliŋonek dole nici izii miniŋiti o Loryento baal anyak e ŋaatin tɔ, agaac ɔkɔma gɔl ci ka kojoktai bodo niigi guruc. Agamit ni niigi Pɔl been Silas, ma agurek nɔɔgɔ ŋino roonnyo mɛlɛgɛnyai.
44016020	Avɔyi nɔɔgɔ alaate o Rom, ma anek nɛ, “Ɔl nicigi ɔl ceen Juz, ma avu uulal niigi ɔl kuture cinai noko.
44016021	Adɛmɛz niigi ɔl kɛɛranɛ ci abanɔ kibeen lotinok ogaac. Ma alaŋ abon ŋaati kagɔɔni kaal ci aduwaket niigi ageet o giye o keeginɛ naaga ɔl o Rom.”
44016022	Enico olotai kɔlɛ, ma aŋozonek nɔɔgɔ. Ma arɛɛc alaata rumanɛ o Pɔl been Silas ona aborcek e lai. Ma aricanek takirnya kodooyit nɔɔgɔ.
44016023	Mazi avɔ odotiz ŋaati adɔɔi nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt, acabit nɔɔgɔ sijina. Ma aricanek alaata alaan o sijino konyoogek nɔɔgɔ ceez ka calaŋ avir.
44016024	Mazi avɔ aduwak niigi nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nico, arek niini nɔɔgɔ zanzan eecitɔ. Ma acabek nɔɔgɔ zɔɔ kɛɛn ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt.
44016025	Ma baalin kɛŋa aŋaruyɔ Pɔl been Silas, ma abɛn beniinok ci adiŋdiŋani Jook. Maje ɔl o acabje dook azii nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ.
44016026	Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci dook ɔrɔɔt, ma amɔɔt sijini. Taman nɔkɔ ɔkɔltɛ karogɛta dook, ma aaryai ziiya o acabin ɔl o acabje dook.
44016027	Ma acinɛ alaani o sijino. Mazi acin niini karogɛt o sijino okole, abaaban niini izi nɛ, Coma odokonyit inoko ɔl o acabje e dook. Ma aara kabaz onin tibila arɔɔŋ ka kuruk ɛlɛ kadaak.
44016028	Egerenyek ni Pɔl nɔɔnɔ molowe ci appe anek nɛ, “Má arui ɛlɛ daak gaga. Ŋaan kaavtiya naaga dook tɔ.”
44016029	Ma awa alaani o sijino eet oma ka kanyaa tokolec. Ma adokonyonek sijin eecitɔ, ma akani kozoŋti looc Pɔl been Silas zɔɔnɛ ŋaati abarini.
44016030	Ma aduŋnan nɔɔgɔ bitaala, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Eeta, mayo kutugu gitaz ci ka korogozan?”
44016031	Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Tu Manyi Yesu ka orogit niina kibeen ɔl o ceez unun buk.”
44016032	Uuwaktek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kibeen ɔl o ceez onin dook zɔɔz o akati Manyi.
44016033	Ma baaline nice ɛlɛ ook alaani ci sijino noko, ma akɔ amoor Pɔl ki Silas tobɛ. Otoonycɛ ni enice niini kibeen ɔl o ceez onin dook.
44016034	Ma akɔyi niini Pɔl been Silas ole onin, ma akɔ anyek dayiin kadaktɔ. Ma atalnɛ niini kibeen ɔl o ceez onin ɔrɔɔt, eeci utuweec niigi Jook.
44016035	Ma ŋeeretine co itoonit alaata o Rom takirnya ka kooti molok ci azi nɛ, “Oborocit ɔl baalke.”
44016036	Uduwak ni alaani o sijino Pɔl enek nɛ, “Anyaa alaata o Rom molok ci azi nɛ, Uburucewu sijina niina kibeen Silas. Inoko zin ɔtɔɔz yaak.”
44016037	Bar Pɔl anek takirnya nɛ, “Ma alaata ŋaan rak buk kootet rooni ka kicinit zɔɔz cinaaŋ o, bar olla adooket niigi kɔlɛ kebereca gaga nɔkɔ. Zin naaga buk keegina ɔl ci Rom. Ma alaŋ waan kaganona ŋaati agooneket niigi ageeta gi ci abil nɔkɔ. Acabtet niigi ageeta sijina. Ma inoko arɔɔŋ ka koborocet roodinta. Alaŋ zin kagamana naaga zɔɔz nico. Abon avu alaata o Rom niigi alya ŋina ka kivita kuburucawet.”
44016038	Ooti ni takirnya zɔɔz nico alaate o Rom. Mazi avɔ azii niigi Pɔl kibeen Silas een ɔl ci Rom, anyayit ŋoliin.
44016039	Ɔɔtɔ ni niigi ŋaatineeŋ, ma avɔ anek nɛ, “Kavoloŋnya naaga giye ci kagoonekuŋ igeet o.” Uburuca ni niigi nɔɔgɔ sijina, ma ilalek nɔɔgɔ kɔtɔɔzɔ kuture nico.
44016040	Mazi aduŋna Pɔl ki Silas sijina, ɔɔt korge o ŋaa o kazi Lidiya. Ma ŋinaante urumtɔ kibeen ɔl o tuwento, ma aduwak niigi nɔɔgɔ zoozok ci dizkento. Ma vurta ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi kuture nice.
44017001	Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi, ma avɔ adiir kutur o kazi Ampipolis kibeen Apoloniya. Ma avɔ zɛɛ been kutur o kazi Tɛsalonika. Ma ŋinaante anyak ceez ci ɔl o Juz lotento.
44017002	Ook ni Pɔl ceeze ci lotento noko eonin gɔɔn akɔyi laadun. Ma ŋinaante ɔɔt adaŋtɔi ki ɔl zɔɔz ci akati waragɛ o Joowo iinya ci yubzento iiyu.
44017003	Ma oobek niini nɔɔgɔ waragɛ o Joowo, ma ayelzek nɔɔgɔ kaal o ayeedi akati piryakzɛt o Kiristo kibeen ŋaazi onin daayiza. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma Yesu ci kuuwawekuŋ naana o, nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ween Kiristo.”
44017004	Agamta ni ɔl ogɛn Yesu ceeze o lotento, ma aromonek niigi Pɔl been Silas. Ma buk atuwe ŋaai ci meel ci gɔɔn agayi niigi ɔla, kibeen ɔl ci meelik ole ween Garik o gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan niigi Jook gole o rɛɛn.
44017005	Maje bar ɔl ci Juz ogɛn amadiyit nɔɔgɔ, ma avɔ alota ɔl o gɔɔn olla awɔ kɔkɔm liŋliŋɔn ci agɔɔn, ma akat nɔɔgɔ ka kotobortek Pɔl ki Silas nɔŋ. Ivita ni iminaŋti kɔlɛ nici kaal kutura dook. Ma aŋozonek niigi ɔl korge o Jeson, eeci arɔɔŋ niigi Pɔl ki Silas ka kuduntak kɔlɛ bitaala.
44017006	Bar mazi ŋaan kojokta niigi nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante, utugurta niigi Jeson ɛlɛ kibeen ɔl o tuwento oogi, ma avɔyi nɔɔgɔ alaate o kuturo. Ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Pɔl ki Silas o gɔɔn uulal ɔl vitɛnane dook, inoko ivitayet niigi ageet kuture cinai o buk.
44017007	Ma aku atalna Jeson nɔɔgɔ ole onin. Inoko zin alaŋ azooni niigi lotinok o alaan o Rom adikir. Azi niigi nɛ, Abil alaani oman ci kazi Yesu.”
44017008	Mazi avɔ azii kɔlɛ kibeen alaat o kuturo zɔɔz nico, otoborit niigi nɔŋ.
44017009	Ma anyek alaata Jeson been ɔl o tuwento oogi kuruyit karama ci ka kuburucai. Mazi avɔ aruk niigi karama nico, uburuca ɔl nɔɔgɔ bitaala.
44017010	Mazi akɔ baalin lɔɔci, itoontek ɔl o tuwento Pɔl ki Silas gɔl kɔɔt kuture o kazi Bariya. Mazi avɔ arum ŋinite, ɔɔtɔ ceeze o Juz lotento.
44017011	Maje ɔl ŋinaante arɔɔŋ demziin ɔrɔɔt kujukit ɔl o Tɛsalonika, ma atalna niigi zɔɔz ci Pɔl ki Silas noko ɔrɔɔt. Ma gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ akɛɛp niigi waragɛ o Joowo ka kicinit zɔɔz o aduwa Pɔl mã een zɔɔz ceen didi.
44017012	Utuyɔ ni ɔl ci Juz meelik ŋaatineeŋ, ma atuwe buk ɔl ci mac ole ween Garik been ŋaai ci meelik ŋaane ci agayi ɔla.
44017013	Bar mazi azii ɔl o Juz abaak kuture o Tɛsalonika gi o uuwayi Pɔl zɔɔz o Joowo kuture o kazi Bariya, ivita niigi ŋinaante buk, ma avu akana kɔlɛ ka kɔɔt kigidit Pɔl.
44017014	Taman nɔkɔ itoonit ɔl o tuwento Pɔl kook liiltoga. Maje Silas been Timozi aavtiz niigi Bariya ŋina.
44017015	Ma ɔrkɔr ɔl ci itoonek Pɔl gɔl ki nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been kutur o kazi Atinas. Ma ŋinaante abadaak niigi Bariya anyaa otok ci itoona Pɔl arɔɔŋi Silas kibeen Timozi ka kɔɔt karabta nɔɔnɔ kataman.
44017016	Mazi ŋaan arɛ Pɔl Silas kibeen Timozi kuture o kazi Atinas nɔkɔ, icinun niini joowanɛ ci adilyai mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt ŋinaante. Otobor ni niini nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye nico.
44017017	Ma akɔ ceeze o lotento, ma akɔ adaŋɔ ki Juz kibeen modɛn o adiŋdiŋan Jook ŋinaante. Ma buk adaŋɔ niini tup ki ɔl o gɔɔn olla avunak ŋaami.
44017018	Ma buk adaŋɔ kibeen ɔl koogi o kazi Epikuran kibeen Sitowik ci gɔɔn adɛmɛz gɔnɔgi. Ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ anɔ nɛ, “Ma gi ci labak azee yeedinɛt noko arɔɔŋ kizi nɛ?” Bodo ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Coma inoko arɔɔŋ niini kuduwayet ageet zɔɔz ci akati joowanɛ ci modɛn koogi.” Anɔ niigi nɔkɔ o, eeci uuwak Pɔl zɔɔz ci akati Yesu kibeen ŋaazi onin daayiza.
44017019	Ooti ni niigi Pɔl, ma anyaak nɔɔnɔ ŋino gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl biye o kazi Arapagus. Ma ŋinaante enektek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Karooŋnya di ka kiziikta demziin ci colai anyaaket noko.
44017020	Eeci kaal ci aduwa noko ŋaan kiziikta laadun baale. Karooŋnya zin ka duwayet keŋti cigeec.”
44017021	Aje ɔl dook o abaak Atinasa kibeen ɔl o avu loocowe ogɛn aavtiz iinya dook ŋinaante olla aŋaam, arɔɔŋ ka kiziiyit demziinok ci colai.
44017022	Itiŋa ni Pɔl ibilun jena ɔl ci alotɛ biye ci Arapagus noko dook ŋuma. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kacinuŋ igeet ɔl ci Atinas noko eeginu ɔl ci adiŋdiŋanu joowanɛ ɔrɔɔt.
44017023	Eeci kotonowa naana kutur cunooŋ o dook, ma kicina vitɛn ci adiŋdiŋanu niiga joowanɛ o. Buk kojowa ŋino taabinto ayeedonek gi ci azi nɛ, “Ŋino jook o alaŋ agayi.” Ma zin jook ci adiŋdiŋanu ma alaŋ agayu o nɛɛn ci kaduwakuŋ igeet noko.
44017024	Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o ɛɛnyca looc dook kibeen kaal o ɛɛl loota dook. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ween Manyi o abal tammu taden ki looc. Alaŋ niini abaak ceezine ci ɛɛnyca ɔl ci deer kiyo joowanɛ ci adilyai o.
44017025	Ma alaŋ buk arɔɔŋ niini gi ci agoonek ɛɛti ci deer nɔɔnɔ, eeci nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o anyek eet ci deer rogɛt kibeen kaal dook.
44017026	Ma Jooi baale laadun ɔɔwa e ɛɛnyca eet codoi. Ma iiya ɛɛti nici itira modɛn dook. Ma anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ kabaayitɔ loocok dook. Maje laadun ruk maŋaan kɛtɛɛnya Jooi eet ci deer e, aga niini nɔkɔ katin iiten jaŋ kibeen ŋinḏaŋ ci ka kabaakti niigi.
44017027	Agɔɔn Jooi gi nico o, ka coma bac abaaban ɔl nɔɔnɔ, ma arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ, ma ajowa niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati olla amugi niigi gɔl onin. Maje zin bar buk giye ween didi Jooi alaŋ rɛɛn ŋaatinai.
44017028	Kiyo azi zɔɔz nɛ, “Jook nɛɛn ci ɛɛnycanet ageet keelit tɔ, kiziti ɔl ci deer koroget kɔtɔɔz dɛmdɛm o.” Buk gɔɔn beniinowa ugooc azi nɛ, “Keegin naaga dɔl ci Joowo.”
44017029	Zin giye o keeginɛ naaga dɔl ci Joowo, alaŋ abon ŋaati kanyekɛ naaga Jook kizi gi ci ɛɛnyca ɛɛti ceen arit warkinɛ, karabɔŋ een zurtɛnɛnɛ, karabɔŋ een biyɛnɛ.
44017030	Ma Jooi iinyaye o ŋaan kagayi ɔl nɔɔnɔ e apɛz kaal o agɔɔn ɔl gɛr labak. Bar zin inoko iricanek niini ɔl vitɛnane dook ka kabada niigi kotoŋit gɔl o gɛr.
44017031	Eeci Jooi erewun iiten ci ka kapayi niini ɔl dook payiin ci abil tɔp eete o ɛŋɛra niini ka kapak nɔɔgɔ. Eyelizak zin Jooi gi nico ɔl dook gole o itiŋawi niini eet nico daayiza.”
44017032	Mazi azii niigi zɔɔz o Pɔl akati ŋaazi daayiza, atararti ɔl ogɛn nɔɔnɔ. Maje bar ogɛn azi nɛ, “Karooŋnya di kiziikta zɔɔz nico bodo.”
44017033	Ɔɔtɔ ni Pɔl ŋaati lotento noko.
44017034	Ma aromonek ɔl ogɛn nɔɔnɔ, ma atuwe. Buk ŋaatineeŋ ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Donsis ci gɔɔn alotɛ ki ɔl biye ci kazi Arapagus noko, kibeen ŋaa ci kazi Damaris, kibeen ɔl oogi.
44018001	Ma vurta otoŋ Pɔl Atinas ook kuture o kazi Korintiya.
44018002	Ma ŋinaante urumtɔ ki eet ceen Juz kazi Akila ci aritai looce o kazi Pantas. Ɔrkɔra niini kibeen ŋaa cin kazi Parsila looce o kazi Italiya avunak Korintiya, eeci baale alaani o adikir kazi Kaladiyas ɔtɔɔk ɔl o Juz dook kuture o kazi Rom abil Italiya. Ma akɔ Pɔl ka kook kicin nɔɔgɔ.
44018003	Ma akɔ abaak ŋaatineeŋ, ma aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔgɔ, eeci gɔɔn ajowa niini guruc ci adayin o ŋaati aloli kɛɛmanɛ kiyo niigi o.
44018004	Ma iinyaye o yubzento dook akɔ gɔɔn niini ceeze o lotento, ma akɔ azɔɔzɔ ki ɔl ŋinaante. Arɔɔŋ niini ka kɛtɛɛza ɔl o Juz kibeen Garik zooze ci ka kutuyi niigi Yesu.
44018005	Mazi arum Silas kibeen Timozi looc ŋaao avuni niigi looce o kazi Masidoniya, odoma Pɔl uuwak iinya dook. Ayelek niini ɔl o Juz gi o ɛɛnɛ Yesu Kiristo o arɛ niigi nɛɛn.
44018006	Mazi avɔ abor niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aduwak kaal ci gɛr, ɛbɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ ŋaati ajulan tuduwac rumanene ogin, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã akolonenu gole o Joowo, ijinit eleeti ugooc maany. Maje naana kuduwayuŋ igeet. Inoko zin kawɔ naana kakɔ kuuwawei zɔɔz o Joowo ɔl ween modɛn.”
44018007	Ɔtɔɔ ni Pɔl otoŋ nɔɔgɔ, ma akɔ abaak ceeze ci eet ceen modɛn kazi Titos Justus ci gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan Jook. Ma ceez ci eet nico noko apadanɔ ki ceez o lotento.
44018008	Maje Karispas ween alaan o ceez o lotento agama buk niini Jook kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook. Buk ɔl ogɛnɛ kutura iziiyit zɔɔz o Joowo. Utuyɔ ni niigi, makacin otoonycɛ.
44018009	Ma baaline oman uwunozɛ Pɔl. Anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ wunozyai nɛ, “Má aŋole looc. Bar mɛda wayiz calaŋ abil.
44018010	Eeci karomɛ naana kibeen ineet, ma akɔm eet ci ka kutuguweyin ineet gi ci gɛr, eeci kuture nico kanyei ɔl cigan meelik.”
44018011	Abaawun ni Pɔl ŋinaante irkit codoi kibeen nyɛlɔwɛ tɔrkɔnɔm, ma ademzek ɔl zɔɔz o Joowo.
44018012	Ma waano ɛɛnɛ Galiyo alaan ci abal looc ci kazi Garik neke, ulute ɔl o Juz ŋaatodoi, ma avu agam Pɔl, ma avɔyi ceeze o roonnyo.
44018013	Ma akɔlak nɔɔnɔ rooni alaane ci kazi Galiyo noko zooze ci anɛ niigi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici arɔɔŋ ka kanyek ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit Jook gole ci aŋɔrɔwɔ kibeen lotinok ogaacak.”
44018014	Mazi arɔɔŋ kɔzɔɔz Pɔl, enek Galiyo ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Matɛ waan ɛɛti ci anyaanu noko kutugu didi gi ci gɛr oma, kaziiŋnuŋ waan igeet.
44018015	Bar mazi een olla daŋɔn ci zoozo, ma akati zaar ci ɔl oogi, been lotinok ugoocok doon, ɔɔtɔ iroonit niiga maany. Alaŋ naana kawɔyɛ tɔ.”
44018016	Ɔtɔɔk ni niini nɔɔgɔ kudunit ceeze o roonnyo.
44018017	Enico agamit niigi dook eet o kazi Sosenis ween alaan o ceez o lotento, ma adɔɔk nɔɔnɔ ceez o roonnyo bitaala. Maje Galiyo apɛz gi nico labak.
44018018	Ma aromɛ Pɔl kibeen ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Korintiya iinya ci meel. Ma vurta ɔtɔɔ, ma akɔ atɔɔt kavool ɔrkɔr niini kibeen Akila been Parsila avɔ looce o kazi Siriya. Maje rak ma ŋaan kɔtɔɔt niini kavool kuture o kazi Senkiya e, akoc rak ɔɔ, eeci aterkedek niini Jook gi ci ka kutuguwek.
44018019	Mazi avɔ arum niigi kutur o kazi Evesos, otoŋek Pɔl Akila kibeen Parsila ŋinite. Ook niini ceeze o lotento, ma akɔ azɔɔzɔ kibeen ɔl o Juz.
44018020	Ma arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaavu rak ŋinti rɛɛn, bar ajura niini.
44018021	Mazi awɔ, enek ɔl nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋnyan tɛ Jooi kabada, ŋaan kabadakuŋ.” Ma enice otoodun kavool ŋinaante idiceya.
44018022	Mazi akɔ arum kutur o kazi Sisiriya, idicek ook Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ azaa ɔl o tuwento ŋinaante. Ma bodo adicek akɔ Antiyokti.
44018023	Mazi akɔ adica iinya ci miliny ŋinaante, ɔɔtɔ bodo ook looce o kazi Galatiya kibeen Pijiya, ma akɔ ilot niini ɔl o tuwento dook ŋinaante ka kodoyit tuwɛnta.
44018024	Maje iinyaye niceke anyak eet ceen Juz kazi Apolos akunak Evesos. Aritai niini kuture ci kazi Alikzandariya. Niini eet ci aganek zɔɔz ɔrɔɔt, ma aga buk waragɛ o Joowo ɔrɔɔt.
44018025	Ɛdɛmɛz baale niini gɔl o Joowo, ma agawun juruŋ. Ma uuwak gɔɔn niini zɔɔz o Joowo zinize onin dook, ma ademzek ɔl gi o akati Yesu juruŋ. Bar zin olla aga niini onyɛn o Jɔn doon, ma ŋaan kaga ŋaazi o Yesu daayiza.
44018026	Mazi akɔ azii Akila kibeen Parsila nɔɔnɔ azɔɔz moozɛta ceeze o lotento, ooti nɔɔnɔ ɔlɔ, ma avɔ oobek kaal koogi ci akati gɔl o Joowo juruŋ.
44018027	Ma vurta orooŋun Apolos ka kook looce o kazi Garik. Ma atirit ɔl o tuwento nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ayɛɛdi waragɛ ci ka konyowozek niini ɔl o tuwento looce o kazi Garik ka kataltai ɔl nɔɔnɔ. Mazi akɔ arum looc, ook itirit ɔl o anyek Jooi dɛtɛn onin ka kutuyɔ ŋaati adaŋɔn niini kibeen ɔl o Juz kɔla. Ma atɛɛza niini nɔɔgɔ daŋonte nico gole ci ayelzɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ waragewe o Joowo Yesu nɛɛn ween Kiristo.
44019001	Mazi ŋaan aavi Apolos kuture o kazi Korintiya, ɛɛrɔn Pɔl, ma akɔ adiir loocok ci meel, ma akɔ zɛɛ been kutur o kazi Evesos. Ma iitene oman ojowa niini ŋinaante ɔl ci tuwento koogi.
44019002	Ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim yo mã atuwenu e, iiyayuŋ Vɔŋiz o Joowo?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan buk laadun kiziikta zɔɔz ci akati Vɔŋiz ci Joowo.”
44019003	Ma ajin Pɔl nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mazin da oonyenu ku waanice?” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Koonyena naaga gole baal ademzek Jɔn ɔl baal oony niini e.”
44019004	Ma anek Pɔl nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mazin toonyɛnɛt o Jɔn baale akati ɔl o abada oŋene ugeec. Ma waanice aduwak Jɔn ɔl o Israyil ka kutuweec eet o anowa nɔɔnɔ vurta. Zin ɛɛti nica Yesu nɛɛn.”
44019005	Mazi akɔ azii niigi zɔɔz nico, otoonycɛ niigi zaare o Manyi Yesu.
44019006	Mazi ataadek Pɔl nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn, iiyak nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma azɔɔz niigi zooze calaŋ agayi, ma buk uuwak niigi zɔɔz o Joowo.
44019007	Een ɔl ci baal akunak Vɔŋizi o Joowo neke amɔtɔ ram.
44019008	Ma abaak Pɔl ŋinaante nyɛlɔwɛ iiyu, ma gɔɔn akɔ niini ceeze o lotento, ma azɔɔzɔ kibeen ɔl moozɛta. Azɔɔzɔ niini kibeen nɔɔgɔ arɔɔŋ ka kɛtɛɛza nɔɔgɔ zooze o akati baliin o Joowo.
44019009	Maje ɔl oogi ŋaatineeŋ adɔi zinzeeti kak calaŋ atuwe. Ma bar azɔɔz niigi kaal ci gɛr ci akani gɔl o Joowo ɔl dook ŋuma. Udunai ni Pɔl ɔl o tuwento ceeze o lotento, ma akɔyi nɔɔgɔ ceeze ci eet o kazi Tiranas demziinto, ma gɔɔn akɔ ilot niini nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante tup.
44019010	Ma adɛmɛz Pɔl ɔl ŋinaante irkitok ram. Ma enice ɔl o Juz been modɛn dook o abaak looce o kazi Asiya iziiyit zɔɔz o akati Manyi Yesu.
44019011	Ma iinyaye niceke anyek Jooi Pɔl kutugu kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
44019012	Akɔ zɛɛ mayo nuun een rumanɛ ogin acabi ɔɔ kibeen o acabi barkɔny avɔyi ɔl ole o amɔɔr, ma anyek rumanɛ nicigi nɔɔgɔ korogit moorizowɛ, ma buk atɔɔk miniŋ o Loryento gɛr ŋaatineeŋ.
44019013	Ma anyak ɔl oogi ole o Juz ci azɔp looc gɔɔn ŋaati atɔɔyi miniŋ o Loryento ɔla. Orooŋit ni buk niigi katamanit kutuguzɔ kaal nicoko zaare o Manyi Yesu. Ma anek niigi miniŋ o Loryento nɛ, “Karicanekuŋ igeet zaare o Yesu o gɔɔn uuwak Pɔl ka aaryai eete nico.”
44019014	Maje ŋinaante anyak alaan ci ceez o Joowo ci kazi zaar nɛ Sikiva. Anyak niini lɔgɔz torgɛrɛm. Ma lɔgɔz ciginɛ noko agɔɔn buk gɔɔn kaal nicoko.
44019015	Ma iitene oman arɔɔŋ kaarya miniŋit ci Loryento eete oman. Bar anek miniŋit nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaga naana Yesu kibeen Pɔl. Mazi yo niiga eeginu ɔljaŋ?”
44019016	Ma aŋozonek ɛɛti ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento noko nɔɔgɔ, ma adɔɔk nɔɔgɔ kanyayit tobɛ, ma arɛɛc rumanɛ ugeec lai. Omogun niini nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt. Ma avir niigi ole ci eet nico o.
44019017	Mazi azii ɔl o Juz kibeen modɛn dook o abaak ŋinaante gi nico, anyayit ŋoliin, ma atitiny niigi zaar o Manyi Yesu ɔrɔɔt.
44019018	Ma avu ɔl ci tuwento meelik, ma abɔrak kɔlɛ kaal ugeec gɛr baal gɔɔn agɔɔn e.
44019019	Ma anyaa ɔl ci meel ole o tuwento baal gɔɔn agɔɔn ŋarizɛt e waragɛnya ugeec ŋarizetu, ma avu avaat ɔl kɔrgɛna. Maje guruca ci baal ataalan ɔl waragɛnya nicoko o mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ (50,000).
44019020	Ma kaala ci adɔi baal agooni iitene nice neke anyek ɔl ci meel kutuweec Jook, ma anyek ɔl o tuwento kodoyit tuwente uneeŋ.
44019021	Mazi akɔ odotiz kaal nici, orooŋun Pɔl kimiire kook Jerusalɛma ka kook rak kidiir looc o kazi Masidoniya kibeen Garik, ma adicek been Jerusalɛm. Ma azi niini nɛ, “Katin ma kook kuruma Jerusalɛm, kadicei kakɔ kuture o kazi Rom”
44019022	Itoonun ni niini Timozi kibeen Erastus o gɔɔn atirit niigi nɔɔnɔ liŋliŋɔnta karaktɛ kɔɔt looce o kazi Masidoniya, ma akɔ amɔn rak niini iinya ci miliny looce o kazi Asiya.
44019023	Ma iinyaye niceke anyawun macuconɛt ci appe kuture o kazi Evesos zooze ci demziin o akati gɔl o Joowo.
44019024	Ŋinaante anyak eet ceen arit ci dediinto kazi zaar nɛ Dimitiros. Ɛɛnyca gɔɔn niini ceezi ci miliny ziiyi ci atobzek ceez o adikir o jook o kazi Artimis. Ma gɔɔn ataalinɛ niini ceezi nicoko, ma anyaak liŋliŋɔnti nicini nɔɔnɔ been ɔl o aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔnɔ guruc ci meelik gɛr.
44019025	Olota ni niini ɔl ogin aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔnɔ dook kibeen ɔl koogi o aliŋliŋ liŋliŋɔn ci atobɔ kibeen liŋliŋɔn cin o ŋaatodoi. Ma aku anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔl ogan, agayu niiga arɔkzɛt cinai o aku liŋliŋonte cinai noko.
44019026	Inoko zin icintu, ma iziiktu niigalya gi o agɔɔn ɛɛti o kazi Pɔl. Azi niini nɛ, “Joowanɛ ci adila ɛɛti ci deer o alaŋ een joowanɛ ceen didi.” Ma ɛtɛɛza niini ɔl ci meel kuture nico kibeen looce o kazi Asiya dook.
44019027	Zin giye nico anyek katin niigi liŋliŋɔn cinai noko kizi gi ci labak. Alaŋ een zin bar liŋliŋɔn cinai o doon, bar buk anyek iima ceez o jook o kazi Artimis kizi gi ci labak. Jooi ci titiny gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan ɔl Asiyakti kibeen loocok dook noko ɛpɛzɛ katin.”
44019028	Mazi azii ɔl zɔɔz nico, otoborit nɔŋ, ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Adiŋdiŋ jooi onaaŋ kazi Artimis doon o aavi Evesosa.”
44019029	Ilorit ni ɔl dook kutura bornɛt nɔŋa, ma avɔ agam eet ci kazi Gayus kibeen Aristarkos ceen ɔl ceen Masidoniyɛt baal gɔɔn ɔrkɔr kibeen Pɔl. Ma agurut nɔɔgɔ avɔyi ŋaao gɔɔn lotento adikir.
44019030	Maje Pɔl alya arɔɔŋ kook ŋaati lotento neke buk. Alamit ni bar ɔl o tuwento nɔɔnɔ.
44019031	Ma itoonak alaata ogɛnɛ ole o loocu een laŋotigin nɔɔnɔ otok ka calaŋ ayelza ɛlɛ ŋaao alotɛn ɔl.
44019032	Ma amacucɔ ɔl o alotɛ iitene nice ɔrɔɔt, ma olla awalwal niigi dook. Ɔl ogɛn agɛrɛny aduwa gi oma, bodo ogɛn agɛrɛny aduwa gi cineeŋ doon, zɛɛ ma alaŋaan buk ɔl ci meel ŋaatineeŋ aga gi ci tɛ laadun alotan niigi ŋaatodoi o.
44019033	Ŋinaante anyak eet ceen Juz kazi Alikzandar, ma anyek ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ kitiŋa kibil ɔl ŋuma. Ma abaaban ɔl ogɛn anɛ, Coma anyak zɔɔz nico niini, eeci een niini eet ci Juz. Ma ajaŋan niini ɔl ŋaati adɔŋi aziit arɔɔŋ ka kɔzɔɔz kenek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ilori nico alaŋ akana ɔl o Juz.”
44019034	Bar mazi iiyez niigi nɔɔnɔ izi eet ci Juz, egerenyit bodo niigi dook ziik ram anɔ nɛ, “Adiŋdiŋ jooi onaaŋ Artimis aavi Evesosa doon.”
44019035	Ma vurta ajaŋan alaani o kuturo ɔl, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeeta ɔl o Evesoso, aga ɔl dook nɔkɔ kuturi cinai kazi Evesos noko anyak ceez o Artimis o adiŋdiŋ kibeen bɛ baal iina tamma e.
44019036	Akɔm zin eet ci ka kadaŋ gi nico. Abon zin di ativaninu calaŋ agoonu gi ci gɛr.
44019037	Anyaanu niiga ɔl nicoko ŋina gaga nɔkɔ, eeci ŋaan bac nuun kogorozit kaal o ɛɛl ceeze o joowanɛ ogaac, ma akɔm buk gi ci gɛr aduwak jook onai kazi Artimis.
44019038	Mã arɔɔŋ tɛ Dimitiros kibeen ɔl o aliŋliŋ ki nɔɔnɔ kɔkɔltak eet oma rooni, anyak iinya o roonnyo tɔ, ma anyak buk alaat o roonnyo. Abon zin akɔlɔ niigi roonnyok iinyaye niceke.
44019039	Mazi bar tɛ anyaku gi oma ci appe kujuk zɔɔz nico, abona zin anyeku ɔl dook kutura kolotai ka kozoozit gi nico.
44019040	Eeci giye ci agoonu waanico noko, anyet tedec alaata o Rom kiziti ɔl ci kilor bornɛt nɔŋa o nɛɛn naaga, ma akɔm inoko eet ci ka kuduwa kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci agɛrnyi ɔl o.”
44019041	Mazi akɔ odotiz zɔɔza, azaan niini ɔl.
44020001	Mazi akɔ ajaŋani gernyi, otowa Pɔl ɔl o tuwento, ma adizkek nɔɔgɔ tuwɛnta, ma anek nɛ, “Abona, kɔtɔɔwa zin naana.” Idicek ni niini ook looce o kazi Masidoniya.
44020002	Ma akɔ azɔp looc nice dook, ma adizkek ɔl ŋinaante zoozowe o Joowo. Ma akɔ zɛɛ been Garik.
44020003	Mazi akɔ arum niini Garik, ook ɔmɔn ŋinaante nyɛlɔwɛ iiyu. Mazi arɔɔŋ kitiŋa kook Siriyakti, iziik niini ɔl o Juz areyi arɔɔŋ ka kuruyit nɔɔnɔ. Zin giye nico imiire niini, ma akɔ adiir Masidoniya.
44020004	Ɔrkɔr niini kibeen Sopater ween ŋɛɛrti Pirus o aku kuture o kazi Bariya, ki Aristarkos, ki Sekundus o avu kuture o kazi Tɛsalonika, ki Gayus o aku kuture o kazi Darbi, ki Ticikos, ki Tovimas o avu looce o kazi Asiya, been Timozi.
44020005	Ma araki niigi ŋaatineeŋ, ma avɔ areyet kuture o kazi Toras.
44020006	Mazi akɔ idicai iiteni o gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl adayi ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, kotooda kavool kuture o kazi Vilipiya, ma kawoya liila iinya tur zɛɛ ma kavɔ karumnya nɔɔgɔ kuture o kazi Toras. Ŋinaante kɔmɔnta iinya torgɛrɛm.
44020007	Ma yomana iitene ween Sabit kulutewa naaga ka kadakta dayiin o laŋotizetu kaadana daayiz o Yesu. Ma uuwak Pɔl zɛɛ been baalin kɛŋ, eeci arɔɔŋ ka kɔɔtɔ ŋeeretine ci aalna o.
44020008	Maje lambɛta ci meelik alanyit ceeze ci wun kalotena o. Ɛɛnyci ceez nici gɔɔn tadena.
44020009	Maje buk ŋinaante anyak logo ci kazi Yutikus aavi niini nyapildiŋa. Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Pɔl nɔkɔ, uduŋun logoti nici zɛɛ makacin ɛtɛɛda ooŋnya. Ma iina kuruk looc ceez eci bitaalu e. Mazi avɔ adɔŋa ɔl nɔɔnɔ, bar adaawa.
44020010	Ma aduŋna Pɔl ceez tadena akunak looc, ma uubononek nɔɔnɔ, ma atorkot nɔɔnɔ, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Má atiranyu gaga. Ŋaan arogi niini bodo labak.” Zin didi orok logoti.
44020011	Ma amiironek Pɔl ceez tadena bodo, ma akɔ adak ḏokoc o adaan daayiz o Yesu. Ma azɔɔz Pɔl ŋinti wun zɛɛ makacin aal tammu. Ɔɔtɔ ni niini.
44020012	Ooti ni ɔl logo ona iina e ɔlɔ. Ma atalnɛ niigi ɔrɔɔt, eeci urugun niini bodo.
44020013	Ma karayina naaga rak kavoola kavoya kuture o kazi Asos ka kook kamadawet Pɔl ŋinaante. Anyet ageeta karaktewa, maje niini arɔɔŋ ka kɔɔtɔ zɔɔnɛ zɛɛ been ŋinite.
44020014	Mazi akɔ amadanet niini ageeta Asosa, kɔrkɔrta naaga dook ki nɔɔnɔ kavoola, ma kadiceka kavoya kuture o kazi Mitilin.
44020015	Ma iitene co ŋinaante kidiceya bodo zɛɛ ma kavɔ karumnya looc o kazi Ciyas. Bodo iitene co kivitaya kutur o kazi Samos. Ma kadiceka kavoya kuture o kazi Miletus.
44020016	Eeci Pɔl alaŋ arɔɔŋ koota Evesosa. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ kidica iinya ci meel Asiyakti. Arɔɔŋ niini kiyiik kook karaba iiten o Pintikos Jerusalɛma.
44020017	Itoonek ni Pɔl otok alaat o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Evesos ka kivita kurumtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ kuture ci kazi Miletus o.
44020018	Mazi avɔ arum niigi looc, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Agayu inoko gɔl ci baayiz can kabaai o nɔkɔ, eeci koromtɛ naaga ki igeet waanbaal kakunakuŋ looce ci kazi Asiya noko zɛɛ been inoko o.
44020019	Iinyaye niceke dook kaliŋliŋ naana kizi gabaren ci Joowo calaŋ kadoŋ ɛlɛ. Aciritnan gɔɔn aneet ziniz liŋliŋonte can noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma akunakan gɔɔn piryakzɛt gole ci arɔɔŋ kuruktan ɔl o Juz.
44020020	Ma agayu buk iinya baal kuuwawekuŋ zɔɔz o Joowo e, akɔm gi ci karooduŋ kaale o kacin naana aganɔ ŋaati kaduwakuŋ igeet dook ka kitirituŋ. Ma kademezuŋ kɔla ki korogjowe ugooc.
44020021	Ma kiloti ɔl o Juz kibeen modɛn buk ɔrɔɔt ka kabada niigi oŋene ugeec kivitak Jook ka kutuweec niigi Manyi onai Yesu.
44020022	Ma zin gole o kaziiŋnɛ Vɔŋiz o Joowo, kakɔ naana Jerusalɛma. Alaŋ kaga gi ci akɔ agoononekan ŋinaante.
44020023	Olla kaga aduwakan gɔɔn Vɔŋizi o Joowo aneeta kuturyowe o kakɔyɛ dook gi ci kakɔ kanyayɛ tiŋeere piryakzɛt been cabiin Jerusalɛma.
