47012018	Karicanei waanice Titos kook ŋaatunooŋ, ma buk kitoon gɔtɔna oma ci tuwento korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ. Ma Titos ook alabawuŋ? Bar kanɛ, Akɔm! Eeci aneet ki Titos arayinet ageeta dook Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma kaliŋliŋnya liŋliŋɔn codoi.
47012019	Karabɔŋ bar abaabanu niiga aniyu nɛ, Kanyeka naaga eleeti kobonta ŋaatunooŋ doon. Akɔm kina! Kaduwana naaga kaal nicoko dook ŋume o Joowo eo ɔl o didi oromtozek Kiristo. Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, ma kaala dook o kagoona naaga, kagoona ka kitirituŋ igeet.
47012020	Kaŋole naana ŋaati kakɔ kacinuŋ igeet, ma kajowanuŋ abaaku baayiz ci aŋɔrɔwɔ ki o karooŋekuŋ naana igeet abaakti. Bodo buk kaŋole ŋaati kakunakuŋ igeet, ma kagernyekuŋ gole calaŋ arooŋnyu niiga. Kaŋole buk ŋaati kamadanuŋ igeet anyaku daŋɔn, ki madkɔn, ki bornɛt nɔŋ, ki ŋɛrɔn, ki momoz, ki ŋɔmtiin, ki eleeti doŋiin, been yawyawitin.
47012021	Kaŋole karabɔŋ tiŋeere acɛlbɛzanan Jooi aneet ŋaatunooŋ kutulu ɔrɔɔt ŋaati kajowanɛ ɔl ci meelik ŋaatunooŋ ŋaan agɔɔn kaalyan ci gɛr ki waaŋzɛt, ma ŋaan kotoŋit kaal ci gɛr nɔkɔ.
47013001	Baale rak koowa ŋaatunooŋ lak ram. Inoko zin . tiŋeere ma kakunakuŋ enico, izi koca kuni ci kaku kacinuŋ igeet lak iiyu. Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Mã agɔɔn ɛɛti gi ci gɛr, alaŋ akɔlyak nɔɔnɔ rooni dooke coma anyak bacok ceen ram karabɔŋ een iiyu ci icinit eet nico ŋaati didi agɔɔnɛ gi nico.”
47013002	Iiten baal karomɛn ki igeet e, kitilowa rak ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn oŋɛ ŋaatunooŋ dook ka calaŋ amɛna niigi oŋɛnɛ. Bodo zin inoko kiloti ni nɔɔgɔ kɛdɛyai nɔkɔ. Ma kakɔ tiŋeere ŋaatunooŋ, kakɔ kagerenyei ɔl dook o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr baale kibeen buk inoko o.
47013003	Arooŋnyu niiga agaac karabɔŋ didi kazooz naana zɔɔz dɔyize o Kiristo abil ŋaatan. Ŋaan zin avɔ agayu gi nico iiten ci kakɔyɛ ŋaatunooŋ e, eeci Kiristo o aliŋliŋ zinzeetine ugoocok alaŋ azeei nɔɔnɔ dɔyizi, bar anyak niini dɔyiz ci aliŋliŋi ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
47013004	Ŋɛdɛt iiten baal adɔdi ɔl nɔɔnɔ e alaŋ anyak dɔyiz, bar zin inoko arogi niini dɔyize o Joowo. Mazin buk naaga o koromtozeya nɔɔnɔ, yo nuun akɔmnet dɔyiz, karugna naaga kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ma kanyaka dɔyiz o Joowo ka kegernycekuŋ naaga igeet.
47013005	Ataŋaamtek zin eleeti cugoocok o maany ka agaac niiga karabɔŋ didi oromtozeyu Kiristo tuwɛnta, karabɔŋ ŋaane. Mazi anyaktu tuwɛn, agaac aavi Kiristo tɔ ŋaatunooŋ.
47013006	Bar kanɛ agayu buk niiga kataŋaamteya naaga eleeti, ma kagaya didi aavi Kiristo tɔ ŋaatinaaŋ o.
47013007	Kajina zin naaga Jook ka calaŋ agoonu niiga kaal ci gɛr. Alaŋ zin bar kajina Jook kaal nicoko o ka keyeliztawa gi o karomɛna naaga ki Kiristo, bar kajina o ka utuguz niiga kaal ci abon, mayo nuun tɛ aŋaamneketu niiga ageeta kizik keegina kaal ci labak.
47013008	Alaŋ naaga kanimnya kutuguza gi ci aŋɔrɔwɔ ki zɔɔz o Joowo een didi, bar olla naaga karooŋnya kuzuuta zɔɔz onin.
47013009	Mã akɔmnet ageeta dɔyiz, ma bar adoŋnu niiga, katalnina naaga ɔrɔɔt. Ma kajina Jook ka odoyit niiga tuwɛnta juruŋ.
47013010	Gi zin ci kayeedekuŋ igeet waragɛ nico ŋaati kadɛwɔn o nɛɛn, ka ma kakunakuŋ ka calaŋ kagerenyekuŋ igeet ɔrɔɔt dɔyize o anyan Jooi. Eeci anyan Jooi aneet dɔyiz nico o ka kitirituŋ igeet, alaŋ bar ka kuulaluŋ.
47013011	Gɔtɔnɔga o tuwento, inoko zin kaṯornɛkɛ ŋina. Ooritnɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ka odoyit tuwɛnta juruŋ. Iziiyit kaal ci kaduwakuŋ noko juruŋ ka utuguz. Má adaŋonu, bar abaayit juruŋ ganɔnta. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, aromenu koca didi ki Jook o anyek ɔl rɛɛzɔnɛt ki ganɔn.
47013012	Azaayɔ gɔɔn niiga dook reezonte o Joowo. Azaayuŋ zin buk igeet ɔl o tuwento dook ŋaato.
47013013	Abon bai dɛtɛni o Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo, ki reezinɛt o Joowo, been laŋotizɛt o Vɔŋiz onin aromenu ki igeet dook.
48001001	Aneeta Pɔl o kaŋɛryai kizi toonnyai. Alaŋ zin aŋɛranan ɛɛti ci deer, bar aŋɛranan Yesu Kiristo kibeen Jook ween baatinai baal iŋaani nɔɔnɔ daayiza e.
48001002	Naana kibeen ɔl o karomena ŋaato dook kazaayuŋ igeet bor o Joowo abaaku Galatiya ŋinaante.
48001003	Abon bai Jooi ween baatinai ki Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo anyuŋ igeet dɛtɛn been ganɔn.
48001004	Ma giye o ka korogti naaga kaale ci loocu gɛr noko, agama Kiristo daayiz ci adaakni niini baciinowe ogaac eo arɔɔŋi Jooi ween baatinai.
48001005	Abon zin abilna diŋdiŋɔni Joowa nɔkɔ kodot. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
48001006	Inoko abiirnan aneet ɔɔ ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye ci utuŋtu taman nɔkɔ Jook baal laadun otowawuŋ igeet bonate o Kiristo e. Ma bar ootu bodo kaviyawe ogɛn o.
48001007	Akɔm zin bar buk kaviyak oogi ceen didi, bar olla anyak ɔl oogi ci uulaluŋ igeet, ma arɔɔŋ kotoweec niigi kaviyak o Kiristo.
48001008	Mayo nuun da kuuwaweyuŋ naaga karabɔŋ een toonnyaiti ci Joowo, zɔɔz ci aŋɔrɔwɔ kibeen kaviyak o Joowo baal kuuwaweyuŋ naaga e, abon koca apayek Jooi nɔɔnɔ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
48001009	Inoko bodo kabɛdɛkɛ zɔɔz nico. Kanɛ mã anyak eet ci uuwaweyuŋ igeet zɔɔz ci aŋɔrɔwɔ kibeen baal kuuwawekuŋ naaga e, abon apayek Jooi nɔɔnɔ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
48001010	Alaŋ kaduwa zɔɔz nico o, ka kataltan ɔl ci deer, karabɔŋ ka kagawɛ ɔla. Akɔm! Bar kaduwa o ka katalɔ Jooi. Mã karooŋ ɔl kataltan aneet, alaŋ koca naana keen didi gabaren ci Kiristo.
48001011	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, karooŋnyuŋ igeet agaac kaviyawa ci kuuwai naana o alaŋ een zoozok ci avu eete ci deer.
48001012	Eeci alaŋ kajowa eete ci deer zoozok ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ. Ma bnk akɔm eet ci ademzekan aneet zoozok nicoko. Bar Yesu nɛɛn o ayelekan aneet kaviyak nicoko niini alye onin ɛlɛ.
48001013	Iziiktu ri niiga baayiz onan baal kabaayɛ waan baal ŋaan karicanɛ lotinok o ɔl ogan Juz e. Karican waanice naana lotinok niceke kibeen kɛɛranɛ o jijitigan ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk bul onan katobona dook. Gi baal zin kagidɛ ɔl o tuwento ɔrɔɔt kɔkɔmawan caki, ma karooŋ kuulali nɔɔgɔ lai e nɛɛn.
48001015	Ma kagoon kaal niceke neke, maje da bar Jooi ɛŋɛrawan aneet bonate onin laadun iŋaan kitiryai e, ka kiliŋliŋozek nɔɔnɔ.
48001016	Iiya ni niini eyelizayan aneet ŋɛɛrin, ka kuuwayek naana modɛn kaviyak ogin abon.
48001017	Ma ŋaan buk naana waanice kook Jerusalɛma ka kook kijin demziinok ole baal een toonnyak o Yesu laadun ɔɔwa ŋaatan e, bar waanice kakɔ looce o kazi Arabiya, ma bodo kabadai Damacik.
48001018	Mazi kakɔ kadica irkitok iiyu, kiiya ni koowa Jerusalɛma ka kook kagayowa ki Pitɔr, ma kakɔ kamon ŋaatin ŋinaante iinya amɔnki tur.
48001019	Ma iinyaye ci baal kamɔnɛ ŋaati Pitɔr neke, ŋaan kicin nuyak dook zɛɛ ma kacin Jemis ween gɔtɔni Manyi Yesu doon.
48001020	Kaduwakuŋ didi tammalya. Ma kaal ci kayeedekuŋ naana igeet noko dook kaal ceen didi, alaŋ kavɔlɔŋa.
48001021	Ma vurta kitiŋa koowa vitɛnane ogɛn looce o kazi Siriya been Silisiya.
48001022	Maje iinyaye niceke ɔl o tuwento abaak looce o kazi Judiya ŋaan kagayan niigi aneeta.
48001023	Bar olla da aziiŋnan niigi ɔla azi ɔl nɛ, “Ɛɛti baal gɔɔn agidet e, inoko niinilya buk uuwak kaviyak o Yesu baal gɔɔn arɔɔŋ kuturturɛn lai e.”
48001024	Ma waanice anaat niigi Jook ŋaatan giye ci kutuwɔyɛ o.
48002001	Mazi kakɔ kadica irkitok amɔtɔ wec, kimiirozeya bodo Jerusalɛm, korkorya kibeen Barnabas, ma kakɔyɛ buk Titos.
48002002	Akɔm eet ci awuyan aneet, bar kakɔ gole ci ayelzakan Jooi aneet kooyi. Ma kakɔ karumona kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento ŋaatinaaŋ doon, ma koobei nɔɔgɔ kaviyak o Joowo baal kuuwayei ɔl o alaŋ een Juz e. Kagoon gi nico o, eeci alaŋ karooŋ olla kadaktan zɔɔ tuu liŋliŋonte onan baal kagoon baale e zɛɛ been inoko o.
48002003	Maje bar ŋinaante anyak ɔl oogi ci alutɛnɛ eleeti kiziti ɔl ci atuwe. Ɔl nicigi ɔrkɔr gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ kibeen ɔl o atuwe kizi bar roote ka kicinit niigi gɔl o kabaai naaga ŋaaten Yesu. Ma arɔɔŋ niigi kadaŋteyet ageet lotinok ugeec. Arɔɔŋ niigi kadaŋtek Titos o korkorya been aneet teedinɛt, yo nuun een niini eet ci ɔl o kazi Garik o. Bar zin kotobora waanice naana zɔɔz nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma buk anuyan toonnyawa aneet zooze nico, eeci alaŋ karooŋnyuŋ naana igeet iziti bakbayɛ. Ma rogzɛn alaŋ aku teedinta karabɔŋ een lotinowe o Juz, bar aku ŋaati katuwi Yesu doon.
48002006	Ma alaata o kavu karumona ki nɔɔgɔ Jerusalɛma, akɔm gi ci kaŋorowona naana kibeen nɔɔgɔ, ma akɔm buk niigi gi ci colai aduwakan aneet liŋliŋɔnta kina, eeci atubuzet Jooi ageeta dook. Mayo nuun een niigi alaat ci adikir o aga buk niigi ɛŋɛrawan Jooi aneet.
48002007	Ma bar buk icinit niigi liŋliŋɔn o anyan Jooi aneet ka kuuwayɛkɛ ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz kaviyak ogin abon, kiyo buk anyek niini Pitɔr kuuwayek kaviyak ogin ɔl o Juz o.
48002008	Zin kiyo anyek Jooi Pitɔr dɔyize onin kizi toonnyai cin ole o Juz o, anyan buk niini aneet dɔyize onin kizi toonnyai cin ole o alaŋ eegin Juz.
48002009	Ma Pitɔr ki Jemis been Jɔn o eegin alaat o adikir agaac didi niigi anyan Jooi aneet liŋliŋɔn nico niini alya. Ma adizkeket niigi aneeta been Barnabas ka kemedawa naaga kuuwakteya ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz zɔɔz o Joowo nɔkɔ. Maje niigi uuwayek ɔl o Juz.
48002010	Ajinet zin waanice niigi olla gi codoi ci ka kitirita ɔl o amaat ŋaatineeŋ. Gi zin baal karooŋ buk laadun naana ɔrɔɔt e nɛɛn.
48002011	Mazi akɔ akunak Pitɔr kutur o kazi Antiyok, kegerenyeya naana nɔɔnɔ ɔl kebereca, eeci anyak niini gi ci abac ŋinaante.
48002012	Rak ɔɔwa azɔlɔ niini kibeen bor o tuwento alaŋ eegin Juz labak. Bar mazi avɔ avu ɔl ci atuwe een Juz atoona Jemis Jerusalɛma, aara niini ɛlɛ bitaala ole ona azɔlɔ e. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci aŋole ɔl ci tuwento een Juz o, eeci gɔɔn arican niigi teedinɛt ci ɔl ceen modɛn o.
48002013	Buk ɔl ceen Juz atuwe abaak Antiyokti ɔtɔŋɔltɛ buk niigi ɔl ci avu Jerusalɛma o kiyo Pitɔr o. Akɔ zɛɛ meen nuun Barnabas ɛlɛ ɔtɔŋɔlɛ buk niini nɔɔgɔ, makacin unuwun nɔɔgɔ.
48002014	Mazi kakɔ kaŋaamnei naana nɔɔgɔ, kacin abacit niigi demziinok o Joowo. Kegerenyeya ni Pitɔr kɔlɛ kɔrgɛna, kanei nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt niina een eet ci Juz. Bar zin iiten baale rak abaawu baayiz o ɔl o olla atuwe o alaŋ eegin Juz. Arooŋ zin bodo taman gɔl ci ka anyekɛ ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz kabaakti baayiz ci ɔl o Juz o naa?”
48002015	Ŋɛdɛt naaga karitai kiziti Juz, ma alaŋ katobɔ ki modɛn o oŋenu.
48002016	Kaga zin naaga ɛɛti ci deer alaŋ abona ŋume o Joowo giye ci agami niini lotinok ci ɔl o Juz, bar kaga abona ɛɛti ŋume o Joowo ŋaati atuwi Yesu Kiristo. Ma buk naana ki ineet katu Yesu Kiristo ka kanyet niini ageet kobonta Joowa ŋaaten tuwɛn, alaŋ een giye ci kazooni naaga lotinok o ɔl o Juz.
48002017	Mazi abaabanu niiga gɔl ci karomonɛkɛ naaga Yesu ka kobontai ŋume o Joowo o, bar kizik anyet ageet kutuguz oŋɛ kiyo modɛna o, anyceyu zin koca niiga Yesu kizi eet ci aliŋliŋ gɔl ci oŋecu. Alaŋ zin abil nɔkɔ.
48002018	Inoko bodo mã kamiire naana, ma kakɔ kagam lotinok o ɔl o Juz baal kotoŋa e, kabaca zin ri koca naana gɔl loror.
48002019	Inoko zin kotoŋa naana lotinok o Juz baal een daayiz e, ma kibila naana ŋaatineeŋ kiyo kadaawa o, ka karogek Jook doon.
48002020	Kotodoyewa naana ki Kiristo keete ween talakec, ma rogɛti ci karognɛ noko, alaŋ karugi naana doon, bar karognɛ Yesu o aavi ŋaatan. Ma rogɛti ci karognɛ naana loota ŋina noko, karugi ŋaaten tuwɛn o katuwɛ naana Yesu Kiristo ween Ŋɛɛrti Joowo o areezan aneet, ma adaai ŋaatan.
48002021	Alaŋ naana karooŋ kɛpɛz dɛtɛn o Joowo kizi gi ci labak. Mã da kanyek Jooi eet ci deer kobona ŋume onin lotinowe o Juz, adaawun zin da koca Kiristo gaga.
48003001	Igeet aliyak ci Galatiya coko, ŋɛnɛɛn ci iiya agaranyanuŋ tamarzɛta o? Ma baale kizik koobteyuŋ igeet zoozok o rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ŋaaten daayiz o Yesu Kiristo keete ween talakec.
48003002	Bodo karooŋ di kijinuŋ gi ce. Iiten baale akunakuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo e, eeci azoonu lotinok o Juz, yo da akunakuŋ giye baal iziiktu niiga kaviyak o Kiristo, ma utuyu?
48003003	Eeginu zin tarbalɛ nɔkɔ naa? Iiten baale rak akatawu niiga baayiz o colai dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Mayo inoko bodo orooŋtu abaayit dɔyize ci eleeti ugooc doon?
48003004	Ma kaala ci meel baal agoononekuŋ igeet noko dook ŋaatunooŋ kaal ci labak?
48003005	Inoko anyuŋ Jooi igeet Vɔŋiz onin, ma agɔɔn kaal ci ateeduŋ biye ŋaatunooŋ o, eeci azuunu lotinok o Juz? Akɔm kina! Agɔɔn niini kaal nicoko o, eeci iziiktu kaviyak ogin, ma utuyu niiga nɔɔnɔ.
48003006	Abaabanit di zɔɔz o akati Ibrayim. Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Baale anyek Jooi Ibrayim kizi eet ci abon ŋume onin e, eeci atuwe niini.”
48003007	Abon zin agayu niiga dɔl ci dɔl ci Ibrayim een didi nɛɛn ɔl o anyak tuwɛn.
48003008	Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz ci aduyai baale ci ka kanyekɛ niini modɛn dook kobonta ŋume onin tuwɛnta. Ma buk aduwak Jooi Ibrayim kaviyak ci abon anek nɛ, “Amayuwi katin modɛna dook poda ŋaaten ineet.”
48003009	Amayuk zin buk Jooi ɔl o atuwe inoko dook, kiyo baale amayuk niini Ibrayim tuwente onin e.
48003010	Ma ɔl o abaaban kizik bar ajowa niigi bonat ŋume o Joowo gole ci azooni lotinok, aavi toriin ŋaatineeŋ, eeci azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, “Mã ɛɛti calaŋ azooni kaal o aduwa lotinowa dook, aavi toriin o Joowo ŋaatin.”
48003011	Inoko zin kagaac naaga akɔm bodo eet ci abona ŋume o Joowo gole ci azooni lotinok o Juz, eeci azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, “Eet ci arogi dook nɛɛn ɛɛti ci abona ŋume o Joowo tuwɛnta.”
48003012	Mazin lotinowa alaŋ een tuwɛn nɛɛn. Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Mã azooni ɛɛti kaal o aduyai lotinowɛ dook kɔkɔm ci areyek nɔɔnɔ, arogi koca niini labak.” Bar zin akɔm eet ci anim kozooti lotinok dook, makacin alaŋaan lotinowa nici ɛɛla nɔɔnɔ.
48003013	Mazin giye o anyaaket lotinowa ageet toriin, iiya Kiristo orogozet ageet toriinte nico. Ooyi toriin onai niini, eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Atɔr Jooi ɔl o irimi keete ween talakec.”
48003014	Agooni gi nici o, ka buk ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz kojokta mayuwɛnɛt baal aterkedek Jooi Ibrayim e ŋaaten Kiristo, ka kojokta naaga tuwɛnta Vɔŋiz o Joowo aterkedek niini ɔl o atuwe.
48003015	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, karooŋnyuŋ di igeet ayabiztek zɔɔz nico baayiz onai ɔl o deer ɛlɛ. Gɔɔn ma arom ɔl raman gi cineeŋ, alaŋ bodo ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ uulal zɔɔz nico, karabɔŋ bar azaac giye oman.
48003016	Baale eterkedek Jooi zɔɔz onin Ibrayim been dole ci dole cin. Alaŋ abuuŋ waragɛwi o Joowo gi ci akati dɔl ci dɔl ci Ibrayim meelik, bar abuuŋ gi ci akati dole codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ dolene ci dɔl ci Ibrayim. Zin dole nico nɛɛn Kiristo.
48003017	Waanice zin aterkedek Jooi Ibrayim zɔɔz onin, ma aricanek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kagoonekin waanma igeet gi nico.” Ma vurta mazi akɔ adicai irkitowa ceen eet tur lak wec ki tiin eetoma kamɔtɔ (430), itoonak Jooi ɔl o Juz lotinok. Ma lotinowa nicaga alaŋ anyak niigi dɔyiz ci ka kuulalti zɔɔz ci baal aterkedek Jooi Ibrayim neke.
48003018	Eeci waan da keterkedek Jooi Ibrayim gi ci abon gole ci azooni niini lotinok, alaŋ waan zin koca bodo gi ci abon aku terkediinte onin. Bar zin kaga naaga ɔrɔɔt waanice iiya anyek Jooi Ibrayim kaal o eterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ, eeci baale eterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ laadun.
48003019	Mazin da laadun Jooi anyek ɔl lotinok o naa? Anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ lotinok niceke o olla azaacek terkediin vurta, ka rak keyelek nɔɔgɔ baciinok nɛɛn kalakaz zɛɛ ma akɔ aku dole ci baal atɛrkɛt niini o. Anyaa zin waanice lotinok niceke toonnyawa o Joowo, ma avu anyek niigi eet ci kazi Mosis ka kiiya kuduwak niini ɔl.
48003020	Gɔɔn laadun ma aŋɛrɔ ɔl kizi kɔlɛ, abon anyak eet ci abil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ka kɔzɔɔzi niini nɔɔgɔ. Bar zin Jooi adoye niini ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
48003021	Mayo inoko zɔɔz nici akati gi ci lotinowa bodo amarnin kaal baal atɛrkɛt Jooi niini maany e? Akɔm kina! Mã da lotinowa nica kanyayit dɔyiz ci arogzi ɔl, ajowa waan koca ɔl bonat ŋume o Joowo giye ci azooni niigi lotinok nicoko.
48003022	Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, “Abal oŋɛci ɔl o loocu dook," ka kanyozozek mayuwɛnɛt o Joowo baal atɛrkɛt e ɔl o atu Yesu Kiristo.
48003023	Baale zin iŋaan kiiya gɔl o tuwento e, acabjet waanice ageet lotinowa ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma aku ayelzai gɔl o tuwento.
48003024	Olla zin waanice lotinowa anyoneket ageet ka kuzuutet zɛɛ mazi akɔ aku Yesu Kiristo ka kiiya kanyet niini ageet kobonta ŋume o Joowo tuwɛnta.
48003025	Inoko zin waazine nico iiyayet gɔl ci tuwento, alaŋaan bodo naaga kabaak dɔyize ci lotinowu.
48003026	Inoko zin niiga dook izitu dɔl ci Joowo giye o utuyu Kiristo.
48003027	Mazin niiga o otoonycewu, oromtozeyu Kiristo, ma eeltu niiga kiyo niini o.
48003028	Ɔkɔma zin bodo inoko ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ole o Juz been ole o alaŋ eegin Juz. Ma buk ɔkɔma ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci eet ci ceen gabaren been eet calaŋ een gabaren. Ma akɔm buk ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci eet ci mac ki ŋaa. Odoyewu niiga dook ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo tuwɛnta.
48003029	Zin mã izitu niiga ɔl ci Kiristo didi, izitu koca niiga dɔl ci dɔl ci Ibrayim, ma buk ojoktawu koca niiga mayuwɛnɛt baal aterkedek Jooi nɔɔnɔ e.
48004001	Anycaŋ di bodo koobeyuŋ kaal nicoko gole oman. Abil zɔɔz nici kiyo logoti o ŋaan miliny, ma ooŋnak baatinɛ kaal o. Zin mayo nuun aga ɔl nɔɔnɔ een eet o tiŋeere arigiz kaal o baatin nɛɛn o, azooni rak kaal cigin o ki nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ ɔl ogɛn. Ma aavi rak niini kiyo gabarɛnti o zɛɛ ma akɔ adikir.
48004003	Kɛɛl zin buk baale naaga nɔkɔ ɛlɛ. Baale iŋaan kagaac gɔl ween didi e, keegin naaga gabara ci abalet kaal o loocu.
48004004	Bar zin akɔ mazi aku iitene baal arek Jooi e, itoonak niini ŋɛɛrin looc kiiya kitiryai ŋaawa kiyo ɛɛti o deer o. Ma iiya buk ozooti niini lotinok o Juz, ka kɔɔga nɔɔgɔ cabiinte o lotinowo, ka naaga o kutuweec nɔɔnɔ kiziti dɔl ci Joowo.
48004006	Mazin giye o izitu niiga dɔl ci Joowo, itoonayet niini ageet Vɔŋiz o ŋɛɛrin kiiya kaavu zinzeetine ogaac. Vɔŋiz zin nico nɛɛn o anyet ageet kotoweec Jook zinzeetine ogaac dook kiziti nɛ, Baaba.
48004007	Alaŋaan zin bodo niiga eeginu gabara, bar izitu niiga dɔl ci Joowo. Ma giye o izitu dɔl ogin, anyuŋ niini igeet kaal dook o anyayek niini dɔl ogin.
48004008	Baale iŋaan agaac Jook e, eeginu waanice niiga gabara ci joowanɛ o alaŋ een didi o adilyai.
48004009	Bar zin inoko agawutu niiga Jook, ma bar buk agawuŋ niini igeet ɔɔwa. Arooŋnyuŋ zin bodo imiirtozek kaal ci amaat akɔm dɔyiz o naa? Arooŋnyu ɔɔtɔ iziti gabara cigeec bodo?
48004010	Aganeku gɔɔn niiga ŋaati aŋeranu iinya oogi, ki nyɛlɔwɛ oogi, been irkitok oogi. Ma aricanu anyeki kizi titinyɛ gaga nɔkɔ.
48004011	Kaŋole zin naana kaal ci agoonu niiga noko, eeci bar kizik olla da adaktan aneet zɔɔ tuu kaale baal kagoonekuŋ igeet e gaga.
48004012	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, kilalekuŋ igeet ka ayayizaŋ aneet giye ci akati lotinok, eeci buk naana alya keen eet ci deer. Otoŋit kɛɛranɛ o Juz kiyo buk kuuŋ naana o. Ŋaan zin laadun utuguzeyan niiga aneet gi ci gɛr.
48004013	Agayu ri niiga waan baal kakɔ kuuwaweyuŋ kaviyak o Joowo ɔɔwa e, kaavɛ waanice ŋaatunooŋ, eeci kamoor.
48004014	Bar zin mayo nuun waanice kapirnanuŋ naana igeet mɔɔrize nice ɔrɔɔt e, ŋaan otobortaŋ niiga aneet been nɛɛn. Bar waanice areezanaŋ kiyo areezanu toonnyai ci Joowo karabɔŋ bar een Yesu Kiristo ɛlɛ o.
48004015	Ma atalninu waanice niiga ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaatan. Alaŋaan zin eelnu ebaale naa? Waanice areezaŋ aneet ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma kaga naana kizi da gɔɔn gi ci anim ɛɛti kaarak gɔn keberec, aartayaŋu waan niiga aneet iitene nice.
48004016	Mayo inoko anyaŋ kizi miroi giye ci kaduwakuŋ igeet zoozok ceen didi o?
48004017	Ma ɔl ci acinu kizik bar areezuŋ niigi igeet neke, alaŋ een ɔl ci abon. Arɔɔŋ olla niigi kalabtawuŋ, ka kupuwantawuŋ igeet ŋaatan, ka ɔɔtɔ ereezit niiga nɔɔgɔ, kiyo areezuŋ niigi igeet o.
48004018	Ŋɛdɛt rɛɛzɔnɛt alaŋ gɛrzɛ. Abon zin waan areezuŋ ɔl igeet giye ci akati gɔl ci abon. Ma alaŋ abon ŋaati areezuŋ niigi igeet ŋaati kaavɛ naana tɔ doon.
48004019	Dɔl o yaai tuwento kareezuŋ, inoko abon naana kapirna bodo ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ labak kiyo ŋaa o gɔɔn aam dole ka kotoyai o nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma avɔ abaaku baayiz o arɔɔŋ Kiristo.
48004020	Inoko tɛ kizi gi ci kaavɛ naana ŋaatunooŋ ŋinaante, abon koca ka waan koobeyuŋ igeet zoozok oogi bodo, eeci aviryan ziniz ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt.
48004021	Karooŋ di kijin ŋaatunooŋ ɔl o arɔɔŋ konowit lotinok o Juz. Uduktayaŋ di inoko agayu didi zoozok o aduwa lotinowa juruŋ?
48004022	Ayeedi zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Anyak Ibrayim lɔgɔz ram. Logoti codoi aritai ŋaawe ceen gabaren een miroi kazi Egar. Maje codoi aritai ŋaawe cin arɔca ole o looc onin ɛlɛ kazi Sara.
48004023	Ma logoti ci aritai ŋaawe ceen miroi o, aritai niini eo laadun gɔɔn aritan ɔl dook. Maje logoti ci aritai ŋaawe calaŋ een miroi o, aritai niini, eeci baale aterkedek Jooi nɔɔnɔ Ibrayim.
48004024	Ma kaala nicigi yabziin gi. Ma ŋaai ceen ram noko ayelzaket kaal ceen ram aterkedi. Ma ceen miroi, ma arita dɔl ceen mirɔk o Egar nɛɛn. Ayabzonek nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz baal aterkedek Jooi ɔl lotinowɛ biye o kazi Sinai e.
48004025	Mazin Egar niini alya ci ayabzonek bɛ o kazi Sinai looce o kazi Arabiya noko, niini riritɔn ci ayelza kutur o kazi Jerusalɛm, eeci ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma dook eegin mirɔk ci acap nɔɔgɔ lotinowa.
48004026	Maje Jerusalɛm o abil tammu tadena kibeen ɔl ogin, akɔm gi ci acap nɔɔgɔ been nɛɛn. Nica zin yaatinai onai ageet nɛɛn.
48004027	Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo gi ci azi nɛ, “Talɔ niina ŋaa o awɔ koliin, ma ŋaan laadun ga wucez ci aamnyin dole, eeci ŋaa ci akolonek looc anyak bar niini tiŋeere dɔl ci meelik kujuk ŋaa o ŋaan aromɛ kibeen eet.”
48004028	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, keegin naaga dɔl o Joowo een didi terkediinta kiyo buk baale Aizak e.
48004029	Zin kiyo waanice logoti o aritai gole o eet o deer kazi Ismayil, agit gɔn o aritai dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo kazi Aizak e, kagide buk naaga nɔkɔ.
48004030	Bar zin ayeedi waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Tɔɔk ŋaa ceen miroi noko ki ŋɛɛrin kɔtɔɔzɔ, eeci alaŋ aganɔ dole ci ŋaa ceen miroi o ŋaati ka kɔzɔlti kɔrɔk cuno niini kibeen logo ci ŋaa cun alaŋ een miroi o.”
48004031	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, inoko zin naaga alaŋ keegin dɔl ci ŋaa ween miroi, bar keegin dɔl ci ŋaa o alaŋ een miroi.
48005001	Inoko zin ɔkɔmawet ageet cabiin, eeci ɔɔgawet Kiristo ageet kɔtɔɔz labak. Abon zin aruweku niiga zɔɔ looc juruŋ odoyit kak, maŋaan bodo anyeku ɔl kimiirtoyuŋ igeet kootuŋ cabiinte baale.
48005002	Iziiyit di gi ci kaduwakuŋ naana Pɔl igeet ce. Má aziiknu zoozok culu. Mã agamanu teedinɛt, anyceyu koca niiga Kiristo kizi gi ci labak.
48005003	Inoko zin kilotuŋ igeet bodo. Mã agama ɛɛti teedinɛt, adaŋewun koca niini ɛlɛ gi ci ka kozooti lotinok dook.
48005004	Mazin niiga ɔl o arooŋnyu obonta ŋume o Joowo gole ci azoonu lotinok o Juz, eŋeryawu niiga eleeti ŋaaten dɛtɛn o kajowa ŋaati Kiristo.
48005005	Bar zin kaga naaga anyet tiŋeere Jooi ageet kobonta ŋume onin dɔyizi o Vɔŋiz onin ŋaaten tuwɛn onai. Gi o zin inoko karɛ naaga nɛɛn.
48005006	Eeci mã koromtozek naaga Yesu Kiristo, ɔkɔma bodo ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci eet ci ateedi kibeen eet calaŋ ateedi. Bar olla izi gi ci titiny dook nɛɛn tuwɛn kibeen rɛɛzɔnɛt.
48005007	Ma baale kizik atuwenu juruŋ. Ŋɛnɛɛn zin bodo ci iiya abakbayanuŋ igeet tuwente unooŋ o?
48005008	Alaŋ zin agɔɔn gi nico Jooi baal laadun otowawuŋ e.
48005009	Azi gɔɔn ɔl nɛ, “Nyigita ci nyaanu miliny tɛr anyek nyaan dook kɛtɛdɛ.”
48005010	Mazin giye o koromtozɛkɛ naaga Manyi, kagayuŋ naana igeet nɔkɔ alaŋ baabani cunooŋ aŋɔrɔwɔ kibeen baabani can o. Ma buk kaga naana tiŋeere apayek Jooi eet ci uulaluŋ igeet noko gerzitin, yo nuun een niini eet ci titiny karabɔŋ cɛlbɛz.
48005011	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, alaŋaan naana kamɛna kuuwai gɔl ci teedinto. Mã da waan kutugu nɔkɔ, kagide zin bodo koca naa? Mazin da buk kutugu nɔkɔ, alaŋ waan koca abornɛ zɔɔz onane kuuwayɛ daayiz o Kiristo keete ween talakec.
48005012	Mazin ɔl ci arican teedinɛt, ma uulaluŋ igeet noko, abon apaya niigi teri ugeec kiziti nyakuluknya.
48005013	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, awuyuŋ Jooi igeet ka ɔɔktai ɔtɔɔz labak. Má zin bar anyeku zɔɔz nico kizi waŋi ci ka utuguzi niiga kaal o arɔɔŋ eleeti ugoocok. Bar abon atirtonu niiga dook reezonte o Joowo.
48005014	Eeci lotinowa o Joowo dook oromnyai gole codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, o anɛ Jooi nɛ, “Rɛɛz ɔl dook kiyo areez niina ɛlɛ unun maany o.”
48005015	Bar mazi abaaku baayiz ci adawonu maany kiyo kɛlɛgɛ o too o, abon agenyu, eeci mã agoonu nɔkɔ, uulalu koca eleeti lai.
48005016	Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Anycek Vɔŋiz o Joowo karawoyuŋ igeet kaale dook, ka calaŋ agoonu kaal o gɛr arɔɔŋ eleeti ugooc.
48005017	Eeci kaala o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti ci deer amarnin kaal o arɔɔŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo. Buk kaala o arɔɔŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo amarnin kaal o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o deer. Kaala ceen ram noko amarnɔ ɔrɔɔt. Mazin giye nico alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati agoonu niiga kaal ootine cugooc doon.
48005018	Bar zin mã arayinuŋ didi igeet Vɔŋizi o Joowo, alaŋ bodo anyak lotinowa dɔyiz ŋaatunooŋ.
48005019	Mazin kaala o gɛrzɛ aavtiz zinzeetine ci ɔl o deer agayi nɔkɔ. Kaal zin nicoko nɛɛn waaŋzɛt, ki kaal ceen ririny akati waaŋzɛt, been ziniz zeen, ki diŋdiŋani ci joowanɛ ci adilyai, ki tamar, ki marnɔn, ki yɔwɔn, ki madkɔn, ki bolŋac, ki zinzeeti appinzɛt, ki ŋɛrɔn ci aŋɛrɔn kizi kɔlɛ, ki ewiin ci ɛɛwɔnɛ kaal, ki baayinɛt, been buk kaal oogi ci gɛr kiyo nicigi noko. Kilotuŋ zin naana igeet ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kaale nicoko kiyo rak kilotuŋ iiten baale e, eeci ɔl ci agɔɔn kaal nicoko, alaŋ niigi arum baliin o Joowo.
48005022	Zm keberti ci Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɛɛn rɛɛzɔnɛt, ki talniin, ki ganɔn, ki zinzeeti laliz, ki gononzɛt, ki bonat, ki zinzeeti imɛɛn, ki celbezitin calaŋ kadɔŋi eleeti, been gami ci kagami eleeti kaale o gɛr arɔɔŋ zinzeeti. Ma ɔl ci agɔɔn kaal nicoko dook, akɔm lotinowa gi ci agoonek nɔɔgɔ.
48005024	Mazin ɔl o oromtozek Kiristo alaŋ bodo niigi agɔɔn kaal o gɛr arɔɔŋ zinzeeti ugeecik. Otodoyek niigi kaal nicoko kɛɛt ween talakec baal adodinɛ Yesu Kiristo e.
48005025	Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɛɛn o anyet ageet rogɛt. Zin giye nico abon buk kanyek naaga nɔɔnɔ karawoyet ageet baayize onai.
48005026	Alaŋ zin abon ŋaati kadɔŋi eleeti, ma alaŋ abon ŋaati kanyekɛ eet oma kotobor nɔŋ. Ma alaŋ buk abon ŋaati kamadkɔn naaga maany.
48006001	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, mã anyak eet ci abaca gi ci gɛr, abon ɔl o arayin nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatunooŋ atiritu nɔɔnɔ, ka kimiirozek niini gɔl ci abon. Itiloz zin niiga nɔɔnɔ zinzeetine ci alal. Ebeyit buk niigalya eleeti ugooc, gɛrzɛ ŋaan iinaku oŋec nico.
48006002	Itiritɔ niiga dook. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, uzuutu koca didi niiga lotinok o Kiristo.
48006003	Mã abaaban ɛɛti bar kizik niini titiny, maje ŋaato akɔm gi ci agɔɔn, alaba koca niini ɛlɛ onin maany.
48006004	Abon zin gɔɔn rak aŋaamnek ɛɛti liŋliŋɔn onin niini maany zɛɛ mã abona, ŋaan abɔlɔli liŋliŋɔn cin o niini aliye onin doon. Alaŋ abon ŋaati atalnin niini giye ci ajuki gɔɔn oma liŋliŋɔnta.
48006005	Eeci tiŋeere akɔyi gɔɔn ɛɛti ceeni ŋume o Joowo kaal ogin agɔɔn niini maany.
48006006	Mazin ɛɛti ci ɛdɛmɛz zɔɔz o Joowo, abon azɔl niini kaal ogin abon kibeen eet o adɛmɛz nɔɔnɔ.
48006007	Zin má alabanu eleeti, eeci akɔm laadun eet ci ka kalaba Jook. Gɔɔn laadun mã aḏok ɛɛti gi ci aḏok, bodo tiŋeere atɛɛda niini kɛbɛrɛ ci gi nico ɛlɛ.
48006008	Zin mã agɔɔn ɛɛti kaal o arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ oninɛ, ajowa niini daayiz. Mazi agɔɔn niini kaal o arɔɔŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn o anyaa Vɔŋizi nici.
48006009	Abon zin naaga kamɛna kagɔɔn kaal ci abon, eeci mã kamɛna kagɔɔn nɔkɔ, kavɔ koca tiŋeere naaga kacin kaal ci abon ci anyaa liŋliŋɔnti ona.
48006010	Abon zin naaga tup kagoonek ɔl dook kaal ci abon, matɛ gɔɔn kajowa gɔl ci aganɔ ŋaati katirti ɔl, ricik ɔrɔɔt bor o Joowo.
48006011	Icinit di kayeedi zoozok nicoko kiziti appintɛ, ka agaac kayeedi didi naana alya aziite onan maany.
48006012	Ɔl zin o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ kɔkɔlta eleeti ka katalit ɔl nɔɔgɔ kaale ci akati ɛlɛ eci bitaalu nɛɛn ci adaŋekuŋ igeet teedinɛt o. Agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ o, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ gidɛn giye ci akati daayiz o Kiristo keete ween talakec.
48006013	Mayo nuun een ɔl ci ateedi noko ɛlɛ alaŋ azooni lotinok. Bar olla arooŋnyuŋ niigi igeet eteede ka kobololit giye ci agamtayu niiga teedinɛt cineeŋ o.
48006014	Maje zin naana kabɔlɔlɛ gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, kabɔlɔlɛ daayiz o Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo keete ween talakec. Eeci giye o adaayi niini keete ween talakec, alaŋaan kaal o loocu ŋaatan anyak dɔyiz. Eelit niigi ŋaatan kiyo kaal o adaai o. Maje buk naana alya ŋaatineeŋ kibila kiyo ɛɛti o adaai o.
48006015	Mayo nuun ateedi ɛɛti, karabɔŋ alaŋ ateedi, adoye dook nɔkɔ. Bar zin gi ci titiny nɛɛn baayizi ci abaayi ɛɛti baayiz ci colai.
48006016	Abon bai aavi reezinɛt o Joowo been ganɔn ole o ano gɔl nico baayize uneeŋ, kibeen buk ole o Joowo dook.
48006017	Kaṯornɛkɛ zin zooze ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Alaŋ karooŋ bodo eet ci apirnanan, eeci morotanɛta ci kanyei alya noko, ayelza gi o kɛɛnɛ naana gabaren o Yesu didi.
48006018	Dɔl o Yaai tuwento, abon bai dɛtɛni o Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo aavi ŋaatunooŋ igeet dook. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
49001001	Aneeta Pɔl o keen toonnyai o Yesu Kiristo, ma kɛŋɛryai Joowa aneet eo arɔɔŋi niini doon. Kayeedekuŋ waragɛ nico igeet ɔl o Joowo abaaku looce o kazi Evesos o atuyu Yesu Kiristo zinzeetine ugooc dook.
49001002	Abon bai Jooi ween baatinai ki Yesu Kiristo ween Manyi onai anyuŋ igeet dɛtɛn kibeen ganɔn.
49001003	Abon kanaat Jook ween baati Manyi onai Yesu Kiristo. Amayuket niini ageet mayuwente onin tammu tadenu giye o koromtɔi naaga ki Yesu Kiristo.
49001004	Ɛŋɛrawet niini ageet baale laadun iŋaan lɔɔci kɛtɛɛnyai e ka koromtozek naaga Kiristo kiziti ɔl ci Joowo akɔmnet gi ci gɛr ŋume onin ka kabaayit naaga rɛɛzɔnta.
49001005	Ɛŋɛrawet niini baale laadun ka kiziti dɔl cigin gole ci katuwi naaga Yesu Kiristo. Nici zin gi baal laadun arɔɔŋ niini e nɛɛn.
49001006	Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka katanaaz naaga dɛtɛn ki bonat onin adikir baal iiriyeket niini ageet labak ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin onin arɛɛz e.
49001007	Eeci daayizi o Kiristo aarawet ageet payiin o gɛr anyaaket oŋɛ ogaac. Kobonta naaga Joowa ŋaaten biye o Yesu. Ma irkɛn o Joowo ayelzeket niini ageet appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
49001008	Agɔɔn niini gi nico gɛnyize onin adikir adɛnyanɛ kaal dook.
49001009	Ayelzaket zin niini ageet gi baal arɔɔt niini zinize onin laadun e. Arɔɔŋ niini laadun gi nico ka kiiya kidica ŋaati Yesu Kiristo loota ŋina.
49001010	Ayeleyet zin Jooi gi o arekɛ niini iiten ci katin ka koromi kaal ogin ɛɛnyca tamma ki loota dook kodoye ka kabal nɔɔgɔ dook Yesu Kiristo.
49001011	Ma kaala dook agooni gole o abaabana Jooi, ma aŋɛra niini ka kutuguwi nɔɔgɔ. Ɛŋɛrawet zin niini ageet baale kinatamma e laadun kiziti ɔl cigin giye o koromtozɛkɛ naaga Kiristo, eeci nici gi baal laadun arɔɔŋ niini ka kutugu e nɛɛn.
49001012	Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka naaga o kagamta Kiristo ɔɔwa keyelezta diŋdiŋɔn onin.
49001013	Iziiktu buk niiga zɔɔz ween didi ween kaviyak o Joowo abon baal anyaakuŋ igeet rogɛt e, ma utuyu niiga Kiristo, ma arekuŋ Jooi igeet bayen ween Vɔŋiz onin baal aterkedek niini ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ e.
49001014	Ma Vɔŋizi o Joowo o inoko kanyak naaga abil kiyo bayen o ka kanyet ageet kagaac kavɔ kajowa naaga tiŋeere kaal dook o aterkedoneket ageet ŋaaten Kiristo. Abon zin naaga kayelza diŋdiŋɔn onin iinya dook kaale nicoko.
49001015	Kiziiwa zin naana tuwɛn unooŋ atuyu Manyi Yesu ki reezinɛt unooŋ areezu ɔl o Joowo dook.
49001016	Zin giye nico kanyi gɔɔn Jook zany ŋaatunooŋ iinya dook, ma kaadanuŋ igeet ŋaati kaŋaryinɛ.
49001017	Kajin Jook o Manyi onai Yesu Kiristo ween baatinai o adiŋdiŋ ka kanyuŋ niini igeet Vɔŋiz onin gɛnyizo, ka keyeleyuŋ igeet Jook ka zin agaac niiga nɔɔnɔ juruŋ.
49001018	Kajin gɔɔn Jook ka kɔkɔl zinzeeti ugooc ka agaac niiga gi o adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt o ka ojokta niiga katin tammu tadena giye o eeginu niiga ɔl ci Joowo.
49001019	Ka zin buk agaac niiga dɔyiz onin adikir o aliŋliŋ ŋaaten ageet o kutuwit nɔɔnɔ. Dɔyiz zin onin adikir gɔɔn aliŋliŋ zinzeetine ogaac o ɛlɛ nɛɛn nici.
49001020	Ma dɔyizi ci aavi zinzeetine cigaac noko atobɔ ki dɔyiz o Joowo baal iŋaani Kiristo daayiza, ma akɔ anyek nɔɔnɔ kaavu aziite o Joowo azo alaazetu tammu tadena e nɔkɔ.
49001021	Zin ŋinaante anyak Kiristo alaazɛt ci abali kaal dook tamma ki loota buk. Ma adiŋdiŋ zaara oginɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal dook looce nico been looce ci katin colai ŋaan aku e buk.
49001022	Anyek Jooi Kiristo korocek kaal dook looc, ma adɔŋ nɔɔnɔ ka kizi alaan ci adikir ole o atu nɔɔnɔ.
49001023	Zin ɛlɛ o Kiristo nɛɛn ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ, ma abaak niini ŋaatineeŋ, ma anyek niini nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz onin. Nɔɔnɔ zin nɛɛn o aṯornɛkɛ kaale dook.
49002001	Baale laadun niiga eelnu kiyo ɔl o adaai o, eeci waanice agoonu kaal ci gɛr tup ŋume o Joowo.
49002002	Baale gɔɔn agoonu kaal o gɛr agɔɔn ɔl o loocu, ma aziiŋnu zoozok o Loryen ween alaan o abal ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr dook. Ma buk inoko aliŋliŋ niini zinzeetine o ɔl o abor zɔɔz o Joowo dook.
49002003	Zin buk baale naaga alya kabaak gole ci abil kiyo nici o ɛlɛ. Kagɔɔn buk baale naaga kaalyan ci gɛr eo arɔɔŋi eleeti ogaac, ma kawɔyi zoozok ci ooti ogaac doon ki baabanok ogaac. Ma waanice keere onai ɔl o deer aborneket Jooi ageet nɔŋ kaale o gɛr kagɔɔn kiyo buk ɔl dook o.
49002004	Bar zin giye o areezet Jooi ageet, kuwucek naaga nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
49002005	Mayo nuun baale katobɔ ki ɔl ci adaai giye o kabacan oŋɛ e, iiya Jooi arogozet niini doon bonate onin ŋaaten Kiristo.
49002006	Mazin giye o koromtozɛkɛ naaga Yesu abil kiyo itiŋayet Jooi ageet been Kiristo daayiza, ma anyet ageet kaavtiz buk aziite onin azo koromtɛ ki Kiristo alaazete onin tammu tadena o.
49002007	Agɔɔn Jooi nɔkɔ o ka keyeliza niini iinyaye ci ŋaan avu e dikirɔn o bonat onin giye o koromtozɛkɛ naaga Yesu Kiristo.
49002008	Zin giye o ojoktayu niiga rogzɛn bonate o Joowo tuwɛnta, alaŋ agoonu gi nico niiga ootine ugooc, bar Jook nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet rogzɛn nico niini doon.
49002009	Alaŋ zin rogzɛn nici ajoyai kaale ci abon agooni, ka calaŋ adɔŋ ɔl eleeti ŋume o Joowo.
49002010	Orogozet Jooi ageet ka kutuguz naaga kaal ci abon ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo. Idimdimanet niini ageet ka kiliŋliŋit liŋliŋɔn onin abon loota ŋina.
49002011	Abon zin niiga aadanu gi o alaŋ laadun aritanu iziti Juz, ma apezuŋ igeet ɔl o Juz ateedi, ma awuyuŋ iziti modɛn calaŋ ateedinu.
49002012	Abon buk niiga aadanu waanice abaaku ŋaati adewonu niiga kibeen Kiristo many. Alaŋ waanice eeginu ɔl ci bor o Joowo aŋɛryai. Ma eeginu niiga baale mirɔk calaŋ agayu zɔɔz o rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn baal aterkedek Jooi ɔl ogin e.
49002013	Bar zin inoko giye o oromtozeku niiga been Yesu Kiristo niiga baal eeginu rɛɛnɛ Joowa e ivita ojoŋoztu Jook gole o biye o Kiristo.
49002014	Ma Kiristo niini alya ganizoi onai nɛɛn. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o orom ɔl o Juz kibeen ɔl o alaŋ een Juz kiziti bor codoi. Aara niini gi baal aŋɛr nɔɔgɔ ma anyek kamartɔ e. Agɔɔn niini gi nico daayize onin baal adaaŋni keete ween talakec e.
49002015	Aara buk Yesu marnɔn baal anyaa lotinowa o Juz, ma aŋɛr nɔɔgɔ ki modɛn dook e bitaala, eeci arɔɔŋ niini kaganiz Juz ki modɛn dook ka kodoye niigi kiziti bor codoi ka kivita niigi dook koromtɛ ki nɔɔnɔ. Zin gole nico utugu niini ganɔn.
49002016	Agɔɔn buk Yesu kaal nicoko o ka kaganiz modɛn dook, ma anyaak nɔɔgɔ dook Jook ŋaaten daayiz onin keete ween talakec, ma gole nico aara niini marnɔn uneeŋ.
49002017	Iiya niini, ma iiya uuwak kaviyak ogin ganonto ɔla dook. Ma zɔɔz nici abon ɔrɔɔt ŋaaten igeet baal adeyanu Joowa e kibeen buk ole o Juz baal ajɔŋɔz Jook e.
49002018	Ŋaaten Kiristo naaga dook ɔl o Juz been ɔl o alaŋ een Juz kojokta gɔl ci kavunakɛ Jook ween baatinai zinzeetine ci adoye.
49002019	Alaŋaan zin bodo niiga inoko eeginu modɛn ŋume o Joowo, bar izitu buk bor ci Joowo kiyo ɔl ci Juz aŋɛryai o, ma izitu buk ɔl ci tatok o Joowo.
49002020	Eelnu niiga kiyo biyɛn o gɔɔn ɛɛnyci ɔl ceez o. Maje toonnyawa kibeen nyakaŋanɛt ɛɛl niigi kiyo biyɛn o gɔɔn akanan ɔl ceez eenycinta o. Maje Yesu Kiristo atobɔ niini ki bɛ ci titiny itiir ceez nico dook kɔdɔk kak.
49002021	Ma niiga ɔl o Joowo dook ŋaaten Kiristo oromtewu odoye, ma agamonu odoyit kiyo biyɛn o ɛɛnycanɛ ɔl ceez o, ka iziti niiga ceez ci Manyi adiŋdiŋ.
49002022	Zin niiga ŋaaten Kiristo eteenycewu Vɔŋize o Joowo ka iziti ceez ci Joowo abaayi.
49003001	Zin naana Pɔl kacabje o, eeci ɛŋɛrwan Yesu Kiristo aneet ka kuuwaweyuŋ zɔɔz nico igeet o alaŋ eeginu Juz.
49003002	Didi zin iziiktu buk niiga gi o ɛŋɛrayan niini aneet bonate onin ka kuuwaweyuŋ igeet kaviyak nicoko.
49003003	Eyelizayan Jooi aneet zɔɔz baal aroodi e, ma anyan kaga. Iiten baale rak kuduwayuŋ zɔɔz nico ŋintimiliny waragewe baal kayeedekuŋ ɔɔwa e.
49003004	Mã ekeebtu waragɛ nice, agayu koca kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ween didi baal laadun arɔɔdi Jooi ɔl e. Eyelizayan zin niini aneet zɔɔz nico kaga.
49003005	Baale laadun ɔɔwa e ŋaan niini keyelek zɔɔz nico ɔl o deer, bar zin iiya eyelek niini toonnyak kibeen nyakaŋanɛt ogin gole o Vɔŋiz onin.
49003006	Zɔɔz zin ci ayelzakan Jooi aneet o nɛɛn ci ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz buk inoko o iziti niigi dɔl ci Joowo giye o utuyi niigi kaviyak nicoko, ma ozolit buk niigi kibeen ɔl o Juz kaal o Joowo, ma oromtɛ niigi dook kiziti ɛlɛ codoi. Ma azɔl niigi dook kaviyak o abon baal aterkedek Jooi nɔɔgɔ ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo e.
49003007	Ma naana bonate o Joowo adikir ŋaaten aneet kizɛ gabaren ci ka kuuwak kaviyak o abon. Anyan niini aneet dɔyiz ka kiliŋliŋi liŋliŋɔn nico.
49003008	Mayo nuun keen naana alya cɛlbɛz ɔrɔɔt bore o Joowo tuwento dook o, ɛŋɛrayan Jooi aneet liŋliŋɔn ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt ka kuuwawewuŋ igeet o alaŋ eeginu Juz kaviyak o abon o Yesu Kiristo. Ma kaviyawa nici adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma atobɔ ki arɔkzɛt ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
49003009	Arooŋnyan zin Jooi aneet kanyek ɔl dook kagaac gɔl o ka kiliŋliŋi niini liŋliŋɔn onin baal aroodi e, ma Jooi o ɛɛnyca kaal dook arɔɔdi niini ɔl o bulok dook zɔɔz nico baale laadun.
49003010	Ka zin inoko o kiiya keyelizak niini gɛnyiz onin adikir toonnyak o tammo anyak dɔyiz ki alaazɛt tammu tadena. Ma gɛnyizi nici ayelzai ŋaaten ɔl ogin atu nɔɔnɔ.
49003011	Ma gi ci agɔɔn Jooi noko, abaaban niini baale kinatamma e laadun, ma iiya idica niini gi nico ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo ween Manyi ona.
49003012	Mazin giye o kutuyi naana nɔɔnɔ, ma koromtɔi ki nɔɔnɔ, kanim naaga kɔtɔɔz ŋume o Joowo labak kɔkɔmawet ŋoliin.
49003013	Bar zin kilalekuŋ naana igeet ka calaŋ akanu culum giye ci kapirnanɛ naana ŋaatunooŋ o, eeci giye nico ŋaan bar ajowanu niiga titinyɔn.
49003014	Ma giye nico kakanɛ kozoŋti looc ŋaryiinta ŋume o Jook ween baatinai.
49003015	Eeci ɔl o atuwe dook tammu tadena ki loota awo Jook kizi baatineeŋ.
49003016	Kajin zin Jook ka kanyuŋ igeet dɔyiz onin ŋaaten Vɔŋiz onin ka kodoyit zinzeeti ugooc, eeci anyak dɔyiz dook niini.
49003017	Ka zin buk Kiristo kabaak zinzeetine ugooc giye o atuyu niiga nɔɔnɔ. Ma buk kajin Jook ka uruktek niiga zɔɔ looc reezonte unooŋ.
49003018	Ka niiga kibeen ɔl o Joowo dook anyayit dɔyiz ci agayu juruŋ reezinɛt o Kiristo adikir adala looc dook.
49003019	Didi ɛlɛ mayo nuun alaŋ anim ɔl ci deer o kagaac kaal dook o akati reezinɛt nico o, ŋaan agayu niiga reezinɛt nico juruŋ, ka zin kanyuŋ Jooi igeet eelit kiyo niini o.
49003020	Katanaaz zin Jook o anyak dɔyiz ci agooneket niini ageet kaal ci abon meel ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal o kajin naaga nɔɔnɔ been o kabaaban karɔɔŋ naaga nɔɔnɔ kutuguweyet ŋaaten dɔyiz onin aliŋliŋ zinzeetine ogaac.
49003021	Abon bai Jooi atitinyi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ boryowe o atu nɔɔnɔ kibeen ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo bulowe dook tup nɔkɔ zɛɛ been nɛɛn. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
49004001	Zin naana o kacabje giye o kaliŋliŋonɛkɛ Manyi karicanekuŋ igeet abaayit baayiz ci ɔl o ɛŋɛra Jooi kizi ɔl cigin.
49004002	Ɛcɛlbɛzanit eleeti ɔrɔɔt. Itibezit. Anycek zinzeeti kalalit. Eyelizta rɛɛzɔnɛt eleetine ugooc maany, mayo nuun agoonekuŋ ɔl ogɛn igeet kaal ci gɛr, ereezit niiga nɔɔgɔ labak.
49004003	Ooritnɔŋ ɔrɔɔt uzuuti romɛn o anyuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaaten ganɔn o arumnyuŋ igeet odoye.
49004004	Keegin naaga dook ɛlɛ codoi, ma kanyak naaga dook Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Ma otowawet Jooi ageet dook gole codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ka kɔɔtɔ kojokta naaga kaal o aterkedeket niini ageet.
49004005	Kanyak zin naaga Manyi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ kibeen tuwɛn codoi been toonyɛnɛt codoi.
49004006	Ma kanyak naaga dook Jook codoi ṯɔr ween baatina ageet dook. Ma een niini alaan ci abal kaal dook, ma abaak zinzeetine o kaal dook, ma aliŋliŋ eleetine o kaal dook.
49004007	Anyet Kiristo ageet dook doyizok. Anyek niini eet co gɔɔn ŋaatinai dɔyiz ci aganɔ ki liŋliŋɔn o aŋɛrak niini nɔɔnɔ.
49004008	Kiyo azi waragɛwi o Joowo giye ci akati Kiristo nɛ, “Baale ma akɔ niini tamma e ayit ɔl ci meel gɛr ole baal acabje e, ma anyek ɔl oogi dɔyiz ci ka kiliŋliŋti niigi liŋliŋɔn o aŋɛrak niini nɔɔgɔ.”
49004009	Mayo zin inoko zɔɔz ci azi waragɛ nɛ, Ook niini tammu tadena o, kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz? Kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico nɛɛn gi baal rak ɔɔwa akuni niini looc, ma iiya ook tɔdɔwai eecitɔ ŋaao miniŋu e.
49004010	Ma Yesu baal rak ook tɔdɔwai eecitɔ e nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ nɛɛn o iiya ook tammu tadena ŋaati aṯornɛkɛ e ka kook kadala niini tammu tadena ki looc dook dɔyize onin.
49004011	Nɔɔnɔ zin nɛɛn o anyek ɔl ogin doyizok. Aŋɛra niini ɔl oogi kiziti toonnyak. Maje oogi aŋɛra ka koobtek gɔnɔgi keŋti ci zoozok o Joowo. Maje oogi aŋɛra ka kuuwayit kaviyak o Joowo abon. Aŋɛra oogi ka kiziti towayok ci ɔl o tuwento. Maje oogi aŋɛra ka kedemezit gɔnɔgi.
49004012	Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka kidimdiman ɔl o tuwento dook kutuguzɔ liŋliŋɔn o Joowo ka bor o Joowo een ɛlɛ o Yesu kodoye tuwɛnta.
49004013	Ma gole nico kadoye naaga dook tuwente onai ki gawiinte o kagawi ŋɛɛrti Joowo juruŋ, ka kiziti zin naaga ɔl ci adikir kagɛny ɔrɔɔt kiyo niini o, ka zin kaavu niini zinzeetine ogaac, ma anyet ageet dɔyiz onin.
49004014	Alaŋ zin bodo aganɔ ŋaati kɛɛlni kiyo dɔlya o miliny gɔɔn olla azooti ki zoozok o ŋootu alaban ɔl nɔɔgɔ demziinte ci voloŋo o.
49004015	Bar zin mã kaduwa naaga zɔɔz ween didi rɛɛzɔnta, karogtai koca naaga, ma kadɔi kaale dook kiyo Kiristo ween ɔɔ o bor o Joowo tuwento o.
49004016	Oromtɛ zin ɔl o tuwento dook kizi ɛlɛ codoi ṯɔr ŋaaten Yesu kiyo korɔna o arom ɛlɛ o eet o deer dook kɔdɔwɛ ṯɔr o. Zin mã aliŋliŋ ɔl o atuwe dook liŋliŋɔn ci abon, iroktai koca niigi ween bor o Joowo een ɛlɛ o Yesu kɔdɔk rɛɛzɔnta.
49004017	Anycaŋ zin kuduwayuŋ gi ce, ma kilotuŋ zaare o Manyi. Ma ŋaan bodo abaaku kiyo ɔl o alaŋ aga Jook, ma abaaban kaalyan ci gɛr aleeket keŋti o.
49004018	Adiit nɔɔgɔ baciinowa ooti kɔkɔm ŋaatineeŋ baabani ci akati Jook. Ma adɛyai niigi many rogete o anyek Jooi ɔl, eeci adɔi nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti kak, ma otoborit zɔɔz ween didi.
49004019	Ma alaŋ anyak niigi alyaan kaale cigeec gɛr agɔɔn noko. Otoŋtek niigi eleeti ugeec dook waaŋzɛt ki rɛɛcanzɛt, ma amɛna niigi arɔɔŋ zinzeetine ugeec kutuguzɔ kaalyan o gɛr dook tup nɔkɔ.
49004020	Bar zin niiga ŋaati Yesu ŋaan laadun edemezit kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ.
49004021	Iziiktu niiga zɔɔz o akati Yesu juruŋ, ma edemeztu gɔl onin een didi.
49004022	Abon zin adɛwanu eleeti oŋene ugooc baal abaaku baale iŋaan agamta Yesu e. Ma baayizi ci baal oŋenu neke atarganyuŋ, eeci akati kaal o loocu gɛr.
49004023	Abon zin uwuyu zinzeeti ugoocok been baabaninok ugoocok kobonta.
49004024	Abaayit baayiz o colai abon, eeci arooŋekuŋ Jooi igeet baayiz ci colai abon kiyo cinɛ o.
49004025	Zin giye nico má ŋaan avoloŋnyu bodo. Abon gɔɔn aduwak ɛɛti gɔn zɔɔz ceen didi, eeci naaga dook koromtɛ kiziti ɛlɛ codoi ŋaaten Yesu.
49004026	Matɛ gɔɔn aburnu nɔŋ, má anyeku bornɛt nɔŋ nico kooyuŋ oŋeca. Buk má anyeku bornɛt nɔŋ kook zɛɛ ma akɔ ii loota,
49004027	eeci bornɛt nɔŋ anyek Loryen waŋi ci aliŋliŋi zinzeetine ugooc.
49004028	Mã anyak eet ci da gɔɔn agɔrzɛ baale, abon ooŋ agɔr cin o, ma akana liŋliŋɔn ibaatine ogin ɛlɛ ka kojowa niini kaal o arɔɔŋ gole ci abon, ma buk atirti ɔl o amaat.
49004029	Má acankayaneku ɔl utugete been nɛɛn. Bar abon azoozu zoozok ci abon ci atirit ɔl oogi kitiroyai kodoyit gole o Joowo.
49004030	Má anyeku Vɔŋiz o Joowo kakat culum, eeci niini een bayen o Joowo o aavi ŋaatunooŋ zɛɛ been iiten ci katin abadaan Yesu looc e. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o ka keyeliza gi o eeginu niiga ɔl ci Joowo iitene ci katin aku ɛɛlanuŋ Yesu loota ŋina e.
49004031	Otoŋit varac been bornɛt nɔŋ zinzeetine ugooc. Otoŋit gernyi bornɛt nɔŋa ki dominta. Otoŋit marnɔn kibeen kaal o gɛr dook zinzeetine ugooc.
49004032	Abon areezonu niiga dook, ma abon anyaku ɛɛzɛt ki zinzeeti taan. Otoŋit kaal o abacakuŋ ɔl ogɛn kiyo buk ooŋ Jooi ŋaaten Kiristo kaal o abacanu niiga ŋaatin o.
49005001	Zin giye o eeginu niiga dɔl o Joowo areezuŋ, abon atobzeku buk niiga eleeti nɔɔnɔ kaale ci abon agoonu.
49005002	Abon abaaku baayiz ci areezonu niiga dook kiyo buk areezet Kiristo ageet, ma akn anyet ɛlɛ onin ageet daayize onin ka kizi todoyoi ci abon ɔrɔɔt atalna Jooi o.
49005003	Má anyeku zin ɔl waŋi ci azoozuŋ niigi igeet gɛrzɛ ŋaati agoonu waaŋ, karabɔŋ olla een kaal koogi ci akati waaŋ, karabɔŋ een zinzeeti appinzɛt, eeci izitu niiga ɔl ci Joowo.
49005004	Otoŋit buk utugeti caŋkawɔn, ki micit ci gɛr, been zoozok ci tarbal. Bar abon anyeku Jook zany bonate onin ŋaatunooŋ.
49005005	Abon agayu gi ceen didi ce. Mã een ɛɛti waaŋnyai, karabɔŋ appe ziniz, alaŋ anyak niini ŋintin baliinte o Joowo kibeen Kiristo. Didilɛ ma ziniz appinzɛt atobɔ kibeen diŋdiŋani ci adiŋdiŋani ɛɛti kaal o arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ ziniz.
49005006	Má anyeku eet oma kalabawuŋ zoozowe calaŋ een didi akati kaal nicoko, eeci kaala nicigi anyek bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo kiiyak ɔl o alaŋ azooni zɔɔz onin.
49005007	Má aromenu zin ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaatodoi been nɛɛn.
49005008	Baale laadun niiga aavtiyu muura, bar zin inoko o aavtiyu vooritine o Joowo, eeci oromtozeya niiga Manyi. Abon zin abaaku baayiz ci ɔl o aavtiz vooritina.
49005009	Eeci vooritin nɛɛn o anyaa bonat ki leeminɛt been gɔl o abil tɔp.
49005010	Ooritnɔŋ edemezit kaal o atal Jooi.
49005011	Ɛdɛyai kaale o waaŋzetu agɔɔn ɔl o aavtiz muura, bar eyelizta niiga kaal cigeec gɛr noko vooritine o Joowo.
49005012	Ma kaala cigeec agɔɔn roodinta noko kaal ceen alyaan ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma alaŋ buk karɔɔŋ koobit.
49005013	Bar zin katin adɛnyai kaala cigeecik gɛrzɛ noko dook ŋaati anyaanu niiga kiiya kataraan nɔɔgɔ vooritin o Joowo.
49005014	Eeci vooritin anyek kaal dook kɛdɛnyai. Gi zin nɛɛn o anɛ zɔɔz oman nɛ, “Niina o ooŋ, tiŋa je daayiza ka kataraanin Kiristo ineet.”
49005015	Egenyit zin ɔrɔɔt! Má abaaku kiyo ɔl o tarbal o, bar abaayit baayiz ci ɔl o agɛny.
49005016	Mã ajowanu waŋi ci aganɔ ŋaati agoonu gi ci abon, utuguz ecodoi nɔkɔ, eeci iinya nici gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt.
49005017	Má eeginu zin tarbalɛ, bar abon agayu kaal o arooŋekuŋ Jooi igeet utuguz.
49005018	Má awudu nyaantanɛ, eeci baayinɛt uulaluŋ igeet iziti gɛrzɛtɛ, bar anycek Vɔŋiz o Joowo abil zinzeetine ugooc karawoyuŋ igeet.
49005019	Ebenit niiga dook beniinok o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo ki beniinok o bor o Joowo o anaatu niiga Jook zinzeetine ugooc.
49005020	Anycek Jook ween baatina zany kaale dook tup nɔkɔ zaare o Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo.
49005021	Iziiktɔ niiga dook zɔɔz juruŋ giye o aŋolinu niiga Kiristo.
49005022	Niiga ŋaai iziiyit buk eet ugooc kiyo aziiŋnu Manyi Kiristo o.
49005023	Eeci ɛɛti ci mac o abal niini ŋaa kiyo bnk abal Kiristo ɔl ogin atu nɔɔnɔ, ma arogoz nɔɔgɔ o.
49005024	Abon zin buk ŋaai azii eet ugeec kaale dook, kiyo buk ɔl o Joowo azii Kiristo o.
49005025	Niiga eeta ereezit buk ŋaai ugooc kiyo arɛɛz Kiristo ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ, ma iirkek ɛlɛ onin nɔɔgɔ o.
49005026	Agɔɔn niini gi nico o ka kanyek ɔl o atuwe kobonta kiyo niini o gole o oonyi niini nɔɔgɔ maami kibeen zooze onin kitiliza.
49005027	Buk agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka kanyaak ɔl o atuwe ɛlɛ onin kitiliza, kɔkɔma nɔɔgɔ ronyayitin ki oŋɛ karabɔŋ een olla gi ci gɛr oma.
49005028	Abon zin eeta arɛɛz ŋaai ugeec kiyo buk arɛɛz niigi eleeti ugeec maany o. Ma ɛɛti ci arɛɛz ŋaa cin, arɛɛz niini ɛlɛ onin.
49005029	Akɔm zin laadun eet ci abor ɛlɛ onin maany, bar irokta niini ɛlɛ onin, ma azooni kiyo irokta Kiristo ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ, ma azooni nɔɔgɔ o.
49005030	Mazin naaga ɔl o katu Kiristo keegin ɛlɛ onin nɛɛn.
49005031	Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Abon ooŋ ɛɛti baatin ki yaatin, ma akɔ aromɛ ki ŋaa onin, ka niigi dook ramantiya kiziti ɛlɛ codoi.”
49005032	Nici zɔɔz ci alɛɛmnyai ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma abon ɔl dook aga kɛŋ cin juruŋ. Zin kaga naana zɔɔz nici ayabzonek Kiristo been ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ.
49005033	Ayabzonekuŋ bar buk zɔɔz nici igeet ɛlɛ. Abon ɛɛti arɛɛz ŋaa onin kiyo arɛɛz ɛlɛ onin maany o. Ma abon ŋaa buk azii zɔɔz ci eet onin juruŋ.
49006001	Niiga dɔlya otoŋole baatugooc ki yaatugooc ŋaaten Manyi Yesu, eeci mã agoonu nɔkɔ abon ɔrɔɔt.
49006002	Azi lotinɛt oman lotinowe o Joowo een amɔtɔ nɛ, “Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun, ka kaala dook kobonta ŋaatun, ka buk baak niina loota ŋina rak ŋinti wun.” Zɔɔz zin o laadun arican Jooi ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn nici.
49006004	Niiga baatizɛt, má agooneku dɔl ugooc kaal ci anyek nɔɔgɔ kotoborit nɔŋ. Bar itirokta gole ci anyek nɔɔgɔ kiziiyit Manyi, ma adɛmɛz golok ogin juruŋ.
49006005	Niiga gabara iziiyit manyigi ugooc aliŋliŋoneku loota ŋina juruŋ ŋoliinta. Abon aliŋliŋoneku niiga nɔɔgɔ zinzeetine ugooc dook kiyo aliŋliŋoneku Manyi Yesu Kiristo o.
49006006	Má aliŋliŋoneku nɔɔgɔ ŋaati acinuŋ doon, bar iliŋliŋtozek nɔɔgɔ zinzeetine ugooc dook talniinta eo arɔɔŋi Jooi, kiyo aliŋliŋoneku Kiristo o.
49006007	Iliŋliŋtozek nɔɔgɔ talniinta kiyo aliŋliŋoneku Yesu o calaŋ bar een ɔl ci deer labak o.
49006008	Eeci agayu niiga mã agɔɔn ɛɛti kaal ci abon, acacak tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔnɔ kaal ogin abon agɔɔn, yo nuun een ɛɛti gabaren karabɔŋ alaŋ een gabaren.
49006009	Buk niiga macigja utuguzek gabara ugooc kaal ci abon. Má agidu nɔɔgɔ. Agaac niiga Manyi unooŋ nɛɛn o buk een Manyi uneeŋ aavi tammu tadena. Apak niini ɔl dook kotobtɔ kɔkɔm tɛl.
49006010	Inoko zin odoyit kak romente unooŋ ki Manyi dɔyize o anyuŋ niini igeet.
49006011	Agamit kilibwa o Joowo ka uruktek zɔɔ looc odoyit ɔɔrtɔ ki Loryen ween labjoi calaŋ amiirenu ki vurut.
49006012	Eeci alaŋ kɔɔrɔ naaga ki modo ci anyak eleeti ci kacin kiyo naaga o. Bar kɔɔrɔ ki toonnyak o Loryento ki voŋizok ogin gɛr abaak muura. Abal niigi looc nico, ma anyak dɔyiz vitɛnane ugeec abal loocowe nicoko dook kurum ŋinti aŋɛrɔn tammu taden ki looc e.
49006013	Inoko zin agamit kilibwa o Joowo ka inimit ooryɔi ki Loryen. Uruktek zɔɔ looc iliŋliŋti kaal ci anyuŋ Jooi noko dook, ka omogit Loryen.
49006014	Uruktek cazok looc juruŋ. Anycek zɔɔz o Joowo een didi kizi voocwɛn cugooc acabju keŋti. Anycek baayiz unooŋ abon kizi kubuli ceen ziit.
49006015	Uuwayit kaviyak o abon o anyaa ganɔn ka kizi caava cugooc zoonu adɔi.
49006016	Agamit tuwɛn ween kilip juruŋ ka eelai eleeti dilanyaye o Loryento gɛr.
49006017	Agamit rogzɛn unooŋ aruguzuŋ Jooi igeet juruŋ ka kizi kavurɛt cugooc ootinu een ziik. Agamit buk zɔɔz o Joowo atobɔ ki gina.
49006018	Utuguz kaal nicoko dook ŋaati ajinu Jook tnp dɔyize o Vɔŋiz onin ka kitirituŋ niini igeet. Zin gole nico iziti vililɛ emeda ŋaryiinta. Ijintek buk gɔɔn Jook ɔl o tuwento dook.
49006019	Ijinteyaŋ buk gɔɔn Jook aneet ɛlɛ ka kanyan niini aneet kuduwa zoozok ci abon iinya dook ŋaati kazɔɔzɛ, ka kuduwak gɔɔn ɔl dook keŋti ci kaviyak o Joowo baal rak aroodi e moozɛta.
49006020	Keen toonnyai ci ka kuuwak kaviyak o Joowo abon mayo nuun kacabje o. Aŋaruyozeyaŋ zin ka kuuwak zɔɔz o Joowo moozɛta labak.
49006021	Inoko zin kitoonekuŋ igeet Ticikos ween gɔtɔna ona karɛɛz tuwɛnta o gɔɔn iimi nɔɔnɔ ziniz liŋliŋonte o Manyi. Ŋaan akɔ aduwakuŋ niini igeet kaviyak o akanan aneet, ki ɔl ci karomɛna ki aneet ŋaato o dook. Ka zin buk kanyuŋ niini igeet odoyit tuwɛnta.
49006023	Abon bai Jooi ween baatina been Manyi Yesu Kiristo anyek ganɔn ki tuwɛn ki rɛɛzɔnɛt gɔtɔnɔga ogaac tuwento dook.
49006024	Abon bai amayuk Jooi ɔl o arɛɛz Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo rɛɛzinɛt ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
50001001	Aneet Pɔl kibeen Timozi o keegina gabara o Yesu Kiristo kayeedekuŋ waragɛ nico igeet dook ɔl o Joowo o oromtozeyu Yesu Kiristo o abaaku Vilipiya kibeen alaat o ɔl o tuwento been tiritok ugeec.
50001002	Abon bai anyuŋ Jooi ween baatina been Manyi onai Yesu Kiristo dɛtɛn been ganɔn.
50001003	Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ ma kabaabanuŋ igeet, kanyi Jook zany ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt.
50001004	Kajinekuŋ gɔɔn Jook talniinta tup ŋaati kaŋaryinɛ.
50001005	Katal Jook, eeci atiritaŋ niiga aneet liŋliŋonte o uuwayi o kaviyak o Joowo, akanai iitene baal agamanu e zɛɛ been inoko o.
50001006	Kaga zin naana Jooi o akata liŋliŋɔn o abon zinzeetine ugooc ŋaan atirituŋ niini igeet zɛɛ ma arumnyuŋ iiten ci abadaan Yesu Kiristo katin e.
50001007	Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ kabaabanuŋ naana igeet zinize cano. Aganɔ zin ŋaatan ŋaati kabaabanuŋ igeet nɔkɔ, eeci oromtozeyaŋ niiga aneet detene o liŋliŋɔn o anyan Jooi. Yo nuun een inoko ŋaati kacabinɛ o, karabɔŋ een ŋaati alaŋ kacabinɛ, atiritaŋ niiga aneet ka kɔɔrɔi kaviyak o Joowo.
50001008	Aga Jooi naana kaduwa didi giye ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Kareezuŋ igeet dook ɔrɔɔt o, eeci didi kareezuŋ naana igeet zinize onan dook kiyo areezuŋ Kiristo o.
50001009	Kajinekuŋ zin gɔɔn naana igeet Jook o ka kazaacɛ rɛɛzɔnɛt unooŋ tup kidikir, ka buk kazaacɛ gawiin unooŋ agayu Jook kidikir.
50001010	Ka zin agaac niiga iinya dook kaal o abon. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, atirituŋ gi nici igeet obonta ŋume o Joowo zɛɛ been iiten ci abadaan Yesu Kiristo katin e.
50001011	Enice ka zin ibitit niiga bonat ween didi o aku ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo doon. Ma zɔɔz nici anyaak Jook naatinɛt been diŋdiŋɔn.
50001012	Dɔl o yaai tuwento, inoko karooŋnyuŋ naana igeet agaac kaal o gɛrzɛ agoononekan aneet dook bar itiritit kaviyak o Joowo abon kazaantozek looc.
50001013	Inoko takirnya o abɛk ɔl o acabje kibeen buk ɔl dook ŋaato agaac niigi kacabje naana o, eeci keen gabaren ci Yesu Kiristo. Alaŋ kacabje giye ci kagɔɔnɛ gi ci gɛr.
50001014	Mazin cabiin cane o bar idiziyek ɔl ci meel ole o tuwento kiziti mootɛ kuuwayit zɔɔz o Joowo kɔkɔm ŋoliin.
50001015	Ŋɛdɛt kaga naana ɔl nici ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ uuwak gole ci gɛr, eeci olla amadikan niigi aneet, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kujuktan niigi aneet. Maje ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ uuwak zɔɔz o Kiristo zinzeetine ci abon.
50001016	Ɔl nicigi uuwak zɔɔz o Joowo o, eeci areezan niigi aneet, ma aga niigi kacabje naana giye o koorinɛ kaviyak o Joowo.
50001017	Bar zin ɔl ci amadikan aneet o aliŋliŋ niigi gi ci akati eleeti ugeec, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kanyaaktakan niigi aneet baabani ci gɛr iinyaye ci kaavɛ cabiinta o.
50001018	Bar zin ŋaatan nici gi ci labak! Olla naana karooŋ gɔl ci uuwayin zɔɔz o Kiristo. Ma gi nici anyaakan aneet talniin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Yo nuun tɛ uuwak niigi zɔɔz o Kiristo zinzeetine ci gɛr, karabɔŋ een zinzeetinɛ ci abon, katalnɛ naana labak.
50001019	Eeci kaga naana ŋaryiin unooŋ kibeen tirtɛn o aku Vɔŋize o Yesu Kiristo ŋaan anyan aneet kɔɔgjai.
50001020	Gi can karooŋ ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn ce. Alaŋ naana karooŋ kiita liŋliŋonte o anyan Jooi kiliŋliŋ. Bar karooŋ kanyak moozɛt tup, ricik ɔrɔɔt ŋaati kacabinɛ noko ka kanyaak Yesu Kiristo diŋdiŋɔn alye can o kaale o kagoon dook, yo nuun tɛ karugi, karabɔŋ kadaai.
50001021	Mayo rogɛt gitaz? Ŋaatan rogɛt nɛɛn liŋliŋɔni o kaliŋliŋonɛkɛ Yesu Kiristo ween Manyi onan. Mazi kadaai giye ci akati nɔɔnɔ, bar abon ɔrɔɔt, eeci kavɔ naaga tammu tadena, ma kavɔ kajowa talniin o rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
50001022	Alaŋ zin naana kaga rogɛt ki daayiz kɛŋɛra ŋaatineeŋ jaŋ, matɛ ŋaan karugi, ma anyaak rogɛti cane o Kiristo liŋliŋɔn ci abon loota ŋina.
50001023	Inoko kaŋer zɔɔ. Karooŋ kotoŋ rogɛt ci loocu kanyei noko, ka kook koromtewa been Kiristo tammu tadena. Ma nici ŋaatan gi ci waan abon ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn.
50001024	Bar zin giye ci akanuŋ igeet, maya rak karugi.
50001025	Zin giye nico kaga naana ŋaan karugi rak tiŋeere, ma karomɛ kibeen igeet dook ka kitirituŋ igeet dook kazaaceyuŋ talniin tuwente unooŋ kizi maka.
50001026	Ka zin atanaaz niiga Yesu Kiristo ŋaaten aneet iiten ci kakunakuŋ naana igeet bodo.
50001027	Gi ci zin adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn baayizi ci abaaku niiga baayiz o aduyai kaviyawe o Kiristo. Mayo nuun tɛ kakunakuŋ naanalya igeet ka kicinuŋ, karabɔŋ alaŋ kakunakuŋ, abon kaziiŋnuŋ naana igeet adowinuŋ zinzeeti ki baabani, ma aruweku zɔɔ looc tuwɛnta odoyit gole o kaviyak o Joowo.
50001028	Má aŋolinu ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet, bar anyayit moozɛt tup nɔkɔ. Mã amɛnanu agoonu nɔkɔ, ayelzak koca gi nici nɔɔgɔ targanyin uneeŋ atarganyin katin. Maje niiga bar katin ɛɛlyanu, eeci Jook nɛɛn o katin ɛɛlanuŋ igeet.
50001029	Eeci ɔkɔlayuŋ niini igeet gɔl ci atuyu Yesu Kiristo. Alaŋ zin bar buk een gi nico doon, bar buk ɔkɔlayuŋ niini igeet gɔl ci aliŋliŋoneku niiga nɔɔnɔ, ma apirnanu ŋaatin.
50001030	Inoko zin kooritnɔŋ naaga dook liŋliŋonte nico. Nici liŋliŋɔn baal gɔɔn aziiknu kapirnanɛ naana e nɛɛn. Ma inoko ŋaan kamɛna nɔkɔ kiyo gɔɔn aziiknu o.
50002001	Inoko baayizi unooŋ ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo alaŋ anyuŋ dɔyiz? Inoko reezinɛt o Kiristo alaŋ anyuŋ talniin? Inoko niiga dook alaŋ anyaku Vɔŋiz o Joowo? Inoko gɔɔn alaŋ awucnekuŋ igeet ɔl ci apirna ŋaatunooŋ?
50002002	Karooŋnyuŋ zin naana igeet anyayit baabaninɛt ci adoye ki rɛɛzɔnɛt ci adoye ki zinzeeti ci adoye. Mã agoonu kaal nicoko, abiz buk koca aneet ziniz cane o ki talniin.
50002003	Má anyeku eet oma ŋaatunooŋ kutugu kaal ci akati ɛlɛ cin doon, bar abon acɛlbɛzan ɛɛti ɛlɛ calaŋ anyek niini ɛlɛ kizi titiny gonogine ogɛn.
50002004	Má atiritu eleeti ugooc doon, bar egelemit gɔl ci atiritu niiga ɔl oogi buk.
50002005	Abon niiga anyaku baabani ci atobɔ been baabani o Yesu Kiristo.
50002006	Mayo nuun atobɔ niini been Jook, ma anyak dɔyiz o Joowo ɛlɛ o, alaŋ arɔɔŋ kirican dɔyiz nico ɔrɔɔt.
50002007	Bar otoŋ tobɔnɛt o atobɔnɛ niini ki Jook, ma anyek ɛlɛ kizi gabaren. Agɔɔn niini ɛlɛ kibil kiyo ɛɛti o deer o.
50002008	Acɛlbɛzan niini ɛlɛ, ma awɔ gole ci aziiŋni Jook zɛɛ makacin ook daayize onin baal apirnanɛ ɔrɔɔt keete ween talakec e.
50002009	Giye nico ɔdɔŋa Jooi nɔɔnɔ loota ooyi tammu tadena, ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk zaar dook.
50002010	Ka zin kaala dook o abaak tammu tadena kibeen o abaak loota dook been o abaak tɔdɔwai eecitɔ dook kakati kozoŋti looc ŋume onin ŋaati adiŋdiŋani niigi zaar ogin.
50002011	Ma abɔra ɔl dook aatine ugeec gi ci azi nɛ, “Yesu Kiristo Manyi nɛɛn.” Ma gi nici anyek Jook ween baatina zany ɔrɔɔt.
50002012	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, karooŋnyuŋ iziiktaŋ ɔrɔɔt ŋaati kadɛwɔn noko kujuk bar baal gɔɔn aziiknaŋ niiga aneet tup iinyaye baal karomɛn kibeen igeet e. Abon gɔɔn aliŋliŋa ɛɛti ce ŋaatunooŋ rogɛt ci ɛlɛ onin niini alya. Utuguz gi nico ŋaati adiŋdiŋanu Jook ŋoliinta.
50002013	Eeci Jooi aliŋliŋ niini tnp nɔkɔ zinzeetine ugooc, ka kanyuŋ igeet dɔyiz ci aziiŋnu kaal o arooŋnekuŋ niini igeet utuguz, ma animnyu iziiyit nɔɔnɔ.
50002014	Iliŋliŋit kaal dook kɔkɔm cocobɔn been daŋɔn.
50002015	Ka zin anyayit niiga zinzeeti ci vɔɔr, ma abaaku been ɔl kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr eo dɔl o Joowo. Mayo nuun abaawonu ki ɔl ci loocu gɛr een libjok noko, abon ataranu niiga nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna kiyo monyonya o tammu tadena gɔɔn ataran looc o ŋaati uuwaweku niiga nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o rogeto.
50002016	Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, kanaati koca naana Jook ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt iitene ci abadaan Kiristo e, eeci kaga koca naana alaŋ adakan zɔɔ tuu demziinte onan kademezuŋ igeet.
50002017	Mayo nuun mã kadaai naana giye ci akati tuwɛn unooŋ, katalnɛ naana labak, ma kazɔl talniin can o ki igeet dook.
50002018	Buk niiga abon atalninu ka kozolit talniin cunooŋ o naaga dook.
50002019	Inoko zin karooŋ naana zaare o Manyi Yesu kitooneyuŋ Timozi kataman, eeci karooŋ kiziik kaviyak cugooc ka katalɔ aneet ziniz.
50002020	Akɔm eet oma ci abil kiyo Timozi o. Areezuŋ didi niini igeet ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ kook kitirituŋ.
50002021	Ɔl ogɛn aliŋliŋ kaal ci eleeti cigeec doon, alaŋ een kaal ci akati Yesu Kiristo.
50002022	Agayu ri niiga bonat o Timozi. Kaliŋliŋnya gɔɔn naana ki nɔɔnɔ kiyo logoti o aliŋliŋ kibeen baatin o ŋaati kuuwaka kaviyak o Joowo.
50002023	Karooŋ zin kitooneyuŋ nɔɔnɔ igeet kataman iiten ci tɛ akatai rooni onane, ma kagaweya gɔl ci kagawei.
50002024	Kaga zin naana zaare o Manyi ŋaan kakunakuŋ igeet naana alya taman.
50002025	Kabaaban abon kitoonekuŋ igeet Eparoditus ween gɔtɔna tuwɛnta baal itoonakaŋ aneet ka kiiya kitiritan e. Korkorya gɔɔn naana been nɔɔnɔ ŋaati kuuwaka kaviyak o Joowo.
50002026	Arɔɔŋ zin inoko niini kook ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka kook kicinuŋ igeet. Alaŋ niini atalnɛ, eeci aga atiranyuŋ igeet zinzeeti giye o aziiŋnu niiga nɔɔnɔ amɔɔr.
50002027	Amɔɔr zin didi iiten baale ɔrɔɔt kɔjɔŋɔz daayiz. Bar zin uwucewun niini Jook, makacin utuŋun Jooi nɔɔnɔ korok. Alaŋ zin awucnek Jook niini doon, bar kawucnei Jook naana buk, eeci mã adaai niini, kakati koca naana culum ɔrɔɔt.
50002028	Karooŋ zin naana kitooneyuŋ nɔɔnɔ igeet taman, ka ma avɔ acinu niiga nɔɔnɔ bodo ka ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt, ka buk culumi cane o kɔbɔwɛ.
50002029	Atalta zin niiga nɔɔnɔ zaare o Manyi reezinte o zinzeeti ugooc dook, eeci ɔl ci ɛɛl kiyo niini noko abon katitiny nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt.
50002030	Eeci iiten baale ɔjɔŋɔz niini daayiz giye ci akati liŋliŋɔn o Kiristo, ma atiritan niini aneet kaale calaŋ niiga animnyu atiritaŋ giye o eeginu rɛɛnɛ.
50003001	Gɔtɔnɔga, abon atalninu ɔrɔɔt ŋaati Manyi. Inoko bodo kabadai kaal baal rak kayeedekuŋ e ɛlɛ, eeci nici kaal o ka kuzuutuŋ igeet nɛɛn.
50003002	Egenyit ole o gɛr atobɔ been orze, ɔl o gɔɔn arican teedinɛt ci alyo.
50003003	Kaduwakuŋ gi nico o, eeci kanyayit naaga teedinɛt ween didi giye o kadiŋdiŋani naaga Jook ŋaaten Vɔŋiz onin, ma kajowa naaga titinyɔn o akunaket ageet ŋaati Yesu Kiristo. Alaŋ akunaket titinyɔnti giye ci kɛɛranɛ ci katɛɛdi eleeti eci bitaalu.
50003004	Matɛ waan kɔrɔɔŋ karek tuwɛn onan kaal ci kɛɛranɛ ci ɔl o Juz eecitɔ kariwan labak. Bar zin alaŋ karooŋ, eeci baale keen alaan ci ɔl o Juz, ma kazoonɛ kɛɛranɛ ugeec. Kaga naana kɛɛranɛ o ɔl o Juz ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɔl o arican kɛɛranɛ o Juz dook.
50003005	Baaba kibeen yaai ɔl o Juz ɛlɛ. Niigi bor ci ɔl o kazi Bɛnjimɛn. Keen naana biye o ɔl o Juz ɛlɛ rɔp. Ateedan baale ɔl aneeta ŋaati kidicayɛ iinya torgɛrɛm kiyo gɔɔn ɔl o Juz dook o. Ma kazoonɛ kɛɛranɛ o ɔl Juz dook juruŋ.
50003006	Kagidi gɔɔn baale naana ɔl o atu Yesu, ma kagoon kaal o arɔɔŋ lotinowo o Juz dook kɔkɔm gi ci kabaci. Mã da kizi gi ci anyet lotinowa o Juz kobonta, kobona koca naana ɔrɔɔt.
50003007	Bar zin inoko o giye ci akati Kiristo, kaal baal kagoon naana baal kizik abon ŋaatan e dook, kagawa inoko bar da kaal ci labak, alaŋ atiritan.
50003008	Alaŋ zin bar buk een kaal niceke doon, bar buk kanyeya kaal o loocu dook kizi kaal ci labak giye o karɔɔŋɛ naana gi o abon ɔrɔɔt. Titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal niceke dook gawiin o kagawɛ naana Yesu Kiristo ween Manyi onan. Giye ci akati nɔɔnɔ kujukeya kaal niceke dook tuu. Kanyeya nɔɔgɔ dook kizi kaal ci gɛr een ririny, ka kojowa naana gɔl o Kiristo.
50003009	Ka zin buk kanyak naana ŋintan ŋaatin. Alaŋ karooŋ bodo naana kobona dɔyize ci ɛlɛ can o doon giye ci kazoonɛ lotinok o Juz, eeci naana inoko kaga kanyawa bonat ween didi ŋume o Joowo giye o kutuwɛ Yesu.
50003010	Gi ci adiŋdiŋ ŋaatan ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn gawiin o kagawɛ Yesu been dɔyiz o iŋaani niini daayiza, ma karooŋ buk kɔzɔlta kibeen nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt onin. Ka buk kanyak naana titinyɔn daayiza kiyo buk baale niini e.
50003011	Eeci karooŋ ka kitiŋayan Jooi daayiza ka kook rogete o abil been nɛɛn.
50003012	Alaŋ katarkadi gi ci kazi nɛ, Kabona naana ŋume o Joowo. Akɔm. Bar olla ŋaan kamɛna koornɔŋ karooŋ bonat baal laadun areezekan Kiristo aneet e.
50003013	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, alaŋ ri naana kazi nɛ, Kobona ŋume o Joowo. Bar olla kanekuŋ nɛ, Erekteyan kaala baal gɛrzɛ kagoon baale e, ma inoko kɔrɔɔŋa ɔrɔɔt kɛmɛda kutugu kaal o areezekan Jooi aneet kutugu.
50003014	Inoko zin naana kari ɔɔ ŋin o abilni gi o karooŋ doon, ka kook kojowa dizkɛn o awekan Jooi aneet ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo tammu tadena.
50003015	Abon naaga dook o kodoyit tuwɛnta kanyak baabani nico. Bar matɛ anyak ŋaatunooŋ ɔl ci anyak baabaninok ci aŋɔrɔwɔ been nico, ŋaan ayelek Jooi nɔɔgɔ gɔl nico juruŋ.
50003016	Bar zin abon kamɛna naaga gole nico nɔkɔ.
50003017	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, emeda ayayiztaŋ aneet baayize onan. Ataŋaamtek buk ɔl o ayayizet ageeta baayize o acinu niiga ŋaatinaaŋ.
50003018	Kuduwayuŋ rak baale igeet gi nico lak ci meelik gɛr. Inoko bodo kaduwakuŋ ŋaati kaluwɛ kanyayɛ tilalɔ kɛbɛrɛn. Anyak ŋaatunooŋ ɔl ci meel ayelza baayize uneeŋ gi ci amarnin niigi daayiz o Kiristo keete ween talakec.
50003019	Ŋaan zin katin atarganyani niigi, eeci atitiny niigi dayiin doon anyek kizi Jook cineeŋ, ma adɔŋ eleeti kaale o gɛr o waan abon anyayi alyaan, ma abaaban niigi zinzeetine ugeec kaal ci loocu gɛr noko doon.
50003020	Maje ageet abilna baayizi onai tammu tadena. Ma kareyi naaga ɔrɔɔt kabɛk gɔl o akuni ruguzoiti ona ween Manyi Yesu Kiristo o ka kiiya tammu tadena.
50003021	Ŋaan zin tiŋeere aku abali niini dɔyize onin eleeti cigaac gɛr alaŋ anyak dɔyiz noko, ma anyek kotobtɔ ki ɛlɛ onin alaŋ adaai, ma anyek kaal dook dɔyize onin kiziiyit nɔɔnɔ doon.
50004001	Gɔtɔnɔga o kareezuŋ, karooŋ gɔɔn naana koromtɛ ki igeet nɔkɔ, eeci gɔɔn anyaŋ niiga aneet talniin ci kɔbɔlɔlɛ ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt. Abon zin aruweku zɔɔ looc odoyit nɔkɔ baayize unooŋ ŋaaten Manyi Yesu Kiristo.
50004002	Inoko kilalekuŋ igeet ŋaai ween ram kazi Odiya been Sintica otoŋit daŋɔn. Oromtɛ iziti ŋoonen ŋaaten Manyi Yesu Kiristo.
50004003	Kilalekin buk ineet laŋo ween didi ka tirit niina ŋaai nicoko, eeci gɔɔn baale niigi kibeen Kelemet been buk ɔl oogi ci gɔɔn kaliŋliŋnya been nɔɔgɔ, atiritan niigi aneet ɔrɔɔt ŋaati kuuwayɛ kaviyak o Joowo. Eteyeede zin inoko nɔɔgɔ zaara ugeec waragewe o rogeto.
50004004	Inoko zin karooŋnyuŋ igeet dook, ataltɔ tup nɔkɔ baayize unooŋ ŋaati Manyi Yesu. Kabɛdɛkɛ gi nico bodo kanekuŋ nɛ, Ataltɔ.
50004005	Eyeliztak zinzeeti bonat ɔl dook. Izi ŋinti ka kiiyai Manyi ajɔn.
50004006	Má anyaku ŋoliin kaale dook been nɛɛn, bar mã anyak gi ci arooŋnyu, ijinit Jook ŋaryiinta tup. Ijinit Jook zinzeetine ugooc ŋaati anyeku nɔɔnɔ zany kaale dook.
50004007	Ŋaan Jooi o anyak ganɔn o adikir ɔrɔɔt azooni zinzeeti ugooc been baabaninɛt unooŋ kaavtiyɔ yaak giye o aromenu niiga ki Yesu Kiristo.
50004008	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, Inoko zin karooŋnyuŋ naana igeet ibitizit ooti ugoocok baabaninte ci abon anyak leeminɛt, ki baabaninte ci anyak titinyɔn dook, ki baabaninte ci abil tɔp, ki baabaninte ci akati vooritin, ki baabaninte ci atalna ɔl, ki baabaninte ci anyak ɛɛzɛt. Abaabanit kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ doon.
50004009	Má anyeku kibiirtuŋ ooti. Utuguz kaal baal iziiktu ŋaatan, ma icintu kagoon, ma kademzekuŋ, ma agamtawu niiga ŋaatan e. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, azuunuŋ koca Jooi o ganonto igeet.
50004010	Inoko katalnɛ naana ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaati Manyi Yesu giye o bodo inoko aadayaŋu niiga aneet ka itiritaŋ eonooŋ laadun. Iiten baale rak amalaŋtu niiga ŋinti wun ci alaŋaan atiritaŋ aneet, eeci akɔmnuŋ waŋi ci ka itiritaŋu.
50004011	Alaŋ kaduwakuŋ gi nico giye ci karɔɔŋɛ bodo naana kaal oogi. Akɔm, eeci kɛdɛmɛza gɔl ci kaleenona naana kibeen kaal o kanyei.
50004012	Kaga naana gɔl ci kabaayɛ iinyaye ci kamaanɛ ɔrɔɔt kibeen gɔl ci kabaayɛ iinyaye ci kanyɛrnɛ, ma kagawa baayiz ci golok nicoko dook. Olla ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana o iinya dook, kaleenona kibeen kaal ci tɛ kanyei o. Yo nuun kanyer, karabɔŋ adakan magiz, karabɔŋ kanyei kaal ci mɛɛlɛ, karabɔŋ een ci miliny, kaleenona kibeen aneet labak.
50004013	Kanim naana kutugu kaal dook labak ŋaaten Yesu o anyan aneet dɔyiz.
50004014	Bar zin buk tirtɛn cunooŋ atiritaŋ aneet iinyaye ci kapirnanɛ noko, abon ɔrɔɔt.
50004015	Baale ɔɔwa iitene baal kakananɛ uuwawi o kaviyak o Joowo, ma kiŋaanɛ looce unooŋ kazi Masidoniya e, akɔm waanice ɔl oogi ole o tuwento ci atiritan aneet kaale ci anyan, bar igeeta doon baal atiritaŋ aneet e. Agayu ri buk zɔɔz nico niiga alya ɔl o Vilipiya.
50004016	Buk baale iŋaan kaavɛ Tɛsalonika e, itoonakaŋ waanice niiga aneet kaal o karooŋ lak ci meelik gɛr.
50004017	Alaŋ zin bar titiny ɔrɔɔt kaala ci anyaŋ niiga aneet o doon, bar titiny ŋaatan ɔrɔɔt mayuwɛnɛt o amayukuŋ igeet Jooi tirtente unooŋ.
50004018	Inoko zin urumnyan Eparoditus kaal baal itoonakaŋ e dook, ma inoko kanyawa kaal ci meelik gɛr kɔkɔm gi ci kamaati kaale o karooŋ rogete onan. Ɛɛl zin kaala nici kiyo kaala o gɔɔn amadɛ ɔrɔɔt kanyek Jook ka katalɔi niini ɔrɔɔt o.
50004019	Ŋaan zin buk anyuŋ Manyi onane igeet dɔyize onin kaal dook o arooŋnyu niiga rogete unooŋ irkente onin ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo.
50004020	Kanycek Jook ween baatina zany nɔkɔ kodot. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
50004021	Ijintayaŋ zin ɔl o Joowo zaare o Yesu Kiristo dook.
50004022	Azaayuŋ buk igeet ɔl o Joowo dook ŋaato, ricik ɔrɔɔt ɔl o aliŋliŋonek alaan o Rom.
50004023	Nyamɛr dɛtɛni o Manyi Kiristo kaavu ŋaatunooŋ igeet dook.
51001001	Aneeta Pɔl o keen toonnyai o Yesu Kiristo eo arɔɔŋi Jooi niini doon.
51001002	Aneet been Timozi ween gɔtɔna tuwɛnta kayeedekuŋ waragɛ nico igeet ɔl o Joowo abaaku Kolosiya, igeet o eeginu gɔtɔnɔga giye o atuyu niiga Yesu Kiristo. Nyamɛr kanyuŋ Jooi ween baatinai igeet dɛtɛn ki ganɔn.
51001003	Gɔɔn tup kaŋaryonekuŋ naaga igeet, ma kanyeka zany Jook ween baati Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo.
51001004	Eeci kiziikta naaga tuwɛn o atuyu Yesu Kiristo kibeen reezinɛt unooŋ areezu ɔl o Joowo dook.
51001005	Atuwenu niiga, ma areezonu o, eeci baale ɔɔwa e iziiktu niiga kaviyawe o Joowo zɔɔz o akati rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn o itaŋekuŋ Jooi igeet tammu tadena. Inoko zin tuwɛn ki rɛɛzɔnɛt cunooŋ o abilna giye nico.
51001006	Anyaa kaviyawa o Joowo mayuwɛnɛt, ma adala looc dook kiyo baale buk akunakuŋ igeet iitene baal aziiŋnu niiga dɛtɛn o Joowo, ma agayu dɛtɛn nici een didi e.
51001007	Aziiknu waanice niiga zɔɔz nico ɔɔwa ŋaati laŋotinaaŋ o kareeza kazi Epavaras o atiritet niini ageeta vɔlkɔcɔnta liŋliŋonte o Kiristo.
51001008	Iiya zin uduwayet niini ageeta zɔɔz o akati rɛɛzɔnɛt o anyuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo igeet.
51001009	Zin giye nico kajinekuŋ gɔɔn naaga igeet Jook tup nɔkɔ, akana iitene baal kaziikna zɔɔz nico e zɛɛ been inoko o. Kajina Jook ka kanyuŋ niini igeet gɛnyiz o Vɔŋiz o Joowo ka agayi kaal o abon o arooŋekuŋ Jooi igeet utuguz.
51001010	Ka zin inimit abaayit baayiz o arɔɔŋ Manyi, ma agoonu kaal ci atalna niini iinya dook. Gole nico ayelzai bonati o baayiz unooŋ kaale o abon agoonu niiga tup, ma iroktanu agaac Jookjuruŋ.
51001011	Abon bai anyuŋ Jooi igeet dɔyiz ci amezu piryakzɛt zinzeetine ci alal talniinta.
51001012	Nyamɛr buk anycek niiga Jook ween baatinai zany talniinta giye o anyuŋ niini igeet oromtozek ɔl ogin dook ka ozolit niiga kibeen nɔɔgɔ kaal o itaŋek Jooi ɔl ogin baliinte onin atobɔ ki vooritin.
51001013	Ɛɛlawet Jooi ageet dɔyize o oŋenu atobɔ ki muur, ma anyaawet niini ageet kivita kɔɔtɔ baliinte o ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo o arɛɛz niini.
51001014	Ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin kabaayitɔ naaga yaak, eeci aaryai ageet oŋɛ ogaac.
51001015	Kiristo niinilya riritɔn ci Joowo. Ayelzaket niini ageet Jook o alaŋ naaga kacin. Niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo ween abuu o abal kaal o ɛɛnyca Jooi dook.
51001016	Ɛɛnyca Jooi kaal o kacin kibeen o alaŋ kacin dook tammu tadena been loota ŋaaten Yesu. Ma kaala nicigi voŋizok o anyak dɔyiz kibeen alaat ugeec been dɔyiz o baliin uneeŋ. Ɛɛnyca Jooi tammu taden ki looc kibeen kaal dook ŋaaten Yesu, ma anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kaal nicoko dook ka kabal.
51001017	Ma ŋaan kɛtɛɛnyai kaala dook e, aavi niini tɔ laadun, ma aromɛ kaala dook dɔyize onin.
51001018	Inoko zin arayin niini ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ, ma ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ oromtɛ niigi kizi ɛlɛ codoi. Niigi zin ɛlɛ ci Kiristo. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔgɔ rogɛt. Niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo ween abuu o avula ŋaazi daayiza ka karawɔi kaal dook niini, ma abal nɔɔgɔ dook niini doon.
51001019	Eeci arɔɔŋ Jooi nɔɔnɔ kanyak dɔyiz ki diŋdiŋɔn dook kiyo niini o.
51001020	Abadakɛ Jooi ɛlɛ kaal dook ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo. Anyawun niini ganɔn kibeen kaal o ɛɛl tammu tadena been loota dook ŋaaten daayiz o ŋɛɛrin keete ween talakec.
51001021	Bar zin baale niiga adɛyanu Joowa, ma amarninu nɔɔnɔ, eeci baabanowa ugooc kibeen liŋliŋonok ugooc gɛrzɛ.
51001022	Bar zin inoko ŋaaten daayiz o ŋɛɛrin keete ween talakec anyaawuŋ Jooi igeet ivita iziti laŋoten been nɔɔnɔ. Ma anyuŋ niini igeet obonta ŋume onin.
51001023	Abon zin amɛnanu niiga aruweku zɔɔ looc kodoyit tuwente unooŋ, ka gɛrzɛ ŋaan abulunu gi o abon aduyai kaviyawe o Joowo. Nici kaviyak o abon baal gɔɔn aziiknu uuwawonek modɛn dook loota e nɛɛn. Kizɛ zin buk naana gabaren ci kaliŋliŋ liŋliŋɔn nico.
51001024	Inoko zin naana katalnɛ labak piryakzete onan ŋaaten igeet. Kapirnanɛ naana ɛlɛ cano o, eeci karooŋ kidica piryakzɛt baal apirnanɛ Yesu ŋaaten ɔl o tuwento e.
51001025	Ɛŋɛrawan Jooi aneet kizi gabaren ci ɔl o tuwento, ma anyan liŋliŋɔn nico ka kitirituŋ naana igeet kuuwayeyuŋ zɔɔz onin kiziiyɛ juruŋ.
51001026	Rak baale laadun kinatamma e arɔɔdi Jooi ɔl o bulok dook zɔɔz nico. Bar zin inoko o iiya eyelizak niini ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nico.
51001027	Arɔɔdi baale laadun Jooi ɔl dook zɔɔz nico o, eeci arɔɔŋ niini ka kiiya kɔbɔrak ɔl ogin atu nɔɔnɔ. Arɔɔŋ niini keyeliza diŋdiŋɔn ci zɔɔz cin baal aroodi noko modɛni dook. Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico o akati gi o aavɛ Yesu ŋaatunooŋ igeet o alaŋ eeginu Juz ka ozolit niiga been nɔɔnɔ titinyɔn onin.
51001028	Kuuwayeka zin gɔɔn naaga zɔɔz o akati Kiristo ɔl dook, ma kilota nɔɔgɔ, ma kademzeka nɔɔgɔ kaal o kagaya naaga dook, eeci karooŋnya naaga kanyaaktawa ɔl dook ŋum o Joowo ka keelit niigi kiyo ɔl o iroktai ŋaaten Yesu o giye o oromtozɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ.
51001029	Gi o zin gɔɔn kuukona naana ki liŋliŋɔn ɔrɔɔt o nɛɛn, kaliŋliŋ naana dɔyize o adikir anyan Kiristo, ma inoko o aavi alye onan.
51002001	Karooŋnyuŋ igeet agaac gi o kuukona naana ki liŋliŋɔn ɔrɔɔt ŋaaten igeet, ki ɔl o abaak kuture o kazi Ladosiya, been buk ɔl o ŋaan laadun kicintan niigi aneet.
51002002	Kaliŋliŋ ɔrɔɔt o, ka kodoyit igeet dook zinzeeti oromtɛ rɛɛzɔnta. Ka zin agaac niiga dook anyaktu gɛnyiz o anyaa gawiin o Joowo. Ka buk agaac niiga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci baal arɔɔt Jooi ziniza o, ma gi nici akati Kiristo ɛlɛ.
51002003	Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ween gɔl o ajowanu niiga gawiin ki gɛnyiz o Joowo dook.
51002004	Kayeedekuŋ gi nico o, ka kɔkɔm eet ci aku alabanuŋ igeet daŋonte ceen vɔlɔŋ akɔm leeminɛt.
51002005	Inoko zin kadɛwɔ naaga eleetinɛ doon, maje baabaninta karomɛ naana ki igeet, ma katalnɛ giye o adowinu niiga tup, ma aruweku zɔɔ looc tuwɛnta ŋaaten Kiristo.
51002006	Mazin giye o agamtayu niiga Yesu Kiristo kizi Manyi cunooŋ, abon aromoneku niiga nɔɔnɔ baayiz unooŋ.
51002007	Uruktek zɔɔ looc ŋaaten Yesu ka itirokcai ŋaaten nɔɔnɔ. Emeda odoyit tuwente unooŋ ɔrɔɔt ebaal edemeztu laadun e. Anycek Jook zany tup nɔkɔ.
51002008	Karicanekuŋ igeet, ebeyit eleeti juruŋ, ka kɔkɔm eet ci alabanuŋ igeet gɛnyize ci areket kɛŋ akati demziin o voloŋo aku ole o deer. Eeci demziin nici akati kɛɛranɛ o loocu, alaŋ akati Yesu Kiristo.
51002009	Ma bonati o baayiz o Joowo dook ayelzai ŋaati Kiristo. Abitiz Jooi nɔɔnɔ bonata, ki gɛnyiza, been dɔyize onin dook.
51002010	Anyozeyuŋ zin buk igeet bonati o baayiz o Joowo dook giye o oromtozeku niiga Kiristo, ma abitizuŋ niini igeet calaŋ arooŋnyu bodo gi oma. Anyak niini dɔyiz ci abali kaal o anyak dɔyiz dook.
51002011	Ma giye o oromtozeku niiga Kiristo, eeltu niiga kiyo ateedinu o. Bar zin teedinɛt cunooŋ o alaŋ atobɔ kibeen o gɔɔn agɔɔn ɔl o deer azɛɛnɛ. Ma naaga ŋaaten Kiristo kɛɛl kiyo kateedi o giye o ɔɔgayet niini ageet dɔyize o oŋɛ o arooŋeket ageet eleeti ogaac kutuguz.
51002012	Waanbaal oonyinu e, eeltu niiga kiyo adaaktu kibeen Yesu o, ma buk onyente nice eeltu kiyo aŋaanu niiga daayiza kibeen nɔɔnɔ o, eeci atuyu niiga dɔyiz o Joowo baal aŋaani Yesu daayiza e.
51002013	Baale eelnu niiga kiyo ɔl o adaai o, eeci waanice eeginu modɛn ci oŋenu, ma akɔmnuŋ igeet lotinok zinzeetine ugooc. Bar zin inoko o anyaayuŋ Jooi igeet rogɛt ŋaaten Kiristo. Aarawet Jooi ageet oŋɛ ogaac dook.
51002014	Aara niini ŋaatinai ŋabolɛt o oŋenu kibeen dɔyiz o lotinowu baal gɔɔn aconanet e iitene baal adodinɛ Yesu Kiristo keete ween talakec e.
51002015	Ma gole nico izirziran Jooi dɔyiz o Loryento ki kaal o anyak doyizok dook been alaazɛt uneeŋ. Ma ayelza niini dɔyiz onin amɔgi nɔɔgɔ talakece o adaŋni Yesu ŋaati awɔyi caala.
51002016	Karicanekuŋ zin naana igeet ka calaŋ anyeku eet oma kabakbayanun giye ci akati dayiin, karabɔŋ een kaal ci awudu, karabɔŋ een gi ci akati iiten o Juz kazi Sabit, karabɔŋ bar een diŋdiŋani ci adiŋdiŋanu nyelok iitene o gɔɔn anyerkin.
51002017	Eeci kaala nicigi dook riritɔn ci kaal ci ka kivita, bar zin gi nici akati Yesu Kiristo ɛlɛ.
51002018	Má anyeku eet oma kabakbayanuŋ igeet gole ci aduwakuŋ niini igeet wunozyak cigin ka idiŋdiŋanti niiga toonnyak o Joowo kiyo niini o. Eeci ɛɛti ci abil nɔkɔ adɔŋ niini ɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt, ma azɔp looc tup azɔɔz zoozok ci labak ci akati kaal o loocu.
51002019	Ma ɛɛti ci agɔɔn nɔkɔ ɛdɛyai niini ŋaati Kiristo ween ɔɔ o bor o ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ dook. Bar zin ŋaaten Kiristo ween ɔɔ o bor o tuwento, aromɛ ɔl o tuwento dook kodoye kiyo korɔna o arom ɛlɛ kɔdɔwɛ o, ma iroktai niigi kodoyit eo arɔɔŋi Jooi.
51002020	Mã didi oromtozeyu niiga Kiristo daayize onin, ma alaŋaan aziiknu kaalyan ci loocu noko, naa zin bodo abaaku baayiz ci ɔl ci loocu o? Izitu koca tarbalɛ mã aziiknu kɛɛrit o azi nɛ, “Má agam gi nico. Má atar gi co. Má uum ce.”
51002022	Ma kaala nicigi dook kaal ci utuguze, ma akɔm ŋinti akati. Olla niigi kɛɛranɛ ci avu eete ci deer doon.
51002023	Ŋɛdɛt kɛɛrita nicigi mã kacin bar kizik anyak gɛnyiz ceen didi giye o adaŋɛkɛ niigi ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit toonnyak o Joowo, ma acɛlbɛzan eleeti, ma apirnanɛ eleeti. Bar zin mã aada ɛlɛ gi ci aada, alaŋ kaala nicigi atiritet ageet kuzuuti eleeti kaale o gɛr.
51003001	Agayu niiga oromtozeyu Kiristo, ma itiŋgazu been nɔɔnɔ daayize o anyaa oŋɛ ugooc. Abon zin areku zinzeeti kaal o ɛɛl tammu tadena ŋaao aavɛ Kiristo libire o Joowo azo.
51003002	Aryek zinzeeti kaal o ɛɛl tammu tadena. Otoŋit kaal o arɔɔŋ ɔl o loocu.
51003003	Eeci utuŋtu niiga oŋɛ kiyo ɛɛti o adaai alaŋ bodo agɔɔn oŋɛ o. Inoko zin rogɛt unooŋ colai anyak Kiristo ŋume o Joowo.
51003004	Kiristo nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet rogɛt ween didi. Mazi katin ayelzai niini, ayelizyanu buk niiga, ma aromoneku nɔɔnɔ, ma azolu kibeen nɔɔnɔ titinyɔn onin.
51003005	Abon zin adaweku looknya kɔɔt many kaalyan o loocu gɛr gɔɔn arɔɔŋ eleeti ugooc utuguz kiyo zoocmazita, ki waaŋzɛt, been kaal o gɛr akati waazɛt, ricik ɔrɔɔt zinzeeti appinzɛt o atobɔ ki diŋdiŋani o joowanɛ o loocu.
51003006	Eeci kaale nicoko akunak iima bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo been payiin onin ɔl o alaŋ azii nɔɔnɔ.
51003007	Baale rak niiga alya agoonu kaal nicoko waanbaal ŋaan abaaku muura e.
51003008	Bar zin inoko o abon adaweku kaal nicoko dook look kɔɔt many kiyo bornɛt nɔŋ, ki zinzeeti gidaŋitin, ki corzɔn, ki ŋɔmtɔn, been utugeti caŋkawɔn.
51003009	Buk má avoloŋnyu, eeci utuŋtu niiga zinzeeti o rɛɛn been gerzitin uneeŋ.
51003010	Anyaktu zin inoko niiga zinzeeti ci colai, ma azaacekuŋ Jooi igeet baayiz ci abon tup ka agaac nɔɔnɔ juruŋ, ka zin buk obonta niiga kiyo niini o.
51003011	Enico ɔkɔma ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci ɔl o Juz kibeen modɛn oogi. Ma akɔm buk ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci ɔl ci ateedi been ɔl calaŋ ateedi. Ma akɔm eet ci titiny been eet calaŋ titiny. Ma buk akɔm ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci ɔl ceen gabara been ɔl calaŋ een gabara. Bar zin adiŋdiŋ kaale dook Kiristo doon, ma aavi niini ɔla dook been kaale dook.
51003012	Inoko zin igeet ɛŋɛrawuŋ Jooi iziti ɔl cigin, ma areezuŋ niini igeet. Abon zin awucnekuŋ igeet ɔl ogɛn. Abon eeginu gononɛ. Abon acɛlbɛzanu eleeti. Abon atibeznu. Abon anyaku zinzeeti laliz.
51003013	Itiritɔ niiga dook. Mã anyak ɛɛti zɔɔz ci miliny gone oman, abon ooŋ niini nɔɔnɔ kiyo buk ooŋ Yesu oŋɛ ugooc o.
51003014	Mazin kaale nicoko dook titiny ɔrɔɔt rɛɛzɔnɛt, eeci rɛɛzɔnɛt arom kaal dook kodoye.
51003015	Abon ganɔni o anyek Kiristo ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ abal zinzeeti ugooc, eeci otowawuŋ Jooi igeet dook ŋaatodoi ka anyayit ganɔn nico.
51003016	Abon zɔɔz o Kiristo abaak zinzeetine ugooc ɔrɔɔt. Ɛdɛmɛztɔ. Itilozɔ niiga maany gɛnyize unooŋ dook. Ebenit beniinok o kadiŋdiŋani Jook gole ween didi anycek Jook zany beniinowɛ zinzeetine ugooc dook.
51003017	Utuguz kaal ci agoonu been ci aduwanu dook zaare o Manyi Yesu. Anycek Jook ween baatinai zany kaale dook ŋaaten Yesu.
51003018	Niiga ŋaai iziiyit eet ugooc, eeci nici gi o abon agoonu nɛɛn giye o atuyu niiga Manyi Yesu.
51003019	Buk niiga eeta ereezit ŋaai ugooc. Má agidu nɔɔgɔ.
51003020	Ma niiga dɔlya iziiyit baatugooc ki yaatugooc kaale dook, eeci gi nici anyek Jook katalɔ.
51003021	Buk niiga baatizɛt má agernyeku dɔl ugooc bolŋaca, gɛrzɛ ŋaan baraŋɛ dɔl zinzeeti.
51003022	Ma niiga gabara abon aziiŋnu manyigi ugooc aliŋliŋoneku loota ŋina kaale dook. Má bar olla aliŋliŋoneku nɔɔgɔ juruŋ ŋaati acinuŋ niigi igeet doon giye ci arooŋnyu zoozok ci abon ɔla. Bar iliŋliŋtozek nɔɔgɔ zinzeetine ceen didi giye o aŋolinu niiga Manyi Jook.
51003023	Ma kaal o agooneku manyigi ugoocok dook, utuguz volkoconte o zinzeeti ugooc dook, kiyo aliŋliŋoneku Jook o.
51003024	Eeci agayu niiga ŋaan aruwekuŋ Manyi Jooi igeet vɔyit o aterkedek niini ɔl ogin giye o aliŋliŋoneku niiga Manyi Yesu Kiristo.
51003025	Ma ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr ŋaatunooŋ dook, ŋaan katin acacai kaal ci gɛrzɛ gɔɔn agɔɔn niigi o, eeci Jooi apak ɔl dook kotobtɔ.
51004001	Ma niiga manyigi gabara, abon agoonu gabara ugooc juruŋ, eeci agayu buk anyaku niiga kibeen nɔɔgɔ Manyi unooŋ igeet dook tammu tadena.
51004002	Emeda ijinit Jook ɔrɔɔt. Aryek zinzeeti ŋaryiin juruŋ. Anycek Jook zany ŋaryiinta.
51004003	Buk ijinteyetu ageeta Jook ka kɔkɔlayet Jooi gɔl ci kuuwaka zɔɔz onin ka kuduktaya ɔl zɔɔz o Yesu Kiristo baal rak aroodi e. Nicini zin gi o gɔɔn kacabinɛ naana nɛɛn.
51004004	Ijinteyaŋ zin Jook ka kuuwayek ɔl zɔɔz nico kiziiyɛ juruŋ gole o arooŋekan niini aneet.
51004005	Egenyit gɔɔn ŋaati aromenu kibeen ɔl o alaŋ atuwe. Ma gɔɔn tɛ ajowanu waŋi, ooritnɔŋ uduktak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o akati Yesu Kiristo.
51004006	Anycek zoozok cugooc o kizi zoozok ci atalna ɔl, ma amednek nɔɔgɔ tup nɔkɔ. Abon agayu niiga gɔl ci abarzeku ɔl dook zɔɔz ci alɛɛmnyai.
