61002018	Eeci alaba niigi ɔl o arɔɔŋ konowit gɔl o Joowo abil tɔp zoozowe ci een vɔlɔŋ ki eleeti doŋnya kibeen kaale o gɛr arɔɔŋ nɔɔgɔ eleeti ugeec kiyo waaŋzɛt o.
61002019	Anek niigi ɔl nɛ, “Utuguz kaal o arooŋnyu utuguz labak,” maje bar niigi alya gabara ci oŋecu. Abalun oŋɛci nɔɔgɔ, ma alaŋaan anim niigi kotoŋit oŋɛ.
61002020	Mã utu ɛɛti Manyi Yesu Kiristo ween ruguzoi onai, ma utuŋun niini kaal o gɛr baal gɔɔn arɔɔŋ ziniz oninɛ kutugu e, mazi bodo amiironek kaal nicoko, koca tiŋeere payiin cinɛ iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ e appe ɔrɔɔt kujuk baal rɛɛn e.
61002021	Maya da bar ŋaan kiziiyit niigi gɔl o Joowo laadun kujuk ŋaati iziikti, ma bodo aborni zɔɔz o Joowo abon vurta.
61002022	Ma zɔɔz nici abil ole nicoko kiyo olit o gɔɔn azi ɔl nɛ, “Mã azai oroz zɛɛ ma odotiz, bodo amiironek zak ogine ɛlɛ, ma adak.” Ma bodo azi nɛ, “Mã uuny kɔcɔcɔbac kitiliza, amiironek bodo robrobo, ma abulɛnɛ.”
61003001	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, inoko kayeedekuŋ bodo waragɛ nico ka kono gɔɔn baal rak kayeedekuŋ ɔɔwa e. Ma waragenyaye nicoko dook karooŋ kaadayuŋ igeet kaal baal agawutu laadun e ka kizi zinzeeti ugooc vɔɔrɛ.
61003002	Karooŋnyuŋ igeet aada zoozok baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta o Joowo kibeen demziin o Manyi ween ruguzoi ona baal kuuwawekuŋ naaga o keegina toonnyak o Yesu e.
61003003	Ɔɔwa rak abon agayu gi ce. Tiŋeere iinyaye ci aṯornɛkɛ e, avu ɔl ci arɛɛz ŋaati agɔɔni kaal o gɛr arɔɔŋ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ugeec, ma avu amomoz demziin o Yesu.
61003004	Ma anɔ tiŋeere niigi nɛ, “Baale Yesu azi nɛ, Ka kabada bodo. Ka zin kabada tiŋa? Icinit di! Idicai jijitigaac, maŋaan buk kaala dook ɛɛl ebaal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi looc e ɛlɛ nɔkɔ.”
61003005	Epezit niigi loror nɔkɔ gi ween didi baal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi tammu tadena ki looc zɔɔza doon e. Ɛɛnyca niini looc maami.
61003006	Ma bodo baale iiya otodot looc maami.
61003007	Bar zin tɔdɔwa kibeen tammu ci kacin noko eelnek goo ka katin kavaat Jooi nɔɔgɔ lai zɔɔza doon iitene o arek niini ka kapayi ɔl o alaŋ atuwe, ma atarganyi nɔɔgɔ.
61003008	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, má anyeku kereyeyuŋ gi codoi ce. Iiteni codoi kibeen irkitok ceen eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1000), atobɔ dook nɔkɔ ŋaaten Jook.
61003009	Alaŋ Jooi aliŋliŋ kaal o atɛrkɛt niini kidicilim giye ci azeeni nɔɔnɔ dɔyizi kiyo abaaban ɔl ogɛn o. Bar olla alal nɔɔnɔ ziniz ŋaatunooŋ o, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini eet codoi kiiyak targanyinɛt, bar arɔɔŋ rak ɔl dook kabadit mony oŋene ugeec.
61003010	Zin tiŋeere iiteni o Manyi aku boyoŋyoŋ kɔkɔm eet ci agawa kiyo agoryaiti ween aamnyoi o. Iitene nice agɛrɛny tammu kɛŋ, ma azi ḏim calaŋ kacin bodo. Ma avaadi ii ki nyelok been monyony gooya lai. Buk lɔɔci kibeen kaal dook o ɛɛl loota ŋina katin avaadi lai.
61003011	Zin yo giye o tiŋeere iinanɛ kaal nici, abon inoko o niiga abaaku ku? Abon zin abaaku niiga baayiz o abon ŋume o Joowo. Abon ayelzanu gi o eeginu niiga ɔl cigin ŋinti ŋaan areyu niiga iiten o Manyi Yesu o.
61003012	Ereya niiga iiten o Manyi zinzeetine ci abur. Iiteni nica iiten o tiŋeere avaadinɛ tammu taden ki ii ki nyelok been monyony gooya lai nɛɛn.
61003013	Maje naaga karɛ tammu ki tɔdɔ o colai baal aterkedeket Jooi ageet e, ma ŋinita buri ci ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon.
61003014	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, ma giye o atuyu niiga terkediin o Joowo, ma areyu kaal ci ka katin kiitazɔ neke, ooritnɔŋ ɔrɔɔt anycek eleeti kitiliza ŋume o Manyi Yesu anyayit ganɔn kibeen nɔɔnɔ.
61003015	Abon buk aadanu niiga zinzeetine ugooc gi ceen didi ce. Ziniz laliz o Joowo nɛɛn o anyaakuŋ igeet rogzɛn. Buk Pɔl ween gɔtɔna ona karɛɛz tuwɛnta eteyeedeyuŋ baale igeet kaal nicoko gɛnyize o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
61003016	Azɔɔz baale niini waragɛnyai ogin dook zɔɔz ci akati kaal nicoko ɛlɛ. Azɔɔz gɔɔn baale niini iinyaye ogɛn kaal ci adɔi ŋaatinai, ma alaŋ naaga kaga keŋti cigeec. Ma ɔl ogɛn o ŋaan kagaac zɔɔz o Joowo juruŋ, avɔ niigi ademzek ɔl zoozok o Pɔl vɔlɔŋa, kiyo buk gɔɔn laadun ademzek niigi ɔl zoozok o Joowo oogi vɔlɔŋa o. Atargany zin katin Jooi nɔɔgɔ giye nico.
61003017	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, ma giye o agayu niiga kaal nicoko laadun, abon abeku eleeti juruŋ ka calaŋ alabanuŋ igeet oŋɛ ci ɔl o abor Jook, makacin ukuluztu tuwɛn unooŋ.
61003018	Bar emeda niiga abaayit baayiz ci abon giye o anyuŋ Manyi Yesu igeet dɛtɛn onin. Azaacit buk gawiin o agayu Manyi Yesu Kiristo ween ruguzoi onai. Abon bai kanyek Manyi zany nɔkɔ kodot. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
62001001	Kayeedekuŋ naaga igeet zɔɔz o akati Yesu ween zɔɔz o rogeto baal abil tɔ kanaanta laadun e. Kiziikta naaga nɔɔnɔ, ma kicinta nɔɔnɔ keberene ogaacak ɛlɛ. Ma buk kuumta naaga nɔɔnɔ aziine ogaacak.
62001002	Akɔ zɛɛ mazi ayelzai rogɛti nici e, kicinta naaga alya nɔɔnɔ. Kazooza zin naaga gi ci kagaya, ma kaduwakuŋ igeet gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ ween rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn baal laadun aromɛ ki Jook ween baatinai, ma iiya eyelozeyet ageeta e.
62001003	Mazin naaga kaduwakuŋ igeet gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ o kicinta ma kiziikta o, ka buk niiga oromtozeyetu ageeta tuwɛnta ki laŋotizete o kanyaka naaga ŋaaten baatinai kibeen ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo.
62001004	Kayeedekuŋ zin gi nico o, ka talniin onai ageet dook kizi appe.
62001005	Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ naaga igeet zɔɔz o kiziikta ŋaati ŋɛɛrin. Kanekuŋ nɛ, “Jooi niini vooritin, ma akɔm ŋaatin muur been nɛɛn.”
62001006	Mã kazi naaga nɛ, “Keeginɔ laŋoten kibeen Jook," maje bar bodo ŋaato kabaak muura, kavɔlɔŋ koca naaga zoozowe ci kaduwa o kibeen buk kaale ci kagɔɔn o.
62001007	Bar mazi kabaak naaga vooritina kiyo Jooi o, kizitɔ koca naaga dook laŋoten. Ma oonyanet biyeta o ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo ageet oŋɛ ogaac dook.
62001008	Mã kazi nɛ, “Akɔmnet ageet oŋɛ," kalaba koca naaga eleeti ogaac maany, ma akɔmnet ageet leeminɛt.
62001009	Bar mazi kabɔrak naaga Jook oŋɛ ogaac, aaranet koca niini ageet oŋɛ ogaac, ma oonyanet ageet kaal o gɛr kabaca dook lai. Agɔɔn nɔkɔ o, eeci een niini Jook o azooni zoozok o atɛrkɛt, ma agɔɔn kaal ci abon.
62001010	Mã kazi naaga nɛ, “Ŋaan kutuguz oŋɛ," kanyek koca Jook kizi voloŋnyoi, ma alaŋ aavi zɔɔz oninɛ ŋaatina.
62002001	Dɔl ogan tuwɛnta, kayeedekuŋ igeet kaal nicoko o, ka calaŋ abacanu oŋɛ. Bar zin matɛ gɔɔn anyak eet ci abaca oŋec, Yesu Kiristo tɔ. Ŋaan azoozet niini ageet ŋaati baatinai, eeci abon niini ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt.
62002002	Mazin Yesu niini alya gɔl o aaryanɛ oŋɛ ogaac nɛɛn. Alaŋ een zin bar oŋɛ cigaac o doon, bar buk oŋɛ ci ɔl o loocu dook.
62002003	Mã kazooni naaga lotinok o Joowo, kagaac koca naaga nɔɔnɔ didi.
62002004	Mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, “Kaga Jook," ma bar alaŋ azooni lotinok o Joowo, ɛɛti nicini voloŋnyoi, ma akɔm ŋaatin leeminɛt.
62002005	Maje ɛɛti ci azooni zɔɔz onin, eet o didi arɛɛz Jook ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn. Gɔl zin o kaga naaga karomɛn ki Jook nɛɛn ce.
62002006	Mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, “Kaga Jook," abon abaak niini baayiz ci abon kiyo baale Yesu Kiristo e.
62002007	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, alaŋ kayeedekuŋ igeet lotinɛt ci colai, bar kayeedekuŋ lotinɛt o rɛɛn baal iziiktu baale laadun e.
62002008	Kayeedekuŋ zin lotinɛt nico kizi colak bodo, ma lotinɛt nico eyelizyai titinyɔni oninɛ ŋaati Yesu kibeen ŋaatunooŋ buk, eeci muuri iziitɔ, ma iiya vooritin ween didi, ma inoko o atokoli.
62002009	Ma ɛɛti ci azi nɛ, “Kaavɛ naana vooritina," maje ŋaato amarnin gɔtɔni, ŋaan aavi niini muura nɔkɔ.
62002010	Mazin ɛɛti ci arɛɛz gɔtɔni, aavi niini vooritina. Ma akɔm gi ci gɛr agɔɔn niini ka kanyek eet oma kabaca oŋec.
62002011	Maje ɛɛti ci amarnin gɔtɔni, aavi niini muura. Awɔ niini muura, ma alaŋ aga ŋinti iim o, eeci anyek muuri nɔɔnɔ kizi ruben.
62002012	Kayeedekuŋ zin igeet dɔl ogan tuwento gi nico o, eeci aaryai oŋɛ ugooc lai zaare o Kiristo.
62002013	Kayeedekuŋ igeet baatigan gi nico o, eeci agayu niiga nɔɔnɔ o aavi tɔ baale kanaanta laadun e. Kayeedekuŋ igeet lɔgɔzɛt gi nico o, eeci omoktu niiga Loryen.
62002014	Kayeedekuŋ igeet dɔl o miliny gi nico o, eeci agayu niiga baatina. Kayeedekuŋ igeet baatizɛt gi nico o, eeci agayu niiga nɔɔnɔ o aavi tɔ baale kanaanta laadun e. Kayeedekuŋ igeet lɔgɔzɛt gi nico o, eeci adoknu, ma aavɛ zɔɔz o Joowo ŋaatunooŋ, ma omoktu niiga Loryen.
62002015	Má ŋaan zin areezu niiga looc kibeen kaal ci gɛr loocu noko, eeci mã areezu looc kibeen kaal ci loocu noko, alaŋ koca areezu niiga baatina.
62002016	Kaal zin o looc nico nɛɛn rɛɛcanzɛt, ki zinzeeti appinzɛt, ki eleeti doŋiin. Kaala nicigi alaŋ avu ŋaati baatinai, bar avu niigi dook looce nico.
62002017	Mazin lɔɔci nici kibeen kaal ci arɔɔŋ ɔl loota ŋina noko dook katin aṯornɛkɛ. Maje bar ɛɛti o agɔɔn gi o arɔɔŋ Jooi, arogi niini nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
62002018	Dɔl ogan kareezuŋ, izi looc dican ajɔn. Iziiktu baale niiga zɔɔz o azi nɛ, “Aku katin miroiti ci amarnin Kiristo.” Inoko zin eyelizyai ɔl ci meel ci amarnin Kiristo. Kagaac zin naaga izi looc dican ajɔn.
62002019	Mazin ɔl nici alaŋ da een niigi didi ɔl cigaac. Gi zin ci gɔɔn adɛyan niigi ŋaatinai o nɛɛn. Mã da waan kiziti niigi ɔl cigaac didi, karomɛ waan ki ageet. Bar zin ɛnyɛktɛ niigi ŋaatina o, ka kagaac ɔl dook niigi didi alaŋ een ɔl cigaac.
62002020	Bar zin niiga anyaku Vɔŋiz o Joowo o akunakuŋ igeet ŋaaten Kiristo. Inoko zin niiga dook agayu gi ween didi.
62002021	Alaŋ zin kayeedekuŋ igeet zɔɔz nico o giye calaŋ agayu gi ween didi. Bar kaga nɔkɔ ŋɛdɛt agayu, ma buk agayu niiga akɔm laadun vɔlɔŋ ci ɔrkɔr ki leeminɛt.
62002022	Mazin yo ŋɛnɛɛn ceen voloŋnyoi o? Eet ceen voloŋnyoi nɛɛn ci adaŋnye azi nɛ, “Yesu niini alaŋ een Kiristo.” Ma ɛɛti ci azi nɔkɔ o, niini amarnin Kiristo. Ma abor niini baatinai kibeen ŋɛɛrin buk.
62002023	Eeci ɛɛti ci abor ŋɛɛrti Joowo, abor buk niini Jook. Maje ɛɛti ci agama ŋɛɛrti Joowo, agama buk niini Jook.
62002024	Abon zin azuunu niiga zinzeetinɛ zɔɔz baal aziiknu ɔɔwa e juruŋ. Mã azuunu zɔɔz nice, aromenu koca niiga tup nɔkɔ ki Jook been ŋɛɛrin.
62002025	Gi zin o aterkedeket Kiristo ageet nɛɛn rogɛti o abil kodot.
62002026	Kayeedekuŋ zin gi nico o, ka egenyit ole o arɔɔŋ kalabtawuŋ igeet.
62002027	Bar zin igeet aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo tɔ ŋaatunooŋ. Mazi ŋaan aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatunooŋ o, alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga eet ci ka kedemezuŋ, eeci ademezuŋ niini igeet kaal dook. Ma kaal o ademzekuŋ niini igeet alɛɛmnyai, alaŋ een vɔlɔŋ. Uzuuti zin demziin ci Vɔŋiz ci Joowo o. Uruktek zɔɔ looc ŋaati Kiristo.
62002028	Dɔl ogan kareezuŋ, aavtiyek niiga nɔɔnɔ, ka tiŋeere ma aku niini ka calaŋ kanyak naaga alyaan ŋaatin iitene nice.
62002029	Mã agayu niiga didi Kiristo niini abon, agaac buk ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon dook niigi dɔl ci Joowo.
62003001	Icinit zin di reezinɛt o areezet Jooi ageet. Reezinɛt oninɛ adikir ɔrɔɔt, makacin utuyet ɔl ageet kiziti dɔl ci Joowo. Didi zin keegin naaga dɔl ci Joowo. Gi zin ci gɔɔn alaŋ agayet ɔl o loocu ageet o nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ aga niigi Jook.
62003002	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, inoko naaga keegin dɔl ci Joowo. Ŋaan zin rak inoko kagaac karabɔŋ tiŋeere kɛɛl ku, bar zin kaga naaga tiŋeere ma aku Kiristo, kɛɛl kiyo niini o, eeci katin kacin nɔɔnɔ kizi didi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ.
62003003	Mazin ɔl dook o arɛ gi nico, abon adɛwa eleeti kaale o gɛr ka kobonta niigi kiyo Yesu o.
62003004	Ma ɛɛti ci abaca oŋɛ, abac niini lotinok o Joowo, eeci oŋɛci baciin ci kabaci lotinok o Joowo.
62003005	Agayu niiga Kiristo aku ka kiiya kaara oŋɛ ɔla. Maje bar ŋaatin ɛlɛ akɔm oŋec kina.
62003006	Mazin ɔl dook o aavtiz ŋaaten Kiristo, alaŋ bodo amɛna ŋaati agɔɔni oŋɛ. Maje ɛɛti ci amɛnak oŋɛ, ŋaan niini kicin Kiristo, ma ŋaan buk kagama nɔɔnɔ.
62003007	Dɔl ogan tuwɛnta, má anyeku ɔl oogi kalabtawuŋ igeet. Ma ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal ci abon, niini abon kiyo Kiristo o.
62003008	Maje ɛɛti ci amɛna agɔɔn oŋɛ, niini eet ci Loryento, eeci Loryen abaca niini oŋɛ baale laadun kinatamma e. Gi zin baal akuni ŋɛɛrti Joowo e nɛɛn ka kiiya kɔɔyɔk liŋliŋɔn o Loryento.
62003009	Ma ɛɛti ci izi dole ci Joowo alaŋ bodo amɛna agɔɔn oŋɛ, eeci anyawun niini ziniz o Joowo. Giye o izɔi Jooi baatin, alaŋ bodo amɛna niini agɔɔn oŋɛ.
62003010	Ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt zin ci dɔl o Joowo kibeen dɔl o Loryento nɛɛn ce. Ɛɛti calaŋ agɔɔn gi ci abon, karabɔŋ alaŋ arɛɛz gɔtɔni, alaŋ een niini dole ci Joowo.
62003011	Eeci azi zɔɔz baal aziiknu niiga ɔɔwa e nɛ, Abon karɛɛzɔ naaga dook.
62003012	Alaŋ abon ŋaati kɛɛlni naaga kiyo baale ɛɛti o kazi Ken baal aavi libire o Loryento, makacin omony gɔtɔni onin niini maany e. Ma da Ken amony gɔtɔni naa? Amony niini gɔtɔni o, eeci gidaŋ nɔɔnɔ ziniz giye baal agɔɔni niini kaal ci gɛr, ma abor Jooi dizkɛn onin. Maje waanice gɔtɔnnya agɔɔn kaal ci abon, ma agama Jooi dizkɛn onin.
62003013	Dɔl o Yaai tuwento, má anyeku zin kibiirtuŋ ooti mã amarninuŋ ɔl o loocu igeet.
62003014	Kaga naaga kudunta daayiza, ma kivitak rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Kaga naaga gi nico o, eeci karɛɛz dɔl o yaatigaac tuwento. Ma ɛɛti calaŋ arɛɛz gɔtɔnɔgi, ŋaan niini aavi daayiza nɔkɔ.
62003015	Ma ɛɛti ci amarnin gɔtɔni, niini munyoi ŋume o Joowo. Ma agayu niiga ɛɛti ceen munyoi alaŋ anyak niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
62003016	Gɔl zin o ka kagawi naaga reezinɛt nɛɛn o iiya adaayi Kiristo ŋaaten ageet. Abon zin buk naaga kadaai ŋaaten dɔl o yaatigaac tuwento.
62003017	Ma anyak ɛɛti kaal ci meelik, ma acin gɔtɔni ci amaat, ma alaŋ atirit nɔɔnɔ, azi zin koca nɛ, Arɛɛz niini Jook o, ku?
62003018	Dɔl ogan tuwento, alaŋ abon ŋaati kaduwan reezinɛt otoga doon, bar abon kayelza reezinɛt ween didi kaale ci kagɔɔn.
62003019	Ma gole nico kagaac koca naaga kiziti ɔl ci Joowo didi. Ma buk koca kanyak naaga moozɛt ŋume o Joowo.
62003020	Mayo nuun akat zinzeeti cigaac o vinoc, alaŋ avir zinzeeti, eeci Jooi aga kaal dook kujuk o kaga naaga zinzeetine ogaac.
62003021	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, mã alaŋ akat zinzeeti cigaac o vinoc, kanyak zin koca naaga moozɛt ŋume o Joowo.
62003022	Ma kajowa ŋaatin kaal dook o olla kajin naaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci kazooni naaga lotinok ogin, ma kagɔɔn gi o atalnin niini.
62003023	Mazin gi o aricaneket Jooi ageet nɛɛn o abon katuwi naaga zaar o ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo, ma abon karɛɛzɔnɛ buk naaga alya maany kiyo aricaneket Kiristo niini alya ageet o.
62003024	Ma ɛɛti ci azooni lotinok o Joowo, oromozek niini Jook, ma aromonek buk Jooi nɔɔnɔ, ma kaga naaga gi nico Vɔŋize onin anyet niini ageet.
62004001	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, má olla agamanu zoozok ci ɔl dook, bar abon gɔɔn rak niiga aŋaamneku zɔɔz ci eeto juruŋ, karabɔŋ zɔɔz cinɛ o aku Joowa didi. Eeci ɔl ci meelik uuwak vɔlɔŋ azaantozek vitɛn nicoko dook.
62004002	Gɔl zin ci ka ojoktai niiga zɔɔz o aku Vɔŋize o Joowo een didi nɛɛn ce. Mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, “Yesu Kiristo iiya alye ci eet ci deer," ɛɛti nici anyak V ɔŋiz o Joowo.
62004003	Maje ɛɛti ci adaŋ zɔɔz nico, alaŋ niini anyak Vɔŋiz o Joowo, bar anyak niini vɔŋiz ci miroi o amarnin Kiristo baal iziiktu azi zɔɔz nɛ ka kiiya e, bar zin buk inoko iiya aavutɔ loota ŋino laadun.
62004004	Dɔl ogan tuwento, agaac niiga eeginu ɔl ci Joowo, ma omoktu ɔl o uuwak voloŋnyok. Eeci Vɔŋizi o Joowo aavi ŋaatunooŋ adɔi niini ɔrɔɔt kujuk Loryen o aavi ŋaaten nɔɔgɔ ween ɔl o loocu.
62004005	Azɔɔz zin niigi kaal o loocu, ma azii ɔl o loocu nɔɔgɔ, eeci eegin niigi ɔl ci loocu ŋina.
62004006	Bar zin naaga keegin ɔl ci Joowo. Ma ɔl o aga Jook aziiŋnet niigi ageet. Maje ɛɛti ci alaŋ een eet ci Joowo, alaŋ niini aziiŋnet ageet. Nici zin gɔl o ka kagayi naaga ŋɔrɔwɔnɛt ci ɔl o anyak vɔŋiz o zɔɔz ween didi been vɔŋiz o baciinowu nɛɛn.
62004007	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, kɛrɛɛztɔ naaga dook, eeci reezinɛt aku Joowa. Ma ɛɛti ci arɛɛz gɔnɔgi, niini dole ci Joowo, ma aga niini Jook.
62004008	Maje ɛɛti calaŋ arɛɛz gɔnɔgi, alaŋ aga niini Jook, eeci Jooi niini reezinɛt.
62004009	Ayeleket zin Jooi ageet reezinɛt onin gole o itoonanɛ ŋɛɛrin o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ kiiyak looc ka korogit naaga ŋaatin.
62004010	Alaŋ een ageet nɛɛn o karɛɛz Jook, bar nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o areezet ageet, ma itoonaket ŋɛɛrin ka kizi gɔl ci ka kaaryai oŋɛ ogaac. Nici zin reezinɛt nɛɛn.
62004011	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, mã areezet ageet Jooi o, abon buk naaga karɛɛzɔ.
62004012	Akɔm laadun eet ci icinun Jook, bar zin mã karɛɛzɔ naaga, aavi koca niini ŋaatinai, ma azaaci rɛɛzɔnɛt cinai o kidikir kiyo reezinɛt oninɛ o.
62004013	Kaga naaga kaavtiz ŋaaten Jook, ma aavi buk niini ŋaatinai, eeci kanyak naaga Vɔŋiz onin.
62004014	Kicinta zin naaga alya, ma kaduwaka ɔl kaneka nɛ, “Itoona Jooi ŋɛɛrin ka kiiya kizi rogozoi ci loocu.”
62004015	Mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, “Kaga naana Yesu niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo," aavi koca Jooi ŋaatin, ma aavi buk niini ŋaaten Jook.
62004016	Inoko zin naaga alya kagaac, ma kutuwit reezinɛt o areezet niini ageet. Jooi niini reezinɛt. Mã arɛɛz ɛɛti gɔnɔgi, aavi niini ŋaaten Jook, ma aavi buk Jooi ŋaatin.
62004017	Inoko zin reezinɛt o Joowo idikir ŋaatinai. Akɔmnet zin bodo ageet ŋoliin tiŋeere iitene ci roonnyo e, eeci baayizi cinai kabaayi looce nico o abil kiyo o Kiristo o.
62004018	Alaŋ zin bodo naaga kanyak ŋoliin, eeci areezet Jooi ageet ɔrɔɔt, ma reezinɛt cinɛ o aara ŋaatina ŋoliin dook, ma atɔɔk kook many. Ma ɛɛti ci anyak ŋoliin, ŋaan reezinɛt o Joowo kidikir ŋaatin, eeci ŋaan anyak niini ŋoliin ci akati payiin ci gɛr.
62004019	Mazin naaga karɛɛz Jook o, eeci Jooi ereezet niini ɔɔwa ageet.
62004020	Mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, “Kareez Jook," maje ŋaato amarnin gɔtɔni, niini voloŋnyoi. Eeci mã alaŋ arɛɛz ɛɛti gɔtɔni o acin kebereca, ka zin kɛrɛɛz Jook o ŋaan niini kicin ku?
62004021	Aricaneket Kiristo niini alya ageet gi ci azi nɛ, “Mã arɛɛz ɛɛti Jook, abon buk arɛɛz niini gɔtɔni.”
62005001	Ma ɛɛti ci atu, ma aga Yesu niini Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo, niini buk dole ci Joowo. Ma ɛɛti ci arɛɛz baati doleco, arɛɛz buk niini dole o eet nico.
62005002	Zin buk gole nico kaga naaga karɛɛz dɔl o Joowo een gɔtɔnɔga ogaac ŋaati karɛɛzi naaga Jook, ma kazooni lotinok ogin.
62005003	Eeci gɔl ci karɛɛzi naaga Jook nɛɛn ci kazooni lotinok ogin. Ma lotinowa oginɛ alaŋ adɔi ŋaati kazooni.
62005004	Eeci ɛɛti ci izi niini dole ci Joowo anim niini kɔmɔk gerzitin o loocu. Kanim zin naaga komogit looc tuwente onai.
62005005	Ŋɛnɛɛn zin inoko ci anim kɔmɔk gerzitin o loocu? Eet ci anim kɔmɔk gerzitin o loocu dook nɛɛn ci atu, ma aga Yesu niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo.
62005006	Ma Yesu Kiristo niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi. Ayelzai gi nici tonyente o maamu kibeen biyete o daayiz onin. Alaŋ ayelzai niini tonyenta doon, bar ayelzai niini tonyenta been biyɛtɛ. Vɔŋiz zin o Joowo nɛɛn ween bacoi onin. Niini Vɔŋiz o aduwa zɔɔz ween didi.
62005007	Anyak zin bacok ceen iiyu, Vɔŋiz o Joowo kibeen maam been biye.
62005008	Nɔɔgɔ dook iiyontiya adoye zɔɔz cineeŋ.
62005009	Mã kagama gɔɔn naaga zɔɔz ci aduwa ɛɛti ci deer, abon zin bar kaga naaga zɔɔz ci aduwa Jooi o adɔi ɔrɔɔt kujuk zɔɔz ci aduwa ɛɛti ci deer. Nici zin zɔɔz o aduwa Jooi zooze o akati ŋɛɛrin nɛɛn.
62005010	Mazin ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo anyak niini zɔɔz nico zinize onin. Maje ɛɛti calaŋ atu Jook, anyek niini Jook kizi voloŋnyoi zooze nico, eeci alaŋ atu niini zɔɔz o aduwa Jooi ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin.
62005011	Azi zin zɔɔz ci aduyai nɛ, “Anyet Jooi ageet rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ma rogɛti nici ajoyai ŋaati ŋɛɛrin.
62005012	Ma ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo, anyak niini rogɛt nico. Maje ɛɛti calaŋ atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo, alaŋ niini anyak rogɛt nico.”
62005013	Kayeedekuŋ naana igeet o atuyu zaar o ŋɛɛrti Joowo zɔɔz nico o, ka agaac niiga anyaku rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
62005014	Kanim naaga kijinit Jook labak o, eeci kaga naaga mã kajin nɔɔnɔ kaal o karɔɔŋ ŋaatin gole o arɔɔŋ niini, aziiknet niini ageet.
62005015	Aziiknet gɔɔn niini ageet mã kajin naaga nɔɔnɔ. Mazi kaga naaga zɔɔz nicini een didi, kaga zin buk naaga anyet niini ageet kaal o kajin nɔɔnɔ dook.
62005016	Ma acin ɛɛti gɔtɔni ci agɔɔn oŋec calaŋ akɔyi nɔɔnɔ daayiza, abon ajinek niini nɔɔnɔ Jook, ka korogoz Jooi nɔɔnɔ. Ma zɔɔz nici akati ɔl o oŋɛ ugeec alaŋ avɔyi nɔɔgɔ daayiza. Anyak zin oŋɛ ci avɔyi ɔl daayiza. Mazin eet ci agɔɔn oŋec nico o, alaŋ naana kazi nɛ, Ijintek nɔɔnɔ Jook.
62005017	Ŋɛdɛt kaala o gɛrzɛ kagɔɔn dook oŋɛ gi, bar zin anyak oŋec calaŋ akɔyi eet daayiz.
62005018	Kaga naaga akɔm dole ci Joowo ci amɛna agɔɔn oŋɛ, eeci ŋɛɛrti Joowo azooni nɔɔnɔ calaŋ Loryen agoonek nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛr.
62005019	Kaga naaga keegin ɔl ci Joowo nɔkɔ, mayo nuun abal looc nico dook Loryen o.
62005020	Kaga naaga ŋɛɛrti Joowo iiya, ma iiya anyet niini ageet gɛnyiz ci kagawi Jook ween didi, ma karomɛ naaga ki Jook ween didi kibeen ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo. Nicini zin Jook ween didi nɛɛn, ma ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ anyak rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
62005021	Dɔl ogan tuwɛnta, edeya eleeti ugooc joowanene o adilyai.
63001001	Aneeta Jɔn o keen mayan ole o tuwento. Kayeedekin waragɛ nico ineet ŋaa o ɛŋɛrawin Jooi ineet kibeen dɔl ugun. Kareezuŋ naana igeeta didi, bar alaŋ zin kareezuŋ naana doon, bar buk areezuŋ igeet ɔl dook o agaac gi ween didi.
63001002	Mazin giye o kagayi naaga gi ween didi, amɛna tiŋeere zɔɔz nici abil ŋaaten ageet nɔkɔ kodot.
63001003	Abon bai anyet Jooi ween baatinai kibeen ŋɛɛrin Yesu Kiristo ageet dɛtɛn ki tirtɛn been ganɔn, ka zin kabaayit naaga leeminta been rɛɛzɔnta.
63001004	Katalnɛ naana ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye baal kiiya kojowayɛ dɔl ugun oogi abaak gole ween didi ebaal aricaneket baatinai ageet e.
63001005	Inoko zin karooŋnyin ineet kɛrɛɛztɔ naaga dook. Nicini alaŋ een lotinɛt ci colai kayeedekuŋ naana igeet, bar lotinɛt baal iziiktu laadun e.
63001006	Mazi karɛɛz naaga Jook didi, abon kazooni naaga lotinɛt o aricaneket niini ageet. Iziiktu zin baale laadun azi niini nɛ, “Abaayit niiga dook rɛɛzɔnta.”
63001007	Iziiyit di gima ce. Anyak ɔl ci meel uuwak vɔlɔŋ ci alaban ɔl, ma inoko azaantozek niigi looc nico dook. Azi niigi nɛ, “Alaŋ Yesu Kiristo baale aku alye ci eet ci deer.” Ma ɛɛti ci abil nɔkɔ eet ween labjoi, ma amarnin Kiristo nɛɛn.
63001008	Uzuuti zin niiga eleeti ugooc ka calaŋ akulunu vɔyit o liŋliŋɔn unooŋ Joowa, bar abon agenyu ka ojokta kaal dook o ka kanyuŋ niini igeet.
63001009	Ma ɛɛti ci awɔyi gi ci ɔɔ cin doon, ma alaŋ aliŋliŋi demziin o Kiristo, alaŋ niini aavi ŋaaten Jook. Maje ɛɛti ci aavi demziinte o Kiristo, aavi niini ŋaaten baatina kibeen ŋɛɛrin.
63001010	Zin mã anyak eet ci akunakuŋ igeet, ma alaŋ anyaakuŋ demziin o Kiristo, ma bar anyaakuŋ niini igeet demziin cin doon, má anyeku nɔɔnɔ kiiyak ceezi ugooc. Buk má azaayu niiga nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.
63001011	Eeci mã azaa ɛɛti nɔɔnɔ, ozolit koca buk niini ki nɔɔnɔ kaal o gɛr agɔɔn niini.
63001012	Kanyei kaal ci meelik karooŋ kuduwayuŋ, bar zin alaŋ karooŋ keteyeedeyuŋ igeet kaal nicoko waragɛwa, eeci karooŋ naana alya kook kicinuŋ ka kozoozɔ naana kibeen igeet ɛlɛ, ka naaga dook kataltɔ ɔrɔɔt.
63001013	Azaayin ineet ɔl o buk aŋɛra Jooi nɔɔgɔ ŋaato.
64001001	Aneeta Jɔn o keen mayan ole o tuwento kayeedekin waragɛ nico ineet Gayuz o kareezin didi ɔrɔɔt.
64001002	Laŋo o kareezin, kajinekin gɔɔn naana ineet Jook, ka kobonta kaala dook ŋaatun, ka buk nyak niina ɛlɛ ci abon kiyo kaga naana abonanin ziniz tuwɛnta o..
64001003	Katalnɛ zin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci iiten baal avuni ɔl o tuwento ogɛn ŋaato e, ivita udukta niigi tuwɛn unun een didi kiyo didi ano niina laadun zɔɔz o Joowo een didi o.
64001004	Katalnɛ zin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye ci kaziiknɛ dɔl ogan tuwento abaai baayiz o Joowo een didi o.
64001005	Laŋo ween didi, agoon gi ci abon Joowa ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye ci atirtɛ gotonogu o tuwento, mayo nuun ŋaan ga laadun niina nɔɔgɔ o.
64001006	Ivita zin uduktak niigi gɔnɔgi o tuwento ŋaato reezinɛt unun. Abona zin atiriti niina nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ keronnye cineeŋ o gole ci atalnin Jooi.
64001007	Eeci niigi ɛɛrɔn ka kuuwayit zɔɔz o Kiristo, ma alaŋ agama niigi tirtɛn ole o ŋaan kutuwit Jook.
64001008	Abona zin naaga ɔl o tuwento katirit ɔl nicoko, ka buk kodoye naaga dook ki nɔɔgɔ liŋliŋonte o uuwayi niigi kaviyak o Joowo een didi.
64001009	Kayeedei iiten baale waragɛ ci miliny ɔl o tuwento ŋinaante, bar Ditarapoz o arɔɔŋ kanyek ɛlɛ kizi alaan, alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziik zɔɔz ci kaduwai naana nɔɔnɔ o.
64001010	Zin tiŋeere mã kakɔ, ŋaan kaduwakuŋ kaal o gɛr agɔɔn niini, ki momoz o amomozet, been vɔlɔŋ o akanet niini ageet. Alaŋ zin bar agɔɔn kaal nicoko doon, bar buk abor niini ɔl o tuwento ɛɛrɔn ŋaati avunakɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ ole onin. Ma buk alam niini ɔl o arɔɔŋ kitiritit gɔnɔgi ci ɛɛrɔn o. Mã atirit ɛɛti kɛɛrɔn, agernyek niini nɔɔnɔ, ma arɔɔŋ kɔtɔɔk nɔɔnɔ ole o tuwento.
64001011	Laŋo ween didi, má ayayiz zin niina ɔl ci agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr o, bar yayiz ɔl ci agɔɔn kaal ci abon. Eeci ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal ci abon, niini eet ci Joowo. Maje ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr, ŋaan niini kaga Jook been nɛɛn.
64001012	Azɔɔz ɔl dook kaal ci abon ci anaati niigi Dimitiros. Mazin didi kaal o agɔɔn niini ayelza tuwɛn onin Joowa. Ma kagaya naaga buk zɔɔz nici zɔɔz ceen didi, eeci kicinta naaga buk liŋliŋɔn onin. Ma buk agayetu niiga ageeta gi ci kaduwana naaga gi ceen didi.
64001013	Kanyei kaal ci meelik karooŋ kuduwayin. Alaŋ zin karooŋ kɛtɛyɛɛt waragɛwa.
64001014	Eeci karooŋ kiyiik taman kook kicinin naana alya ka kɔzɔɔztɔ naana ki ineet utugetine ogaac ɛlɛ.
64001015	Abon bai abaai yaak. Azaayin laŋotugune dook ŋaato. Zaaweyet zin buk niiga laŋotigaacak dook ŋinaante.
65001001	Aneeta Jud o keen gɔtɔni Jemis, ma keen gabaren o Yesu Kiristo. Kayeedekuŋ waragɛ nico igeet o otowawuŋ Jooi. Igeeta nɛɛn o areezuŋ Jooi ween baatina, ma abekuŋ Yesu Kiristo.
65001002	Abon bai bonati o Joowo aavi ŋaatunooŋ igeet dook tup, ma azaaci ganɔni unooŋ been rɛɛzɔnɛt kizi appe zinzeetine ugooc.
65001003	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, iiten baale kabaaban ɔrɔɔt karooŋ keteyeedeyuŋ zɔɔz ci akati tuwɛn onai kazɔl naaga dook. Bar zin inoko kabaaban abon kayeedekuŋ igeet zɔɔz ci kilotuŋ, ka ooritnɔŋ ooryɔi tuwɛn ween didi baal anyek Jooi ɔl ogin lak codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ e.
65001004	Eeci anyak ɔl oogi calaŋ aga Jook, ma iniktozeyuŋ niigi igeet eecitɔ. Ɔl nicigi uulal zɔɔz o akati bonat o Jook onai, ma abor niigi Yesu Kiristo ween alaan ma een Manyi onai adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ o arɔɔŋ ka kutuguzɔ kaal ci akati golok ugeecik waaŋo. Bar zin payiin cineeŋ ɛtɛyɛɛdɛ waragewe o Joowo baale laadun.
65001005	Mayo nuun agayu niiga gi baal ɛɛlanɛ Jooi ɔl o Israyil looce o kazi Masir e, karooŋ kaadayuŋ bodo igeet gi nice. Yo nuun waanice ɛɛla Jooi nɔɔgɔ Masirɛ e, bodo vurta iiya atarganyan niini ɔl baal alaŋ azooni zɔɔz onin ŋaatineeŋ e.
65001006	Buk aada zɔɔz o akati toonnyak o Joowo baal adɔŋ eleeti, ma alaŋ anyek zinzeeti ugeec kɛlɛɛntɔ been alaazɛt uneeŋ baal anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ e. Otoŋit waanice niigi tammu taden ŋinbaal abaai e. Inoko zin acabje niigi ziiyi cabiin ci abil kodot. Ma arek Jooi nɔɔgɔ ŋinti muur tɔdɔ loota ka kacabtɛ niigi ŋinaante nɔkɔ zɛɛ been iiten ci katin payiinto e.
65001007	Aada buk ɔl o kuturyok o kazi Sodom ki Gomora been ɔl o kuturyok o ajɔŋzɔ ki nɔɔgɔ. Baale niigi abor zɔɔz o Joowo kiyo toonnyawa oke e, ma agɔɔn waaŋzɛt golowe ci meelik gɛr. Otooztɛ ni waanice niigi gooya lai ka ɔl dook kegenyit calaŋ agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr.
65001008	Mazin buk ɔl ci ademzek ɔl vɔlɔŋ noko anyak niigi wunozak ci uulal eleeti ugeec maany. Ma apɛz dɔyiz o Joowo, ma adɔm toonnyak o tammu tadenu.
65001009	Mayo nuun een Maikɔl ween alaan o toonnyak o tammu tadenu, ŋaan niini kɔdɔm Loryen iitene baal adaŋɔn ki nɔɔnɔ zooze o akati ɛlɛ o Mosis e. Bar olla waanice anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan acinin ineet Jooi doon.”
65001010	Mazin ɔl nicigi amomoz niigi kaal calaŋ aga. Aga niigi kaal oogi zinzeetinɛ doon kiyo kɛlɛgɛ o too akɔm baabani o. Ma agɔɔn niigi tup nɔkɔ kaal o arɔɔŋ niigi ootine ugeec doon. Bar zin tiŋeere uulal kaala nicigi nɔɔgɔ.
65001011	Izi nɔŋa wole zin ŋaatineeŋ, eeci oneec niigi gɔl o Ken ween ŋɛɛrti Adam baal amony gɔtɔni e. Ma agɔɔn niigi kaal ci gɛr kiyo baale ɛɛti o kazi Balaam e, ka olla kojoktai niigi guruc. Ma buk atobɔ niigi ki eet o kazi Kora baal abor Jook e. Uulali zin buk tiŋeere niigi kiyo baale niini e.
65001012	Ma ɔl nicigi gɔɔn agɔɔn niigi kaal ceen alyaan ɔrɔɔt ŋaati azolonu niiga been nɔɔgɔ lotɛnta. Avunakuŋ gɔɔn niigi igeet o, eeci arɔɔŋ dayiin been baayinɛt. Arican niigi eleeti ugeec doon, ma anyek eleeti kizi ɔl cugooc. Atobɔ zin niigi ki diizwa o gɔɔn aloŋloŋ, ma ivaan ŋɔɔti calaŋ atiil o. Ma atobɔ buk niigi ki kɛɛn o gɔɔn akɔm kɛbɛrɛ, yo nuun een lɔɔla, alaŋ abiir o. Ma ɔl nici atobɔ niigi ki kɛɛn o gɔɔn adaacai agɛrɔi, ma araabjai dook lai o.
65001013	Ma kaala ci gɛrzɛ agɔɔn niigi noko atobɔ ki kavucac o maamu gɔɔn apalpalanak ŋɔɔti dɔwɔn liila o. Ma buk ɛɛl niigi kiyo monyonya o gɔɔn olla awɔ, ma alaŋ ɛɛl ŋaatodoi o. Bar zin ɔrɔɔŋak Jooi nɔɔgɔ ŋinti muur gilinyik ka kujukek nɔɔgɔ kaavtiyɛ nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.
65001014	Baale ɛɛti o kazi Inok ween dole o dɔl o Adam aduwa zɔɔz ci akati nɔɔgɔ azi nɛ, “Icinit di, aku tiŋeere Manyi ŋaati ɔrkɔran been toonnyak ogin meelik een eet keet, ka kiiya kapayek ɔl o oŋenu dook gerzitin kaale ugeec gɛr agɔɔn dook kibeen zoozowe ugeec gɛr amomozi niigi Jook.”
65001016	Ma ɔl nicigi arɔk cocobɔn tup nɔkɔ. Ma ano niigi kaal o gɛr arɔɔŋ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ugeec. Ma abɔlɔli eleeti ugeec maany, ma alaba ɔl utugetine ci amadi ka kojokta kaal o arɔɔŋ niigi ŋaatineeŋ.
65001017	Laŋotigan o kareezuŋ, aada di gi baal aduwakuŋ toonnyawa o Manyi ona Yesu Kiristo e.
65001018	Anekuŋ baale niigi nɛ, “Katin iinyaye ci aṯornɛkɛ e avu ɔl ci ararni zɔɔz o Joowo, eeci arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ niigi kaal o gɛr arɔɔŋ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ugeec.”
65001019	Ma ɔl nicigi ɔl o anyaa ŋɛrɔn nɛɛn, eeci arɛɛz niigi kaal o loocu gɛr, ma akɔm nɔɔgɔ Vɔŋiz o Joowo zinzeetine ugeec.
65001020	Bar zin niiga laŋotigane o kareezuŋ, abon amɛnanu azaacu tuwɛn unooŋ kɔdɔk. Aŋaruyɔ buk dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
65001021	Mayo nuun akunakuŋ piryakzɛt, abon agayu ŋaan areezuŋ igeet Jooi nɔkɔ. Ereyɔ zinzeetine ci alal zɛɛ ma akɔ anyuŋ Yesu bonate onin rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
65001022	Abon zin awucnekuŋ igeet ɔl o aŋɛr zɔɔ zooze o Joowo, ma abon buk atiritu niiga nɔɔgɔ.
65001023	Ɛɛlta buk ɔl o ano demziinok o voloŋo gooye o Loryento. Abadai niiga nɔɔgɔ gooya kivitak gɔl o abon. Itiritit buk ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr ka kagaac niigi gi ween didi. Bar zin abon agenyu niiga alya ka ci alaŋ agoonu oŋɛ kiyo niigi o, olla anycek kuwuceyuŋ niigi igeet.
65001024	Jook nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet uzuuti tuwɛn unooŋ giye o anyuŋ niini igeet obonta ŋume onin, ma atalninu niiga tiŋeere iitene ci avoyu titinyonte onin e.
65001025	Adoi Jooi laadun ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ma aruguzet niini ageet ŋaaten Manyi onai Yesu Kiristo. Abon bai katitiny naaga nɔɔnɔ o anyak diŋdiŋɔn dook, ki baliin dook, ki dɔyiz dook, been alaazɛt dook kinatamma laadun e, been inoko o, been buk irkitowe ci ŋaan avu e dook nɔkɔ zɛɛ been nɛɛn. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
66001001	Nici zɔɔz o Yesu Kiristo o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ ka keyelek I. niini gabara ogin. Kaal nici iina tiŋeere taman. Itoona zin Yesu toonnyai ci Joowo kiiya keyelezayan kaal nicoko aneet Jɔn o keen gabaren onin.
66001002	Kɛtɛyɛɛda ni kaal nicoko dook. Kayeedi zɔɔz o Joowo been zɔɔz o Yesu Kiristo een didi ebaal kacinɛ e.
66001003	Amayuwi zin ɛɛti ci akɛɛp zoozok nicoko, ma amayuwi buk ɛɛti ci azii zoozok nicoko, ma azooni ziniza juruŋ. Eeci eelit iinya ci tɔny ka kiitazɔ kaala nici.
66001004	Aneeta Jɔn nɛɛn ci kayeedekuŋ waragɛ nico o. Kitoonekuŋ igeet ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe ween torgɛrɛm ɛɛl looce o kazi Asiya. Dɛtɛni ki ganɔn izi cunooŋ Joowe baal aavi tɔ kinatamma laadun e, ki inoko o, been katin. Ma amayukuŋ buk igeet toonnyawa oginɛ een torgɛrɛm aavtiz nɔɔnɔ ŋuma lecere onin alaazetu.
66001005	Amayukuŋ buk Yesu Kiristo ween bacoi o iimi. Niini abuu o arak daayiz been ŋaazi o aŋaanɛkɛ rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma een niini alaan o abal alaat o loocu dook. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o areezet ageet, ma otoonyawet oŋɛ ogaac biyete ogin.
66001006	Ma arɔnyanet ageet kiziti alaat ci adikir kaliŋliŋonek Jook ween baatinai. Abon bai kanaat naaga nɔɔnɔ, ma kadiŋdiŋan nɔkɔ kodot.
66001007	Iziiktɔ di! Aku katin niini diizwani. Kicinit ɔl dook kurum buk ɔl baal akat nɔɔnɔ dilawa e. Ma aluwek katin ɔl ci loocu noko dook nɔɔnɔ. Nici zɔɔz ceen didi. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.
66001008	Azi Jooi nɛ, “Koontanɛ, ma katirananɛ.” Azi nɔkɔ Jooi baal aavɛ tɔ baale kinatamma laadun e, ki inoko o, been katin. Niini Jook o anyak doyizok dook.
66001009	Aneeta Jɔn o keen gotonu unooŋ tuwɛnta o kazɔl ki igeet piryakzɛt, ma kazɔl baliin o Yesu Kiristo. Ma karuwek zɔɔ looc tuwɛnta naaga dook. Kacabje baale ŋaaten viriviro aleya maama kazi Patmos ka kaavu waan ŋinaante giye o kuuwayɛ zɔɔz o Joowo, ma kaduwanɛ zɔɔz o Yesu een didi.
66001010	Ma iitene o yubzento iiyayan Vɔŋizi o Joowo kiyo wunozya o. Ma kazii molok ci appe ci agɛrɛny kiyo toromba o azɔɔz aneet bawuca.
66001011	Anekan nɛ, “Tɛyɛɛt kaal ci acin noko waragɛwa zɛɛ toonek waragɛ nico ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe ween torgɛrɛm kazi Evesos ki Simirna ki Pergamum ki Sayatara ki Sardis ki Viladɛlvia been Ladosiya.”
66001012	Mazi kookcɛ ka kicin eet ci azoozekan o, bar kacin tokolɛn ceen warki een torgɛrɛm.
66001013	Ma kacin tokolɛn nicoko kɔrgɛna gi ci kizik eet ci deer ci aborcek rum ci wun kal kurum tɔdɔ, ma acabek kavali ceen warki.
66001014	Maje imana ciginɛ o vɔɔrɛ pɛr kiyo biyɛn o gɔɔn atiilna tammu o, maje kɛbɛrɛ alanyit kiyo goo o.
66001015	Maje zɔɔna kizik zurtɛnɛn o gɔɔn apucpucani zɛɛ ma azi pilpil o. Maje mɔlɔyi cinɛ o kizik molok o maam o gɔɔn ariiya bɛ tadena o.
66001016	Maje aziite cin azo o agam monyony ceen torgɛrɛm. Maje otoge cin o aduŋna gina ci lɛɛt kabanyɔ dook. Maje ŋum cinɛ o alanyit kiyo kɔr o gɔɔn araanɛ ɔrɔɔt o.
66001017	Mazi kacin nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, kiita nɔɔnɔ zɔɔnɛ kir kiliitawan lɔɔci lai kiyo ɛɛti o adaai o. Iiya ni niini, ma aku ataadekan aziit cin azo o, ma anekan nɛ, “Má aŋole looc gaga. Nici aneet o koontanɛ, ma katirananɛ.
66001018	Aneeta nɛɛn o karogi nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Baale rak kadaawa. Inoko zin o koroga nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn. Kanyei dɔyiz ci kamɔgɛ daayiz, ma kanyei nyoogec ci ŋin o daayizo.
66001019	Inoko zin tɛyɛɛt kaal ci acin noko been kaal ci ka kutuguze katin e.
66001020	Inoko icinu monyony ceen torgɛrɛm aziite can azo o been tokolɛn ceen warki een torgɛrɛm o. Keŋti zin ci kaal nicoko nɛɛn ce. Ma monyonya ceen torgɛrɛm o toonnyak o Joowo abɛk ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe ween torgɛrɛm. Maje tokolɛna ceen torgɛrɛm o ɔl o tuwento kuturyowe ween torgɛrɛm nɛɛn.”
66002001	Nici zin zɔɔz ci aku ŋaaten aneet o kagam monyony ween torgɛrɛm aziite onan azo, ma kawɔ tokolɛn ween warki kɔrgɛna. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz co toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Evesos.
66002002	Enek nɛ, Kaga kaal ugooc abon gɔɔn agoonu nɔkɔ. Kagayuŋ ŋɛdɛt aliŋliŋnyu ɔrɔɔt o. Buk kagayuŋ gɔɔn amezu piryakzɛt zinzeetine ci alal. Kagayuŋ gɔɔn adɛwanu eleeti ole o gɛr. Ma buk icintawu ɔl o gɔɔn anyek eleeti kiziti toonnyak vɔlɔŋa, makacin didi ojoktawu niiga vɔlɔŋ uneeŋ.
66002003	Kagayuŋ buk igeet alalnuŋ zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt, ma gɔɔn amezu piryakzɛt zaare ogan calaŋ arnekaŋ.
66002004	Bar zin anyak gi ci kabornekuŋ ce. Kacinuŋ alaŋaan areezaŋ kiyo baale e.
66002005	Abaabanit di reezinɛt baal areezaŋ rak ɔɔwa e. Inoko abacu gɔl. Karooŋnyuŋ zin abaabanit ka eteedɔi gɔl nico. Mã alaŋ agoonu nɔkɔ, kakunakuŋ koca ma kaku kanyɛyɛ tokolec unooŋ gɔɔn atukuluŋ o ŋaao onin gɔɔn alanyci o aavtiz nɔkɔ.
66002006	Bar zin ŋaan kareezuŋ naana igeet giye o gɔɔn abornu niiga ɔl o kazi Nikolatan kiyo buk kabur naana o.
66002007	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiknu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl o tuwento o juruŋ. Ma ɔl o amɛz piryakzɛt zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ, kanyi tiŋeere naana nɔɔgɔ kadayit kɛbɛrɛ o kɛɛt o rogeto abil mana o Joowo kɔrgɛna.
66002008	Nici zɔɔz o aku ŋaaten aneet o koontanɛ ma katirananɛ baal kadaai, ma karogi bodo e. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz co toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Simirna.
66002009	Enek nɛ, Kaga gidɛn been maatiz unooŋ nɔkɔ. Bar zin tamma eeginu niiga arɔk ɔrɔɔt. Kaga buk amezu niiga momoz o gɔɔn adomnyuŋ ɔl o anyek eleeti kiziti Juz, ma bar alaŋ eegin niigi ɔl o Juz didi, bar eegin niigi dook ɔl ci Loryento.
66002010	Má aŋolinu zin kaal ci katin avu apirnanuŋ igeet neke been nɛɛn. Agiduŋ ŋɛdɛt tiŋeere Loryen igeet gole ci arikɛ ɔl koogi ŋaatunooŋ ceez o cabiinto. Bar zin anyak gidɛn nici iinya ci miliny tɛr. Anycek zin zinzeeti cugooc o kiimtɛ ŋaaten aneet mayo nuun adaaŋnu, eeci ŋaan kakɔ kanyuŋ kondɛnɛ o rogeto.
66002011	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl ci tuwento noko juruŋ. Ma ɔl o amɛz piryakzɛt zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ alaŋ bodo niigi adaai daayize o vurto.
66002012	Nici zɔɔz o aku ŋaaten aneet o kanyei gina o lɛɛt kabanyɔ dook. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz nico toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Pergamum.
66002013	Enek nɛ, Kagayuŋ nɔkɔ azuunu zaar ogan kɔdɔk kak o. Mayo nuun abaaku niiga ŋaao anyak lɛcɛr o Loryento alaazetu o, ŋaan adaŋit tuwɛn o atuyaŋ niiga aneet been nɛɛn, mayo nuun een iinyaye baal aruwɛn bacoiti onane iimi ziniz kazi Antipas e. Aruwe waanice niini kuture unooŋ abaai Loryen.
66002014	Bar zin olla anyak kaal ci miliny kabornekuŋ ce. Anyak ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ ci agam zɔɔz o eet o kazi Balaam baal ademzek niini eet o kazi Balak ka kalabɛkɛ ɔl o Israyil oŋɛ gole ci anyekɛ nɔɔgɔ kadayit kaal o ataabi ɔl joowanɛ o adilyai, been gole o ka kutuguzi waaŋzete.
66002015	Bodo buk anyak ŋaatunooŋ ɔl ci agam demziin ci ɔl o kazi Nikolatan.
66002016	Abon zin ateedinu gɔl nico, gɛrzɛ ŋaan kayiiyakuŋ igeet kataman, ma kaku koor ɔl nicoko ginawe onan aduŋna otoga.
66002017	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl o tuwento o juruŋ. Ma ɔl o amɛz piryakzɛt kanyi tiŋeere nɔɔgɔ dayiin o kazi mana itaŋonek nɔɔgɔ tamma. Ma buk kanyi katin eet codoi gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ bɛ ci vɔɔr ci ayeedonek zaara ci colai, ma akɔm ɔl ci aga zaar nicoko bar aga ɔl ci anyonek o doon.
66002018	Nici zɔɔz ci aku ŋaaten aneet ŋɛɛrti Joowo o kanyei kɛbɛrɛ o alanyit kiyo goo o, ma ɛɛl zɔɔna ogane kiyo zurtɛnɛna o gɔɔn apucpucɛn ɔl zɛɛ ma azi pilpil o. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz nico toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Sayatara.
66002019	Enek nɛ, Ŋɛdɛt kagayuŋ nɔkɔ agoonu kaal ci abon o. Kaga reezinɛt unooŋ ki tuwɛn unooŋ iimi ki liŋliŋɔn unooŋ been zinzeeti ugooc laliz. Buk kagayuŋ aliŋliŋnyu gɔɔn ɔrɔɔt kujuk liŋliŋɔn unooŋ baal rɛɛn e.
66002020	Anyak zin olla gi ci miliny kabornekuŋ igeet ce. Kabornekuŋ gi calaŋ alamnyu niiga ŋaa o kazi Jazabil gɔɔn anyek ɛlɛ kizi nyakaŋan ci Joowo o. Adɛmɛz gɔɔn niini gabara ogan kutuguzɔ waaŋzɛt. Ma buk alabek niini nɔɔgɔ gɔl ci ka kadakti kaal o gɔɔn ataabi ɔl joowanɛ o adilyai.
66002021	Ŋaanbaal kanyekɛ nɔɔnɔ waŋi ci ka kɛtɛɛdɔi waaŋzɛt cin agɔɔn o been tɛr, bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ kotoŋ nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
66002022	Kanyi zin tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt ci ɔɔŋɛ kuwena nɔkɔ, ma kagidi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma kanyi buk tiŋeere ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn waaŋzɛt kibeen nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt ci appe ɔrɔɔt, mã alaŋ ateedinɛ niigi waaŋzɛt ci agɔɔn kibeen nɔɔnɔ o.
66002023	Buk tiŋeere karui nuyak kadaayitɔ, ka zin kagayan ɔl o tuwento dook aneet kaga naana kaal o abaaban niigi zinzeetine ugeec dook nɔkɔ. Ma ŋaan kacacai katin gɔɔn giten kaal o aganɔ kibeen liŋliŋɔn onin agɔɔn.
66002024	Kanekuŋ zin igeet o abornu demziin ci gɛr Loryento nɛ, Akɔma bodo gima ci ka kuduwa ŋaatunooŋ.
66002025	Olla zin abon azuunu gɔl ci abon noko zɛɛ ma kabada katin.
66002026	Ma ɛɛti ci amɛz piryakzɛt, ma amɛna agɔɔn kaal o karooŋ naana nɔkɔ kodot, kanyi katin nɔɔnɔ alaazɛt ci abali modɛn.
66002027	Kanyi katin nɔɔnɔ alaazɛt ci atobɔ kibeen anyan baaba aneet, ka zin kabal niini modɛn alaazete nico ŋaati anyayi kɛɛt ci alaazetu een ziit, ma kanyi dɔyiz ci ka kilibi niini nɔɔgɔ kazaantɛ taza kiyo gɔɔn alibe iju o.
66002028	Ma kanyi buk katin nɔɔnɔ kotobtɔ ki coboc o ŋeeretinu.
66002029	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl o tuwento o juruŋ.
66003001	Nici zɔɔz ci aku ŋaaten aneet o kanyei toonnyak o Joowo een torgɛrɛm been monyony ween torgɛrɛm. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz co toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Sardis. Enek nɛ, Kagayuŋ agoonu kaal ci gɛr o nɔkɔ. Abaabanu niiga kizik anyaku tuwɛn ci adɔi, bar zin kacinuŋ naana igeet akɔmnuŋ tuwɛn, ma eelnu kiyo adaaktu o.
66003002	Icintɛ zin. Utuguz kaal o ŋaan utuguz, maŋaan adaayit zɛl o. Eeci kacin liŋliŋɔn unooŋ ŋaan kobona juruŋ ŋume o Joowo.
66003003	Abon azoonu kaal baal ojoktawu, ma agawutu laadun ejuruŋ. Eteedɔi kaal o gɛr agoonu, Mã alaŋ ateedinu, kakunakuŋ koca boyoŋyoŋ igeet kiyo gɔɔn agoryaiti ween aamnyoi o calaŋ agawanu iiten ci kakunɛ.
66003004	Anyak ɔl ci miliny kuture ci kazi Sardis noko calaŋ agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr. Korkorya zin tiŋeere naana kibeen nɔɔgɔ ŋaati kaborceka rumanɛ ci vɔɔrik pɛr giye o aganɔn niigi ŋaati korkorya ki aneet.
66003005	Ma ɔl o amɛz piryakzɛt zɛɛ ma amɔk kaal o acina nɔɔgɔ, aborcek tiŋeere niigi rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr. Ma alaŋ ɛɛyai zaara ugeec bodo waragewe o rogeto been nɛɛn. Kayelza tiŋeere naana nɔɔgɔ kagaye ŋume o baaba been ŋume o toonnyak ogin buk.
66003006	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl ci tuwento noko juruŋ.
66003007	Nici zɔɔz o aku ŋaaten aneet o kadiŋdiŋ, ma keen didi. Kanyei naana nyoogec o Devid ka kɔkɔli araan o baliin o Joowo. Zin mã kɔkɔla naana araan nico, akɔm bodo eet ci anyook. Mã kanyuugi, akɔm bodo eet ci ka kɔkɔl. Teyeedek zin zɔɔz co toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Viladɛlvia.
66003008	Enek nɛ, Kaga kaal ugooc abon agoonu nɔkɔ. Mazin giye nico kokoleyuŋ igeet araan, ma akɔm bodo eet ci ka konyook, eeci ŋaan anyaku niiga dɔyiz ci miliny. Ma ŋaan azoonu zɔɔz onan, ma ŋaan adaŋit zaar ogan been nɛɛn.
66003009	Iziiyit zin di zɔɔz ci akati ɔl o Loryento ce. Gɔɔn niigi anyek eleeti kiziti ɔl ci Juz vɔlɔŋa. Kanyi zin tiŋeere naana nɔɔgɔ kivita kakateyuŋ igeet kozoŋtin ka kagaac niigi kareezuŋ naana igeet.
66003010	Mazin giye o azoonu niiga zɔɔz onan zinzeetine ci alal, kazuunuŋ buk tiŋeere naana igeet kaale o gɛr iinyaye ci alibɛn lɔɔci e, eeci avunak tiŋeere kaal ci gɛrzɛ ɔl ci loocu noko dook.
66003011	Izi zin ŋinti ka kiiyai naana ajɔn. Uzuuti zin niiga bonat cunooŋ o nɔkɔ ka calaŋ arigiz ɛɛti oman kondɛnɛn ugooc.
66003012	Mã amɛz ɛɛti piryakzɛt zɛɛ ma amɔk kaal o acina nɔɔnɔ dook, kanyi tiŋeere naana nɔɔnɔ kizi kitiir ci ceez o Jook onan, ma abil niini nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Ma alaŋ bodo niini anyeki ceeze nico. Ma kayeedei tiŋeere naana nɔɔnɔ zaar o Jook onan. Ma kayeedei buk nɔɔnɔ zaar o kutur o Jook onan kazi Jerusalɛm Colai akunak looc tammu tadena ŋaaten Jook onan. Ma buk tiŋeere kayeedei nɔɔnɔ zaar ogan colai.
66003013	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl ci tuwento noko juruŋ.
66003014	Nici zɔɔz o aku ŋaaten aneet o keen didi. Kazooz naana tup kaal ci ɛɛl tɔp. Keen naana bacoi ween didi, ma ɛɛnyca Jooi kaal dook ŋaaten aneet. Teyeedek zɔɔz co toonnyai o ɔl o tuwento kuture o kazi Ladosiya.
66003015	Enek nɛ, Kaga kaal ugooc agoonu dook nɔkɔ. Kagayuŋ buk alaŋ niiga alalnu, ma buk bodo alaŋ aburnu. Abon zin waan aŋeranu gɔl codoi golowe nicoko.
66003016	Mazi alaŋ aŋeranu gɔl codoi, kaburnuŋ koca, ma koortakuŋ tuu.
66003017	Aziyu gɔɔn niiga nɛ, Eeginu arɔk ci akɔm gi ci amaanu. Bar zin alaŋ niiga agayu ma eeginu boyok, ma eeginu rubenɛ, ma awoyu ŋaḏinyiny o.
66003018	Inoko zin kilotuŋ igeet ivita ataalit warki o aayai odota ka iziti arɔk. Ivita buk ataalit rumanɛ o vɔɔr pɛr ŋaatan ka uburucek ubuŋti alyaan cunooŋ noko. Ivita ataalit agɛrɔ ŋaatan ka ɔkɔlti kɛbɛrɛ coma acinenu.
66003019	Kagernyei zin gɔɔn naana ɔl o kareez dook ka kamadek nɔɔgɔ gɔl o abon. Anycek zin niiga zinzeeti ugooc korogit. Okolit kɛbɛrɛ ugooc juruŋ ka abadayaŋ niiga aneet.
66003020	Iziiktɔ di juruŋ! Aneeta nɛɛn ci kabil tatoga karui karogi o. Mã anyak eet ci aziiŋnan molok onan, ma akolekan karogi, kakɔ ceeze onin, ma kakɔ kazolona naana kibeen nɔɔnɔ.
66003021	Ma zin ɔl o gɔɔn amɛz piryakzɛt kiyo buk baale naana e, tiŋeere karomena ki aneet been baaba lecere onan alaazetu.
66003022	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu kaal ci aduwak Vɔŋizi o Joowo ɔl ci tuwento noko juruŋ.
66004001	Ma vurte ci kaal nicoko ivitayan bodo wunozyawa ogɛn. Kacin tammu kɛŋ akoli. Ma kazii bodo molok we ɛlɛ agɛrɛny kiyo toromba o, ma anekan nɛ, “Ija tadena ŋaato ka keyeleyin gi ci ka kiita katin ce.”
66004002	Ecodoi nɔkɔ iiyayan Vɔŋizi o Joowo kiyo wunozya o. Ma kacin tamma ŋinaante lɛcɛr ci alaazetu anyak eet ci aavɛ.
66004003	Ma kacin eet ci aavi ŋinaante o azi ŋum cinɛ o pilpil kiyo kagoranti o agirgir alina o. Ma aliya lɛcɛr ci alaazetu noko bɔrɔyɛ ci anyak golnya ci colai kic kiyo kagoranti o colai gɔɔn alina o.
66004004	Ma bodo buk aliya lɛcɛr ci alaazetu noko lɛcɛrɛ ogɛn ceen eetoma ki tiin wec. Ma aavtiyɛ lɛcɛrɛ nicoko alaata ceen eetoma ki tiin wec ci aborcek rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr, ma anyak kondɛnɛn ceen warki ootinɛ.
66004005	Ma abadi bɔrɔyɛta lecere ci alaazetu noko, ma ajul. Maje ŋaati lecero noko ŋina anyak tɔlit ceen torgɛrɛm ci alanyit. Ma nicigi voŋizok o Joowo een torgɛrɛm nɛɛn.
66004006	Ma ŋinti arek lɛcɛri kɛŋ o anyak gi ci kizik liil ci liilim kiyo gizazac o. Ma aliya lɛcɛr ɛlɛ kɛlɛgɛ ceen wec ci anyak kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik keŋtinɛ been bawucin buk.
66004007	Adoma kelegiti ci oowu o bar kizik maa. Maje kelegiti ci anowɔ o bar kizik ariz. Bodo kelegiti ci anowɔ ki gɔn nico o abil ŋum cinɛ o kiyo ŋum o eet o deer o. Maje kelegiti ci atiranan o abil kiyo zeeroc ŋaati akuli o.
66004008	Kɛlɛgɛ nici dook anyak gɔɔn ceeni ŋaatineeŋ taba ceen tɔrkɔnɔm. Ma anyak tabana cigeec o kɛbɛrɛ eecitɔ been eci bitaalu buk. Ma abɛn kɛlɛgɛ nicigi waazinok been baalinok dook beniin ci azi nɛ, “Alile. Alile. Alile Manyi Jooi o anyak dɔyiz dook. Niini aavitɔ baale kinatamma e laadun, been inoko o, been buk katin.”
66004009	Gɔɔn kɛlɛgɛ nicigi adiŋdiŋan eet ci aavi lɛcɛra noko, ma atitiny niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ zany beniinowɛ. Ɛɛti nici arogi niini nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
66004010	Mazi agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ, iŋaaz alaata ween eetom ki tiin wec e lecerene ugeec, ma akani kozoŋti looc eet ci aavi lecere ci alaazetu o ŋuma, ma adiŋdiŋan niigi nɔɔnɔ o arogi nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Ma arek niigi kondɛnɛn ugeec e ŋino arek lɛcɛri o alaazetu kɛŋ, ma anɔ nɛ,
66004011	“Een niina Manyi, ma een Jook nɛɛn. Aganonu niina ki diŋdiŋɔn been titinyɔn kibeen dɔyiz. Ineeta nɛɛn baal ɛɛnyca kaal dook, ma anyi nɔɔgɔ dook rogɛt ci arogni oowe unun doon.”
66005001	Ma kacin eet ci aavi lecere ci alaazetu noko anyak waragɛ aziite ci azo o. Ayeedi waragɛ nico kabanyɔ dook, ma atuuzi. Ma aromɛ ɔtɔgi mutulai lak torgɛrɛm ka kɔkɔm eet ci akɔl.
66005002	Ma kacin toonnyai ci Joowo ci anyak dɔyiz ɔrɔɔt. Agɛrɛny molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci aganɔ ŋaati aaranɛ mutul ceen torgɛrɛm noko ka kɔkɔl waragɛ ci atuuzi kɛŋ noko?”
66005003	Bar akɔm eet ci ajoyai tammu tadena, karabɔŋ een loota, karabɔŋ een tɔdɔ loota ci ka kagantɔ ŋaati akɔli waragɛ ci atuuzi noko ka kicin kɛŋ eecitɔ.
66005004	Kutulu ni ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci akɔm eet ci aganɔ ŋaati akɔli waragɛ nico ka kɛkɛɛp zoozok ci ayeedi eecitɔ o.
66005005	Mazi ŋaan kalu nɔkɔ, eneyan alaani codoi alaate ci ona aliya lɛcɛr ci alaazetu o nɛ, “Má alu. Cin di eet ci akanonek zaara ci kazi Maa o Bor o Juda noko. Niini dole ci dɔl o Devid. Amɔk niini kaal dook. Aganɔ niini kaara mutul ceen torgɛrɛm noko, ma akɔl waragɛ nico.”
66005006	Enico ɛlɛ kicina Nyɔɔn ci abil lɛcɛr ci alaazetu noko ŋuma, ma aliya nɔɔnɔ kɛlɛgɛ ween wec e kibeen alaat ween eetom ki tiin wec e. Ma Nyɔɔn nici abil kiyo nyɔɔn baal rak ɔtɔdɔŋɛ e. Anyak niini oto torgɛrɛm kibeen kɛbɛrɛ torgɛrɛm. Ma kɛbɛrɛ nici toonnyak ween torgɛrɛm itoononek looc dook nɛɛn.
66005007	Iiya ni Nyɔɔn nici, ma adoma waragɛ ona atuuzi anyak ɛɛti o aavi lecere o alaazetu aziite onin azo e.
66005008	Mazi agɔɔn nɔkɔ, akani kɛlɛgɛ ween wec e kibeen alaat ween eetoma ki tiin wec e kozoŋti looc Nyɔɔn ŋuma, ma adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ. Anyak niigi dook kidorɛt kibeen kodoocɛ ceen warki ci abiz karkarɛta tɔc. Ma karkarɛta nici akati ŋaryiin o ɔl o Joowo.
66005009	Ebenit ni niigi dook beniin ci colai azi nɛ, “Aganonu niina ŋaati adomanɛ waragɛ ci atuuzi noko ka pila mutul. Eeci baale uruktin ɔl ineet daak. Zin daayize unun ataalayu niina boryok o loocok dook Jook kurum vitɛn ci akani tammu zɔɔ looc e.
66005010	Ma anyeyu niina nɔɔgɔ kiziti alaat ci adikir aliŋliŋonek Jook, ma abal tiŋeere niigi ɔl loocok dook.”
66005011	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ bodo, kacin toonnyak ci Joowo ceen eet keet calaŋ kakɛɛp. Aliya niigi kibeen kɛlɛk ween wec e been alaat ween eetoma ki tiin wec e lɛcɛr o alaazetu.
66005012	Ma abene niigi dook molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Aganɔ Nyɔɔn ci baal aruwe kadaak noko ŋaati anyayi dɔyiz, ki arɔkzɛt, ki gɛnyiz, ki alaazɛt, ki titinyɔn, ki diŋdiŋɔn, been naatinɛt.”
66005013	Ma kazii molok ci kaal o arogi dook tammu tadena, ki loota, ki tɔdɔ loota, been liilowɛ. Abene niigi dook azi nɛ, “Kanaatit eet ci aavi lecere ci alaazetu noko been Nyɔɔn. Aganɔ niigi ki titinyɔn, ki zany, been alaazɛt nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
66005014	Ma abɛdɛkɛ kɛlɛgɛ ceen wec o nɔɔgɔ azi nɛ, “Didi zin.” Ma akani buk alaata ceen eetoma ki tiin wec o kozoŋti looc, ma adiŋdiŋan eet ci aavi lecere ci alaazetu o been Nyɔɔn.
66006001	Enico kicina Nyɔɔn ŋaati apilan mutulac o oowu mutulaye ween torgɛrɛm e. Mazi apila niini mutulac nico, kazii kelegit codoi kelegjene ween wec e agɛrɛny molowe ci appe kiyo ajul tammu o azi nɛ, “Ija.”
66006002	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacinjɔm ci vɔɔr aku. Anyak ɛɛti ci atɔɔt o irii, ma anyak kondec o mogiinto ɔɔwa. Awɔ niini jome nico ka kook kɔmɔk modɛn o ɔɔrɔ ki nɔɔnɔ dook.
66006003	Mazi bodo apila Nyɔɔn mutulac oma, kazii kelegit codoi azi nɛ, “Ija.”
66006004	Ma aduŋna bodo jɔmi ci meeri. Maje eet ci atɔɔt o anyonek nɔɔnɔ gina ci wun ki dɔyiz ci aaranɛ ganɔn loota, ma anyaakɛ looc ɔrɔɔn ci akanɔn ɔl kadaayitɔ.
66006005	Bodo apila Nyɔɔn mutulac oma, ma kazii kelege oke codoi azi nɛ, “Ija.” Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacin jɔm ci oli aku. Atɔɔt ɛɛti ci anyak gi o gɔɔn ayabzi ɔl kaal o aziita.
66006006	Ma kazii molok ci kizik bar aku kelege ween wec e. Azi mɔlɔyi nici nɛ, “Guruca ci aliŋliŋa ɛɛti iitene codoi aganɔ kibeen labi ci ataalak ɛlɛ onin doon ka kadak iitene nico ɛlɛ, bar alaŋ alɛɛnɔ ki ɔl ci kɔrɔk onin dook. Anyak buk dayiin oogi tɔ, bar adoŋnyi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma alaŋ anim ɛɛti kataala.”
66006007	Bodo apila Nyɔɔn mutulac oma, ma kazii kelege ween wec e codoi azi nɛ, “Ija.”
66006008	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacin bodo jɔm ci colai aku. Kazi zaar ci eet ci atɔɔt jɔm nico o nɛ Daayiz. Maje miniŋa ci meelik gɛr ano nɔɔnɔ vurta. Anyonek nɔɔgɔ dɔyizi ci alibi looc kaluden codoi ŋaao aŋerin lɔɔci kizi kaludanɛ wec. Aruk niigi ɔl kadaayitɔ ɔrɔɔnta, ki magize ween tarjo, ki moorizowɛ, been kelegene ci mootik.
66006009	Bodo apila Nyɔɔn mutulac oma, ma kacin ŋaao taabinto loota voŋizok ci ɔl baal aruwe giye o azooni zɔɔz o Joowo, ma abɔranɛ niigi tuwɛn uneeŋ e.
66006010	Agɛrɛny niigi molowe ci appe anɔ nɛ, “Manyi Jook o anyei dɔyiz, ineet nɛɛn o adiŋdiŋ, ma een didi. Ka zin yo rɛwɔ been inin ŋaati ka cacɔi ole baal aruket ageeta kadaakta e?”
66006011	Anycozek ni nɔɔgɔ dook rumanɛ ci vɔɔr wuntik. Ma aduyak nɔɔgɔ gi ci ka rak kereyɔi ŋintimiliny, eeci ŋaan anyak gɔnɔgi ci ano Jook ka buk kurukte kadaayitɔ, kiyo baale niigi e.
66006012	Bodo apila Nyɔɔn mutulac oma. Taman nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci kirakirak, ma ookci ii kizikoli tɛr. Maje nyɛlɔyi ookci kizimeerik tɛt kiyo biyeta o.
66006013	Ma iinak monyonya looc kiyo arurai kɛbɛrɛ o moneeco ŋaati ivaani ŋɔɔti o.
66006014	Ma atuuzi tammu taden kiyo kuwɛni o, makacin izi ḏim. Maje biyɛn dook kibeen vitɛn ween viriviro aliya maama apiyai vitɛnane ugeec.
66006015	Maje alaata o loocok dook, ki ɔl o titiny, been alaat o takirnyawu, ki ɔl ween arɔk, ki ɔl ween olenya, ki ɔl ween gabara, kibeen ɔl o aliŋliŋonek niigi aroodi niigi dook bɔɔtwani been vitɛnanɛ o lukudik ɛɛl biyɛnɛ.
66006016	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Bar maya iinaket biyɛn nici ka kiliita bornɛt nɔŋ ci eet o aavi lecere o alaazetu kibeen bornɛt nɔŋ o Nyoonu.
66006017	Eeci iiya iiteni uneeŋ aborni nɔŋ. Ŋɛnɛɛn zin ci ka kɛɛla ɛlɛ iitene nico?”
66007001	Enico kicina toonnyak ci Joowo een wec aŋeronek looc kaludanɛ dook wecjentiya. Ma alam niigi ŋootok ween wec dook jaŋ calaŋ ivaan looc, karabɔŋ een liilok, kati een kɛɛn.
66007002	Ma kacin bodo toonnyai oma ci aku libire cijenu o anyak niini katim o Jook o arogi aziita. Ma awo toonnyaiti nici molowe ci appe toonnyak ween wec ona anyonek nɔɔgɔ dɔyizi ci ka kilibti looc been liilok e.
66007003	Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má rak di uulalu looc ki liilok been kɛɛn zɛɛ ma karikɛ gabara o Jook ona ŋumti bayen.”
66007004	Kiziiwa ni ɔl o Israyil aronek bayen ŋumti een dook 144,000. Ɔl nicigi avu boryowe o ɔl o Israyil dook.
66007005	Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Juda een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Robɛn een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Gad een 12,000 .
66007006	Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Acar een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛrayi bore o Navtali een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Manasa een 12,000.
66007007	Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Simiyan een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛryai bore o Livai een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛrayi bore o Isikar een 12,000.
66007008	Ɔl ci aŋɛrayi bore o Zebulon een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛrayi bore o Josev een 12,000. Ɔl ci aŋɛrayi bore o Bɛnjimɛn een 12,000.
66007009	Ma vurte nice kaara kɛbɛrɛ, ma kacin kɔlɛ ci meel ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ci akɔm eet ci anim kɛkɛɛp. Ɔl nicigi avu boryowe dook, been modene dook, been loocowe dook. Ma avu ɛɛl niigi ŋaao lɛcɛr o alaazetu been Nyɔɔn. Aborcek niigi dook rumanɛ ci vɔɔr wuntik, ma anyak azɛɛnɛ oto ci kɛɛn ween kɛtɛlɛɛn.
66007010	Ma agɛrɛny niigi ɔrɔɔt azi nɛ, “Aku ɛɛlyan Joowe onai aavi lecere o alaazetu kibeen Nyɔɔna.”
66007011	Maje toonnyawa o Joowo dook ɛɛl niigi ŋinaante aliya lɛcɛr ci alaazetu noko, ki alaat ween eetom ki tiin wec e, ki kɛlɛk ween wec e. Ma akani niigi dook kozoŋti looc adiŋdiŋan Jook.
66007012	Anɔ nɛ, “Didi zin. Jook ona nɛɛn o anyak naatinɛt, ki titinyɔn, ki gɛnyiz, ki talniin, ki diŋdiŋɔn, ki dɔyiz, been alaazɛt nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.”
66007013	Ijinan ni ɛɛti codoi alaatɛ gi ci anekan nɛ, “Aga inoko ɔl ci aborcek rumanɛ ci vɔɔr noko? Aga inoko ŋinti avuni niigi o?”
66007014	Ma kabɛdɛkɛ naana nɔɔnɔ kanei nɛ, “Manyi, alaŋ kaga, bar aga inoko niina.” Ma anekan nɛ, “Nicigi ɔl o adɔi tuwɛn uneeŋ piryakzete baal gɔɔn agidɛn e nɛɛn. Otoonycɛ zin niigi biyete o Nyoonu kiziti rumanɛ ugeec vɔɔrɛ pɛr.
66007015	Gi zin ci ɛɛlni niigi ŋaati lɛcɛr ci Joowo o nɛɛn ka kiliŋliŋtozek niigi nɔɔnɔ tup waazinok ki baalinok ceeze onin. Jook zin ci aavi lecere ci alaazetu noko nɛɛn o ka kozooti nɔɔgɔ.
66007016	Alaŋ zin bodo adak nɔɔgɔ magizeeti, karabɔŋ aruk kɔr, ma akɔm buk bodo kɔr ci abur avac nɔɔgɔ, karabɔŋ een ŋɔɔt ci abur ivaan nɔɔgɔ.
66007017	Eeci Nyɔɔn ci aavi lɛcɛr ci alaazetu ŋuma noko oowa niini nɔɔgɔ, ma ŋaan akɔyi niini nɔɔgɔ valacece o maam o rogeto. Ma ɛɛya tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔgɔ tilalɔ ugeec.”
66008001	Ma vurta mazi apila nyɔɔn mutulac o ano gɔnɔgi ween tɔrkɔnɔm e, itivanɛ tammu taden tiv ŋinti rak ŋɛdɛt wun kurum ziit kɔrgɛn.
66008002	Ma kacin toonnyak o Joowo een torgɛrɛm o gɔɔn ɛɛl ŋume onin. Anyonek nɔɔgɔ dook torombɛta.
66008003	Ma aku toonnyaiti oman, ma aku abil ŋaao o taabinto. Anyak niini iju ci ɛɛnycai warkinɛ ci aburutni karkari. Ma anyononek nɔɔnɔ karkarɛta ci meelik ci ayelza ŋaryiin o anyek ɔl o tuwento Jook. Agɔɔn niini kaal nicoko ŋaao taabinto lɛcɛr o alaazetu ŋuma.
66008004	Arek zin toonnyaiti karkarɛt goo o, ka kook burɛti been ŋaryiin o anaati ɔl o tuwento Jook tammu tadena ŋaao aavɛ Jooi.
66008005	Odoma ni toonnyaiti nici goo ŋaao taabinto, ma arek iju o ɛɛnycai warkinɛ e, ma ajukek looc. Enico abadun tammu, ma ajul bɔrɔyɛ ɔrɔɔt kɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci ḏirakḏirak.
66008006	Maje toonnyawa ween torgɛrɛm ona anyononek torombɛta e olla areyi ka kotobeec.
66008007	Mazi abo toonnyaiti ci oowu o toromba onin, aromnyai maama ceen biyɛn ki goo been biye, ma iinak niigi dook looc. Ma atoozi lɔɔci ki kɛɛn ki artɛ kaludente codoi ḏim ŋaao aŋerin kizi kaludanɛ iiyu.
66008008	Mazi bodo abo toonnyaiti ci ano gɔɔn nice o toromba onin, kacin gi ci kizik bɛ ci appe alanyit kiyo goo o. Ma ajukonek maam o liilu kutuye maama kaludente codoi ŋaao aŋerin kizi kaludanɛ iiyu keelit kiyo biyeta o.
66008009	Ma adaai buk lɛlɛni codoi lelenete ween iiyu kaale o abaak liile nico. Ma uulali buk kavoolɛt o liilu lɛlɛni codoi lelenete ween iiyu.
66008010	Mazi abo bodo toonnyaiti oman toromba onin, iina monyatot ci appe tamma ci alanyit kiyo tɔl o gooyo o. Iinak monyatot nici liilok been valacɛ kaluden codoi.
66008011	Kazi zaar ci monyatot nico nɛ Akaka. Ma ookci maama ci iinak niini noko kakakaac kak. Ma adaai ɔl ci meel ole ci awot maam nicoko o.
66008012	Otobo ni bodo toonnyaiti oman toromba onin. Mazi abo, otoozyai ii libir codoi kizi koli. Buk nyelok libir codoi atoozyai kizi koli. Maje monyony lɛlɛni codoi atoozyai buk kiziti kolitɛ tɛr. Ma muur lɔɔci ziik wec waazinok ki baalinok dook.
66008013	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacin zuut ci adikir amalil tammu tadena rɛɛna many, ma agɛrɛny molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa wole, izi nɔŋa wole. Akunak tedec nɔŋa ci targany ɔl o abaak loota ŋaati tedec abɛ toonnyawa ceen neke iiyu torombɛt.”
66009001	Otobo ni bodo toonnyaiti oman toromba onin. Ma kacin monyatot ona iinak looc e. Anyonek muvtawi ci ka kɔkɔli look ci wun kal.
66009002	Mazi akɔl look otok, aduŋna burɛti ci appe ci abil kiyo burɛti o gɔɔn atoozɛnɛ zarɛ o appe ɔrɔɔt o. Ma abuŋa burɛti nici ii dook gilinyik kizi koli lɔɔci tɛr.
66009003	Ma aduŋnak giroc looc burete nico. Ma anyonek nɔɔgɔ dɔyizi ci avaci ɔl kiyo kitɛɛna o.
66009004	Ma aricanonek nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz calaŋ adayi artɛ ki kɛɛn been kaal o aduŋna tɔdɔwai dook. Bar olla aduyak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci ka kavaci niigi ɔl o alaŋ anyak bayen o Joowo ŋumtene ugeec.
66009005	Ma anyonek buk nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz calaŋ avaci ɔl kadaayitɔ, bar olla abon anyek niigi nɔɔgɔ eleeti wucez nɔkɔ nyɛlɔwɛ tur. Maje ciritɔnti cineeŋ o bar kizik ciritɔn o gɔɔn kiteenu o ɛlɛ.
66009006	Ma nyelowene ceen tur noko abalac ɔl ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɔɔŋ niigi daayiz ka coma aliita balcɔn nico, bar alaŋ adaai.
66009007	Maje giroc nici ɛɛl kiyo jɔmanɛ o eelnek ɔrɔɔn o. Anyak niigi ootinɛ kaal ci kizik kavurɛt ceen warki, ma ɛɛl ŋumti kiyo o ɔl o deer o.
66009008	Ma wuntɛ imana kiyo o ŋaanu o, ma ɛɛl nyigita kiyo o maatu o.
66009009	Ma anyak kubulɛt ceen ziik. Maje tabana cigeec o anyak molok ci appe kiyo zɔɔci o kɛlɛk o aluti o.
66009010	Ma anyak kaal ci avaci ɔl kiyo kitɛɛna o, ma apirnanɛ ɔl nyɛlɔwɛ tur.
66009011	Ma anyak niigi alaan ceen toonnyai ci Loryento ci abal look ci wun noko. Akanek ɔl o kazi Ibiro toonnyai nico zaar ci kazi Abadon. Maje ɔl o kazi Garik awo zaar ci kazi Apalan. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ libɛn.
66009012	Nici zin nɔŋ o targany oowu nɛɛn, bar zin ŋaan ɛɛl nɔŋa ci targany een ram ka kivita.
66009013	Otobo ni bodo toonnyaiti oman toromba onin. Mazi abo, kazii molok ci aku ŋaao taabinto een warki abil Jook ŋuma.
66009014	Anek mɔlɔyi nici toonnyai nico nɛ, “Ɔɔga toonnyak ween wec baal acabje liile o adikir kazi Yuparatiz e.”
66009015	Maje laadun toonnyawa ceen wec noko acabje niigi ŋinaante o arɛ iiten nico ka kɔɔt kuruyit niigi ɔl lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ween iiyu kadaayitɔ.
66009016	Ayit niigi takirnya ci meel gɛr ci atɔɔt jɔmanɛ. Ma aduyakan meelitin ci akeebinɛ takirnya nici kiziti 200,000,000.
66009017	Ma kacin wunozinte can noko jɔmanɛ nicoko been ɔl ci atɔɔt nɔɔgɔ noko. Anyak ɔl nicigi ogɛn kubulɛt ceen ziik meerik kiyo goo o, ma anyak ogɛn kubulɛt ci colayik kiyo jaloc o, ma bodo buk ogɛn anyak kubulɛt ci maanik kiyo toloyaci o. Maje ooti ci jɔmanewu o kizik ooti ci maatu. Ma aduŋna utugetine cigeec o goo ki burɛt been ŋɔliz ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.
66009018	Ma goo ki burɛt been ŋɔliz ci gɛr aduŋna utugetine cigeec noko aruk ɔl lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ween iiyu kadaayitɔ.
66009019	Ma dɔyizi ci jɔmanɛ nicoko o abil utugetinɛ been nyalaadɛtɛ buk. Eeci nyalaadɛta cigeec o ɛɛl kiyo kowanya o, ma anyak utugeti ci adayi ɔl kipirta ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
66009020	Maje ɔl o ŋaan kurukte jɔmanene nicoko kadaayitɔ e, alaŋ arɔɔŋ kotoŋit baciinok ugeec, bar amɛna adiŋdiŋan voŋizok o Loryento been joowanɛ o adilyai nɔkɔ. Ma joowanɛ ci adilyai noko ɛɛnycai warkinɛ ki zurtenene ci gidaŋ, ki zurtenene ci maan, ki biyɛnɛ, been kɛɛni. Alaŋ een joowanɛ ceen didi ka kidiŋdiŋanit ɔl, eeci alaŋ acinɛ, ma alaŋ aziiŋnɛ, ma alaŋ amɔɔt.
66009021	Buk ɔl nici alaŋ arɔɔŋ kotoŋit monyɛnɛt, ki tamarzɛt, ki waaŋzɛt, been gorziin.
66010001	Kicina ni bodo toonnyai ci adɔi aku tamma. Aborconek nɔɔnɔ diizwana kiyo rumanɛ o, ma atakuconek bɔrɔyɛ ɔɔ cin o. Ma abil ŋum cinɛ o kiyo ii o, ma alanyit zɔɔna ciginɛ o kiyo goo o.
66010002	Anyak niini aziita waragɛ ci miliny, ma akoli waragɛ nici ŋaati anyayi aziita o. Ma arek zooc ci azo o liil, maje zooc ci kaŋeto o arek dɔwɔn.
66010003	Ma agɛrɛny molowe ci appe kiyo aruur maa o. Ma abɛdɛkɛ bɔrɔyɛta ceen torgɛrɛm nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz julya.
66010004	Mazi azɔɔz bɔrɔyɛta nici julya, kɔrɔɔŋa kɛtɛyɛɛt zɔɔz cineeŋ o. Bar kazii molok ci aku tamma, anekan nɛ, “Rɔɔt kaal ci aduwa bɔrɔyɛta nici o. Zooti niina doon. Má ayeedi.”
66010005	Ma kacin toonnyai nico adoŋek aziit cin azo o tammu taden.
66010006	Ma itoon zaar o Jook o arogi nɔkɔ been nɛɛn o ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki kaal o ɛɛl ŋinaante dook, ki looc ki kaal o ɛɛl loota dook, ki liilok been kaal o anyak dook. Azi niini nɛ, “Alaŋaan bodo rewinɛt o Joowo akɔ ŋinti rɛɛn ŋaati ka kidicai niini liŋliŋɔn onin.
66010007	Inoko zin ma abo toonnyaiti o ano gɔnɔgi ween tɔrkɔnɔm e toromba onin, agaac idica Jooi liŋliŋɔn onin alaŋ agayi baal aduwak niini nyakaŋanɛt ogin doon e.”
66010008	Ma kazii molok ona azoozekan tamma e bodo anekan nɛ, “Bitɔ doma waragɛ o miliny akoli e toonnyaite ona anyak e.”
66010009	Koowa ni toonnyaite nico, ma kakɔ kajin ka kanyan waragɛ. Eneyan ni niini nɛ, “Doma dak. Akɛtkɛt tedec otoge cun o kiyo lɛtɛci o, bar zin tedec awuci kɛŋ ɔrɔɔt.”
66010010	Kodoma ni waragɛ nico nɔɔnɔ aziita. Mazi kadei, akɛtkɛt didi kiyo lɛtɛci o. Bar mazi kakuu, ook uwuc kɛŋ ɔrɔɔt.
66010011	Uduwayan ni niini zɔɔz ci anekan nɛ, “Abon amɛna uuwaye zɔɔz o Joowo modɛn kɛbɛrɛ dook kibeen alaat ugeec.”
66011001	Anyozeyan ni kɛɛt ci ka kook kayabizɔi, ma aduyakan zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Bitɔ yabiz ceez o Joowo been ŋino taabinto. Buk kɛɛp ɔl o adiŋdiŋan Jook ŋinaante.
66011002	Bar zin má ayabiz ceez reerun, eeci anyozozek ŋinitana modɛn o alaŋ een Juz. Uulal zin tiŋeere niigi kutur o Joowo nyɛlɔwɛ ceen eet ram ki tiin ram.
66011003	Ŋaan zin kakɔ naana kitoona bacok ogan een ram ka kivita kuuwayit niigi nyelowene nicoko ŋaati anyai rumanɛ ci zɔrzɔr.”
66011004	Ma bacowa ceen ram noko atobɔ niigi kibeen kɛɛn ween kiŋiro een ram been tokolɛn ween ram ɛɛl ŋume o Jook o abal looc dook.
66011005	Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kutuguwek nɔɔgɔ gi ci gɛr, aduŋnakɛ koca niigi nɔɔnɔ goo utugetine ugeec, ma aruk kadaak.
66011006	Anyak niigi dɔyiz ci alami tammu calaŋ atiil iinyaye ci uuwayi zɔɔz o Joowo o. Ma buk anyak dɔyiz ci ookci maam dook kizi biye. Ma anyak niigi dɔyiz ci anyaakɛ looc moorizok ki kaalyan ci gɛr ci olla arɔɔŋ niigi.
66011007	Mazi avɔ adicai nyɛlɔwɛ o uuwawi o zɔɔz o Joowo, aduŋna tiŋeere kelegiti o mooti loowe o wun kal, ma aku ɔɔrɔ ki nɔɔgɔ. Ma amɔk niini nɔɔgɔ, ma aruk nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ.
66011008	Ma oogin eleeti ugeec gole o kutur o adikir baal adodinɛ Manyi uneeŋ keete ween talakec e. Ma kuturi nici agayi gerzitina kiyo baale Sodom been Masir e.
66011009	Avu zin tiŋeere agɛlɛm modɛna loocok dook nɔɔgɔ ci adaai oogin gɔla noko iinya iiyu ki iiten kɔrgɛn, ma alaŋ anyek ɔl kɔɔt kadaac nɔɔgɔ.
66011010	Ma atalnɛ tiŋeere ɔl o loocu daayize ci bacok nicoko o. Ma agam tiŋeere niigi caalit, ma anyɔ kaalyan ci adizkɔn talniinta, eeci gɔɔn apirnanɛ nɔɔgɔ nyakaŋanɛta ceen ram noko.
66011011	Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ceen iiyu noko kibeen iiten kɔrgɛn, itiŋawi Jooi bodo nɔɔgɔ daayiza. Ma anyak ɔl ci ona aŋaamnek nɔɔgɔ o ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
66011012	Ma azii bacowa ceen ram noko molok ci appe ci akunak nɔɔgɔ tamma anek nɛ, “Ivitak taden ŋaato”. Makacin didi ilikta diizwana nɔɔgɔ, ma avɔyi tammu tadena kicinit ɔl o amarnin nɔɔgɔ e nɔkɔ.
66011013	Taman nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci ḏirakḏirak. Makacin ilibe kutur libir codoi libiroye ween amɔtɔ kuture nico. Ma adaai ɔl ceen 7,000 ŋaati ona amɔɔni tɔdɔwa noko. Maje ɔl ci ŋaan anyigzai o, anyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook o tammu tadenu.
66011014	Nici zin nɔŋ o targany ano gɔɔn o oowu nɛɛn. Maje nɔŋa o targany ano gɔnɔgi ceen ram noko izi buk ajɔn.
66011015	Otobo ni toonnyaiti o aṯornɛkɛ toromba onin. Ma kazii molokwa ci avu tamma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Ibilun dɔyizi o ka kabalɔi lɔɔci ŋaaten Jook kibeen Kiristo tɔ, ka kabalit niigi looc nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
66011016	Ma adoma alaata ween eetom ki tiin wec ona aavtiz lecerete ugeec ŋume o Joowo e, akani kozoŋti looc ŋume onin, ma adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ.
66011017	Ma anɔ nɛ, “Kanaatin naaga ineet o anyei doyizok dook. Ineet nɛɛn baal aavɛ tɔ baale kinatamma laadun e zɛɛ been inoko o. Kanaatin naaga ineet giye o anyayɛ niina doyizok dook aziite unun, ma inoko abalu looc.
66011018	Utuburtin zin modɛna, ma inoko izi waŋi o abornɛkɛ niina nɔɔgɔ nɔŋ. Ma buk izi waŋi o ka payi ɔl o adaai. Ma izi waŋi o ka anyekɛ bonat gabara ugun een nyakaŋanɛt. Ma buk ŋaan acacai niina ɔl ugun titiny been ɔl ugun cɛlbɛz kaal o abon aganɔ kibeen diŋdiŋɔn o adiŋdiŋanin niigi ineet. Buk izi waŋi ci ka ɛɛyai ɔl baal uulal looc e.”
66011019	Ɔkɔlɛ ni ceez o Joowo tammu tadena. Ma ayelzai loidoŋi o terkediinto ceeza eecitɔ. Ma abadi tammu, ma ajul bɔrɔyɛta. Maje ŋaato bodo amɔɔt lɔɔci, ma atiilnai maama ceen biyɛn.
66012001	Zin eyelizai gi ci appe panypany tammu tadena. Gi nici bar tɛ ŋaa ci aborcek ii, ma ataadek zɔɔ nyelok, ma anyak ɔɔwa kavur ci anyak monyony ceen amɔtɔ ram.
66012002	Ŋaa nici anyake, ma izi ajɔn ka kotoyai, ma aam nɔɔnɔ dole kutulu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
66012003	Eyelizai ni bodo gi ci appe panypany oman tammu tadena. Gi nici bar tɛ kutal ci meeri appe anyak ooti torgɛrɛm, ma anyak kondɛnɛn kibeen oto amɔtɔ.
66012004	Ma agura nyalaade cin o monyony lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ween iiyu tamma, ma ajukek looc. Ma aku abil niini ŋaa nico ŋuma. Arɛ dole kotoyai ka kukuu.
66012005	Zin didi otowa ŋaa nici logo o ka kabal ɔl dook loota keete onin alaazetu een ziit. Mazi akɔ ookcai, kataman nɔkɔ iraannyai dole nici onyowozozek Jook ŋaao lɛcɛr onin alaazetu.
66012006	Maje ŋaa alya ivir ook balala ŋaabaal agɔɔnak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ka kook kabaai nyɛlɔwɛ eet ram ki tiin ram e.
66012007	Akatai ni enico ɔrɔɔn tammu tadena. Toonnyaiti o Joowo kazi Maikɔl been toonnyak o aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ ɔɔt ɔɔrtɔ ki kutal been toonnyak ogin.
66012008	Ma ɔɔrɔ zɛɛ makacin ɔmɔgɛ kutali kibeen toonnyak ogin. Mazi akɔ amogji, ɔkɔma bodo nɔɔgɔ ŋintineeŋ tammu tadena.
66012009	Ujukcak ni kutali ci appe noko been toonnyak ogin tɔdɔ. Ma kutali nici kutal o kazi zaar nɛ Loryen nɛɛn. Nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ nɛɛn ween kowat baal alaba looc dook e.
66012010	Kiziiwa ni molok ci appe aku tamma azi nɛ, “Inoko zin iiya ɛlyaan o Joowo, ma eyeliza Jooi dɔyiz o alaazɛt onin. Buk eyeliza Kiristo dɔyiz onin. Loryen baal gɔɔn akɔlak gɔtɔnɔga ogaac rooni Joowe onai waazinok been baalinok e ujukcak looc.
66012011	Omogit zin niigi nɔɔnɔ biyete o Nyoonu been zooze ween didi baal uuwak niigi e, eeci agamta baale niigi zɔɔz ci adaaŋni ŋaaten Kiristo labak.
66012012	Ataltɔ zin niiga ɔl o abaaku tammu tadena dook giye nico. Bar zin izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ ɔl o abaaku tɔdɔwai been liilowɛ, eeci Loryen iiyayuŋ igeet bornɛt nɔŋa. Aga niini nɔkɔ izi iinya oginɛ tɔnyɛ.”
66012013	Mazi akɔ acin kutali zɔɔz o ujukcakɛ niini looc, akata tooyinɛt ci atɔɔyi ŋaa ci ona ookcai o.
66012014	Anyozozek ni ŋaa nico tabana ceen ram ɛɛl kiyo o zuut o adikir o, ka kiviri kajaari kutal nico kukulozɛkɛ ŋinbaal agɔɔnak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ka kook kabaai nyɛlɔwɛ eet ram ki tiin ram balala e.
66012015	Mazi acin kutali ŋaa ivirun ŋaatin nɔkɔ, izicek maam ceen tawan nɔɔnɔ vurta ka kitiriiwi maama nici ŋaa kooyi many.
66012016	Bar zin tɔdɔwa izi tiritoi ci ŋaawo. Aŋaaki, ma acorza maam ci ona azicek kutali ŋaa o dook.
66012017	Otoborek ni kutali ŋaa nico nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma akɔ ka kook kɔɔrtɔ been dɔl ci ŋaa nico oogi. Dɔl ci ŋaa nico nɛɛn ɔl o gɔɔn azooni lotinok o Joowo, ma atu zoozok o ayelza Yesu een didi.
66012018	Ma aku abil kutali nici liiltoga.
66013001	Ma kacin kelegit ci mooti aduŋna liila anyak ooti torgɛrɛm been oto amɔtɔ. Ma anyak oto ciginɛ o dook kondɛnɛn. Ma ayeedonek ooti cigin noko dook zaara ci abɔlɔli azi nɛ, Keen naana Jook.
66013002	Kelegiti nici kizik bar kɛlaŋ, maje zɔɔna kizik kiciciman, maje ɔtɔgi kizik maa. Ma anyek kutali kelegit nico dɔyiz onin ki lɛcɛr o alaazetu been alaazɛt onin adikir.
66013003	Ma ɔɔ codoi ootine cigin noko ateedi, ma kizik ka kadaak, bar tɛ tobɛn ci alal labak. Ma atɛɛt ɔl dook zɔɔz nici biye, ma ano kelegit nico.
66013004	Ma adiŋdiŋan niigi dook kutal, eeci anyewun niini kelegit nico dɔyiz onin. Ma buk adiŋdiŋan niigi kelegit nico. Azi nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci atobɔ ki kelegit nico? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anim kooryɔ ki nɔɔnɔ?”
66013005	Ma anyononek kelegit nico gɔl ci ka kɔbɔlɔli kutuguwi ɛlɛ kizi Jook. Ma anyononek nɔɔnɔ dɔyizi ci ka kutuguwi nɔkɔ nyɛlɔwɛ eet ram ki tiin ram.
66013006	Akata ni niini momoz ci amomozi zaar o Joowo, ki ŋin onin abaai, been ɔl o abaak tamma dook.
66013007	Ma anyononek nɔɔnɔ dɔyizi ci ka kɔɔri ɔl o Joowo, ma amɔk nɔɔgɔ, Ma anyononek buk nɔɔnɔ dɔyizi ci abali modɛn o loocu dook.
66013008	Ma ɔl ci abaak loota noko dook adiŋdiŋ nɔɔnɔ. Zin ɔl baal laadun ayɛɛt Jooi zaar ugeec waragewe o rogeto kinatamma e doon calaŋ niigi adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ. Ma waragɛwi ci rogeto o waragɛ ci Nyɔɔn baal aruk ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak e.
66013009	Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu zɔɔz nico juruŋ.
66013010	Mã anyozek eet gɔl ci ka kagamɔi, tiŋeere agamnyi. Mã anyozek eet daayizi ci ka kadaai dilawa, tiŋeere adaai niini dilawa. Zin ɔl o Joowo abon anyak niigi zinzeeti dɔyiz tuwente o atuwi Jook.
66013011	Bodo ni kacin kelegit oma ci mooti aduŋna tɔdɔwai. Anyak kelegiti nici oto ram ci ɛɛl kiyo o mirkic o ŋaan miliny o, ma agɛrɛny kiyo kutali o.
66013012	Ma anyak dɔyiz ci abil kiyo kelegiti ona oowu e, ma atirit niini gɔn nice. Ma adaŋek ɔl ci abaak loota noko dook kidiŋdiŋanit kelegit ci ona anyak oowe codoi tobɛn ci alal noko.
66013013	Ma agɔɔn kelegiti nici kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye. Anyek niini goo kiitak looc tamma kicinit ɔl dook.
66013014	Ma alaba ɔl ci loocu noko dook giye o agɔɔni niini kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ka kitirit kelegit o oowu. Ma aduwak kelegiti nici ɔl kɛtɛɛnyca riritɔn ci abil kiyo kelegiti ona anyak morotɛn e. Aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ kutuguza riritɔn nico ka kidiŋdiŋanti niigi kelegit nico.
66013015	Anyonek kelegit nico dɔyizi ci abɛkɛ vɔŋiz riritɔn o ɛɛnyca ɔl kotobtɔ ki kelegit ona oowu e korok kɔzɔɔz. Ma anyonek riritɔn nico dɔyizi ci ka kuruyi ɔl o alaŋ adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ kadaayitɔ.
66013016	Ma adoma kelegiti nici adaŋek ɔl dook zɔɔz ci ka kanyakti niigi bayen aziine ci azo o, karabɔŋ een ŋumtinɛ, ɔl o titiny ki ɔl o cɛlbɛz, ki ɔl ween arɔk been ɔl o amaat, ki ɔl ween mirɔk been ɔl o alaŋ een mirɔk.
66013017	Akɔm zin bodo eet ci ka kataalɔ karabɔŋ ataalinɛ kaal, dooke coma anyak bayen ween zaar o kelegit nico.
66013018	Abon zin anyaku gɛnyiz. Ma ɛɛti ci agɛny ajowa niini kɛŋ ci bayen ci kelegit nico o, ma bayen nici een
66014001	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacin Nyɔɔn ci abil biye o kazi Ziyɔn Jerusalɛma. Aromɛ niini been ɔl baal aŋɛryai een 144,000 e. Anyak ɔl nicigi ŋumtinɛ zaar o Nyoonu been zaar o baatin ween Jook.
66014002	Ma kazii molok ci aku tamma ci uurut kiyo maama o ariiya biyɛn tadena o. Ma buk ajul kiyo bɔrɔyɛ o. Ma bodo arɔk kiyo kidorɛta o abenin ɔl o.
66014003	Ma avu ɔl ceen 144,000 noko, ma avu ɛɛl ŋaao lɛcɛr o alaazetu ki ŋume o kɛlɛk ween wec been ŋume o ɔl ween alaat. Ma abɛn niigi beniin ci colai. Ma akɔm eet ci anim kɛdɛmɛz beniin nico, bar aga niigi doon ŋaao ɛɛnɛ 144,000 baal ataalanɛ Nyɔɔn nɔɔgɔ loota biyete ogin e.
66014004	Ma ɔl nicigi dook ɔl o azooni eleeti waaŋzɛta ki zoocmaziti. Ma ano niigi Nyɔɔn nɔkɔ ŋaati olla tɛ akɔyi niini. Ataalyai niigi loocowe dook, ka kiziti ɔl ci Joowo kibeen Nyɔɔn.
66014005	Aleek nɔɔgɔ vɔlɔŋ been nɛɛn, ma akɔm niigi kaal ci gɛr abaca.
66014006	Enico kicina toonnyai ci Joowo akul tammu kɛŋa. Anyaa niini zɔɔz o abil been nɛɛn o kaviyak o Joowo colai ka kiiya kuduwak modɛn o loocu dook.
66014007	Ma agɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Ɔtɔŋɔltɛ Jook. Idiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ. Eeci iiya iiteni o ka kapayi niini ɔl dook. Idiŋdiŋanit zin nɔɔnɔ o ɛɛnyca tamma taden, ki tɔdɔ, ki liilok, been valacɛ.”
66014008	Ma anowa bodo toonnyai nico gɔn oman ci azi nɛ, “Uulalɛ, uulalɛ kuturi o adikir kazi Babilan. Kutur zin nico nɛɛn o gɔɔn anyek modɛn kɛbɛrɛ dook kutuguzɔ kaal ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt iinya dook calaŋ bac buk zinzeeti azi caki kiyo abaaki o.”
66014009	Ma anowa bodo toonnyak ceen ram noko toonnyaiti oman ci agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci adiŋdiŋan kelegit nico been riritɔn onin, ma agama bayen onin karek ŋum karabɔŋ een aziit, abornek koca tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ajowa niini piryakzɛt ci appe ɔrɔɔt gooye ween lɔtɔn ŋume o toonnyak o tammo been Nyɔɔna.
66014011	Ma burɛti ci tiŋeere aduŋna gooye ci avaat nɔɔgɔ neke aburut tiŋeere nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Apirna tiŋeere niigi baalinok ki waazinok dook, eeci idiŋdiŋanit niigi kelegit kibeen riritɔn onin, ma anyak niigi bayen o zaar ogin.”
66014012	Abon zin ɔl o Joowo adɔi tuwente uneeŋ. Abon azooni niigi lotinok o Joowo, ma abon atu niigi Yesu ɔrɔɔt.
66014013	Enico kiziiwa molok ci aku tamma azi nɛ, “Tɛyɛɛt zɔɔz co. Abil mayuwɛnɛt ole o adaai giye o anowi niigi Jook.” Ma azi bodo Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɛ, “Didi zin. Inoko tiŋeere niigi uyubuzit liŋliŋonte uneeŋ, eeci acacak tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔgɔ bonat o liŋliŋɔn uneeŋ.”
66014014	Mazi kaara kɛbɛrɛ, kacin gi ci kizik eet ci deer ci aavɛ diizoc ci vɔɔr. Anyak niini kavur ceen warki ɔɔwa, ma anyak aziita cɛrcɛr ci lɛɛdi ɔrɔɔt.
66014015	Ma aduŋna toonnyaiti oman ceeze o Joowo, ma awo molowe ci appe eet ci ona aavi diizoca o azi nɛ, “Doma cɛrcɛr unun, tɛɛdɔ. Ibiiritɔ kaala o loocu dook.”
66014016	Odoma ni ɛɛti ci ona anyak cɛrcɛr aziita noko ɔtɔɔmɔwi cɛrcɛr tɔdɔwai, ma atɛɛda kaal o loocu dook.
66014017	Ma kacin bodo toonnyai oma aduŋna ceeze o Joowo tammu tadena. Anyak niini buk cɛrcɛr ci lɛɛdi ɔrɔɔt.
66014018	Ma kacin toonnyai o gɔɔn abɛk goo ŋaao taabinto aduŋna ŋinaante. Ma awo niini toonnyai ci anyak cɛrcɛr noko molowe ci appe anek nɛ, “Cin di. Kaal o loocu dook loota ibiiritɔ. Doma zin cɛrcɛr unun ka tɛɛdɔ.”
66014019	Ɔtɔɔmɔwi ni toonnyaiti nici cɛrcɛr onin loota, ma atɛɛda kaal o loocu. Ma kaal ci loocu noko ɔl o loocu nɛɛn. Aruk toonnyaiti nici nɔɔgɔ o, eeci abornek Jooi nɔɔgɔ nɔŋ.
66014020	Ma ariik biyeta ugeec loota kiyo maama o tawano o.
66015001	Ma kacin gi ci panypany tammu tadena ci ateedan biye ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Bar tɛ gi nici toonnyak ceen torgɛrɛm ci ka kanyaaktak ɔl piryakzɛt ki gidɛn lak torgɛrɛm. Ma gidɛn nici gidɛn o aṯornɛkɛ. Nici zin dican o bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo nɛɛn.
66015002	Ma kacin ŋinti kizik liil ci liilim kiyo gizazac o, ma azi pilpil kiyo goo o. Ma kacin buk ɔl ona abor kelegit ki riritɔn onin kibeen bayen onin een e. Ɛɛl niigi ŋaati kizik gizazac noko, anyak kidorɛt o Joowo azɛɛnɛ.
66015003	Ma adiŋdiŋan niigi Nyɔɔn ŋaati abɛni beniin ci atobɔ ki beniin baal abɛn Mosis azi nɛ, “Manyi Jook o anyei dɔyiz dook, een niina alaan o modɛn dook. Kaala ugune gɔɔn agoon atɛɛt ɔl dook biye. Kaala o agoon dook kaal ci ɛɛl tɔp.
66015004	Ɔl dook aŋolinin ineet, ma atitiny niigi dook zaar ugun. Ineet doon o titiny. Ma tiŋeere avu modɛna dook ka kivita kidiŋdiŋantin ineet, eeci ɔl dook icinit liŋliŋonok ugun abon.”
66015005	Ma vurta kacin ceez o Joowo tammu tadena ɔkɔlɛ, ma kacin ceez ŋino alile.
66015006	Ma aduŋna ceeze nice toonnyawa ween torgɛrɛm e. Aborcek niigi dook rumanɛ ci vɔɔr ataranet, ma anyak zinzeetinɛ kubulɛt ceen warki.
66015007	Ma anyek kelegiti codoi kelege ween wec e toonnyak ceen torgɛrɛm noko kodoocɛ ceen warki een torgɛrɛm ci abiz bornɛt nɔŋ o Jook o arogi been nɛɛn.
66015008	Ma adala ceez o Joowo gi ci kizik burɛt ci aku diŋdiŋonte o Joowo been dɔyize onin. Ma akɔm eet ci anim kook ceeze o Joowo eecitɔ zɛɛ ma akɔ adicai piryakzɛt ki gidɛn ween lak torgɛrɛm ona anyaa toonnyawa e.
66016001	Ma kazii molok ci appe aku ceeze o Joowo anek toonnyak ween torgɛrɛm e nɛ, “Ooti kodoocɛ ceen torgɛrɛm noko ka ɔɔt uḏuutek bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo looc.”
66016002	Ma akɔ aḏuutek toonnyaiti ci oowu o bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin looc. Taman nɔkɔ ɛyɛnnyai dɔkizɛ ci adakac ɔrɔɔt ole baal anyak bayen o kelegto, ma adiŋdiŋan riritɔn onin e.
66016003	Bodo buk aku toonnyaiti oman, ma aḏuutek bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin e liilok o adikir. Taman nɔkɔ utuye maama keelit kiyo biyeta o eet o adaai o, makacin adaayitɔ kaala o arogi liilowɛ dook.
66016004	Bodo aku toonnyaiti oman, ma aḏuutek bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin liilok o miliny been valacɛ kutuye kizi biye.
66016005	Ma kazii toonnyai o gɔɔn abɛk maam azi nɛ, “Inoko agoon gi ci abon. Apai niina kaal keelit tɔp. Een niina Jook o alile nɛɛn baal abil tɔ kinatamma laadun e zɛɛ been inoko o.
66016006	Baale ɔl o gɛrzɛ akata biye o ɔl ugun been nyakaŋanɛt ugun. Inoko zin anyeyu buk niina nɔɔgɔ biye ka kowodit. Ojokta zin niigi payiin ci aganɔ been gerzitin uneeŋ.”
66016007	Ma kazii molok ci aku ŋaao taabinto ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Didi zin. Een niina Manyi Jook o anyei doyizok dook. Payiinowa ugune een didi, ma ɛɛl tɔp.”
66016008	Ma aku bodo aḏuutek toonnyaiti oman bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin e ii, ma anyononek ii dɔyizi ci avaadi ɔl aburiza.
66016009	Ma avaat aburizi nici ɔl ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, makacin odomit niigi Jook o anyaak nɔɔgɔ piryakzɛt nico. Alaŋ aga niigi piryakzɛt nici aganɔ kibeen gerzitin uneeŋ o, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ buk niigi kotoŋit baciinok ugeec.
66016010	Ma bodo aku toonnyaiti oman, ma aḏuutek bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin lɛcɛr o kelegto anyayi baliin. Taman nɔkɔ adala muuri baliin o kelegit nico lai, ma adak ɔl nyigit balcɔnta.
66016011	Mayo nuun adakac dɔkizɛ ugeecrk, ma abalac niigi ɔrɔɔt o, alaŋ arɔɔŋ kotoŋit baciinok ugeecik gɛr agɔɔn been nɛɛn, bar adɔm niigi Jook.
66016012	Ma bodo aku aḏuutek toonnyaiti o ano gɔnɔgi ceen tur o bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin liil o appe kazi Yuparatiz. Taman nɔkɔ owodjai liili nici kɔdɔk kɛŋ kak ka kanyek alaat o avu libire ci jenu e gɔl.
66016013	Ma kacin voŋizok ci gɛr een iiyu ci kizik bar nyɛɛlwa. Aduŋna niigi otoge o kutalo, ki otoge o kelegit o oowu e, been otoge o kelegit o vurto een nyakaŋan o voloŋo.
66016014	Nicigi voŋizok o Loryento anyak dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye. Ma iŋaaz niigi avɔ awa alaat o loocu dook kivita kulute ŋaatodoi ka kereya iiten o ka kooryɔi niigi ki Jook. Ma iitene nice azaan tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔgɔ dɔyize onin kizi nɔŋa cigeecik targanyɛ.
66016015	“Iziiktɔ zin. Kakun iima naana kiyo agoryaiti o. Amayuwi zin ɛɛti ci acinɛ baalin dook, ma azooni rumanɛ ogin kizi ajɔnɛ ka calaŋ adun niini ŋaḏinyiny, ma anyaak ɛlɛ alyaan kɔla.”
66016016	Ma anyaak voŋizowa nicigi alaat o loocu ŋintodoi. Ma ŋinti alotɛn alaata nici noko awo ɔl o kazi Ibiro zaar ci kazi nɛ Armagedon.
66016017	Ma bodo aku aḏuutek toonnyaiti ci ano gɔnɔgi ceen tɔrkɔnɔm o bornɛt nɔŋ o kodooc onin ŋɔɔt. Ma aduŋna mɔlɔyi ci appe lecere o alaazetu abil ceeze o Joowo tammu tadena, ma azi nɛ, “Inoko zin odota.”
66016018	Enico abadit bɔrɔyɛta, ma ajul, ma amɔɔt lɔɔci ḏirakḏirak ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ mɔɔtiz ci ŋaabaal ɛɛnycanɛ lɔɔci ŋaan kɔtɔɔmɔ nɔkɔ. Ma mɔɔtizi nici appe ɔrɔɔt kujuk mɔɔtiz o gɔɔn laadun amɔɔni lɔɔci o dook.
66016019	Ma apaki kuturi o adikir kazi Babilan kɛŋɛrɛ lak iiyu. Ma alibe kuturyowa o loocu dook lai. Alaŋ areyek Jook kuturi ci adikir kazi Babilan noko, ma itoonek nɔɔnɔ payiin onin gɛr o, eeci abornek niini nɔɔnɔ nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt.
66016020	Ma azi vitɛna o kutulik aliya maama dook been biyɛn ḏim.
66016021	Ma atiilna tammu taden maam ceen biyɛn ci appintik adiŋdiŋ kiyo goluwɛta o, ma iinak ɔl kodomit Jook giye o apirnanɛ niigi biyene ci iinak nɔɔgɔ noko.
66017001	Iiyayan ni toonnyaiti codoi toonnyaye ceen torgɛrɛm ona anyak kodoocɛ o, ma aku anekan nɛ, “Ija ka keyeleyin piryakzɛt o apawonek kutur o kazi Babilan ɛɛnycai ŋaao aliya liilowa o meelik. Kuturi nici atobɔ niini ki ŋaa ceen waaŋnyai agayi ɔrɔɔt.
66017002	Ma oogin niini kibeen alaan. Ma agɔɔn buk ɔl o loocu dook kibeen nɔɔnɔ waaŋzɛt ci abaayinɛ kiliita nɔɔgɔ lɔɔci lai.”
66017003	Ooyan ni toonnyaiti nici balala vɔŋize o Joowo. Ma ŋinaante kicina ŋaa ci aavɛ kelegit meeri ci mooti, ma ayeedonek kelegit nico ɛlɛ dook zaara ci abɔlɔli azi nɛ, “Keen naana Jook.” Ma anyak kelegiti nici ooti torgɛrɛm been oto amɔtɔ.
66017004	Aje ŋaa nici aborcek rum ceen gol jaloc. Ma ayiŋyiŋan ɛlɛ warkinɛ been kalbene ceen kagora azi pilpil kibeen ziira. Ma anyak buk niini diic ceen warki aziita. Maje diic nico abiz ririnya ci kaal o waaŋzɛt onin.
66017005	Maje ŋum cinɛ o ayeedonek zaara ci anyak kɛŋ ci aroodi ci azi nɛ, “Babilan o adikir o ademzek ɔl o loocu dook waaŋzɛt kibeen gerzitin.”
66017006	Ma kacin ŋaa nico abaak nɔɔnɔ biyeta o ɔl o Joowo ki biye o bacok o Yesu baal gɔɔn aruk niini e. Mazi kagelem nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, kabaraŋɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
66017007	Ma ajinan toonnyaiti anekan nɛ, “Gitaz ci ɛɛnɛ baraŋ o? Ŋaan kaduwakin kɛŋ ci akati ŋaa nico o, kibeen kɛŋ ci akati kelegit ci aavɛ niini anyak ooti torgɛrɛm been oto amɔtɔ noko.
66017008	Ma kelegiti ci acin niina noko baale rak arogi labak, makacin bodo iziitɔ. Bar zin inoko izi ŋinti ka kudunai niini loowe o wun ka kiiya kook ŋaao ka kuulalɔi lai. Mazin ɔl o abaak loota baal ŋaan laadun zaara ugeec keteyeede waragewe o rogeto kinatamma e, ateedi tiŋeere nɔɔgɔ biyeta ŋaati acini kelegit nico, eeci baale arogi niini labak, ma inoko o iziitɔ, bar zin katin ŋaan ayelzai bodo.
